The story unfolds across various locations, including a suburban home and a mysterious forest retreat, where an innocent couple faces a relentless werewolf and other monstrous creatures. Players will engage in tense exploration, object interaction, and combat, using stealth and strategy to hide, fight, and escape from supernatural threats. The game blends elements of classic horror films and survival horror games, offering a narrative-driven, single-player experience filled with fear, suspense, and the challenge of survival under the full moon.

name: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
summary: A remake of the first installment in the main Trails series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.
developers: Nihon Falcom, GungHo Online Entertainment, Inc., Clear River Games
storyline:
The protagonists are Estelle and her partner Joshua, who aspire to become Bracers, protectors of peace in the region.

As they take their first steps as apprentice Bracers, the duo travels across the Liberl Kingdom, resolving various requests and incidents in each place they visit, gaining experience as Bracers along the way.

name: Morsels
summary: Morsels is a fast-paced creature collecting roguelite with a rotating roster of characters to switch between at will. Overcome a clique of killer cats as you fight your way out of the sewers in this unique, action-packed journey.

name: Coffee Talk: Tokyo
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Coffee Talk: Tokyo is the newest instalment of the beloved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator. It brings the warmth, heart, and delicious drinks from the previous games to an all-new café in Tokyo where humans and yokai alike share their stories.
developers: Chorus Worldwide Games Limited, Toge Productions
storyline: In a city of paper and steel, as large as a country, a small café gives humans and fantasy people a cosy place to be. Brew the right order for your customers as they seek refuge from the sweltering Tokyo summer heat and share heartfelt stories to chill lo-fi beats.

name: Orbo's Exodus
summary:
After a whirlwind odyssey with his friend, our accountant-turned-hero Orbo decides to make his way home by way of Peeb's signature biplane. While flying over the coast of a mysterious vacation resort, Peeb's attempt to demonstrate a cool loop-de-loop turns into a spectacular nosedive that is only one-upped by the resulting explosion.

Following the crash, Orbo is left stranded, with Peeb nowhere in sight. Left to his own devices, Orbo begins an all-new quest to buy a ferry back to the mainland, but in the process he may discover there's more to the island than meets the eye...

Armed with some new moves and a set of snazzy hats, Orbo sets out on his final adventure: an exodus of epic proportions.

name: Fatal Run 2089
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Atari’s Fatal Run 2089 delivers over-the-top driving action across a post-apocalyptic landscape. You’ll have to race against a countdown clock at incredibly high-speeds and destroy enemy vehicles by any means necessary. Fail to complete your missions and you put humanity in jeopardy.

name: Kokubyaku no Avesta: Aushedar
summary:
Under the world of the first Divine Throne, two forces are killing each other relentlessly. Black and White, Light and Darkness, Good and Evil. Until the other is destroyed, the fighting will never stop. That is the instinct called Avesta.
Follow the wicked warrior Magsarion and his path of remorseless breaking dualism, along with Quinn, who is tasked with collecting a "miracle".

This is the first installment in a two-part visual novelization of the light novel by Masada Takashi, serving as a prequel to his earlier visual novel "Paradise Lost".

name: Brute Horse
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
developers: Place of Departure, Bohemia Interactive Studio

name: Onward: Asylum
summary: Going onwards as we escape this horrific asylum— an indie 2D horror sidescroller where your task is to get out of the facility without getting captured by the monster itself.
storyline:
An alarm broke and woke up a girl from her sleep filled with fragments of memories of her past. Grace is alone in a secret underground laboratory where they do experiments illegally with humans. She is on a quest to find her mom and leave this place. Unbeknownst to her, something is lurking within the shadows, a monster waiting for their cue.
Will grace be able to escape from the prison she was held captive? Will Hope guide her the way?

name: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare
summary: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare is a single-player story-based game. Play as Takiko to explore several areas inside her unique reality. Players can interact with various objects, solve puzzles, fight enemies, or discover some unreal phenomena.
storyline:
Takiko is a teenage girl. Her grades suddenly drop and sometimes she spends time in her room with empty looks.

The parents are getting worried about what is wrong with her. They decided to bring Takiko to a psychiatrist.

The psychiatrist took action by doing hypnotherapy to make Takiko relax and close her eyes. But, everything change after she open her eyes.

name: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is an action-packed, rogue-lite adventure in the world of Random. Play as Queen Aleksandra and wield her living die-companion Fortune, as they go all in against the ancient evil that took everything from her.

name: Park Ranger Simulator
summary: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!

name: Sigilfarer
summary: Sigilfarer is a roguelite adventure where every decision rests on the roll of your dice. Master a dice-building system while navigating a sprawling, procedurally generated world. Strategize your route, manage resources and push your luck to the limit!

name: Galactic Economy
summary: Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy? Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

name: Will: Follow the Light
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

name: Floatopia
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Discover all the beloved elements of life simulation games—farming, fishing, logging, and decorating your dream home. With a sprinkle of magic to sweep away your worries, set sail on your very own floating island and journey through a world of superpowers!

name: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
summary:
Deadly Days: Roadtrip is an exciting action roguelite, that combines reverse bullet hell gameplay with strategic inventory management.

Start your road trip through the zombie apocalypse! Fight your way through, gain experience and collect items to assemble an epic inventory.

Craft more effective weapons and find out what items you can combine to withstand the ever-increasing waves of zombies.

name: Project_Structure_01
summary: Project_Structure_01 is first-person exploration game focusing on atmosphere and exploration of surreal liminal spaces that feature brutalist architecture.
storyline: You wake up in space and an unknown entity sends you to explore mysterious locations.

name: Barkour
summary: Step into the paws of a brave, four-legged special agent! In BARKOUR, you work for a secret organization where all agents are exceptionally skilled animals brought together by one goal: to save the world from the forces of evil (and mischievous cats)!

name: Umblight
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Umblight is a deckbuilder roguelite where you must combine cards to overpower your opponents. Travel through dark environments, find treasure, build your special deck filled with unique skills, and battle the creatures you meet along the way in this DND inspired adventure!

name: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Explore the mysterious open world of the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone in this post-apocalyptic action RPG adventure. Craft your story by facing sinister hazards and monsters. Survive furious encounters with the help of your crafted weaponry, developed skills, gathered teammates, and supported factions

name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game
summary: Experience and play through the highest grossing animated movie of 2023 in an all new epic way through an action packed retro story driven 2D Platformer!

name: Gaming Raiding
summary: Third-person shooter games

name: Meowmentum
summary: Run, young Meowcolyte - finish the elders' speed trials and prove yourself worthy of wielding Meowmentum! Harness your paw-kour skills, dash through magic orbs, and race against the world!

name: Northanda Chronicles
summary: Blending deck-building mechanics with party-based RPG elements. Command a trio of heroes battling through a world threatened by reality-warping Chaos, each with unique abilities but sharing a single, evolving deck. Balance the needs and strengths of multiple characters to forge a unified strategy.

name: He is Coming
summary: He is coming is a rougelike autobattler where you have to collect and combine powerful items in order to defeat the demon king and his minions. Upgrade your weapon, discover hidden treasures and survive, because whether you're prepared or not, He is coming!

name: Cargo
summary: Cargo is a space shooter where you collect packages from planets and try to deliver them to other planets without being killed.

name: Zombie Dolls
summary: Fend off hordes of cute zombified dolls using guns, bombs, bats, and boomerangs. Zombie Dolls is a light-hearted, but intense, stand your ground shoot em up game. Don't be fooled by their friendly appearance, they are tough and unrelenting!

name: Aether Singularity
summary: Take on the role of a special agent and fight against digital demons from the Aethernet with your Daemon partner. Something's gone wrong in a prominent research facility, and you and your squad have been deployed to uncover the source of the demonic threat that's been unleashed. Destroy all demons!
storyline:
A demonic anomaly has been detected in an important research facility. DATA agents... deploy!

In 1969, mankind established its first link to the Aethernet. Humanity soon entered a golden age of technological wonder and prosperity.
But, kept secret from the eyes of the public, a second discovery was made shortly after... demons weren't just the subject of myths and religion.
To combat them, the Demonic Anomalies Termination Agency was born. An FBI offshoot where agents are partnered with daemons through a pact, their mission: send the demons back where they belong.

name: Loki's Revenge
summary: Loki’s Revenge is a bullet heaven roguelite where you play as Norse gods fighting Loki’s army of monsters! Level up to gain powerful upgrades and explore the hand-crafted maps to find secret items. Build the ultimate overpowered god with permanent upgrades and master each god’s signature weapon.

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator
summary: Conquer the arcane market in Alchemist Shop Simulator! Set up your very own magical store, full of wonders. Keep expanding your business! Experiment with ingredients bought or home-grown in your garden to brew potions for your quirky clientele. Buy low, sell high, make your store legendary!
storyline:
You find yourself in an idyllic medieval village with no recollection who you are or what are you doing there. You've just woke up on the doorstep of an Alchemist Shop, and a letter in your pocket explains that YOU are the Alchemist!

Its up to you to get your business back on track, learn all the recipes you forgot, and delight the clientele that demands more magic in their lives. There's no business like the magic business, so get that fire going under your couldron!

name: Little Droid 2: Escape
summary: "Little Droid 2: Escape" is a classic 2D (Metroidvania) side-scrolling pixel art adventure where you need to find a way to escape a mysterious planet.

name: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster
summary: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster is an Action RPG Looter Shooter with a focus on build theorycrafting. Exterminate bug hordes, collect gold and items, level up, acquire new skills, upgrade your weapon and fight bosses.

name: Witch Way
summary: A dark witch imprisoned by the Church is forced to turn against her own kind, seeking the most chaotic power within the constraints of trust. This is not just a battle against enemies in action, but also requires a strategic and panoramic vision.

name: Mini Worlds
summary: Mini Worlds is a cozy building game about creating tiny cities on a small world.

name: Camille and Laura
summary: Camille and Laura is a point and click about the greatest adventure of all: parenting.

name: E-FCC
summary: Immerse yourself in the action with E-FCC, the official Fast Close Combat video game, now available on Steam! E-FCC brings you a realistic airsoft simulation experience, based on the innovative sport of Fast Close Combat (FCC). Take on your friends or other online players in intense 1-on-1 duels where every hit counts.

name: Hero of the Hive
summary: Take flight in this casual adventure game as a bee on a mission to save your crumbling hive. With the Queen mysteriously missing, it's up to you to gather resources to rebuild, explore the vast basin, and embark on quests to help the animals of nature as you become the hero your hive needs!

name: Type-Noise: Shonen Shojo
summary: Traumatized youth trapped in 'Noise Scramble City', a labyrinth of their own fears. Amnesiac teens solve puzzles in a multi-ending escape adventure.

name: Verve
summary: Welcome to Verve. You are RT-6, a member of Liminal Leap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call from deep within the void of Verve. Good luck, the Verve is unforgiving.

name: Chemist Wanted
summary: Chemist Wanted is a crafting game with a difference! In this lab simulator, you use practical chemistry to make compounds and sell them. Set up your equipment, run the experiments and create your products. But be careful who you cut deals with - you might get more than you bargained for!

name: Darkwater
summary: A cooperative survival horror game where you take command of a submarine trapped under the ice of an alien planet.

name: Puzzled Hive
summary: Puzzled Hive is a simple, beehive based puzzle game in which you play as Meo and help him explore this strange place in search of his answers.

name: Gensokyo: Presumption of Guilt - Pansies Before Dawn
summary: An ancient village, once sealed by yokais for a millennium, is now plagued by a series of bizarre yokai murders. Follow the protagonist as they delve into the investigation, unravelling the mysteries submerged in the history.

name: Footsy
summary: Footsy is a chaotic multiplayer soccer party game set inside grandma's house! Smash furniture, shatter bottles, and tumble TVs as you compete in wild, goal-scoring action. Customize your characters, challenge your friends, and embrace the crazy destruction in every room!

name: Don't Trust
summary: Don't Trust is a multiplayer horror game about deception. There are a group of survivors on a military base, and one of the survivors is secretly infected. The infected can transform into the survivor form to trick the other players.

name: Project Forgemaster
summary: Inspired by the classic Ragnarok Online, Project Forgemaster is an aRPG where you, a player from the real world, are born in a forge. Summoned for the Realm to level up, explore, and loot monsters. Remember that the king will soon seek your assistance as you forge your path to glory.

name: Rancher: A New Life
summary: Start a new life as a Rancher. Travel the forest paths by quad bike, raise cattle, build, repair, and improve your farm. Take care of animals, go fishing, cook, grow vegetables, practice your accuracy on shooting range, take photos, and much more. Relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

name: Starsand Island
summary: Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise!

name: Paradise Beach Simulator
summary: Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulation game where you transform an abandoned island into a successful business. Welcome your guests, maintain your equipment, manage your staff, and explore your island, all while restoring the beauty of a lost paradise.

name: Floridale Man: The Joy of Chaos
summary: Welcome to the sunny state of Floridale! Make the most of your stay by causing problems on purpose, mingling with hotties and gators, and embracing the chaos of life in this comedy physics collectathon.

name: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
summary: It is a girls' love visual novel set against the backdrop of college and the workplace. The protagonist carries a love curse and is searching for her true love. However, as events unfold, she finds herself facing even bigger challenges...
storyline:
After spending two light-hearted years on campus, I moved on to my junior year. However, I was not only faced with the challenges of graduation and internships, but also suddenly told that I must find my destined soulmate soon, or else I would perish due to a curse.
As if it were fated, my childhood playmate who I hadn't seen in ages suddenly reappeared. My friend's sister showed a keen interest in me, a senior I met by chance generously offered a referral, and even the manager at my internship company cast intrigued glances my way...
Who among them is my fated one, and who has an axe to grind? Hesitantly, I move forward, trying to find answers in the fog...

name: Castle Crashers: Painter Boss Paradise
summary:
We used to be enemies. We used to destroy the world around us. Now, we create!
The DLC will include:
Steam workshop capabilities – create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!
New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and unleash powerful art to vanquish your foes!
New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).
Endless knightly possibilities – if you aren’t feeling creative, choose from thousands of community characters or preloaded characters created by our team!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Gnomer
summary: The gnomes got no chance ! Drop down through levels filled with hostile gnomes. Kill gnomes, upgrade your gear and buy buildings that will help you on your Journey.

name: Pozionista
summary: Travel through a world surrounded by nature, collect plants and use them to create potions, invent new recipes, sell potions in stores and explore the world.

name: MeowFall
summary: MeowFall is a charming 2D platformer in pixel art style. Take control of an adorable cat, overcome obstacles and uncover the secrets. Are you ready for an adventure to find the best hat ever?

name: JumpMap
summary: JumpMap is an exciting first-person 3D platformer that features a special mechanic: every time you fall, you get put back to where you were before. Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!

name: Whisper of the Swallows
summary: Sink into a vast, strange and unforgiving world, in procedural generation. Fight against extreme climatic conditions. Alone or in cooperation, survive, explore, build and bring light back to the chaos.

name: Carpocalypse RC Racing
summary: The World may be over, but the fun is just about to begin! Get ready to race in this post apocalyptic racing game. Visit abandoned warehouse, shop, restaurant or someone's home. Become the champion in Championship Mode or try to survive in Mayhem mode. Warning! Versus mode can ruin your friendship!

name: The Run: Got Next
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The Run: Got Next is a fast-paced, full court, 3v3 basketball game that celebrates all of street hoops culture worldwide. Play solo online or squad up to stack wins and become the G.O.A.T. Who’s Next?

name: Crown and Adventure
summary: An open-world adventure RPG game. Choose your favorite character, train your elite legion step by step, and crash all enemies on the battlefield. Strengthen yourself, establish a powerful family, create a great dynasty, and become the dominator of this fantasy world.

name: Sliding Hero
summary: Sliding Hero is a top-down puzzle Metroidvania where you slide in a single direction until hitting an obstacle. Trapped in a sinister 1700s Venetian villa, explore a world inspired by Venice’s carnival that will test your wits to overcome challenges, uncover secrets, and unmask your destiny.

name: The Whittled Horse
summary: A boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

name: Gun Crate Raccoon
summary: Gun Crate Raccoon is a fast-paced arcade platformer where you collect crates to skyrocket your highscore and conquer the leaderboard. Climb higher and unfold the mysteries of the Tower.

name: Pixel Parkour
summary: Fast, fluid movement is at the core of this vibrant indie adventure. Blast through beautiful landscapes and complete speed challenges to find your purpose in this picturesque, pixelated world.

name: Niraya of
summary: "Niraya of " is a Japanese horror game inspired by the Buddhist beliefs. The game focuses on a unique system where players "avoid" the attacks of various monsters. This, combined with the fear of exploring eerie environments and solving puzzles, is a major draw of the game.

name: Whiskerwood
summary: Establish a home for your industrious mice under the oppressive paw of your cat overlords in this city builder featuring complex simulations, intricate production chains, and the age-old rivalry between cat and mouse.

name: Scholomatch
summary: Match gems, level up, and date wizards in this match-3 visual novel with a lot of heart and a little spice. Form deep relationships with faeries, sirens and werewolves, each with their own endearing personalities and challenges. Make choices that affect your relationships, and their destinies.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 17: Lucy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Adds Lucy to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 16: Unika
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Adds Unika to the roster of playable characters

name: Splitgate 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Portal into the action as an elite Ace in Splitgate 2, the only free-to-play shooter where you can teleport across the map to outsmart your opponents. Team up, customize weapons, and master portaling skills as you compete for glory in epic showdowns.

name: 100 Cats London: Extra Content
summary: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details. 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves in London.

name: Brutalist
summary: Brutalist is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. And all this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.
storyline:
There is a world among you, a world that consists of abandoned concrete jungles, full of mysteries, dangers and secret passages. Your main enemy is polluted air, so along the way you will have to look for oxygen cylinders, this will add to the challenge!
Somewhere far away, there is a green paradise, but can you reach it?

The main feature and idea of ​​the BRUTALIST is to enjoy the environment, especially for fans of post-apocalypse and minimalist concrete architecture. Narration through the environment, that's what awaits you.

name: Exiler
summary: Face demons and occult rituals in Exiler, a gripping horror quest adventure. Perform banishing rites by combining skills and improvised means, uncover eerie secrets, and save innocent souls in a race against time. Be the exorcist or die possessed.

name: Spy Drops
summary: Inspired by stealth action from the 90’s, undertake a series of covert ops to save the world from a global terrorist threat. Experience PS generation, 3D stealth action updated with modern effects, randomly generated levels, modern equipment, and head-to-head local multiplayer.

name: Monster DNA
summary:
At the international space center of research, something we never ask is why. Our clients are from all corners of the new world's universe and we're sworn to secrecy. We deliver our exclusive hybrids monsters as demanded, and of course, we make sure our hybrids have the best possible work contracts. Our source DNA is sourced from the most notorious galactic inmates seeking participation in our programs, often aiming to secure prison perks or time reductions as they negotiated with their administration.

Your job? Create the monsters we seek, and do a quality control on them, whether it's painful or not.

Each playthrough is unique. You can experience it multiple times.

name: Arashi Gaiden
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Arashi Gaiden is a turn-based action game, with frantic combat, in the dash-and-slash style. Arashi is a Ronin from the Pocket Bravery universe, he was hired by his former master, Lobo, receiving the mission of defeating Ninjas and Matilha soldiers to recover 3 powerful relics from Japan.

name: Mizuki and the Crimson Moon
summary: Journey through a yokai-filled Japan in this 2D Action Platformer! Control Mizuki, a carefree and playful kitsune, as she investigates evil events happening around her village. Use her signature ability of teleportation to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies in this unique platformer adventure.

name: Sky Dust
summary: Sky Dust is set in a cyberpunk universe, taking place in a future where society has collapsed following a global disaster, and the lines between morality and ethics have become blurred.
storyline:
In this world, powerful individuals hire mercenaries to carry out various tasks, with data trafficking in the Cyberverse being the most common.
Players take on the role of a mercenary embarking on a transformative journey, impacting both their own life and the world around them.

name: One Last Raid
summary: An arena based roguelike action RPG where you play as a skeleton warrior, who fights waves of enemies with diverse abilities. Each run you create a unique build by selecting different skills on each level up and picking up loot from fallen enemies.

name: MechaBlade Hero
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: MechaBlade Hero is an indie action adventure game where you control a robot fighting your way through an army of robots to get out of a giant tower. Face enemies and gain new weapons, solve puzzles and platform challenges in this challenging hack and slash.

name: Deep Cuts
summary: Genre-bending blend of messy physics, storytelling, and highly detailed worlds. A new chapter in the Scythe Saga Universe from the horror masterminds behind Happy's Humble Burger Farm!

name: Lovesick
summary: After a grueling tour that has left them drained and flat broke, a struggling post-punk band returns home. The group is already on the brink of collapse when a supernatural event dubbed “the Feedback” plunges them all into a twisted alternate reality.
storyline:
Middle-America, 1999. After a grueling tour that has left them emotionally drained and flat broke, the four members of The New Agenda make it back to their dilapidated home, they have nothing in the fridge, nothing in the bank, and nothing in the future but a whole bunch of questions.

“How the hell are we gonna scrap together next month’s rent?” the drummer, Tommi, asks the group. “Well maybe we’d have some cash if we had an album to tour,” says Dom, lead guitar and vocals, “When is Nik going to finally finish writing something?” Nik shouts back from the kitchen, “I’m WORKING on—” but Tommi cuts her off. “How are we supposed to book a show if nobody ever wants to practice?”

name: The Occultist
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: In The Occultist, Alan Rebels travels to the cursed island of Godstone to investigate the sudden disappearance of his father. After decades of mentioning the island, all Alan knows is that his father was born and lived his early years there.
storyline:
In The Occultist, Alan Rebels travels to the cursed island of Godstone to investigate the sudden disappearance of his father. After decades of mentioning the island, all Alan knows is that his father was born and lived his early years there.

Alan does not travel alone. He carries with him his mystical pendulum, an object of unknown origin that accompanies him in all his paranormal investigations. But this will not be a case like the others, he will immerse himself in the foggy streets and maddening buildings, apparently the only thing that remains in GodStone.

GodStone was inhabited until 1950 by a macabre cult that performed all kinds of disturbing experiments and cruel rituals that resulted in the eternal damnation of its inhabitants. No one has ever set foot on the island again, until today. Alan must interact with or avoid the ominous souls that have been frozen in the shadowy streets of GodStone.

As a problem solver, Alan must find his father, investigate what happened on the island and release the curse. Or not…

name: Aces of Thunder
summary: Experience the thrill of aerial combat like never before with Aces of Thunder, the upcoming VR game made specifically with capabilities of PlayStation VR2 in mind.

name: Sloppy Forgeries
summary: Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced, two-player local multiplayer painting game. Each player is given a mouse, a blank canvas, and a few simple paint tools. Each round, a famous painting from art history is revealed. Players race to copy the painting as quickly and accurately as possible.

name: Burden of Truth
summary: The Burden of Proof saga continues! Step into the shoes of legendary prosecutor Conrad Cross during a pivotal moment of his journey. Investigate crime scenes, solve mysteries using evidence, and make your case in the courtroom. The burden lies with you to unravel the truth!
storyline: One year after his mentor's poisoning, renowned prosecutor Conrad Cross accepts a new case tangled in web of conspiracy. In order to determine the true culprit, Cross and his opponent, Kate Flocking, engage in a battle of wits and piece together the incident by analyzing the available evidence. However, this objective proves difficult to accomplish when it's revealed that a mysterious organization is interfering with the flow of information to the courtroom. Even so, the legal counsel is determined to persevere through these limitations and expel the lies by uncovering contradictions within the witness' statements. To deliver justice, someone must be found guilty.

name: Fighting Force Collection
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5
summary: Who doesn’t love a good brawler? In Fighting Force, you and up two three friends have a simple, four step strategy: break things, get weapons, use those weapons to pummel people, and repeat as needed. It’s straightforward streetside carnage with a 3D flair.
developers: Limited Run Games, Square Enix, Core Design

name: Bubsy in: the Purrfect Collection
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Is Bubsy a celebrated icon from the mascot wars of the early 90s or a platforming punchline? The team at Limited Run has built a new collection to find the answer. Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection explores the franchise's troubled history and enduring popularity.

Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is a playable history that includes games, artifacts and interviews. All of the games have been carefully updated for modern PCs and consoles using Limited Run’s proprietary Carbon Engine. Along the way the team was able to smooth out some of the games’ rough edges.

At the helm of the project is Limited Run’s Audi Sorlie, a producer, author, Bubsy World Heavyweight Champion and arguably the world’s foremost expert on the furry franchise. Together with the team at Limited Run and Atari, he has created the ultimate retrospective celebration of Bubsy, the 3’6” tall 80 pound bobcat (with a pet armadillo named Arnold). What could possibly go wrong?

name: Ghosts
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
developers: Visible Games, Jed Shepherd, Limited Run Games

name: Table Flip Simulator
summary: Had a stressful day? Blow off some steam in Table Flip Simulator! This physics-based puzzler allows you to unwind as you throw or smash items with hilarious effects. From working as a barista to becoming the President of Antarctica, you can go beyond flipping the table – the world is yours to wreck!

name: Cats Hidden Around the World 2
summary: Find 1500 cats hiding in over 15 iconic locations such as Dubai, Rome or Bangkok in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Get More Fries!
summary: "I'm a seagull, and I'm not just after your fries, I'm also gonna poop on humans! You guys better watch out!" This is a 3D game with some action elements

name: Five Laps at Freddy's
summary:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Select one of 12 of your favorite animatronic #FNaF characters and race on sixteen tracks set across 4 cups! Each track is based on your favorite locations from Five Nights at Freddy's lore, including Fazbear Hills, Midnight Motorist and more!

name: Dragon Quest I & II: HD-2D Remake
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake will continue the classic RPG trilogy’s narrative, offering players two adventures to undertake in DRAGON QUEST I and DRAGON QUEST II.
developers: Square Enix, Artdink, Team Asano, Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Mio: Memories in Orbit
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Play an android in MIO: Memories in Orbit, a mesmerizing metroidvania where you explore the Vessel, an enormous technological ark overgrown with machines gone rogue. Uncover its secrets, enhance MIO's abilities, and save the spaceship and its resident from oblivion!

name: Whiskers Wonderland
summary: Whiskers Wonderland: a game where your pops sent you to find something that was lost in a restaurant, but be warned, Mr Whiskers doesn't like trespassers and you unfortunately are one, so he's after you... You do remember another robot named Dr Mouser. Ready to find what happend to him?

name: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX
summary: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX is an enhanced edition of the pixel-perfect adventure. Jump, battle foes, and dig up treasure as you quest to defeat the Order of No Quarter and The Enchantress. DX adds 20 playable characters, online multiplayer, and new features like rewind and save states.

name: Gummy Nightmares
summary: Step into the enigmatic world of Gummy Nightmares as a little boy who wakes up in a mysterious amusement park with no memory. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover lost memories while evading sinister plushie robots. Use weapons, set traps, and find hideouts to survive and reveal the truth.
storyline:
Gummy Park was once a lively amusement park filled with joy and laughter, but one day, an accident turned everything sinister. Now, you must explore this eerie park haunted by sinister robots, uncover its secrets, and remember who you are before the nightmares consume you!

Beware of the sinister plushie robots that haunt the park, trying to keep you from discovering the truth. Survive by hiding, setting traps, or confronting them. As you progress through the story, these robots will become increasingly aggressive. Fortunately, along your journey, you will also encounter friendly robots who will help you achieve your objectives and fight the evil ones!

Your slingshot is your best friend! Use it to shoot active elements like electric boxes, gumball dispensers, or fire extinguishers to attack your enemies and slow them down. The slingshot isn't just for fighting; it can also be used to interact with your surroundings, solve puzzles, and unlock secrets. Most importantly, remember to regularly fill your backpack with gumballs from the dispensers located throughout the park.

In certain areas of the park, you'll encounter patrolling robots such as Gummy and Scrawny. Fighting them isn't always an option; at times, survival hinges on finding a hiding spot. Seek sanctuary inside lockers, beneath beds, or within the rides situated in the lobby. Additionally, the karts in the lobby provide a means of evading your adversaries.

name: Lunar Eclipse
summary: Ealish, the sole survivor, hides in the shadows, seeking shelter from the merciless creatures that now dominate this devastated world. Immerse in the grim atmosphere of what’s happening. Fight for life, create anew, explore the unknown, become a hunter in a world where everyone has become prey!

name: Sonatina
summary: Sonatina is a challenging action-adventure RPG. Fight epic battles against formidable foes using rhythmic shmup (“shoot them up”) combat.

name: Anno 117: Pax Romana
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
In the latest instalment of the award-winning Anno strategy franchise, it’s your destiny to shape the Roman Empire in the year 117 AD. As governor, will you encourage economic growth or expand your rule through dominance? Lead with rebellion or unite a diverse culture?
The cost of peace is yours to decide.
developers: Ubisoft Blue Byte, Ubisoft Entertainment, Ubisoft Mainz

name: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard
summary: Shoot paint, mix colors, and solve puzzles in this adventure about friendship and redemption. Just don't enter that portal to another universe, and everything will be perfectly fine.

name: Stormforge
summary: Stormforge is an open-world survival crafting game for up to 8 players. You are Stormforged, with the ability to brave and harness power from magical storms. Explore, fight, forage, craft, build, and defeat bosses in this epic, fantasy game. Survive the Storms and thrive!

name: Generation Exile
summary: You are aboard humanity’s first and final generation ship, a last-chance expedition now teetering on the rim of collapse. One step at a time you must rebuild society and the ship’s fragile ecosystems — using only what you brought with you — in this turn-based narrative city-builder.

name: Copa City
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Organize high-stakes football events in the first football tycoon! Get the urban space and the stadium ready, ensure safety, and provide fans with an amazing football fiesta! But stay alert: Your decisions will not only influence the city but also the emotional rollercoaster for football fans!

name: Lorn Vale
summary: A free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG in which you must weather the unrelenting brutality of a dying world. Shape your own unique journey, forge alliances. Make difficult choices in this systems-driven game full of procedurally generated events. Amidst the ruins, your story begins.
storyline:
Step into a world beyond repair, where only the strongest persevere.

Lorn Vale is a free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG. Can you endure the merciless cruelty of a land on the brink of oblivion? Your mission is to survive, climb the food chain, and carve out a living by any means necessary.

Your journey is shaped by every choice and action you take, ensuring that no two playthroughs are ever the same.

name: Star Birds
summary: Star Birds is a cheerful asteroid base-building and resource management game. Discover and mine countless asteroids, create production networks and guide your colony of spacefaring birds to new interstellar horizons!

name: Mixtape
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
On their last night of high school, three friends embark on one more adventure together. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly-curated playlist draws them into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. It's the greatest hits of teenage friendship, from the first kiss to the last dance.

name: Winter Burrow
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals.

name: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Experience an isometric, narrative-driven stealth game set in the stunning city of Eriksholm. When Hanna’s brother, Herman, disappears and the police begin to pursue him, her search sets off a chain of catastrophic events that will not only alter their lives but also the destiny of the entire city. Join your allies, outsmart relentless enemies, and use your cunning to uncover the truth behind Herman’s disappearance — where greater powers are at play than you ever imagined.

Follow Hanna’s adventure through the vibrant streets of Eriksholm, a sprawling Nordic city inspired by the elegance and grit of early 1900s Scandinavia. In this world, every shadow offers a hiding place, and every corner hides a new challenge. Allies and quick reflexes are your greatest tools as you unravel the city's secrets and outsmart your pursuers.
storyline: Join Hanna's adventure through Eriksholm on her quest to find her brother and uncover the mystery behind his disappearance. Venture into stunning landscapes in a gripping story where every second counts as Hanna strives to reunite her family.

name: Happy Bastards
summary: Happy Bastards is an open-world tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you assemble a squad of unruly mercenaries to explore, fight, and loot. Let the bastards do the dirty work while you give the orders, reap the rewards, and enjoy the high life. Who needs XP when you're famous?

name: Super Crane HD
summary: Retro match 3 about a Bug juggling at his job, BUT NOW IT'S BETTER Match 3 drops to clear them, but your tool changes constantly, so watch out! Be a Bug, Do a Work, Match a 3

name: Tiny Lands 2
summary: Take your perception into a new dimension with the relaxing sense of photorealistic miniature scenes in Tiny Lands 2. Find the differences and stories by exploring handcrafted 3D dioramas. Can you find them all?

name: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
summary: In Squeakross: Home Squeak Home, solve and transform puzzles into furniture to decorate the perfect home for your rodent friend. Collect hundreds of decorations, accessories and stickers in this cozy game full of charm!

name: Battle Vision Network
summary: Battle Vision Network is an online PvP Puzzle-Battler fusing cozy color-matching puzzle gameplay with deep turn-based tactics. Teams from across the galaxy vye for the ultimate championship title in fast n’ fierce puzzle battles!

name: Cairn
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive the unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.
storyline: As pro climber Aava, you embark on the ascent of Mount Kami, a summit that has never been reached. Along the journey, meet unexpected companions and hear from those left on the ground. Discover the mountain's history and decide what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the her dream.

name: Tears of Metal
summary: Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike. Carve through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your formidable Scottish battalion. As you advance deeper into the trenches, uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.

name: Cuffbust
summary: Escape prison with your friends by equipping tools, evading guards, and executing your breakout plan. Destructible environments, proximity chat, a multitude of escape routes, and 20 player lobbies!

name: Junxions
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Simulator, Strategy, Indie
summary: Build a traffic intersection nobody has ever seen before. Use your wits to manage lanes, rails, crossings, traffic lights, and rights of way. Test it with advanced AI adapting to the rules of the road you decide on. Become a traffic engineer with the most comprehensive road tools in a game to date.

name: Starlit Stories
summary: Welcome to Starlit Stories. Relax to calming music as you build and customize your dream campsite. Watch as travelers come and go, adding life to your tranquil retreat. There's no management or deadlines for you to meet. Just wind down and let your creativity flow in this cozy campsite builder.

name: Wild Tactics
summary: The Wildest character-driven tactical strategy game you've ever seen! Build your team and maintain their relationships in the war against organized crime. Uncover the conspiracy in the animal-populated city of Clawville, and find the mastermind behind its downfall!

name: Demon Tides
summary: The first TRULY Expressive 3D Platformer set in an open world, by the minds behind Demon Turf & Slime-san. Stay tuned for the full game announcement!

name: BatteryNote
summary: This is an adventure game. You, a mechanic, have picked up three robots from a scrapyard. You can select one of them and charge and converse with them within a time limit. How you treat them will change their reactions, and the ending of the game will change little by little along with their fate.

name: Unbox the Room
summary: Unbox the Room is a relaxing puzzle game where you unpack and arrange items and furniture in your new home. Create a cozy space by placing everything just right, from the smallest cup to the largest sofa.

name: Potion Punch Rivals
summary: Potion Punch Rivals puts your shopkeeping, potion punching skills to the test. Race against your rival to see who can take orders first, prep fastest, and serve best.

name: Only Way is Down
summary: Embark on a purr-fectly perilous adventure as this lil kitty cat took an unfortunate cat-nap and ended up stranded sky high! With no way but down, unleash your feline agility and platforming prowess to navigate your descent through the urban jungle in this whimsical and gravity-defying escapade!

name: The Bell of Time
summary: The Bell of Time is an adventure, puzzle and combat game where you'll play a teenager brought to a mysterious mansion. Explore this mansion with its horror-like visual and audio ambience, fight against the supernatural and solve puzzles using never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Ballad of Antara
summary:
In a distant land, a mist-like phenomenon devastates the common world with unknown malice. Begin a perilous journey, seek towering, divine creatures, retrieve those twisted and lost ""essences"" of the land.

-Become Emissaries, powerful entities that wield the force of fundamental essences. Experience unique classes, gameplay capabilities, and enticing, mysterious stories.
-Explore the Para, the otherworldly dimension where danger lurks at every corner. Seek the truth inside, and recover the essences of the world.
-Explore handcrafted gameplay space with intricate, exploration oriented level design.

name: Covert Crew
summary: A Superpowered SRPG! Covert Crew is a 2D strategic roleplaying game inspired by the classics of old with a modern twist.

name: Comet Angel
summary: Comet Angel is a sci-fi visual novel with point and click puzzles. Help the mysterious alien Faerie return home by bringing it the food it needs to fly, and help Izzy and Nat learn to understand themselves and each other.

name: Painted In Blood
summary: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.

name: journey of Reincarnation
summary: 【Reincarnation Roguelike Retro RPG】Battle is fully automatic with no commands! Support the characters who think for themselves and do their best by collecting “Jewel”. Repeatedly reincarnate and aim to conquer dungeons that change their appearance each time you enter them!

name: John Fox
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: John Fox is an elite warrior and super soldier who saved the leaders of various States. He was a professional mercenary who retired with honor. But now his beloved pet, Milo, has been killed. You have to avenge him!

name: Hyperslice
summary: Fast paced action arena roguelike where you defeat waves of enemies using your dash. Slice through enemies or push them to survive. Upgrade and buy abilities throughout your run to turn your ship into a killing machine.

name: HyperFatal
summary: AIR STRAFE, ROCKET JUMP, and SURF your way through dimensions in this HYPER-intensive skill-based movement shooter of old. The onslaught of foes in your way are invading worlds, and the only way to stop them is to show you will be FATAL.

name: Amerta: The Abandoned Hotel
summary: Amerta is a First Person Horror Game. Feel the experience of being trapped into another world. You will act as Maya and try to get out of the unseen world.

name: Piggy One Super Spark
summary: PIGGY ONE SUPER SPARK is a single-player action game starring Xiamy, Yuez, and a lost newborn baby they happen to find. Follow the trio in their chaotic but heart-warming adventure!
storyline:
Xiamy and Yuez find a lost baby. A lost newborn baby.

They start on a journey to find who this baby belongs to, while fending off the dark monsters chasing after it. As they travel using a sort of phone booth as their vehicle of choice, they meet a bunch of unique people, make friends, and they give and receive help here and there.

name: EleBall
summary: EleBall is a casual platformer about a circus elephant, who tries their best to catch falling objects while simultaneously keeping balance on a bouncy ball.

name: Sparrow
summary: Trapped in a mysterious mansion, a tiny sparrow must survive deadly encounters with horrific creatures as it unravels the mansion's dark secrets and desperately tries to escape. Explore vents, crawlspaces, secret rooms, and more to uncover the gripping story and world of Sparrow.

name: Rusty Flesh
summary: Rusty Flesh is a sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping. Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

name: Yunyun Syndrome!?: Rhythm Psychosis
summary: “Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis” is a rhythm adventure game about a psychotic hikikomori girl - also an avid anonymous poster - who corrupts the world with her severe brain rot from listening to too many denpa songs. Yunyun all over this world with your degen otaku-posting.
developers: WSS playground, Alliance Arts, WHO YOU

name: Ultra Mushroom
summary: Hey! Wanna rise to the top at a festival stall? "Ultra Mushroom" is a high-energy game where you run a mushroom stall at a three-day festival and see how much you can earn. Gather mushrooms in the mountains by day and sell them at night. The key? Rhythmic banter and Ultra Mushrooms that bring joy!

name: Yarn Guardians
summary: Yarn Guardians is a 2D Action-Adventure in which you play as cute flying cats that fight enemies with powerful Yarn Balls! Play the story campaign alone or with a friend. You can also challenge up to three friends in the versus mode.
storyline:
Rudy's peaceful life changes abruptly when his home is attacked. He decides to protect his grandmother, unaware that he is following in the footsteps of the legendary Yarn Guardians. His grandmother told him stories of the heroes who once restored and maintained peace with the powerful Yarn Balls.
On his journey, the adventurous cat encounters power-hungry villains and shady characters. But on his mission to recover all of the lost Yarn Balls, he also finds allies and makes friends. Can they join forces to save their world from a new war?

name: Double Whammy
summary: Work at a guitar shop by day! Hack and slash interdimensional monsters by night! Uncover the mystery behind Gigi's recurring nightmare! Shred all day all night! Rock 'n Roll 24/7!

name: Leaf Town
summary: Leaf Town is a farm management game that includes pigeon racing gameplay elements. Here, you can manage your own ranch town. By purchasing farm buildings, arranging them for optimal effects, exploring and expanding the map, and using pigeon racing items, you can achieve higher profits.

name: Rita
summary: Explore, collect, solve, converse, and platform your way as loveable chicklet Rita through this charming word-based puzzle adventure game!

name: Work! Wan Wan Human
summary: Work! Wan Wan Human is an [ADV Novel Game of Human Gachi-Inukenka] that educates sinners and turns them into adorable dogs. Become a correctional officer in a city of chaos where humans, demons, and angels are all mixed together and get the job done.

name: Food Devils
summary: You're the last chef in a post-apocalyptic world. Attract adventurers with monstrous food, make them sign contracts with the Food Devils and organize expeditions to collect wicked ingredients! Customize your characters, build the perfect restaurant and plan every move in this Strategy-RPG Roguelike.

name: SerialWorld
summary: "SerialWorld" is a comedic yet serious RPG. Whether you've played deck-building games before or not, everyone can enjoy this adventurous tale. Embark on a journey into the mysterious world to solve the city's disturbances!

name: Kenoma: Action Without Action
summary: Answer the question of mortality in this sidescroller inspired by point-and-click adventures of old. Wander the depths of a world split in two. Confer with gods, locals, and other travelers. Solve problems through intuition and a collection of odd trinkets. Choose: death, or eternal life?

name: Lunarium
summary: Lunarium is an atmospheric fantasy A-RPG. Play as Ave, a light-armored knight, who teams up with Lune, a mysterious Starfarer. Together, they journey to save a dying world, engaging in challenging battles to retrieve the lost glow of the stars and forsaken memories, unveiling cosmic secrets.

name: Shield Strike
summary: Shield Strike is a competitive game where players use shields as projectiles, in addition to the unique abilities of each of the 8 characters. Made for up to 4 players, VS or Coop, and with a challenging journey in story mode.

name: Under Canopies
summary: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.

name: Total Chaos
summary:
Total Chaos is a relentless survival horror experience from Trigger Happy Interactive (creator of Turbo Overkill) and Apogee Entertainment. Washed ashore on Fort Oasis, a long-abandoned mining colony swallowed by decay, players must scavenge for supplies, craft makeshift weapons, and navigate a world where hallucinations warp reality and unspeakable horrors lurk in the shadows.

With dynamic AI-driven enemies, a Madness system that distorts perception, and a brutal fight for survival, Total Chaos pushes the boundaries of psychological horror. Every bullet counts, every wound matters, and your own mind may be your worst enemy.

Prepare to descend into madness—Total Chaos launches in 2025 on PC via Steam, with an optional VR mode for those brave enough to step inside the nightmare.

name: Garten of Banban 8
summary: Explore the most obscure levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new deceives and mysteries that await you. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Stonemachia
summary: Stonemachia is an adventure in which you can fight and explore a world distorted by the Plague of angels, taking on the role of Zefiro, a pawn capable of transforming into other chess pieces. Venture into the lands of Medhelan and prepare to face armies of angels transformed into statues and objects inspired by Italian art, architecture, and folklore! Fight with a variety of abilities and precise timing in a parry-centric game, where the shield can truly change the outcome of every encounter! Discover the various transformations and their unique abilities to experience a Dantesque epic and uncover the secret of the chess pieces...

name: Goodnight Universe
summary: You are Isaac, a 6-month-old baby, developing mysterious psychic powers. What you want most is to be loved and accepted by your family, but a secretive tech corporation wants you for their own.

name: Velev
summary: Dive into VELEV's depths, a hidden world where technology and nature merge. Embark on quests, battle monsters, and unveil mysteries with enhanced gear. Experience intense PvPvE combat, strategic team play across diverse classes, and continuous character growth through exploration and extraction

name: The Case of Andrew D.
summary: A forensic challenge - help private eye solve cases for their clients using OSINT and digital forensics techniques.

name: Mohrta
summary: Mohrta is a nonlinear FPS game blending action, exploration, and light dungeon crawling. Explore a vast selection of unique environments, slay an enormous cast of otherworldly creatures, and upgrade your arsenal of multifaceted weapons.
storyline:
The Great Strange- a zone in which supernatural phenomena occur at an abnormal rate, where echoes of other worlds and ethereal beings converge and contort reality.

A special military group known as "The Hayward" was formed to investigate and destroy the anomalies within The Strange. For years, the Hayward had done an admirable job of monitoring, handling, and reverse-engineering elements of the Great Strange into their work. Among these Hayward operatives is where your remains found new life.

You are Hayward Generation VII 81363-7, a corpse swathed in iron and arcane. Though a newer model, you are no guest to the Strange and a formidable veteran of its wilds.

Recently, the Great Strange has begun to rapidly expand- its phenomena intensifying to an unseen degree. Current leads suggest the involvement of Hayward Generation I "Avlan", whose disappearance synchronizes with the Strange’s sudden proliferation.

Mission Objective: Enter the mining village of Kozanoda where Avlan was last spotted and apprehend the missing Gen I.

Use of lethal force is authorized. Use of paranormal apparatus is authorized. Exercise extreme caution when confronting Avlan. Minimize injuries to civilians and infrastructure. Attempt capture where possible. Mission subject may be terminated if need be.

name: Jitter
summary: Jitter is an immersive sci-fi exploration and survival game set on a mining colony and its outskirts in the Main Asteroid Belt. You assume the role of an experimental AI that maintains ship functions and engages with the crew on board. As you explore the mining colony, you will take on new missions, expand ships and bases using various modules, add survivors to your crew, engage in space fights, and repair the damage left by enemy fire and onboard accidents.
storyline: You are the artificial intelligence of a spaceship. Explore, fight, and survive across a mining colony in the Main Asteroid Belt. Rebuild your ship. Rescue your crew. Reveal the truth behind your mission.

name: Windward Horizon
summary: Windward Horizon is an upcoming RPG-adventure set on the high seas, a sequel to the game Windward released on Steam in 2015. Trade, quest, fight, or just sail the world and fish — it’s your choice, and you can do it alone or together with your friends.

name: Onibi
summary: Dash, possess, and explore your way through different areas as you accompany a child on their adventures as their fledgling guardian spirit.

name: Morgman
summary: MORGMAN is a first-person horror game, a hybrid of classic survival horror and puzzle. You find yourself deep in the forest, in an abandoned mansion with a dark past. You'll need to explore its dark corridors and rooms while staying alive.

name: Ninjam!
summary: "Ninjam! is a multiplayer action game for up to 4 players where cute ninja characters move freely and compete against each other on a 3D map."

name: Pie in the Sky
summary: Pluck them. Pluck them all. You are an Australian Magpie on a mission. That mission: Spread havoc, cause mayhem, and grab the occasional unattended piece of food. Menace, rob, and terrify humans, enjoying old-school action arcade gameplay rendered in glorious retro PS2 graphics.

name: Only Up: Tiny
summary: Only Up: Tiny Is a First-Person Precision Platformer, Your goal is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult jumps.

name: Icebound
summary: In this first-person driving survival simulator, assume the role of a wilderness firefighter on a mission gone wrong. Drive, explore and survive with your snowcat vehicle in an icy environment with a hostile military faction ever present on your tail.

name: Paper Play VR
summary: Experience creative minigames as the world's biggest paper playground unfolds right in front of your eyes! We have crazy games, difficult challenges and a heartwarming story for you and your friends, so come and join the party!

name: Bones Beneath
summary: Explore the Egyptian underworld in this precision platformer! Jump, whip, and dash your way through a challenging, interconnected world that weaves linear gauntlets with open-ended exploration.

name: Beholder: Conductor
summary: A Beholder series spin-off. Become a conductor of the Determination Bringer train: monitor passengers, report incidents, and carry out important Ministry assignments — whose level of secrecy depends only on your loyalty. And remember: mission success is very important to you!

name: Cemitério São Sacramento
summary: Live the day to day life of someone who suffers from insomnia and sleep paralysis, do something to pass the time like washing dishes, watching a movie, taking a shower, until you can sleep again… Something “peculiar” might happen in this rented house.

name: Cats Hidden in England
summary: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across England in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cash Cleaner Simulator
summary: Start your money laundering business in this chill simulator! Use various not-so-powerful tools to restore dirty money bills and some unusual items to their full, crisp potential! Spend your hard-earned crypto to upgrade and cozy up your lab! The cash is in your hands!

name: Too Small To Matter
summary: Journey of animals trying to survive a War. An emotional tale where you'll decide the fate of all who embark on this journey.

name: Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim
summary: A charming RPG where you'll discover the joys of running your own cozy cafe. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to making friends with the locals, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure during your own coffee break.

name: Meowstery of a Growing Aurora
summary: 'Meowstery of a Growing Aurora' is a 2D pixel-art adventure set within the fictional VR-MMORPG Shenanghia, where you step into the shoes of Eleanor, as she has to save her pet cat Aurora from danger lurking within the game.

name: Extinction Rifts
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Extinction Rifts is a fast-paced FPS where you get stronger as your combo increases! Inspired by classic shooters, you will battle your way through secret enemy headquarters and destroy the Ancient Monoliths with your devastating gauntlet!

name: Dwarven Defense
summary: Dwarven Defense is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.

name: Aquapark Tycoon
summary: Build the ultimate waterpark paradise in this cozy simulation game! Design & customize water slides, pools, and saunas to fulfill your guests' needs. Combine creativity, strategy, and management to make a splash in the world of water parks and become the ultimate Aquapark Tycoon!

name: Break The Line
summary:
Rogue elements + Free Layout + Battle Mastery + Turn-based March.
What kind of different experience will it bring? Will you be able to hold on to a tower caught in a tidal wave of enemy attacks? May be the answer you're looking for.

name: SSR Wives: The Murder Of My Winter Crush
summary: SSR Wives: The Murder Of My Winter Crush Is an upcoming Retro Survival Horror experience that takes inspiration from iconic staples of the survival horror genre with the charming narrative intrigue of a Visual Novel. Atmospheric exploration, Challenging puzzles, and Horrifying encounters await!

name: Jest Messter
summary: Commercial remaster of "The Punniest Pun Messter".

name: Knight of Nevermore
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Knight of Nevermore is a roguelike action-platformer featuring tight combat and diverse builds. Fight skillfully, platform carefully and equip yourself wisely if you plan to overcome the challenges of Nevermore.

name: King of Retail 2
summary: Ready to build another empire? You are once again back in the role as the manager, trying to make the best of a busy store. Find the right things to sell, get the right employees and turn every stone for a profit. Can you handle the pressure or will you buck under? Welcome to King of Retail 2.

name: Gobocore
summary: Roguelite Turn Based Auto-Battler about little goblins rescuing their kidnapped tribe members. Smash. Evolve. Survive.

name: Felbound
summary: Felbound is a challenging and ruthless roguelike game. Embark on a journey into a mysterious dungeon, facing off against orcs and goblins with a plethora of weapons spells and items!

name: Pool of Madness
summary: A retro-styled Lovecraftian pool game with roguelite elements. Shoot some balls. Unleash horrors from beyond. Go insane. Try again.

name: Decadent
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Decadent is a story-driven FPS combining atmospheric exploration, horror and combat into an immersive experience. Become John Lorn, a Great War veteran turned decadent occultist on a quest to save your lost son and uncover an ancient secret; challenging not only your skills, but your very humanity.
storyline: You are John Lorn, a royal explorer and a veteran of the Great War, turned decadent occultist. As a result of a traumatic experience during one of your occult experiments, you become a host for a mysterious parasite. Traveling to the Arctic one last time, you follow the traces of a lost Miskatonic University expedition. As your courage and sanity are pushed to the limit, you must learn to walk the line between good and evil and discover just how much grief and suffering you are ready to cause to save someone you hold dear.

name: Stygian: Outer Gods
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Dive into a hostile world that challenges your very existence, in this survival horror game with RPG elements. Unravel a thousand-year-old mystery, risk your sanity and face the Outer Gods with your skills. Every bullet and the decision counts now, are you up to the task?
storyline: Assume the role of a mercenary accompanying the enigmatic girl to the foggy settlement of Kingsport to uncover her family’s dark secret. You are shipwrecked and soon encounter the nightmares that have haunted this place for centuries. Would you be able to find your way out, keep your sanity, and prevent the coming of the ancient Outer Gods, or maybe being insane is the key to salvation?

name: Unihorn
summary: Cute, funny and with one horn - that is an Unihorn. Welcome to the very first unicorn climbing game!

name: Quantum Beast
summary: Quantum Beast is a hardcore sci-fi stylish action fighting game where you need to execute massive crazy robots to save the city. Be sure fully acquiring various skills to pass through those hard battles.

name: Automate It
summary: Automate It is a factory building game that requires clever solutions to its size, power, and time constraints. Solve challenges, build and share your own levels, or open things up in sandbox mode. If you want to build it - Automate It.

name: Button Man
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Button Man is a side-scrolling adventure game set in a fictional Nova Scotia during prohibition. After years of being the henchmen to the local bootlegging kingpin your job now is to find who killed him and protect the town from what’s coming to it. Explore Kingsport and learn the truth!

name: Teo Dove Pro Skater 2
summary: Skateboarding game in the spirit of THPS. Perform flip tricks, grabs, grinds. Insane lines. Level up your character and learn new tricks. Find hidden secrets. And challenge your rival to a classic game of skate HORSE!

name: Cursed Dawn
summary: Cursed Dawn is a wave survival FPS featuring complex maps packed with secrets, dynamic spawns, and hordes of zombies to turn into gory mulch. Plan your defense, stay on the move, and master the maps. Remember: Nowhere is safe, death is assured, how long can you last until you become zombie chow?.

name: Primland The Magus
summary: A dark fantasy 2D action game about a solitary island that has turned into hell and a girl named Magus. Collect "relics" sleeping on the island and acquire skills. Take on mysteries and powerful enemies using a variety of actions!

name: Inkonbini
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.
storyline:
Discover joy and wonder hidden behind the daily routine of a konbini worker, engage in meaningful conversations with a diverse cast of characters, and see how their stories intertwine in a beautifully-rendered early 1990s Japan.

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a meditative third-person single-player experience that puts you in the shoes of Makoto Hayakawa, a college student taking a break from her studies to help her aunt at the small and cozy convenience store.

name: The Joy of Creation
summary:
The classic Five Nights at Freddy’s fan-game returns, rebuilt from the ground up to offer a modern and immersive horror experience with real-time graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

The Joy of Creation puts you in the shoes of The Creator, a game developer forced to confront the manifestations of his own mind throughout five unique levels, each with a unique blend of free-roaming and classic sit-and-survive gameplay mechanics.

This game is officially backed by Scott Cawthon as part of the Fazbear Fanverse Initiative.

name: Six Blow: Bullet Rain
summary: "Six Blow: Bullet Rain" combines FPS action with living bullet cards. Survive the Wild West, customize your shots, and strategize!

name: Veil of Madness
summary: Veil of Madness is a Lovecraftian Deck Builder game that merges the strategic charm of a deck builder with the immersive experience of a first-person RPG genre. Unravel eldritch secrets, battle insanity, and shape your destiny in this chilling journey.

name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
summary: Escape the void...and destroy its heart. A collision between three lost souls ends in a surprise trip to purgatory, where vengeful spirits abound. These unlikely friends must uncover the secrets of their past to escape—but can they stop arguing first?
storyline:
Help three unlikely friends destroy the void—before they destroy each other!

New allies Weapon, Spirit, and Magic have some big tasks ahead of them. Recover their stolen memories, defeat an ancient demon or two, and escape from the dreaded void between worlds... Assuming they can stop arguing first, that is.

As stakes rise, and memories slowly return, will their once-forgotten feelings break them?

Or bring them closer?

name: Lanista: Shadows and Dust
summary: A Tactical Roguelike about the life (and death) of post-apocalyptic gladiators in a dystopian society. Embrace the arena, become the LANISTA!

name: Crime or Punishment
summary: Play as a corrupt detective on the mob’s payroll, and cover up their crimes. Read files, collect information and obscure evidence to frame an innocent bystander, who was at the wrong place, at the wrong time. After all, crime pays.

name: Agronom
summary: Agronom is a 1st-person farm building simulator in the setting of Slavic popular science fiction. In the role of a robot farmer you will learn how to grow tomatoes and potatoes on Mars and can admire Martian birch trees. Robotize the production and cultivation of foods familiar from childhood!

name: Permanent: Hope & Vacuum
summary: Psychological horror, puzzles, platforming, adventure, dungeons, action, intrigue and a touching story are all terms that should be used to try to define the essence of «Permanent: Hope & Vacuum».

name: Dissimilar
summary: Dissimilar est un jeu narratif en 2D isométrique, avec une exploration semi-ouverte et des combats stratégiques en tour par tour.

name: Side Kicks! Beyond
summary: An expanded port of Side Kicks! for Nintendo Switch, Android, and iOS that will add new episodes to the main story of Side Kicks!, as well as a crossover episode with BUSTAFELLOWS, which is set in the same world.

name: Trizna
summary: “Trizna” is a classic plot-driven 2.5D metroidvania filled with intense battles utilizing the unique features of weapons, evasions, parries, and counterattacks. Explore the mysterious and eerie realm deeply intertwined with pagan beliefs, with blade, magic and a keen mind.

name: Moonwakers: Episode 01
summary:
Dive into a survival roguelite by taking control of a S.E.E.D, an advanced reconnaissance android! To accomplish your mission, explore exoplanets to determine if they are suitable for humanity.

Thus, you'll need to search for vital elements necessary for life: Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Phosphorus, and Sulfur. But beware, danger lurks on this unknown land, and your survival will depend on your ingenuity and skills. Traps abound, and you'll need to strategize to make it through.

Regularly, you'll have to shelter your character to escape ionic storms. Exploration will allow you to acquire new skills and enjoy more autonomy, speed, and gliding. Your biggest challenge? Managing your energy to avoid extinction.

name: Blender Start Here
summary: Want to learn Blender but don't know where to start? START HERE!

name: Crackernuts
summary: Crackernuts is a narrative game about a goat-headed girl and her sister, a no-bodied head. They are on quest to find themselves and rescue their village from a curse of darkness.

name: Aisla
summary: You play as Aisla, a woman who wakes up with no memories in a complex on Mars. Your objective is to explore the environments and discover who the character is and what situation she is in.

name: Cut the Cards
summary: Create your own cards in this roguelike deckbuilder by cutting and pasting throughout your deck! Journey to the chasms, fighting off dragons and Boviks alike as you manage scarce resources.

name: Industria II
summary: INDUSTRIA 2 is a narrative FPS adventure about a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge and fight your way through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home.
storyline:
Years after the events of the prequel INDUSTRIA, Nora is stuck in a parallel dimension, far away from home. Surviving alone on a peaceful island, an empty apartment building in a vast sea of hostile solitude, she constructs a machine to return to her home dimension: 1989 East Berlin.

Just before she completes the year-long project, a chain of unforeseen consequences pulls her back into the pulsating heart of the artificial intelligence ATLAS.

Nora soon comes to the realization that she cannot evade her past and must face the haunting responsibility that lies within it – her involvement in the creation of the uncontrollable A.I.

name: Reason Unfound
summary: Your brother's unexpected death leads you to unsettling locations in search of floppy disks with cursed retro games.

name: Category 6
summary: Brace yourself for the ultimate open-world survival craft experience. Welcome to a world shattered by the relentless fury of the most colossal hurricane in history. You are thrust into the eye of the storm, tasked with not just enduring, but thriving in the aftermath of nature's wrath.

name: Bloom Thrice
summary: Embark on a journey through the gamified "Beautiful World", play (fight) with residents until you are satisfied, and explore to the end of the world. "Bloom Thrice" is a 2D action adventure game where you join the world full of brightness and kindness.

name: Last Standing
summary: This is an action game in which players compete to defeat the number of enemies that appear from the left and right sides of the screen. The most distinctive feature of the game is the control method, which is innovative and original, like banging on a keyboard.

name: Suspended Animation
