summary: A sci-fi first person exploration game about a ship in danger, and the evil AI tasked with saving it: you.

name: Watch Out For Goblins!
summary: Experience the joy of physics based goblins in their natural habitat! Run, jump, kick and flip your way through a delightful physics sandbox! Explore and collect Power Cogs to become Goblin Royalty! There's no saying what might happen, and no stopping the BIG GOBLIN ENERGY!

name: Stream or Die!
summary: Become the greatest streamer of all time in STREAM OR DIE! Embark on your quest for fame by streaming a wild new MMO - where your choices can rocket you to viral glory or comically seal your doom.

name: ChipWits
summary: Challenge your brain in this open-ended robot programming puzzle game! Code your ChipWit to navigate logic-twisting puzzles, zap malfunctioning robots, and dominate the global leaderboards. Can you solve Dr. Droog's twisted game and restore order to the space station before it's too late?

name: Sniperbot: The Hype Game
summary: SNIPERBOT: THE HYPE GAME is a retro styled, rhythm-based action platformer; It’s Mega Man meets Crypt of the NecroDancer. The player traverses through the cybertech world of Meta Metro. Where Hypebeasts run wild, clout is currency and the only way to survive is attacking your enemies and fighting boss battles with a blaster and sword, all while keeping on beat to a late 80s / early 90s Hip Hop soundtrack!

name: Brave Glin in Fairyaria
summary: Brave Glin in Fairyaria is an action-adventure platformer game in the world of Fairyaria, a wonderful fairytale. Play as Brave Glin, a little magical creature that getting lost in a forest, nedding face dangers on the way to return home!

name: Noah's Dilemma
summary: Noah, the flood has come. Go search and collect animals that survived. Voyage across the sea to somewhere safe. Be careful though, don't let them kill each other. Noah's Dilemma is a unique Sudoku-inspired strategy roguelike set in a reimagined world of Noah's Ark.

name: Dungeons and Diners
summary: Dungeon and Diners: A Culinary Adventure Awaits! Dive into dungeons with your friends, hunting for exotic ingredients to bring back to your bustling diner. Choose to team up with up to 4 players or enlist the help of adventurers for both dungeon delving and diner duties.

name: Bounce Gun
summary: Bounce Gun is a challenging arcade roguelike shooter with a huge number of item combinations, unconventional controls and an unusual approach to difficulty progression.

name: Fatal Claw
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: FatalClaw is a high-quality 2D Metroidvania game. Explore the mysterious underworld in your own way with cat “Kisha” who rise from the dead, and find the key to the ground with other survivors through absorbing the power infected enemies.
storyline:
Fatal Claw’s world is full of mysteries where Ancients and Commoners coexist. Hidden in this vast underground realm are violent infected creatures, sealed passages, stones archiving vital force, and more.
In this dark, desperate world, you will join Kisha—a mysterious cat resurrected by his ancestors. Rescue survivors as you explore the stretch of ancient ruins connected systematically. Overcome perilous terrains, absorb abilities from the infected, and unravel the mysteries and truth behind all incidents.
May light guide you and Kisha until the end of your journey.

name: Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
platforms: Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Control the direction of gravity as you run, jump and explore in an outrageous time-traveling adventure as Reggie, an unlikely hero from the 16,000th century on a mission to save science and ultimately the entire universe!

name: Sealed Bite: Extended
summary: Emilia's life turns into chaos as her family members disappear, one by one. Forced to put her trust in a wolf spirit, Emilia sets off to search the land while pressured into feeding a monstrous power. Will the enigmatic figure she encounters offer guidance, or is Emilia diving head-first into peril?

name: Kill the Witch
summary: The time when humans gave up being happy to be no longer unhappy and became 'bugs'. The story of a witch who smashes everything with a baseball bat tightly in her hand.

name: Plinio Needs a Hand
summary: Guide the father slime, separated from his family across five levels. Use your skills to manipulate boxes and overcome challenges. Solve puzzles, explore, and reunite this unique family in an exciting journey!

name: Collateral Dungeon
summary: Collateral Dungeon is a tactical puzzle dungeon crawler. Explore as an archaeologist trapped in your most recent dig: an enemy-infested dungeon. However, you are a lover, not a fighter. Without weapons, you must turn to your wit and clever traps to defeat enemies lest you relive your failings.

name: Potion Shop Simulator
summary: Master the art of alchemy in Potion Shop Simulator, a unique blend of simulation and strategy. Brew potions, manage your shop, and cater to a magical clientele in a single-player or co-op experience of the medieval fantasy world.

name: Counter Clash
summary: Lead religious zealots, spiritual nomads, or scientific warmongers in a fast-paced, tactical strategy game. Discover different troop combos, counters, and environmental hazards to crush the opposition!

name: Leaf Blowing Simulator
summary: Experience the calming tranquility of blowing thousands of leaves around in Leaf Blowing Simulator, the only real-time physics-based simulator that allows you to effortlessly create your own virtual oasis. Shape nature at your own pace and find relaxation in the gentle flow of leaves.

name: Ichorous Moon
summary: Run! Race through the corrupted streets of Türme to stop the rising of the Ichorous Moon

name: The Magic World 2: Curse of the Ancients
summary: Party role-playing game. You control a squad of characters moving through an open game world. Collect items, complete quests, communicate with NPCs, try to survive, destroy enemies with various magic and weapons.

name: The Raptured
summary: The Raptured is a TPS horror survival video game that follows Fletcher in Still Pines, overrun by apparitions that stalk the player. Find out what happened to the town, and try not to be consumed by the treacherous hordes of the apparitions.

name: The War in Chiapas
summary: Control a group of young people who enter the jungle of Chiapas, Mexico, in the eighties, to form a guerrilla whose objective is to create an army to overthrow the government through a new revolution, however, a paramilitary group appears unexpectedly.

name: Hanno
summary: Join Hanno, an unusual elephant, and Vimal, his newly young companion, as they face challenges brought by…fate? Fight, stealth, explore, sort things out and get ready to uncover the cost of loyalty in this stunning, mysterious, heartfelt action-adventure game.

name: The Sinking City 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The Sinking City 2 is a terrifying Lovecraftian journey, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

name: Sleight of Hand
summary: Infiltrate a hardboiled, rain-slicked city of taboo, where ritual magic and cursed artefacts set apart those with power from those without. Sleight of Hand is a 3rd-person Stealth-Action Deckbuilder about taking down the coven you used to run with.
storyline: Step into the gumshoes of Lady Luck, a revered former occult detective fated to return for one final job: taking down her former Coven. Her departure was less than amicable; last time, she lost her left hand. Too tired to fight fate any longer, and with more overdue bills than bucks to her name, Lady Luck strikes out to Steeple City with cursed deck in hand, ready to track down everyone from her past life.

name: Korga's Arena
summary: We combined a Roguelite Deckbuilder, a Turn-Based RPG, and a bloodthirsty orc battle-mage, to create Qrena! Craft your Deck, enhance your Weapons, and forge your Gladiator Emblem to customize your playstyle.

name: Crab Attack
summary: Extraction-lite meets SHMUP. Get more upgrade materials by exploring dangerous places as far as you can go, just be sure to escape before you get pinched or you'll lose everything you've collected.

name: GMH: Good Morning Human!
summary: In a synthwave-inspired universe, achieve the best possible scores by avoiding obstacles in your path. Control and skills will be necessary to complete each level.

name: Dating Simulator 2025
summary: Dating Simulator 2025 is a dating simulator that offers you the skill of seduction and improving your dating skills. This game allows players to immerse themselves in a world where they can meet, socialize and win the hearts of virtual girls.

name: Terminator: Survivors
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Play as a survivor in an open world set after Judgment Day where you, alone or in co-op, scavenge resources to build a base of operations for mankind. But you’re not alone. Skynet’s machines hunt you down as well as rival human factions.
themes: Action, Science fiction, Survival, Open world
storyline: It’s been four years since the day humanity nearly perished. The truth of the event is still muddied in half-truths as you emerge from a shelter to attempt and reestablish some semblance of society in a world that seems hell-bent on eliminating you and the last vestiges of mankind. You are tasked with scouring the surrounding land for materials, information, other survivors and key resources in order to establish a base of operations for your fledgling group.

name: Endurance Motorsport Series
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Manage the race from the stands, drive legendary cars and enjoy a genuine endurance race experience. As both driver and engineer, in this unique simulation victory can only come through teamwork.

name: Horse Racing Manager
summary: Build your legacy in the horse racing world. Breed the next champion, making key decisions on training the horse and choosing its diet. Every choice counts, and every race tells a story. Create your own rags-to-riches journey, from being a stablehand to owning the greatest racing stable in the game.
developers: Sheep Meadow Road Games, Sheep Meadow Road Games

name: 9 Kings
summary: 9 Kings. 9 cards. 9 tiles. In this pocket roguelike strategy game, you have to build a kingdom powerful enough to withstand the other king's invasions and be crowned the king of kings.

name: TransmuTowers
summary: The Kingdom is under attack! Collect resources, build towers, buy upgrades and work alone (or with up to 3 friends) to defend it! Select your favorite Alchemist from a magical coven, and fend off innumerable hordes of beasts in this post-apocalyptic fantasy world.

name: Pokémon Legends: Z-A
summary: A new adventure awaits within Lumiose City, where an urban redevelopment plan is underway to shape the city into a place that belongs to both people and Pokémon. Please look forward to seeing it for yourself.​​

name: Duskpunk
summary: Dredgeport: a steampunk city spiralling out of control. Gangs roam the slums, and the corpses of the dead are processed for fuel. You’ve escaped the great war, but can you escape starvation? Inspired by the freedom of TTRPGs, explore the city, choose your friends, and shape the city’s future.

name: Faith in Despair
summary: Build your own cards, find game-breaking synergies and dominate Satan's army of demons in this roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Red Snow
summary: Experience the ultimate fusion of snowboarding and combat in RED SNOW! Navigate perilous slopes, battle enemy forces, and execute stunning tricks to earn cash in this epic board-n-sword adventure.

name: Node
summary: N.O.D.E. is a 2.5D puzzle platformer with Timeline-based navigation set in a Cold War era nuclear complex. Plan a route for your robot, strategize, sequence commands and execute them to navigate between checkpoints. Try again. And again. Influence the story with your choices and solve the mystery.

name: Whirlight: No Time To Trip
summary: In the heart of Verice Bay, a brilliant idea takes shape in the hands of an eccentric inventor and an eclectic artist. Follow Margaret and Hector in a point-and-click graphic adventure that will take you to the edge of space and time to help them avert imminent danger.

name: Wiblu
summary: Wiblu: The Search for the Fire Tea, is a captivating video game with German mythology, following Wiblu's quest to find the legendary Fire Tea to save her sick grandmother.

name: Truxton Extreme
summary: Truxton Extreme, which inherits the DNA from legendary arcade masterpiece Truxton, is a collaboration with manga artist and Toaplan alumni Junya Inoue.

name: Exosky
summary: ExoSky: Join a whimsical AI cat in a futuristic flight sim. Master stunts in a tech-inspired world with moddable aircraft and realistic physics. Explore beyond Earth in a blend of simulation and imagination. A pilot's dream of skill and creativity.

name: Dolls Nest
summary:
Dolls Nest is a 3D action game where you control a mecha girl as she explores the gigantic factory world of Hod on her journey to uncover the truth.
Hod, the world which you inhabit, is a massive crater crawling with armored units. Broken machines and ruined buildings are strewn across its landscape.
But fate can be cruel. You must scavenge the land for resources if you wish to survive in this ruined world.
Make use of the parts and items you find on your journey, and overcome the trials that lie before you.
storyline:
Doll.

My darling doll...

Your birth is nigh,so leave the cradle.

They plunderd my body,
my limbs ripped of,
my eyes gouged.

To reclaim all ,I give birth to you.

Awaken, my doll. It is time for battle.

name: The House of Tesla
summary: A brand-new adventure from the creators of The House of Da Vinci. With new handcrafted puzzles, hauntingly beautiful locations and challenges for your brain’s gray (or blue) matter. You will be able to look at the world through the eyes of one of the most famous inventors, Nikola Tesla.

name: Teeto
summary: This cute adventure platformer follows a tiny blob named Teeto and his obnoxious bunny companion Nory. Use Teeto’s signature ability of absorbing elements from the environment to fight off the shadow monsters and complete all sorts of challenges for the cast of crazy characters.
storyline:
Teeto has no clue who.. or even what he is. All he knows is that he is small and the world around him is big and scary. Teeto is joined by his much smaller, even cuter bunny companion Nory. Luckily for them (and to the misfortune of others) - what they lack in size they more than make up for in reckless determination. With Nory by your side, you must traverse through the unknown - solving puzzles, exploring crazy environments and doing your darnedest to survive.

The world is overrun with dark, shadowy monsters. Sure, it would be lovely if we could just talk to these things and hash out our differences - but trust me, they aren’t exactly known for being emotionally reasonable. Who are they? What do they want? What are they? Why are they such jerks? Why so many freakin' questions??? We don’t yet know - best defend yourself by throwing a punch or twelve at these absolute maniacs.

name: Fine Work
summary: Weave Rhythm and Romance! Charm 7 otherworldly clients with your artisan prowess in this rhythm-infused dating sim.

name: Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart
summary: ⛏️ Survival crafting adventure   Through magical portals   Into fantasy worlds  ⚡ Once-in-a-lifetime, high-paced, high-variety  ⏳ The sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel ️

name: Lost Hellden
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Lost Hellden is a unique 3D hand-painted J-RPG from Artisan Studios, enhanced by dynamic lighting and weather effects. Follow Cyphel and his allies as a mature story unfolds. Customize your characters as you see fit and dive into a battle system that mixes action and strategy.
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view
storyline:
On a planet called Era, people are bound to one of the Seven Deadly Sins before their first birthday via a religious ceremony called the Nexus Ritual. All their life, the inhabitants of Era have to fight against their urges. Should they fail and succumb, they transform into mindless and aggressive beasts. The Unio religion representatives – the Arkhons – ensure that everyone follows the rules and put down any monsters that appear in the cities.

One day, a woman gives birth to twins, something that never happened before. The Prime Arkhon, supreme leader of Era, conducts the Nexus Ritual himself. However, something goes wrong, and one baby is bound to all seven sins, while the other receives none.

The twins are taken to the capital, Avilah, where they are brought up as Arkhon apprentices. They are never allowed to leave the walls of the sanctuary…
But one day, Leht, the twin bound to the seven sins, manages to leave the city. His brother Cyphel is sent on a mission to find and bring him back. He is accompanied by two seasoned Arkhons, Gram and Enki.

The journey of Cyphel and Leht is one of self-discovery, one that will allow them to grow and become the people they were destined to be.

name: Spirit Guardians
summary: Spirit Guardians is a pixel-art roguelike game. A life-and-death battle is unfolding between light and darkness in the spirit realm. Take on the role of the guardian, continually strengthen yourself, and repel the onslaught of the evil spirit legion. Are you ready to embark on this endless journey?

name: Twilight Parade: Moonlit Mononoke
summary: Beautiful oni-girls battle hordes of yokai in this side-view bullet hell SHMUP. Every year yokai takes to the streets to celebrate at Hyakki Yagyou, the night parade of the hundred yokai. But this year they didn't invite the oni twins, so they're going to ruin the party!

name: Kira Legends
summary: Experience an Action Packed RPG as you slay monsters with mastered sword combat and Unleash Your Inner Dragon abilities as you take on the form of both human and Dragon. Kill off all the Demons as you make your way from your peaceful Hometown to the depths of the Underworld.

name: Decurion
summary: Combine the unique abilities of Mechs and Pilots in strategic synergy. Team up with friends in local co-op to conquer dynamic levels with different geometry, shaping your strategic approach. Watch out for anomalies introducing unexpected challenges as you defend your base and strive to stay alive.

name: Master of Ives
summary: Join Jennifer and her Ive sisterhood in a quest to restore their roles as muses. Explore the Institute for Vital Energy, uncover potentials, and mend the lost bond between humans and these ethereal inspirers.

name: 100 Cats Belgrade
summary: Find 100 Cats hidden in Belgrade! Can you find them all?

name: Sunkissed City
summary: Sunkissed City is a life-sim set in an upbeat, sun-kissed seaside metropolis full of funky vibes and quirky characters. Stake out your new life in the city, tending to DIY gardens, learning new skills, and making life-long friends and help bring life back to its once-vibrant streets!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen
storyline:
Welcome to your new life in Apollo City, a sun-kissed seaside metropolis that's pumping with funky vibes and quirky characters.

As a fresh hire for the monolithic Pico corporation's new "Peco Pioneer" pilot program, you've been tasked with fostering a relationship with Apollo's vibrant community and putting in a good word for Pico's new eco-focused initiatives.

But all is not well in these bustling streets. The local wildlife has begun to behave more aggressively, the waters are devoid of life, monsters are pouring out from the sewers, and that's not to mention the constant migraines everyone's been having latel

name: Blocks for Babies
summary: Blocks for Babies is the puzzle-shooter mashup of your dreams. Clear falling blocks by forming complete lines, or go in guns blazing to clean up the board the messy way. Hard and soft drops aren't your only tools anymore—now you have a shotgun.

name: Armored Brigade II
summary: Armored Brigade II revolutionizes real-time tactical warfare in 3D, focusing on the intense combined arms combat of the Cold War era, from 1965 to 1991. Boasting a meticulously researched database and huge real-world terrain maps, this game offers an unparalleled combat simulation experience.

name: Algolemeth
summary: "Create AI and Conquer the Dungeon." Algolemeth is a dungeon RPG where you send golems equipped with AI (combat logic) into a dungeon for fully automated exploration. Enhance the AI and, through trial and error, aim to conquer the dungeon!

name: Knights of Fresco
summary: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.

name: The Last Winter Knight
summary: Haunt a suit of armour. Explore an abandoned castle. Remember your past–and bring an end to the tragedy you uncover in this melancholy yet hopeful visual novel.

name: 1001 Nights
summary: This is an AI-native game. Start a journey in the ancient Persian Empire as Shahrzad. Use magic to turn language into reality, collect unique weapons from the tales, and get revenge on the evil King! The fate of the world is yours to rewrite!
storyline:
"The limits of my language mean the limits of my world"
Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of "1001 Nights", an AI-native game about storytelling.
Inspired by the folktale collection "1001 Nights", this game follows the story of an evil king who, betrayed by his wife, marries a new maiden each day only to execute her the following morning. You, as Shahrzad, become his next bride. You possess the secret magic to turn language into reality... Can you end his reign of terror?

name: Goblin Cleanup
summary: A co-op cleaning game where you have to clean and rearrange a dungeon before the next adventurers come to complete it again.

name: StarRupture
summary: Explore a mysterious planet in an ever-changing open world torn by recurring cataclysms. Build a complex industrial system to extract resources, produce goods and expand your base. Fight against hordes of alien monsters to defend your base and survive, alone or with friends.

name: Steam Trigger
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
summary: A riveting steampunk 2.5D platformer set against the backdrop of the sprawling metropolis. Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing fusion of industrial progress and Victorian aesthetics as you embark on a journey throughout the city.

name: Chocolatio
summary: Create and build your own automated chocolate factory. Freely design and expand your factories to deliver a huge variety of chocolate themed resources.

name: Botanica
summary: Botanica is a short 2D side scrolling platformer game that immerses you in a world of sentient plants. Join the sprout, whose kind is often regarded as incredibly weak, on a journey to test its strength against Botanica and its governors.

name: Before The Mine
summary: Witness the recording of a young individual who, in the 90s, decides to delve into a forest in search of a dark secret in this horror game created with Unreal Engine 5

name: Lilac
summary: Lilac is an upcoming visual novel developed by Frontwing about an interspecies academy story between wizards and humans that depicts the “ordinary” within the “extraordinary.”
storyline: In the story of the stage plays, a great wizard named Lilac created a school where magic users and humans can freely interact, so as to bridge the gap between them. In the magic school, wizard and human form Familia contracts, deepening bonds and strengthening each others' powers. The school becomes the place of new dreams, hope, and ambition. The story focuses on two individuals: a magic user who comes from a storied dynasty of mages, but is actually failing their studies and close to dropping out; and a human who was born to a poor family and hates most mages. Though they have completely opposite backgrounds, circumstances draw them together to form a Familia contract.

name: Deep State
summary: Deep State, a first person shooter inspired by classic games such as Goldeneye 007, Deus Ex, and Resident Evil.

name: Ritual of Raven
summary: Ritual of Raven is a cozy farming game that lets you be creative in a witchy world by empowering you to dip your toes into the magic of coding. You will meet lots of quirky characters that you can befriend and trade with. You will be able to enchant magical creatures to help you grow the ingredients for your spells. And of course you can be creative, decorate your farm and explore the magical world around you.

name: L.OD
summary:
A 2D exploration adventure.
The main character, Yoi, receives a letter from his dead sister, Chitose, saying that she wants to tell him a secret.
In order to find out the truth, Yoyi heads to an abandoned laboratory.

name: Earthion
summary:
Earthion is an upcoming aftermarket shooting game developed by Ancient primarily for the Sega Mega Drive. Physical MD versions will be published by SUPERDELUXE GAMES in Japan and by Limited Run Games in North America. The game will also get a 16:9 version for modern platforms.

Earthion is published under the label YKGGG, a brand name covering all the retro-style games developed at Ancient. If Earthion meets success, Ancient will go on the venture of releasing video games designed for retro consoles. A separate version of the game for Arcade was confirmed by Ancient and published by exA-Arcadia, which features a new, exclusive mode that will not be available in the Mega Drive version.
developers: Ancient Co., Ltd., Limited Run Games, exA-Arcadia

name: Moonshire
summary: Embark on a journey to save Moonshire as you navigate through a mysterious world filled with dungeons, weapons, upgrades, and fast-paced combat!
storyline:
Learn the art of combat as taught by the Sage. Explore a range of weapons, from conventional spears and longswords to versatile options like boomerangs and the magical Lightning Rod. Each weapon enhances your defense when equipped, and can also be strategically employed - sacrifice it to restore health, or throw it as a projectile for long-range damage.

By exploring your surroundings and overcoming the dungeons, bosses, and battles along the way, you'll uncover exciting new items and abilities that improve your options in combat, while also opening up new areas to explore.

Uncover the mysteries surrounding the unknown threat, and make your way back home to Moonshire! Your path is filled with challenges and opportunities, so arm yourself with unique abilities and an arsenal of weapons. The fate of Moonshire rests in your hands...

name: Kousai Toshi
summary: An upcoming kinetic novel by Key and Matsuyama Takeshi.

name: Aeterna Lucis
summary: Aeterna Lucis is the highly anticipated sequel to Aeterna Noctis. Following the gameplay steps of the first entry in the series, Aeterna Lucis is a Metroidvania that combines fast-paced combat, a large interconnected map, secret hunting, optional challenges, and a rich and deep story.

name: Pastel Parade
summary: Pastel☆Parade is an exhilarating rhythm game with easy controls! Get into the rhythm with cute and pop music!

name: Loopers Plus
summary: An expanded version of Loopers with brand-new scenarios and artworks.

name: Nova Hearts
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A mysterious force of power transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike.
storyline: When returning to your hometown, you don’t expect things to be much different than when you left but now, you and other hot singles in the area have transformed into heroes and villains! Reconnect with old friends, meet new ones and pursue the strange origins of the new cosmic madness prowling the streets. Where did this come from? Why did this happen? And why is everyone so incredibly hot now!?

name: Soulers
summary: Soulers is a Team-Building Twin-Stick Shooter. Assemble a team with time-slowing Protagonist and Colleagues with different abilities, and save the world from invasion of 'Glitch'.

name: WorldShaper Idle
summary: A tile-based world-building idle game. Place forests, rocks, mystical flowers and much more. Discover new tiles by experimenting with their placement. Then try to use their bonuses to optimize your production, or just sit back and become more powerful! What will your world look like?

name: Blackthorn Winter
summary: You were chosen to break the icy chains that shackle the land! Feel the pulse of Slavic folklore beating in tandem with the thrill of arcade games and the depth of RPG character development. Alone or in pairs, craft skill trees to overcome an ever-changing world where no two adventures are alike.

name: Kitty Cat Combat
summary: A unique tactical military simulation RPG that fuses fantasy with modern warfare. Unite under the pawprint banner!

name: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0!
summary: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0! is a story-driven game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling adventure. In this chaotic and disorderly universe, even infinite lives seem so fragile.

name: Eternal Reverie
summary: Dive into 'Eternal Reverie,' a team-based roguelike shooter exploring the mysteries of an eternal war. Solo or in co-op, navigate diverse planets, pilot unique ships, and customize with 80+ upgrades. Unveil secrets on branching paths to increase your roster and discover the truths of the universe

name: Crown of greed
summary: Ascend to the throne of Rodovia - a mystical realm inspired by Slavic mythology. Engage in an unusual, indirect management system in which you can't issue direct orders and must skillfully bend your subjects and heroes to your will. Perfect your ruling skills to build, expand and secure your legacy.

name: Big Walk
summary: Hang out and get lost with close friends in a big world. A cooperative online walker-talker from the creators of Untitled Goose Game.

name: Usual June
summary: Hang out, fight monsters, and discover your town’s darkest secrets in Usual June, a third person action game about summer break and the end of the world.
storyline:
It was supposed to be a quiet summer break: working odd jobs, hanging out with her new friends, and talking to ghosts. Instead, June is investigating Fen Harbor’s darkest secrets, fighting spectral creatures, and canceling a space-time cataclysm before existence itself breaks down and everything goes quiet forever.

Follow June and her new besties (alive and dead) as they investigate the town’s century-spanning secret history, explore a shattered multi-dimensional continuum, chill at the cemetery, defend themselves against massive monsters from beyond the pale, and deflect their parents’ questions about what they’re doing after they graduate.

name: Project Chameleon
summary: Project Chameleon is a stealth game where you must shape-shift into objects to go unnoticed by your enemies. Play as Siren, an elite spy executing missions around the globe. Manipulate your surroundings, set traps, and use powerful gadgets in each mission.
storyline: Siren is a spy who works for an agency focused on terrorism and conspiracies. She discovers that Viper, her mentor, is dead and that he left her his chameleon suit, a suit that is only given to the agency's highest-ranking agents. Siren is then chosen to be the new chameleon agent, replacing Viper. The chameleon suit is capable of simulating advanced holograms allowing the user to blend into the environment, becoming one with the scenery.

name: World of Stickman Classic
summary: World of Stickman - classic war strategy with stickman heroes. Collect resources, build your base and hire a powerful army.

name: Within the Unknown
summary: Within the Unknown is a first-person, psychological indie horror game where you regain your memory and relive the trauma from your dark past in a sci-fi simulation.

name: The Crimson Maid
summary: As a secret celestial curse takes hold of his father, a young cleric finds himself enraptured by the charms of a strikingly beautiful maid. A period drama that combines romance and murder mystery, with a dash of supernatural.

name: The Witch's Bakery
platforms: Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Nintendo Switch
summary:
The Witch’s Bakery is a 2D Adventure Puzzle game where you play as a joyful witch who opens a bakery in modern Paris.

She has a special power: she can heal emotions with her bread.

name: Divine Doubt
summary:
"I can give you that which you desire most. Your humanity."

This was all that was promised to Callum Röttwell in the mysterious email he received out of the blue one day. It was enough though for him to uproot his life and travel to the city of Starhaven to start anew. As an angel from a small town, he has to adapt quickly and learn how to interact with those he's never encountered before: demons. Especially since he must share a bedroom with one in a cramped apartment. Throughout this journey, Callum will meet many characters, explore the city of Starhaven, and dive deeper into what that strange email entails for him. But he must be wary, for his goddess is watching closely.

name: Renxia
summary: This is a challenging action duel game, you will play as an unknown origin of chivalrous expert travel around the ancient Chinese land, to find the former legend of the sword, and gradually solve the mystery of their own origins.
storyline:
Ren Xia is an instant action role-playing game in which you play the role of a young warrior of unknown origin who travels around the ancient land of China, seeking martial arts masters to fight with each other, and gradually unravel the mystery of his own origin.

This is a very difficult game, you need to make the right moves at the right time to defuse the enemy's various offensives, and constantly counterattack. Dance on the edge of a knife.

At the same time, you will accumulate energy with the action. Rational use of these energies to strengthen their own actions, change the situation of the war. In the case of enough energy, it can play a continuous offensive and defeat a strong enemy.

name: Vampire Dynasty
summary: Embrace the darkness. Become one with the night. Feast on blood and start a dynasty. Rule as a merciful lord or a ruthless tyrant. Build a beautiful castle, fight and thrive in an open world - either alone or in co-op mode.

name: Summoner of Greats
summary: Luis the Mad Painter. His last work, a series of portraits, "The Effects Series". - Is it a prayer or a curse? Over 200 beautifully rendered historical figures and worldviews. Casual real-time strategy with a variety of aspects depending on party combination, training, placement, and terrain.

name: Digested
summary: Digested is an open-world horror survival game in which you must evade a giant snake intent on eating you alive. Utilize various tools and abilities to formulate an escape strategy, and use the map to navigate through unfamiliar terrain. Locate your extraction pod and don't get digested.

name: Y2K Directive
summary: Will your leadership help your country survive a sci-fi disaster like a zombie plague or an alien invasion? Find out in this unique blend of real time strategy and a brutal (and often unfair) survival wargame!

name: Qi Shen Nong Gui
summary: Deception is a female-oriented pixel rpg game set in a hollow female background. In the game, you will play the role of Zhen Wu Si's Tie Rider to move freely in the Jianghu and the imperial court. The sea of bureaucracy is full of changes. The fate of the world is yours to decide.

name: Talis
summary: Step into the mythical realm of Northanda as you lead a trio of heroes on a deck-building adventure. Navigate strategic decisions, and harness the combined power of gems, blessings, artifacts, and more. Confront Chaos face-to-face in a world shaped by myth and magic.

name: God For A Day
summary: In this 2D, narrative-based simulation game, you play as the Son of God. Your mission: Decide, bless or condemn city residents. Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your revelation on Judgment Day.

name: Light In Blood
summary: Descending into the world of dreams, you are immersed in the ominous atmosphere of the game "Light In Blood". The game is divided into two teams: victims and executioners. The task of the victims is to survive and get out of the coma, and the executioners are to stop them.

name: HardAF
summary: A punishing precision-based, speedrun 2D platformer...in the dark. Uncover the level with every death, earn swag and unlock new chapters. Run, Jump, Dash, Die, Repeat.

name: England in London
summary: England in London is a surrealist satirical dark comedy adventure game with an emphasis on atmosphere, characters and mini-games. Featuring weird looking art, hand drawn animation and an ambient score for when you truly want to be left alone.

name: Schrödinger's Call
summary: I am Mary. The last person in the world you'll ever talk to. Schrodinger's Call" is an adventure game that uses a mysterious phone to connect with souls who cannot die. The main character, Mary, wakes up in a strange room with no memory. The player, along with the bewildered Mary, will save souls.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Limited Edition
platforms: PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition, 2-Disc Soundtrack, Conceptual Art Card Set (Set of 6), R-9A Arrowhead Acrylic Stand, B-1D Bydo System Alpha Acrylic Stand, Collector's Box

name: Marble Champions
summary: Marble Champions is a thrilling marble racing game that will put your skills and reflexes to the ultimate test. Navigate through intricate tracks, overcome obstacles, and rely on your skills to triumph over your rivals. As you advance through the game, you'll discover a trove of unique marbles. Each marble, with its unique appearance and stats, will become your secret weapon for dominating rivals and conquering every track in style. Engage in daily time trials and tournaments to prove yourself against other players.

name: Anemoi
summary: An upcoming visual novel from Key.

name: Project Code Neon Mafia
summary: Young members of the Mafia fight, rebel, and entrust their hopes to their friends to fight corruption, confront evil, and challenge fate.

name: Keep the Heroes Out
summary: An asymmetric, cooperative dungeon defense game for 1-4 players where you play as the monsters protecting their hard earned treasures against invading hordes of looters (so-called heroes) trying to steal it.

name: Monowave
summary: Monowave is a whimsical puzzle-adventure platformer about the transformative power of emotions. Explore beautiful landscapes and empathize with its quirky denizens to restore harmony in an emotionally turbulent universe.
storyline: Play as Mono, a guardian spirit protecting the four Emotions of the realm: Anxiety, Anger, Sorrow, and Happiness. One day, the Emotions escape, and their unchecked powers explode into a wave of chaos that warps everything—even the Emotions themselves. Determined to set things right, Mono begins a tumultuous journey towards their new lairs…

name: Dross
summary: Dross is an FPS Roguelike set in a derelict facility infested with alien bugs. Travel a procedurally generated world, get powerful weapons and equipment, and upgrade your gear to survive. Fight the Dross, discover and destroy the infestation, and uncover the secrets of this mysterious installation.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Coinciding with the GBA release, an enhanced version of Shantae Advance is also being released for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Windows PCs.
storyline: Filling in the gaps between the original Shantae (2002) and Shantae: Risky’s Revenge (2010), Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution sees Shantae protecting Sequin Land from a twisted new plot orchestrated by her nemesis, the pirate Risky Boots. Using a secret subterranean device, Risky is able to rotate and rearrange the continent, plunging it into chaos and giving her more coastal cities to plunder. Fortunately, by harnessing this technology and the knowledge of the Relic Hunters, players will be able to turn the tables on Risky, giving Shantae new paths through environments and a chance to thwart the villain’s scheme.

name: Dice Captain
summary: Dice Captain is a thrilling roguelike adventure that invites you to command your own ship and crew. Explore a randomly generated maps, select unique sailors with upgradeable dice, and master the art of tactic with talismans and one-time-use cards. Are you ready to become the ultimate Dice Captain?

name: Milo
summary: Survive an onslaught of cult adherents that worship a mysterious beverage
storyline:
You are being hunted for somebody's amusement. You don't know why...but it's kill or be killed.

Fight through an army of crazed cultists in the procedurally generated-altered world of 'Traang Creamery', a proselytizing nightmare cult that worships a mysterious beverage.

name: Kidbash: Super Legend
summary: Kidbash: Super Legend is an exciting 2D platformer that blends classic gaming with a modern touch. You'll go on a thrilling adventure through two different phases - the Mountain and the Village. Your goal is to defeat Tao Shen Long, and begin the journey to becoming a Super Legendary Hero.

name: FUR Squadron Phoenix
summary: Embark on an action-packed adventure in this on-rails space shooter. As a trainee pilot, you will fight in strange virtual worlds. Master your ship, upgrade your skills and protect the federation from an imminent threat. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room
summary: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?
storyline:
The International Space Agency (INSA) has made a chilling discovery. In 6 months, 14 days, 2 hours and 47 seconds, the world will end. An enigmatic cosmic entity, dubbed by scientists as the "Dark Doodad," is on a cosmic rampage, devouring stars at the farthest reaches of the universe. Even worse, now its hungry gaze is set on our solar system. Despite numerous efforts to divert its path, all have failed. Humanity teeters on the brink of annihilation...

However, humanity refuses to go down without a fight. Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein, a distinguished scientist at INSA, has devised a daring plan to change fate – "The Marvelous Room Experiment." Within a 10m x 8m x 5m chamber lies humanity's last hope to thwart the Dark Doodad.

name: Runehaven
summary: Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

name: WYzards
summary: WYzards is an upcoming multiplayer extraction game with a bit of roguelike. Explore dungeons, use your elemental abilities, and go on insane adventures online!

name: Mainland
summary: Enter a cooperative medieval realm, forge alliances, lead armies, and engage in epic battles. Shape history with dynamic politics, or test your mettle against others in fierce player-vs-player combat.

name: Bendy: The Cage
summary: Bendy: The Cage is a first person psychological horror game that takes place during the events of Bendy and the Dark Revival. The shadows are closing in. Fight the madness before it's too late.
storyline:
Bendy: The Cage is the fearful story of Henry and his escape from the Keeper prison known as "The Pit".

The darkest souls have been banished to this deep hellscape of metal and blood.
Survival will require you to fight the madness, before it devours you whole.

name: K2: Digital Edition
summary: Easy to play, hard to survive. Rush to the summit before weather breaks or set up camps and prepare to push later. Choose the right cards for the right moment. Play turn based strategy with friends, AI or in single player mode. Popular board game adaptation consulted with real K2 climbers.

name: Noumisou Journey
summary: A boy, is killed by a killer but resurrected on Halloween. But his brain had been stolen. Confront traps and monsters. Interact with strange inhabitants, solve puzzles, and get your brain back. Dying Game & comical horror. death scene collection feature available. pixel-art exploration adventure.

name: Call of Dookie
summary: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!

name: Soul Blade
summary: "Soul Blade" is a 2D platform action game with classic hand-drawn 2D animations that provide a smooth and immersive visual experience. The combat system is built around the "swordplay" mechanism, delivering intense and exhilarating battles.

name: Isolation One
summary: Exciting action with puzzle elements and an interesting plot, which takes place on the huge spaceship Transporter P18. In this game, players will encounter an incredible mixture of science fiction and horror. Immerse yourself in a dark world where t you need to survive at any cost.

name: The World Well: Blood of Caro
summary: 814 R.E; the war is approaching. In Redimus, the chaotic world where magic, technology, slaves and vampires coexist, a young girl happens upon a magic gun that sets her on a journey of revenge. There is a burning manor behind her, and the road ahead disappears in the jungles of the night...

name: Project Breakout
summary: Project Breakout is a sandbox prison escape game, where you and up to three friends are put into a secured facility. Explore the area, train to improve your attributes and gather items, to craft tools that are necessary for your escape!

name: Five Day Detective
summary: The Five Day Detective is a point n click whodunnit featuring multiple cases and a twisted sense of humour.
storyline:
He hates crime. All Inspector Dermot Dervish likes less are early mornings, his boss, and any technology from the last thirty years. But he won’t need any of these. Armed with his trusty notebook, razor wit, and an assistant who’s trying to pretend she’s not a traffic warden, only Dermot can solve a series of shocking and intriguing murders, and bring the city’s criminal scum to justice.

Or let them go if he thinks they’ve got a good enough reason.

name: FireBall 2
summary: Fireball 2 is an elegant and satisfying arcade-survival game about dodging swarms and triggering bombs. Take control of your fireball and weave through the massive flood of enemies. Lure the flood towards bombs and trigger them, either directly or indirectly, to take out as many enemies as possible.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 4
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 3.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 3
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 4.

name: Saborus
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Saborus is a horror game that puts players in the shoes of Gisele, a chicken escaping from a deadly slaughterhouse. Immerse yourself in a terrifying world with incredible graphics and a chilling atmosphere, where tension and fear await at every turn.
developers: High Room Game Studio, QUByte Interactive

name: Kipidon
summary: A colorful shooter that uses a flower as a cupid's arrow. Shoot as many people as you can before time runs out!

name: Treasures of the Haunted Forest
summary: Treasures of the Haunted Forest is a fantasy hidden object game, where player's goal is to find alchemical ingredients in the haunted forest.

name: Fat Goblins
summary: Prepare for goblin-packed, hat-stealing, and princess-fattening team based 16v16 combat! Siege the castle walls, rescue your pudgy princess, fatten up the enemy princess with delicious meat, unlock new hats & weapons, and kill each other repeatedly in silly and chaotic PvP war!

name: Body Count
summary: Embark upon a cop's gripping journey of vengeance through this bullet hell shooter.

name: Clown Meat
summary: Clown Meat is a Precision Platformer with an emphasis on speedrunning and replayability. Tumble through a butchered world where humanity is barely a memory on your naïve journey to cheer up the monolithic clown that came from the Depths of Jupiter.

name: The Bugs Manor
summary: The Bugs Manor is a free 2D pixel art horror game. Explore a cursed mansion, hide from scary monsters, and solve puzzles with an inventory-free gameplay, focused on direct interactions with the environment. Can you survive your first night in this haunted house and uncover its mysteries?

name: Travel Knight Adventure
summary: The Medieval Action Based RPG with guns and magic. Pirates, zombies, wizards and dragons! Catacombs full of treasure and puzzles.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne
summary: While being in the Ottoman capital of Edirne, Vlad Voievod Dracula descends into the dungeons to save a great warrior sentenced to death, so he might join Dracula to take the crown of Wallachia. A casual relaxing game, in the Vlad Voievod Dracula franchise, that takes place before Episode 1.

name: Little Problems
summary: Little Problems is a Cozy Detective game about solving mysteries around minor inconveniences, everyday misunderstandings, and of course, little problems. This game is not about saving the world; it's about enriching it, one case at a time.

name: Stunt Xpress
summary: Become a delivery van driver. The best in the world. Take part in internationally renowned delivery van driving championships. Shoot your parcels (on time) into customer's homes like a marksman while performing gravity-defying stunts and being chased by god knows what.

name: Deep Time
summary: Shift dimensions and harness cosmic parkour abilities to solve mind-bending puzzles. Reverse the heat death of the universe in this surreal 3D platformer.

name: Shotgun Recovery
summary: A psychological shooter set in a small Nordic town. Take part in robberies, drive-bys and self-medication, all while fighting literal nightmares to survive.

name: Owlet's Embrace
summary:
An owlet afraid of flight sets off to explore a vibrant mysterious world and rediscover itself. On this heartwarming adventure, you'll confront the owlet's deepest fears as only the greatest challenges can lead to the most profound growth.

Owlet's Embrace is an action exploration platformer, blending fast paced grappling hook manouvers with combat and emotional discovery.

name: Calm Cove
summary: Build your dream island, bring it to life and make it flourish. Create nature, establish settlements and welcome villagers while watching your own miniature world thrive before your eyes!

name: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
summary: Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city, set two years after the ending of the original Troublemaker. The journey of the “Parakacuk” gang continues alongside the “Beyond Dream” band in South Jayakarta city in this fun open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game.
storyline:
Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city that continue to haunt the dreams of the youth in the city, along with the power of friendship!

Troublemaker 2 is an open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game set in the fictional settings of South Jayakarta, a diverse city in Indonesia. Play as Jordan and Budi alongside the Beyond Dream band and Parakacuk gang, as together, they overcome all obstacles to chase their dreams.

Explore the City
- Inspired by beat-'em-up classics and its prequel, Troublemaker 2 delivers an exhilarating blend of seamless fun and stylish combat. Bare fists, weaponry, techniques, and finishers, all in your arsenal to defeat your enemies.
- Immerse yourself in a city filled with activities and minigames that will keep you engaged as you explore every corner of the urban landscape.
- Lot of unique side stories will also accompany you on your journey as you lend a helping hand to friends and townsfolk.

Chase your Dream, Together
- Beyond Dream, the band led by Jordan, Alex, Andira, and Halimawan. Together, they dream of becoming the most popular band in the city.
- Parakacuk Gang, a friendship gang from their high school days. Budi, an MMA fighter; Boby, a future scholar; Rani, working for the city's intelligence agency; and Zaenal, diligently working at Kedan Coffee. This friendship will endure as they continue to chase their dreams together.
- Friendship, drama, love, rivalry, and adventures. A story that will never be forgotten throughout their teenage years.

Improvise, Adapt, Overcome
- Witness the stylish combat showdown between Jordan, the street brawler, and Budi, the MMA fighter.
- There are plenty of combo variations, weapons, items, and techniques to empower both Jordan and Budi.
- Discover various unique shops and interactions in the city that will aid you on your journey.
- The key is to use everything in your arsenal to defeat various types of enemies.

name: Music Power Up
summary: As a musician in the 1980s, create music for early video games. Make your own sounds and melodies from scratch, or use pre-composed patterns. Play games, upgrade the music app, meet programmers, editors and musicians, find your next music job, in the crazy decade that started the digital revolution.

name: The Phantom
summary: The Ghost Who Walks is back! Comics' very first costumed hero is coming to Steam and console in an all new side scrolling beat-em-up adventure. Take on the Singh brotherhood across the globe with only your physical strength, skill with weapons and fearsome reputation!

name: Bean Beasts
summary: Defeat monster hordes alongside your Bean Beasts in this cute, challenging Tower Defense Game! Evolve your companions, explore upgrade paths for traps and take on epic boss battles!

name: Morgan: Metal Detective
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A cozy, first person metal detector adventure game, where you reunite residents of the beautiful Cornish island of Glasden with things they have lost. And with your late Grandpa's help, maybe restore magic along the way.

name: Power Line Rider
summary: Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Endless Runner with retro 8-bit inspired graphics & sounds! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!

name: Codename Incubus
summary: Slice, dash, and parry your way through your inner demons in this fast-paced psychedelic journey! Dodge an onslaught of deadly projectiles and unleash your blade upon nightmarish foes that lurk within your subconscious. Follow a dissident dealer and a jaded philanderer on their never-ending trip.

name: Sticker Kittens
summary: Sticker Kittens is a sudoku-like puzzle where you need to match kittens. You can also learn about how to raise and play with kittens!

name: The Bunny Graveyard: Chapter 2 - Terror in Carrot Town
summary:
Terror in Carrot Town is the working title for Chapter 2 of the horror adventure game, The Bunny Graveyard.

Chapter 2 has started development and will follow Skye the Bunny with a different moveset and more gameplay options then the previous chapter. Plans are for the story to get darker but still have wacky moments and fun minigames throughout a more connected world map with a less linear path through the story.

name: Pirates Odyssey
summary: Ahoy, mateys! We are marooned on a series of islands and need to find a way home. Help us explore the environment, build camps and find glorious booty. Join us on an island hopping adventure full of parrot wisdom, pirate mayhem and puzzle glory! Arrr!

name: Pixel Piracy Online
summary: Pirate MMO RPG that has it all. You will play alone or with friends any way you want: build the world, gather resources, farm, socialize, pillage, level up, min-max, loot, craft, survive, etc. One big dynamic, persistent world.

name: Exploration: Light
summary: Experience large space ship battles. Uncover the secrets of the mysterious alien race. Upgrade your ship or even start a fleet. Survive

name: Lost Isle
summary: Lost Isle is an open-world survival game set in a procedurally generated fantasy world. Build and protect or siege and plunder. Harvest and craft or explore and loot. Whether you decide to go it alone or forge an alliance with other players, the Lost Isle is yours to take–and lose–as you see fit.
storyline:
The natural laws of the world are twisted and distorted here, creating a land of new opportunity. Come explore a world lost in the tides of the immaterial. Venture through distinct environments. Battle unique enemies. Gather powerful resources and ingredients. Discover the secrets of the Lost Isle before they’re devoured.

The riches of the Lost Isle are only matched by the hazard. Raise your stronghold and build settlements that offer protection from the dangers in the darkness at the edge of the campfire. Customize buildings with a detailed building system both inside and out. Expand your skillset to build, grow, and protect your new home.

The Lost Isle is unforgiving, particularly to the unprepared. Struggle against the harsh nature of the isle as you gather materials to craft weapons, armor, tools, and defenses. Brew potent concoctions and forge legendary devices to shore up your fragile mortality. Learn from master alchemists, artificers, apothecaries, witches, and wizards the secrets of the most dedicated.

name: Dark Decline
summary: Dark Decline is a horror game about exploring the town you live in to figure out what happened to everyone. Play against unique enemies that will do whatever it takes to stop you.

name: Lea
summary: In a world of miracles and challenges, where steam technology meets magic on a vast archipelago continent, you become Lea, an ace pilot. Your mission: conquer enemies, unveil conspiracies, and bring peace. Are you ready to be the hero who stops the war?

name: Shadows of the Afterland
summary:
Madrid, 1960. The old city zoo is rocked by a mysterious death, catapulting a soul to the threshold between the world of the living and the afterlife. But when the transition goes awry, the soul arrives with the memories of Carolina, one of the pioneers in Madrid's police force, who has yet to be born.

Step into Carolina’s shoes and plunge into a riveting adventure to unravel the enigma shrouding these ominous events. Explore the wacky realm of the afterlife, teeming with unique characters and with its own set of rules.

name: Memory Rewind
summary: Explore the thrilling detective visual novel adventure with your assistant Olivina. Find your way through the bizarre case that pulling you into unique investigation gameplay and meet the colorful cast of memorable characters that can help you or endanger you

name: The Diner at the End of the Galaxy
summary: Build your diner. Grow exotic ingredients and create a menu for your intergalactic guests. Send expeditions to outer worlds in search of loot. Form alliances and rivalries with powerful factions and shape the fate of the galaxy. Welcome to the Diner at the End of the Galaxy.

name: Infernae
summary: Fear is not a shield. Only those who face it will survive this adrenaline-pumping bullet hell boss rush.

name: OhMyWitch!
summary:
It is the first year I have had the chance to join the Halloween parade. But why the monster kidnapped me to the other world?! And this charming monster wants me to be his Witch. What do you think I should do?!

On the other hand, I also met the cat I lost. But why did he suddenly become a human?!

name: Heart Cage
summary:
You are a detective who has just moved to a new town. You are involved in a serial killer case, and three mysterious residents (Or more?!) are approaching you!

Don't trust anyone! But... can you?

name: Kiyo
summary: Sneak, fight and sabotage an evil bunny corporation in this stealthy platformer. Join a resistance group of animals trying to get their home planet back from the paws of evil rabbits. Master stealth, swing with ninja ropes, crack tricky puzzles and enjoy satirical humour!

name: Crystal Journey: Lum's Adventure
summary: Crystal Journey - Lum's Adventure is a captivating 3D puzzle/adventure game where your goal is to guide Lum, a brave light spirit, through a world filled with challenging puzzles and stunning environments. Rotate the levels, think creatively, and solve intricate puzzles to reach the magical purple crystal that hold the key to Lum's journey.

name: Amp
summary: Dive into the synesthetic world of Amp, the neon rail shooter set in a polygonal rhythmic universe.

name: The Scramble Vice
summary: It is the year 2048. Tokyo Police Department’s notorious 9th Mobile Unit, “The Scramble Vice” is ready to fight high-tech robot crime! Clad in an armed exoskeleton suit, police officer Sakuragi Kei of the 9th unit stands to fight robot crimes within Neo Tokyo! Are you ready to scramble up Tokyo?
developers: Flyhigh Works, Studio Pico, ESQUADRA, Inc.

name: Geno 2 the Generals' Orders
summary: Take out demonic generals that have taken over the planet! Destroy giga robots, save the cities, give the citizens their homes back, and stop the reign of terror from the 6 masterminds. Collect power orbs to unlock new areas and explore the open world of each location.

name: Rubinite
summary: "Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

name: B.U.D.D.
summary: B.U.D.D. is a cute sci-fi adventure platformer heavily inspired by games and anime from the late 80's.

name: Hollow Home
summary: Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG about the russian invasion of Ukraine, told from the perspective of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

name: Elemdian
summary: RPG that combines exploration with magic combat. Unfurl your claws as a powerful werewolf warrior wielding the power of the Elegems! A journey to find the Elegems, unleash devastating spells, and unravel the mysteries of Morrok.

name: Tom the Postgirl
summary: Take a ride with Tom through her village and discover a great deal—perhaps too much—about the locals. Her approach, although controversial, is highly effective: intense and obsessive stalking.
storyline: This spooky adventure follows the mischevious Tom on her deliveries which surprisingly always go wrong. No wonder, she is a real stalker and peeks inside whenever she gets the occasion to. Go along with her and see what the locals may have to hide.

name: Mayhem Brawler II: Best of Both Worlds
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: A perfect fuse of '90s arcade vibe and modern rogue-lite / RPG mechanics in a time transition-themed beat 'em up. Play solo or online with friends and shape the story through your choices. Be amazed by the hand-drawn comics-inspired art, frame-by-frame animated characters, and kick-ass soundtracks.

name: Parkside: Decayed Soul Manipulation
summary: Parkside is an FPS-Immersive Sim that chronicles the future of biomechanical subterfuge and suffering. Shoot, hack, and either save or sour the future of humanity in the dismally attractive and dystopian city of Abbotsford, California in the awful year of 2038. Will you serve the Divine Rod?

name: Noga
summary: Noga is a single-player shooter/driver, RPG, where an alien invasion of Earth has just begun. As you try to save your friend from the hands of the aliens, you uncover the real reason that brought them to Earth.

name: Fishing Echoes
summary: Step into the cozy realms of Fishing Echoes, a game that beckons you to shorelines filled with rare fish and whispered legends. Ready yourself for the ultimate angling challenge as you embark on a journey to mastery.

name: Dark Auction: Hitler's Estate
summary: The game is a mystery adventure centering on the idea of a historical figure having surreptitiously bequeathed a fictitious estate, following the drama that plays out among the characters faced with an enigma extending all the way into their modern world.
storyline: The tale unfolds in an ancient castle in 1981, 36 years after Hitler's death. 18-year-old protagonist Noah is determined not to turn out like his father, but, beyond that, he has no idea of the kind of person he wants to be. Noah takes part in a mysterious auction held at the old castle, and, as someone living in the 1980s, comes to terms with the absurdity of the trauma the war left behind, learning of the truths hidden deep within those affected, ultimately closing in on the big secret his father has been concealing.

name: Exelio
summary: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.

name: Archetype Blue
summary: Archetype Blue is a rogue-lite deck building game where you form your own adventure team and deck before facing the challenges this fantasy world has in store for you. With all the options in front of you and the circumstances surrounding your expedition, do you have any chance of succeeding?

name: Alpine Lake
summary: Kick back in the fresh mountain air and craft your ideal haven on the shores of Alpine Lake! Build, and decorate your inn to bring joy and prosperity to the community. Welcome guests to your cozy escape in the woods. Farm, cook, and entertain them in your own unique way!

name: On a Summer Night
summary: "Today, I would like to tell you about one night. One night that changed my life." On a Summer Night is a short point-and-click visual novel.

name: Animaloid Girl
summary: The story of a girl who is changing from a human to a "Kemono" and watching her coming of age. This is a multi-ending "adventure game about training an Animalized girl" set in a Kemomimi x Hong Kong x cyberpunk world.

name: Little Cheese Works
summary: This is a cooperative action game where you have to carry cheese to the goal without being found by cats. You can have a conversation with voice chat, but the slightest noise will wake up the cat. Let's carry the cheese quietly by breathing quietly so that the cat won't find it!

name: Toree Saturn
summary: Toree Saturn is a speed based 3D Platformer featuring a round bird with sunglasses and a backpack!

name: Million Depth
summary: Embark on an adventure, exploring a million subterranean floors of a fallen Earth.Trace the remnants of humanity that once dwelled below, all in search of "YOU".Utilize a crafting system that transforms your drawings into weapons to survive the challenging underground world.

name: Dissent on Mars
summary: A sci-fi life sim where you create new societies unlike anything on Earth. Design your economy and government, build your colony, and experience your choices firsthand by living as a colonist. Will your society become a living utopia, or another dystopia?

name: Janet DeMornay is a Slumlord (and a witch)
summary: Live the anxieties and horrors of what it is to be a renter in a world run by landlords. …and your landlord is a witch.
storyline:
JDM is about being a renter. It’s about landlord overreach. It’s about a legal system built by landlords for landlords. It’s about being a queer and having a found family. It’s also about a witch. And that witch is very interested in what you’re doing. What you’re doing right now. In fact she wants to see you. Please answer the door, Andrew. I have a right to see what you’re doing in my house Andrew this is just a little tenant pop-in why won’t you answer the door answer the door answer the door answer the

I see you, Andrew.

name: Ghost of Catsushina
summary: Ghost of Catsushina - is an action-adventure platformer. The action takes place on the island, when damage penetrates into the jade dream of the guardian spirit, the warrior awakens and sees that his homeland has been destroyed. Set out on a journey to defeat the filth.

name: Tormented Souls II
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Caroline Walker is back in an award-winning classic survival horror sequel. Explore eerie monasteries and other nightmarish locations. Brace yourself, confront terrifying creatures armed only with makeshift weapons as you desperately try to rescue your cursed sister.
storyline: After the events of Wildberger Hospital, Caroline yearns for a normal life with her younger sister, Anna. However, fate has other plans. As Anna falls victim to a mysterious affliction, coughing blood and experiencing blackened eyes and moments of unconsciousness, conventional remedies prove futile. In a desperate bid to save her sister, Caroline must turn to the supernatural.

name: Hexxen: Hunters
summary: Lead a party of 18th century Hunters against the forces of Hell in this turn-based tactical RPG. Manage your base of operations, train your team of Witch Hunters, and fight to save the world from certain doom.

name: Menace
summary: Lead a strike force against an alien threat in this turn-based tactical RPG from the developers of Battle Brothers. Answer distress calls across different worlds, train and equip infantry, deploy tanks and mechs, and plan and execute missions in detailed turn-based battles.

name: Little Nightmares III
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Embark on a new adventure in the unique world of Little Nightmares.

In Little Nightmares III, you follow the journey of Low & Alone, as they search for a path that could lead them out of the Nowhere.

Trapped within the Spiral, a cluster of disturbing places, the two friends will have to work together to survive in a dangerous world full of delusions and escape the grasp of an even greater threat lurking in the shadows.

For the first time in the franchise, face your childhood fears together with a friend using online co-op, or solo with an AI companion.
developers: BANDAI NAMCO Games Inc, Supermassive Games

name: To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora
summary: Delve into the captivating realm of Faenora in our upcoming real-time strategy RPG game, To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora. Drawing inspiration from timeless classics like Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we're modernizing the elements that made these games unforgettable.

name: Beneath the Bleeding Moon
summary: A boys' love / yaoi visual novel set in 19th century Japan. Follow the adventures of Haru, an aloof young man forced to crossdress by his mother from childhood, and Kishou, a cheerful and irreverent thief brought up in poverty, as they travel across the country to break an age-old curse.

name: Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment
summary: Hack, Slash, Parry and Dodge your foes in this Souls-like Action RPG. Explore the countryside in search of The Devil Fragment while fighting enemies with a multi game inspired combat system where you can launch foes into the air and then juggle them to build your combo meter for multiple buffs.

name: Quantum Cortex
summary: Quantum Cortex is a fast-paced, physics-based metroidvania. Tear through a dark, atmospheric environment at lightning speeds and battle terrifying creatures. Discover the eldritch mystery behind civilization’s fall, and rise up against the transhumanist dystopia that took its place.
storyline:
It is the dawn of the 27th Century.

The Greed of Man has manifested into physical form, tainting the earth with unholy infection.

Society has collapsed. Humanity is near extinction.

The ruling class remains intact.

name: Spirit X Strike
summary: An Action Adventure Game that lets you craft unique COMBOs and explore endless ways to style on your enemies with a high-speed combat system. Test your skills in fun chaotic one-vs-group battles, intense, strategic duels, and exhilarating post-apocalyptic adventure that will set your blood boiling.

name: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Indie
summary: Lessaria is a unique strategy game that combines city building with indirect hero control. Build and manage a thriving kingdom while issuing commands and quests to guide your heroes in their adventures. Explore, conquer, and shape the destiny of your realm in this epic fantasy world.
storyline:
You have guilds at your service, through which you summon heroes to the kingdom and issue orders on the task board. Heroes can make their own decisions, but the substantial rewards they see on the task board will guide them where needed. Or it might not, if they are drunk or set on buying themselves a new weapon!

Each hero in the game has their own value system, determining their preferences and influencing their behavior and decisions. Thieves are ready to tickle a dragon for gold, while paladins eradicate evil with enthusiasm, and free of charge. A wise ruler can use this to their advantage.
In the tavern, over a mug of ale, heroes gather in parties to take on the serious challenges that the land of Lessaria presents. Together, they become stronger, complementing each other's skills and compensating for weaknesses.

A king must take care of his people, manage and oversee construction! Guilds of heroes, equipment and potion shops, resource gatherer homes, walls, and towers are all vital for your kingdom. Heroes will often come for supplies, enriching the treasury to some extent. Taxes are the foundation of any commonwealth. Without them, the kingdom will starve - tax collectors will ensure this doesn’t happen by routinely visiting every building in the city.
Another source of income for the kingdom is from caravans. Protect your own and plunder others to become even richer and more influential. After all, it is your land, and you have the right to combat smuggling within its borders.

What could be better than the smell of a fire storm in the mornings? Only the scent of singed goblins who have decided to attack you! Use the arsenal of spells available to court wizards to destroy your enemies, aid allied heroes, and summon magical creatures into battle.
You can learn new spells in the library or from the guilds of heroes. If you want to use them a distance away from the castle, build beacons.

name: Ardaria
summary: Procedural building, crafting, RPG skills, resource mining, and dynamic NPCs. Master parkour moves, face hordes of enemies, and tame powerful mounts! Embark on an epic adventure in Ardaria!

name: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion
summary: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion follows three high school friends; Haruka Nanami, Nemu Takanashi, and Maria Hitsugi, as they explore the Amare Est Vivere Hospital, testing a local urban legend as the streamer Nemu seeks to boost her subscriber count. Unfortunately for the three girls, the legend of “Ayame’s Mercy” is true, and they trigger a decades-old curse that sends them into a dark realm. Together they must avoid the vengeful spirit of Ayame Kirishima and other horrors from the hospital’s dark past as they search for a way to dispel Ayame’s curse once and for all.
developers: XSEED Games, Marvelous Europe Ltd., Team GrisGris, MAGES.

name: Divine Guardian
summary: Explore the enchanted Vietnamese jungle, combat mystical monsters, and rescue creatures on your quest to challenge the gods and restore harmony to the Universe as the DIVINE GUARDIAN, immerse yourself in an epic 2D hand-drawn refreshing adventure.

name: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue!
summary: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue! is an upcoming non-linear investigative visual novel where the player, with each mission, must interview witnesses, gather evidence, and find contradictions in the suspects' testimonies to find out who the real culprit is.

name: SoulQuest
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch
summary: Carve your path through hordes of enemies, defying the gods to seize the power of Morrigan, Goddess of Death, and retrieve the soul of your beloved! SoulQuest combines the evergreen Metroidvania gameplay with the unique Celtic mythology into one, action-packed mixture!

name: Starfall Invaders
summary: Embark on a roguelike shooting game set in a mysterious world that combines 2D and 3D elements. Survive and escape from an unknown planet. Utilize enemy resources to enhance yourself, repair your damaged spaceship, and prepare for increasingly powerful and numerous enemy forces.

name: Projected Dreams
summary: Drag toys from the shelves and drop them on the table to create a shadow play in this cozy puzzle game. As the shadows you cast uncover past family relationships and the environment around you changes and evolves, the lines between reality and fantasy blur.

name: Dragonscale Monastery
summary: Tame the mountain peak and create a dragon sanctuary. Carefully expand your monastery and discover the secrets of dragon breeding. Survive harsh winters, limited resources, hunger, cold, and many other adversities. Experience unique survival city-builder in the world of Dragonscale Monastery.

name: Water Me & You
summary: Water Me & You is a cozy two-player co-op adventure in which you play as a water droplet or a seed-like creature that can change states, on a quest to regenerate a world left behind by humans.

name: Soul Devourer
summary: Soul Devourer is a metroidvania action-platformer with a classic 2D horror style. You'll explore the vast, cursed Sakuradoki High School, master unique abilities, fight twisted monsters and uncover the long-buried secrets concealed under the school.

name: Primal Carnage: Evolution
