summary: Primal Carnage: Evolution builds on the bones of what came before, taking dinosaur versus human combat to the next level. Featuring an expanded roster of prehistoric playables, evolved gameplay, and a wealth of brand new content to sink your teeth into.

name: Ratatan
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Ratata Arts and TVT have announced Ratatan, a new rhythm action game from the creator of Patapon previously teased as Project JabberWocky.

name: Recycle Bin Battle
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Reycle Bin Battle is an arcade puzzle game based on 3 differents gameplay. Make combo with rubishes to make ball, use ball in a breakout to get energy and finally use energy to shoot Kaiju coming from outer space.
storyline:
In a near futur, Humanity exploited 98% of earth ressources.
It's the moment choose by unknown force coming from space to attack Human species.
Humanity decide to use last ressources to design a weapon working with rubishes, the Recycle Bin Weapon. Now it's time to fight !

name: Sylvana's Chronicles
summary: A turn-based strategy game with roguelike and deck-building elements. Explore a dark and magical world full of forgotten lands, monsters, and secrets. Build your own deck of cards to fight your way through the dungeons. Upgrade your cards, unlock new items, and discover ancient artifacts.

name: Wish Upon a Llama
summary: Embark on a delightful journey of breeding and raising adorable animals like llamas, bunnies, and capybaras while building meaningful relationships with the residents of Llama Town. What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!

name: Constance
summary: Constance is a 2D hand-drawn action adventure featuring a paintbrush-wielding artist, striving to escape from a colorful but decaying inner-world, created by her declining mental health.

name: Panchin is Frustrated
genres: Point-and-click, Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary:
You are the all-seeing observer of a pair of roommates, Panchin and Julem. Panchin is an artist struggling with creative block, and thus spends most of their time pacing around the room, or staying distracted.

Click to collect Panchin's Tears of Frustration. The amount of Tears collected during the day affects Panchin's dreams at night.

name: Saeko: Giantess Dating Sim
summary: You opened your eyes to find a giant girl looking down at you. Experience the fate of Saeko and the little people in this cruel yet captivating story with avant-garde art.

name: System Purge: Hollow Point
summary: Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. SYSTEM PURGE - Hollow Point is a massive expansion which adds a surreal new campaign, challenging new gamemodes, and more.

name: Eydigard
summary: Eydigard is a coop RPG drawing from Scandinavian and Sami folklore. As an adventuring shapeshifter, you're tasked to reclaim and cleanse farmlands infected by a relentless plague, while navigating the intricate politics of rival clans. Each decision impacts your path and the world around you.

name: Milord
summary: Milord is a Kingdom Management RPG game with city building mechanics. You'll be left with hard choices for your fiefdom. Will you be able to rise to the occasion or lose your kingdom and life in the process.

name: Tales of Wakana
summary: "Tales of Wakana" is a thrilling action-adventure game like Galaxy Castlevania. Explore a mysterious and challenging world, battling monsters using magical skills. Uncover the true meaning of life, family bonds, and self-knowledge for an enlightening experience.

name: Heroes Suck
summary: Defend your dungeon against an onslaught of heroes in this physics-enabled tower defense. Build your dungeon tile by tile, placing deadly traps to protect your loot. Upgrade your defenses and powers as you amass wealth and unleash havoc on these cheese wheel-stealing 'heroes'.

name: Bobo Bay
summary: Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions. You are able to feed your Bobo an old shoe which is kinda funny.

name: RaidKids
summary: Still, the boy keeps walking.
storyline:
The boy and the girl have no choice but to go on.
Regret is trapped, transformed, and fangs.
What will the children feel, what will they need, what will they find?
You are the only one who can witness the end of the world and their end.

name: Cyber Paradise
summary: Revive Mini the Dog digitally through 2D roguelite actions; craft her cyber paradise with beloved moments, like sniffing dog butts XD. Uncover a deeper dystopian narrative and strengthen friendships in cafe chats—a frenetic yet cozy journey.
storyline:
In the not-so-distant future, reality as we know it has been unmasked - our world is nothing more than a computer simulation. Every aspect of life, from our appearance and possessions, to our thoughts and experiences, is pre-determined by algorithms. When we die, we are simply deleted; our life data fragmented and discarded into a digital wasteland known as The Lost Sector. There is no heaven or hell, just cold digits.

Yet, amidst the bleakness of this discovery, you seize the opportunity and turn it into a business. Catering to those still yearning for hope, you establish Cyber Paradise. This service navigates the desolate corners of The Lost Sector to recover fragments of the dearly departed, reassembling them within the warmth of a digital sanctuary, a personal paradise sculpted from ones and zeros.

You take on the role of Hayley, a skilled hacker-warrior, and team up with her dog DDmeow on this captivating adventure. Vanquish creatures manifested by the deceased's fear and sorrow; delve into the rich narratives of your clients' pasts, and form connections within the café that serves as your clandestine base. There, amid the hustle and bustle of Samuel's customers, you catch a glimpse of this dystopian world through their shared stories.

In the first episode, you bear witness to the touching tale of your initial client - Mini, a dog whose recent passing leaves behind a grieving human companion, Samuel. Embark on this journey to piece together the digital remnants of Mini's life and create for her a serene Cyber Paradise.

name: Relic Guardian
summary: "Relic Guardian" is a fantasy-style strategy tower defense game. As the builder on the battlefield, summon a variety of defense towers and spells with reliable hero companions to complete this epic and guarding adventure!

name: Tales of the Laser Knights
summary: Zak needs to save the galaxy! Explore all 5 known planets, upgrade your Laser Katana, learn how to fight the evil ... and go on an intergalactic adventure, in this sci-fi b-movie Action-RPG!

name: Sky Harvest
summary: Sky Harvest is an Open World Farming Game set in a fantasy town named Magica where you play as Zacharias whose goal is to manage the farm on a floating island and supply the crops in the City below.

name: The One Who Stands Behind
summary: Survive hordes of monsters in a deck builder with a tactical grid while engaging in existential conversations with your avatar.

name: Rebirth of Arcadia
summary: Rebirth of Arcadia is a turn-based tactics game with roguelike elements and contemplative story. Experience the journey of two groups of people working together to escape from the Abyss. Explore, defeat monsters, wield and modify the power of runestones to uncover the secrets of the Abyss.

name: Zehlar
summary: Explore a world full of secrets and magic, inhabited by creatures with unique elemental abilities. Ally with them to embark on your adventure, and train alongside your creature companions to become stronger and conquer the challenges of the world.

name: Golembert
summary: Golembert is a beautifully illustrated story game about a Gardener Golem that takes care of the plants and spirits on his own small island. Manage the needs of your plants within a circular economy, grow fresh veggies, barter them with your friends and be ready for an adventure! Are there other Levighosts out there like Helio? How is the Great War related to your garden? And what about the cutthroat Trade Co. that makes life difficult for Frieda? Meet lovable characters, decorate your garden and make the world a better place through your choices!

name: Crown Gambit
summary: Choose the next sovereign in this dark fantasy game, featuring card battles and visual novel-like dialogues with multiple endings. Play your cards well, use your skills with care, and move carefully in these turn-based battles, where the weak rely on luck and the Heroes on their talent.

name: Death the Guitar
summary: "Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

name: Operation Octo
summary: Dr. Odin, a hyper-intelligent octopus, is on a conquest against sunken skeletons. High-tech turrets are at his aid: Pistol Shrimp! Navy Seal! Death Ray! Deploy 'em, guard 'em, and collect more of 'em! Travel across unique biomes and put the dead to rest.

name: Specters of the Sun
summary: Specters of the Sun is a challenging 2D action platformer with action-packed levels. Take on the role of an elusive specter to reclaim your old corpse, now possessed at the heights of your former kingdom.

name: Gex Trilogy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Gex Trilogy is the definitive edition of the classic platforming series with Gexcessive attitude, complete with Gextras like rewind and save anywhere. Relive Gex's snark-laced adventures through the warped lens of twentieth-century pop culture and use your Gexterity to survive an onslaught of television-themed challenges.
developers: Square Enix, Crystal Dynamics, Limited Run Games

name: Sky the Scraper
summary: This is a building cleaning Roguelike action game, about a young man named Sky, who chases uncertain dreams as a building cleaner. Conquer thrilling randomly changing high-rise stages, upgrade skills and gear with your money and will, and find your path within a two-month limit.

name: Tales from My Ass: Slice of Death
summary: My first-person horror adventure about the night I delivered a pizza to a haunted manor full of deadly traps, knife-wielding cultists, and lots of gore. This all actually happened to me. How it all ended will shock you the most!

name: Coraland: The Worst Rescuer
summary: Coraland is a puzzle adventure game where we follow Joris, a good for nothing rescuer on her first adventure to save Pon-Pon island from imminent danger. The controls are simple and the puzzles have been designed to be accessible for all ages, without outside knowledge to solve them.

name: A Simple Expurriment
summary: A 2D platformer with puzzles, exploration and genetically modified cats. Help the cat mom search an alien ship for her missing kittens by doing typical, not-so-typical and definitely atypical cat things: run walls up and down, turn to liquid and rearrange parts of the ship like pieces of a puzzle.

name: Chimera Custom XG
summary: Dive deep into mysterious alien facilities, hidden structures, and ancient sites all over the planet. Overcome technologically advanced defenses, deadly forces, and cunning traps. Be wary of what you uncover, as the most dangerous thing you may find is the truth!

name: Survivter
summary: Survivter is a roguelike first-person shooter where you no longer have to press a button to make your weapon fire, it shoots itself as long as there are enemies in the room. The gameplay consists of dodging enemies and upgrade character.

name: TD Royale
summary: TD Royale is a real-time multiplayer tower defense where you summon enemies for your opponents. Balance economy and offense without letting your own defenses fail in order to outwit your enemy and be the last summoner standing!

name: Riversiders
summary: Raft down the river, camp in the wild, and make friends!

name: Vegangsters
summary: A 2D roguelike that brings deckbuilding games to the next level! Set in a world full of crime, you will take control of a potato inspector that uses cards to arrest criminal vegetables.

name: Pneumata VR
summary: VR version of Pneumata!
storyline: The tenants are going missing, the screams are getting louder, and the building itself keeps changing. There's a serial killer loose in the city of Milton. Investigate the mysterious rumors surrounding Clover Hill Apartments and discover the terrible secrets that lay beneath the surface.

name: A.I.L.A
summary: A.I.L.A. is a first-person horror game set in a near-future filled with immersive technology. Play as the sole game tester for a revolutionary new fictional AI. Survive intense horror experiences that prey on your deepest fears as the lines between virtual and reality begin to blur…

name: Nova Roma
summary: The glory of Rome is at your fingertips in this city-building game where you must appease the gods, enact laws, and develop complex supply chains to meet the needs of your citizens.

name: Surviving Deponia
summary: Explore, craft, build and fight your way through the harsh landscape of Deponia. Meet allies and make enemies while surviving the perils of the junk planet. It might be garbage - but it’s your garbage!
storyline:
7 years after we said “Goodbye, Deponia!” the once lovely little trash planet has turned into a Mad Max-ian nightmare: Elysium, the floating high society citadel, has crashed onto Deponia’s surface and brought with it not just a never-before-seen water shortage, but new structures and a new order as well.
Master Deponia’s harsh landscape, meet new as well as old friends and start carving out your path from heaps of junk!

name: Steel Seed
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Steel Seed is a single player stealth-action adventure game set in a dark sci-fi world. In her epic journey inside a hostile underground facility run by AIs, Zoe is alone with Koby, a flying drone, as her only companion.
developers: Storm in a Teacup, ESDigital Games
storyline: Steel Seed is a stealth action-adventure game set in a dark, sci-fi world where humanity hangs on the brink of extinction. Join protagonist Zoe and her flying drone companion KOBY, as they investigate the depths of a hostile underground facility in search of answers and the key to the survival of mankind.

name: Tall Trails
summary: Tall Trails is a chill exploration game. You play as Alp, an indestructible little golem on a quest to find his purpose. With your trusty Rocket Boot strapped to your back, you'll summit towering peaks, scale mysterious megastructures, and meet strange little guys!

name: Angeline Era
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary:
Bump the World! A fast-paced, nonlinear, 3D Bumpslash Action-Adventure with intense boss fights! Venture into an ancient land of Angels and Fae, as you slash and shoot through a lush world filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations. By the creators of Anodyne 2 and Sephonie.

Bump into enemies to automatically attack--no attack button needed! This fast-paced and athletic combat experience is easy to pick up, but difficult to master. Intense boss fights will test your skills!

Explore the nonlinear overworld however you’d like. Challenging, ancient ruins sit near quiet forests, each filled with outrageous hazards, charming creatures, and unholy abominations.

Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!
storyline: Hunt down the beings who plague the esoteric land of Era. Within an intertwined history of Angels, Humans, and Fae, seek the truth of Angeline Era!

name: Baby Steps
summary: Play as Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Hike the serene mountains by placing each footstep yourself, in original physics-based gameplay from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. Take in the sights, fall in love with the local fauna, and try to find meaning in a wasted life.
developers: Devolver Digital, Bennett Foddy, Gabe Cuzzillo, Maxi Boch

name: Bye Sweet Carole
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Bye Sweet Carole is a horrific thriller game inspired by the greatest animation movies and created by Chris Darril. (Remothered series) Be ready to jump into the world of Corolla and meet the rabbits that has infested it.
developers: Meangrip Studios, Maximum Entertainment, Little Sewing Machine

name: Light Odyssey
summary: You will journey to reclaim the light of a fallen world, and in the ruins of an ancient civilization you will confront the Colossus. Their power might be overwhelming but trust the fading light guide and restore you during this Light Odyssey.
storyline: Light Odyssey is a Souls-like boss rush action game. The Colossus, ancient entities forgotten by time, will mercilessly attack you. You must analyze their unique attacks and exploit their weaknesses in order to survive and bring light back to the world.

name: Dunk Dunk
platforms: Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun. Familiar platforming controls plus unique stretchy arm controls make for nail-bitingly tough matches. Dress up your dunker and get ready to dunk across the universe!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Parcel Simulator
summary: Inspect and dissect parcels and packages in this parcel inspection simulator! Examine labels for mistakes, contents for contraband and hone your parcel reviewing skills. Build, upgrade and expand your warehouse to take your parcel inspections to the next level!

name: SWAT Commander: Prologue
summary:
The FREE PROLOGUE version of our tactical squad shooter. In SWAT Commander you take charge of an elite special forces unit. Issue orders to your SWAT team, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your mission successfully.

SWAT Commander: Prologue is the FREE prologue version of the upcoming team tactical shooter and does not reflect the final version of the game.

name: April '86
summary: April ‘86 - is a mystical first-person thriller which has our protagonist journeying to the abandoned city of Pripyat, to confront the secrets of the past.

name: Haruka: Beyond the Stars
summary: Haruka: Beyond the Stars is a juvenile sci-fi RPG about the intergalactic adventures of the protagonist, Yuuki, and a mysterious girl named Miiya. Set out on a spaceship and explore unique planets. Enjoy a thrilling adventure in the latest 3D anime art style.
storyline:
Humankind faces its twilight in the far future.

Having explored every corner of the universe, people have stopped progressing—their lifestyle now dependent on Energy Capsules, a legacy of their past.
​
Yuuki is a boy living in Spica Village, a base for receiving Energy Capsules from the lunar ruins.
One night, he meets Miiya, a mysterious girl who crash-landed due to a spaceship malfunction.

Their meeting sparks the beginning of an intergalactic journey in search of Yuuki's father, who left for space to unravel the mystery behind humankind's decline.

name: The Warrior
summary: A short and unique platformer with constantly changing protagonists, stories, and mechanics. Control legendary warriors, giant worms, greedy kings and lazy demons, each with their own purpose.

name: Spaceman Memories
summary: Spaceman Memories is a retro JRPG that takes place in a distant future but draws inspiration from ancient Japanese folktales. A story full of wonder and nostalgia as you take on the role of Ichiro 94, an astronaut who wakes up from hypersleep to go on a journey to find the remnants of his past.
storyline:
Set in a futuristic Japan overrun by spirits, Spaceman Memories is a true ode to classic JRPGs of the past. The game's world coupled with its heartwarming narrative, offer players a chance to relive the good old days of 2D gaming. As the spaceman Ichiro 94, whose capsule mysteriously landed back home after a space mission, players embark on a poignant journey of self-discovery, encountering strange creatures, and battling formidable foes, all while uncovering the secrets of his forgotten past and ancient Japanese mysticism. With each step, players must also solve puzzles and use Ichiro's abilities to fight, all of which are vital in the quest to uncover the truth about his past.

Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted retro Japanese game, brought to life in a vibrant 3D world brimming with emotion and nostalgia. This heartwarming adventure, seamlessly blends open-world exploration with puzzles and turn based battles offering a truly unforgettable experience!

name: The RPG
summary: An RPG-lite adventure with intentionally twisted traditional role-playing games aspects, where your choices do matter.

name: Marathon
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: A PvP-focused extraction shooter set on the mysterious planet of Tau Ceti IV, Marathon will see players inhabit the bodies of Runners, cybernetic mercenaries who have been designed to survive the planet’s harsh environments, exploring the lost colony that once inhabited Tau Ceti’s surface. Players will engage solo or in crews of three, searching for mysterious alien artifacts, as well as for valuable loot and new weapons and gear that they can add to their collection.
storyline: A massive ghost ship hangs in low orbit over a lost colony. The 30,000 souls who called this world home have disappeared without a trace. Strange signals hint at rumors of mysterious artifacts, long-dormant AI, and troves of untold riches. You are a cybernetic mercenary – a Runner – and your destination is Tau Ceti IV. You are one of many, working solo or with a crew, venturing into the unknown and facing the unimaginable in a fight for survival, for riches, for fame... and for infamy. Who among you will write their names across the stars?

name: Sword of the Sea
summary: Surf across the surreal undulating landscapes of the Necropolis on a quest to unveil a lost ocean teeming with life in Sword of the Sea.
storyline:
In a world where the terrain flows in waves, ride the Hoversword to speed over shifting seas of sand. It controls like a snowboard, skateboard, and hoverboard all in one. Build momentum to achieve great speeds and catch big air as you explore skatepark-like ruins, lost in the tides of the Necropolis of the Gods. The Hoversword embodies the feel of snowboarding and skating games, but in an entirely new context of adventure.

You are the Wraith – resurrected in a desolate world and tasked with restoring life to it as you explore submerged ruins and the vibrant, varied cultures within. Surf through sinking tombs, mysterious shipwrecks, and petrified battlefields - and bring giant shoals of fish and creatures back in the process. But beware- this land is also home to massive leviathans that will stand in your way.

name: Dunk City Dynasty
summary: It's the hottest basketball game out, with gameplay deeper than you'd think!

name: Lost Colony
summary: "Lost Colony" is a Twin-Stick Shooter Action-Roguelike set on an abandoned space colony. Guided by your drone companion, you must explore the planet and defend yourself from the swarms of aliens and the corrupted colony security system. Will you uncover the secrets of the Lost Colony?

name: Dream Channel Zero
summary: Dive into a glitched-out game world! Explore synthwave skylines, fight freaky phantoms, and meet a whole host of quirky characters in this hysterically surreal adventure!
storyline: Dream Channel Zero tells the tale of a boy named Akira, who one day gets suddenly and inexplicably sucked into the world of a mysterious video game. There, he meets Rumiko—a seemingly normal girl in a teal blue hoodie—and the two team up to conquer whatever perils this strange virtual world might throw at them, and hopefully find a way out. Thus begins an all-new and truly original adventure full of laughter, tears, and fears from Fuming (creator of the indie cult classic Zelle) and award-winning developer Odencat.

name: LoveSoTea
summary: Tea-making simulator meets adventure game meets visual novel in the modern tale that is LoveSoTea. Once you complete it, you'll know how to brew the most delicious tea... maybe. No promises.
storyline:
Meet Yoru, who has been told he only has a few months left to live, and Chihiro, a high school student who keeps insisting on treating him to some delicious tea, for reasons unknown.
The two slowly pass his remaining time together, not at a café but at home, sharing some peace and quiet - and a few laughs - at a tea time just for two.

name: Pegdrop Hearts
summary: A relaxing Peggle-like game with a cozy and emotional theme that will warm your heart, while you learn about love and self-respect. It's a relaxing Pachinko game for you to chill.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos: Deluxe Edition
platforms: PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Includes R-Type Tactics I・II Cosmos: Standard Edition, Digital Soundtrack and a Poster

name: Enlightened
summary: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.
storyline:
You find yourself in the basement if the hotel, not knowing how you get there. The place seems empty, but only at the first glance...
Will you be able to overcome all obstacles on your way and solve the mystery of the hotel?

name: Mouse: P.I. For Hire
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch 2, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Join private detective John Mouston in MOUSE, a gritty, jazz-fueled shooter. With guns blazing and a retro rubber hose animation style, battle your way through a corrupt city full of crooks and danger. Inspired by classic FPS and noir films, MOUSE is the explosive shooter you've been waiting for.

name: Timeless Rain
summary: Explore this foreign world and use manipulate time to defeat any creature who dares to stand between you and your goal! Meet the inhabitants of this strange realm as they push you towards finding the Timeless Rain...

name: The Precinct
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Averno City, 1983. Gangs rule the streets and your father lies restless in his grave. Clean up the city, uncover the truth, and embark on thrilling vehicle chases through destructible environments in this neon-noir action sandbox police game.

name: VISK
summary: Face your fears in VISK, an open-world online co-op horror game for 1-2 players. Escape from a strange village, uncover the dark secrets of this place and solve puzzles to discover new areas. But beware, deadly creatures are after you and your friend!

name: Cassette Boy
summary: All you see is all there is - Cassette Boy: an RPG where what exists depends on you.

name: Evercore Heroes: Ascension
summary:
Evercore Heroes: Ascension is a 3-Player Team Action Roguelite where you play as one of the Luum sentinels, tasked with restoring the natural balance of magic to the world. Pick your favorite hero, customize your loadout, and go out on missions with your friends across the different regions of Lumerea.

You are the only ones who can stop the Fate's Blade army and rebuild the magical treasure known as the Evercore. Of course, you won’t be expected to overcome all of the challenges on your first attempt! With each run you can unlock new ways to play, come up with new strategies & builds, regroup, and try again to win the day as a team!
storyline:
Welcome to Lumerea, a world with a deep connection to magic. Lumerea is home to people of all shapes and sizes, who lived together in relative peace until The Shattering. Now the natural flow of magic has been disrupted, and chaos spreads across the lands.

You and many others like you have chosen to rise up and fight back the tide of monsters and stand agaisnt chaos. Some come for noble ideals, some come for fame whilst others harbour motivations based in self interest. However you came to the battlefield one goal remains above all, to prove you and your allies are the world's greatest team of super Heroes.

name: Elder's Grace: Rise of the Mobley
summary:
Join this epic battle to take back a magical homeland. Help Mobley heroes explore, build, raid and defend in an effort to regain & hold what's rightfully theirs.

Build and protect customized strongholds while creating specialized teams to explore and plunder others.

name: Talents
summary: Write your way to success with your talented yet rowdy co-founders in this game development-themed romance visual novel! Do you have what it takes?
storyline:
"Ready to take on the game development world?"

Play as an aspiring game writer and designer who dives into a business partnership with a rowdy crew of talented co-founders, aiming to conquer the game development industry through their shared stories, love, and relentless determination. Will you write your way to the top?

name: Soulbound
summary: A Retro-modern roguelie adventure for 1-2 players. Enjoy responsive and skillful combat. Upgrade, unlock and progress. Fight curious enemies and meet charming friends. Embark on a strange adventure!

name: Bogdan's Cross
summary: Embark on a journey of redemption as Bogdan, a fallen Templar seeking to make amends for his past sins. Explore a stunning world filled with ancient mysteries, uncover hidden secrets, and battle fierce enemies in this immersive action-adventure game.

name: Out of Action
summary: Action heavy, multiplayer + singleplayer FPS set in a brutal cyberpunk universe.

name: Corr
summary: Corr is a difficult Souls-lite Boss Rush Action RPG where you Run-n-Gun & Hack-n-Slash your way through challenging boss encounters. To endure the strange, dark and whacky world of Corr, level up and customize your warrior build with berserk powers, tonics, talismans and more.
developers: Spelkollektivet, Go Go Galago Games I/S

name: Unhinged 2
summary: You wake up and find yourself in the midst of a psychotic infestation, and gotta find a way out and avoid being chewed up into a red paste...

name: It Consumes
summary: Use demonic sonar to reveal the world around you as you fight your way through Lovecraftian horrors in this roguelike arena FPS. Upgrade your abilities, discover hidden secrets, and climb the leaderboards as you plunge deeper and deeper into a world of total darkness.

name: Threat Actor
summary: Threat Actor is a story rich, cybercrime-themed game, where you, an infamous hacker and paranoid owner of an underground marketplace, are ready to do whatever it takes to secure the legacy of your business as one of the most luxurious trading sites on the Dark Web.

name: A Call From Under the House
summary: A Lovecraftian detective game using point-and-click style gameplay where the player must investigate a house suspected of cultish activity.

name: Arisen Force: Vonimir
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: "Arisen Force: Vonimir" is an A-RPG game featuring exquisite high-definition pixels, it combines the engaging RPG adventure storyline with the 2.5D combat experience.We create a magnificent Middle-Earth world, for players exploration and adventure, recruit teammates, collect and develop business, challenge enemies, reveal the secrets of the world, guide the future, forge your own legends .

name: VICCP 2 Core
summary: The Very Important Central Control Panel is back. Keeping the mysterious atmosphere and with even more mysteries. Control the omnipotence remote, experiment, and find many endings. Brainstorming in retro sci-fi style / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click.

name: The Void Calls
summary: The Void Calls, and you will answer. Explore the mysteries and secrets of Reprieve, a town stitched together from the dark past of its bizarre inhabitants in this horror-filled point-and-click adventure.

name: Dev_Hell
summary: Welcome to Dev_Hell, the dark comedy game about the unrealistic expectations and chaos of the tech industry. Use coding skills to complete poorly-defined features, manage relationships with coworkers, and survive long enough to ship a product that may or may not crash on launch...

name: Unyielder
summary: Unyielder is an intense Boss-Rush Movement-Shooter with a flexible and exploitable Roguelite-Looter sandbox. Carve your way through the war-torn lands of Antarctica, Hunt down war machines and Assemble your arsenal of destruction.

name: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
summary: Kitchen Sync: Aloha! is a cheerful single player kitchen sim with a Tactical RPG twist. Cook delicious Hawaiian food by leading your team of chefs. Explore the Island, discover kitchens, meet cooks, collect recipes, and achieve your dream of becoming the best restaurant!

name: One Card One Shot: Mafia
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Enter the world of the mafia, with an agile and dynamic Card Game that will challenge you in your free moments or addict you for hours! Choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion?

name: Dr. Emmerson's Nocturnes
summary: Dive into the worlds of the best classic weird fiction and cosmic horror writers. Try out our original approach to bringing literature into the interactive medium. Relax and let Dr. Emmerson guide you through all colors of dread.

name: Nivoz Running Canned
summary: Missile attacks that automatically pursue enemies, switching control to a companion who will not be knocked down, etc. This is a third-person action game in which the player fights using slightly peculiar abilities.

name: Detective Butler and the King of Hearts
summary: The members of a university Detection Club find themselves entangled in a series of murders. Follow Detective Butler through the eyes of his sidekick Gilligan as the two set out to find the culprit. Can they unravel the truth before the serial killer claims another victim?

name: Respark
summary: A roguelite-platformer in which squirrels shoot fireworks in a cute world! Choose from about 30 different fireworks to face a mysterious course that changes with each challenge. You can even design and use your own original fireworks.

name: Not Only Nine
summary: A narrative turn-based RPG where the only fights are the bosses. Play as a cat and journey through the afterlife to save your human. Meet loveable characters and explore what it means to exist.
storyline:
You are the soul of a cat, journeying to the center of the afterlife in order to save your human. However, the Reapers will try to stop you. An ancient overpowered being helps you on your quest as you discover the nature of the Universe.

Not Only Nine is about life, death, and heartfelt characters. It's a narrative-rich game with deep character interactions. While you explore the afterlife, characters will respond to actions you've taken and offer you new quests. For some reason, the afterlife feels like a high-fantasy adventure!

The main story was originally inspired while playing Undertale: “What if Flowey aided you the entire game?”

name: Henry Halfhead
summary: Meet Henry, merely half a head, but with the peculiar ability to possess and control any object within their reach. Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to progress through Henry’s not-so-ordinary everyday life.
storyline: Confronted with rules and obligations, Henry loses their playfulness and curiosity for the world while growing up. Overworked and unhappy with their life, Henry decides that it’s time for change. Help Henry to rediscover their playfulness: Experiment, explore and make everyday life fun again!

name: Poke All Toads
summary: A puzzle game starring mischievous fairies. Solve levels by working as a team, operating dangerous machinery and manipulating local wildlife.

name: Lamia's Bambina
summary: Lamia's Bambina is a unique game centered around the trials of the Lamia tribe. Reclaim stolen territory from the rival Harpy tribe by training, forming formidable parties, and facing off in battle. The fate of the Lamias lies with you. Unite, Lamia's Bambina!

name: Changer Seven
summary: Fast-Paced Lane-Based Action Brawler. The legendary Changers 7 heroes must fight a new threat that changes the citizens of Sunny Point into terrifying beings! But as they investigate and defeat "villain of the week" like enemies, they suspect that someone from their own group may be behind it all.

name: The Doorway Effect
summary: The Doorway Effect is a 1-4-player co-op psychological horror roguelike. Explore the inner world of a dying man's mind, racing through door after door in a labyrinth of nightmares. Encounter traumas incarnate, and discover the secrets locked within. If you can survive long enough...

name: Neon Death Drop
summary: A fabulous, fast-paced top-down action game Control and manipulate your environment; Slay rogue robots with stylish go-go dance moves; Sling enemies around with dazzling kinetic force!

name: The Lacerator
summary: A mix of classic survival horror and trash movies, play as an 80's porn actor and beware of every corner because you can get Lacerator and lose a limb in real time... But you can still adapt and survive.
storyline:
It was just another sexy job for Max, a very famous pornstar, but everything went wrong.
The movie crew was captured by THE LACERATOR!!!

Now it's up to you to survive and escape from the hideout of this worthless psycho!

name: Oxide Room 208
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: After Matt’s tragic disappearance in room 104 of the Night Soul Motel, his business partner Josh is still trapped there at the mercy of a ruthless and cruel scientist. The lives of Kat, Josh and Matt crossed paths in science —a macabre science orchestrated by Doc’s deadly hands.

name: Blacksmith Master
summary: Manage your own medieval smithy in Blacksmith Master and supervise the entire process from mining ores and gems to designing and selling finished products. Forge everything from weapons and armor to tools and cooking utensils to fund your craft and become the Blacksmith Master.
storyline: Tucked away through the winding alleys of a small medieval town lies your workshop – at first just a humble place for a humble blacksmith, but with potential for greatness. Here, you control the entire production chain - from mining the ores to smelting them into ingots, then crafting weapons, armor, tools, and jewelry to put on display and sell to customers for a profit. You will design your shop to make the best use of space, ensuring there’s enough room for the production and sale of goods alike, while adding personal touches to liven up an otherwise dreary space. As your reputation grows, so too will your operation, and it won’t be long before you become a master of your craft.

name: Discounty
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Discounty is a supermarket management life simulation game. Keep shelves stocked, serve customers, and source local wares in the once-thriving town of Blomkest to revitalize your shop and the community. But be careful. The proud Blomkestians are not looking to be saved by some shopkeeper.

name: Bloody Horror Plant
summary: Bloody Horror Plant – probably the bloodiest casual point and click adventure game ever! Help Horror Plant solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, kill evil dwarfs, save the forest and its creatures!

name: Embervale.TV
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), Android, iOS, Web browser
summary:
Welcome to Embervale.TV, the ultimate fantasy role play game that you can play fully as an extension on Twitch! Join the adventure and immerse yourself in a world of magic and wonder where you can become the strongest player, team up with other players, and create the most powerful guild.

Embark on thrilling adventures alongside your favorite streamers and experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Beyond These Stars
summary: Journey on the back of the space whale Kewa, building a city for your people as you travel across the galaxy seeking purpose and answers, and developing deep relationships with the universe around you.
storyline: Recovering from uncertain times, the Peeps find themselves on the back of Kewa - a lonely Space Whale journeying across the universe. Building a city on the back of a sentient creature comes with its own set of challenges, but as you build your relationship and travel across the galaxy, you'll come across great opportunities for exploration and stable expansion. Meet other species, pursue the needs and wants of your Peeps, and seek the truth about their ancestors, and the Space Whales alike.

name: Ebola Village
summary: Ebola Village - this is a classic survival horror game from the 90s with a focus on atmosphere and player immersion. Solve puzzles, follow the story carefully and use various weapons in a brutal fight for survival. Danger lurks at every turn.

name: EbiTapes
summary: Go on an adventure to meet fun new friends, help them out, and create delicious beats along the way! Record the sounds of the world and make your own cool music.

name: HexLands
summary: HexLands is a turn-based, roguelike city builder, set on peaceful, procedural medieval islands. Settle as many islands as possible, as they are getting less and less habitable! Manage your resources, complete quests, use special tools and synergize perks! How far will your empire reach?

name: Bagdex
summary: The journey begins! Collect over 160 creatures inspired by Brazilian culture, manage and customize your base, conquer challenging battles, and unravel the mystery behind this fantastic world!
developers: Castro Brothers, Caramelo Games, Dumativa Game Studio, Nuuvem

name: Among the Stars
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Separated by an illegal fire, two indigenous sisters try to reunite with the help of an ancient nature entity.

name: Project Box
summary: 2D horizontal scroll adventure game, interweaving unique art style, horror, suspense and fantasy. A horror secret is hidden in the apartment where lost children are going to be engulfed by nightmares.

name: Exilium
summary: Exilium is an atmospheric point & click project. As an exorcist, you will face demons and occult rituals. Cast out evil spirits with your skills and improvised means. Uncover dark secrets and restore balance before it's too late...

name: StarVaders
summary: Defend the Earth from an alien invasion in the ULTIMATE fusion of deckbuilding and grid-based tactics. Pilot a mech, discover game-breaking combos, and protect the future of humanity in this endlessly replayable roguelike.

name: Omen Exitio: Hunger
summary: Forces beyond human comprehension draw a macabre veil over the icy NY of 1927. A child has disappeared and you, a reporter with an unhappy past as an artist, become entangled in the drama. In this story, inspired by true events, you will investigate between reality, dreams and Lovecraftian horrors.

name: Stand-Alone
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Stand-Alone is a 2D roguelite action platformer game. A world inhabited by athro, a robot that lost everything along with its memories due to an explosion at the center, is the only one left and wants to carry on its beliefs.

name: Professor Layton and the New World of Steam
summary:
Professor Layton and the New World of Steam depicts the world one year after the events of "Professor Layton and the Unwound Future".

Due to a mysterious incident in Steam Bison, a new adventure for Layton and Luke begins!

name: Twistales
summary: On the day of what she believed to be her ‘Happy ending’, Cinderella witnesses the collapse of her universe and the murder of her beloved. With the help of a magic grimoire, in search of the truth, she walks into various fairy tales, through worlds that are now disturbing and enigmatic. Fighting enemies corrupted by a strange curse, the princess becomes a mighty warrior, determined to resolve this chaos.

name: Gilded Destiny
summary: Gilded Destiny is a grand strategy game depicting the transformative era of the Industrial Revolution. You will take the helm of the country of your choice and transform it from a backward agrarian society to an industrial powerhouse.

name: Little Eternal Chronicle
summary: Manipulate time! Let's do mischief! Helpless 10 year olds are given only one weapon: a clock. This world will soon be destroyed...

name: KaiJu Girls
summary: Kaiju Girls is a Visual Novel full of Monster Girls. The protagonist lost his memory in an accident and became a KaijuTamer, with the Kaiju girls in the Kaiju world full of danger adventure! In the wonderful and exciting adventure journey in the protagonist will slowly recall his memories.

name: Whisper Mountain Outbreak
summary: An isometric co-op PvE multiplayer survival horror game. It's 1998, and an ancient curse has been unleashed, trapping everyone on Mt. Bisik. When a mysterious fog appeared, people started hearing whispers and seeing monsters. Fight, explore, solve puzzles, and figure out a way to escape... together!
storyline:
It’s 1998; a mining operation on Mt. Bisik inadvertently unleashed an ancient horror when they disturbed a ruin buried deep inside the mountain.

People started hearing whispers and seeing monsters when a mysterious fog suddenly appeared and covered the area surrounding the mountain. Now, you and your friends are trapped in the cursed Mt. Bisik.

name: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends
summary: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends is a story-rich RPG. The story is set in an East Asia inspired fantasy world. Fight off the Demon Tomang and its minion and discover the truth behind the Cycle of Hatred and put an end to it in this classic pixel RPG.
storyline:
For centuries An immortal demon named Tomang terrorize on the United Golden Dragon Empire. due to his immortality, each time he was slain he came back stronger leading to a cycle of terror and despair for the people

However, on one of the cycle while they were preparing for him, Tomang doesn’t appear. Believing the demon is gone, the people of the Empire celebrated their triumph and began to enjoy their peaceful life once more. However, the disappearance of Tomang resulted in the weakening of the Empire, with no common enemy to fight corruption and infighting run rampant in the empire. Little did they know a rising threat from the shadows, preparing the destruction of the empire.

Follow Zemi, a stiff man of ideal, B.W. a reckless carefree warrior and Aiq a vengeful demon hunter on their quest to save the empire and uncover the secret behind The Cycle of Hatred. Will they succeed or is it too late to save the empire and its people?

name: Big Boss: A Villain Simulator
summary: An asymmetrical roguelite experience where the player is the boss, fighting heroes for rank in EVILLC to become the final boss. Equip spells, lay traps, and take command of minions to ensure your rise to the top!

name: Imperial Ambitions
summary: Discover and colonize the world, Allocate your labor force, Monopolize markets, Fight tactical battles, Survive the age of imperialism as the world turns into a war zone.

name: Gurei
summary: An action platformer where you face challenging enemies inspired by Japanese mythology and acquire their powers. Choose your fights in any order, knowing that each opponent gets stronger as the game progresses!

name: Unwound
summary: Lose yourself in a surreal candyland adventure about transformation and escapism. Descend into a land of weirdos and forgotten memories as you assemble a new you from whatever you find.
storyline: You are an investigator sent to find the cause of a series of natural disasters affecting the sweet mines of Candy Island. When a storm destroys your ship and strands you on the island, you must use found objects to build yourself up from a sentient ball of yarn, with new body parts changing how you navigate this strange and mysterious place. Get involved in politics, join cults, uncover lost memories, make friends and break hearts — but figure out what's causing Candy Island's troubles before the whole place breaks apart.

name: Timeless Heart VR
summary: Timeless heart VR is an action VR roguelike game, As the second work of Timeless Stories series, this work further simplifies and enriches the unique sword skill system of the series. Advancing in the unknown labyrinth with Lycanea, and break through this blockade from fate!

name: The Starbites: Taste of Desert
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: The story of a girl's growth and adventure on a vast desert planet, "Bitter."

name: BrokenLore: Unfollow
summary: BrokenLore: Unfollow is a surreal horror game where you play as a victim of bullying, fighting terrifying monsters as you uncover a dark mystery in a thrilling journey of terror. It pushes you to the edge of your seat as you explore the dark impact of social media on mental health.
storyline:
Anne wakes up to a silent, empty house with memories of how she got there… And she’s not alone. A horror game focusing on the dark side of social media. Featuring social media influencers Akidearest, Knite, Kin Ryan, and Elisa True Crime.

To escape, Anne is forced to explore the rooms in the house and come to terms with the most painful choices of her past. However, she’s not alone. A horrible creature wanders around and follows her every step... Will Anne be able to get out?

name: Echoes of the Living
summary: Echoes of the Living is a dark Classic Survival Horror inspired by the greatest hits from the 90's focused on reimagining visual horror, your goal is to make it alive while uncovering the truth about the incident.
storyline:
In 1996, on a quiet small town located in Europe, a mysterious fog suddenly rises upon the town in a clear night, their inhabitants have no clue of the horrors and chaos that were about to unleash.

Not longer after, the locals get sick and panic runs all over the place, nobody knows how or why the dead walks on the streets, a few hours later all left in the town are the echoes of the living…

name: Opus: Prism Peak
summary: Opus: Prism Peak is a narrative adventure where your choices lead to divergent endings. Play as a photographer lost in an ethereal realm, and unveil its mysteries with your camera to find a way home.

name: Full Fathom
summary: Full Fathom is an oceanic survival horror game. Pilot a deteriorating submarine as it drifts through grim waters, keeping it maintained as it is your only lifeline in the hostile, merciless ocean.
themes: Action, Horror, Thriller, Survival, Open world
storyline: Set adrift in a vast and uncaring ocean, you find a decrepit submarine, seemingly abandoned and in disrepair. Determined to make your way back to civilization, you must maintain the submarine and keep yourself alive.

name: Trailer Park Life
summary: Build and manage your own trailer park to either become a peaceful haven or a pit of unruly partiers. Expand on services and amenities to keep tenants happy. Manage staff to keep your park safe and clean or let chaos run amuck and risk it all for higher gains.
storyline:
Trailer Park Life is a city-building, simulation and management game about building and growing a trailer park with a thriving community.

Your trailer park will be a place for people to come and camp, come to party and come to live. With camping areas with tents, RV trailers on lots to double-wide retirement villas you will have all types of people staying at your trailer park. Your park needs resources like power and water, businesses to keep your citizens entertained and have places to eat and staff to keep it all up and running. Your citizens and your park will challenge you with wants and needs, not to mention a variety of natural disasters including tornados, fires and more!

The success of your trailer park will depend on your attention to your citizens and management of the employees and park resources.

Layout your park as a quiet place to relax or turn it into a freakish party zone, not intended for early risers. Trailer Park Life is all about choices. With many buildings to plop down that cater to services, food & dining and entertainment. Building locations really matter. Be sure they are close enough to access yet not so close to annoy the neighbors.

Park services will be needed in keeping the park up and running. Each of the services require people to run them and funds to pay them so your management will be vital to the success of your park.

You will need staff to help you keep things in order. Life will be easier by hiring and upgrading your cleaning staff, maintenance staff, security guards and more. All these employees don't come free, so you will need manage the park expenses and income so you can turn a profit.

name: Devil's Liminal
summary: A demon's imprint, a final summer. A horror and queer romance visual novel.
storyline: After graduating from private school, Margo returns to her hometown in Arizona to work before starting college. As she settles into her summer internship working at the social services department of a veterans home, supernatural events start to happen around her. A series of strange dreams lead her to an occult puzzle involving her own soul.

name: Warside
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Warside is a new game that cuts to the core of what made classic turn-based tactics games so great. A great story mode campaign, unique Commanders with totally different playstyles, awesome Battle Powers, and a wide variety of terrain and units.

Choose your Commander, assemble your forces, and battle your way to victory.

Warside is a love letter to the turn-based tactics games of the last three decades.

We grew up playing the games that spawned the genre. Games like Nectaris and the Advance Wars series. We have continued to enjoy modern iterations such as Battalion, Into The Breach, Wargroove, and UniWar. Yet we yearn for more. We feel something is missing... something we think we can bring back.

If a modern version was released today, what would that look like? How would it play? How do we update the formula whilst retaining the charm of the classics?

We combine the game mechanics you already love with awesome new features to push the genre foward. We keep a retro pixel art feel but with higher-fidelity and higher-resolution graphics than any of the genre's predecessors.

Warside is the game we have waited for. The game that no one else made.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days
summary: Texas, 1980. Walton City has fallen to a zombie outbreak. Lead a band of desperate survivors from refuge to refuge by scavenging, crafting, and fighting in a relentless struggle for survival. Plan wisely, stick together, and — above all — keep moving if you want to make it out alive.

name: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
summary: Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam — with companions by his side — sets out on a new journey to save humanity from extinction. Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected?

name: Judas
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: A disintegrating starship. A desperate escape plan. You are the mysterious and troubled Judas. Your only hope for survival is to make or break alliances with your worst enemies. Will you work together to fix what you broke – or will you leave it to burn?

name: King's Blade
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Take on the role of a warrior of an elite royal squad and defeat the bloodthirsty Barganian Empire in King's Blade - classic beat 'em up game set in a heroic fantasy setting.

name: Winds of Arcana: Ruination
summary: Winds of Arcana: Ruination is a 2.5D Metroidvania featuring a customizable combat system set in the treacherous and magical world of Lirna. Experience a powerful, lore-rich story as you discover ancient magic, upgrade your abilities, and battle dangerous foes that stand in your way.
storyline:
Millenia ago, the world of Lirna faced the devastating wrath of Ashkaton, a cataclysmic phenomenon that nearly tore the world asunder. Stopped by heroes who ascended to godhood, Ashkaton was eventually confined to the pages of history.

With blade and magic, embark on the dark odyssey of Aryn, a lone mercenary seeking answers in a world broken by an ancient wrath.

name: V's Rage
summary: V’s Rage is an hand drawn action-adventure game that pays homage to classic action arcade games from the ‘80es-’90es.
storyline:
“Rise from your bed…”
These are the words that V, an overworked wife and mother who hates videogames, hears in her sleep right before waking up in her worst nightmare: she has been cursed and trapped in a videogame by a mysterious entity. Now she must beat any foe unlucky enough to cross her path, and free herself from a crazy low-poly world inhabited by odd creatures. She got a pan, she got rage, and she will beat them all.

name: In Stone
summary: In the late 19th century, a sculpture is confined in a monastery asylum. It's in your hands to follow the blue vision to explore the monastery's deeper secrets, or to escape the stone prison by gathering clues inside the hospital.

name: GladiEaters
summary: A hybrid between Turn-Based Tactics and Cooking Mini-Games where food you cook turns into powerful Gladieaters for you to command. Cook your team from Eggs, Pastries and Vegetables - balancing the Taste of the team between Sweet, Salty and Umami - to unlock powerful taste twists.

name: Twin Jet Racer
summary: Two jets. Two triggers. That’s all you need to swerve, drift, corkscrew, loop or even fly to reach the next checkpoint and top the leaderboard. Master the controls and the physics to progress to the next class of racer and unlock greater challenges. Compete against friends or against the clock.

name: Bride Corruption
summary: Do you need a wedding planner, by any chase? "Weddings & Co." will organise your wedding, take care of everything you need, and as a bonus - corrupt the bride!
storyline:
Long time ago, during the high school, our hero and his best friend Josh both got a crush on a beautiful girl named Mary. She was the perfect girl for both of them: long blond hair, stunning body and amazing character. However, they were best friends since childhood and a girl couldn't break their friendship, so they decided to never hook up with her.

Time passed, and after school their paths diverged - they entered different universities in different cities. And although they promised to keep in touch with each other - Josh soon started to ignore our hero and they friendship ended.

Years later, our hero bumps into Josh in a grocery store. After a small talk, Josh invites him to his house and introduces him to his future wife, sho turns out to be Mary. And as it turned out: Josh and Mary started dating secretly during the high school.

And now, after discovering this huge lie, our hero decides to take revenge and offers Josh to organise their future wedding. Our hero will slowly make Emily fall in love with him and ruin the wedding...

name: Super Cucumber
summary: Super Cucumber is a 16-bit inspired action-adventure game filled with tight platforming, unlockable abilities and plenty of secrets to discover. Traverse more than six towers and overcome dozens of levels, fight your way past devious bosses and become the greatest Aardvark Superhero in the world!

name: Lost and Found Co.
summary: Lost & Found Co. is a hidden object adventure in a cozy and immersive world. Join a cast of quirky characters on their epic journey across countless magical locations. Find lost items, solve puzzles, and help a tiny dragon regain her power!

name: Hyper Drill
summary: Hyper Drill is a speedrunning runner game, where you fly at supersonic speed and destroy everything in your path. Drill through any obstacle, jump between different galaxies, and uncover the mysteries of the universe.

name: Total World Liberation
summary: Open World Survival Automation Crafting Building Turn-Based game, yup that's a huge mix of genres and it works!

name: Farmistic
summary: Farmistic is a top-down farming simulation game in early developement by an independant developer. Start small, work your fields, buy more land and equipment, and automate!

name: PenguInn
summary: PenguInn is a classic single-player 2D platformer that takes you on a journey through a dream world made in AI-generated art. Collect beautiful art by completing 100 levels before waking up from your dream.

name: Chyss
summary: Chyss is a turnbased, tactical 1vs1 game inspired from chess. You can move, attack, and consume your mana to summon new units, cast spells and use items when it's your turn. Your characters both have a move type and range and an attack type and range. Overcome your opponent's team!
storyline:
The year is 12022.
Number of civilisations evolved from primitive life to being able to travel the universe.
In this universe, a game has evolved to become essential: The Chyss.

The Chyss has its roots in chess, but many have added to the rules in order to create its successor. A timeless, universal, and balanced game, allowing interplanetary competition, where fair play, game intelligence and risk-taking are the traits of legendary players.
Young children want to become great Chyss players, the vast majority of adults play, whether to have fun, relax, explore the possibilities, or to pursue their childhood dreams.

In this universe, a phenomenon affects about a third of the people...
About a third of people become incarnates overnight. Falling asleep as themselves, they wake up controlled by different, higher forces.
These forces do not want their loss, but simply direct their steps, their actions.

You are this higher force which is going to take control of an inhabitant of this universe.
You, and all the other players of this video game...
You will embody an incarnate.

This incarnate is now you.
Your goal will be determined by you. You can become the best Chyss player in the universe, but there are many pitfalls along the way.
There are many extremely strong, clever players in this universe.
The best Chyss player in the universe is anonymous. She is only known as "The Galaxy Queen".
Good luck! And battle with pride.

name: NecroTactics
summary: An auto-battler roguelite with tower defense and horde survival elements. Draft and position your army, develop your graveyard, equip units with powerful items, cast spells, and place turrets to annihilate your opponent's army in seconds!

name: Sincognito
summary: Sincognito, is a 5-15 players SOCIAL DEDUCTION, horror, stealth game in which players, split between two distinct teams - Humans & Sins - must use communication with proximity voice chat, teamwork to complete tasks, skills for combat, betrayal, and ultimately mind games to defeat the opposite team.

name: Adaptory
summary: Adaptory is a 2D base building/survival game where you're looking after a crew of four characters who have crash landed on a procedurally generated planetoid in deep space. In order to survive, you're challenged to build a home and ultimately a community in this complex environment, and along the way learn more about the unique characters in your crew.

name: Astromeda
summary: Astromeda is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria race. The game is inspired by Undertale, H
storyline:
A long time ago, a prophecy was foretold across the Earth. It predicted that a massive asteroid would collide with the planet in the next century. An asteroid so large, that it would obliterate all life on Earth. And so it did.

After the cataclysm, an alien bacteria was released from the remains of the asteroid. It quickly multiplied and spread across the world. The bacteria absorbed the DNA of humans and animals, creating new forms of life. Their intelligence grew, and so did their size and technology. As a result, a new race of thriving bacteria inhabited the Earth, forming a peaceful colony.

Many years later...

The Earth finally became habitable for human life again. Four human survivors, lucky enough to escape the asteroid, could finally return to Earth. Not knowing what was in store for them...

name: Play Rough
summary: Play Rough is a roleplaying game set in the surreal, post-apocalyptic wasteland of what was once California. It's a place where humans live side-by-side with living cartoons, twisted abominations of ink and flesh, and... Clowns...?

name: Nanomon
summary: Nanomon are tiny, virtual pets who hang out in the corner of your screen. Train, explore, discover, and play with your Nanomon so they can evolve into the perfect companion! Only the best, most attentive trainers will help their Nanomon achieve their life goal!

name: RunMan Turbo
summary: The indie legend returns, now in a 2D platformer where you speedrun randomly generated levels. Bounce, slide, jump, and run fast as heck. Easy to play and challenging to master, with an awesome soundtrack and a style that will make you go, "Oh snap!"

name: Relieve
summary: Stories about people who stucked between life and death, in the middle-world called "World of Agony". Help them escape and try to relieve fate of those who left there forever.

name: High School Dirty Secrets
summary: Popular and beautiful Kasuga suddenly wakes up in her highschool and realizes she's been locked up by her mean and jealous classmates. As she advances trying to find a way out, weird things begin to happen.

name: Streets of Rogue 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Streets of Rogue goes open-world! Fight, sneak, hack, drive, build, farm, quest, craft, and just live in this non-linear sandbox with a focus on fun. Unlimited adventures await!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen
themes: Action, Survival, Stealth, Sandbox, Open world

name: Death Relives
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Be prepared for a first-person look on life through the eyes of a teenager, who is trying to escape from mighty Aztec god Xipe Totec. Get ready for a chaotic experience with horror and survival mechanics.

name: Call of the Golden Valley
summary: Become a detective and delve into the depths of desire and motivation to solve the mystery of vanishing hikers in the Australian bush. Follow clues, solve puzzles, dive into conspiracy theories, and find your missing friend. This thrilling story is an immersive escape into a true crime-like mystery.
storyline:
An unexpected turn of events has landed you, an American woman, in the mysterious Australian High Country searching for your missing friend.

Follow clues, solve puzzles, and delve into conspiracy theories to investigate not only her disappearance, but the strange and inexplicable mystery surrounding many missing hikers drawn to the mountains.

name: The Big Catch
summary: The Big Catch is a 3D platformer all about tight expressive player movement, exploration, and FISH. In addition to inheriting the best parts of retro and modern platformers, The Big Catch is designed to be something fresh (like the fish).

name: Delilah
summary: Eastern Europe is the newest Circle of Hell, but outside its walls things aren't much better. Relentless action, pixelated gore, 256 colors. That is Delilah.

name: Furcifer's Fungeon
platforms: Web browser, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac
summary: Furcifer’s Fungeon is a loot-based dungeon crawler action roguelike. Forge powerful character builds using common, rare and legendary items and upgrade your collection for following runs!

name: Cozy Room
summary: Cozy Room is an idle game for chilling. Enjoy your time with a feline companion.

name: Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino
summary: "Where will their light lead them?" Kitsune is a fox girl who finds herself on Adashino Island and starts travelling with her Frog friend. Neon signs give light and color to the island with a Japanese-inspired atmosphere. Something is lurking in the shadows, inching ever closer...

name: Rue Valley
summary: A highly emotional RPG with Personality System and Mind Map Mechanics. Survive the unjust psychotherapy, lift yourself from rock bottom and uncover the mystery of the time anomaly that keeps the world stuck in 47 minutes.

name: Orc Warchief: Strategy City Builder
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Tactical, Indie
summary: Become an Orc warchief and fight for survival of your race. Rebuild your village and train your warriors. Gather resources and craft your weapons. Raise your warbanner and gather The Horde.

name: Reclaim the Sea
summary: Reclaim the Sea is a roguelike strategy game set in a pirate fantasy world. Fight your way through randomly generated maps and text events. Command your pirate crew, upgrade your ship and make tactical decisions to beat the boss and save the world… or die trying.

name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
summary: A top-down 2D story-driven adventure game inspired by real-life events. Traverse and experience the life of a formerly homeless man through an interview of how he regained his sense of self by telling his past to a stray dog. Set in Bangkok, Thailand 2017.
storyline:
What could make a man homeless? Is it one's family's financial situation? Is it the government? Is it because of our friends? Or... is it because of oneself?

Explore a journey from his childhood to the present. Unravel what made a man lose everything.

name: Tiny Bookshop
summary: Leave everything behind and open a Tiny Bookshop by the sea in this ambient narrative management game. Stock your wagon, set up shop in scenic locations, and navigate a post-capitalist future alongside Bookstonbury’s eclectic cast of characters.
storyline: Explore the picturesque coastal town of Bookstonbury-by-the Sea as you make a living selling used books out of your trailer and befriend the locals. Build your small business, discover wonderful locations, help out the locals, solve mysteries, and become a part of the town's story.

name: Tenebris Somnia
summary:
Tenebris Somnia is a horror adventure in the same vein as survival horror classics like Silent Hill or Resident Evil, but transferred to a retro 2D environment more typical of the N.E.S. or Famicom.

You will struggle to survive by solving puzzles and fighting horrible creatures.

The secret ingredient of the game is its cinematics. When you reach certain key points you will see sequences with a completely different aesthetic, made in live action with real actors and created by a professional film crew.
developers: Tobías Rusjan, Saibot Studios, Andrés Borghi

name: Wonderland Quest
summary: Wonderland Quest is a casual point & click adventure game. Travel across Wonderland teeming with colorful challenges, surprises and creatures, brought to life with beautiful artwork.

name: Assassin's Creed Jade
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
summary:
Explore the path of Xia in Assassin’s Creed Codename Jade. Set in the third century BC during the time of one of the first unified empires in China, an unprecedented era of trade and cultural exchange between East and West is just beginning, but with this comes new challenges and threats lurking in the shadows.

From the Great Wall outside the empire’s borders to the imperial capital of Xianyang, journey through a world filled with ancient history and hidden dangers. Defend against the Xiongnu and work to dismantle conspiracies, taking on greater responsibilities, and facing new challenges.
storyline:
As the adopted child of the master Wei Yu, players will set out on a quest for revenge after their close friend is betrayed. But as they delve deeper into their mission, they will uncover secrets about the past and a powerful force that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

Assassin’s Creed Codename Jade takes place in 215 B.C., between the events of Assassin’s Creed Odyssey and Assassin’s Creed Origins.

name: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
This narrative-driven ensemble game stars Captain America Steve Rogers, Black Panther Azzuri (T'Challa's grandfather), U.S. soldier and member of the Howling Commandos Gabriel Jones, and leader of the fledgling Wakandan Spy Network, Nanali.

All four characters will be playable at different parts of the story. According to Skydance, players can look forward to "intuitive controls and exhilarating second-to-second gameplay that captures the action and excitement of Marvel, inspired by landmark comics, television, and films, as they navigate this all-new glob-trotting adventure."
storyline: In the chaos of war, worlds collide. Captain America and Azzuri, the Black Panther of the 1940s, must overcome their differences and form an uneasy alliance to confront their common enemy. Fighting alongside Gabriel Jones of the Howling Commandos, and Nanali, a Wakandan spy embedded in Occupied Paris, they must join forces to stop a sinister plot that threatens to turn the havoc of WWII into the ultimate rise of Hydra.

name: Escape
summary: Escape is an online co-op game for 1 - 4 players. You and your team have entered a haunted mansion and got stuck there. Explore the procedurally generated environment, kill monsters, find clues, equip different weapons, and escape at any cost.

name: Perfect Tides: Station to Station
summary: A point n' click sequel to Perfect Tides about the momentum and whiplash of young adulthood.

name: Mystical Conquests
summary: A turn-based fantasy strategy game that fuses 4X, RPG and survival. Lead your faction in a world where the forces of evil are trying to destroy every civilizations. Expand your realm, improves your cities, recruit heroes, seek allies, build an army and try to save the world!

name: Stick It to the Stickman
summary: Stick it to the Stickman is a practical guide for anybody seeking to climb the corporate ladder in the fastest way possible. A groin-kicking, staple-gunning, chainsaw-wielding roguelike brawler loaded with high-impact, physics-based combat, copious amounts of coffee, and weaponized farts!

name: Penny Blood
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary:
Penny Blood is a alternative history horror JRPG and spiritual successor to the Shadow Hearts series led by former Shadow Hearts series director, Matzuso Machida.

The year is 1923 and American PI Matthew Farrell is tasked by the Bureau of Investigation to investigate a New York asylum overtaken by supernatural entities. Matthew's mission soon takes him across the world as he battles an otherworldly threat alongside a group of allies.

name: Lou's Lagoon
summary: A cosy open world adventure about running a seaplane delivery service. Customize your character, discover new islands, harvest goods, solve a family mystery, and work to keep an adorable island community afloat.

name: Snaccoon
summary: Snaccoon is a stealth/exploration game set in a dense, stylized city. The player controls an above-average-intelligence raccoon searching for snack foods after the local city government has banned them. Stumbling across a budding black market of cakes & chips, players will have to steal phones & items to engage in a series of deals that will take them all over the city to trade their way up to a coveted box of their favorite treats.

name: Goman: Stuck in the Avici Hell
summary: Goman is a Infinitely looped scroll style battle action game.

name: Tokyo Underground Killer
summary: Dive into the neon-drenched deep underground of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin who harnesses the power of blood energy. Use your sword, mystical abilities and powerful weapons to assassinate highly dangerous maniacs and stop the invasion of the brutal Flatliners terrorizing Tokyo.
storyline:
Take a deep dive into the criminal underground of Tokyo as the feared "Shinjuku Vampire" Kobayashi.
Equipped with a mystical sword and supernatural powers fueled by the blood of his fallen enemies, Kobayashi takes out Tokyo's craziest lunatics for just the right price.

However, as Tokyo gets overrun by the mysterious Flatliners, a whole new world of insanity and depravity opens up in front of Kobayashi.

name: Rogue Blight
summary: Rogue Blight is a souls-like, rogue-lite, combat focused RPG. Fight your way through ever-changing maps. Customize your playstyle based on what you find. Meet other struggling heroes. Death will be punishing, but you will get stronger with every journey. Are you up for the challenge?

name: K-Pop Idol Stories: Road to Debut
genres: Music, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: A love letter to the thrilling world of K-pop! In this life simulator, you're the manager responsible for scouting talent, organising schedules, creating budgets, planning social media, choosing music, and styling your idols. Your goal? To debut the next big K-pop idol group!
storyline:
Decide the story of an upcoming KPop idol group: Discover the ups and downs of your idols and assist them through the tight schedules. Prepare for their debut!

Will you support them on their journey?

name: My Familiar
summary: In this RPG, wake up as a fresh familiar on the mean streets of Wish City, where the denizens are dark and corruption is king. Fight, flee, and aggressively rap your way through a vibrant inner city gauntlet, chock full of dysfunctional demons, in flashy, over the top, turn-based battles.

name: Train Mechanic Simulator 2025
summary: Take on the role of a qualified Train Mechanic. Repair broken steam locomotives using your fully stacked workshop. Find out how complex and difficult this job really is. Become one of the few that know how to repair an old train.

name: Every Day We Fight
