platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest is a parody/homage to NES ClassicVania and other NES titles from the era.

The titular hero, Simon Quest, has just arrived in Transylvania only to discover his vampire hunting rival, Stan Helsing, has already slain the evil Count Dracula. In order to reclaim the glory that should be his, he journeys across Wallachia to gather what he needs to resurrect the dark count piece by piece and kick his ass himself!

name: Last Moon
summary: The Moon is falling, malicious creatures appear, the world falls in chaos! Last Moon is an Action-RPG greatly inspired by the mythical titles from the 90s! Explore a mesmerizing, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers, face tainted creatures and upgrade your abilities in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.
storyline: While the giant If harbours life, human greed triggers the destruction of the Moon. Corrupted creatures appear, and the world falls into chaos. Only a true Lunar Knight can stop it, and it’s you. Armed with courage, your fate seems sealed, but will you manage to save the situation and bring peace to If?

name: Outrider Mako
summary: Take on the role of Mako on her quest to seek out and subsequently deliver her, uh, deliverables in this top-down view 2D action game. Jump on top of your enemies and slime them with goo to stop them in their tracks! Get those deliverables delivered!
storyline:
In accordance with a deal made with self-proclaimed "delivery service" and all-around mysterious entity known as Bumon, Mako has taken a job working as a lackey at the Bumon Delivery Corporation in "Mayoi" - the world of the gods.
She was told that if she finishes up her assigned tasks and collects the stamps of approval for her various deliveries, then she'll be able to return to her own world, but...

Get to work finding and collecting the various items requested in Mayoi.
As soon as you've gathered the items, bring them to the workbench. Once you're finished packaging them, deliver them to the client. Rinse, repeat, and keep on going to see just how the story unfolds.

name: Earth From Another Sun
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Explore the galaxy, establish and grow your empire, build your trade network, fight alongside the armies you command, and conquer the galaxy! Once you rule over all, remodel the galaxy as you see fit. Long live the Emperor!
themes: Action, Science fiction, Sandbox, Open world
storyline: Grow your empire, obliterate enemies with military might, control the galactic trade markets, master diplomatic relations, or conduct clandestine criminal activities. The Galaxy is yours for the taking.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is the successor to the iconic RPG Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Set in a Seattle faithfully reimagined in the World of Darkness, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 features reactive storytelling, fast-paced melee combat, and intriguing characters with their own hidden motives.

Created in an act of vampire insurrection, your existence ignites a blood war among the vampire factions who run Seattle. To survive, you’ll choose a clan and enter into uneasy alliances with competing factions in a world which will react to every choice you make. Unleash your supernatural powers against your prey, but be mindful of your surroundings at all times or run the risk of breaking the Masquerade (the absolute law of secrecy that keeps Vampire society hidden from humanity).
storyline: Enter the night as one of several humans inexplicably attacked in a Mass Embrace, suddenly thrown into the dangerous and ruthless vampire politics of Seattle. Tensions between the factions in Seattle are at an all-time high, and this unsanctioned attack throws the status quo into chaos. An inquest is called in order to get to the bottom of the mystery, and you’re the star witness… whether you like it or not..

name: Night is Coming
summary: Night is Coming is a survival building simulation set within the unforgiving cold of the Carpathian mountains. Build your settlement, nurture and protect your people - prepare for impending Darkness. Will everyone survive? Will evil displace your homestead? Will a Hero emerge?

name: Artificial
summary: Artificial is a physics based first-person puzzle platformer inspired by Portal & Half-Life series. Interact with the environment, pick up and throw objects, sneak around enemies, control intricate physics-based mechanisms and learn how to survive in the underground colony of the Asteroid 2031 XT.

name: Netherworld
summary: A weird jellyfish handles marriage crisis with alcohol, drugs, sex, blows and lots of odd characters.

name: Hive Quest
summary:
Guide your insect tribe on an unusual journey through a mythical woodland filled with ancient magic, strange creatures & hidden mysteries. Uncover the secrets of the Old Orchard, find and train your very own woodland sprite and lead your Hive to victory!
Hive Quest is a story driven game with many layers:

- Colony building
- Pet management
- Exploration & mystery
- Weird puzzles
- Swarm battles
- Subterfuge
- Resource gathering
- Spell casting
storyline:
Hive Quest is an immersive real time strategy game set in a mythical woodland filled with ancient magic, strange creatures & intriguing puzzles. As the Hive Mind you will guide your insect tribe on a hazardous adventure to find safety after a terrible cataclysm. Explore mysterious locations with the help of your pet Shrublet, find allies, uncover the story behind the Old Orchard and fight against other tribes. Do you have what it takes to re-establish your Hive’s fortunes and seek out the mythical ‘Sunny Uplands’?

– Guide your embattled tribe on a quest to find fortune, glory and a new home.
– Interact with a wide variety of crazy puzzles and strange goings on as you try to make sense of it all.
– Explore the mysteries of the Deep Woods and uncover new allies and enemies.
– Battle against other hives to maintain control of your territory.
– Manage resources and build your Hive into a powerful kingdom, filled with hard working drones.
– Take mind control of your drones and send them into unknown territory on dangerous missions.
– Launch attacks on enemy Hives & dangerous creatures that stand in your way.
– Obtain woodland elementals as pets and upgrade them to fight and do your bidding.

name: Theropods
summary: Face dinosaurs, solve puzzles and travel back to the time of ginormous lizards and pixelated adventure games.

name: Dino Run 2
summary: Dino Run 2 is a hyper-evolved pixel-art single and multiplayer platformer with procedurally generated terrain, multiple dino types to play as with different strengths and skills, tons of character customization, and most importantly an unstoppable doom wall that's constantly on your tail.

name: Once Upon a Puppet
summary: Once Upon a Puppet is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer developed by Flatter Than Earth.

name: Steam Punks
summary:
Steam Punks is an action platformer in the vein of 90's retro SNES legends like Mega Man X and Super Metroid.

Take control of Dunns Calhan, one of Mayor Spurs elite enforcers, as he takes on the notorious Bowler Gang and tries to save Steamopolis from total destruction.

name: Grand Theft Auto VI
summary: Grand Theft Auto VI heads to the state of Leonida, home to the neon-soaked streets of Vice City and beyond in the biggest, most immersive evolution of the Grand Theft Auto series yet.

name: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond
summary: Developed by a new team under Nintendo producer Kensuke Tanabe. A return to the First Person Adventure gameplay focused on action, isolation, and exploration.

name: The Siege and the Sandfox
summary: The Siege and the Sandfox is a 'Stealthvania' – an infusion of stealth into the familiar Metroidvania experience, creating a unique twist on the ever-popular genre. Lovingly realised in an evocative 2D art style, enriched with the power of Unreal Engine 4.
developers: Cardboard Sword, Chucklefish Games, Koch Media
storyline: Master dynamic parkour abilities to explore the cavernous depths of an ancient underground prison, evading detection and avoiding certain death from a sand-borne evil. Fight for your city! Foil the enemy's attempt to strike from within the heart of the kingdom.

name: Dead Static Drive
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: Dead Static Drive is a horror survival adventure. You're on the road. The world begins to fall apart in front of you. Your friendships will make every bit of difference as order collapses and the people you meet fight for their own survival. Sneak, scavenge, fight, befriend, barricade and bunker-in or steal a car and drive off into the sunset. There's no escape; there's only what you choose to do with the little time that's left.
storyline:
You’re roaring an 80s muscle car down the interstate when you see someone snatched by something dreadful in the darkness. You save them, but they pull a gun and steal your car. You walk to a diner. It feels safe. As night falls, noises in the darkness outside change your mind. The door crashes open. You’re cornered. Now there’s a woman with a baseball bat beating the things over the head.

Can you trust her? Do you really have a choice?

name: Tavern Keeper
summary: In Tavern Keeper you manage a tavern, building, bartering, cooking and cleaning your way to success in a humorous fantasy world. Starting out with a shell of a tavern in the backwaters of the kingdom, you build rooms, place items, stock the larder and hire staff to satisfy the demands of the oddball locals and misfit heroes that stumble through your door. Run your business well and you'll progress to larger taverns with more demanding patrons where you'll need to expand your offerings to include new meals, drinks, rooms and services.
storyline: A good tavern is the heart and soul of a community - a place for drama and intrigue, shoddy deals and outrageous meals. A place for peasants to relax, travelers to rest and heroes to plan their next daring adventure. But what of the unsung heroes of it all - the tavern keepers?

name: Mewgenics
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Adventure, Indie
summary:
From the creator of The Binding of Isaac, Super Meat Boy and The End is Nigh comes... Mewgenics! A game where you hoard, breed, train and set cats out on epic adventures through a sprawling world of complete chaos.
Level up your team as you venture further and further from your home, collect unique items, defeat epic bosses, gain mutations and return home so you you can breed and further your bloodline, in this turn based legacy roguelike draft sim about cats!

name: Sanctity
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Sanctity is a Hack & Slash RPG with platformer elements where you travel between the Real and Virtual Worlds in fast-paced combat against swarms of enemies and boss fights inspired by MMO raid design.
storyline:
For as long as the history books recorded, humans and Fae had been sworn enemies. Driven by insatiable greed, humans hungered for ever-expanding territories and resources whilst the ethereal Fae, with an aura of otherworldly superiority, regarded themselves far above mere mortals.

Naturally, this led to war - one that lasted for generations, both sides locked in a stalemate.

Then, one day, the king of the humans was visited by a “god”, who gave them a gift to turn the tides of war - the gift of “technology”.

With their new technology, the humans decemated the Fae forces, subjugating them and building a world in God's name by deploying autonomous knights known as Paladins - one for each of the 7 elements; Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Light, Dark and Gravity. . Now at peace through technology, humans succumbed to stagnation.

They built their grand fortress cities, enslaved the Fae to do their bidding, and wollowed away their lives in debauchery and frivolity within God's Infinite Paradise system.

Thus has the world remained for centuries, stuck in an ever lasting cycle of stagnation. That was, until the Corrupted came.

Swiftly consuming the world, the Paladins struggling valiantly against the blasphemy of the Corrupted. But even the might of the Paladins could not stop the spread from reaching the Holy City…

With her trusted Artificial Companion, Aura, the Paladin of Gravity known as Aldreda returns to find a city in chaos. Armed with only her wits, combat prowess and sword, can she fight back against the wave of Corruption and save the remaining citizens of Sanctaidd?

name: Cavescape
summary: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!
storyline:
Fred worked in the mine, finding comfort during breaks as he petted his only friend, Rocky, a small puppy he had rescued from hungry coyotes.

One day, Gorgath, the big underground monster long thought to be a myth, emerged from the unexplored cave, killed the people working at the mine, and abducted Rocky.

Out of fear, Fred ran to the lift and fell into the unknown depths of the enormous cave system, said to be home to the most dangerous monsters alive.

However, Fred was armed with two tools to escape and defeat Gorgath to reunite with his best friend, Rocky: a pickaxe and a grappling hook!

name: Danger is Near
summary: Danger is Near - sessional hardcore multiplayer shooter that includes several genres: FPS, survival, weapon and combat simulator, RPG with MMO phenomena. The game will immerse you in a realistic gaming environment imbued with a gloomy post-apocalyptic atmosphere...

name: Irony
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: You are a nameless mercenary, dispatched to the research facility 'UNDERDOG CORP.' Survive the horrors of this dangerous facility, twisted by human experimentation, and uncover the hidden secrets within before they consume you.

name: Heart of Artemisa
summary: Heart of Artemisa is a rhythm adventure game, with dungeon crawler & Roguelite elements. The player has to defeat enemies and solve puzzles at the beat of music.

name: Aokaki
summary: Aokaki is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you play as an isopod ronin. Explore fun and challenging levels while battling against the forces of the evil Shogun in this bug inhabited pixelart world.

name: Road Warriors
summary: Survive on the road in this post-apocalyptic world! Road Warriors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where your goal is to create the strongest build in one run!

name: Future Weapon 2D
summary: Future Weapon 2D is a top down space shooter where you can relive the couch co-op glory days with up to 8 players across 2 screens. Grab a gun, grab a spaceship, upgrade everything, mine rocks, explore, and recruit the local townsfolk to conquer this demo.

name: The Adventures of Bryan Scott
summary: 2D point & click adventure, that combines classic elements from games like "Broken Sword" and "Deponia".
storyline: Bryan Scott, son of the late well-known archaeologist John W. Scott, receives a small package from Near East in which he finds the diary of treasure hunter Kate Williams, who went missing while searching for the legendary treasure of the Queen of Sheba, the same treasure his father had pursued for many years. Not entirely voluntarily, Bryan travels to Ethiopia in order to follow Kate’s trail, but his journey soon leads him to the secret society “The Black Fist,” which is also looking for the fabled treasure. And so a dangerous and exciting adventure begins!

name: Evolution: From the Little Light
summary: A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world. Embark on a 2D adventure full of exploration and puzzles, making crucial decisions, facing dangers and discovering the hidden secrets of evolution.
storyline: A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world.

name: Nyan Heroes
summary: Step into Nyan Heroes, a free-to-play, third-person hero shooter where intelligent cats pilot powerful mechs known as Guardians. Experience agility, strategy, and precision in a world shaped by feline intelligence.
storyline:
The Epic Story of New Nekovia
In the not-so-distant future, cats rule the world. An intelligent breed of hunter-scientists, they created giant robots called Guardians in the image of their ancestral owners. With the power of Guardian technology, they became the apex species of the new world - Nekovia.

However, hubris is a power that corrupts all.

Through their greed and constant desire for power, Nyankind continued to push technology to the bleeding edge. They conducted their first nekogenic graft in an effort to fuse their feline DNA with guardians, in an attempt to enhance their abilities and reflexes. It worked, but there were some unforeseen side effects. A dormant feral sentience began to awaken within each guardian, perhaps sensing the unnatural union of machine and fur. Feralization was irreversible, and countless Nyans became prey to their own creations. The casualties were immense, and the remainder of the survivors fled underground.

They began to rebuild. A routine exploratory mission led to the discovery of Nyanite, a rare material found near the Earth's core, one that would eventually stabilize the process of nekogenic grafting and prevent feralization. Using the power of Nyanite, the survivors rebuilt their city underground - now known as New Nekovia, the city with holographic skies.

It is a vibrant city full of optimism and hope - filled with heroes that dream of a better future. At the center lies the Battledome, a futuristic training facility that also serves as a reminder of the past and a symbol of hope for the future. Nowadays, Guardian Battles are the most popular sport in New Nekovia, with extravagant competitions and lavish prizes for winning teams. Yet as countless heroes fight for glory and riches, the true meaning behind their fight is never forgotten.

name: Death Blonde
summary: Death Blonde is a local multiplayer racing shooter. Join a world of cursed (blonde) skeletons with cool sunglasses. Isn't that enough for you? Let's also put in cars, drifts, weapons, explosions, and heavy-metal-electronic music, maybe that's more what you're looking for.

name: Try 2 Sleep
summary: Try 2 Sleep is a casual, local Co-op horror game made for two players. An evil spirit has invaded your house, collaborate with your partner and survive the night terrors!

name: Welcome to Doll Town
summary: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.
storyline: As Yumi uncovers the town's terrifying history, she finds herself trapped in a deadly game orchestrated by the cursed dolls. To survive, Yumi must navigate through haunting dollhouses, each themed after a particular doll's tragic past. In these dollhouses, she must solve intricate puzzles, confront her deepest fears, and gather the seven cursed items needed to break the final doll's curse—Aiko, the town’s most malevolent spirit.

name: Double Dragon Revive
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Double Dragon Revive faithfully reproduces the thrill of old school side-scrolling action games, with updated controls and difficulty settings for the modern era, and utilizing Arc System Works’ fighting game development experience. Jimmy Lee, Billy Lee, Roper, Abobo, and more will appear in stylish 3D.

name: Love at The Milky Way Diner
genres: Point-and-click, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.
storyline:
Love at the Milky Way Diner is a game about cultural exchange through food, building community, and finding love in the process.

200 years after first contact, humanity is still trying to find their place in a galaxy full of far more advanced and established species.
One such human, our protagonist, has recently been laid off from their corporate job on Mars when news reaches them; their distant aunt Cassiopia has passed away suddenly, and she would like one of her relatives to take over her restaurant on the distant deep space station Hesperides.
The protagonist decides to take a leap of faith. They may have never left their home start system of Helios, but surely there must be something (or maybe someone) better out there waiting for them.
When they reach the station they find themselves welcomed by a vibrant, multi-species community of eccentric individuals who are only too happy to welcome the new owner of their favourite place to eat.

Love at the Milky Way Diner will feature 8 love interests, each with their own routes and stories

name: Directive 8020
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Earth is dying and humanity is running out of time. 12 light years from home, Tau Ceti f offers a small sliver of hope. When the colony ship Cassiopeia crash lands on the planet, its crew soon realize they are far from being alone. In space, death takes many forms.
storyline:
Earth is dying and humanity is running out of time. 12 light years from home, Tau Ceti f offers a small sliver of hope. When the colony ship Cassiopeia crash lands on the planet, its crew soon realize they are far from being alone.

Hunted by an alien organism capable of mimicking its prey, the crew of the Cassiopeia must outwit their pursuers to make it home alive. To help them survive, the choices you make are more important than ever! Evade real-time threats where any step could be your last. Decide who to trust in a world where anyone could be a deadly alien impostor.

name: The Kharzov Effect
summary: Welcome to The Kharzov Effect, an immersive first-person puzzle horror game. Explore Dr. Kharzov’s eerie estate as you unravel the mystery behind a series of abductions. Face terrifying creatures, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the truth of Kharzov's dark history!
storyline:
Set in the cinematic world of 1985, you play as Chris, a boy searching for his recently abducted friend Billy. Solve puzzles and stealthily infiltrate the mysterious mansion of Professor Kharzov to uncover layers of dark secrets.

This single-player unforgettable experience has you exploring in first person, completing dangerous quests, and solving escape room level puzzles all while avoiding capture in a thrilling blend of strategy and horror.

name: Sick Samurai
summary: Sick Samurai is a blindingly fast and bloody action game based on instant-death combat. Immerse yourself in lofi hip hop and retro anime aesthetics as you slash and dash your way to becoming the greatest fighter on the island.
storyline: Sick Samurai tells the story of a young man who dreams of becoming the greatest fighter on the island of Furikyu. He seeks out Genyu, an infamous ex-samurai, in the hopes of learning from him. Genyu agrees to train him, though he has motives of his own, and their journey begins...

name: Pipkin
summary: Explore a magical and spooky world, capture wild Pipkin, and fight alongside them, as you uncover a series of mysterious events happening around New Haven...

name: Digital Exorcist: CF1_Defrag
summary: After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence.

name: UpRooted
summary: UpRooted is a 2.5d action-adventure featuring a mage and a paladin fighting to hack a virus corrupting a forest. Play as two and fight as one stunning as a mage and slashing as a paladin. The forest may be wilting, but at least you're not in this alone.

name: Deepspace Emporium
summary: Deepspace Emporium is a gritty shopkeeping sim set in the depths of a sprawling space station. As a former scavenger turned merchant, you trade in goods of varying legality—all while facing rising rent. Navigate a divided society, balance faction demands, and dodge authorities as you try to survive.

name: Knightica
summary: Recruit powerful units, place them strategically and find the best synergies in this Roguelike Autobattler! Knightica lets you guide a warband through many challenges to free the Kingdoms. Discover optimal combinations, weave powerful enchants, face dangerous monsters and lead your army to victory!

name: Twisted Jam
summary: Twisted Jam is a fast-paced, arcade-style Frisbee like game set in a digital world. Contestants will battle it out for the top spot by scoring points within the goals.
storyline: Place yourself inside the digital Colosseum, where contenders team up to battle for the top spot. While competing, communicate with your squad to make plays on the opponent's goal. Additionally, take advantage of height by using "Flux Drift" to move around walls and ceilings. Don't forget to eliminate opponents; otherwise, they might do the same to you.

name: Ninja Gaiden 4
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The definitive ninja action-adventure franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in a high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat.
developers: Koei Tecmo, Team NINJA, Xbox Game Studios, PlatinumGames

name: NOIR: Dead On Arrival
summary: Noir/Horror themed story rich interactive adventure indie game with party-based RPG elements. As you investigate various mysterious cases, you will learn more about the secrets of this dystopian world and maybe discover why most of mankind has turned into zombies. Each of your choices really matters

name: Cat Tree
summary: Cat Tree is a relaxing indie game. Collect cats, watch them grow on your tree, and unlock new sections of it. Gather rare, epic, and legendary cats to create a unique collection and uncover all the secrets of the tree!
storyline: Your task is to nurture the cats, watch them grow, and decide which ones to keep in your collection and which to sell for profit. Explore the tree and uncover all its secrets while enjoying the peaceful and soothing atmosphere of the game.

name: Tattoo Removal Simulator
summary: Take on the role of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Enjoy a soothing pace that lets you focus on the calming process of tattoo removal. Set in a small studio in a bustling city, your all clients share one goal: erasing parts of their past, marked by colorful images, texts, secrets and stories.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy
summary: Take command of the forces of light, in the Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy Expansion. Join the celestial Archons as they strike back against Urrath’s corrupt forces. Consult the oracles and glimpse the hidden prophecies that shape the fates of the realms, and become the master of your own destiny. Contains a new culture, story content and prophecy events.

name: Captain Midnight
summary: The tide always wins

name: Rematch
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Control one player on your team and compete in fast-paced 5v5 matches from an immersive third-person perspective. Team up with your friends and join the action.

name: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A brand-new side-scrolling entry to the NINJA GAIDEN series from the team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound redefines the classic platformer saga in a spectacular, thrilling and challenging ninja adventure.

name: Space Hunters
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S
summary: Join space bounty hunters in a brutal 2D handmade beat 'em up, where every punch and kick is fueled by action and greed. Battle your way through a gritty, money-driven universe in this intense, fast-paced adventure.

name: Kentum
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Stranded in the year 10,000, Kent—an average Joe turned clone—must survive, explore, and rebuild civilization with the help of a snarky AI. Craft, farm, and automate in this 2D craftervania adventure as you uncover Earth’s secrets and kickstart humanity, one machine at a time.

name: Cards and Dungeons
summary: Cards and Dungeons is an action-packed roguelike dungeon crawler blending hack-and-slash gameplay with cards. Fight through procedurally generated floors teeming with monsters, gather loot, and unleash powerful effects with collectible cards. Will you survive the depths?

name: Dungeon Crawler
summary: Dungeon Crawler is an upcoming roguelite, hack n' slash, platformer puzzle game. Makhoba discusses how Dungeon Crawler's imagination mechanic works, the inspiration behind the game's creation, and more.

name: There's Always a Madman: Bring the Thunder
summary:
In this single-player spy thriller interactive novel, secret agents Franklin Benjamin and Virginia West take on a madman named Zeus who threatens the world with a weather machine.

You may find yourself needing to de-escalate a hostage situation, investigating a crime scene, or even defusing a ticking time bomb - good thing you always bring the thunder, agent!
storyline:
We have it on good intel that a madman named Zeus is attempting to build a weather device that could wipe entire nations off the face of the Earth. Obviously, we can't let that come to pass!

Track down this madman, unravel his scheme, and destroy his doomsday device. The fate of the world rests on your shoulders and your shoulders alone, agent. This is a single-player game, after all

name: My Arms Are Longer Now
summary:
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!

name: Kernel Hearts
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: Gather your allies. Eliminate Angels. Transform into a Magical Girl. Slay god. Kernel Hearts is a Multiplayer Co-Op Roguelike Action RPG about four magical girls and their attempt to save a world that's drowning in ashes

name: Maple Forest
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary:
Maple Forest is an action RPG inspired by a bunch of 90s classics. In it, you'll adventure across an island that's begun to sink for mysterious reasons. The residents of the island's main village tell you that their legends say the power of the god of the island is what keeps the island afloat.

The god of the island lives in a shrine at the top of the mountain, but that shrine has been sealed off by a huge stone door for longer than anyone in the village can remember. If there was a way to open that door and speak with the island's guardian, the island might be saved, but noone on the island has been strong or courageous enough to brave the island's wilderness in search of a way to unseal the door...until now!

name: Spook-A-Boo
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Spook-A-Boo is a ghost-hunting couch co-op game for up to four players. Team up with friends and family to locate and capture sneaky ghosts hiding in plain sight.
storyline:
Ghosts are running amok and causing trouble across the universe. The Dimensional Entity Department (D.E.D.) needs all the help it can get. It is up to you to put an end to their spooky shenanigans.

With a total of five unique dimensions to explore, you will encounter a variety of ghosts, including a boss ghost haunting each dimension.

name: Mafia: The Old Country
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily.

name: Herdling
summary: Guide a herd of mysterious creatures on a stirring and beautiful journey into the mountains… and beyond.

name: Dying Light: The Beast
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Dying Light: The Beast is a thrilling standalone zombie adventure set in a tightly-crafted rural region. Play as Kyle Crane, a legendary hero who breaks free after years of brutal experiments. Now, he must realize there’s more at stake than just revenge.
storyline: You are Kyle Crane, the man whose selflessness during the initial virus outbreak saved many from a fate worse than death. After more than a decade in captivity, you find yourself in a world that’s changed, and not for the better. Now, you’ll need to use the survival skills that kept you alive all those years ago to save even more innocent lives.

name: Trifoil
summary: Trifoil is a minimalist, cerebral line drawing puzzle game, that explores how lines can interact with themselves. It has multiple puzzle mechanics, secrets to discover and mysteries to solve.

name: Shadows of Chroma Tower
summary: An immersive first-person Dungeon Crawler RPG with heavy roguelite elements and huge bosses in an Extraction setting. Level up, learn skills on a vast talent tree, develop your profession as a harvester or crafter, discover new recipes, loot and craft your way to becoming an unstoppable fighter.

name: Motorslice
summary: In the ruins of a megastructure, a girl arrives with a single objective: Destroy every machine inside.

name: Tackle for Loss
genres: Shooter, Sport, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Tackle for Loss is a 2D top-down action game that puts you in the shoes of a former American football pro. Violent combat, a captivating narrative, and dark pixel art combine to create a pumped-up experience, inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami.

name: AI.VI
summary: A mercenary robot is forced out of retirement as the P.A.S.C.A.L. Gigacorporation conquers his planet to squeeze it dry. Combine your FPS and tower defense skills, then send the corporate invaders to the scrapheap, seize the means of production, and take the planet back for the worker bots!
storyline: It's been a nice retirement. Mining in the desert might not be the easiest job, but it's better than being scrapped on the frontline. Then the P.A.S.C.A.L. came, an evil intergalactic corporation out to turn every planet in their path into numbers in their accounts. What they didn’t expect was that one of the docile mining robots isn’t designed for surrender. No, AI.VI is designed for something else: Incredible violence.

name: Feline Forensics and the Meowseum Mystery
genres: Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: There's only one detective to unravel this murder turned museum heist... and they're the cat's meow. Interrogate a "colorful" cast of suspects until they cough up hairballs... and the truth. Will you wrap up the case in time for an afternoon nap, and make injustice knead its last biscuit?

name: Zurarararush!!!
summary: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.

name: Todokero! Tatakae! Calamity Angels
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch

name: A Blocc World
summary: A voxel-style open-world RPG. Use a variety of melee, ranged and magical combat abilities to smash your way to saving the world. Grow your strength, with powerful abilities and equipment. Learn about the world of Blocc from friendly characters, and try to keep them in one piece.

name: Dobbel Dungeon
summary: Gather your party, roll your dice and embark on a quest to discover why the local wildlife has suddenly turned evil! No two adventures are the same in this dice-powered tactical RPG!

name: Simulacro
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S
summary: In this first-person philosophical journey, Poísis, an enthusiastic art student, explores a mysterious island in Greece. As she solves the local puzzles, she uncovers traces of its ancient inhabitants, leading her to question her own reality.
developers: The Philosophical School of Games, QUByte Interactive

name: Hell Games
summary: Get ready for Hell Games: In this 4 player action arena brawler fallen Olympians, once cheaters and dopers, battle it out in the depths of hell. Knock out opponents with sports gear, power up, and strive to be the last one standing.

name: Golel
summary: Golel, a first person roguelike Dungeon Crawler.Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.Dropping book shelves on an enemy, or kicking an enemy into a trap are all valid tactics.Deep skill/magic and combat gameplay, with many development paths.

name: Vultures: Scavengers of Death
summary: Face zombies and fearsome monsters in this turn-based survival-horror roguelike as you seek the path to recover a valuable artifact. Unravel the history of Salento Valley and its downfall after a bioterrorist attack led by a secret cult involved with the powerful corporation Eugenesys Tech.

name: Nqc: Non Qualia Character
summary: RPG where human who became NPC find himself.

name: Who Are You!?
summary: 'Who Are You!?' is a strong narrative first person sci-fi psychological horror videogame, where you will play as Ray Roswell, traveling through his distorted memories and solving puzzles to understand what is real about his wife’s disappearance 20 years ago.
storyline: Get immersed into a deep sci-fi psychological horror experience, where you'll have to fight through your memories and emotions while reality blurs when you try to understand the disappearance of your wife 20 years ago, and the current whereabouts of your daughter.

name: Wheel World
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Dive into Wheel World as Kat, a rider chosen by ancient cycling spirits. Race elite teams, trick out your bike, and perform the long overdue Great Shift ritual to save a universe on the brink! Your bike is your destiny.

name: Hidden Pass
summary: Hidden Pass is a tactical turn-based RPG with base management that blends tactics with fascinating visual effects. The game sets in unique technomagic fantasy world. Plan your steps carefully while you lead an expedition to the center of a vast cluster of uncharted isles floating high in the sky.

name: Everdeep Aurora
summary: An ongoing apocalyptic meteor shower has forced the world’s population to settle underground. As Shell, a feline child who awakens to find her mother missing, drill downward from the surface layer through a tile-based underground and discover the Everdeep.

name: 3 Last Chances
summary: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

name: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
summary: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.
developers: The Philosophical School of Games, Bobware

name: Elation for the Wonder Box 6000
summary: Elation For The Wonder Box 6000 is a first-person, claymation adventure game about going into the city to try and find a game from your youth that no one else remembers.

name: King of Conquerors
summary: Your journey from adventurer to king will begin here!

name: Wink and the Broken Robot
platforms: Game Boy Color, Web browser, Game Boy
summary:
Explore the weird and cute post-apocalyptic world of The Outskirts while collecting coins and mysterious ancient treasures like floppy disks and cassette tapes

Wink is taking inspiration from Gameboy classics like Super Mario Land 2 and Link's Awakening, but doing its own little thing.
developers: Max Oakland Games, In the Junipers
storyline:
That night, Wink had fallen asleep at his computer. Not too far away, a Robot was sleeping peacefully until a group of monsters broke into his house and stole pieces of the Robot to use for themselves.

Wink heard the Robot’s calls for help and immediately jumped up to help. He followed the calls to an abandoned house, where he was ambushed by a crazy box monster.

After defeating the monster, Wink realized it was just a little broken robot, who was scared of being attacked again. The Robot apologized and Wink vowed to help him get his pieces back from the monsters who stole them.

Now the adventure begins!

name: Campus Life
summary: In Campus Life you’ll create your own college freshman. Experience the hardships of college in this amusing and engaging life sim game. Study hard and party even harder. Join a fraternity to meet new interesting individuals. It is entirely up to you how your academic career will progress!
developers: Live Motion Games, Frozen Way, PlayWay S.A., Frozen District

name: Drops of Death
summary: A murder mystery visual novel with a romantic twist. The killer is randomly chosen and you may unknowingly fall in love with them.

name: Creep
summary: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

name: Borderlands 4
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: See if you have what it takes to go down in history as a legendary Vault Hunter as you search for secret alien treasure, blasting everything in sight.

name: Unit Down Charge
summary: A futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, and epic boss battles!
storyline:
Due to depleting resources, toxic planet surface, and the threat of extraterrestrial beings, all the nations of Earth combined to create a central government; The Earth Unit. While working under this new government, a brilliant scientist by the name of Dr. Aura discovered DNA of animals that once populated the planet... animals long extinct, such as dogs and cats. Using this DNA, he created genetically modified animal soldiers, called Bio-Units, to defend the planet from external threats.

However, Dr. Aura's ego began to grow out of his control, and though time, became a tyrant ruling over his own creations. He overthrew the Earth Unit and took over as it's new ruler, using his Bio-Units as his army.

Over time, these Bio-Units began to show their disapproval of Dr. Aura's actions, some even going as far as betraying the Earth Unit and running away, unwilling to participate in his tyrannical actions. Lars, a carefree and over-confident fighter, Kit, a softhearted mechanic, Deon, an arrogant ex-soldier, and Garrison, their strict team captain, teamed up and challenged Dr. Aura to put a stop to his dictatorship.

After a strongly fought battle against his armies, the 4 of them succeeded in overthrowing Dr. Aura, and upon his defeat, took over the Earth Unit. Garrison, the team's captain, became the new head of the planet, and began to restore the relations between Bio-Units and the people of Earth. Peace became a reality, and a new era in Earth's history was beginning.

However, word of Dr. Aura being sighted recently has caught the attention of Garrison, Lars, Kit, and Deon. It was under everyone's understanding that Dr. Aura was dead, defeated in battle years ago.

Surely, he could not still be alive.

name: Hell is Us
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: If war is the closest we get to hell on earth, it's because Earth harbours the worst of demons: humankind. In an isolated country ravaged by infighting, discover the secrets of your past and deal with the repercussions of a mysterious calamity.
storyline: As well as the civil war dividing the country, the region is suffering from a mysterious calamity, which has given rise to supernatural creatures that no modern weapon can defeat. Your drone and sword from a different age are your faithful allies as you cut a path through lands infested with terrifying chimeras and try to unravel the mystery of their appearance.

name: Hell is Us: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition of Hell is Us includes:
- The Hollow Walker Pack, featuring an exclusive skin for Remi and his drone KAPI
- The Military Pack, featuring an exclusive skin for Remi and his drone KAPI
- An exclusive investigation
- The Art Pack, including the digital artbook and original soundtrack

name: Tired to Fall
summary: Tired to Fall is a puzzle-platformer where you collect, launch, and transform buddy-leaves into platforms to help a little leaf climb back to its tree. Jump, glide and solve puzzles in an undergrowth packed with spiky chestnuts, acorns, and cannon-mushrooms!

name: Expedition: Into Darkness
summary: Expedition: Into Darkness is a medieval third-person cooperative dungeon crawler and extraction looter. Assemble weapons, customize gear, and join forces with up to four other allies. Survive the ruins—or lose everything you carr

name: Our Freedom
summary: The medieval world is waiting for you! Stand up for your people and help them protect their freedom! Build your village, win battles and tournaments and become a famous adventurer in the game Our Freedom!

name: Termina
summary: Termina is an intense, adrenaline-fueled, survival shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Dive into the heart-pounding action of endless waves of the undead, scavenging for power-ups, unlocking powerful weapons, and battling through hordes of relentless zombies until your last breath.

name: Kaisa: Resurrection
summary: You play as the puppet of Kaisa an undead confused octopus with a fuzzy ambitions for vengeance and power. During the day you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies to satisfy your masters needs. During the night... Well that's another story.

name: Nihilum
summary: Step into 'Nihilum', a retro RPG that weaves together elements from the real world and a mystical fantasy realm. Take on the roles of Célestin and Alexandra, non-identical twins, who evolve and mature as you solve puzzles, unravel mysteries, and tackle survival challenges. Engage in strategic combat, level up, and equip your characters while discovering hidden treasures throughout the game. Embark on a journey filled with brain-teasers and battles that shape the twins' destinies in this captivating adventure. Dive deep into 'Nihilum' and uncover the secrets hidden in every corner of its unique world.
storyline:
In 'Nihilum', twins Célestin and Alexandra find their worlds shattered when a mysterious event tears them apart, leaving them to face their destinies alone. As they are separated, a fragile bond remains through their dreams, where they catch glimpses of each other’s struggles and triumphs.

Alexandra finds herself in a hostile, alien world where every day is a battle for survival against unknown creatures and harsh environments. As she navigates this new world, she uncovers its secrets and learns to harness its power, hoping to find a way back to her brother.

Meanwhile, Célestin faces a different kind of challenge. Left alone in their once familiar world, he grapples with the trauma of losing Alexandra and the pressure of his family falling apart. As he delves deeper into the mysteries of their separation, Célestin discovers hidden strengths and new allies in his quest to reunite with his sister.

Together, yet apart, the twins must grow and overcome their own fears, hoping that the thread that connects their dreams will eventually lead them back to each other.

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Slay the enemies in the silence of the moment. Run through the world of Shinobi full of monsters and ninja actions. Grab Oborozuki, the legendary sword, and slay evil once more. Your clan and the world are counting on you.

name: Gates of Siberia
summary: Racing with elements of survival and role-playing system. Travel to locations from all over the world, survive, participate in competitions, complete tasks and keep your travel blog in the new part of Wildland!

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Sneaking DLC Pack
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Equip yourself with this DLC pack containing a special set of stealth gear for Snake, including new uniforms, faces, and equipment, available in-game in METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER.
Pack Includes:
Uniform: Battle Dress (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Sneaking Suit (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Crocodile Suit​
Uniform: Naked (Woodland)
Uniform: Naked (Ammunition Belt)
Uniform: Gold
Face: Glasses
Face: Sunglasses
Equipment: Kerotan Mask
Equipment: GA-KO Mask

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The same gripping story and engrossing world, but now with cutting-edge graphics and 3D audio, which bring the jungle to life. Get ready for the ultimate survival, stealth and action experience.

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Digital Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes both the game and the Sneaking DLC Pack at a reduced price.
Includes:
・METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER
・Sneaking DLC Pack
Uniform: Battle Dress (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Sneaking Suit (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Crocodile Suit​
Uniform: Naked (Woodland)​
Uniform: Naked (Ammunition Belt)
Uniform: Gold
Face: Glasses
Face: Sunglasses
Equipment: Kerotan Mask
Equipment: GA-KO Mask

name: Windborn: Wings of Fate
summary: Soar through the sky and master the wind!

name: Slimes & Dusters TO
summary: Lead an army of slimes on the offensive against the dusters that have invaded your planet and restore your home to its former glory in this Tower Offense game!

name: Stellar Code
summary: Mysterious phenomena from space. A researcher's fatal accident. Cryptic codes engraved on an unknown material. Together with your brilliant sister-in-law, you must unravel a mystery that could determine the fate of Earth. A sci-fi mystery visual novel of discovery and suspense.

name: Carnival Massacre
summary: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park.

name: Tomboy Adventure 2
summary: Start a relaxing adventure together with your (girl) friend!

name: Rayless Blade
summary: Venture into an unforgiving, open world and struggle alongside your team to one day, possibly, escape your terrible destiny.

name: Rangingstrike
summary: Master the three weapons that change according to the humanoid robot form and fighter form, destroy the scattered enemy attack targets, and finally defeat the boss standing in your way!

name: Tales of the Shire
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Welcome home, Hobbit! Live the cosy life of a Hobbit in the wonderfully serene landscape of the Shire. Discover, decorate, & share in this idyllic corner of Middle-earth. Join friendly Hobbits & familiar faces awaiting your arrival in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game.
storyline:
Create your own Hobbit as you set forth in Bywater. Though not yet established as an official village in Hobbiton, play a part in helping the quaint town flourish. Greet comfort at the door as you decorate your own Hobbit hole, tend to your garden, fish at the clear ponds, forage wild fruits and herbs, or trade with townsfolks. Prepare homemade meals to share with fellow Hobbits and foster relationships.

With much to see and lots more to eat, enjoy days of splendor in the picturesque forests, lakes, and pastures.

Unwind in the place where what matters most are all the little things. Help bring the community together to achieve village status in Bywater. Experience delight in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game.

name: Cotton Reboot! High Tension!
summary: Sequel to Cotton Reboot!

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact
summary: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is an upcoming Hunter x Hunter fighting game, developed by Eighting and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: Stronghold: Crusader - Definitive Edition
summary: Gird your loins and sharpen your steel! Besiege 20 unique enemy lords and battle friends online, in this expanded remaster of the classic 'castle sim'. Relive history with new units, AI opponents, visuals, audio, campaigns, skirmish trails, co-op and larger maps.

name: Atomic Owl
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Atomic Owl is a pixel art-based single-player, side-scrolling roguelike that combines fast-paced platforming with dynamic hack-and-slash combat and a variety of weapons, powerups, and a demonic blade. Journey through eight roguelike zones, save your friends, and take up arms against Omega Wing!

name: Swap
summary:
Swap - third person adventure game. Explore colorful planets with unique landscapes, atmosphere and other features. From sand dunes to ice fields. Remember, each planet hides its own secrets.

Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles using the cat skills of your four-legged friend. Jump, climb, slide and use your cat instincts to get to the finish line.

Collect various objects and discover new mechanics.

Meet charismatic characters. With hostile alien creatures that will prevent you from reaching your goal.

Feel all the fear of the unknown in the skin of a small cat. To overcome all the obstacles, you need dexterity, agility, curiosity, inquisitiveness and an extra 9 lives.

Swap is a game that will make you fall in love with it from the first "meow", with its exciting gameplay, picturesque and varied locations, interesting puzzles, adventurous spirit, as well as a fluffy and cute main character. The game will become your new and ideal way to spend time with interest.
storyline:
A man and a cat exchange bodies.
A person in a cat's body needs to find his human body and exchange them back

name: Retro Game Store Simulator
summary: Build your own Video Game Store in 1984. Everyday until the end of 1989 gives you the opportunity to stock shelves, cycle your inventory, manage your prices, analyze historical trends to make your game store profitable. Use era-relevant technology and systems to prove that gaming has a future!
storyline: Bring a game store back to life in the 1980s.

name: Code Violet
summary:
Developed by TeamKill Media, Code Violet is a third-person action horror game, where you take on the role of Violet Sinclair, a girl plucked from the past who must unravel the mysteries of the Aion Bioengineering Complex as she avoids, hides or fights against the creatures who have overrun it.

With the evacuation protocol in effect, Violet’s main goal is to escape the complex and save those she cares for, but with the creatures and a mysterious Director doing all in their power to stop you, will you get out alive?
storyline:
In the 25th Century it is said that mankind narrowly survived a cataclysm that left Earth uninhabitable and in ruins. What was left of the human race looked to the stars for a new world: Trappist 1-E, where they would rebuild and start again.

However, those who had survived the cataclysm, were sterile and could not produce children and without a solution mankind would soon go extinct.

Earth’s last survivors, a colony known as Aion, decide they will use their technology to jump to different periods in time, extract women and bring them back to their base on Trappist 1-E to be surrogates and prevent mankind’s extinction.

However, what seems like good intentions, hides dark truths and when Violet Sinclair is plucked from her time and relocated to Trappist 1-E, she finds herself in a conflict of conspiracy and survival as the true intentions of Aion reveal themselves.

name: 180 Seconds: A Firefighter's Call
summary: 180 Seconds is all about choices and consequences. Arriving at the scene of a fire, you will have only 3-5 minutes to rescue people from a burning building. You must decide what to prioritize once inside. Can you save everyone or will your choices seal the fate of those depending on you?

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 7
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

name: Pale Coins
summary: Pale Coins is an Action RPG set in a fantasy world with challenging combat, open world exploration and a variety of items. Traverse old forests, dark caves, weathered ruins and unknown places, to find the Champion's Coin and fulfill your greatest wish.

name: Ascend
summary: Ascend is an adventure puzzle game where a young woman must navigate to the top of a mystical mountain learning the secrets of both the past and the future to find the balance in all aspects of life.

name: Mystery Trails
summary: Delve into a first-person atmospheric adventure game, where you’re a mountain rescuer and a hiking guide who has just received information about an accident in the area. You know it might be too late for the victims, and soon you realize something strange happened out there.
storyline:
The year 1910, you’re a mountain rescuer and a hiking guide who has just received information about an accident in the area.
Your instinct tells you that this time it’s not going to be a regular one and it might be too late for the victims.
Soon after that you find a body and realize something strange happened out there, and it’s up to you to find out what it was.

In order to get the answers you’re seeking, you’ll also have to use your detective abilities.
You’re not a private investigator, but you’ll have to become one.
Think outside of the box, look for hidden details and interview potential witnesses.
Keep in mind that the weather won’t allow you to take it slow, time pressure is on you!

name: Essentures
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Indie
summary: Essentures is inspired by the great games of the 90s and late 80s. You will experience a grand story driven adventure through 4 lore rich kingdoms wherein you can catch and collect mysterious creatures, using them as allies or weapons!
storyline:
The mysterious Essentures creatures always habited the world and made human survival harder, everything only changed when humanity made weapons from these creatures, with all that power, humanity turned on themselves with wars and destructive conflicts, this was stopped only when a Emperor chosen by the Divinessen (the Gods of this world) created a unified world. After a period of peace at his last days, he need to choose a sucessor, a champioship was made by the Gods: One who passes the 7 trials of Seven Wonders will be the sucessor, as a gift every candidate will receive the Gauntlet, a device that let you use Essentures no more only as weapons, but as allies.

However not everything is how it looks, you are someone who has been trained the whole life to take down the deceitful Gods who appear to just pulling the strings for their reals purposes. So ally with your Essentures partners to take down the Gods and burn their champioship down!

name: Alliance Peacefighter
summary: A linear, story-driven space sim in the style of 90s classics like X-Wing and Wing Commander. As a newly qualified Alliance pilot, you find yourself caught up in a plot to break the fragile peace between two galactic super powers.
storyline: As a newly qualified Alliance pilot, you find yourself caught up in a plot to break the fragile peace between two galactic super powers.

name: Idle Craft
summary: Start from the most basic elements and help your World evolve through the timeline of progress. Merge elements, unlock new discoveries, and enjoy a satisfying blend of idle and strategic gameplay! And you know what? Your World continues to evolve even while you're away!

name: Dreamwalker
summary:
Dreamwalker is a top-down story RPG game with deckbuilding combat.

Embark on a journey through dreams and nightmares in Dreamwalker, a 2D top-down RPG set in a mesmerizing pixel art world. You are a wandering traveler, drawn to a small village shrouded in mystery and cursed by an ancient evil.

name: Operation Zero
summary: Grab your biggest gun and jump into this story-driven top-down run-and-gun sci-fi arcade shooter starring the ultimate bio-engineered hero-manchild TASKILLER!

name: Blueprint Bob
summary: Stack, twist, and balance your way to record-breaking heights. Create the tallest, most daring structures imaginable, and help Bob reach for the sky!

name: Dare to Lucid Dream
summary: For the first time in years, Sonny meets a person he knows inside of his lucid dreams and, to his surprise, Sonny discovers that what he says and does in his dreams directly affects the people he dreamed about.

name: You Die Today
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Combine deck-building and dice-rolling in this tabletop-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler! Roll D4s, D6s, D20s, and more to activate powerful card abilities and conquer dynamic encounters.

name: Monster Train 2
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Card & Board Game
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: It's time to raise Hell in Heaven! Monster Train returns with all new clans, new enemy factions, new challenges, new modes and more! Defend your Pyre in the classic three-tiered, vertical gameplay that made the original roguelike deckbuilder a hit.
storyline:
Powerful beings known as Titans have seized control of Heaven. A makeshift alliance is formed between former angels and demons, who must learn to work together against their common foe.

Now, you must command these clans aboard newly forged trains, and embark on your journey through Hell, Heaven, and the Abyss, to defeat the Titans before they destroy this world.

Chaos awaits beyond the gates!

name: DeadWire
summary: Hack, link, and shoot in a fast-paced top-down cyberpunk shooter. Create devastating chain reactions to outwit enemies, break records and save your childhood mentor from a ruthless syndicate

name: Spring Tales
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.

name: Better Mart
summary: Welcome to Better Mart, a dynamic management game where you create, customize, and grow the ultimate supermarket! Combining fun and strategy, this game gives you complete freedom to design a unique store, attract customers, and maximize your profits.
storyline: In Better Mart, you have full control over every aspect of your supermarket. Choose the layout of your aisles, arrange products efficiently, and optimize customer flow to ensure a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience. Keep your shelves stocked, monitor market trends, and adjust your prices to outsmart the competition.

name: Wordatro!
summary: Discover Wordatro!, a simple and easy-to-get-into single-player roguelite. Form words to accumulate points and unlock bonuses. With over 50 bonuses and challenges to refresh each game, Wordatro! is perfect for fans of word games and strategy.

name: Toward Dawn
summary: Inspired by Welsh mythology, experience a classic fantasy RPG adventure focusing on recovery after traumatic events. Customise your abilities, craft new equipment and Break your enemies in strategic turn-based combat.

name: Cast n Chill
storyline: Cast n Chill is a cozy idle fishing game where you explore serene lakes, rivers, and oceans. Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - with your loyal pup by your side.

name: ReCharge RC: High Voltage
summary: Drift your way into ReCharge RC: High Voltage! Customize your vehicle, Create your very own race tracks, Share them online and race your friends best times with global online leaderboards. Created by an RC enthusiast, for RC enthusiasts!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: AquaDream
summary: Guide your anglerfish through intricate underwater mazes. Collect stars, solve puzzles, and avoid perilous obstacles. Experience a captivating deep-sea adventure filled with hidden treasures and mysteries in this immersive aquatic world.
storyline: Explore the dark marine abysses in AquaDream, a captivating puzzle game. Take on the role of a brave anglerfish and solve complex puzzles in the heart of underwater labyrinths. Find hidden keys, activate towers to open new passages, and follow ocean currents precisely to avoid deadly traps with the goal of escaping.

name: Auto-Crisis
summary: You're driving away on a forest road, late at night, under a heavy storm. Your car breaks down. Luckily, there might be a gas station nearby. But a misfortune never comes alone. The storm has brought something else, something otherworldly that oddly smells of spilled diesel oil.

name: Slime Attack: Survivor
summary:
Slime Attack: Survivor is a roguelike action bullet heaven game where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into intense battles against waves of dynamic slimes and formidable bosses. Customize your character with unique gear and spells, and navigate through thrilling quests to unlock new content. With strategic resource management and heart-pounding action, every run is a new adventure.

Think you have what it takes to take on the slime invasion and become the ultimate survivor? Prove it!
storyline:
In a world where humans lived in peace and harmony, everything changed when mysterious portals began appearing across the land. From these portals emerged a new threat: slimes of all shapes and sizes, wreaking havoc on the once tranquil world.

These weren't just ordinary slimes; some were Yonian Slimes, a rare and dangerous breed capable of transforming into other species. These transformations gave rise to formidable bosses, each with unique abilities and powers that challenged even the bravest of warriors.

As the slime invasion grew more intense, humanity's survival hung in the balance. It was up to the heroes to rise, defend their world, and close the portals once and for all. Armed with customizable gear, powerful spells, and sheer determination, they embarked on a journey to reclaim their homeland from the slime menace.

name: Campus Fantasy
summary: Start with one billion! You will transform into the male protagonist of Shuangwen and go to school. Sports cars and airplanes are just your means of transportation. Villa beauties are also your standard equipment. With the ability to make money, you are the Veyron for school!

name: A Directionless Cycle
summary: 2D Sokoban game where you control multiple tiles, with different directions, at the same time.

name: The Black Vault
summary: You play as a software engineer who just came back from his job and got a message from his friend that a hacking group called "The Black Vault" is recruiting new members. Throughout the night you'll be given different tasks you'll have to complete in order to get into the group. As the night continues, you gather the attention of some shady people that will try to stop you from getting into The Black Vault. You must crack into servers and devices in order to obtain valuable information while avoiding getting murdered by a bunch of Deep Web killers.

name: Adhvan Chakra
summary: Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.

name: You Have A Delivery
summary: You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game, inspired by action-comedy films. Take down the mafia in one night: rip apart your enemies, unlock guns and perks, and deliver unstoppable chaos. You're the only one who can pull it off. Can you deliver it?

name: Öooo
summary: A Bomb Caterpillar's Big Adventure! "Öooo" is a charming yet mysterious exploration puzzle platformer where you discover creative ways to use bombs!

name: Medix
summary: How much can a person endure, and what is the true value of human life? In this minimalist real-time strategy game about war medics, you fight for your own survival and that of others while the army is under constant pressure, retreating from a superior enemy. A narrative campaign, accompanied by hand-drawn illustrations, takes you through the story of physicians pushed to their breaking point in their fight for a sliver of hope.

name: Find or be Found
summary:
Find or Be Found is an asymmetric co-op horror game. Go on heists as a pair of burglars looking for the most valuable items in haunted houses. Locate the specific item to earn money and progress, but search for too long, and unimaginable horrors will awaken.

Play as either the hacker or the robber. Only the hacker knows what to steal and where to find it, and only the robber inside the house can grab it. Communication is key.

name: Alien Market Simulator
summary: Run a market on your space station. Restore and upgrade the station, expand your services, and sell to a variety of alien customers. Experience the challenge of managing a business in space and growing your market

name: Blasted Dice
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: Blasted Dice is a roguelike deckbuilder where you assemble a deck of dice to blow up your enemies. Achieve masterful combos, acquire legendary items, meet strange characters and blow up your enemies with your very own dice launcher.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings
summary: Restore the Elder Giants to their rightful place as masters of the Astral Sea, in the Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings Expansion. Explore the ruins of their fallen empire, seek out forgotten crystal magic to empower your armies, and delve for forgotten treasures deep beneath the earth. Contains a new giant ruler type, dwelling and hand crafted regions to explore.

name: Void Sails
summary: Void Sails is a single-player adventure where you captain a flying ship across uncharted space. Sail through mysterious worlds, battle powerful foes, and make story-defining choices. Uncover dark secrets in a game where every discovery could bring you closer to the truth—or to madness.

name: Fogpiercer
summary: Build your train to build your deck. Fight off bandits in a post apocalyptic world. Progress and unlock new train combinations with synergies. Get drivers to their final destinations.

name: Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant
summary: Eldrea is calling once again. Eldrea needs you. One. More. Time. Ashes of Elrant is the official DLC for the highly acclaimed Chained Echoes, offering you more of what you enjoyed so much. Meet all your beloved characters and answer the call as the Crimson Wings are needed once again.

name: Sofia in Exchange for Lies
summary: Peek into the sins and memories of five personalities through surveillance cameras. This is an immersive, mystery adventure game that unravels the thoughts of the dark past that lie dormant inside Sofia, a suspect in the murder of a presidential candidate, and uncovers the truth behind the crime.

name: And Roger
summary: It was a morning like all others, until she realized her dad wasn't home. In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she "takes her medicine". Who is he? Where is dad?

name: Expedition to the Backrooms
summary: You are the exploration team from company Async, you arrive to reported anomaly place and searching for anomalies, but what would you find? Prepare yourself for a gripping and heart-pounding adventure in EXPEDITION TO THE BACKROOMS, where every step could be your last.

name: Hell Clock
summary: Forge powerful builds with endless loot in this relentless combination of Roguelike and ARPG. Blast through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos.

name: Evil Timefall
summary: Evil Timefall - hardcore FPS, where you fight against medieval evil. Immerse yourself in dark horror, where you kill zombie knights, witches and demons. Dive into the meat slaughter, where cruel enemies attack you from the darkness. Upgrade guns to execute more servants of the bloody lord.

name: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World
summary: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer where you travel across the coolest places on earth to defeat all the monsters and find all the mythological secret there! Now let's jump, shoot, slide, and defeat all the monsters! LET'S GO!

name: Rogue Loops
summary: Rogue Loops is a roguelite action game where a trapped family battles to escape an endless loop. Combine unique skills and relics to create powerful synergies against the loop’s guardians. As you grow stronger, so does the loop—can you break free from this relentless cycle?

name: Smash It Wild
summary: Smash It Wild is a tactical turn-based game combining volleyball and dodgeball in a fantasy universe. Upgrade your players and defeat your opponents in an intense roguelike competition!

name: Spray Paint Simulator
summary: Sit back, relax and express your creative side in the colorful world of Spray Paint Simulator. Enter the town of Spatterville, meet the locals while you restore, repair, mask and spray paint everything from a kitchen to local landmarks. Buy new equipment, unlock Free Spray and transform the town.
developers: Whitethorn Games, North Star Video Games

name: Weldiver
summary:
Each mission in Weldiver is a journey into the ocean’s depths, where players undertake the challenging work of maintaining offshore structures, performing emergency repairs, and replacing seabed infrastructure like optical cables, pipelines, and power lines.

Forty times more likely to die than the average worker... and every time I go down, the pressure waits. Trying to make me implode, drown, freeze... or worse.
themes: Action, Fantasy, Horror, Survival, Open world
storyline:
In the depths of the world, where light fades and danger rises...
I chose the most dangerous job in the world… Not because I wanted to, but because someone has to.
I’m an underwater welder.

I keep the bridges standing... the dams from breaking... oil pipes from leaking... and the giants of the sea from sinking into the abyss

My office? 1,300 feet beneath the surface... where no human should be.

One meter down... you lose 1% of your chance to survive. I live on the edge of life and death.
Months away, lost in the vast, dark ocean. No one knows what’s down there. Maybe nothing... maybe something worse.
Forty times more likely to die than the average worker... and every time I go down, the pressure waits. Trying to make me implode, drown, freeze... or worse.

This job doesn’t just need skill. It needs nerves of steel.
I miss my family... my wife... my little girl..
Because down here... one mistake, and you're never coming back up.

But someone must brave the depths and maintance the world.
It's not just a job. It's a life... a battle... a fight for survival.
Welcome to the depths. Welcome to my world.

Weldiver

name: Mobs 'N Monsters
summary: Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!
storyline:
Where do monsters of the world go after Halloween? When the towns are already terrorized? What about those kind-hearted monsters who’d just prefer a quiet life away from human judgment?

It just so happens that Doctor Malice has opened her castle gates to all monsters- scaley, slimey, or covered in fur. All are welcome to stay as long as they please... so long as they volunteer for an experiment here or there.

But life in Shiverfall Peaks isn’t as peaceful as the monsters hoped. Local villagers soon became aware of the outcasts’ refuge, and did what they do best- form an angry mob!

Will you let them run your monstrous crew out with torches and pitchforks, or will you fight for your place in this wicked world?

name: Blind Exposure
summary: Navigate through claustrophobic, completely dark world illuminated only by scans you manage to create; listen carefully to sounds coming from the darkness, and don’t let dread and paranoia get to you.

name: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dive into Ayasa, a dark and mysterious platformer where light and shadow hold the key to survival. Journey through six haunting lands, solve challenging puzzles and restore balance to a world on the brink of collapse.
storyline: The Inverted World was once a harmonious place where good and evil coexisted, maintained by Tas, the Absolute. But now, darkness threatens to engulf everything, and Ayasa must embark on a perilous journey through the devastated lands of Faith, Hope, Love, Greed, Indifference, and Betrayal. Only by finding the remnants of Tas’s light can Ayasa hope to restore balance and save the world from complete destruction.

name: Spectral Prison
summary: Trapped in an endless cycle, David Echo must navigate haunted houses and terrifying dimensions to escape the sinister warden. Find hidden keys, avoid monsters, and break free from the nightmare. Can you survive?

name: Nubs!
summary: Slap yourself into the absurdity of Nubs, where 5-player battles are as chaotic as they are quick! Risk it all for the mighty Konzumos' delight in this arena brawler and smash the others to nublivion in your quest for glory! Simple rules? Check. Roguelite progression? Sure. Predictability? No way!

name: Deep Copy
summary: Deep Copy is a top down point-and-click literary adventure set in a hand-painted science fiction world. Awakened with no memory, you must solve puzzles and navigate a branching story to piece together the dense, interconnected mystery at the heart of the lab.

name: Red Rocket Defencism
