summary: You, a military officer from our great autocratic motherland, must protect our precious rockets from the evil capitalist enemy in this revolutionary base building strategy game. Bribe! Surveil! Purge! Imbibe! The end justifies the means when you have to protect our invaluable rockets!

name: Armed Decobot
summary: Armed Decobot is a unique blend of Beat 'Em Up and Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up mechanics inspired by Treasure and Metal Slug. It seamlessly combines the crowd control & throw heavy melee combat of Beat 'Em Ups with the intense dodge & shoot gameplay of Shmups. It's fast paced, it's difficult, it's chaotic, it's a pure unbound arcade action game! A quick burst of adrenaline to start the day!

name: Runeborn
summary: Runeborn is a dark fantasy roguelike that merges deckbuilding with a slot-machine-like mechanic. Forge your runebook, crush enemies, and combine trinkets of boundless power to destroy the forces of Despair!

name: Project Rogueteers
summary:
Third-Person "PVE" Co-op Shooter with Roguelite Elements
In the year 3000, humanity's last stand against sentient AI is at a stalemate. Choose your hero and unite in the digital world in a showdown against shadow algorithms.

Enter the Nullverse.
Everything happens in a virtual multiverse, where each world offers a unique adventure waiting to be discovered.

Choose your upgrades, and customize each run.
This world is full of possibilities with random abilities, diverse enemies, and ever-changing maps, the only certainty in Project Rogueteers is uncertainty.

Unlock Rogueteers, and flex their abilities.
You'll discover a diverse array of characters, each equipped with their unique abilities.

Ass whoop challenging bosses in co-op.
Gear up and rally your teammates to devise strategic plans that will help you vanquish your foes and conquer every mission.
storyline: In the year 3000, humanity's last stand against sentient AI is at a stalemate. After decades of physical combat, they realize victory lies in the virtual realm. Choose your hero and unite in the digital world in a showdown against shadow algorithms. Welcome to the Virtual Rebellion -- where destiny is coded in ones and zeros

name: Forlorn Souls of Wicked Past
summary: "Eldritch Verdict": A dark fairy tale turn-based card game. Strategic planning and battle execution shape your adventure amid challenges. Progression customizes character growth for a deep, replayable experience.

name: Yakuza Wars
summary:
Yakuza Wars is an upcoming mobile game developed by BBGame and SEGA.
It's a strategic game based on the Like a Dragon series with many characters from the original series.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: A Pirate's Fortune
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: "A Pirate's Fortune" is the second story expansion for Star Wars Outlaws, an open world action adventure game from Ubisoft. The Trailblazer’s reputation precedes Kay as she runs into veteran pirate Hondo Ohnaka, who is looking to settle old scores with a ruthless gang of pirates.

name: Sea of Stars: Throes of the Watchmaker
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: This Sea of Stars DLC finds the Solstice Warriors Valere and Zale venturing into the miniature clockwork world of Horloge. In this magical land where denizens are threatened by a cursed carnival, our heroes will need to adapt to unfamiliar rules if their Sun and Moon powers are to manifest.

name: Mightreya
genres: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Join schoolgirl superhero Reya and her manager Nio as they embark on their journey as Hero Content Creators, fighting monstrous beings that emerge daily from a dimension beyond. Anime-inspired, heart-pounding hero action is waiting for you!

name: The Dreamers Foresight
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Embark on a dreamlike journey as a ninja in this roguelite adventure, shaping your world with randomized biome tiles, align similar Tiles for better loot. Build a powerful deck from a variety set of cards while balancing your energy to battle relentless nightmare creatures.

name: Skyline Savior
summary: Control Sam’s car in Skyline Savior with arcadey movement, jumping, dashing, slow motion, and downforce skills. Conquer obstacles in regular, pretty hard, and impossible modes for the ultimate challenge.

name: FaeTerra
summary: Collect and battle with 121 unique creatures, manage your team, level-up, and evolve your Fae's. Summon them into battle and create impactful synergies and defeat your opponents in PVP!

name: Polyaris
summary: Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing game set in a post-nuclear, procedurally generated Arctic world. Survive the cold, ski through icy wastelands, find essential resources, fight enemies, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.
storyline: The main character is an engineer working in a remote northern outpost, living somewhere in the far north on the border of Norway and Russia. The game begins with the onset of a nuclear war. Since the protagonist is in the distant north, he is not directly affected, but he loses contact with the outside world.

name: Ultimate Jello Party
summary: Ultimate Jello Party is a multiplayer party game that combines elements of card, board and minigame battles. Challenge up to 3 friends and mess up the game with your strategies! Earn coins, plan your moves, collect and accumulate jellies to become the big winner.

name: Nora: In Search of Hidden Ingredients
summary: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.

name: Mystopia
summary: Mystopia is a relaxing sandbox game about building your own worlds and crafting magical potions. Discover blocks inspired by witchcraft, use potions for mystifying effects and build your dream worlds! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Caution Ahead: Part 2
summary:
This is the second installment of a three-part series featuring a run-and-hide type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park.

After the events of Part I, John continues his relentless search and rescue mission. He must venture further into the depths of Richburg National Park before it's too late to save both Michelle and Elena.

* Chapter 4: The search.
* Chapter 5: Run for your life.
* Chapter 6: Almost there.
storyline: John Rand, a search and rescue officer determined to find Michelle and Elena, continues his journey deeper into the shadows of Richburg National Park. Uncover the dark secrets lurking within the park in this three-part series.

name: Sinned Arena
summary: Sinned Arena is a classic arena shooter inspired by timeless 90s games. You are trapped in Hell with other unfortunate souls, fighting among each other for demons twisted pleasures. Fight for your way out this dark place but beware, demons aren't there just to watch.

name: Cozy Dungeons
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch
summary: Explore deadly dungeons, clear them out of enemies and renovate them in Cozy Dungeons, a one-of-a-kind adventure/interior design game!

name: A Ruthless World
summary: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, 80s-inspired platformer world.

name: ToHeart
summary: Remake of the ToHeart visual novel with characters drawn in full 3D.

name: Sheep Sweep
summary: Sheep gone missing! Join a goofy solo or coop adventure. Use various tools in a fully flammable world, crack unique puzzles, bypass obstacles and safely recover all the missing sheep.

name: Coding Day
summary: In "Coding Day", you are a videogame developer whose project is about to be released, but a sinister entity threatens its publication, and you must survive it throughout the night in a dark office building full of mysteries and dangers.

name: A Building Full of Cats 2
summary: Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats! In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks. Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?

name: Biped 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Adorable robots are back to save the day! Explore an unknown planet in this puzzle action-adventure game and experiment with our unique, innovative mechanics solo or in co-op with up to 4 players!

name: Into the Restless Ruins
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder where you build the dungeon you fight through. Each night use your cards to expand the ruins then battle through them harvesting Glimour from the residents, so The Maiden may grant your heart’s desire. But be warned - eventually your trespassing will awaken The Warden.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Bridges & Ports
summary: Livelier coasts are now available with this new expansion, Bridges & Ports! With a new set of tools you are now able to create a bustling port to your city, and add beautiful new details like draw bridges and lighthouses.

name: The Sacrifice
summary: Immerse yourself in this dark atmospheric puzzle game set in the region of Salem in the 17th century! Help Sarah guide her father with her magical play board and avoid the many dangers of The Sacrifice.

name: Little Oceania
summary: Little Oceania is a minimal strategy building game. Create a delightful medieval kingdom in the middle of the ocean by placing cute miniature structures. Plan your space well, earn money, discover new buildings and biomes, and continually expand your picturesque island kingdom.

name: Headlice
summary: Headlice is a reverse horror game where you play as an escaped biological abomination fleeing an inept corporation. Embrace your parasitic nature and become the monster you were meant to be.

name: Subversive Memories
summary: A classic survival horror game set in the obscure backrooms of an old dictatorship. Unravel an ancient mystery, escape ominous presences, and scavenge every corner of this land.
storyline:
Renata is searching for her ██████. They suddenly disappeared during the darkest era of a South American military regime and media censorship.

Trying to find answer to fill the void left in her life, she follows a promising track to an abandoned military research base.

However, she soon finds out that this place holds secrets beyond her comprehension and that her obsession might cost her a price she can't pay.

name: Amnea28: Two Eternities
summary: A group of university students is going to spend a week in the old hotel "Amnea". Within these seven days they have to find out what is hidden behind its facade and to unravel all the mysteries without losing their minds.

name: Squirrels Gone Nuts
summary: Squirrels Gone Nuts is a fast-paced, multiplayer, arena shooter. Play as a speedy squirrel able to run on any surface and wield various guns. Procedurally generated arenas paired with an innovative game mode that blends capture the flag with king of the hill ensures a fresh experience every match.

name: My Drug Cartel
summary: My Drug Cartel is a drug plantation management game with basebuilding and combat elements. Expand your plantation, hire workers, research new drugs and construct buildings. But be ready to face a heavy response by law enforcement by hiring guards, buying weapons and ammunition and building defences.

name: Sunflowers and the Goddess of Death
summary: A classic style, story-driven RPG centered around a young woman determined to protect her people from fel beasts and the interminable greed of men, all while struggling against the manipulation of a goddess who seems to want nothing more than to paint the world a flowing crimson...

name: Alchemy of the Earth
summary: Explore the dreamscape of an alchemist. Uncover his attempts to use alchemy to bring back the dead. Survive in a doomed world, where the alchemist's failed experiments linger behind, guarding his abandoned secrets.

name: Sol Cesto
summary: Sol Cesto is a tactical and frenetic roguelite in which you have to master your luck. Choose a hero and reach the bottom of a random dungeon. In this grim world, every action has consequences...

name: Shroomtopia
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Shroomtopia is a relaxing and atmospheric puzzle about manipulating soils and blending colors. Use your logical reasoning to solve challenges and help bring nature back to life.

name: Overnet
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Card & Board Game
summary: Forge a legendary legacy in this electrifying free-to-play Collectible Card Game where you can create your own characters, craft your cards to build perfect decks and engage in epic battles as you rise to become the supreme OverKnight.
storyline:
The energy that powers the Overnet, known as Quantum Bits (Q-Bits), exists outside the human-perceivable energy spectrum. It has the dual capacity to supply power and transmit information. However, contact with its overwhelming power destroys the integrity of the human body. Despite this danger, Q-Bits have the potential to improve technology performance and render other energy sources obsolete.

To interact with Q-Bits, Cybermask developed the Multi-Interface Neural Device (M.I.N.D.), allowing humans to transfer their consciousness directly to the OverNet. There, they manifest as OverKnights, avatars made of data. However, only 1% of the population is compatible with the M.I.N.D., prompting the ZOI to identify and provide compatible individuals with the necessary resources for exploration.

At the heart of the Institute lies the only portal to the Overnet yet discovered. OverKnights equipped with a M.I.N.D. can access this portal, leading to a replica of the institute within the Overnet a digital hub for all OverKnights operations.

All individuals equipped with a M.I.N.D. have autonomy over its use. However, they are encouraged to participate in controlled battles to study Q-Bits and improve their usability. OverKnights are ranked based on their performance in battles and rewarded accordingly.

In these battles, the M.I.N.D. manifests as a collection of 40 cards representing various actions, reactions, and artifacts. Players have the agency to customize their cards by combining different effects, costs, and conditions. Additionally, OverKnights can equip armored suits with various abilities to match their gameplay style.

When OverKnights are defeated in battle, their consciousness is safely returned to their real-life body before integration with the Overnet, preventing them from becoming ethereal entities.

name: Dark Lessons
summary: Can you survive your teacher in this psychological horror game? With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.

name: CleanFall
summary: CleanFall is a dynamic tower defense rogue-lite set in a post-apocalyptic subterranean ecosystem. Gather supplies as you descend the abyss, meeting oddities and strangers of every kind. Prepare yourself- the depths will not surrender their secrets easily.

name: Cauldron
summary: Cauldron is an upgrade-heavy, minigame-centric, turn-based RPG. Play minigames to strengthen your party, then fight battles to uncover more map, more heroes, more minigames, more everything! If your favorite plant is an upgrade tree, then this game is for you!

name: Kemono Teatime
summary: Relax in the world of Kemono Teatime, where animal ears are a normal part of everyday life. Here in Melodius, you can whip up whatever blends of tea you desire in your favorite cafe as you play through an adorable story. Come now and live out your bestest and cutest life—down to the last drop.
storyline:
Come on in! Here, we strive to make the remainder of our customers' lives as enjoyable as possible, so we've curated a cute space for everyone to relax and find peace in. We also have a great range of tea blends and delicious desserts on offer, so please make yourself at home.

Now, to get things started, how about a nice cup of tea blended just for you?

You caught that, right? The shop's only running for a maximum of 21 days. What kind of people and stories will you get to know during this time? And is the cafe really shutting down after that? Why open up a limited-time cafe to begin with, anyway? The truth is up to you to uncover!

name: Blood Sins
summary: Embark on a heroic quest in Harda, a kingdom threatened by dark forces from Wick. Unravel the mystery of Amrak's invasion, aided by allies like Jahnarr, Maugh, and Gonel. Your choices shape the fate of the realm. Can you restore peace to Harda?

name: Tidebound
summary: Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.

name: Mecha Break
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Mecha Break is a multiplayer mech game that allows players to choose from diverse mechs, customize appearances, and battle colossal war machines on treacherous terrain. Get ready for the ultimate showdown—blitz, brawl, blaze!
storyline:
Discover an array of assault, melee, sniper, reconnaissance, and support mechs, each with unique playstyles. Engage in immersive aerial and ground combat, employing strategic tactics for close and long-range encounters. Unleash devastating firepower, scorch foes with precision beams, and rain missiles upon the battlefield.

Prepare for adrenaline-pumping battles, lightning-fast maneuvers, and explosive firepower. Experience the essence of speed, power, and thrilling controls.

name: Prison Boss: Prohibition
platforms: Meta Quest 2, PlayStation VR2, SteamVR, Meta Quest 3
summary: Prison Boss Prohibition is a VR crafting game where you play as a shop owner smuggling prohibited stuff. Produce and sell beers, erotic magazines, cigarettes, and more! But watch out, the police are cracking down on contraband!

name: Revenge Crystal
summary: Revenge Crystal is an epic top-down action RPG. You explore a defeated world by unknown invaders as an amnesiac knight who must save the world and defeat the invaders by navigating through a world of interconnected challenges, fierce enemies, and intricate puzzles.

name: Speed Box
summary: Immerse yourself in "Speed Box," a unique puzzle game experience where strategic thinking meets captivating challenges. Developed by the innovative minds at Yellow Panda Games, Speed Box tests your problem-solving skills in a beautifully designed, minimalist world.

name: Battle of BackYard
summary: Engage in thrilling household air battles in this wacky game. Choose your role as a skilled pilot or a sharp-shooting gunner, and customize your aircraft to fit your preferred playstyle. Take on daring missions or challenge friends in multiplayer combat. Relive history and dominate the skies!
storyline:
War rages on in the backyards and peaceful rooms of suburbia!
Take to the skies in this thrilling WW2 air combat game, featuring 20 customizable planes from both Axis and Allied nations. With multiple factions to choose from and a variety of game modes, enjoy epic battles in both single-player and multiplayer

Select your role to fit your playstyle
Jump into the action as either a pilot or gunner, and master the skies with a powerful arsenal! Equip both primary and secondary weapons to suit your playstyle. As a gunner, take control of machine guns from your aircraft or man anti-aircraft defenses to protect your base. Unleash devastating firepower with rockets, torpedoes, and bombs—or get creative with special weapons like the "Rubber Duck of Doom"!

Complete objectives like picking up keys, opening doors, and destroying enemy airfields and dioramas. Cause chaos as you drop support items, build AA guns, and even obliterate porcelain in your mission to dominate the battlefield!

Show your friends who’s the master of the house in Multiplayer mode!
Host your own local multiplayer chaos—no servers, no limits! Whether it’s a kitchen skirmish or backyard showdown, you’re always ready to battle. Customize the scenarios to create the wackiest, most intense fights for up to 32 players. With fast-paced, competitive modes and ridiculous action, get ready for hilarious, non-stop dogfights where anything can happen (including rubber ducks of doom and laser pointers?)!

Key Features:
Over 20 customizable planes: and more to come after Global Launch

Dynamic role-switching: Pilot, gunner, or AA specialist—you choose how to fight and strategize in every battle.

Epic multiplayer (up to 32 players): Work together or prank your friends in wild, unpredictable matches.

Editor: Think you can do better? Design and share your own for endless replayability!

Powerful pickups: Collect resources and wacky weapons like ducks(!), to gain the edge over your enemies and upgrade your war machine.

name: Paperhead
summary:
PAPERHEAD is a fast-paced FPS game set in a world where everything is made out of cardboard and paper but is infested with horror!
Use a pencil as a weapon and explore what exactly went wrong in the secret research facility and why suddenly papercut people were able to...bleed.
Paperhead's Main Features

- Cardboard cute style with a horror twist. Cute but horrifying!

- Brutal and fast-paced combat. Slide to throw enemies in the air, kick explosive barrels into them (or enemies themselves!), and jump onto them Mario-style.

- Use a Pencil as a weapon. Draw a bomb to explode enemies!

- Use a Pencil as a reality-warping puzzle-solving tool. Not sure how to get through? Try to draw a door on the wall!

WHY WOULD PAPER...BLEED?

name: Ammossum
summary: Dive into this action roguelite as a brave Possum, shooting down crowds of crazy beasts. Drink cactus booze, ride your train through the deserts, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts! Whistling bullets, explosions, flying arrows, mines, fire, and acid — bring this chaos under control!

name: Mimic
summary: A multiplayer survival horror game where players must choose their allies carefully to survive imminent danger. In this social-deduction game players won't know who to trust with their lives.

name: Vangaro Tactics
summary: Command colorful troops into tactical turn-based battles in Vangaro Tactics! Infiltrate enemy outposts on the Stealth Missions: mine, recruit, move wisely, and you'll stand a chance. Know your commanders and exclusive units to make the most of each faction.

name: Mutants Ate My Carrots
summary: A fairytale forest in decay. A black rabbit ready to fight... and a king lion who only looks out for himself. Unlock new skills and discover who stole your carrots in a humorous adventure full of fun puzzles and mutated kickass moves.

name: Dino Tower Arena
summary: Lets beat'em all! In this dinosaur combat roguelike, you will build and upgrade your own dinosaur with lots of special abilities and fight over enemy dinosaurs while going up the floors of a enormous tower

name: Escape The Charon
summary: Escape the Charon is a sci-fi adventure meant to be played in one sitting. An ancient alien artifact has been brought to the space station Charon - soon after, the Charon goes dark. James West must search for clues and solve the mystery to discover what went wrong.

name: Disco Samurai
genres: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!
developers: We Dig Games, Pixel Fiber Games
storyline:
The world has gone mad for Disco Samurai – a game set in the cyberpunk metaverse known as Disco. Everyone is playing it – your neighbor, your boss and probably even your least favorite politician. People are not only purchasing virtual real estate, cars and designer clothes, but they’re even insuring them! Sounds crazy? You tell me – since the game’s release, the world’s crime rate has decreased by over 77%! Why rot in jail for minor offenses, when in Disco you can become a notorious bounty hunter without facing any consequences?

The story follows Fox – a rebellious student who wants to make a name for herself in the world of architecture and fine arts. Since virtual vandalism and spilling pixel blood are more her style than attending lectures, the world of Disco is about to learn a new definition of “brutalism”.

name: The Crazy Hyper-Dungeon Chronicles
summary: Dive into a 2D roguelite dungeon-crawler with top-down views in glorious pixel art. Experience turn-based combat with arcade thrills, where weapons are extensions of your character with unique abilities. Each level is its own universe, endlessly reinventing itself for ever-changing challenges.

name: The Chronos Event
summary: The Chronos Event is a fast-paced third-person shooter that emphasizes the tactics of time travel and fast, aggressive play. Players rewind time, battling alongside their younger selves against overwhelming opposition.

name: Cute Survivors The Musical
summary: A musical rogue-like adventure where you lead a band of adorable cats. Feel the rhythm-based abilities to unlock new band members, levels, and songs. Each member brings unique instruments and abilities, allowing you to overcome the hordes of enemies with the power of music!

name: KnockedDown
summary: Race as a cop, take down criminals in this thrilling low-poly game. Fast action, challenging obstacles. Join the chase!

name: Private Military Manager: Tactical Auto Battler
summary: You are the CEO of a private military company. Recruit capable mercenaries, purchase weapons, and develop your mercenaries according to their roles and characteristics. Observe how your mercenaries perform in combat and plan your tactics to ensure mission success.
storyline: The player is the CEO of a private military company based in Cordivia, South America during the 1990s. The cartels are rapidly growing, and the government and local police are quickly becoming corrupt. Rebels are constantly seeking to start a civil war, and intelligence agencies from various countries are running rampant. In this world plunging into chaos, opportunities and crises always come hand in hand for the mercenary company.

name: Memento Dawn
summary: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.

name: Ada: Tainted Soil
summary: Step into the world of Ada, a story-driven single-player 2D top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals to enjoy. Combine different weapons, spells, and skills to overcome all obstacles in your way. Be prepared for the unexpected.

name: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Simulator, Strategy, Indie
summary: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily is a turn-based stratergy game. The villainess Scarlet, deceived and falsely accused of killing of the King, becomes the first streamer. Through this, she uses manipulates and diversion to rebel against the vast military force of the Imperial Kingdom.
storyline:
The duchess of the Imperial Kingdom, Scarlet, was deceived and falsely accused of regicide, the killing of the King.She was sent to the guillotine, but fate arrives in the form of Lily, who holds the secret of the technology to stream and the best aerial warship the Imperial Kingdom possessed.
Scarlet deems her once home, now an enemy. With the trusted aerial warship that carries the ability to "Broadcast", she manipulates the vast military force of the Imperial Kingdom.
The battle to conquer everything, begins.

name: LightSup!
summary: LightSup! is a couch-action co-op game for 1-4 players with rogue-lite elements where you play as adventurers encounter ferocious monsters crawling from the Eclipse Dungeons. Prepare your weapons and protect the Altar of Light at any cost, or the world will be doomed into darkness forever.

name: The Ripe Blood Anthology: This World Is Just for the Two of Us
summary: Take on the role of Derek — the police chief in a small town. Make decisions that will change the course of the story. Unravel the mystery behind the peculiar behavior of Derek's boyfriend, Chris, and his younger sister. The graphic style is inspired by bara-manga and colorful line art.

name: To the Dungeon!
summary: Explore the depths of this massive dungeon with your adorable companion Una in this exciting deck-building adventure!

name: Fretless
summary: In this turned-based RPG, wield powerful legendary instruments, gather mighty riff attacks and save the land from Rick Riffson's devilish goons and musical hybrid monsters!
player_perspectives: Bird view / Isometric, Side view, Auditory
storyline:
Play as Rob, a friendly musician trying to restore harmony in an off-tuned world where wacky villains are corrupting music.

Rick Riffson, boss of the evil Super Metal Records company, is using the Battle of the Bands contest to extend his hold on every last note, chord, and song by trapping the best musicians with deceptive soul-binding contracts.

Embark on an adventure with Rob and his zany rock-loving friend to end SMR's plans. Stay alert during your journey: Riffson’s devilish goons, monster-instrument hybrids, and legendary musical animals will try to get in your way!

Explore this musical land to add sick riffs to your deck, and wield your mighty guitar to unleash powerful crescendo attacks in epic music battles!

name: Arcane Revolt
summary: Arcane Revolt is an action role-playing game with pixel graphics. Lead a revolution as a powerful mage against tyrants in a fantasy medieval world. Customize your spells and make decisions that will benefit your cause in battle. Improve your spells, start the rebellion, and bring down the order!

name: Montaro 2
summary: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth puzzle game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".

name: Chronomon
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Chronomon is a monster taming JRPG game with retro pixel art graphics. Explore a branching storyline, Capture and train over 50+ Chronomon. Battle other trainers in this one of a kind, multi-platform game.
storyline: Set in a post-apocalyptic world teeming with mysterious creatures, Chronomon combines monster taming and farm sims for a single, seamless experience. Catch them, train them, evolve them - then take the fight to the Epoch Syndicate, while uniting towns through trade, non-linear quests, and, of course, defeating the villains that threaten everyone. Don't forget to take care of yourself: Hearty meals and plenty of sleep matter as much as chronomon in the vibrant, ever-changing world that's yours to explore!

name: Primal Fray
genres: Puzzle, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch
summary: Primal Fray is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built and synergistic team to learn the truth about the Rift.

name: The Idolmaster Tours
summary:
THE iDOLM@STER TOURS is an upcoming arcade game that was first announced on February 10th, 2023, at Japan Amusement Expo 2023. It will be the first mainline arcade game since the original game. The graphics and models from Starlit Season have been carried over with some adjustments and additional models for the newly added characters.

The first location test began in the summer of 2023, and a second location test began in summer of 2024. The game is set to be released in Spring 2025.

name: Moth Kubit
summary: This is an RPG about corporate life as an ordinary insect. Our protagonist, Moth Kubit, has just been promoted, and all of a sudden embarks on a weird adventure in a megacorp to redeem (or eradicate) himself, his bug-ddies and the company before the mysterious "Final Process" arrives.
storyline:
Our protagonist, Moth Kubit, has just been promoted, and all of a sudden embarks on a weird adventure in a megacorp to redeem (or eradicate) himself, his bug-ddies, and the company before the mysterious "Final Process" arrives.
This game depicts an absurd but vivid Kafkaesque corporate world of insects and a unique combat system, featuring multiple endings based on the important choices Moth Kubit made along the way.

name: Shark Rain
summary: The very first Shark-Based Shooter game! Become a cute shark-girl and speed through water then emerge in human form and blast your enemies to oblivion! Nowhere will they be safe, not even on land!

name: Death By Misstep
summary: Death By Misstep is an upcoming First-Person Rhythm, Stealth and Horror game set on a party cruise where a massive massacre by robots is happening.

name: Never Ending Beyond
summary: The only roguelite where you must pet animals to survive. Each animal comes with its own unique weapons and passive abilities. Pet animals, mixing and matching abilities to create unique skill builds and conquer the Beyond.
storyline: Explore the Beyond, a mysterious shattered planet filled with androids and animals. Uncover the mystery that lies at the Edge of the Beyond.

name: Red Rebellion
summary: A sapphic fairy tale mashup as Robin Hood teams up with Red Riding Hood to save their town, in this yuri / lesbian historical fantasy.

name: Daomei Village
summary: You have been banished to Daomei Village for your offense. In order to return to the Emperor's favor, you must make an effort. Repair, build, cultivate fields and fight various adversities. Meet new friends and learn their stories. Do whatever it takes not to be banished forever!

name: Star Vortex
summary: Humanity is being pushed to the brink of annihilation by invading forces. As one of the few remaining combat pilots, you must fight the enemies of humanity. Rebuild your ship, salvage ancient technology, and turn the enemy's weapons against them.

name: Islands & Trains
summary: Build Islands. And Trains. No goals, no timer, no stress. Just build, relax, enjoy.
storyline:
Create tiny dioramas with just one shed or idyllic villages nestled in dense forests.

Lay your own railroad atop your beloved island and make your model train dreams come true. Place animals in the countryside andwatch & enjoy your peaceful creation. Get lost in finding the most perfect place for all these little pieces to come alive.

No goals, no timer, no missions, and no mistakes - just happy accidents.

name: Interwoven
summary: Welcome to Interwoven - a compact, but dynamic adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs! Follow an unlikely trio on their journey up to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Use the unique Augment Battle System to create all sorts of interesting strategies.

name: PaperKlay
summary: PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world.

name: Olliefrog Toad Skater
summary: Olliefrog Toad Skater is the amphibian-based skateboarding game where its easy to be steezy! Create your own little custom cute frog or toad and hit up the local skatepark for a brief skating session, or tackle the more extensive story/career modes and ollie, grind, and kickflip your way to the top.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Ragdoll LABS
summary: Ragdoll LABS is a game of action, physics, and lots of laughs, where you control a ragdoll in wild and varied simulations. Have fun watching your enemies failing miserably, unlock items to give your beloved ragdoll a unique look, create your own simulations, or play in others developed by the community.

name: Nivalis
summary: Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.
storyline:
Welcome to Nivalis! Making it in this cyberpunk city isn’t easy. The gangs want to harvest your organs, the Corps will fine you for breathing, and the whole time, the ground under your feet is crumbling. This city could fall into the ocean tomorrow, so you better make your fortune today.

You’ve got to start small: a food stall, a noodle stand, a stim store. Build your way up to a bar, a restaurant, or even a nightclub. Eventually, you’ll own all the nightlife in Nivalis. You’ll own the night!

In Nivalis, you choose how to spend your time in the city. In this unique slice-of-life sim with realistic weather simulation and night and day cycles, you can grow your business, meet strange and diverse characters, form friendships and experience the danger and wonder of this cyberpunk voxel city.

name: Bits & Bops
summary: Bits & Bops is a collection of original rhythm mini-games. Featuring over 20 mini-games filled with catchy music, snappy gameplay and gorgeous, hand-drawn animation, Bits & Bops is sure to brighten your day.

name: Pivot of Hearts
genres: Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel, Card & Board Game
summary: Game developer Wén Xiàn has a second chance at love, but it’s not what he expects. Will he be able to stray off the beaten path and find true happiness? Play your cards right and find out in Pivot of Hearts, a non-monogamous visual novel!

name: Rise of the Robots X
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Played on a hexagonal grid battleground, each game is an opportunity to refine your army and get better Robots, Buildings or Masteries!

name: High Elo Girls
summary: High Elo Girls is a Visual Novel set in the esports scene where you play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?

name: Decide 4 God
summary: Six of them wanted out. Six of them wanted in. Now, all twelve of them are trapped in a prison where a fate worse than death awaits them. Can they survive the wiles of Empathy Systems? What dark secrets lurk behind that institution? It is for the future when none may tread.
storyline:
Side A:
One hour.

The woman and her team of investigators had one hour to infiltrate a prison and cause a breakout. Her dearest hope was that, among the prisoners, there would be her brother who disappeared nearly twenty years ago.

She couldn't shake the feeling that something sinister was waiting for her team.

Side B:
One hour.

The man had been up for one hour, contemplating his past. Everything changed when breakfast was delivered and a box with clothing was slid through the opening in the door. He was told to put it on if he wanted to escape.

Something felt wrong but the prisoner obeyed. Someone was breaking him out... but why?

It is for the future when none may tread.

name: Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story
summary: "Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story" is an action-adventure platformer following the story of a failing musician named Sondro, who must seek and recover the wish-granting Mystic Orbs to repay his debt to the mysterious Masked Man. Can he find them before the many rogues of Sunova beat him to the punch?

name: Silly Polly Beast
summary: This story is about a girl who, by the will of fate, faced the beast, and in order to become free she was forced to study its nature. A story-driven roguelike with aggressive gunfights and terrifying monsters awaits you. How far can you go in the fight for your freedom?

name: Sparkball
genres: Sport, Strategy, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie, MOBA
summary: Sparkball is a 4v4 adrenaline-packed ‘sports brawler’ where players select from a cast of lovably unique heroes and carefully balance both ballin' and brawlin' to score in the enemy team's goal! Affectionately described as League of Legends meets Rocket League (or Kung Fu-tbol!), Sparkball grips you immediately with its dopamine-inducing take on combat sports and keeps you coming back for more as you strive to master its surprisingly complex strategies.

name: Eden.schemata();
summary: EDEN.schemata(); is a multi-ending sci-fi mystery adventure game, featuring headless corpses, a sealed laboratory, a limbless android suspect/heroine, and an amnesiac protagonist. The game design and gradually UI change in reflection of your actions.
storyline:
“Nice to meet you... again?”

An android named “Eve” speaks to “you”, before a headless corpse apparently known as “The Professor”.

Completely devoid of any sort of memory, you, together with Eve—an android, and the Professor’s apparent killer—must uncover the truth of what really happened here.

Use your powers of deduction to unravel the mystery of this locked laboratory, revealing one truth after another.

We hope you enjoy this all-new type of mystery—the kind that’s only possible in a video game.

name: Zodiac Legion
summary: Zodiac Legion is a turn-based tactical Role-Playing-Game featuring lethal combat, squad management and strategic elements. Lead your heroes through daring raids and forgotten ruins, defend your land in a time of conquest and betrayal, and master the secrets of volatile ancient magic to restore a realm beset by the armies of undying fiendish sorcerers.
storyline: As the Grandmaster of the Zodiac Order, it will be your duty to restore this knightly brotherhood and rally its champions under the banners of the thirteen Zodiac signs. You will manage your domain, take important diplomatic decisions and train your warriors in the arcane arts. Enemy armies will invade your borders, forcing you to dispatch your knights on missions resolved through turn-based, tactical battles. Their superhuman powers will tip the scales in the face of overwhelming odds, but beware: many will not survive the ordeal. Yet exploring the secrets of necromancy may reveal that a Zodiac Knight's duty need not end in death.

name: Dewdrop Dynasty
summary: Run, dash, and crawl your way through a fast, Metroidvania. Battle with giant bosses, find new guns and abilities, meet quirky characters, and most importantly find your way home.
storyline: After losing his wings in a tragic incident, Poe the mighty Bee warrior must find his way back home. Can you unlock the strange mysteries of Dewdrop?

name: Slaves of Magic
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie
summary: Slaves of Magic is a fantasy turn-based tactical RPG in which you have to lead the resistance against the invaders. You will have to find ways to slow down their forces, till you can learn their most powerful weapon, the use of elemental magic, and turn it against them.
storyline: Humanity has been invaded by otherworldly forces using magic. Can you lead the resistance against the oppressors in this fantasy turn-based tactical strategy game to save humanity from becoming slaves of magic?

name: Moroi
summary: Moroi is a grimdark fairytale with an even darker sense of humor. Experience frantic combat, perplexing puzzles, and a twisting narrative anchored by a bizarre cast of characters. Can you break free from eternal madness?
storyline:
Moroi is set within the Cosmic Engine, a personalized hellscape designed to distort any semblance of normalcy. Truth is an illusion, paranoia is constant, and your humanity is an oddity.

You awake to find yourself a prisoner within a living nightmare. Your name, your past: gone, but not the record of your misdeeds. Your crimes: beyond comprehension. Your conviction: incontestable. Your sentence: eternal. The need to escape and set things right: undeniable.

Fight your way out of a living, twisting labyrinth. Hone your skills as you take on dynamic combat encounters and absurd puzzles. Meet the Cosmic Engine’s most disturbing and grotesque inhabitants, all with unique and nonsensical personalities, who are just as likely to aid in your quest as they are to deceive you.

Escape means freedom, and in freedom, the truth.

name: Run TavernQuest
summary: A role-reversing twist on old school text adventure games. You're the command parser and game master for an artificial player named STEVE. Who knew that running an RPG would be so frustrating?
storyline: This is a game you won't be playing. Instead, you will be behind the scenes, overseeing the inner workings of the game for another player named STEVE. Can you shepherd STEVE away from his poor decisions and towards the goal of saving the princess?

name: Hotel Barcelona
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
"Hotel Barcelona," where serial killers from all over the United States are said to have gathered. You must defeat them and check out before all the blood is spilled.

Japanese game creators SWERY65 and SUDA51 have teamed up to create this ambitious work. Don't miss it.

name: Overlook Trail
summary: A mix of long remembered dreams and recurring fantasies. Overlook trail is a collection of short experiences, each with its unique form and purpose. Some of them are part of the real world.

name: Ship of Heroes
summary: An MMORPG set hundreds of years in the future aboard the mega ship FHS Justice, super powered characters are an accepted part of society and integral to the ship's defense while it encounters other craft and alien worlds.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Moonlight Knight
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Moonlight Knight is an action-slasher with RPG elements. Use sword, bow, magic and hook to fight your enemies. Loot gold, upgrade character stats, find unique items and unlock ultimate abilities to make it to the very end!

name: Hero Odyssey
summary: Awaken on the mysterious island of Damatheia with a Godly mission in your backlog. Forge bonds with unlikely allies, make life-altering choices, and battle the undead in this Visual Novel filled with secrets, minigames and multiple endings. What truths will you uncover... and at what cost?
storyline:
After losing consciousness on your university rooftop, you awaken on the strange Greek island of Damatheia, where nothing is as it seems. The first person you meet has hooves in place of feet, the dead roam among the living, and even the mighty Gods bicker like mortals.

In the center of it all is you — a seemingly ordinary young man thrust into extraordinary circumstances. Chosen by Zeus Himself to fulfill a divine mission, you must explore the island in search of allies, help its peculiar inhabitants, and work your way toward your ultimate goal: defeating the God of the Underworld.

Unravel the mysteries of Damatheia while facing tough choices, encountering unexpected foes, and uncovering the truth behind your arrival. Who’s really in control, and what price will you pay to fulfill your destiny?

name: Backpack Monsters: Survivors
summary: A PvP inventory management auto battler with evolution upgrades! Buy and update powerful monsters, then carefully arrange them in your grids.

name: Plantasia
summary:
Plantasia is a cozy semi-idle, gardening & puzzle game designed to sit at the bottom 1/3 of your screen so you can play in-between tasks without disrupting your work!

Nurture Plants:
Plant your seeds and watch them grow into beautiful blooms. Then, harvest them for materials and extra seeds.

Combine Species:
Use some of your seeds in the station lab to create hybrids, and grow new interesting plant types for better appearances and resource yields.

name: In the Abyss of Dream
summary: Two worlds, one nightmare. Explore a gruesome orphanage, solve puzzles related to an inexplicable phenomenon, and dive into the depths of dreams to uncover otherworldly horrors. In the Abyss of Dream is a cosmic horror point-and-click game set during the Great Darkness.

name: Tron: Catalyst
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac
summary: The Arq Grid stands on the brink of collapse. With your Identity Disc and Light Cycle, fight to escape by wielding the power of the Glitch loop. Electrifying action and a rich story combine in a new adventure set within Disney’s iconic TRON universe.

name: Droid Escape
summary: In this adventure, help Droid 07 to overcome challenges, discover mysteries and free your friend from the miniaigas.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
summary:
Enter the abandoned workshop of Murray’s Costume Manor and unravel the mystery left behind by the reclusive inventor, Edwin Murray. In Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, you’ll step into a world where every dark corner holds a secret and every flicker of light hints at an ever-present threat. The Mimic, a prototype endoskeleton, can adapt to any costume and become any character, including what you fear most. Armed with only your wits, a few gadgets, and a heavily redacted corporate briefing, you’ll attempt to retrieve Fazbear’s prized prototype technology while grappling with cryptic clues and a relentless shadow determined to dispatch all unwanted company.

Prepare for heart-pounding thrills as you explore the labyrinth of the deserted Costume Manor, discovering remnants of Edwin’s unfinished work and eluding the monster he’s created. Experience Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, survive the mystery and madness. Five Night’s at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic will be available for the PlayStation 5, Steam, and Epic Games Store on June 13th, 2025.

Disclaimer: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for whatever you awaken in the dark.

name: Virtual Girl @ World's End
summary: A visual novel developed by HEADLOCK about Virtual YouTubers in an apocalyptic world.
storyline:
Shine in despair…

Tokyo, 2055. War, resource depletion, population decline.
In this place full of despair, girls host live streams. With colorful new outfits and hairstyles, today’s stream begins.
They are appraised, ranked, and drained. Only their eyes, the ones that saw the world, became dark and murky.
In a colorless, dark world, one girl awakens.
“HELLO WORLD! I’m Ai from Vstar!”
The girl sings. For the smiles of people all over the world. No matter the darkness, she continues to sing.

Until the day the world ends.

name: Rubber Sharks
summary: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?

name: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle
summary: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle is an adventure game where you can experience summer vacation in the world of “Natsume's Book of Friends”. As the protagonist Takashi Natsume, you are able to meet other friends and spirits and enjoy a wonderful summertime.

name: Architect Life: A House Design Simulator
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Create the ideal home! From 3D plan modelling through to on-site decision-making, you must bring each project to life while adding your own creative touches, to take your architectural firm to the pinnacle of the profession.

name: The Little Pixel That Could
summary: The Little Pixel That Could is puzzle-platformer about a daring pixel on a mission to delete the browser history of its enigmatic owner. Traverse hard drives and firewalls to piece together the fragmented memories of the owner's life.

name: Stellar Blade x Goddess of Victory: Nikke
Lesson
summary: An upcoming adult boys' love visual novel developed by parade.

name: Quantum Witch
summary: Wake up lovely, you've got things to do! First, find your lost flock of faer. Then find your wife, she'd look so cute wearing that flower you found. And if you have time, attack and dethrone god. Ok? Don't worry about that portal. I'm sure it's nothing. Now be careful. Every choice matters.
storyline:
It's a straightforwardly lovely day in Hus.

It's always a lovely day in Hus. That's not suspicious at all! The bovey is grazing in the field, the faer are roaming around town causing chaos, the shadies are out preaching (they're not a cult!), and a giant stone portal to another dimension has appeared in the woods.

I hope nothing goes hideously wrong and results in an adventure.

name: Date Everything!
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Date Everything is a sandbox dating simulator set in the comfort of your own home, featuring 100 fully voice acted datable characters! Let the romance flow between your bed, smoke alarm and… Overwhelming Sense of Existential Dread? Are you ready to Date Everything?

name: Level Down
summary: Crashed in space, surrounded by collapsing floors, reach for the top...

name: Heroes of Mount Dragon
summary: Unleash your dragon-morphing powers in this action-packed side-scrolling brawler! Choose from 8 unique heroes, each with their own fighting style. Play couch co-op or online with up to 3 friends, uniting to defeat evil or competing for supremacy. A fun and accessible challenge for all skill levels!
storyline:
The Celestial Dragon, the last of its kind, is dying...
Soon the world will have to face the evil Karnak, who is about to pierce the two-thousand-year-old seal that protects the continent. Armed with their courage, eight heroes, one from each kingdom, must answer the dragon's call and form the League of Dragon-Bloods in order to protect the world!

name: Shatter and Spin
summary: Play electronic gyro, memories of cyber childhood! In Shatter and Spiral, players will be able to modify their gyro partners and manipulate them to shatter enemies one by one!

name: RoadHouse Manager
summary: Bartend and run a roadhouse in this AI-enhanced roguelite-sim! Patrons once impressed, will become permanent barflies that can be hired as staff, or sent on quests in the mysterious mist. Upgrade your roadhouse, hire a band, and build your Signature Cocktail, with 333 ingredients to choose from.

name: Cult of Abaruth
summary: Have you always felt that you were destined for great things? Have you dreamed of being the leader of a dark cult? Or maybe you just love Dark Fantasy with a touch of humor? Now you have the opportunity to test your skills! Take on the role of a cult leader and lead him to glory!

name: Sword: Depths of the Void
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Xbox One
summary: Sword: Depths of the Void is WorthyWorm and The Sword Teams first upcoming game, releasing in 2025. Sword: Depths of the Void is a 2D Action RPG Platformer with a special sword that can morph it's blade into different weapons. Play as Trent Helms, the chosen one of this legendary sword, and make your way through various areas in open-world forms, bring people with you on your journey, explore a town in the sky, and much, much more.
storyline:
"The Void has opened again. You see that purple rift in the sky?" - Tiela Thorn

Our main character, Trent Helms, was walking down his well-known trail, and had reached the end of it- a cliff, outlooking the wonders of Amethyst Valley. While Trent was looking out on this cliff, a quick explosion startled him. A strange sword inside a stone had appeared behind him... as it flew straight towards his hands. Trent was confused. His vision began to darken for a few seconds. He felt as if he was traveling at lightspeed. Suddenly... he ended up in a whole new world. Crystal Depths. A place only for those who have been given the Spectral Sword, a sword that can morph its blades into glowing blue objects, like a bow or hammer, or even a spear. Trent had obtained this sword... but he has yet to know that this sword gives the user a quest. A quest to close the Void once more.

name: Broken Arrow
summary: Broken Arrow is a large-scale real-time modern warfare tactics game. The base game features both the American and Russian factions, more than 100 units and multiple deck specialisations per nation. Broken Arrow brings the genre to a whole new level by combining the complexity of a joint-forces wargame with the typical real-time tactics action-packed gameplay.

name: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road
platforms: PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: A brand new Inazuma Eleven game, returning to its roots! Play through the story mode with a new protagonist, and meet all characters from the series' long history in chronicle mode!
storyline:
Twenty-five years after the events of the original "Inazuma Eleven," the new protagonist Destin Billows enters South Cirrus Junior High in search of a world without football.
On the other side of the coin is Harper Evans, a bona fide "Football Monster" from the prestigious Raimon Junior High, which occupies the top spot in the national tournament.
Everything will change when these two cross paths...

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Collector's Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Collector's Edition Includes:

ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN Base Game (Physical disc for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, physical STEAM voucher for STEAM) - ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to offer players a new gaming experience by reimagining the game’s core design.
Additional DLC* – Additional DLC that will be available after the release of the main game
Statue of Wylder - A perfect replica of the nomadic warrior, Wylder, a lone swordman in pursuit of the Night Lord. Crafted by Pure Arts. Size : 25cm
SteelBook - Premium metal case with a full-color illustration of Wylder. The perfect protection and display for your game disc
Nightfarer Cards - A set of eight high-quality tarot cards featuring detailed illustrations of the Nightfarers. These glossy, full color cards are the perfect way to predict your future in Limveld
Exclusive Hardcover Artbook - An exclusive 40-page artbook tracing the development of ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN through previously unseen concept art, sketches, and full color illustrations. Size: 24 x 21 cm Language: English
Digital Soundtrack Download Code - The unforgettable original soundtrack is included in this Collector’s Edition. Return to Limveld again and again with fully orchestrated tracks from ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN.
Collector’s Box - A beautiful case to store or display your statue and artbook.

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
• ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN
• Additional DLC
- Additional playable characters and bosses
• Digital Artbook & Mini Soundtrack

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Elden Ring: Nightreign is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to bring a new gaming experience.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Battle Royale

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma
summary: The classic action-RPG and life-simulation gameplay, beloved by Rune Factory fans across the globe, is taken in a bold new direction in Guardians of Azuma. This all-new adventure takes place in the never-before-seen eastern country of Azuma where you will assume the Earth Dancer powers and fight against the spreading Blight to bring hope back to this once-prosperous land.
storyline:
The Celestial Collapse—a calamity caused by a colossal object crashing into the eastern lands known as Azuma. The devastating impact sent fragments of terrain to the skies above and the seas below. With the earth shattered, the power provided by the runes ceased to flow. The gods of nature vanished soon after. Mountains crumbled and fields withered, leaving the people with nothing…not even hope.

You awaken, startled by a dream of duelling dragons. You don’t remember how or why, but a voice resonates within you.

“Accept the power of an Earth Dancer. Use this power to save the land."

name: Lost Soul Aside
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary:
Embark on an epic odyssey to save your sister and the whole of humankind from dimensional invaders in a stylish single player action-adventure RPG.

Chain lightning-fast combos, learn new abilities, and upgrade your weapons as you take on formidable enemies and colossal bosses in fast, dynamic combat.
storyline:
The war ended ten years ago, the unknown monsters then appeared,
Kazer accidently got combined with an ancient race Arena,
Then they got on the journey to seek for the mysterious crystals with their own purposes.

"This is not for saving the world, just for saving myself."

name: Sonic Wings Reunion
platforms: Arcade, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Sonic Wings Reunion is a sequel to the arcade-style shooter SONIC WINGS. The previous version was sold in 1998.

Choose from 8 characters and destroy the mysterious organization “Fatamornagana” that has progressed into the modern world. The scenario changes depending on the combination of characters.

The first new Sonic Wings (Aero Fighters) game in 26 years, with original staff members from the series involved in its planning, production, and oversight. This all-new installment in the classic vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up series is designed for all fans of the genre to enjoy.
storyline:
In the year 20XX, cities around the world come under attack. “Fata Morgana,” a mysterious organization wielding super weapons and the unknown technology to control the world’s military arsenal, has returned. “Project Blue,” an international secret rescue team of knights that soar the skies, rises to stand against this threat to the world. What awaits them in their fight against these formidable foes…?

In the year 20XX, cities around the world were attacked.

The mysterious organization “Fata Morgana,” which possesses superweapons and controls the world's military arsenal with unknown technology, has returned.

The international secret rescue team “Project Blue,” a group of sky-riding knights, stands up against this global threat.

What awaits them as they take the fight to a powerful enemy for various reasons? ......!

name: Scar-Lead Salvation
summary: Hard difficulty TPS roguelike with randomly generated dungeons. The protagonist, Willow Martin, has no memory of her past, but when a fight begins, her body moves naturally and she displays exceptional combat abilities.
developers: Compile Heart, Neilo Inc., Idea Factory International, Inc.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Fuga: Melodies of Steel series has reached its epic conclusion! Dive into this dramatic RPG featuring a brand-new, strategic battle system, enhanced Taranis training during intermission, and tactical route progression and event battles!

name: Fable Hospital
summary: Embark on a hospital management game where you lead a medieval hospital and face comical diseases. Hire staff, design wards and assign tasks while your employees take care of patients in a hilarious way.

name: My Father Lied
summary: My Father Lied is a first person point and click mystery game that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.13 feat. V.W.P
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.12 feat. V.I.P
To a T
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: to a T is a 3D narrative adventure game developed by Keita Takahashi and the uvula team, with a strong focus on character, interaction, story and exploration. Play as a teenager (Teen), with a unique posture just trying to live a normal life in a small coastal town. Explore the town along with the help of Teen’s loyal dog and loving mother. While going to school and contending with bullies, Teen discovers a new ability granted to them by their extraordinary posture, and they start to uncover more about their mysterious lineage.

name: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Reclaim your destiny. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls to perform issen critical counter attacks and intense swordplay. Experience this dramatic revenge story set in Feudal Japan.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed: Battle Destiny Remastered
summary: Become a pilot in the world of Mobile Suit Gundam SEED, for the first time available with English localization! Engage in thrilling, action-packed Gundam battles, complete missions, and tune up your newly acquired Mobile Suits!
developers: B.B. Studio, Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.

name: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time is an RPG life-sim game and the long-awaited sequel to the 3DS classic Fantasy Life. This game will expand on what the original did, blending simulation with traditional action RPG combat mechanics.
storyline:
A new chapter of Fantasy Life that transcends time!

Begin a fantastic life on a ruined island, and embark on a great adventure into the past! Gather friends, craft, and build your own city!

name: RoadCraft
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: As the leader of a company specialized in restoring sites devastated by natural disasters, use your construction machinery to restart the local industry. Clear debris and faulty equipment, rebuild roads and bridges damaged by weather, and much more!

name: Dune: Awakening
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Rise from survival to greatness and challenge the power of an Imperium in Dune: Awakening, a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale. Survive the sandworm, craft your ornithopter, build a fortress, and ascend to power on an open world Arrakis shared with hundreds of other players.

name: Virtue's Heaven
summary: Virtue’s Heaven is an expressive, 2D action adventure. Explore a world that has been stuck in an endless day for as long as anyone can remember, free your friends from prison and gain enough Zeal to end the Age of Reason.
storyline: It is the End of History and the world is dying. Time to venture out and create a new future. Fight against those that stand in the way of progress. Fight to end the Age of Reason.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Capcom's newest fighting collection hits the stage!

Choose from fan-favorite games like Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice to 3D action games like Power Stone and Power Stone 2 in this collection of eight classic fighting games!

Each game in the collection can be played online or co-op!

Get back in the ring and duke it out in battles that everyone rumored, but no one believed!
Whether it's with a rival new or old, give it your all and strive for victory!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Super Cursor
summary: Start your journey in Cursor Ville, where you'll be tested in your precision, agility, patience, and determination! Will you be able make your ways through the treacherous world and save your beloved princess? Aim, dodge, move, and most importantly, never give up!

name: Verses of Hope
summary: Verses of Hope is a 2D platform game and interactive poetry adventure where you shape the world through the power of your words. Build your own poems to change the landscape and narrative.
storyline:
Hope, a cute and brave spark that players control, represents the hopefulness of Helena, the last knight trying to bring light back to her world. Hope’s mission is crucial because he symbolizes the spark of light needed to drive away the darkness.

Hope’s journey through the world is full of challenges, but his determination and bravery make every moment special.

name: Doom: The Dark Ages
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: DOOM: The Dark Ages is the prequel to the critically acclaimed DOOM (2016) and DOOM Eternal that tells the epic cinematic origin story of the DOOM Slayer’s rage. Players will step into the blood-stained boots of the DOOM Slayer, in this never-before-seen dark and sinister medieval war against Hell.

name: Doom: The Dark Ages - Premium Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
DOOM: The Dark Ages Premium Edition INCLUDES:
- Base Game
- Campaign DLC **
- Digital Artbook and Soundtrack
- Divinity Skin Pack

**DLC availability to be provided at a later date.

name: Hero World 2
summary: Join Tom and Lisa in Hero World 2, a thrilling new adventure! Unlike the story-driven first installment, this sequel focuses on helping the duo collect fruits while introducing numerous upgrades and fresh features.

name: Tears of Vanfell
summary: Tears of Vanfell is an action-packed dungeon crawler with roguelike and hack-'n-slash elements. Choose between a wide cast of characters and climb the Mountain as you swap weapons and grow stronger as a team of up to four player in online Co-op.

name: Open Air
summary: Summer! Sea! Festival! You've been waiting for this for so long, and here you are! But what is it, why are the stages empty, and everybody around you is sad? Explore the island, learn the stories of the islanders, unlock new strengths during meditations and arrange the loudest and coolest festival!

name: The Midnight Walk
summary:
Embark upon The Midnight Walk in this reverent dark fantasy adventure built in clay, from the minds behind Lost in Random and Fe.

Become The Burnt One, befriend a lost lantern creature named Potboy, and use his flame to light your way through a conflicting world of wonder and horror. Survive and outsmart the many monsters eager to devour your little friend’s flame as you experience five tales of fire and darkness, featuring an incredible cast of odd characters.

Marvel at every disturbing detail in a landscape painstakingly handcrafted with real life clay and animated in a stop motion style. Fully playable in both flatscreen and with a VR headset.
storyline: Journey with Potboy along the twisted trail of The Midnight Walk. Work with your companion to outsmart monsters, using his flame to distract while you hide from and evade the many threats of The Dark Itself. Encounter new friends and experience awe-inspiring sights as you navigate a path fraught with both peril and affirmation.

name: Tokimeki Memorial: Forever with You - Emotional
Revenge of the Savage Planet
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Revenge of the Savage Planet is an upbeat, satirical action adventure Sci-Fi. Jump, shoot and collect your way across vibrant alien worlds, uncovering new gear and upgrades, while discovering various hidden secrets.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Little Adventure Tale
summary: Little Adventure tale is a Roguelike Deckbuilder set in a cute fantasy world where you can enlist the help of the Guild to Hire companions and manage several Card Decks & Accept Quests to earn more rewards! All this in order to banish the Evil Lord Obradin!

name: Metal Eden
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
An adrenaline-rush sci-fi FPS.
A HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue citizens' COREs from MOEBIUS, an orbital city turned into a deadly trap. Dive into cybernetic warfare, face the ENGINEERS, and uncover the secrets of METAL EDEN.

name: Metal Eden
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
An adrenaline-rush sci-fi FPS.
A HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue citizens' COREs from MOEBIUS, an orbital city turned into a deadly trap. Dive into cybernetic warfare, face the ENGINEERS, and uncover the secrets of METAL EDEN.
storyline: An advanced HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue the citizens’ COREs from the vast monolithic city MOEBIUS once a hopeful new home for humanity now turned into a deadly trap. Blast your way through the INTERNAL DEFENCE CORPS in cybernetic warfare, confront the ENGINEERS and uncover the mysteries of the project EDEN.

name: Captain Blood
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Captain Blood is a pirate-themed action game set on the Spanish Main in the 17th century, where you step into the boots of a fearsome pirate on a quest for gold and glory. Expect wild adventures with cannon firing, pistol shooting, swashbuckling sword fights, and plenty of pirate shenanigans. This action-packed hack'n'slash features fierce hand-to-hand combat, hordes of enemies, and a classic fighting system with flashy combos and epic finishers.

The game underwent several iterations throughout the 2000s and was last showcased in 2010 before vanishing for years. Now, we are excited to bring it back, combining its original glory with a series of modern improvements for today's gamers.

name: Drop Duchy
summary: Build your duchy piece by piece in this refreshing hybrid rogue-lite game. Use block-dropping mechanics to collect resources, recruit troops to fight against belligerent armies, and let every block shape your realm, leading your path to victory!

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Sogeumgang
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: 2weistein in Rongerland
summary: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.

name: Suspense: Madman's Dreams
summary: This psychological adventure, focused on narrative, is based on a scientific representation of mental disorders. Are you ready to face the fears of people suffering from mental illnesses? Use your voice as the voice of the main character to get as close to them as possible.
storyline:
Explore the habitats of the characters: a hospital, a dungeon, an English house from the 1950s—all through the eyes of several mentally ill individuals. Watch as their minds crumble before your eyes, tearing apart like an abandoned mansion. Wander through ever-changing environments, face fears and phobias head-on, and feel like someone is always watching you. Even when you think no one’s there, chances are, someone is still staring at your back.

Your goal is to direct the events and assemble all the pieces into a logical story, giving insight into the character's state of mind. To achieve this, you’ll need to explore the world and piece together narrative and interactive elements in your mind. Everything that happens has a logical connection to reality but appears surreal. This is exactly what can be found in the pages of psychiatry textbooks—what might happen to a person suffering from such conditions. Just remember: what you see isn’t real, but it is real for the one who sees it, as their mind is inflamed and deteriorating.

name: Mangút
summary: Face the struggles of Gil, a tireless app delivery worker running against time to pay the bills. Swing across the platforms with a mechanical arm, dare to make tough decisions, and lead a revolution in Morro do Mangút.

name: Shape of Dreams
summary: Shape of Dreams is an action rogue-lite infused with MOBA-esque elements. Venture into a vivid dream world, and create your own champion by freely swapping skills with whatever you like. Play solo against all odds, or with friends in a 4-player co-op game.

name: WitchGhost
summary: A spooky adventure through a weird and wonderful land. Boost your powers and change the world as you help Ezme, the WitchGhost, collect her memories so she can remeber how to go home.

name: Killa
summary: Killa is a 3D adventure mystery with multiple endings. Valhalla, our protagonist, seeks the killer of her mentor, a mentor she treasures like family, venturing to an unknown island. Discover the culprit on this enigmatic island and embark on a journey of revenge.

name: ZeroSpace
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Tactical, Indie
summary: ZeroSpace is a cinematic RTS with an epic sci-fi story where your decisions determine the fate of the galaxy. No two matches play the same thanks to nearly limitless combinations of factions, mercenary units and heroes, introducing unparalleled strategic depth and player expression to the genre.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)
storyline:
Strange events are being reported in the Orion Sector: Leviathans going mad opening wormholes, an entire Dread Raider colony gone dark, and Grell swarms massing on nearby planets. The Arandi leader, I’olin, states that these events are all connected.

You make contact with a new species. They are hostile, their technology seems unmatched and they seem to resent humans, although no record of this species comes up in any human or alien database.

Discover their secrets and defend your home in a grand RPG story.

name: Pandorex
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Pandorex is a Point & Click Adventure featuring Harry who is on a mission to find his lost dog.
storyline:
Pandorex.
Nobody really knows what is up with it.

And then there is Harry. Harry is a simple, not very social guy. His best friend is his dog. Unfortunately, he lost his dog. And since his dog is the only thing that is important to Harry, he starts looking for it, willing to do everything
as long as he gets his dog back. And that´s where the story begins. Harry is only a very small piece of the puzzle, but in the end, he could be the most important one. The one piece that holds the universe together or is responsible for the demise of the universe and therefore the demise of all life not only on earth but on all the planets.

You are responsible to aid Harry in his adventures, help him to choose the right decision, and solve puzzles and riddles that come across Harry's long journey of finding his dog and hopefully not destroying the universe.

Pandorex is a humorous and funny point and click adventure with a small tick of social criticism and a lot of pop
