culture and subgenre references. This game does not take itself very seriously, so you should not do it either!

name: Despelote
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
despelote is a first-person exploration game about the universal language of soccer and the ways it can bring people together, or push them apart.

Run, pass, and play with dozens of charming, hand-drawn characters in a unique world inspired by the street parks of Quito, Ecuador.

The game consists of three “days,” with each one taking place at a different phase in the player’s life. As you get older, so do the characters in the world around you. Your interactions with them, as well as your relationship to soccer itself, change dramatically with time.
storyline: The game consists of three “days,” with each one taking place at a different phase in the player’s life. As you get older, so do the characters in the world around you. Your interactions with them, as well as your relationship to soccer itself, change dramatically with time.

name: Liminal Shroud
summary: A psychological exploration experience that takes you deep into the heart of uncanny, in-between spaces where reality unravels. There are no monsters here—only the shadows of your own mind. Navigate strangely layered rooms, interact with the environment and unlock secrets to escape.

name: Skin Deep
summary: Skin Deep is an immersive first-person shooter. We got sneezing. We got things getting stuck in your feet. Stalk through a vast non-linear starship and sneak, subvert, and sabotage to survive in this stellar sandbox. You're outnumbered, outgunned, and have no shoes. Welcome to Skin Deep!

name: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
summary: PERESTROIKA - CONTINUATION OF OCTOBER Crisis... Crisis has caught up with the Motherland of the Revolution and lurks in its very heart - the Kremlin. Lead the country through the most difficult times. "Crisis in the Kremlin" opens up huge prospects for you.

name: Navigating the Labyrinth
summary: Navigating the Labyrinth is a classic first-person party-based dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and turn-based combat. Discover the secrets and riches of the labyrinths, and save your dying city.
storyline:
The city of Pherae is in decline. It was once rich, but has been overshadowed by the Labyrinth Kingdoms and their Minotaur king.

Every year, brave adventurers venture forth to solve the mysteries of the labyrinths in order to return with treasure to save their dying city, but none ever return. This loss of healthy, skilled people only serves to accelerate the decline.

Can you succeed where others have failed? Test your mettle against the mazes and discover the secrets and riches that lie within!

Navigating the Labyrinth is a classic first-person party-based dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and turn-based combat. Build and level up a party of up to six adventurers of different classes and use their spells and abilities to defeat progressively tougher monsters as they explore farther into the labyrinth.

name: Days Gone Remastered
summary:
Ride into a desperate, dog-eat-dog world in the definitive Days Gone experience, remastered for the PlayStation5 console.

Fight to survive an environment ravaged by a deadly pandemic as former outlaw biker, Deacon St. John. Risk the threats of the Broken Road on the back of your trusty Drifter bike as you face terrifying hordes of relentless feral Freakers – as well as dangerous gangs of humans.
developers: Sony Interactive Entertainment, SIE Bend Studio, Climax Studios
storyline: Deacon St. John, a former outlaw and drifter, searches for purpose in a world ravaged by a pandemic that has turned much of humanity into mindless, violent creatures called Freakers. Driven by the hope that his wife, Sarah, may still be alive, he navigates the dangers of the Pacific Northwest, facing hostile factions, freakish threats, and his own haunting memories. As he fights for survival, Deacon forms new alliances, confronts his past, and seeks answers about his wife’s fate, uncovering harsh truths about resilience and loss in a world on the edge.

name: Dreamy Syrup
platforms: PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: "Sato Ama," whom you met by chance at university, is an ardent fan of the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" just like you! The two hit it off and go out together, talk about their favorite idols, and gradually become closer. However... "I almost got found out." A certain comment made by Amaha Shiroppu during a stream raises a question: "Could it be that Amaha Shiroppu is... Sato Ama?" Will you witness the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" being found out? A thrilling love comedy where "dreams" and "reality" intersect!

name: 100-in-1 Game Collection
summary: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!

name: 100 in 1 Game Collection
summary: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view, Auditory

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 – Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Get the ultimate Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 experience with the Deluxe Edition!

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Deluxe Edition
summary:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

The DELUXE EDITION contains:
• Base game, DLC costume (Fatal Fury 2: Terry)
• SteelBook
• Artbook (100+ pages)
• OST (2 discs)
• Sticker sheets (X2)
• Poster (double-sided)
• Collector's box

name: Nekura na Classmate ga Ore no Ibukuro wo Tsukande Hanashite Kurenai
TriggerHeart Exelica Enhanced
summary: TriggerHeart EXELICA Enhanced adds additional elements to the original TriggerHeart EXELICA, including Faintear as a new playable character, an opening movie produced by P.A.WORKS with a theme song sung by Ayane, an “Enhanced” story mode with additional high-resolution CGs, balance adjustments to existing characters, handy features from the original game (Training Mode, leaderboards, vertical screen support), and more.

name: Bokura: Planet
summary: "Back to the same planet, together... That's all I wanted..." BOKURA: planet is a two-player puzzle adventure that explores new possibilities in cooperative gaming. Players take on the role of the crew on a space exploration ship as they try to escape from a planet where they have crash-landed on.

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
A full remake of a 2001 point-and-click adventure game Amerzone which served as the first game in the later-created Syberia series.

The remake is more like a reimagining of an old classic adventure with new tough puzzles and new challenges.
storyline: Amerzone: The Explorer’s Legacy beckons players to embark on an enchanting journey of exploration and discovery. Set in a mysterious Latin American realm reclaimed by nature, this remake promises to deliver a visually stunning odyssey unlike any other. Prepare to be transported to a world brimming with secrets and wonders, where every corner holds the promise of adventure. As a daring journalist fulfilling the final wishes of a legendary explorer, you’ll unravel the mysteries of Amerzone’s enigmatic past.

name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club: Tokimeki Roadmap to the Future
summary: An upcoming visual novel based on Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club by Bushiroad Games.
storyline:
The TOKIMEKI-filled days that you spent with the 12 members of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
You loved and cherished all of those sparkling moments, each of which shone like a rainbow.
But then, all of those irreplaceable memories suddenly slip away from your mind, lost.

"They were so bright and warm, truly irreplaceable... But now, I doubt that I'll ever
hold them again..."

The members do all they can for you to regain your lost memories.
The curtain rises on the story of you and the 12 members searching for the missing pieces of that TOKIMEKI!

"That TOKIMEKI, once more. And forevermore."

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: 26 years on, a brand-new entry in the Fatal Fury series is set to arrive on the scene! FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves features a unique art style that stimulates the senses and an innovative REV System that supercharges the excitement. Here, at long last, a new legend is about to unfold…

name: Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Slay the wicked in this gorgeous Japanese-style world of roguelite! Mastering the Demon Blades and fighting hordes of demons in the Edo period as Shigure the kunoichi. With each adventure, you will unravel the truth about her immortality.
storyline:
Once upon a time, a fine balance was maintained between humans and demons. Although there are occasional disagreements between the two sides, they still try to maintain the hard-won peace.
Until the king of all demons, the "Nine-tailed Fox", emerged and led all the demons to wreak havoc on the mortal world.
Embark on a journey in a chaotic world and fight against all kinds of demons. Find a way to restore peace through one adventure after another and gradually piece together the truth behind the mystery.

name: Tempest Rising
summary: Classic RTS action meets modern production and performance in Tempest Rising. Inspired by RTS greats of the 90s and 2000s, Tempest Rising is a classic, base-building real time strategy game set in a modern day alternative history war scenario. It features 3 unique factions, each with its own approach to combat and economy and offering a variety of strategies for players of all stripes, deep and rewarding gameplay that keeps a focus on strategy while rewarding skill, and built-in customization options that allow players to approach the game their way in both single player and multiplayer game modes.
developers: 3D Realms, Slipgate Ironworks, 2B Games Sp. z o.o., Saber Interactive, Knights Peak

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.11 feat. V.W.P
The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Visual Novel
summary: A new adventure from the creators of the Danganronpa and Zero Escape series! 15 students are tasked with defending a school from grotesque monsters for 100 days. Can they make it to the end? And will they survive long enough to uncover the truth?
developers: Aniplex, Media.Vision, Too Kyo Games, XSEED Games
storyline:
Takumi Sumino is a totally average teenager living in the Tokyo Residential Complex, a place where every day is much like the last and nothing bad ever happens. All that changes when freakish monsters attack the town and start wreaking havoc. A strange creature calling himself Sirei appears and offers Takumi the power to protect those he holds dear... All he has to do is stab himself in the chest!

The next thing he knows, Takumi is in Last Defense Academy, a school in the middle of nowhere surrounded by a wall of otherworldly flames. He and 14 other students have been drafted into the Special Defense Unit, a team tasked with keeping the school safe for the next 100 days. How much are they willing to sacrifice to take back their normal lives and save the world from the grotesque school invaders?
The curtain rises on 100 days of war and despair...

name: Maliki: Poison Of The Past
summary: Join Maliki and her wacky family in their epic battle against Poison, a fearsome plant creature that has colonized space-time. Go along on a fantastic odyssey through the ages that provides a unique mix of exploration, temporal riddles and turn-based fights full of surprises.

name: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure
summary: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure is a co-op cooking-combat adventure that combines the chaos of a collaborative kitchen and the wonders of adventuring into an unexplored world. Embark on an exciting culinary journey, whip up delectable delicacies, and serve your way through a fantastical reimagination of Southeast Asia!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen
storyline: Two aspiring culinary geniuses open a traveling food truck and venture out to Khaya Island – a long abandoned, dangerous island with no shortage of monsters and mysteries. Together, the duo explore Khaya Island in search of new recipes and tastes while slowly uncovering the veil of secrets that haunts the locale.

name: Dumbot
summary: Dumbot is a retro style hyper casual scrolling platformer game. Fluid and challenging gameplay designed to entertain. Amazing graphics, easy controls and two big worlds to explore providing you with many hours of fun playing time. Also no annoying in app purchases.
storyline: DUMBOT NEEDS YOUR HELP. Dumbot is a self-aware Robot used by the military to test exoskeleton robotic suits. Dumbot has endured punishing testing including being shot at and crashed. Even worse he has been set on fire, had grenades thrown at him and had IEDs and other explosive devices used on him. So far he has survived all of these punishing and dangerous tests. But now he has a very serious problem. He overheard that his next test will be his last as he is set to be blown to smithereens in-order to test the max explosive tolerance of the exoskeleton suit. Now he needs to find a way out before it’s too late. CAN YOU HELP SAVE HIM?

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Special Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

Contents:
- Base game
- Season Pass 1
- DLC Character 1 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 2 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 3 (Scheduled for: Fall 2025)
- DLC Character 4 (Scheduled for: Winter 2025)
- DLC Character 5 (Scheduled for: Early 2026)

[Special Bonus]
- Pre-order Bonus
Early Access: 3 Days (Playable from April 21, 2025)

- DLC Costume: “FATAL FURY 2: TERRY”
* Digital Version: Bonus included if you purchase the game by April 23, 2025.
* Preorder costume bonus may be released as paid DLC in the future.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Remaster of the complete version of Lunar: Silver Star Story, released as part of the Lunar Remastered Collection bundle.
developers: GungHo Online Entertainment, Inc., Game Arts

name: Lunar Remastered Collection
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Embark on thrilling adventures within the enchanting worlds of LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue Complete! These two cherished JRPGs have delighted gamers for generations. Now, in this definitive remastered edition, experience enhanced graphics, audio, and quality-of-life improvements that make the journey even more magical!
developers: Game Arts, GungHo Online Entertainment, Inc., Clear River Games

name: The Flayed Man
summary: The Flayed Man is a short narrative-driven point and click horror game. Awaking without memories (or skin), you must uncover the sins of the past, pass judgement, and decide your fate in this macabre adventure.

name: Mandragora: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Includes:
Base Game
Deluxe Pet Follower
Deluxe Armor Transmog Set
Original Soundtrack
Digital Art Book

name: Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate" is a side-scrolling beat'em up with the heart of a fighting game, supporting cross-platform pixel art anime action with up to 8P online multiplayer and all the characters from "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Overdrive"!
storyline:
Japan's capital, Tokyo.

The mysterious man, Phantom, has been operating in the shadows in order to regain his immense powers, which have been sealed.

He granted a weapon called FA (Fu-mension Artifact) to young talented individuals, and enticed them into battle by promising them to grant their wish if they win in battle.

This is because the clash between the FAs will generate a distortion in space and time, creating an opening that leads to an alternate world. This opening will eventually unseal his powers.

Waka, the young daughter from the Kumon family belonging to a clan of exorcists rebelling against Phantom, and Mikoto, who offered cooperation, tried to stop this conspiracy, but lost him just before defeating him. In addition, Waka's younger sister Nagi has been kidnapped by Phantom.

Itsuki, who yearns to become the hero of Justice, and Yuzuha, a ninja who once managed to escape Phantom's seduction, also joins the fight, and the 4 girls set out on a search mission to track down Phantom and save Nagi.

name: Tempopo
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Tempopo is a contemplative puzzle game of planning and execution. Guide your Tempopo to rescue musical flowers across imaginative sky islands and arrange them in your own melodic garden. Take your time placing instructions and watch the harmonious or hilarious results of your decisions.

name: Wizdom Academy
summary: Lead a wizard school in 3D, recruit students and staff, manage resources, and solve the mystery of severe mana droughts in Wizdom Academy. Engage in deep interactions with AI characters and thrive in this magical adventure !

name: Over Requiemz
summary:
“Whatever pain awaits, I won’t regret this choice.”

A dark fantasy game about overcoming grief as you wander into the “Land of Oz.”
storyline: "OZ" is a country ruled by a king and four witches. There are many mysterious structures called "Ruins", and it's said that strange creatures wander in it...

name: Rusty Rabbit
summary: Millennia after humanity abandoned the planet, rabbits claimed their place... Stamp, a cute bunny with an old soul, pilots his trusty mech "Junkster" through the giant ruins of a frozen world in this 2.5D action belt scroller.

name: Bionic Bay
summary: An ordinary man in an extraordinary world. Bionic Bay is a new kind of a 2D platformer. It introduces a unique Swap mechanic, allowing players to interact with the physics-based world in new ways. The immersive gameplay is completed by spectacular environments and creative level design.
developers: Psychoflow Studio, Mureena Oy, Kepler Interactive

name: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Mankind has surrendered the world to the monsters. People hide away behind walls of brick and palisades of ignorance, constructed by their leaders. Joy and delight are coveted jewels, out of reach of the masses. This is not the world you were promised. Travel by night and take it back. Journey through a world in decline, slowly falling prey to the damaging effects of Entropy. Fight against vicious enemies, challenge unique, deadly bosses, meet new allies, enemies, and every shade in-between, and make harsh moral choices. There are many paths worth taking. Choose yours.
developers: Primal Game Studio, Knights Peak, MY.GAMES

name: Lushfoil Photography Sim
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: An exploration/photography experience set across a vast selection of faithfully detailed landscapes.

name: Total Reload
summary:
Ever had something turn out so disastrously that you wished you could just reset and start all over again? In this game you may just have the chance to reboot the grandest experiment ever gone wrong. That experiment? The Universe itself.

You will find yourself inside an amazing single mechanism, impressive in its scale. Taking control of its silent resident Artificial Intelligence named HAWKING, you will be able to visit many locations filled with a variety of technical devices.

Solve spatial puzzles, change the fundamental laws of physics to activate all systems of this incredible mechanism and launch a process called TOTAL RELOAD!
storyline:
The plot of the game will be presented in an unusual way. At the start, you will take control of the body of the main character - an Artificial Intelligence named HAWKING, while the AI's mind will function independently and realize that the body is now controlled by someone else. Therefore, HAWKING's mind will periodically communicate with you through text comments that will appear on the screen at certain moments. With the help of these comments and wall drawings you will learn the plot of TOTAL RELOAD.

This is a story about loneliness and difficult challenges posed to oneself, a story about the search for absolute universal knowledge. In a sense, this is a metaphorical narrative hidden under science fiction about the game developers themselves, alone trying to complete a difficult task and overcoming various intellectual obstacles. The game will also contain references to the works of real-life personalities, for example, to the songs of the rock band Muse and the book by Robert Heinlein.

name: Progress Orders
summary:
is the guild where many adventurers meet.
Your unique story begins as you support your companions as the guild master!

name: Leo & Mia: Animal Rescue
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Become a valiant animal rescuer as either Leo or Mia! Save wildlife in the savannah from poachers and other dangers in over 15 exciting missions!

name: Wind Fantasy: NeXus
summary:
Wind Fantasy:NeXus is a TBS game.
In collaboration with 10 Taiwan's popular VTuber in depth into the cooperation, tailored to create a dedicated main storyline and permanent presence in the game, the player will be together with them in the world of wind fantasy, and the legendary heroes together to embark on an epic adventure
storyline:
The “Wind Fantasy:NeXus” series is renowned for its expansive world-building, richly detailed characters, and thrilling plot twists. This sequel is meticulously crafted by the original Windsor development team at “FY Technology.”

In the new storyline, an unknown force disrupts the balance of creation, and players take on the role of the “Zoomer,” a being capable of wielding miraculous powers. Along the way, they encounter the enigmatic AI girl “Little Yemira” and join forces with the legendary heroes of the “Wings of Guilt.” Together, they embark on an epic journey to save the world.

name: The Talos Principle: Reawakened
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Step back into a world of thought-provoking puzzles, philosophical intrigue, and breathtaking visuals with The Talos Principle: Reawakened - a first-person puzzle masterpiece for both new players and long-time fans alike.

name: Star Overdrive
summary: Use your powers to explore a massive world on your Hoverboard at lightning speed, face multitudes of enemies and epic bosses. Journey through four uniquely distinct biomes, each brimming with challenges and secrets to uncover.
storyline: After receiving a mysterious distress signal, you'll embark on a daring adventure through an alien world, uncovering secrets hidden in its depths

name: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel, Card & Board Game
summary: Asuha, a self-proclaimed gambling prodigy, challenges the Witch ruling the gambling district. Poised to win, she is defeated by a mysterious power. An adventure of gambling, exposing frauds and earning fortunes through poker.
developers: ACQUIRE Corp., Alliance Arts, WSS playground
storyline:
Asuha Senahara, a self-proclaimed genius gambler, is a wanderer.
Amidst the tables of cards and dice, it is she alone who snatches the chips at stake.
One day, she learns of the “gambling district”, a special ward where gambling holds influence above all else.
The “Witches” - a group of the most extraordinary gamblers rule over the place - treat Asuha to the taste of defeat; something she was unfamiliar with.
They exercised not luck, not skill, but dirty tricks, such that felled Asuha to the depths of the abyss.
As a self-proclaimed genius gambler, Asuha becomes determined to take down the Witches.
The Coliseum is the battlefield. The challenger is Asuha Senahara. The chips are on the table, and the Witches are ready to be exposed.

name: Promise Mascot Agency
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Explore the cursed town of Kaso-Machi! Recruit and train mascot friends! Help out when jobs go wrong! Solve the mystery of your exile! Help Pinky work through her many anger issues! Turn Promise Mascot Agency into the best agency in Japan! Go go, Michi and Pinky!
storyline: Michi, a disgraced yakuza lieutenant, is exiled to a cursed town to turn a bankrupt mascot agency into a profitable enterprise. As he struggles in his new life, can he manage to make a successful business and unravel the conspiracy behind his exile? He’s helped by Assistant Manager Pinky, who happens to be a mascot herself.

name: Crashlands 2
summary: Slap your way across a vibrant world where interstellar friendships are the key to your survival. Befriend eccentric aliens, craft bizarre weaponry, and stick it to the man in this sequel to the award-winning open world crafting RPG Crashlands.
storyline: Return to Woanope as Flux Dabes, intergalactic trucker and disgruntled corporate employee. After years away from the planet under a lucrative (if morally dubious) Spokesperson contract for the Bureau of Shipping, you return to visit some old pals and recover from corporate burnout. But before your vacation can even begin, a mysterious blast from the planet's surface sends you crashing into a new land, far from friends and alone in an alien wilderness.

name: Pilo and the Holobook
summary: Join Pilo and Prof on a new space adventure! Use your Holobook to turn everything into stickers and create your encyclopedia of a new world. Explore new beautiful planets and meet new friends in this sweet adventure game.

name: Blue Prince
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Welcome to Mt. Holly, where every dawn unveils a new mystery. Navigate through shifting corridors and ever-changing chambers in this genre-defying strategy puzzle adventure. But will the unpredictable path you create lead you to the rumored Room 46?

name: Descenders Next
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Grab your board and master the mountain! Descenders Next is the ultimate extreme sports game, with sprawling snowy peaks, winding dirt tracks, and tons of parks to conquer. Will you and your friends become the Next Ultimate Descenders?

name: Commandos: Origins
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
In 2019, Kalypso Media Group announced that a new 'Commandos' title was in development and last year it revealed that newly formed Claymore Game Studios was working on a next-generation installment in the Commandos strategy series.

Commandos: Origins tells the story of a newly founded British commando unit that grows into a brotherhood during its operations against strategic goals of the German Wehrmacht.

The player will control different characters with different abilities from an isometric perspective of the playing field and use them strategically in such a way that the given mission goal is achieved. So you will work your way through the various missions based on historical locations and missions to the respective goal.

name: In Search of Heroes!
summary: Calling all Heroes! The age of knights is in its twilight, but the people still require your aid! Venture through various randomly-generated locales, complete quests and take down fearsome bosses. Return to your home estate to construct new buildings, equip powerful weapons, and rally new heroes!

name: Tiny Garden
summary:
Tiny Garden, build your own magical garden inside a 90s toy
Plant your vegetables and trade them for furniture to customize tiny gardens in this delightful mix of farming, puzzle and strategy

name: South of Midnight
summary: South of Midnight is a new action-adventure from Compulsion Games. Explore the mythos and confront mysterious creatures of the Deep South in this modern folktale while learning to weave an ancient power to surmount obstacles and face the pain haunting your hometown.

name: The Songbird Guild
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Visual Novel
summary: The Songbird Guild is a Yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job.

name: Bot Hunter
summary: Fast-paced roguelite shooter with modular weapons. Play as a vacuum cleaner bounty hunter. Use color theory to clean the galaxy of bot scum and collect rewards to pay your bills.

name: Bioid
summary: The Space Library is a mess! Several dimensions intertwined with each other after the King of Thorns escaped from the Book of Worlds. Little Bit is rushing to help Owl-like turn the disorder into constant chaos!

name: Mirrored Soul
summary: A turn-based RPG detective story with focus on monster-collecting, exploration, and humor. Negotiate with enemies to recruit them to your party, and fuse your monsters to create new ones.

name: Dragon Blazers
summary: Dragon Blazers is a mix between 16bit arcade and Toriyama style. You are part of the Dragon Blazers, a team of powerful warriors mastering an ancient martial art technique with a dragon power, fighting against an evil cyber-ninja army that's ruining our beautiful world.

name: Idiotic Dots
genres: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: A person called Mr. Dot has assassinated the square president. He suffered the electric chair but after a deal with God he risen. Play as Mr. Dot and run around the weird town of Hammingham running away.
storyline: A person called Mr. Dot has assassinated the square president. He suffered the electric chair but after a deal with God he risen. Mr. Dot runs around the weird town of Hammingham running away.

name: Holy Grain
summary: Holy Grain is an absurd and hilarious roguelike, packed with tons of events, crazy battles, and one simple goal: blindly follow the counselor's orders. Your army's gonna have your back as you smash through those objectives, and the entity will always be there to protect you.

name: The Path of Ren
summary: A 2D precision platformer set in an anime-inspired world between life and death. Those who lacked fulfillment in their lives arrive in this world when they die. Take on challenging, unique, and rewarding platforming challenges in a game that explores what it means to live a fulfilled life.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Markus
Korean Drone Flying Tour East River
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: South of Midnight: Premium Edition
summary:
Immerse yourself into the macabre and fantastical world of South of Midnight with the Premium Edition, which includes the full game, up to 5 days early access, and digital access (in English) to:
• South of Midnight Artbook
• Original Soundtrack composed by Olivier Deriviere
• The Boo-Hag Comic book by Rob Guillory
• Music Video: Songs & Tales of South of Midnight
• Documentary: Weaving Hazel’s Journey, Director’s Cut

name: Toni Island Adventure
summary: Toni, a pizza-loving sailor dog, shipwrecks on a mysterious island. Solve challenging puzzles, defeat foes, unlock minigames, unravel the island's ancient magic to find your way back home, and don't forget to take a break for a hot slice of pizza!
storyline: Toni's ship wrecks due to a relentless storm in the middle of the ocean. Surprisingly, he wakes up on the beach of a mysterious island, awakened by a curious monkey. The island is inhabited by a small village of dogs who report mysterious and concerning events that have been happening recently. Now, it's up to Toni to help them solve the mystery, solving puzzles and facing the unknown magic of the island, in exchange for the promise of assistance to return home.

name: Detective Dotson
platforms: Linux, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac
summary: Chase down criminals, spy on bad guys and solve cases! Change into a disguise or recruit a team member - your choices matter! Enjoy multi-genre gameplay and watch thrilling episodes. Games and stories from the endlessly intriguing modern day India!

name: Leafing Home
summary: Leafing Home is a cozy adventure game where you play as a small squirrel on a quest to retrieve the World Tree’s stolen fruit and find your way back home. Explore a vibrant world filled with quirky characters, and help restore nature to its former glory. Master unique flight mechanics, tackle aerial challenges, solve puzzles, and dive into a variety of fun mini-games. This heartwarming tale of belonging and environmentalism is perfect for players of all ages.
storyline:
Leafing Home tells the tale of a young Prevost's squirrel, adopted and cherished by a family of flying squirrels. As the lone non-flyer among them, the little squirrel always felt a bit different.

When the precious fruit of the World Tree is stolen by a mischievous blue-footed booby, the squirrel bravely attempts to retrieve it, only to fall from the towering mountain. Now, it must find its way back home and reclaim the stolen fruit.

Joined by the bee detective, Detlev, the squirrel embarks on a wholesome journey. With the aid of a magical leaf, it learns to fly and explores a world marked by environmental issues. Along the way, it encounters extraordinary creatures, including colorful, arm-flapping birds, leggy fish, and giant tortoises.

name: Green Thing from the Planet Jupiter
The Electrifying Incident: A Monster Mini-Expedition
summary: An adorable bite-sized adventure from the creators of A Monster’s Expedition - explore the facility, avoid the live electricity, and repair the malfunctioning reactor.

name: Space Outpost Sigma
summary: Sigma Prime is running out of resources! We have to venture into space and mine as much ore as we can for the home planet. Can you survive the harsh environment of an asteroid field? Use probes to discover the sector. Pilot mining ships or direct mining drones to mine ore from asteroids that fly by. Protect Outpost Sigma from collisions using shields. Buy from trading ships. Transports will come to take the much needed ore back to Sigma Prime. If the situation goes bad, you must escape! Good Luck. This is a single-player 2D top-down pixel game with space physics. Random generation makes every run unique. If you ever want to just mine some asteroids while trying to survive the harshness of space, this is the game for you.

name: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday is a DLC that adds content themed around the Like a Dragon franchise.

name: Rolling Star
summary: Bursting with hilarious dialogue and comical encounters! The second installment of the super-exhilarating Metroidvania series is here!!

name: Space Battle
summary: Pilot your ship through dangerous space and defend against relentless imperial attacks in Space Battle, a high-intensity round-based strategy game.

name: Shadows Of Wyrmwood
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Indie
summary: Shadows of Wyrmwood is a roguelike adventure RPG. Use spells, swords, and strategy to defeat every corrupted foe. Travel across four procedurally generated maps that grow harder with every encounter. With each victory, you obtain new armor, weapons, and spells from defeated enemies.
storyline:
Chosen by a magical sprite to save the world, you venture to Wyrmwood, a
once idyllic magical land, now corrupted by an unknown darkness that feeds on

conflict and chaos. Once peaceful denizens stand in your way, confused and cor-
rupted. You must overcome each one, allowing the sprite to cleanse them of the

cursve, so that you can make your way to Wrymwood’s magical source, its Drag-
ons. Under the influence of the chaos, the Dragons throw their unmatched power

against you. Do you have what it takes to restore the balance and save Wyrmwood?

name: Cataclysm Wars
summary: The Empire is under attack, and only its mighty armies can save it! Shame you aren't in charge of those, then. Lead an outmatched militia through overwhelming odds in this turn-based strategy game, and save your nation from collapse. Or, lead the dogged Syrinx foe and crush the Empire!

name: Arch Wizard
summary: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.
developers: A Game From Low Polystan, Toster12D3
storyline:
You are a powerful mage. Lost in the ruins of warp portal network, once connecting the outskirts of the multiverse.
You must fight your way through cosmoses.
First — to get back to your Tower.
Second — to establish dominance on the parallel realms.
To go back from THE OTHER SIDE.
To find the source of Chaos.
To face the End of the World
To become the eternal ARCH WIZARD — an architect, a director, a tailor of your own fait.

name: Kitchen Wars
summary: Kitchen Wars is a fast-paced party game with 2-8 players that plunge players into the chaos of a restaurant, where they must engage in strategic fights and theft while catering to their clients.

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage - Tape 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5

name: Bang Bang Barrage
summary: Survive the treacherous sea in this quirky top-down roguelike shooter! Play solo or team up and fight off Cthulhu's minions. Master a unique recoil-based mechanic to blast enemies and chart your course. Mix and match upgrades to craft the perfect sea-surviving strategy!

name: Koira
summary: Save a puppy and embark on a musical, hand-drawn adventure. Journey together to the heart of a magical forest. Run from danger and discover your powers.

name: Idle Waters
summary: A relaxing idle fishing game that waits for you at the bottom of the screen while you do other things. CATCH, COLLECT and DISPLAY fishes!

name: Hidden Cat Outlaws
summary: Funny hidden object game. Become a sheriff and find all the cats wanted in the Wild West. Relax and laugh as you catch naughty cats!

name: Oni Hunters
summary: Journey through Gironia's lands, where monsters roam and secrets await. Battle, fuse creatures, and decide your fate in the grand Monster Jubilee. Ready for the adventure?

name: Galactic Warship
summary: I always wanted to play a game where I could take direct control of a capital ship in 3D space. When I couldn't find that game, I decided to make it. As a solo developer I spent two years crafting Galactic Warship - letting you pilot massive capital warships in full 3D with complete 6-axis freedom.

name: Underquest
summary: Cute fantasy roguelite with backpack mechanics. Combine items to create powerful skills and use them in fast-paced combat. Explore randomly generated dungeons in the Underkingdom and discover the secrets of its inhabitants!

name: Wizabeasts
summary: Wizabeasts is a monster-taming RPG with tactical battles! Uncover a mystery from the past, take down a dangerous gang, and get your student debt forgiven by defeating club champions!
storyline: You moved to Chademars to attend the prestigious Oscar's Academy, an academy that helps develop the battle skills of commanders! Graduates of Oscar's Academy can look forward to a very lucrative career! The one big downside of attending Oscar's Academy is that it costs $5,000,000... This debt gets reduced by defeating club champions in battle. Defeating 1 club champion drops student debt to $2,000,000, defeating 2 club champions drops student debt to $1,000,000, and so on. You'll also have to worry about and help stop the increasingly dangerous Plume Gang. Plume Gang steal Wizabeasts, show a suspicious interest in cart research, and seem to be plotting something. You're also having recurring dreams that appear to have connections to events in the past and present... During your adventure, you will meet several characters like the snobby rich rival Edward and the friendly aspiring baker Cara.

name: Dungellion
summary: Rogue-lite with elements of Battle Royale and Action-RPG. Fight in randomly generated dungeons and find a lot of unique abilities! Become the only one who survived and go to the next stage along with the winners of other arenas. How long can you survive?

name: Noobs Are Coming
summary: YOU ARE THE FINAL BOSS. Brutal synergy arena roguelike. Pick your Final Boss character, equip boss patterns and combine tons of attacks to create unique builds. Play solo or in co-op!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Hillbilly Hellfire
summary: Defend a holy relic in this third-person tower defense repelling waves of hellspawn using divine intervention and a bit of hillbilly ingenuity. Charge headfirst into fierce battles, outsmarting twisted foes with quick decisions, explosive turrets, and precision gunplay as you claim victory!
storyline:
Down in the holler where the moon barely glows,
Skeeter was cookin' his meth by the rows.
An angel descended, all bright in the dark,
Said, "Boy, grab this gun; you're about to embark."

"The Keep holds a relic, holy and pure,
Hellspawn are comin', of that I'm sure.
Protect it with fire, with lead, and with might,
For demons are risin' to snuff out its light."

Skeeter, he chuckled, his grin full of sass,
"I’ll fight them varmints, and kick some ass.
Just lemme grab my hat and my propane tanks,
And I’ll show those devils who they can thank."

name: Seeking Adventure
summary:
A 2d, search and find adventure RPG about clicking things and finding stuff. Adventure through a map of hand crafted levels helping villagers, overcoming challenges and looting chests to find your place in this medieval fantasy world.

The game blends dice rolling mechanics with hidden object and point and click adventure games to bring a unique blend of genre to the table.

name: Toggle Tile
summary:
Toggle Tile is a puzzle game that has you changing the color of tiles in a 3 by 3 grid.
The goal is to change the color of all the tiles. Each tile has a 3 by 3 grid of icons inside it.
Each icon acts on the corresponding tile in the puzzle. Click on a tile to apply all its effects at once.

name: Festered
summary: Brave the terrors of a contaminated research facility, where every step could be your last. PSX style survival horror game.

name: Zexion
summary: Seek out new weapons and equipment to delve deeper into the dangerous world of Cypher-X72! Be warned, you aren't the only one seeking the forbidden technology known as Zexion! It will take cunning and valor to succeed in this action-packed sci-fi adventure!
storyline:
As the space warrior Natu, travel to the planet known only as Cypher-X72 in search of the mysterious Zexion to save their home world Orinth from destruction!

Seek out technologically advanced items such as the Force Blaster - A gun that fires a spread of bullets that can push blocks and knock back enemies, and the Gravity Harness - A device that lets you fly short distances. You'll need artifacts such as these to unlock paths to delve deeper into Cypher-X72.

Dangers and horrors only spoken of in legend lie ahead, and you aren't the only one seeking Zexion! Galactic warlords and devious space pirates seek Zexion to further their domination of the galaxy! The odds are against you... Are you up to the challenge?

name: Eldritch Escape
summary:
In this roguelike bullet-heaven, Earth has been consumed by an ancient eldritch god. Form a customizable squad of survivors and explore decaying, metroidvania-inspired worlds trapped within the god’s belly. Battle endless waves of nightmarish creatures, extract resources, rescue survivors, uncover forbidden knowledge, and search for a way out.

Portals powered by ancient eldritch forces link worlds and realities, forming a tangled web. With a limited oxygen supply, your squad has just 20 minutes to navigate the portal network, jumping from world to world in search of the one escape route. Can you escape the void in time?
themes: Action, Fantasy, Science fiction, Horror, Survival

name: Gigacrab: Getting Over The Meme
summary: Reach the top of the world using only your muscular claws. Every fall will test your patience. Can you make it?

name: Star Crew
summary: Star Crew is a 1-8 player co-op sci-fi roguelite. Maintain subsystems, fend off enemies, and stay alive long enough for evac to arrive. Powerful upgrade choices, procedurally-generated ships, and permanent progression. Survive with friends or handle things all by yourself.
storyline: The best way to save money on employees is if they don't live long enough to get paid. Amalgamate offers emergency-maintenance services to any and all companies that need to keep their remotely-operated ships and manufacturing plants running for as long as possible for as cheap as possible. Once the revenue of the site safely exceeds the amount of compensation that Amalgamate has promised its employees, a rescue ship is sent to extract them. The only problem is that Amalgamate promises its employees very, very high payouts.

name: Ma vie en rogue
summary: Ma vie en rogue is a roguelike spanning multiple themed dungeons and worlds bringing advancements such as a mini-map, first-person view, and paperdoll customization to the genre.

name: Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity
summary:
The visual novel Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity makes its return with a remastered edition, launching on Nintendo Switch and Steam in spring 2025 with a simultaneous worldwide release.

First released for PC in July 2008, the game quickly captured fans’ hearts, inspiring an anime adaptation in 2009.

This updated edition, supervised by Lump of Sugar, has been reimagined as an all-ages experience, partially remastered in high-definition, and localized into multiple languages.

The story follows protagonist Yuri Mito, the only son of the local priest at Yachimata Shrine. After a series of events during spring break, Yuri meets Kikuramikami no Hime, the guardian of a mystical relic in the woods near his school. She explains the strained history between humans and the Tayutai, a mythical race sealed within the relic due to their potential threat to humanity. To bridge the gap between their worlds, the goddess reincarnates as a young girl named Mashiro and entrusts herself to Yuri. However, the relic is accidentally destroyed, releasing the Tayutai. Particularly dangerous are the “Three Mightiest,” powerful entities hostile toward humans.

Armed with spirit powers unique to his lineage, Yuri teams up with Mashiro and three other heroines to explore whether humans and Tayutai can coexist peacefully. This romantic fantasy adventure tells a heartfelt tale of growth, connection, and the mysteries of love.
developers: Frontier Works, kawaiinium, Lump of Sugar

name: The Fool's Apprentice
summary: A wizard academy management sim where you—an obviously benevolent professor—must manage & cast spells on your many apprentices so that they might study the right spells… and perhaps even survive the researching process. Some may die, but oh well, can’t save them all!

name: Tower Dominion
summary: In this roguelike tower defense, repel waves of enemies by shaping the paths, customizing your defense and adapting your strategy to crush the invading swarms. No two playthroughs are the same and each strategic decision in this treacherous world could lead to survival or utter defeat.

name: Black Mesa: Military
summary: Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills. You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. This mod is not a recreation of any existing mods. It's my own creation and all maps and plot are being developed by me. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the villains and even see Gordon Freeman in person.
storyline: Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills. You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. This mod is not a recreation of any existing mods. It's my own creation and all maps and plot are being developed by me. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the villains and even see Gordon Freeman in person.

name: Booze & Ooze
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Card & Board Game
summary: In this deckbuilder and tavern management simulation featuring RPG and roguelite elements, you play a destitute leprechaun trying to claw his way back to fortune and power from behind the counter of a derelict inn. You are no hero material, but unfortunately for you, your clients are!

name: Feudal Bros
summary: Japan. Edo period. After many years of violent wars, peace has returned to the land, but it doesn’t seem like it will last for long. A new danger lurks in the shadows, and only two noblemen can stop it: Lord Baka, a Japanese feudal lord, and Prince Bouffon, a prince from the faraway land of France.

name: Shattered Time
summary: Step into the chaotic world of Shattered Time, a 2.5D platformer set within the mysterious confines of a high-tech laboratory. As a lone experiment gone awry, you gain the ability to manipulate time itself, allowing you to reverse moments in the environment and use the past to reshape the present.

name: Malevolent Madness
summary: Malevolent Madness invites players into a tension-filled horror adventure, offering an experience rich in mystery and puzzles. A mysterious time machine unleashes extraordinary powers that could disrupt the balance between universes, but this discovery becomes a significant threat to humanity in the wrong hands.
themes: Action, Fantasy, Horror, Survival, Stealth, Mystery
storyline: Players guide a scientist with special abilities assigned to secret projects. Hidden in a dark cave, a time machine, which can only be activated by a specific DNA, initially shows no response but suddenly starts to function unexpectedly. This machine poses a risk of annihilating the universes if the same matter exists in both. As our character uncovers the terrifying secrets behind the machine, they decide to quit their job, yet a malevolent professor wishes to use the machine for his own purposes and abducts the character, subjecting them to torturous tests. The horrifying events grow increasingly complex.

name: Metrogether
summary: Metrogether is a train simulator where you drive, collect passengers, work together with friends and explore the subway network in a fictional city. Embark on your journey as a train driver or ticket inspector in single and multiplayer.

name: Bricksbumpbump
summary: bricksbumpbump is a local multiplayer party game (supporting up to 4 players). In the game, you need to control your character to move and stack blocks like building with toy bricks to achieve the game objectives. The first one to meet the objective wins the game.

name: Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers
summary:
Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers is a hi-score chasing roguelite following the adventures of a Pumpkin and their loyal friend.

Brave the Halloween night and work to survive against waves of monsters while collecting as much candy as you can! Discover new items by Trick-or-Treating between waves, purchase them from the shopkeeper for permanent use, and build a loadout that customizes the difficulty of every run!

name: Masks of the Void
platforms: Xbox, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation, Nintendo Switch
summary: Masks of the Void is a Rogue-lite action-RPG where you use powerful masks that grant you unique powers. Player's can level up their skills and swap them out for better ones as their journey continues.
storyline: You are Iret, a girl who has obtained this power and with it, the task to prevent a Neverending Night. Empower yourself or your allies in this journey while the world reacts to your decisions and your character grows stronger in a roguelike or roguelite style, all up to you!

name: Snakeloop
summary: Snakeloop is a challenging puzzle game based on a simple idea: What if you took classic Snake but inverted the goal and made it so you have to form a loop by eating your own tail.

name: Proud Dad Simulator
summary: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to have a proud and supportive dad? Proud Dad Simulator gives you the loving father you wish you had growing up! Simply click dad to receive an affirmation, or delve deeper to explore all 10 minigames and collect all achievements.

name: End's Reach
summary: End's Reach is a 3D Exploration Action Adventure Game that focuses on a character lost in the depths of space. Players will solve puzzles, collect upgrades, items, weapons and even magical abilities as they uncover the mysteries of this strange new world. A classic tale of technology taken too far.

name: Crony Corp
summary: Master Crony — it’s up to you to buy, craft, strategize, manufacture, and hijack to outperform your rivals and build your empire. In this competitive business builder game, your choices shape the live market. Seize every opportunity to dominate…or get demoted!

name: PBJ: The Musical
summary:
Imagine Romeo and Juliet… but it’s Peanut Butter and Jelly? This handcrafted musical game tells the badly researched story of the iconic sandwich’s tragic origins.
Join peanut boy and strawberry girl on their journey across animated paper landscapes, to the music from famous Crumble Lady Lorraine Bowen – and unlock spinoff remixes from different artists!

name: Kraino Rebirth
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S

name: Do Not Press The Button (To Delete The Multiverse)
summary: In this game, you can do anything except press the BIG RED BUTTON. Enjoy various activities and find creative ways to not press the button. Don't press the button! Do you understand? Inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Title_Pending.

name: Sheol Inferno
summary:
Sheol is a roguelike card game based on Dante's Divine Comedy.

You will accompany Dante on his journey through the 9 circles of Hell and fight alongside him to defeat the guardians of the circles.

Use the cards from the Spanish deck or Poker deck to complete the missions that will be assigned to you in each circle and thus be able to access the next one.

During the game you will earn gold that will allow you to obtain Blessings to help you on your adventure and, at the end of the game, you will be able to improve your skills on your character sheet.

FEATURES:
- Card roguelike.
- Spanish deck of cards or Poker deck.
- Character progression.
- Deck Management.
- Based on the lore of the Divine Comedy.
- Highly replayable.
- NO micro transactions.

name: Conquest Dark
summary: Experience an ARPG's rapid ascension to power in minutes, packed with savage, survivors-like action and devastating sword & sorcery combat. Perfect your builds through Dark Ritual runs that will decide humanity's future as you battle endless hordes across haunting ruins and cursed kingdoms.
developers: Eldritch Sword Games, Mad Mushroom Publishing

name: Heroes of the Seven Islands
genres: Point-and-click, Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Indie
summary: A party-based RPG with turn-based combat. Heroes of the Seven Islands is a comfy yet challenging adventure with side quests in a vast fairytale world, inspired by 90s games.

name: Wildkeepers Rising
summary: Tame monsters! Slay waves of enemy hordes! Explore fantasy lands! Wildkeepers Rising is a whimsical action-RPG roguelite set in a beautiful hand-drawn world that combines the power curve of bullet heaven games with the compulsive fun of a creature collector.
storyline:
When the monsters came, the Wildkeepers and their Guardians were our only hope.
Korin and Ophelia met just outside Ironshade, and they are working tirelessly together to put an end to the invasion.
Will they succeed?

name: Ogora
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try to survive!
storyline:
Having caused the Wizard a massive headache, you (and your ill-prepared companion) are temporarily banished from your home to play in the garden.
As an enchanted piece of furniture, you can guide both friends and foes through the twists and turns of the mysterious garden of Ogora.

name: Hellbreak
summary: Fight to save your soul from damnation in a brutal arena where only the strongest survive. Entertain the Lords of Hell and earn their favor to unlock new weapons, spells, and blessings. Dive into this fast-paced roguelite arena shooter and achieve the highest score. Can you reclaim your soul?

name: SpreadCheat
summary: SpreadCheat is a puzzle game that fuses intricate spreadsheet challenges with a comedic, 90s financial vibe in a retro Windows 3.11 setting. The Player takes on the role of the new office prodigy, solving absurd tasks and manipulating spreadsheet cells to hit specific targets using clever formulas.

name: Crowpoint Manor
summary: Step inside Crowpoint Manor, where every guest harbours a dark secret. As an undercover detective, you’ll solve bizarre puzzles, navigate dangerous traps, and witness hilariously tragic accidents.

name: Frogmageddon
summary:
Fight hordes of the evil snake army as one, several, dozens, hundreds of frogs, each with unique abilities and quirks. Frogmageddon is a bullet hell survival game where you flip the script of survival gameplay and become the horde yourself! Can you make it to 100 frogs and defeat the evil tyranny of King Snek?

Initially made for the GMTK 2024 Game Jam, the Steam version includes controller support, achievements, new game modes, new frogs, and much more!
storyline:
The year is 1472 according to the Frogeian calendar. The great Queen Lilith of the Empire of Froge has been slain, leaving her empire at the precipice in the chaos. All under the divine watch of Toadin stands to be lost, and The Principality of Ouroborus makes its move. With each passing day the walls of this once great empire are torn down one by one.

But the noble souls of the Empire are resilient. Taking up arms in a battlefield once ravaged by a prehistoric war, a lone Frogeian citizen readies to stain the now overgrown ruins once again. In a cruel twist of fate, the true history of these hallowed grounds are revealed. With each snake bested, a soldier from eras past joins the lone frog warrior's final stand. With nearly nothing to call home anymore and the bright flame of one's will to live on, the true nature of the world is revealed in their final moments. This battle has occurred before and will occur again. All that was will be sundered so it may be reborn in a new age. Can this frog make its own fate? Or will the truth once again be missing in another great civilizations annals of history?

name: Kaamos
summary: Kaamos is a bite-sized turn-based puzzle roguelike where battles are fought by matching tiles on a grid with looping rows and columns. Build your character and deck of tiles by looting equipment from your foes. Traverse a dark medieval world where the Sun went down and never rose again.

name: TCG Multiplayer Card Shop Simulator
summary: Multiplayer TCG Card Shop Simulator game. Dive into the world of multiplayer gaming by opening your own local game store! Stock your shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them open to collect the cards yourself.
storyline:
Welcome to the ultimate TCG Multiplayer Card Shop Simulator!

Manage Your Shop: Take control of your own local game store. Stock shelves with the latest booster packs and set your own prices.

Card Collection: Crack open packs to collect rare and powerful cards. Build your collection and trade with others.

Host Game: Organize and host exciting tournaments and events to draw in crowds and create a vibrant community.

Order Products: Keep your inventory fresh by ordering the newest products and exclusive items.

Expand Your Business: Grow your shop by hiring staff, upgrading your store, and expanding your space.

Play with Your Friends: Connect with friends and other players to trade, compete, and collaborate in building the best card shop around.

Are you ready to become the ultimate card shop tycoon?

name: These Darker Tides
summary: Welcome [EMPLOYEE] to your new job protecting Deep Sea Cables from creatures of the deep. We're not liable for loss of limbs, sanity, or life while on the job. Don't forget to keep your desk clean and your eyes on those cameras!

name: Nightmare Shift
summary: Nightmare Shift is a psychological horror game that follows a female protagonist who starts a new job as a motel receptionist, only to find her life spiraling into a dark and mysterious reality. As she questions her sanity, she must uncover the truth behind the eerie and abnormal events around her.
storyline:
In Nightmare Shift, you play as Emma, a newly hired receptionist at a secluded motel. What starts as a routine job quickly becomes a living nightmare as strange and unsettling events unravel around her. Emma's once-ordinary life descends into chaos, and she begins questioning her sanity as the line between reality and nightmare blurs.

As Emma, you'll explore the dark and eerie motel, uncovering clues and piecing together the mystery behind the terrifying occurrences. The game offers an immersive and shocking story, where every choice you make influences the outcome. With multiple endings based on your decisions, Nightmare Shift challenges you to face your fears and discover the truth behind the darkness that has taken hold of Emma's life.

name: Mayo Mayo
summary: Discover Mayo Mayo, a Match-4 game where strategy and agility are key. Chain clever combos, solve captivating puzzles, and break records. Challenge your friends or improve your skills solo in this competitive adventure full of surprises.

name: Jupiter Hell Classic
summary: Jupiter Hell Classic is the demake of a remake of a roguelike unmake of a famous 1993 FPS shooter. Rip and Tear!

name: Hotel Owner Simulator
summary: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: Effulgence
summary: Explore a mysterious world brought to life through text symbols.
storyline:
It's easy to transmit a video signal when you're just the distance of a satellite away. If you go beyond the solar system, it may take hours to send a regular image to Earth.

But when the signal comes from a galaxy a million light-years away, only fragments of symbols make it to us. Sometimes, they can be decoded and assembled into an animation made from text characters.

This is the story of a strange world. It may no longer exist, as the signal has traveled for a million years. Or perhaps it not only exists, but is preparing an attack?

name: Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi
summary: The Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi (Tamagotchi Nano Colorful ホロライブファンタジっち) is the second release in the Tamagotchi Nano Colorful line. It is made in collaboration with the 3rd generation of VTubers under Hololive Production, named Hololive Fantasy.

name: HackHub
summary: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in Hackhub. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: Treasure 'n Trio
summary: Team up with a brute-force warrior, a nimble and wily thief, and a cowardly wizard with teleportation magic. Use all three characters with different abilities at the right time to solve puzzles and collect treasures.

name: Escape from Mutation Station
summary: A short, unconventional escape room experience. You are the candidate. You must find a way out of this room. Things are not as they seem.

name: Deck of Haunts
summary: Deck of Haunts invites you to become a malevolent Haunted House. Lure humans into your cursed halls, manipulate their fears, and drain their essence to grow your power. Use strategy to build your mansion and expand your dark influence, turning your home into a terrifying, inescapable nightmare.

name: Jeepney Stories
summary: Jeepney Stories is a heartwarming, slice-of-life, funny and chill visual novel about family, chances, getting old and living in the third world.

name: Disaster Blaster
summary: Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you play as a mad scientist using a powerful simulator to engineer the most devastating weapon in the universe.
storyline: Every few seconds, the simulation pauses, letting you refine your blaster by adding or rearranging cards in your sequence. Since each card executes in order, positioning is key to creating powerful combos. Once the sequence completes, your blaster fires based on the combined effects of your chosen cards. Strategize, experiment, and survive to unlock new cards, characters, and planets!

name: Thorny Times
summary: You will have to gather an army, explore vast strategic maps, learn spells and capture castles. Defend the royal throne in battles against enemy knights, sorcerers and evil beings.

name: Lovish
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure game! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches!
storyline: Sir Solomon and the Saviors of Light depart Castle Cornelius to free Princess Tsuna from the grasp of the evil Devil Lord! But the knight is worried... What if after being freed, the princess falls in love with one of his friends instead of with him? So he does what anyone would do when blinded by love, and ditches his friends! Solomon ventures into the Devil Lord's castle alone, vowing to steal the princess's heart.

name: Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution
summary: 1789, Paris. Take Napoleon’s place in an alternate history as Céline or César Bonaparte in this ideology driven, turn-based strategy journey. Defend, reform or oppose the monarchy and write your own alternative history by combining cunning political skills and tactical military prowess.

name: I Want to Believe
summary: I Want to Believe is a first-person action game with elements of detective work, simulation, stealth, freedom of action, and driving.

name: Bar Night VR
summary: Mix. Serve. Restock. Fill. Repeat. Bar Night VR is a VR bartender experience where you manage a bar, being responsible for serving customers, restocking drinks, filling machines, and more. Progress through the nights and master the bartender experience!

name: Door4: Ultimatum
summary: Dive into the captivating world of puzzles with the new part of the Door game series. Your task is to find the correct door among many options to advance to the next level. But be careful: only by understanding the patterns and solving puzzles you can unlock the coveted passage.

name: Nebelmer
summary: Discover the unknown land of Nebelmer, a small open world game about exploration, movements and mysteries. Leave your village to uncover the wonders and secrets hidden beneath the mist.

name: Hexaroma: Village Builder
summary: HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.

name: War Mechanic
summary: "War Mechanic" is a unique first-person simulator set in a dieselpunk world where World War II never ended. Manage a military base, explore with your combat vehicle, and survive in a world driven by war and money.

name: Little Fighter 2 Remastered
summary: Rediscover the classic combat charm of "Little Fighter 2," now with fully upgraded and redrawn graphics, support for local connections up to 8 computers, and every character move more detailed and extravagant, providing an unprecedented combat experience.

name: Journey Up
summary: Gain sentience and climb up out of the mines and beyond on your own or online with up to 4 players. Play with checkpoints or without for a more tense experience. Supports VR and desktop monitor mode. Can you reach the top?

name: Teeny Tiny Harbors
genres: Puzzle, Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Tactical, Adventure, Indie

name: Freckles
summary: These are cute little creatures that come from the planet Mercury. On a mission to earth to the united nations, the freckles are challenged with the earth's space junk. While flying there spaceship they accidently crash into a fridge, crashing in the backyard of a greedy family named Maus.

name: Jumfrog
summary: Leap to Freedom! Guide a frog prince on an epic journey out of a deep, dark well in this challenging platformer. Every jump counts as you slingshot the frog with precision through tough obstacles. Can you conquer the fear of failure and find the light at the top?

name: Pieces of me
summary: Pieces of me is a psychological thriller drama in the genre of "walking simulator", which is a spin-off to the game "September 7th"

name: Three Skies Ascension
summary: A turn based, story driven, strategic RPG with challenging dungeons and hundreds of heroes and creatures to collect and customize.

name: Mirage: Ignis Fatuus
summary: As the world turns short of Mana, Mirage, the city of illusions, is in danger of collapsing! Help Kyuboy’d make his way through mind-boggling puzzles to save his hometown!

name: Voice of Belldona
summary: Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic, and sci-fi! The game features roguelike decks, turn-based combat, JRPG elements, and customizable builds. Choose a character and combat style, explore randomly generated maps, power up your team, crush your enemies and... interact with a cute loli?

name: Kill The Dream
summary: Kill The Dream is a survival horror game that combines brutal grid-based combat with first person exploration. Search the town of Frozen Pines, where survivors and monsters alike have been warped by the twisted presence in the lake. Hack your way through, end the nightmare, kill the dream.

name: Shadow Leap
summary: In the world of the night, the protagonist who has the power to manipulate "shadows" performs exhilarating actions to "leap" around and, together with his shadow clone, defeats his enemies. Shadow Clone Action game.

name: Fear the Timeloop
summary: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop?

name: Midnight Swamp
summary: A grim point-and-click adventure where you dive into a world of dark fairy tales. Play as a tourist who must find a way out of the mysterious Midnight Swamp.

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
summary: A dark fantasy about two worlds, human and demon, where vampire hunters who had fought alone now fight with the world's fate at stake.

name: Langort
summary: Langort is a roguelite deck-building hack-and-slash where you are a swashbuckling hero on a quest to defeat the Lich Queen. Fight endless hordes of undead, growing more powerful with every kill.

name: Countess in Crimson: The Black Dawn
summary: The Black Dawn DLC adds 3 new romance options into the game

name: Sultan's Game
genres: Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Sultan's Game is a card-based simulation and narrative game, inspired by The One Thousand and One Nights. You are one of the ministers of the mighty Sultan, a fickle, cruel king that treats his subject like pawns of a deadly game for his own pleasure. Forced to make dreadful choices to save your own life, you will have to find a way to survive not just the Sultan’s Game, but its consequences too.

name: Dread Tomb
summary: Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. You will face a rugged random map environment and terrain construction, adventure in various harsh random weather conditions, and discover a variety of thrilling mechanisms and mysterious monsters waiting for you.

name: Bullet Noir
summary: In the vengeance business, you leave no loose ends. Four characters scour the city, searching for their mentor's murderer in a brutal ballet of bullets. Stylish neo-noir top-down shooter with one-hit-one-kill mechanics.

name: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
summary: Gold makes god. Embrace city-building chaos. Pet giant monsters! Watch puny adventurers! Bend nature to your will with powerful spells and the greatest of all forces of nature - GOLD. Colony sim / reverse RPG

name: Card of Legend: Awaken Angels
summary:
Angels, Cards, Battle! Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces!
A fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.

Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces! A competitive Anime TCG game featuring fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.This game features PvP, PvE, Roguelike, Single Player Missions, and others. Play your cards right!
storyline:
A groundbreaking card battle game from developer ANCHORNODE, is making waves in the subculture gaming world.
Set in a rich fantasy universe, the game immerses players in an epic battle where heroes, aided by angels, fight to prevent the resurrection of an evil demon lord.
The game boasts 129 beautifully crafted angel characters, each with their unique backstory, blending perfectly into human society but unaware of their divine origins.

name: Possible One: Lunar Industries
summary: Possible One is the ultimate colony management game set in space, and the only space-related RTS game based on proven or very feasible technologies, avoiding sci-fi.

name: Croc: Legend of the Gobbos
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Argonaut Games, the legendary studio known for bringing its pioneering 3D technology to a 2D gaming world in the 1980s, has returned after a 20 year hiatus. It became a household name to gamers worldwide by developing groundbreaking titles, including the classics Starglider and Starglider 2, the seminal Star Fox (in collaboration with Nintendo), and Croc Legend of the Gobbos.

The reborn Argonaut Games continues the legacy established by Jez San OBE in 1982, now as a boutique publisher driven by creativity and developer collaboration. Possessing a catalog of classic gaming IP combined with a roadmap of original games, we hope you will join us as we embark on this exciting new chapter in Argonaut’s history.

Additionally, retro-gaming fans will be excited to know that the remaster includes the Crocipedia, an extensive and meticulously curated digital museum containing long-lost development assets, such as game design documents, concept art, animation tests, team member interviews, and much more.

name: Ignition Arena
summary: Ignition Arena is a competitive space combat game where players build and customize their own starships to engage in intense PvP battles. Set in a futuristic arena, the game emphasizes strategic shipbuilding and fast-paced combat. Players can choose from a wide array of ship components, including weapons, armor, and equipment, to create their ideal battle-ready vessel. With a focus on skill-based gameplay, Ignition Arena offers a dynamic multiplayer experience where tactics and customization are key to victory.
storyline: You are a prisoner, spared the death sentence by volunteering to become an Ignition Arena gladiator. For the amusement of the wealthy, you fight for your life and your freedom, building ships, gathering weaponry, and clashing with fellow gladiators, elite military personnel, and even otherworldly creatures. Your survival means more than entertainment—it fuels the war effort of the Terran Federation against the Unified Colonies. But how long can you last in a world where every battle is a life-or-death gamble?

name: Pip My Dice
summary: Pip My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next round, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create game-breaking combos. Climb the leaderboards and enjoy a different run every time!

name: Elevator Down
summary: Judge the Fate of the Dead in this satirical, bureaucratic, decision-making game. Talk to Souls, check their documents, reference Holy Texts and decide if they're going Up or Down. Follow the Rules or trust your own moral compass and see where your choices take you - hopefully not the Elevator Down.

name: Whisper of the House
summary: What's happening in this seemingly peaceful town? Strange residents, bizarre incidents, and unexpected storylines! Please be sure to let go of all your human lifestyle preferences and strive to meet the special requests of your otherworldly employers. Decorate this house with peculiar furniture!

name: Whispers of The Shadow
summary: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.
