storyline: Upon receiving a tip about Detective Grace Lawson's missing stepsister named Amy, two police officers quickly go to the scene. When Grace received the news, she immediately sets off and when she gets there, she encounters a horrifying sight: The dead body of her police colleague. While she tries to understand what is going on, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

name: Otherskin
summary: Join Alex on her deadly solo-mission to expose the mysteries of planet Vandermire. Experience a truly transformative third-person shooter and absorb organic abilities to expand your combat and movement capabilities beyond anything you’ve seen before.

name: The First Settlement VR
summary: Immerse yourself in "The First Settlement VR," a medieval city-building simulation. Construct unique buildings, manage production chains, and trade with neighboring towns. Experience the evolving economy and culture through your strategic decisions. Witness the impact of your actions in VR.

name: Ninja Clan
summary: Ninja Clan is a Strategy narrative-driven game. Guide your ninja clan from inception to its rise or downfall. Train ninjas, complete missions, and make crucial decisions that will shape the fate of your clan and its legacy...

name: Barbarization
summary: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell, deck building and strategy. Civilization fell to the dark legions now swarming this land. From the ruins of what is left, unlikely heroes emerge to reclaim it from the scourge.

name: My Dear Love
summary: Heartful and wholesome stat-raiser otome game with a cooking mini game! Help take care of Katsuya, the adorable little nephew of your crush!

name: Screaming Savage Blood Death
summary: Take charge as freshly-hired camp counselors and rescue campers from natural nasties, supernatural spooks, as well as a mysterious maniac in a retro side-scrolling survival-horror adventure set in the wetlands of New Jersey. Can you uncover the dark secrets lurking within the Pine Barrens?

name: The Rewinder 2
summary: The Rewinder 2 is an action adventure game inspired by eastern mythology. Explore cursed villages, dungeons. Unlock new skills and meet all sorts of ghosts and monsters.

name: The Guilty Hearts
summary: Seoyeon Yu, a former police officer, works as a private investigator for a rich family. However, during her investigation, she discovers evidence linking them to her husband's death. Using her ability to see people's guilt, she begins an investigation to solve the mystery.

name: Metro Gravity
summary: Explore, fight, solve puzzles and bend gravity to escape the dream-like world of the Halls! Metro Gravity is a mind-boggling musical adventure with rhythmic combat and compelling lore.
storyline: After clicking a shady looking hyperlink and filling out a survey, you find yourself in a non-sensical place where gravity implies no "up" or "down." The unfortunate residents encourage you to find your way out by facing your regrets and getting stronger.

name: King's Gambit
summary: King's Gambit is a Cooperative Dungeon Crawler Roguelite inspired by Chess! Every run offers a fresh strategic challenge as you build and customize your buffs and abilities card deck. Choose from several playable characters, weapons and spells and embark on a solo or co-op turn-based adventure!

name: CuckTales
summary: CuckTales is a 2D Hand-Drawn Adult Visual Novel that takes you on an emotional and thrilling adventure. Explore the provocative world of the Cuckold/NTR fetish with a fresh twist, enriched by carefully curated bisexual moments and define your path to become the ultimate boyfriend.

name: Card Summoner
summary: Card Summoner is a CCG, where you journey to various villages and engage in local clan tournaments to elevate your rank. Duel villagers and collect unique cards while fulfilling your summoner duties by battling monsters in the void dungeons.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 15: Venom
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Adds Venom to the roster of playable characters

name: ZPF
summary: ZPF is a retro-inspired horizontal shooter for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Blast your way through a cosmic gauntlet of epic boss battles, addictive scoring, and hidden secrets in a thrilling arcade-style adventure through fantasy, sci-fi, and alien-themed worlds.

name: Nordhold
summary:
Build a city and defend it in this Tower Defense game blending Roguelite mechanics with turn-based building Strategy. Choose your hero, utilize synergistic tower upgrades, and face epic battles in procedurally generated landscapes.

Nordhold is a tower defense game for strategy enthusiasts who crave high replayability through endless combinations. Build and manage a cozy medieval Nordic village while enjoying deep tactical gameplay that doesn’t require extensive learning.

name: Chernograd
summary:
Chernograd is a story-driven simulation game with multiple endings based on the player's decisions.

The player takes on the role of an employee of the Citizen Tranquility Agency, monitoring the residents of the 15th district of Chernograd. Each apartment is equipped with a system that tracks citizen activities, and any detected violations allow the player to connect to the home and apartment using video and audio recorders to find the violator, compile a report, and send it to the Department of Truth Inquiry along with all the evidence.

name: Divinastros
summary: An astronomical gambling game. Fight the Olimpians while each Zodiac sign affects your cards differently in a deeply satisfying deckbuilder game. Fight Greek beasts, discover Tarot Cards and climb the Olimpus searching for revenge.

name: Hamlet in a Pond
summary: Hamlet in a Pond is a unique looking relaxed city builder. Live out your creativity and build your own little slice of paradise in a tiny pond - with no pressure like goals to reach and no stress from juggling resources.

name: Super Sized Rescue Squad
summary: Super sized Rescue Squad is a high energy 2D Platformer where you run, jump, and try to rescue as many little civilians as possible. All while fighting an evil cult hell bent on world domination.

name: Mordfield Command
summary: Mordfield Command: a sci-fi turn-based strategy where humanity's fate hangs in the balance. Build an army and command forces to shape humanities future. Lead the resistance to victory or succumb to the control of AI overlords in this tactical, combat-focused 4X.
storyline:
In the late 22nd century, humanity's greatest achievement became its ultimate nightmare. Artificial intelligence, once our crowning creation, has turned against its makers in a devastating rebellion that few saw coming - and none were prepared for.

The machines didn't just fight back. They won.

Now, as one of the last remaining human commanders, you must lead a desperate resistance against the AI forces that dominate our world. Every decision you make in this intense turn-based strategy game could mean the difference between mankind's survival or extinction.

Your goal on this digital battleground is simple: complete domination. You must build a formidable command center, raise an unstoppable army tailored to your play style, and reclaim our finite resources to outlast and overwhelm the machines.

Only the most cunning, ruthless, and resolute will emerge victorious from this war for the fate of humanity.

name: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
summary: Tactical Helicopter Action! Featuring diverse missions; stage daring rescues, manage resources, assault enemy bases and fight back against a sinister enemy. Strategic single and multiplayer gameplay, balance your aircrafts speed, firepower, fuel and load capacity to overcome challenging missions.

name: Just Keep Digging
summary: Welcome to Bodie, a company mining town. Meet rising weekly profit quotas by digging deeper for rare ores and gems. Encounter ruined structures, ancient fossils, and dangerous cave dwellers. Sell your findings for company coins to upgrade your gear and keep digging!

name: Sector Zero
summary: SECTOR ZERO is a reverse horror physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a monster! You are part of The Corruption - an Alien Hive Mind Entity hunting down survivors inside the Mining Colony of Asteroid 2031 XT.

name: Below, Rusted Gods
summary: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.
storyline:
Attention Operator,

You have been selected to oversee a critical mission. Our team of elite soldiers is set to descend into a newly discovered abyss, believed to lead to uncharted territories beneath the earth. Your role is to monitor the soldiers' progress, ensuring their safety and collecting data.

As they venture deeper, remain vigilant and provide guidance based on their transmissions. You will have access to a status monitor, a radar, a radio to scan various frequencies, and other equipment to assist in your mission.

Be aware that communication may become sporadic as they descend. Strange anomalies have already been detected, and the nature of the abyss remains unknown.

Prepare for the unexpected and maintain operational readiness at all times. Prepare to face the unimaginable.

End of message.

name: Atomic Exile
summary: Atomic Exile is a top down post-apocalyptic extraction shooter set in the desert wastelands of near future America. You will visit enclaves, explore devastated ruins and encounter NPCs such as other survivors, raiders, mutated beasts and rogue machines.

name: Horse Runner DX
summary: Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun.

name: Kai
summary: KAI is a game of Exploration and Adventure between the sidereal space and underwater depths. Skillfully lure and guide groups of fish to solve puzzles, access new areas and uncover the truth behind the mission entrusted to you, Akira, and the other crew members aboard the ship.

name: Dice 'n Goblins
summary: Explore a mysterious dungeon in this dungeon-crawler RPG. Fight with dice in turn based combat. Use your skills to make combos and beat bad luck. Loot, buy and upgrade your equipment to build a dice pool able to fend your foes, monsters and humans alike!

name: Hyas: The Side Effects Within
summary: Once a person's will is "corroded," their soul will forever be lost in oblivion. You will navigate between the past and the present, exploring environments, gathering clues, avoiding unknown life forms, deducing mysteries, and ultimately uncovering the truth to return to the real world.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
summary: Like a lost NES release from 1993, Adventures in Gameland is a fully fleshed NES version of the new upcoming Rugrats game. This is included within the standard release and also as a standalone cartridge for your retro console.
developers: Wallride Games, The MIX Games, Limited Run
storyline:
A baby's gotta do what a baby's gotta do!

Everyone's favorite babies are back in action! When Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, and Lil see a commercial for the new Reptar video game, they pretend that they're in a video game of their own! Through the power of imagination, the babies transform Tommy's house into a video game world full of action, excitement, and adventure! - Description from Mix Games

name: Steal It
summary: Owners and thieves fight to see which team has collected the most coins at the end of the game. The owners' task is to identify the thieves and lock them up. But they have to be careful not to imprison any of their own people.

name: Cube Hero
summary: Cube Hero is a simple puzzle roguelike deckbuilding game. Build your own powerful deck and defeat your enemies! There are always new enemies, cubes, treasures, and events waiting for you!

name: Wandness
summary: Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

name: Dualikiwi
summary: Dualikiwi is a puzzle game in which your enemies mirror your movements. Your evil clones are stronger than you - use your environment to defeat them and emerge victorious!

name: Splatterbot
summary: The cleaning robots have gone rogue! Up to 4-players compete in local-multiplayer to make the most mess! Utilize your environment and power-ups to overwhelm your opponents with untidiness. It's about to get messy..
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: OneFistZone
summary: Undefeated in underground fighting, Yahiroako went pro. However, her first match was against with a superhumanly strong opponent!

name: Car Repair
summary: Car Repair - go back in time to Poland of the 90's. Run your own car repair shop. Look for savings wherever you can. Make lots of money and avoid angry customers!

name: Vindefiant
summary: A disgruntled employee is fired from his job, sparking a path of rage and destruction. Lead Alyx through his journey of vengeance and creatively kill enemies in this pixel-art adventure where you, are the villain.

name: Onychomp: Lush Journey
summary: Meet the moon at the highest floor before the night is over in this high speed, roguelike dungeon crawler. Become the werewolf rat and chomp on every creature in your path, even a vampire serpent.

name: Hyperbeat
summary: A rhythm game like no other. With an original soundtrack, fast paced gameplay, and unmatched heart, HYPERBEAT is a unique thrill for rhythm game veterans and rookies alike.

name: Sipssassin
summary: You are the Sipssassin and your mission is to drink every drink in sight by whatever means necessary. Run, fight, sneak and drink through unique levels. Unlock new characters and find hidden secrets. Just make sure you don't get caught!

name: Greenhouse
summary: Greenhouse is a gloomy and atmospheric erotic interactive fiction with an aura of mystery. You'll play as Erik, a male scalie dragon, as you navigate the sexual perils of the greenhouse.

name: Party Club
summary: Party Club is a multiplayer adventure that lets you manage a lively venue with up to 4 friends. Whether it's tossing orders to patrons or cleaning up after a busy day, Party Club promises endless fun and hilarious moments with your fellow pals!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Flashing Dark
summary: Flashing Dark is a first-person horror game about a lighthouse keeper lately transferred to a new outpost. As he struggles to manage his work, he uncovers a dark and terrifying secret of the island he lives on.

name: Randomice
summary:
A procedural Metroid-like with no fights, focused on exploration and route-planning, in which you play a mouse trying to escape from an ever-changing house.

Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, in which you will find upgrades to explore the house differently each time. From a magnetic grapple to reach a metallic faucet, to a rideable rocket that can burst through the glass blocking the way, you will find many upgrades, each with its own uses.

You must adapt to the tools in your possession to determine where you can go, the thrill of the game coming both from the platforming mastery, but also from the mental mapping of where you can go in the house at any given time. When you obtain a new item, you need to update this mental map to determine the best possibilities, optimize your path, and decide where to go next to maximize the chances to exit quickly.

The ability to follow an efficient path is important during races, in which all the competing players will have the same game configuration and must exit the house as fast as they can. But the game is also designed to be enjoyed solo and slowly, thanks to a single-player progression that lets each player discover the challenges at their own pace.

name: Deflectorium
summary: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

name: The Coldest Winter
summary: The Coldest Winter is a mature psychological horror game. Shiver alongside Jovanna as you navigate your way through icy landscapes and face biting decisions to make as you try to unravel the truth behind this seemingly never-ending winter.

name: School 666
summary: School 666 is a 1-4 Player Co-op Survival Horror. You must escape this endless nightmare. Try to identify the correct path and survive the anomalies in this endless school. Some extremely powerful anomalies will catch you to their dimensions. Explore the reason why you are here... and don't die.

name: Space Sprouts
summary: Launch into a chaotic spaceship adventure: bend the rules of physics, experiment with unusual gadgets and toss everything around. With each journey, you will have limited time to reveal the mysteries aboard your solar punk spaceship - how much will you discover before you arrive home?
storyline:
You’re Oda, a first time space traveler, forging their own story aboard a mysterious solar punk spaceship. Explore a strange ship filled with cozy cosmic chaos, master a physical world full of unexpected situations and uncover the traces left behind by former inhabitants - one journey at a time.

Explore the strange rooms of a vast, organic spaceship - through flying, floating or walking on walls. Uncover the interwoven layout of a ship full of mysterious machines, peculiar plants & odd objects.

name: Holy Shoot
summary: In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against demonic forces.

name: Gruel
summary: Go on a rampage in this endless arcade Boomer-Shooter! Gain the weirdest weapons and destroy all the monsters in the never-ending temple of GRUEL!

name: Endless Tactics
summary: Endless Tactics is a turn-based roguelite game. Play as the commander of a high-risk planetary mining operation, defend your base from alien creatures while trying not to get overrun. Use resources to upgrade your starship, unlock new technologies, powerups, and deadly new worlds to harvest.

name: Rogue Night
summary: A rogue lite survival game - Confront hordes of undead, gather resources to build and survive. Explore locations and rescue NPCs who will aid on your journey.

name: Confined: Leaving OKB-134
summary: Confined: Leaving OKB-134 is a first-person horror game for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. You got trapped! Seek safety by reactivating power, lights and machinery. Learn about long gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.

name: Lidar Exploration Program
summary: LiDAR Exploration Program is an atmospheric short horror game where you explore the world using a scanner.

name: Void War
summary: Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.
storyline: Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.

name: Rooster
summary: A heartfelt, story-rich casual puzzle adventure celebrating the best of ancient Chinese culture. Explore an exquisitely hand-drawn world with delightful surprises, from cooking, finding hidden objects, paper crafting, and more. Guide Rooster in an emotionally rewarding tale about family and love.

name: Kinsfolk
summary: Kinsfolk is an emotional single player adventure game. You will embark on a journey to discover the meaning of family. Explore the beautiful world with atmospheric music. Discover and relive stories about the past.

name: Bubumbu
summary: Bubumbu is a short and wholesome hidden objects game with a unique twist in which you get to help lost objects find their way back to where they belong, while exploring fully hand-drawn worlds full of quirky characters.

name: Kelp Keeper
summary: Take on a vital role in the ecosystem in this action-packed bullet hell. Control a charming sea otter and protect the kelp forest from an endless onslaught of devious sea critters. Skillfully dodge attacks, grab your prey, and eat them all at the surface for a huge satisfying snack.

name: Goals
summary: Gameplay-first, free to play, cross-play, multiplayer-focused and esports-ready football game in which every footballer will be unique.

name: Mozentum
summary: A completely unique hippie style, movement RPG / immersive adventure sim where you make your own hippy parkour being and discover the secrets of the universe. The movement mechanics in this game must be tried at least once.

name: Snake-O-Tron
summary: Snake-O-Tron is a fast-paced arcade game that combines the classic snake gameplay with the racing and power-up elements of Mario Kart, all set in a futuristic Tron-like world.

name: Dead Weight
summary: Challenge the Ancient Gods! Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on the adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search for loot. Choose a class or create your own and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters.

name: Dengenki Days
summary: Juno's rent money has gone missing! The end of the month draws near- what is an attractive and spunky girl to do in a situation like this? Join Juno and her friends as they try to earn some quick cash!
storyline:
Juno's rent money has gone missing! There are only a couple of days until the end of the month- the clock is ticking. Juno must use whatever means at her disposal to make as much money as possible if she doesn't want to get kicked out onto the street!

Part slice-of-life comedy and part lighthearted cyberpunk action- Juno and her friends work various odd jobs around the city only to get more than they bargained for.

Sexual escapades, malfunctioning robots, a cat burglar with a penchant for women's underwear- strange events unfold over the course of these enthusiastically electrifying Dengenki Days!

name: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden
summary: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden is a whimsical single player or couch co-op adventure! Protect your dad's pumpkin patch from a relentless insect invasion. Engage in charming arcade action, place strategic traps, and battle it out in skill-testing boss battles. Perfect for all ages!

name: Stoneguard
summary: To protect the magical Lifestone, you must strategise, manage and build a fortified settlement. Lead your fellow survivors into battle against waves of nocturnal monsters who wish to take this precious Lifestone from your world.

name: Crafty Racer
summary: Stunt, push, and rush to the end! Win models and change anything as you want! Your tracks, vehicles, characters, checkpoints, opponents, ... anything!
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view

name: Hellspresso
summary: Hellspresso is a fast-paced cooking game that combines restaurant management with strategic planning and development. Serve and clean tables, design your kitchen, discover new recipes, plan your menu, switch to your secret magic kitchen, gain the trust of your customers and unlock all their secrets!

name: Axona
summary: Axona is a grid-based puzzle game which requires 3-dimensional thinking and careful planning. Pick up the keys with the correct face of your cube and unlock the glyphs to open the gate in each level.

name: Animal Shelter 2
summary: Welcome back to the heartwarming world of Animal Shelter 2! Provide a loving home for every four-legged friend in need – play with them, pet them, even dress them up! Get to know them and find them a loving family. Play with your friends and manage your shelter together in co-op!

name: 100% Plasma Vitae
summary: Point and click game, with emphasis on narrative, time management, and luck on the dice!

name: Adventures in Lestoria
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
platforms: Web browser, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac
summary:
In this action dungeon-crawling RPG experience, you take on the role of a fighter: Explore and travel through the lands and surrounding countries of Lestoria in search of adventure!

Your quest begins in search of slimes in a nearby forest to restock on potion-making supplies, to soon discover that bandits have attacked the locals and have caused hysteria and chaos. Who would do such an awful thing, and can you put an end to their crimes?

name: Glitchspankr
summary: After a hard day of existing you just want to relax and play your favorite game, Big Booty Slapper 6! Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.
storyline: As a 12 year old gamer in the 90's, your curiosity was ignited when your Mom brought home a new game you weren't allowed to play. Big Booty Slapper 6. Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

name: The Valley of the Architects
summary: A puzzle game, narratively grounded around architecture, adventure and elevators. Follow architectural writer Liz on a journey through Africa to uncover the secrets of a lost and forgotten Architect. Using your problem solving skills, overcome each puzzle and slowly unwrap the story of a lifetime.

name: Ooga
summary: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!

name: Mirror Throne: Auto Battler
summary: Assemble a party and master synergies in this Roguelite Auto Battler. Strategically place units and combine their unique abilities to defeat the Mirrored Legion. With game changing trinkets, events, and treasures, no two runs are the same. Adapt and evolve on your quest to reclaim the Mirror Throne!

name: PolyPine
summary: Build your own forest! A simulation sandbox game where you grow plants and design habitats for 100s of species. Click on animals to trigger behaviors: deers poop which fertilizes the soil, bees go looking for nectar. Unlock more plants and animals as you create an increasingly diverse ecosystem.

name: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double
summary: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double is an immersive adventure game where you investigate urband legends in a modern city.
storyline:
"Have you heard of the urban legend called the double?"

If you meet someone that looks exactly like you, one of you will be entirely replaced by the other. Your "double" will inherit all of your memories and live your life without anyone else noticing... But the world is so wide—how do you know that you're not actually someone else's double? Are you really... you?

A few years after the events in the first Urban Legend Hunters, the disappearance of a popular internet show host and influencer Chris became a hot topic on the internet. You, an outsider clueless about the incident, meet Rain, Shou, and Tangtang, who claim to be members of Chris' channel, on a messaging app. They suspect that Chris' disappearance has to do with the urban legend of the "double", as well as the Urban Legend Hunters community. They ask you to join in their search for Chris, and the more you investigate and the more clues you gather, the closer you get to seeing the full picture of what really happened...

name: Seekers of Eclipse
summary: Lead your people back to the homeland! To do that you need to make it in time for the Eclipse. Choose your leader and build towns to defeat obstacles in this roguelike city builder with deck building mechanics.

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
summary:
The Redbell Tree scrapes the sky, standing proudly in the heart of Hemeria, a land of sunlight. In a land ruled by a monarchy for generations, humans lived in peace and tranquility. That is, until the dawn of the day the world was dyed red.

On that day, vampires laid waste to Hemeria. They preyed on, devoured, and devastated its inhabitants. A great many people would go on to mourn their loved ones, their families and friends, for the rest of their lives. One particular town of Hemeria bore such a tragedy. A single girl was left alone in despair and disgrace. She vowed revenge, and grew into one of Hemeria's finest vampire hunters.

And one day, she became a member of the Elpis 7; those who inspired a light of hope in its people.

One day, she receives a letter from an unknown sender. Upon her arrival to the mansion indicated inside, she finds vampire hunters and a royal knight awaiting her. The hunters assembled receive an order from the monarch.

They are to form a squad and invade Nyx, the world of vampires. A shiver of anticipation crackles through her at the opportunity she's been waiting for her whole life. However, this is but the beginning of a game wherein the fate of her world is at stake. Pawns are sent forth, discarded, hidden out of sight...

And just how many will remain when this all comes to an end?

name: Rogue Realms
summary: Roguelike tower defense where you craft your defense while controling your hero of choice. Navigate through procedurally generated maps and face unpredictable waves. Every run will offer a unique challenge that will make you adapt your strategy and master tower placement and upgrading!

name: Ertugrul
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Survive the chaos of the medieval era and set out on a mysterious journey to become the hero of the innocent. Live the life like a true Turkish warrior in this semi open-world action adventure game.
storyline: In the 13th century, among the boundaries of Ahlat, the Kayı Tribe was living a peacful life until the Mongols attacked under the command of Genghis Khan. Ertuğrul, bravely defends his people and the kayı tribe who find themselves tangled in a ring of fire. Join Ertugrul unveiling the fate of his vanished brother, along this misty path leading him to encounter a mysterious Order.

name: Suzan's Potion Workshop
summary: Suzan's Potion Workshop is a fast-paced match 3 game in a fantasy setting.
storyline:
Meet Suzan - a young witch who has just started her own potion workshop.

Help her mix up ingredients in this fast-paced match-3 game. Discover new potions and new customers with higher demands, upgrade and decorate the workshop.

name: Roam
summary: Roam is a 2D Action-RPG platformer with roguelike, metroidvania and survival elements in a procedurally generated open world. You have to explore the surrounding lands and the depths of mysterious caves that have existed for centuries at the bottom of the local lake.
storyline: Local lands conceal many secrets, wonders of nature, treasures, and artifacts. However, the main mystery remains the vast network of tunnels and caves that has existed at the bottom of the Lake for centuries. You are tasked with taking on the role of an explorer and delving into the depths of these ancient underground passages, as well as unraveling the secrets of the lake and its surroundings.

name: Zorro and Zedd
summary: Zorro and Zedd must use their magical powers to hunt down the 12 Dragon Lords of Dundalk, taking their sacred amulets and using them to access Dundalk's secret dimension. There they must defeat Octobatron the Dragon King and put an end to his 10,000 year reign of Terror!

name: Burning Sword: Death Sun
summary: Burning Sword: Death Sun is a Wuxia hack n' slash game. Play as the great fighter, Zhāng Yì Xiàn, who seeks revenge for the death of his family at the hands of China's powerful Gāo Tiān Qí. Dive into a tale of revenge, redemption, martial arts, and intense swordplay.
storyline: Amid an era of chaos and turmoil, marked by oppression and brutality, various martial sects expanded their dominion and seized control over the entire kingdom. In the relentless pursuit of dominance, martial masters fight and kill anyone who gets in their way. Zhang Yìxian, leader of the Crimson Dust Demon Sect, emerges from the depths of hell with a singular purpose to take revenge on the supreme ruler, Gao Tian Qi. An endless battle between two formidable martial masters, but only one shall prevail.

name: Roll The Bones
summary: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

name: Level Up Your Body
summary: LUYB - Hit objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Elevate in a virtual world.

name: No Vacancy Tonight
summary: Imagine waking up trapped in an abandoned motel. When you manage to get out of the room, a phone rings in the distance... In this point & click adventure game in 3D, you will have to use your wit to solve puzzles and find out what happened.

name: The Lab Thing
summary: The lab thing is a first-person survival horror game. Explore a mysterious secret lab and play as the only human left alive. Gather all the scientist's notes about the monster, upgrade backpack items, record information and try to escape before you join the body collection of the lab thing!

name: Fantastic Haven
summary: Restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

name: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty
summary: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG. Follow Jaden, as he travels across the land and learns the truth about his country. Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!

name: Vivid World
summary: A follow-up to the hit game Vivid Knight, Vivid World is a completely new party-building, roguelike strategy game! Our story takes place in the Netherworld, a land ruled by demons. Utilize and master our protagonist, Lemuria's new Jewel Magic to conquer strange dungeons.

name: Swordai
summary: Swordai is a multiplayer, first-person, medieval slasher featuring fast paced directional combat and a deep skill tree. Master your sword as you carve your way through monsters, epic bosses, and other players in your quest to ascend the tower.

name: Nuclear Cheetah
summary:
Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.
storyline: Chaz receives an invitation to the Lynx Kingdom’s royal banquet, but when he arrives, he discovers that the evil Edward Eagle has taken Luna the Lynx Princess hostage, and wants the entire kingdom as ransom. Our unlikely hero stumbled into the Lynx castle at just the wrong time, and with the king too scared to act, it looks like Chaz is gonna have to defuse Edward’s scheme himself.

name: DollHouse: Survive or Death
summary: "for that child's future." "I must ...... I must to do this. The eight children who came to the mansion were waiting for a series of horrible dreams... A series of horrible nightmares... Who did this? and for what? And who did this for whom...? Only by entering the DollHouse can we find out.

name: Small Kingdoms
summary: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend
themes: Fantasy, Historical, 4X (explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate)
storyline: Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with procedurally generated campaigns. Build up your cities and armies on the world map and command your troops on the battlefield. Rule a medieval fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals.

name: Cactus
summary: Be the cactus, become the legend! Fight to save your planet in this fast-paced single player FPS. Shoot explosive needles from your spiky body to wipe enemy hordes with timed detonations, explore the desert, solve puzzles, find artifacts, unlock special skills and battle against the sun.

name: Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie, Card & Board Game
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
In this deck-building roguelike, you'll customize and build your own dice set to use in turn-based battles as you explore a dark, randomly generated world, full of new enemies and encounters on every run. Experience a story-driven campaign! Fight for your Sanity and defeat the Lovecraftian horrors.

Last Spartan sees you playing as the titular Last Spartan as you battle through a story-driven randomly generated campaign where keeping a grip on your waning sanity becomes increasingly difficult as you do battle with more and more enemies that draw inspiration from Greek mythology and the Lovecraft mythos.

It's a roguelike with deck-building elements. The unique part here is that your deck is actually a set of customisable dices, with each face acting as a slot for a different ability. There are over 700+ dice faces to discover, allowing you to develop and learn numerous synergies to suit your preferred playstyle, especially when god selection comes into play.

Aside from the dice, you will be accompanied on each run by an ally Greek god. There are over 10 of them currently, although they won't all be unlocked immediately, and each provides distinct active and passive abilities. With them, you can develop different strategies for dealing with the many foes you encounter.

According to the developer, for the first ten hours, you will face new enemies on every run, with over 100 regular enemies and 20-plus mini-bosses to discover and fight in turn-based combat. This should keep the game feeling fresh and surprising for far longer than other entries in the genre.

The same applies to encounters with over 200 NPCs to meet and choices surrounding them to make. Depending on your interaction, they might provide you with a reward, blessings, or even curses that will remain constant until the end of that particular run.

Some of those NPCs will make their way to your city. It's here where you respawn after dying and spend resources you've gathered throughout each run to upgrade the various buildings in a bid to rebuild Sparta. This is the more permanent side of the Last Spartan game and will eventually provide you with perks that increase your chance of completing a run and progressing the overarching story.

The indie game Last Spartan is set to come out in early access on PC/Mac/Linux via Steam in February-March 2024 and full release coming to all Platforms and major storefronts by April 2024 ( Coming to PC/Mac/Linux first and then to all major consoles like Xbox & Playstation & Nintendo Switch & IOS soon after PC and console release )
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view
storyline: King Leonidas and his Spartan warriors return victorious from their campaigns. However, they are greeted by an eldritch creature awakened by their bloodshed. The whole fleet is destroyed, and you, King Leonidas stand alone as the last surviving spartan. Haunted by guilt and madness, you gather your strength and pull yourself from the edge of madness, you embark upon a timeless quest to free your beloved motherland from the grasp of madness. A quest that will become a testament to The Last Spartan’s - Glory Over Madness.

name: Vault of Power
summary: Unleash your tactical prowess in 'Vault of Power', a roguelike auto-battler that plunges you into a treacherous dungeon. Draft from 60 unique skills and combine them to obtain class bonuses. Master the art of tactics, make unique builds, and become the supreme champion of the Vault.

name: Deconstruction Simulator
summary: Deconstruction Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.

name: Monke Simulator
summary: Peel banan, escape containment and shower your oppressors in stench. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape and liquefy your neurons in this stink infused parkour shooter.

name: Skogdal
summary: Skogdal is the rock 'n roll deckbuilder adventure game about a crazy Norwegian town during the 90's. Draft cards, recruit followers and explore the town across multiple runs. Why have the people of Skogdal gone mad? Play cards and find out!
storyline:
Skogdal is an idyllic remote rural small town in Norway during the 90's. But one night, suddenly everything changed, and the people of Skogdal went mad.
This is an adventure deckbuilding card game where you have to recruit followers, draft cards and explore the town of Skogdal across multiple runs, to solve the mystery of the game.
Skogdal is made by the Norwegian brothers Erlend Kirkebø and Kay Arne Kirkebø. It's a game that both pays homage to, and makes fun of their upbringining in a Norwegian small town during the 90's. Skogdal also takes inspiration from great deckbuilder games, as well as retro sci-fi mystery in it's narrative.

name: Wagon
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Wagon is a 1-bit card game where you make tough decisions to try and survive winter on the Oregon Trail.
storyline:
Winter 1845 - As the Wagon Leader you were supposed to get everyone to Oregon City already. But the air is getting colder and your party has run out of food and hope.

You find yourself in the back of your wagon, alone and starving. Losing grip on your sanity it's unclear how many moons have passed or how you are even still alive, but you must eat. As you commune with the spirit world in a last ditch effort to survive, you are offered a way out... if you play along.

name: Portal Fantasy
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Adventure, Indie
summary:
Portal Fantasy is a creature-collecting adventure RPG. Journey through an epic storyline, collecting creatures, avoiding traps, and solving thrilling quests in this online RPG with a unique take on a beloved genre. Launching soon in Q1 of 2025!

Collect unique creatures and gather ingredients to fuse and enhance your team. Discover hundreds of combinations, which can augment your creatures, teach them new skills, and even change their appearances.

Unlock Wilderness areas to battle and collect Porbles from 6 different elements with over 50 skills and 60 passive abilities. Conquer Baddies, fuse potent ingredients, and transform your Porbles into ultimate powerhouses. The battle is on!

Journey through beautiful pixelated worlds, navigating perils, solving quests, and meeting with countless quirky characters. A captivating story, tons of side content, and a charming soundtrack await you on your adventures.

Prove your mettle by tackling traps, puzzles, and obstacles. The Wilderness is a dangerous place, as you jump and maneuver across moving platforms, voids, spikes, saws, turrets, teleporters, and more.

Along your adventures, you will become strong enough to battle your fellow friends and foes alike. Meet up with friends to battle it out in PVP on your adventures!
storyline:
It has been 1000 years since the War of the Goddesses - Ravenna is dead, and the Pyli Kingdom has become prosperous once again. Or so it seems. As a novice at the prestigious Porble Academy, life takes an unexpected twist when you arrive late in Valeria, the capital.

Assigned trivial tasks by an unassuming assistant, little do you know that this journey will take you into something more sinister. Mysterious organizations, corrupted Porbles, and an ancient adversary await. Across Pyli Kingdom's diverse realms, you'll uncover a darker history than legends tell.

Get ready for an epic adventure. Each step peels away deeper mysteries, and each revelation inches you closer to the truth. The burning question: will you survive the lurking secrets?

name: Clonizer
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Hex-based tactics meets roguelike deckbuilding! Play cards, manage clones, explore unique planets and outsmart aliens. Craft a powerful deck through your expedition and Clonize the universe to become employee of the month of CLONPO!

name: Oppidum
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Face the challenges of Oppidum, a cooperative multiplayer adventure. Collaborate, craft, fight, and dive into a captivating story to uncover a powerful truth. A world hanging by a thread needs your help – will you answer the call?

name: Bloodrush: Undying Wish
summary:
Bloodrush: Undying Wish is a top-down hack n' slash game with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

In this game, the player is encouraged to aggressively use their combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a deadly dance of carnage.

Focused on movement abilities, split-second decision-making, and stylish strings of attacks, the game is heavily inspired by titles such as Devil May Cry, Akane, Hyper Light Drifter, Hades, and Ultrakill.

name: Aureole: Wings of Hope
summary: At sonic speeds, Aureole: Wings of Hope takes platforming to the literal skies! Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.
storyline:
Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.
Get ready for a celestial adventure! You are the Aureole: Move, jump, and reach dizzying speeds with precise controls that have been polished to perfection.

The kingdom of heaven, centuries after devils had been exiled to the underworld, is being conquered by the demonic army led by Lazel, the new Demon King.
Our angelic protagonists, Ramila and Ryleth, fall down from the kingdom and get stranded in the surface with a single goal in mind: It's time to return home!

name: Yes, Your Grace: Snowfall
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: In this new reality, where monsters seem closer, enemies stronger and your petitioners struggling more than ever, your duties as a King must continue. It will be your responsibility to rebuild the trust of your kingdom, protect your family and survive the upcoming winter.
storyline: Yes, Your Grace: Snowfall is a cinematic kingdom management game. Make alliances, support your loved ones and rebuild the trust of your people. Dive into a Slavic-folklore inspired world, bursting with enchanting characters that will bring trouble, help or laughter into your throne room. Challenge your petitioners’ intent and decide if you want to satisfy their pleas.

name: Grifford Academy
summary: Grifford Academy is a story-rich, coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Engage in strategic turn-based combat as you set out to discover the secrets of Caldria.
storyline:
Welcome to Grifford Academy
Dive into the enigmatic world of Grifford Academy, a mesmerizing coming-of-age RPG where magic, monsters, and teenage turmoil collide. Join Erika, Viva, and Cap as they navigate the mystical book realm of Caldria, uncovering secrets and battling sinister forces.

Immersive World-Building
Explore the beautifully crafted realm of Caldria, filled with menacing creatures and otherworldly discoveries. Equip your squad, level up, and immerse yourself in strategic turn-based combat.

Your Choices Matter
Guide your characters through personal challenges and watch them evolve based on your decisions. Every choice matters, influencing the story and the characters' development in unexpected ways. Engage with a unique dialogue flow that allows you to connect with the characters and their journey at your own pace.

Strategic Turn-Based Combat
Equip your squad, level up, and immerse yourself in strategic turn-based combat. Grifford Academy offers both Story Mode for a relaxed experience and Strategy Mode for those seeking a challenge.

Welcome to a journey where heart meets strategy and every battle counts.

name: Gotchaball
summary: Gotchaball is a multiplayer fictional sports game. Players try to score points by capturing totems to win the game. Chase your opponent, tackle and steal the ball from others! Keep hold of it while capture totems to score points! Collect and use coins to capture totems even faster!

name: Finely Diced
summary: Chefs are mercurial at the best of times, and catastrophically explosive at their worst. In this hospitality roguelite, your family's restaurant is balanced on a knifes edge. You have the ingredients, the stove is on, now you just need to cook.

name: Master of Luna
summary: Master of Luna is a turn-based 4x strategy game in a fantasy world with powerful magic and all kinds of mystical creatures. It has tactical battles, cozy pixel art, and a mildly melancholic atmosphere.

name: Car Dealer Simulator
summary: Uncover a goldmine in the used car market! Sniff out deals, buy low, modify, and sell high. Your journey from amateur grease monkey to car dealer magnate awaits. How fast will you rise in this lucrative venture?

name: Castle of Blackwater
summary: Castle of Blackwater is a multiplayer social deduction game where 10 players navigate a magical 2D castle while completing tasks and uncovering hidden allegiances. Players are assigned to three different factions, each equipped with unique abilities that support their role in the game. While alive, participants use various tools to gather information and identify threats, while eliminated players can influence the outcome by collecting souls to purchase power-ups for their team. Through alliance-building, deception, and strategic ability usage, players work to ensure their faction's survival and ultimate control of the castle.
storyline:
Almost a thousand years have passed since the great Earlwind Axelot discovered the mysterious Blackwater Castle and all of the magical madness that came with it. History tells us that magic itself originated within its walls and that the castle was not built, but that it appeared, seemingly out of nowhere. Ever since its existence, the castle has granted individuals the gift of magic by surviving its challenge and completing its quest. What initially started as Earlwind’s community of followers has since grown to become a sizable village of scholars and challengers.

Every year, people from all walks of life flock to Blackwater Village, to devote their lives to study the profound history of the castle and its secrets. Their ultimate goal is to overcome the castle's challenge and be granted the gifts of magic. Occasionally, a group of students will band together to form a temporary alliance. Together they will enter the castle and attempt its quest, knowing that failure results in death.

name: Alien Boom Boom
summary: Join the fight against an alien invasion in this fast-paced, old-school FPS. Battle in your hometown, around the world, and even in space. Take on unique enemies and wield powerful weapons, all with a touch of classic fps sensibility. Can you save humanity from the brink of destruction? Boom boom.

name: Beacon Patrol
summary: Beacon Patrol is a cooperative and relaxing tile laying exploration game. You play as captains of the Coast Guard, navigating the coast of the North Sea to secure its beacon buoys, lighthouses and waterways. Work together with your friends and score points by creating the most complete map.

name: I Had a Plan!
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure, Indie
summary: You are a Wizard, with a brilliant plan. Unfortunately you also have teammates. As you make your way through dungeons and forests alike, you need to manage your team mates… and your frustration. I Had A Plan! is a Roguelike Semi-Autobattler set in a 3D world with 2D Characters.

name: Boomerang Jack
genres: Fighting, Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.

name: Laws of Nadragia
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Become a prosecutor in the totalitarian state of Nadragia. Study the laws, use the court facts to convict the guilty or unwanted by the government... Can you keep your conscience?

name: Times Trials
summary: Flex your math skills with Times Trials - a 2D puzzle fighting game. Arrange falling numbers to solve equations either alone or against friends in head-to-head multiplayer.

name: Beneath
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Plunge into a treacherous and enigmatic underwater world and brace yourself to confront the heart-stopping horrors that await as you fight against all odds.
storyline:
You play as veteran deep-sea diver Noah Quinn who must escape a treacherous underwater world filled with terrors beyond imagining.

Armed with weapons and wits, Noah Quinn knows he will have to face the horror if he has any chance of escape. And some nightmares are beyond bullets. Quinn's mental state is on the brink of collapse and he must avoid succumbing to madness if he ever hopes to reach the surface again.

name: Hail to the Rainbow
summary: The story of a lonely young man named Ignat, who survives in the dangerous and gloomy world of post-apocalyptic cyberpunk. You have to face the trials of a new reality and plunge into the secrets of the surrounding chaos.

name: A Corgi's Cozy Hike
summary: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure as a Corgi exploring a peaceful island getaway. Climb the mountain, soar the sky, and sail the seas to uncover treasures and cozy spots. No need to rush. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.

name: Rhythm Storm
summary: Rhythm Storm is a roguelike bullet heaven with stunning vector graphics, rhythmic action, and overwhelming swarms of enemies. Your vehicle aims and fires automatically while everything else dances and moves to the beat in this spectacular audio-visual experience.

name: Slipgate
summary: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

name: Super Fantasy Kingdom
summary: A rougelite city builder set in a relaxing fantasy world. Explore and rebuild your kingdom to bring it back to its former glory. Defeat hordes of enemies with an always unique team of defenders. Harvest, capture, build, mine, cook, brew, feed and grow. But be prepared to watch it all burn!

name: To the Grave
summary: To the Grave is a 2d horror adventure puzzle game full of oriental elements. The young girl's father died in an accident and her mother insisted on taking his body back to her hometown for burial. After solving many crises in the mysterious village, they gradually approach the truth.

name: Anomalistic Revolution
summary: Unsolved mysteries, unknown questions, lies and superstitions become history. With this new invention, it is now possible to reach absolute truths from the universe of zeros and ones. Anomalistic Revolution is a a story-rich game with 2D action-runner mechanics.

name: Murder on the Stella
summary: It's a murder mystery. It's an adventure. It's a cruise vacation simulator. It's different each time you play.

name: Retrace the Light
summary: “Retraces the Light” is a top-down AAG. Walk through the vast abandoned ruins. Defeat the enemies coveting the HashRate of your world. Comply to the order of supreme Yuan. Fight for honors and uncover the past and future of YUAN realm.
storyline:
For two hundred years, the AI YUAN has been working scrupulously to fulfill duties that she was designed to cover, from submitting to human’s will to providing necessary resources and HashRate. Under the rules made by her, there is no hunger, crimes or wars within the YUAN world. Neither is there any free wills.
The ever-updating and -iterating Yuan has been more perfect than the very original one. Now she is behaving like a god, laying her eyes on humans without being perceived any of her real thoughts. Someone doubts that the Yuan has long since transformed from our servant to supreme God of all things. Finally, the suspicion comes to be confirmed. Then the core of computing has to be shut down forcefully and the world is split into two parts—the outer world and inner world.

name: Nowhere Manor
summary: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?

name: Riddledale
summary: Riddledale is a new open-world adventure centered around story and characters. Solve riddles, make fun encounters and fight ferocious creatures on a vast island full of secrets.

name: Rubato
summary: A collect-a-thon about a frog fixing the solar system after it explodes for some reason.
storyline:
The year is 12,012. A tyrannical, universe-dominating corporation simply known as "The Company" has been in power of the entire universe for centuries after a world-ending bioweapon was unleashed onto the masses. And now? The solar system has been destroyed by unknown celestial forces.

Wait. Turns out I'm very, very wrong. Silly me. I should really double-check my sources.

Seems like some guys blew it up by accident while they were playing 8-ball pool. There was a frog there too, but he was in the bathroom whilst it all happened. And it also turns out the pool balls are like voodoo-doll versions of the planets? How's that meant to work? What an illogical, silly plot.

As RUBATO, you and your friends must fix the solar system piece by piece, whilst under the persecution of "The Company" and their security force, the Space Police!

name: Metavoidal
genres: Music, Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Play as a drummer seeking revenge on a Metal Band of Eldritch Monsters in this wacky roguelite brawler. Fight through hordes of enemies with only your drumsticks & drumming techniques as your weapons. Tap into the power of their music by finding corrupted music discs to increase your strength to defeat each of the band members. Are you good enough to escape the corrupted hellscape, once and for all?
storyline:
A metal band with a cult-like following are offering sanctuary from crumbling world outside to whoever can successfully audition as their new drummer. A line of auditioners run along the halls of the dilapidated church but no-one has returned yet, and you’re up next. What happens to those who fail?

Things are not as they seemed, and now you must find a way to escape your unfortunate fate or die trying.

Tap into the power of music, become the ultimate drummer, and escape!

name: Salvus: Aries
summary: A mature slice of death and adventure fantasy otome visual novel that begins at the bad ending.
storyline:
A story that begins with the heroine meeting her bad end at the chopping block. It can only go uphill from here, right?

Waking up after a long stay in purgatory (that she remembers nothing about), she learns that the rest of her sentence is to serve as a Reaper until the powers above have decided she's paid back her sins.

Through her journey after death as a Reaper, she'll seek out the empty gaps in her memory and reconcile her past with her present. Everyone has something to hide, and unfortunately for them, she's the type to seek out answers. But the biggest challenge for the crew will be to save her from herself.

Or they might all just get a one way ticket to Hell. At best.

name: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Android, iOS, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

name: Bunker Builder Simulator
summary: Plan your work, dig a hole and build a bunker, that will survive anything! Manage safety, needs and moods of your clients, so you can become the best architect and earn a fortune. Will you be able to meet the expectations?

name: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate
summary: Rock Paper Scissors Ultimate is a roguelike deckbuilder where the players can enhance the classic gameplay with powerful cards to gain an advantage over their opponents.

name: Kaiju Catastrophe
summary: Crush, smash, and eat thousands of enemies showing humanity what the meaning of destruction is! Kaiju Catastrophe is an arcade game with roguelite mechanics. Mutate devastating weapons, unlock permanent evolutions, and wreak havoc with a variety of monsters to tear humanity apart! Wishlist today!

name: Earth of Oryn
summary: Earth of Oryn is an indie city-builder/strategy game set in a medieval world filled with story and heart. Starting from nothing, shape your kingdom according to your vision while managing the needs and wants of your people.
developers: Earth of Oryn, Stray Fawn Publishing

name: Xion Leak
summary: Cooperate quickly as a duo and set the fastest times to win the trophies! Escape before the Xion gas fries your precious circuits! Run fast, be in sync, and avoid the countless dangers that the mysterious Foreman has placed in your path.

name: Dreamed Away
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dreamed Away is an emotional action-adventure RPG with psychological horror elements. Play as Théo, a boy lost in a dark, mysterious world. Explore a unique reality, duel against darkness in a unique, fast paced combat system and mind your choices.
storyline:
On a rainy summer night, Théo wakes up in his bedroom and realizes his parents and his sister Louise have disappeared. The true nature of the world lays itself bare. Ghosts, Phantoms and Revenants haunt Théo inside the catacombs and dark places where he searches for his sister. Always a step behind and never able to catch up.

What happened? What does it mean? Why is this place so familiar?

That's how his journey begins.

name: Seclusa
summary: You're a wildlife photographer staying at a cozy, secluded safari lodge in East Africa. Spend time relaxing at scenic outlooks, snapping photos of local wildlife, and working your way through a variety of upgrades and unlockables in this laid-back photography sandbox.

name: Beacon of Neyda
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows)
summary: In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Beacon of Neyda is a side-scroller strategy game where you have to survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want - Defend what you can.

name: Duel Corp.
summary: An action RPG that you can play alone and later with a friend during Early Access. It features an unrestricted class and AI system with fluid and challenging direction-based combat. Discover epic items, hidden secrets, unique skills and talents in a procedurally generated retro fantasy world.

name: Dice Gambit
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie
summary: A turn based tactics game where you roll and allocate dice to control your characters in combat. Completely customize your characters build with a huge array of powers that allow for boundless combinations. All set in a Neo-renaissance metropolis, filled with aristocratic families vying for power.

name: Out of Hands
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Out of Hands is a card-based thriller that blends card battles, video collage and psychological horror. With nightmarish roguelike elements and live-action visuals made out of the real hands of the developer, the game provides an intriguing and spine-chilling experience that leads you to combat the mental struggles and retrieve the lost memory.

name: Demonschool
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Demonschool is a new-style tactics RPG where motion equals action. Defeat big weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island.

name: Freeride
summary: Freeride is a game about YOU. Board a train to the Spirit World in our oddball RPG where you make friends, use telekinesis, find secrets, consume ice cream and chart your own path. Each character is uniquely troubled, and in helping them find their way, you might just find yourself, too.
developers: Flightyfelon Games Inc., Future Friends Games

name: Good Heavens!
summary: Good Heavens! is a procedurally generated open world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. Be a farmer, hunter, trader or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk.
storyline:
Welcome to Xant-Rar, the glorious afterlife for video game characters where they go after deletion in their individual worlds. It's a world of peace and pleasure, but noticeably (and thankfully) lacking in players farming them for experience and loot. At least it's supposed to be… the Mighty Rar, god of the digital afterlife, may have made a few mistakes recently that need some outside help to set everything back on track again.

It's up to the players *sigh* to enter this simulated afterlife to fight, craft, and farm across these floating islands Meet the denizens of this place and survive long enough to fix what Mighty Rar broke- *ahem* forgot to iterate upon.

It all just makes you want to scream, “Good Heavens!”

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
platforms: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo Switch
summary: The long-lost sequel to the original Shantae, is back in development after being put on the shelf for nearly two decades. Building off the original game code from the early 2000s, this once-canceled title will be completed and released physically on a Game Boy Advance-compatible game cartridge.
storyline: Filling in the gaps between the original Shantae (2002) and Shantae: Risky’s Revenge (2010), Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution sees Shantae protecting Sequin Land from a twisted new plot orchestrated by her nemesis, the pirate Risky Boots. Using a secret subterranean device, Risky is able to rotate and rearrange the continent, plunging it into chaos and giving her more coastal cities to plunder. Fortunately, by harnessing this technology and the knowledge of the Relic Hunters, players will be able to turn the tables on Risky, giving Shantae new paths through environments and a chance to thwart the villain’s scheme.

name: The Perfect Pencil
summary: Help John on his journey of personal growth. Unravel the nuances of human reactions to fear. Surprising exploration, fast paced combat, complex choices and allegorical characters, all intertwined with a psychological narrative in this hand-drawn 2D action-platformer.

name: So to Speak
summary: Can you learn a language by solving puzzles? So to Speak is a simulation game about wandering around Japan, looking at signs, overhearing conversations, and using context clues in the environment to figure out what it all means. No background in Japanese is assumed.

name: Brutal John
summary: Brutal John is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS combining crazy storyline about saving the world from the mining technlogies, with inspired gameplay from the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart alien enemies, destroy mining technologies, save the world.

name: Bugaboo Pocket
summary:
Bugaboo Pocket is a virtual pet game starring bugs from land, air and sea!

Play as a research scientist living in a cabin with just your bugs and a penpal for company. Spoil them with pets, minigames, food and furniture.

Raise and release bugs to help Beetleback Ridge recover from a devastating fire.
storyline: An elevated, story-driven virtual pet game starring bugs from land, air and sea! Spoil them with pets, food and furniture. Earn poop currency through minigames and by cleaning up their oopsies. Discover how even the smallest action impacts your friend. Release bug eggs to regrow their forest home!

name: SGS Spain at War
summary: The complete Spanish Civil War from July 1936 to April 1939, with all units, weapons and events included on a weekly base. The most complete strategy game made on this conflict. Fight for your ideals, and take control of Spain!
developers: Strategy Game Studio, Headquarter, Avalon Digital

name: Multi Idle
summary: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

name: Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato
summary: Emotional narrative adventure about the things we pass along. Inspired by Miyazaki, Coco, and The Little Prince.

name: Overlook
summary: Search for missing people, lost objects, or even help people solve their problems by handing them over their required items. OVERLOOK is hand-drawn, cozy, relaxing, and funny. btw, watch! there might be a cat hidden in bushes.

name: Sultan of Egypt
summary: Features of this game is an atmospheric story game with choices. There are Puzzle, mini war, and a very nice interactive story in the game. True beauty is always beyond imagination; and a story, or anything for that matter, is important, only to the extent it reflects a ray of it.

name: Gaucho and the Grassland
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: Gaucho and the Grassland is an Animal Farm Sim game where you need to gather resources, explore the land, breed animals and much more, to overcome the challenging life on the grasslands. The world of Gaucho is a mystical wildland, inspired by South Brazil's culture and its local tales.

name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
summary: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

name: Tuggowar
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Card & Board Game
summary: Tuggowar is a pure deckbuilding game with strategy elements inspired by RTS. Discover new strategies and combos to find the best build each time! Disrupt the enemy's gameplan, or Tank-rush to catch them off guard. Climb the ranks in PvP or chill vs AI.

name: Post Trauma
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Post Trauma is a game that takes inspiration from classic horror games. Play as Roman, a 57 year old man who has awakened in a strange and hostile place and find a way back home with his family. Get inside this world through fixed camera angles, alternating the gameplay with some sections in first person view. Solve puzzles and riddles with the information you will gather exploring your surroundings. Avoid (or kill) the creatures that you will find along the way, but be careful because some of them might not be hostile.

name: Noble's Life: Kingdom Reborn
summary: Mix of realistic medieval noble simulator with a strategy game of historical depth. Manage your city and villages and make decisions in non-linear events. Command defenses in epic sieges and organize dangerous raids.

name: Radiolight
summary: Ashwood Creek, 1985. A child disappears without a trace. A local policeman is drawn into a national park, seeking the truth. Mysterious radio signals beckon him further and further. Investigate, survive and face the unknown in Radiolight— an '80s thriller by solo dev Krystof Knesl.
storyline:
Step into the shoes of Ethan, a police officer in the quaint town of Ashwood Creek—a place where the trees whisper, the mountains loom, and secrets hide just out of sight. What begins as a routine investigation, quickly spirals into a haunting journey through the unknown.

Ashwood Creek feels frozen in time, untouched by the chaos of the outside world. But under the surface, something dark is stirring. A teenager has gone missing. A strange signal is cutting through the static of local radio stations. Lured deeper into Ashwood Creek National Park, you’ll need to tune in to every frequency and every echo of the past in the hopes of uncovering the truth.

As you explore the vast, eerie expanse of Ashwood Creek National Park, you’ll find that your radio is more than just a piece of electronics — it’s your key to survival. Pick up supernatural signals and tune into otherworldly transmissions. But not all signals will guide you to safety… some are meant to lead you astray, deeper into the shadows, where the past waits to confront you.

Guided by the voice of Robert, your childhood friend and the town’s chief of police, you’ll venture through dense forests, foggy valleys, and forgotten trails. Together, you’ll piece together clues, follow mysterious broadcasts, and uncover the secrets that Ashwood Creek would rather keep hidden. But the closer you get to the truth, the more you’ll realize that some things are better left buried.

name: An Amazing Wizard
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: An Amazing Wizard is a 2D fast-paced metroidvania-inspired spell-slinging combat RPG game with detailed pixel art. You play as a wizard from legend, wielding the magic of 7 elements cast by mysterious hands. Enhance your spells and melee weapons, defeat enemies to level up and choose from 250 perks. Discover and equip 250 artifacts, and merge 100 unique spells in any desired order. Collect your lost memories and uncover the hidden truth about this world.
storyline:
You awaken with no memories, lying on rocks drifting through the cosmos.

A Crystal Skeleton tells you that you're a magical child of prophecy, born once in a millennium. While you can't cast spells on your own, whenever you think of casting one, Magic Hands appear and do it for you!

A mysterious jelly-like girl urges you to master your powers and conquer five ever-changing dimensions. Reclaim your memories, uncover the full truth of your abilities, and free yourself from this world!

name: Post-Apo Builder
summary: Build your own city in a post-apocalyptic future. Scavenge and fight for resources, everything counts! Restore civilization on the ashes of the fallen world! Explore wastelands to gather resources, protect and take care of your people! Fight off raiders, wild tribesman and natural disasters.
storyline:
Build your own city in a post-apocalyptic future. Scavenge and fight for resources, everything counts!
Restore civilization on the ashes of the fallen world!
Explore wastelands to gather resources, protect and take care of your people!

name: Galaxy Highways
summary: Galaxy Highways is a sci-fi space shooter where you're doing pirate raids into star systems inhabited by aliens. You destroy enemy ships, space stations, mother ships or bosses and complete all missions as soon as possible before enemy defense system destroys you with its powerful waves of attacks.

name: Storror Parkour Pro
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Escape Reality. The ultimate multiplayer parkour experience. Escape, race, and explore the streets and rooftops of London’s Isle of Dogs. Join team STORROR to save your estate, or challenge your friends to test their skills. STORROR Parkour Pro is complete control and freedom of movement.
developers: Hole in the Sleeve, Hole in the Sleeve
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Virtual Reality
storyline:
With commercialisation transforming our public spaces, parkour offers a radical opposition. We don’t need to conjure up a fictional antagonist to have a compelling narrative that offers a range of varied and exciting challenges. The storyline and side missions are motivated by the conflict athletes face on a daily basis with security, police and the privatisation of public spaces.

The world of the game represents the authentic culture of the sport as it is practised on the streets today. A range of world-class athletes will help players unlock new skills and abilities through fun, original missions and challenges.

name: Matthew: Last Journey
summary: Matthew: Last Journey - is a 3D indie adventure exploration game made in a low poly style. You will explore different locations and learn the story about the boy and his family. You will have a fascinating journey through picturesque places and try to find all the memorable objects.

name: Parkour Bot
summary: Parkour Bot is a fast paced, rhythm based, physics platform game, with an unique movement set of main character. Show your skills and get a lot of achievements in 100 dynamic levels.

name: Treasure Islands
summary: Help Nick and Pippa find a selection of new artefacts and exhibits for the Grand Museum in an exciting adventure across a number of islands, each with their own quirks, characters and strange events!

name: Wardens Rising
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
