summary: A Coop PvE Action Hero Shooter with MOBA-like base defense elements. Protect cores from massive enemy invasions by using abilities, a custom tech-loadout and building defense towers.
storyline:
The discovery of Synthesis changed the fate of humanity, and the universe forever. Its extraordinary power enabled unprecedented control over all matter and energy, while unveiling and releasing supernatural forces.

Humanity learned to harness the power of its cores, fueling their resurgence from the brink of extinction. After years of peace and prosperity inter-dimensional rifts appeared across the realm, revealing a new existential threat.

Dangerous beings came through the rifts, unrelenting in their pursuit of Synthesis, and began invading the Cores. To prevent catastrophe, an elite fighting force called WARDENS was assembled, each member possessing extraordinary talents and the ability to control Synthesis.

With the fate of humanity at stake, the Wardens must Rise to destroy all invaders, close the rifts and return peace to our realm.

name: Ruffy and the Riverside
genres: Platform, Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Adventure, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: In Ruffy and the Riverside, you wield the magic power of SWAP, using it to Copy & Paste textures within the game world. Turn ice into lava or waterfalls into vines as you ride hay bales, explore, fight, and solve puzzles throughout Riverside. Unleash your imagination in this quirky open-world action game that literally lets you change the world!
storyline: Join Ruffy on an exciting quest to stop the mischievous villain Groll from destroying the World Core and throwing Riverside into chaos. Along the way, you'll travel to fantastic places with helpful friends like Pip the sassy bee, Sir Eddler the adventurous mole, and Silja the wise turtle. Meet a lively cast of characters, each with their own unique stories and dialogues, as the exciting adventure unfolds with unexpected surprises for Ruffy around every corner.

name: Heart of Muriet
summary: Unique voxel fantasy real-time strategy. Experience the land of Muriet and reunite your family in this epic real-time strategy game! It's a game for people who love RTS games, but intense micromanagement stops them from playing.
storyline: The Seneer houses have gone to war with each other since the “Portal Conspiracy”. The council of 12 has disbanded, and a savage conflict over power and wealth has started. Lianam former leader of the council and head of the powerful House Othal has been killed. Her son Necelion survived and is now on a quest to reunite his family and the unity of the Seener.

name: Bittersweet Birthday
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: Bittersweet Birthday is an action game where every combat encounter is a challenging and unique fight. You can also explore different areas and help many of the NPC populating them with their everyday struggles while learning more about the world and its history.
storyline: You wake up, dazed… with no memories. While asking yourself where and how you got there, a strange voice breaks through the silence: “Hey there, bud”. Under the threat of unstable individuals hunting you down, the only chance of escape is to listen to the voice…

name: Little Sim World
summary: Little Sim World is an indie Open World 2D Life Simulator with RPG and multiplayer elements that has been in development since early 2019 for the PC. Little Sim World is being made by Terry along with a few friends who have a passion towards the Sims genre.

name: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths
summary: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths challenges you to transport huge variety of goods using your excellent driving skills, on South American wilderness. Contracts are getting more profitable as you get more reputation, each allowing you to improve your cash balance, upgrade or customize your truck. Take care, though, and watch the road, as accidents and involuntary pit stops cause more problems than simply making your clients mad. If you have no choice, just leave the cabin and make some temporary repairs, refuel frequently whenever possible.
storyline: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths is a truck driving simulator, in which you play as a professional driver and carry the most diverse loads across the South American frontiers where the greatest challenge is the wilderness and capricious aura of nature.

name: Neyyah
summary: Neyyah is a first-person point-and-click adventure game from solo developer, Aaron Gwynaire. You are thrown into a strange secretive world called Neyyah. Use careful observation and logic to uncover the mysteries entwined within Neyyah's peculiar landscapes and bizarre cultures.

name: Gun Miner
summary: Gun Miner is a rogue-lite where you explore the ever-changing caves of a mysterious planet. Dig up treasure with your void-blaster rifle. Spend any loot you find on upgrades for your suit, for your gun, or for your ship. Yes you will die a lot, but each turn makes you a tiny bit more powerful.

name: Vertigo 2: Into the Aether
summary: Into the Aether is a story expansion for Vertigo 2. Embark on an interdimensional expedition to the oldest and most mysterious universe, discover new weapons and tools, and defeat fearsome new enemies.

name: Only Arrows
summary: You are a block. You move with arrow keys. Aspiration languishes in the factures of psyche.

name: Flesh Psychosis
summary: Flesh Psychosis is a little casual puzzle game, in which you have to score as much as possible. You have to collect various spooky ingredients and make deathly meals, using gravity and mad scientist tools.
storyline:
Flesh Psychosis is a calm puzzle game where you must match identical ingredients together to cook... special dishes.

Assemble ingredients to earn them in your inventory! Every 20 actions, a new cooking phase begins to find out if you are a good evil cook.

Help Madline discover even more dreadful recipes while achieving the best possible score!

name: Store Empire
summary: Build your own retail empire on a paradise island. Buy, manage, and expand your stores, attract customers with advertising, and adapt to unexpected events. Protect your business from thieves and dominate the market.

name: Sweep
summary: SWEEP is a tactical turn-based card game. Use your cards and submachine gun to conquer dungeons! Stickers and items turn cards into bullets for devastating damage. Strategize, gain extra turns, and crush enemies with overwhelming firepower!

name: Ambidextro
summary: A witch has kidnapped the prince and princess. As a royal wizard, it is your mission to rescue them both at the same time, but first you will have to learn to control your two bodies simultaneously.

name: Legacy of Sin: Ill-Boding
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Tactical
summary: The world as we knew it no longer exists. Join the few remaining survivors, lead them, and build your city, feed your people and organize your defenses to survive the hordes of enemies attacking your kingdom, mankind's last kingdom, our hope. Can you turn a small village into a great realm?

name: Rain World: The Watcher
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Rain World: The Watcher is an expansion of Rain World. Journey beyond to something, somewhere only ever glimpsed. When the world beneath your feet cracks and crumbles, will you hold on to all you once new? Or dive into the unknown?

name: Superhero Cats
summary: Hidden Superhero Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this epic superhero environment! Test your attentiveness and relax in this cozy and free game

name: Gloom: System Breach
summary: A 3D sci-fi action adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a small robot controlled from a third-person perspective. We wake up in a non-working system, help to activate it by activating individual systems and fight opponents who defend the necessary parts.

name: BitRick's Venture
summary: An action-roguelite with procedural generation.

name: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic
summary: Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic" Play as Cheer Bear and her friends in a variety of arcade games!

name: Winning Post 10 2025
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: The "Winning Post" series, which celebrates its 30th anniversary in 2023, is an "authentic horse racing simulation game" in which players take on the role of an owner-breeder (horse owner and producer) and experience the drama of horses and people in the horse racing world.

name: Venus Vacation Prism: Dead or Alive Xtreme
summary:
On this island, the moment of love.

The first ever full-fledged first-person adventure romance game in the DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme series, offering romantic encounters with six cute, charming girls!
storyline:
On the Venus Islands, a perpetual-summer paradise, you as the appointed owner are preparing for a large festival with the part-time staff Misaki. Misaki suddenly speaks up.

Hey, Boss. Did you know?

About the story of the “Prismatic Meteor Shower” that can soon be seen on this island… “On a night when stars rain down, the souls of those who wish upon the iridescent starlight…” On this island, you will meet 6 Venuses.

name: Inayah: Life after Gods
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
storyline:
In the post-apocalyptic remnants of an far advanced alien civilization, an orphaned outcast named Inayah sets out on a perilous journey to find her tribe. Guided by the spirit of her deceased mentor, she navigates a divided world, forging bonds and uncovering secrets that redefine the meaning of family. Experience an emotionally charged adventure where every decision shapes Inayah's destiny.

INAYAH – Live After Gods takes place in massive, self-sufficient towers called arcologies, constructed on a post-apocalyptic Earth by an alien race known as the Forerunners. The Forerunners, defeated in an interstellar war, sought refuge on Earth to rebuild their forces and exact revenge using humanity, their ancient creation. However, they arrived to find a ravaged world. Undeterred, the Forerunners built the arcologies, resurrected humanity through cloning, and created a haven within the towers.​

Driven by their need for an army, the Forerunners accelerated human evolution through mutations and cybernetic enhancements, transforming them into "super soldiers." This plan, however, was doomed to fail. The fleeing Forerunners carried a virus from their enemies, a plague that ravaged their bodies and turned them into monstrous "statues." In a desperate bid for survival, one Forerunner created hybrid offspring from human and Forerunner DNA. INAYAH herself is one such hybrid. These hybrids, along with pure humans, remained immune to the devastating virus.​

Five centuries later, humanity has fragmented into tribes within the arcology, clinging to survival and viewing the Forerunners' advanced technology as magic. Their attempts to harness this power has led to the arcology's deterioration. Some tribes revere the Forerunners as gods, worshiping their "statues," while others fear their return and prepare for conflict. The game's events unfold against this backdrop of tribal strife, brutal customs, and bloody rituals within the confines of the crumbling arcology.

name: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is a 2D action adventure starring two new characters. Servants of the Dark takes the tight action players enjoyed in Gal Guardians: Demon Purge and vastly increases the exploration and collection elements, shifting genres completely to a full Metroidvania for an all-new experience.

name: Sports: Renovations
summary: Give sports facilities a second life in this relaxing first-person simulator! Restore the glory of old gyms, courts and pitches as you try to make enough money to save your hometown basketball court.
storyline:
Your hometown basketball court is in danger. The shining star of your youth where you watched fantastic matches played by your favourite team. It’s a place where many young talents started their careers. It’s a home of many fond memories, now covered in cobwebs and dust.

The court is deteriorating rapidly. A big developer is only waiting to get his grubby hands on the place, tear it down and build a new shopping mall instead. But you won’t accept that.

Do what you do best! Grab your tools, roll up your sleeves and breathe some life into other old sports facilities to earn money. See the spaces normally unavailable to normal visitors. Learn the inner workings of sports and listen to fascinating tales about their history.

And when you’ve earned enough, step up and renovate your hometown’s court.

name: Atomfall
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: A nuclear disaster has left an area of Britain in tatters. Atomfall, a new survival-action game, will see you explore, scavenge, craft, barter and fight your way through beautifully recreated scenery in search of answers.
storyline:
The game follows a fictional storyline where you find yourself in the quarantine zone five years after the event.

Everything has changed in that time, and you find yourself in a very different Britain, on the wrong side of the quarantine wall. The area is run by the military and beset with factions, in-fighting, and a growing sense of fear.

It’s up you to unravel the mystery of what happened. Explore the countryside, villages, and settlements and meet odd people, wicked cults, rogue government agencies and others along the way.

name: As We Descend
summary: The roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Recruit, upgrade, and deploy your forces in tactical battles against corrupt creatures. Make hard decisions in humanity’s final city to bolster your odds. Will you break the cycle of endless descent?
storyline: Decide the Fate of the City – Hailing from one of the three great factions of the City-Vault, you hold the key to its fate amidst the post-apocalypse. Outmaneuver the medieval politics of the city and unearth its deepest secrets. As the first and last line of defense for the city walls, you must hold the line…

name: The First Berserker: Khazan
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action role-playing game. The player will become Khazan, the great general of the Pelos empire, whom overcame death, and sets out to reveal the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies.
storyline: Khazan and Ozma, the heroes who saved Pelos Empire from the Berserk Dragon Hismar and the Dragon Legion. But General Khazan, falsely accused of treason, becomes a wretched outcast as he is condemned to exile beyond the empire through brutal torture.

name: Bubble Ghost Remake
summary: Guide a small ghost and its bubble through an enchanted castle full of dangers and challenges in this incredible remake of the popular classic "Bubble Ghost". With over 40 levels of skill that include ingenious puzzles and challenging obstacles, get ready for hours of addictive gameplay.

name: Which Way Up: Galaxy Games
platforms: Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Which Way Up: Galaxy Games is a family friendly party game that gives unique freedom of movement by allowing you to run on walls and ceilings, orbit around planets, or fall across entire levels by manoeuvring through gravity fields.

Before The Universe existed, the Space Sprites banded together one-by-one to see a dream come to fruition: the dream of life itself. As The Universe began to take shape, so too did space. But space is unpredictable, and creating life is tiresome work. So, the Sprites took it upon themselves to create a pastime. The Galaxy Games.

Each event features its own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players can compete. Eject your friends into space as you race across gravity fields, score a goal with an entire moon, leap across planets to escape a black hole, and capture and hold zodiacal constellations.

name: Ena: Dream BBQ
summary: Experience surreal environments and inexplicable characters as ENA in a new wild world.

name: Karma: The Dark World
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: This is a first-person story-driven psychological horror game. Delve into this dark and strange world with an investigation officer from Roam to find traces of lost memories and fulfill your destiny.
developers: POLLARD STUDIO LLC, Gamera Games, Wired Productions
storyline:
For some reason, you’ve returned here. Everything has become strange. Your name, your appearance, your voice, and all your memories.

Through the help of an old man, you connected with your past memories by way of a strange tape, and embarked on a journey to find your memories.

In this dark world, experience strange encounters and wade through fragmented memories. As an investigation officer, uncover the truth and find the source of all the happenings.

name: Rosewater
summary:
A thrilling wild west adventure set in the world of Lamplight City! Harley Leger and her ragtag posse embark on a harrowing journey across Western Vespuccia, facing bandits, rebels, ruthless oil barons, and many more obstacles on their quest for fame and riches.

Features
- A thrilling treasure hunt with 5 travel companions. How you treat and interact with them affects the story.
- Traditional adventure game puzzles (i.e. inventory-based) some with more than one solution.
- Fully rotoscoped animations, including cinematic closeups.
- High resolution 1280x720 graphics (yes, that's 720p!)
- Full music score by Mark Benis, featuring live instruments.
- Meet over 50 professionally voiced characters.

name: AI Limit
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: In the distant future when civilization is on the verge of extinction, people follow the legend of the Elysium in the last city, Havenswell. In this post-apocalyptic wasteland sci-fi ARPG, you will play as Arrisa, a Blader with immortality, and explore the city ruin to find the hope of a new life.
storyline:
In the distant future, when civilisation is on the brink of extinction, people follow the legend of Elysium in the last city, Havenswell. In this sci-fi ARPG set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, you play as Arrisa, an immortal Blader, as she explores the ruins of the city in search of hope for a new life.

Arrisa is a highly advanced life form who relies on an extensive arsenal of weapons, spells and combat skills in her quest to save civilization. AI Limit's Sync-Rate system allows for a powerful mix of spells and attacks in intense and dynamic offensive and defensive combat scenarios. The game's post-apocalyptic setting, factions and mechanical monsters are based on completely original AI lore. Ai Limit players will feel the presence of "Sphere Gods" throughout their journey. Sphere Gods will communicate with Arrisa throughout the story as it gradually unfolds to multiple endings.

name: Kemono Heroes
platforms: Google Stadia, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Kemono Heroes combines elements of run and gun, fast arcade action with dashes and slashes, with cool and fluffy characters. It can be enjoyed up to 4 Players in cooperative mode, fighting together and helping each other but is totally designed to work as a single player game as well.

Play solo, or share Joy-Con controllers for local multiplayer support for up to 4 players. With upgradeable weapons and items, and charming visuals drawn from retro side-scrollers and traditional folklore, Kemono Heroes is truly a vivid and memorable action adventure!
developers: NIS America, MadGearGames, Nippon Ichi Software, JanduSoft
storyline: Tsukigami, the Moon God, has petrified the inhabitants of the forest, and only the four Animal Ninja Masters can break the spell and restore their home! Harness each character's swift moves, arsenal of tools, and unique powers to fight through hordes of evil spirit minions to reach Mt. Fuji and confront the Moon God.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ARU
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.10 feat. V.I.P
Cannonball Crew
summary: Cannonball Crew is a fast-paced pirate multiplayer game blending capture-the-flag and treasure hunting. Teams scramble to seize treasures, hide them, and defend their stash. Imprison opponents, rescue teammates, and wield swords, harpoons, and cannons in this intense battle for pirate glory!

name: Grit & Valor: 1949
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Command an elite squad of Mechs in this alternate World War 2 dieselpunk real-time tactics roguelite. Think fast, battle the Evil Axis forces, and neutralise their HQ. Upgrade your Mechs and Pilots, and develop new strategies to defeat the enemy!

name: Breakout Beyond
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Breakout is back! In this neon-drenched take on the classic, you’ll need to literally break through each puzzle by clearing bricks to breach the final goal. Rack up a combo and create spectacular light shows alone or with a friend.

name: Killing Floor III: Day One Edition
summary:
The Flatline Tactical Bundle; 'Flatliner' weapon skin, 'Fear the Reaper' weapon trinket and 'Special Action Force' player card. Also includes (retail exclusive) Clamefield Patrol Character Skins cosmetic DLC.

The Battle Begins With Nightfall

It’s 2091 and megacorp Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called zeds. Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

Killing Floor 3 is the next installment in the legendary action/horror series. This intense FPS puts you in the boots of a Nightfall specialist joining forces with up to five teammates to battle waves of zeds, earn dosh, unlock skills, and build the ultimate arsenal.

name: Frog Galaxy Survivor
summary: Hi, it's Frogus! A nasty vortex has appeared in the sky and turned my frog friends and the Earth into puzzle pieces! Help me find them in these different space universes and platforms !

name: Travel On, Pigeon!
summary: This is a puzzle-rhythm game about a tourist pigeon having a good time, with engaging challenges you can take at your own pace. Stroll through cute and nostalgic places and get with the flow in this chill and charming experience.

name: Sangokushi Taisen: Battle of Three Kingdoms
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Card & Board Game
summary:
KAI SANGOKUSHI TAISEN - Battle of Three Kingdoms - is a military card battle game set in the world of the arcade version of SANGOKUSHI TAISEN.

As part of the 'Volunteer Army' aiming to unify China, players will travel across the land, recruit warlords, and engage in epic battles.

name: Killing Floor III
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: It's 2091. Megacorporation Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called "Zeds." Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

name: The Darkest Files
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Darkest Files is a historical investigation and courtroom game based on true crimes of the Nazi era. Investigate cold cases, search for clues, interrogate witnesses, immerse the crimes and defend your case in court to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Atomfall: Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
Pre-order the Atomfall Deluxe Edition to receive:
• The entire Atomfall game
• 3 days Early Access
• “Story Expansion Pack” – (*not available Day 1):
• “Basic Supply Bundle” Pack
• “Enhanced Supply Bundle” Pack

name: River Towns
summary: Solve puzzles by placing buildings and creating vibrant cities in River Towns. Each district has its own style and shapes, making every level a new challenge. Help to restore and rebuild our River Towns.
storyline:
In River Towns, you place differently shaped buildings and make them fit into a limited area. Combine unique districts into a vibrant living city and help restore our River Towns.

Each of the three districts has its own set of shapes which are shuffled randomly. This makes every game you play a new and unique puzzle to solve. The different district's unique and vibrant architecture combines into beautiful little towns along the river. As the town grows, more townspeople move in and bring life back into this old and broken world.

name: The Deadly Path
summary: A building management, tower defense game set in an occult dungeon. Create your dungeon, defend against raides and build the idol in order to bring your dark lord into being and bring about the age of reckoning.

name: QubiQuest: Castle Craft
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up
summary: QubiQuest: Castle Craft is a game where players build huge castles in an ancient war-torn world and defend them against hordes of enemies in chaotic siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of voxel sandbox, action, and horde defence.

name: Herogue
summary: This game fused turn-based game and roguelikes. You will play the role of the team leader, and build the team's skill genre by upgrading. Experiment with different characters and upgrade options to find your winning formula!

name: Mike goes on hike
summary: Become a real tourist in Mike Goes on Hike! Amazing wild landscapes, inexpressible atmosphere of hiking and important vital lessons are waiting for you. Go all the way to the end to fulfill the request of your beloved grandfather.

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo", the alchemist Yumia yearns for the "truth" that lies hidden in the ruined continent.
Now, she takes her first steps on a grand adventure across the continent─
storyline:
Weaving memories and tracing emotions. For the truth that lies ahead.

The Aladissian Empire. It once thrived on a certain continent, having achieved remarkable development through alchemy that kept other nations at bay. However, it met its end due to a sudden and mysterious cataclysm.

Time progressed, and several centuries later—. Alchemy became known as a “dangerous art that brings destruction,” and considered “evil” and “taboo” in this new era.

In this now forbidden and perilous land, a lone alchemist sets foot. Her name is Yumia Liessfeldt. After losing her mother in an accident three years ago, Yumia discovered that she was from a family of alchemists and began to question many things.

Why did Aladiss fall? Why did alchemy become “taboo”?… Is alchemy truly “evil”? Believing that all truths lie within the continent, Yumia embarks on a journey to uncover its lost history.

name: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

name: Photobia: Tales from the Dark
summary: Immerse yourself in the dark and mysterious universe of Photobia: Tales from the Dark, where intricate light-based puzzles await. Use physics to overcome obstacles and bring light to the heart of this enigmatic world.

name: Jumble Quest
summary: Tap, scramble letters, and solve the clues! How many hidden words can you find?!

name: Into the Zone
summary:
Dominate the Goal Zone: Outlast your rivals and seize control to score. It’s not about kills—it’s about relentless control.
Engage in electrifying 1v1 duels, coordinate devastating team assaults, or unleash chaos in massive multi-team brawls! Every round is a wild, skill-testing party you won't want to miss. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down—this is a party game from another dimension!
storyline: Enter The Zone: once the city’s hottest arcade hub, now a shattered fever dream, a twisted dimension between realities. Demolished in our world, it thrives in another, warping physics at will—impossible leaps, gravity-defying moves, and illusions that blur fantasy and fact. Trapped within its neon-lit confines, you and your friends (online or on the couch) brawl for a chance to escape through a portal that shifts through colors, demanding mastery and quick thinking. But beware, the Zone holds secrets, and escape may come at a price.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition
summary:
The year is 2054. Earth has been destroyed by an intergalactic war between two alien races, and humanity is on the brink of annihilation. A small number of survivors, aboard the USS White Whale, crash land on the vast and untamed planet Mira—and now it falls to you, as a member of BLADE, to help bring humanity back from the edge of extinction…with the aid of powerful giant robots called Skells!

The visually enhanced edition of this open-world RPG contains newly added story elements and more.

Take on tough foes in a robust combat system, and pilot powerful giant robots called Skells

Choose from a huge variety of special attacks, skills, and classes in a combat system that’s as deep as you want it to be. Once you’ve proven yourself to BLADE, you’ll earn the right to pilot and personalize your very own Skell—a powerful machine that can fly, transform into a vehicle for fast overland travel, and wield immense strength in combat with customizable weapons and armor.

Gather resources and take on missions to build the community of New Los Angeles

As you go about the reconstruction effort, getting to know the people of New Los Angeles (NLA), you’ll build affinity with your party members and unlock quests for gear and other rewards. Join your choice of military organization within BLADE to take on even more missions—or even team up with up to 32 players from near and far online* in Squad Tasks, Online Missions, and extra-challenging Global Nemesis Battles!

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Gold Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny and usher in a new era for Japan.

Explore the captivating open world of feudal Japan, from spectacular castle towns and bustling ports to peaceful shrines and war-ravaged landscapes. Adventure through unpredictable weather, changing seasons, and reactive environments.

Become Naoe, a shinobi Assassin, and Yasuke, a legendary samurai, as you experience their riveting stories and master their complementary playstyles. As Naoe, use stealth to avoid detection and agility to confound your enemies. As Yasuke, strike your foes with lethal precision and power. Unlock new skills, gear, and progression independently for each character.

Make information your weapon as you explore the world, and build your own network of spies to be your eyes and ears across locations to hunt down your next target. Along the way, recruit new allies with unique abilities to help accomplish your missions.

Create a fully customizable hideout for your growing shinobi league as you train your crew, craft new gear, interact with key characters, and choose your base’s layout, decorations, and accessories.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Thrown to the Dogs
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Thrown to the Dogs is a downloadable content pre-order expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Shadows that is expected to release alongside the main game. It will involve helping a loyal dog avenge his late master.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac
summary: Experience an epic historical action-adventure story set in feudal Japan! Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a powerful legendary samurai as you explore a beautiful open world in a time of chaos. Switch seamlessly between two unlikely allies as you discover their common destiny. Master complementary playstyles, create your shinobi league, customize your hideout, and usher in a new era for Japan.
developers: Ubisoft Entertainment, Ubisoft Québec, Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Belgrade, Ubisoft Bordeaux, Ubisoft Bucharest, Ubisoft Chengdu, Ubisoft Montpellier, Ubisoft Osaka, Ubisoft Philippines, Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Singapore, Ubisoft Sofia, Ubisoft Craiova, Ubisoft Ukraine
storyline: Live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover their common destiny as they usher in a new era for Japan.

name: Vagrient
summary: Play as Vagrient in this sci-fi action/adventure game full of exploration, combat, character progression and puzzle solving!

name: Frog Island
summary: Frog Island is a fully hand-drawn, cozy Frog Collection and Life-Sim game. Take care of adorable frogs, grow crops, cook meals, place toys and decorations, and uncover the secrets of Frog island!
storyline: Trapped on a mysterious island, you are greeted by a woman who asks you to take care of her frogs while she is away. Explore, farm, cook, fish, and befriend magical frogs as you try to find a way to escape the island, and figure out why you're even here in the first place.

name: Mudborne
summary: Mudborne is a casual nature management sim about discovering & breeding frogs! Awoken from hibernation you find your pond abandoned. Through the genetic keys of new species you must unlock the paths between the waking & dreaming worlds, and embark on a journey to restore lost populations.
storyline:
MUD BORN, IT IS TIME TO WAKE UP!

Mudborne is a casual nature management sim about discovering & breeding frogs!

You awaken from your hibernation to find your pond abandoned and empty. Through a combination of crafting minigames, menu management and puzzle solving, experiment with genetics to breed new frogs and recover what was lost.

Using the genetic keys of the new species you create you can unlock the paths between the waking and dreaming worlds, explore the land of those still hibernating, and embark on a journey to help restore the lost populations and find out what happened.

name: Rendering Ranger: R² [Rewind]
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: You are the Rendering Ranger, a special forces soldier who defending Earth from a devastating alien invasion through nine levels of action platforming as well as blisteringly fast horizontal shooter stages. Originally developed for Super Famicom by Manfred Trenz, creator of the Turrican series.
developers: Ziggurat Interactive, Rainbow Arts, Limited Run Games
storyline:
The Rendering Ranger has travelled far, crossing galaxies and boldly faced the perils of the black hole. With lethal and malignant certainty, The Cube has been lurking for aeons, waiting just for him. Showing its demonic features, core of evil, black and old, legions of unholy creatures breath fire. Utmost evil's incarnation, the Silver Hero stands tall. In this quest for domination, who will win and who will fall?

Spilling blood and raging fire is the price they have to pay. Evil doomed to funeral pyre. Yes, It's Armageddon Day!

name: Trailer Park Tycoon: Raccoon Ranch
summary: One of the key elements of the game is your production. However, instead of the usual vegetables, pies, and trinkets, you're engaged in growing tobacco, brewing alcohol, and producing goods available only to adults. In addition, you can produce coffee, soda, and energy drinks. All of this can be sold in your store!

name: Steinstern
summary: Retro Space Action Shooter with RPG elements. Fight alone or together local couch coop! Prove your skills with many different weapons and several spaceships with different weapon layouts!

name: MLB The Show 25: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content
MLB The Show 25
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Forge your baseball journey in The Show
developers: SIE San Diego Studio, Sony Interactive Entertainment

name: The Tau Experiment
summary: The Tau Experiment is an episodic RPG Adventure game where you play as Sam, an employee with the Tau Corporation. Choose your own adventure as you work to help Sam put an end to the company's plans.

name: Pathologic 3: Quarantine
summary: Pathologic 3: Quarantine is a narrative-driven adventure about a young scientist in search of immortality and a mysterious plague outbreak in a small town. Learn how your story began and what drove a celebrated academic to leave his acclaimed lab. Examine patients, uncover strange secrets, and make first steps towards defeating Death.

name: Chaos Caster
summary: Cast spells, dash around hordes of enemies, and assemble powerful combos as you explore procedurally generated dungeons. Chaos Caster is an action roguelike focused on strategy, playstyle variety, and replayability.
storyline: There is no story.

name: Faun Town
summary: Faun Town is a relaxing automation-building puzzle game. After crash-landing on a mysterious island and losing your memory, you must use the island's resources to build automated production lines and repair your ship.
themes: Science fiction, Sandbox, 4X (explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate)
storyline: Immerse yourself in peaceful island living—farm, mine, chop wood, cook, and fish at your leisure. Explore the island and encounter various pets that might just become your companions with a simple offering. Unlock plant gene modifications, advance your tech, and guide the evolution of your robots. Use your ingenuity to construct mysterious medical pods and repair your broken ship.

name: Wine Factory Simulator
summary: Grow, Harvest, Create – The Art of Winemaking Awaits!

name: MLB The Show 25: Digital Deluxe Edition
WWE 2K25
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Celebrate The Bloodline in Showcase. Compete online in MyGM. Expanded gameplay includes intergender wrestling, chain wrestling, barricade diving, the return of Promos + much more!

name: Out of the Park Baseball 26
summary: 26 years of sports gaming excellence! Out of the Park Baseball 26 is here - officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO! This year's brand new version puts you firmly in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your way, your rules.
developers: Out Of The Park Developments, Com2uS

name: Neva: Devolver Deluxe Edition
summary:
Neva: Devolver Deluxe will include the following exclusive items, besides the physical game:
· A stunning softbound 88-page artbook showcasing concept art and game art.
· A copy of the game’s original soundtrack by Berlinist, on a CD and as digital download.
· A collector’s tuck-in box housing all the contents.

Neva is an emotionally charged action-adventure from the team behind GRIS.
storyline: Neva chronicles the story of Alba, a young woman bound to a curious wolf cub following a traumatic encounter with dark forces. Together, they embark on a perilous journey through a once-beautiful world as it slowly decays around them. Their relationship evolves as they learn to work together, helping one another to brave increasingly dangerous situations. The wolf grows from a rebellious cub to an imposing adult while seeking to forge her own identity, testing Alba’s love and their commitment to one another. As the cursed world threatens to overwhelm them, Alba and her courageous companion will do whatever it takes to survive and make a new home, together.

name: Pachinko TD
summary: Pachinko TD is a physics-based, minimalist tower defense game. Inspired by Thronefall.

name: Chumini: Tiny Army
summary: In this vampire survivor-like, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison 2
summary: A reunion of old middle school friends in a room resembling something from an Alice in Wonderland world. With chains and collars around the girls' necks.

name: Break Wolf
summary: An Adventure RPG that deals with the life and death of wayward humans, striving to escape a syndicate that creates monsters.

name: Grimm's Folly
summary:
In Grimm’s Folly, find yourself falling through a wormhole and landing in a trash heap. The world around you, dark and unfamiliar, is not your own. Someone has trapped you here. And that someone doesn’t ever want you to leave.

Grimm's Folly is a first person adventure puzzle game with a twist. Not only do you control the main character but you can also control a raven to help you explore the available areas, collect unique collectable and even fly through the game in 20 time trials.
storyline: Lost in the remnants of a broken universe, you must piece together the past to escape. Explore surreal landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the mysteries of a forgotten world. With the help of a raven companion, navigate the shattered realm and find your way home!

name: Heat or Die
summary: Survive extreme cold and a Wendigo stalker, hunting it to avoid being hunted. A game focused on survival, exploration, non-linear gameplay, and a terrifying atmosphere.

name: Broad Sword
summary:
Broad Sword is a formation based third-person tactical hack and slash game where you lead formations of troops to face off against a variety of factions in a fantasy realm. Engage in class-based combat as you defeat your foes in conquest, siege and campaign modes.

Fight from a ground level view of large fantasy battles, command your formation of troops, and lead your army through hack-and-slash encounters to claim ultimate victory! Go head to head in objective based conquest mode. Test your defensive skills in a wave based survival mode, or employ grand strategy in a campaign mode. Varied troop types offer distinct fighting styles and weapons, allowing for diverse playstyles and tactics. Will you anchor a battle line with spearmen, shatter defenses with mighty great swords, or rain arrows upon your enemies?
storyline: Broad Sword takes place in a high fantasy realm where classic fantasy factions like Dwarves, Elves, and Orcs meet on the field of battle. The main form of diplomacy in the realm is open conflict. Whether it's pitched battles, castle sieges or grand campaigns the one constant is war.

name: Foepower
summary: Roguelite single character auto-battler - level up, gear up, and chill with the semi-idle gameplay

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Rat Who Demons Fear
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Girl Who Cried Ghost
Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Seign
Cashier Simulator
summary: Grocery Store Manager

name: Moorhuhn Kart 4
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: The world's craziest chicken is heading back to the racetrack! Wacky characters, cool tracks and karts, and zany items await in a worldwide online battle for first place!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: After Death
summary: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...
storyline:
On 18 January 2015, the Argentine lawyer Alberto Nisman was found dead in his home after making a few powerful enemies. Some say that he committed suicide, and others say that he was silenced. The truth behind his death has been lost... or has it?

Continue the investigation in After Death: a first-person horror game based on the mysterious death of Alberto Nisman.

name: Jin & Jan
summary: Jin & Jan: A ghostly puzzle game for two minds but only one player. Control two brothers, Jin and Jan, on a spooky adventure. Jin does what you say, but Jan always does the opposite! Master their unique movements to solve mind-bending puzzles and overcome obstacles in a ghostly world.

name: Splort
summary: Use your elastic hand to climb, push and fight your friends in this intense local multiplayer physics-based combat mayhem, across countless levels, with a huge variety of unique weapons at your disposal.

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light
summary: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth: Fulland of Water and Light is an upcoming game from Bushiroad Games.
storyline:
Memories of love that overflow across time…

One fateful day, without any warning, the labyrinthine city of Orario was transformed.

A "World of Water" emerged.In this submerged city, Bell Cranel meets a mysterious girl.

"Fullland."

Calling him this, she disappeared as if inviting him to play.

At the same time, he received a glowing, blue sword.

A submerged city, "Fullland", a girl, and an ultramarine sword...
Bell remembered the heroic tale "Fullland of Water and Light", which he had once read.
Perhaps this was the clue to solving the mystery of their current predicament.

n the sunken Orario, Bell and his group follow the trail of the characters as dictated in the heroic tale.
What they find there are an abundance of thoughts and feelings not depicted in "Fulland of Water and Light".

This is a “story beyond love”, where the heroes struggle and the spirits dream.

A completely original story from the mind of Fujino Omori!

In addition to the deep main story, sub-stories can also be read by reaching "Scenario Points" during exploration!

name: Kamitsubaki City Regenerate
summary: Answer the summons to the parallel world of "Kamitsubaki City" and meet a cast of colorful characters as you set out on a quest to save this city from the brink of destruction in this dark-fantasy sci-fi visual novel!

name: Matcho
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Connect everything in this revolutionary Match-3 FPS with combat mechanics different from anything you've ever played before. Join Max and his friends on an epic journey as he takes on a mysterious alien invasion that could lead to curing his illness and saving the Earth.
storyline:
Meet Max, a 25-year old, who has spent the past 8 years locked away in Triagon laboratories, located deep underground. Triagon has been trying to cure Max's illness - a very dangerous outburst of anomalous energy. Since there isn't any permanent cure, Max is dependent on Triagon's technology.

Just as he has begun to accept that this is how it will be for the rest of his life, everything changes with the appearance of Thomas Jetsen. He informs Max that the Triagon Facility Leader has been kidnapped by strange, bug-like creatures from outer space.

What’s even more peculiar is that the measured energy signature of the alien bugs is apparently identical to Max’s.

This is where Max’s story begins. He will now go on a quest to save the Triagon leader, find a way to get rid of the space insects, and, most importantly, understand the nature of his unique skills. For years, this weird energy considered a curse now seems to be a blessing that could save humanity from an unknown threat. But the clock is ticking.

Can he find the cure and save the Earth?

name: Play Twice
summary: "Enjoy Twice" – A new Sokoban-style puzzle game, Play Twice! Once you clear a stage, a second playthrough begins on the same board. Enjoy a dual-layered puzzle experience where strategic planning for the second round is the key to success!

name: Doggos in Dungeon
summary: Reclaim your dungeon through tactical combat in this dungeon crawling adventure to become the best Doggo.

name: Expelled!
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: A School Prefect has been pushed out of a window, and everyone's blaming YOU. Can you find the culprit - or someone to take the fall - before you get EXPELLED? Mystery with a wicked twist, from the creators of Overboard! and A Highland Song.

name: Be Brave, Barb
platforms: Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Nintendo Switch

name: Day Zero
summary: Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is a text-based survival game where choices determine fate and ethical and moral decisions matter. Every choice shapes the story. Are you ready to test your limits in a zombie apocalypse?

name: Gretel's Honesty
summary: A comic-like visual novel, expressing a new story based on the fairy tale “Hansel and Gretel”.

name: Wind Breaker: Furyou-tachi no Eiyuutan
summary: An RPG based on the anime 'Wind Breaker'. Features the voice cast of the anime reprising their roles.

name: Fate: Reawakened
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Revisit the quaint town of Grove and the realms beyond as you prepare to enter the Dungeon Gate once again! The award-winning FATE series has gotten a modern facelift while remaining true to the nostalgic dungeon crawler classic.

name: Adulting
summary: Growing older has nothing to do with feeling grown up. Face the challenges of adulthood with Liv, Albert and Finja in this interactive visual novel by exploring their everyday lives through point-and-click interactions as well as mini games and figure out the secrets of how to be an adult!

name: Witchroid Vania: A Magical Girl’s Fantastical Adventures
summary: Join mage-in-training Lily on an epic adventure! Explore a multitude of worlds, including forests, deserts, and dungeons, in hopes of becoming a full-fledged mage!

name: Metal Bringer
summary: In this roguelike action-adventure, control humanoid "Labor" and giant "Arms" to uncover the mysteries of the world. Create fully-customizable robots, strengthen them, and take down hordes of enemies!
storyline:
The sky is blue, infinitely high, and infinitely vast...
Whose words were these again...?
Ah, I remember... It was about a virtual reality Rudra told me about.
A fairy tale.
How many years has it been since humanity took refuge underground?
No one alive has ever seen a blue sky.
And now, I'm trapped in the depths, in a small, lifeless room.
Just how long have I been here...?

A young girl named Suria wakes up in a laboratory and finds out that she has been put in cryosleep for 1000 years without her knowledge.

In order to search for the rest of humanity, she builds Labor with her trusty Buds, and sends them off to investigate...

name: The Wind's Path
summary: The Wind's Path is a fast-paced top down singleplayer game. If you want to stay alive, keep moving. A mysterious force is wreaking havoc in other worlds and only you can stop it. You'll unlock powerful wind abilities that not only make you a force of nature but help you fly through difficult levels.

name: Dead Trash
summary: Years into a brutal lockdown, a once-thriving city lies in ruins, abandoned by its government and overrun by vicious, mindless infected. Grab your hammer, collect your nerves and enter the mayhem.

name: Wanderstop
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: From the creator of The Stanley Parable and The Beginner’s Guide comes Wanderstop, a narrative-centric cozy game about change and tea.

name: Centum
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: An unreliable narrative-driven adventure game. You are trapped, and you must escape. But is that really the goal?

name: Who Wears The Crown?
summary: Test your brain and your brawn in the toughest chess game ever made! Play against a tough chess engine to build your path and climb upward to claim the crown, but be careful! One small blunder and you risk losing your progress. Heavy is the head that wears the crown, but who will wear it?

name: Oblin Party
summary: A wacky physics-based, couch/online party brawler where the hands do the talking. Utilize your elastic arms to wield powerful items, or swing, slingshot, grab, and punch to catapult your opponents off the map. Perfect for quick, hilarious multiplayer sessions with friends!

name: Cheaters Cheetah
summary: Everyone will be given ACTUAL CHEATS in this multiplayer shooter. Use wallhacks and aimbots to your advantage and dominate the other cheetahs. The winner will get to BAN all losers!

name: The Stepfather Remake
summary:
Welcome to the 1920s, an era of jazz, speakeasies, and gangsters with more ambition than brains. In this classic point-and-click adventure, you’ll step into the shoes of Aurelliot, a down-on-his-luck private detective who, drowning in debt and short on clients, takes on a case that seems simple… until it isn’t.

What starts with a mysterious woman and a suspicious job spirals into a tangled web of blackmail, secrets, and absurd situations, where every conversation could hold the key and every object might (or might not) be useful. Inept gangsters, nosy bartenders, and a slew of puzzles await you in this remastered version of the 2003 classic—now with enhanced graphics, a remastered soundtrack, and brand-new voice acting for an even more immersive experience.

name: Broken Sword Collection
summary: Paris in the fall holds many memories for George Stobbart: of cafés, of music, of love, and of death. Now on Evercade, you can explore the first two adventures in this legendary series, presented in their original 32-bit console form.

name: Indie Heroes Collection 4
summary: The Indie Heroes return to Evercade with another lineup of new games made for (and in the style of) vintage gaming hardware. Includes the dig-and-bomb ’em up action of Murtop, the inimitable bouncy platforming of Flea!2, Batty Zabella’s saucy adventures and many more!

name: Beyond the Ice Palace II
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A sequel to 1988's action platform game Beyond the Ice Palace released on Commodore 64.

name: Aneurism IV
summary: An immersive multiplayer industrial nightmare simulator where you will be forced to work in a dystopian city on the verge of rotting. Pick a side, do your job, and don't ask questions.

name: Typing Ninja
summary: Typing Ninja is an upcoming fast-paced typing game where players type falling words before they hit the ground, featuring Arcade and Story options. Players can use power-ups, face challenging bosses, and customize keycaps.

name: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
summary: CraftCraft is an RPG merchant sim with actual. Crafting. Create a tiara for a mermaid princess or a sword made of dragon blood - you choose! Express your creativity in your very own cozy crafting studio and change the lives of quirky locals in the mysterious port town of Windspell.

name: Ladies I'm Ready
summary: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.

name: Dream Life in the Country Side
FarmTD
summary: FarmTD combines the charm of farming with the strategy of tower defense. Utilize and upgrade your animals to fend off invading insects while managing your crops to prevent them from dying of dehydration (or being eaten by hungry goats...)

name: Scarlet: City of Devils
genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: A demon-punk hack-and-slash adventure game! Explore the city of Elovelle at your own discretion and take down the toughest thugs this game has to offer.

name: Ultimate Soccer
summary: Ultimate skills to shoot, attack and run to mix combat gameplay with a skill-based soccer game in third person perspective! Show how you kick the shot to other players and become an Ultimate soccer player, gates awaiting to explode with your amazing goals!

name: Golden Knight
summary: Defeat the forces of darkness and bring peace back to the kingdom of Valerond in this action-packed mini metroidvania.

name: Warm Monkey
summary: Warm Monkey is an Action/Platformer video game in isometric 3D landscape. In a modern architectural and exotic city, a monkey multiplies and its need for water increases. He must reach the seashore.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Trolls vs. Vikings: Reborn
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Tactical, Indie
summary: Strategy meets mischief! Explore an amazing and lush fantasy world, where an epic battle between Trolls, Vikings and the Nordic Gods rages on. Get ready to don your tactical horns and dive into Trolls vs Vikings: Reborn where strategy is king, trolls reign supreme,and your sanity is the final boss!
storyline: Get ready to don your tactical horns (and maybe a trollish grin) for the ultimate strategy showdown. Building on the beloved original that enthralled over 1.3 million players and got massive nods from players, Apple, Microsoft, Amazon and Google, this premium edition cranks the epic dial to 11 with tons of new features and upgrades:

name: My Virtual Friend
summary: My Virtual Friend is a desktop pet/idler game where a cute girl accompanies you whilst you navigate your computer. She's interested in what you're doing and will do her best to cheer you up! Play with her, unlock new backgrounds, and customize your outfits. Just don't make her mad...

name: Overtime Anomaly
summary: You're working overtime again in your dead-end job, whilst your boss is on vacation. However, strange things are happening throughout the office. Complete your daily work tasks, explore your office, report any anomalies you may find, and you may just find yourself getting a promotion...

name: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator
summary: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator is a 2D game with a lot of mechanics. It is always exhausting to look for apartment, but fortune is at your side now! Welcome your new roommate, Yoshima! Can you find the key to her heart? Don't forget to pay the rent!

name: Stick Tongue
summary: Hello, I'm Frogus! Humans have ruined the Earth and depleted its resources. My plan? Climb to heaven with my tongue and ask God to make it rain!
storyline:
Use your tongue to climb higher and higher! “Stick Tongue
Mankind has destroyed the planet. No water, no resources, only ruins and despair. But Frogus, a daring frog, has an idea: climb to heaven to ask God to make it rain.

name: Nubby's Number Factory
summary: A plinko-style roguelike where you work at a number factory. Launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to make bigger and bigger numbers! But beware, if you fail to meet your number quota, the sun will explode.
storyline:
Welcome aboard to Nubby's Number Factory! Your only job here is to make numbers, so you can make bigger numbers, so you can make even BIGGER numbers!

In this plinko-style roguelike, you'll launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to rack up increasingly large numbers. However, it's not all fun and games. You're still a low-ranking employee at this facility, which means that you need to meet your production quota. To make stakes even higher, your work at the number factory is directly responsible for keeping the fabric of space and time intact. One screw up could cause the sun to immediately explode.

Luckily, you can increase your output of numbers by harnessing the magical powers of over 30 unique items. You can use these items to create diverse and creative solutions to surpass your ever-expanding quotas. Feel that sweet surge of dopamine as the components of your factory synergize to make those numbers big!

name: Crimsonwood
summary: Crimsonwood is a roguelike top-down shooter in a cursed national park. Collect various weapons, gain perks and battle hordes of enemies to survive. Play solo or online co-op.

name: Same Room Same Day
summary: Step into the mind of Rosaline in this psychological horror FPS. Face terrifying manifestations of her fears, battle through intense combat, and help her find inner peace. Solve puzzles along the way to unlock deeper layers of her psyche and bring her closer to healing
storyline:
Embark on a journey through Rosaline's psychological landscape, where every monster represents a piece of her past. As her psychotherapist, you must guide her through these nightmares, helping her confront and conquer her fears.

Rosaline is trapped in a cycle of emotional turmoil, struggling to perceive life normally. She experiences overwhelming inner pain, leading to feelings of hopelessness and self-harm. This game metaphorically represents the therapeutic process between you and Rosaline, showcasing how you can help her navigate these dark corridors of her mind.

name: Oyasumii
summary: Relive the nostalgia with Oyasumii, a horror and exploration game inspired by PSX and N64 classics. Enter liminal spaces and face surreal terrors in an adventure that challenges your skills and sanity. Are you ready to relive the golden age of video games with Oyasumii?

name: Moonbase Lambda
summary: Moonbase Lambda is a horror survival game which you have to escape from a procedurally-generated maze. The premise of the game is that an unidentified creature breaks into the moonbase, which leaves you no choice but to survive and escape from it.
storyline: The era of interplanetary travel has arrived in the vast expanse of space. As an advanced outpost for terraforming, there existed the Moonbase Lambda. One day, the player awakens from a cryogenic sleep only to be greeted by the eerie silence of Lambda Base. Despite the confusion, the player begins to explore the base in order to survive...

name: Mars Vice
summary: Mars Vice is a narrative adventure game set on a distant and futuristic Mars. Follow two civil investigators, Dax and Anaya, as they root out deep-seated corruption in the Martian city of Pavonis in this biopunk-infused story.

name: MiniMania
platforms: Web browser, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS
summary: MiniMania is a social MMO designed for browsers and mobile devices, offering a seamless gaming experience on the go. Explore a vibrant virtual world where you can build, customize, and create your own unique spaces. Connect with players worldwide, embark on exciting adventures, and discover endless fun through creative interactions and activities. Dive into MiniMania and make the world your playground!

name: Tiny Dangerous Dungeons Remake
summary: Guide Timmy the little treasure hunter through traps and puzzles to reach the legendary treasure. This classic mini metroidvania is remade with new visuals, music, and content.

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Liar and the Lost
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - The Wandering Pirate
Poltergeist Prodigy
summary:
Poltergeist Prodigy is a single-player, story-focused, puzzle action-adventure game, a first person haunter where you delight in being a mischievous ghost.

You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring scary aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.
storyline: You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring 'scary' aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Gangneung City
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Ever 17 Never 7 Double Pack
summary: Stand up to the fate of infinity!

name: Suikoden II HD Remaster: Dunan Unification War
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Remaster of the second Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.
storyline:
Our story's hero and Jowy were a part of the Highland Kingdom's Unicorn Youth Brigade, partaking in a taxing battle against the City-States. The City-States of Jowston, made up of the 5 cities of Muse, South Window, Tinto, Greenhill, and Two River, as well as the Matilda Knights, and the Highland Kingdom were involved in a never-ending battle over gaining control of land.

A few months earlier to the story, Agares Blight, king of Highland, and Anabelle, mayor of Muse, signed a truce agreement, both sides happy to see an end to the fighting. However, fires of a new war continued to smolder in the shadows...

name: Suikoden I HD Remaster: Gate Rune War
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Remaster of the first Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.
storyline:
The story begins when a hero turns.

Once a renowned hero, now a violent tyrant. The Empire's future turns bleaker by the day, and at last, a Liberation Army rises up against the oppressive rule.

One by one, the 108 Stars of Heaven and Earth gather to shape the course of their history. People harbor their own beliefs under two flags, that of the Liberation Army or the Empire.

Ideals, honor, friendship, loyalty, love, ambition... Various thoughts drive the souls to the battlefield. Once all the fighting concludes, what will be left within their hands...?

name: Star Life
summary:
Sandbox "Zero To Hero" RPG in futuristic setting. Game features deep economic gameplay with realistic economy and full freedom for a player.

While on a planet, range of opportunities is wide, from being employed practically at any building (should there be a vacancy) to owning any non-government building, influencing economy directly. Entire planet economy is based on real buildings present in the game and therefore player can shape it to his liking (if player is rich enough). Player can also choose to be anyone - from local business owner, to criminal or politician (or as it might often be - all at once). Skill development is only possible if player performs tasks which require those skills.

Player can travel from planet to planet and own or rent any spaceship, mining, pirating or simply trading goods between planets. While game has no quests & restrictions, there is a main story present which implies that player need to achieve certain results and actions to meet win condition, which does not stop player from continuing game thereafter.

Choose any path or all at once. Model employee, Business owner, Politician, Merchant, Pirate, Criminal, or just explore game as it feels.

name: Split Fiction
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Embrace mind-blowing moments as you’re pulled deep into the many worlds of Split Fiction, a boundary-pushing co-op adventure.

name: Do No Harm
summary: A Doctor Simulator with a Lovecraftian twist. Diagnose patients by analyzing unsettling symptoms and treat them using your Book of Medicine. Make moral choices — decide who to save or kill, discover whom to trust, and unlock multiple endings! Can you endure 30 days of perilous decisions?

name: Never 7: The End of Infinity
summary: An upcoming remastered version of Never7: The End of Infinity for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.
storyline:
To the promise we once made and the place we must return
The protagonist, Makoto Ishihara, had the worst possible awakening. He had a dream in which a girl died a tragic death right in front of his eyes. The seminar training camp was supposed to go off without a hitch...or so Makoto believed.
April 6th.. The day everything changed.
The uneasiness turned in to despair, and the premonition turned into calamity...
Will Makoto be able to stop the tragedy and see the light of the morning on Day 7?

name: Ever 17: The Out of Infinity
summary: An upcoming remastered version of Ever17 for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.
storyline:
Save me from this cage of infinity
Takeshi Kuranari, an ordinary college student, visits the underwater theme park LeMU. An accident occurs, trapping Takeshi and 6 other individuals inside LeMU, 51 meters below the surface. With no hope of rescue, Takeshi explores LeMU along with the mysterious girl Tsugumi and part-time employee You, searching for a way to escape to the surface.
A theme park of dreams and hopes sunk in the depths of the mysterious blue ocean.
Can dreams and hopes still be found there? Or is there some other mystery lurking?
Overcoming one crisis after another, they search for a way to escape.

name: Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat
summary: Relax in Bao Bao’s Cozy Laundromat, an idle game where you join Bao Bao, a charming panda, in creating the coziest laundromat. Purchase colorful washing machines, add delightful decorations, and hire panda helpers. Watch your cozy laundromat bustle with life, even when you’re not around!
storyline:
Step into the warm and welcoming world of Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat, where our lovable panda, Bao Bao, is eager to share her dream with you. Starting with just 500, you'll help Bao Bao transform a humble beginning into a bustling haven of cleanliness and charm. Picture rows of vibrant, colorful washing machines humming gently, alongside dryers that turn laundry day into a soothing ritual. But it’s not just about washing clothes—it's about creating a space that feels like home.

As you and Bao Bao work together, you'll have the chance to add all sorts of delightful touches: cozy furniture where customers can relax with a good book, snack-filled vending machines that bring joy to those waiting, and lush, leafy plants that breathe life into every corner. And because no great venture is ever truly solo, you'll soon be able to welcome other panda friends to join the fun, each bringing their own special touch to the laundromat.

What's even more relaxing is that Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat is an idle game, meaning you can let it run peacefully in the background without needing too much interaction. Your laundromat will keep thriving, even when you're off doing other things, allowing you to return to a bustling, cozy environment whenever you're ready.

To make the experience even more serene, you'll be surrounded by the gentle sounds of 10 beautiful lo-fi soundtracks, creating the perfect atmosphere for a cozy, laid-back experience. Let the music soothe your soul as you help Bao Bao build her dream.

So come on in, take a deep breath, and feel the warmth of Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat wrap around you like a favorite blanket. Together, you'll create a place that’s not just about doing laundry—it’s about finding a little bit of peace, happiness, and sweet melodies in the everyday.

name: MainFrames
summary: MainFrames invites you to meet Floppy and to browse a clever and charming platformer that plays out entirely within the windows and desktop of a PC monitor. You won’t want to press the escape key on this cozy outing!

name: FragPunk
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: FragPunk is a new fast paced 5v5 hero based first person shooter featuring powerup cards that bend the rules of combat!

name: Parallel Experiment
summary: Dive into the secrets of the Parallel Experiment in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives to finally catch the infamous Cryptic Killer. And remember - communication is key!

name: Scarred
summary: Scarred is a first-person atmospheric horror puzzle game where you must uncover the truth about one of your schoolmates before it’s too late. Traverse a world of nightmares inspired by nostalgic Singaporean architecture as you fight to survive.
storyline: Surrounded by traditional Singaporean locales twisted into a nightmarish realm of danger and discovery, you must navigate a frightening and ethereal world as you piece together a story that will change your understanding of your friends and classmates forever.

name: Morkull: Ragast's Rage
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: A 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration in which we control Morkull, God of death and darkness and lord of the Ragast, whose main mechanics lies in the breaking of the fourth wall, which will allow Morkull to communicate with the player in various ways.
developers: Selecta Play, Disaster Games, Astrolabe Games

name: Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A hero's destiny is written in the Stars. The legendary Konami JRPGs Suikoden I and Suikoden II have now been remastered in HD!
storyline:
The Story of Suikoden I
A once renowned hero turns into a violent tyrant, and an empire falls into decline.
A Liberation Army is rising up in an act of rebellion against an oppressive rule.
One by one the 108 stars of Destiny gather to shape the course of history.

The Story of Suikoden II
Our story's hero and his friend Jowy are members of the Unicorn Youth Brigade, which participated in a drawn-out border dispute between the Highland Kingdom and the City-States of Jowstown .

A few months earlier, a truth agreement was signed between the two forces, both of which were happy to see an end to the fighting.
However, hidden under the momentary peace the fires of a new war continued to smolder…

name: Grimoire Groves
summary: Restore the magical forest as you grow cute plant creatures with your witch magic in this cozy rogue-lite dungeon crawler. Unlock all spells, discover new plant types, befriend magical creatures, and unravel the mystery of the rainbow socks.
storyline: The witches couldn't wait to finally move to the fabled Grimoire Groves: A forest, which – according to old myths – is a home to magical creatures and plants! But as the witches arrived at their new home, they immediately noticed that something was off. Only a few plant creatures were still around, and the forest spirits were missing. Though a shocking revelation, not all is lost. With a little dedication, investigation and magic, the witches might just be the ones to restore the Grimoire Groves to the lush forest it once was!

name: Slime Heroes
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: A game where the slimes are finally the heroes. Play together with your friends as adorable slimes - the only creature that can save the world from an evil corruption. Find different weapons and create your own unique magic abilities to express the way you want to adventure.
storyline: Journey with your fellow slimes to save the gods from a deadly corruption taking over the land. Explore a mysterious world filled with magical plants and wondrous creatures. Discover hidden passageways and forgotten treasures. Collect special gems and combine them to create unique magic skills. Level up and fight back against the corrupted minions to restore the land.

name: Asylum
summary: An epic supernatural horror adventure and the spiritual successor to cult classic Scratches set in a massive, decaying mental institute. Inspired by H. P. Lovecraft, Hammer Films and twisted Euro Horror from the 80s.
storyline: Taking place in a fictional insane asylum called the Hanwell Mental Institute, players will be able to fully explore the institute, which is partially based on elements of real asylums

name: Miryam: The Polluted Land
summary: Traverse the wasteland with Miryam. Use magic items to build defenses against evil spirits. It's a casual tower defense game of construction and resource balance. Characters grow via challenges, from timid to fearless and wild. The blend of building and defense makes it addictive and engaging
Let's do some easy math with the girls!

name: Treasure Hunt
summary: Treasure Hunt is a fast-paced party game where up to 6 players compete as pirates to dig up hidden treasure chests, steal loot from each other, and outsmart their rivals. Use quick reflexes to dig, roll, and shoot your way to victory in chaotic, treasure-filled battles.

name: Lost Valley of the Frog King
summary: You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

name: Soul Trader
summary: Welcome to the NecronomiCon: The most anticipated convention for necromancers from across the land! Gather your minions and craft powerful synergies as you face your rivals in this inventive Roguelike Deckbuilder!

name: Undercover Fools
summary: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!

name: Roll a Dice
summary: "Roll a Dice" is a dice game full of strategy and luck, combining classic props and set effects. In this 8x6 building table, players need to roll dice, activate cells, and trigger different effects to accumulate points and challenge higher goals.

name: Air
summary: A new release of Key's AIR visual novel marking the first-ever official English release, featuring retouched HD visuals and CG coloring, the side story novel "First Sky Chapter" in visual novel format and full voice support.

name: Eldrador Creatures: Shadowfall
summary: The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace.

name: All Whispering Tome
summary: A reading adventure game about exploring stories. The hidden stories in the game are unfold while you read multiple seamingly unrelated stories.

name: Golden Warden
