summary: A turn-based roguelike battle game with easy controls. Choose a card each turn to reach the depths of the dungeon and acquire the treasures guarded by the Golden Warden.

name: 1M84
summary: An upcoming MMO RPG game with lots of fun and things to do! The things you can do are endless. With server updates planned every week!

name: The Wall
summary: Defend the city, Fight the dead. In this fast paced zombie wall defence game set in a neon cyberpunk world, you must man the wall, upgrade defences and build robots and turrets. Face relentless waves of undead as you hold out as long as you can. Its not about if the wall falls its about when.

name: The Bear: A Story from the World of Gra
summary: Home is where the stars are. An interactive bedtime story, for anyone who needs one. Take the bear and the little one on a deeply meaningful journey, as you experience stories of togetherness, of letting go and of finding a place you belong.

name: Refence
summary: Refence is a roguelike based idle defense game, where you can choose heroes and their traits, upgrade your castle, and manage resources to fend off enemies trying to attack your castle.

name: Surf Dance
summary: Next to the cartoonish cute style island, with your favorite cute animals, experience the excitement of high-speed sprint in the rhythm of platform jumps.

name: Flood of Zombies
summary: 《flood of zombies》 is a third-person roguelike shooting game in which the player takes on the role of a soldier, defending against numerous zombie attacks!

name: What's On The Menu?
summary: In What's on the Menu?, step into the shoes of a restaurant manager. From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!

name: Signal: Uncharted Lands
summary: Embark on a journey with four adorable explorers! Uncover all the secrets of a post-apocalyptic world, meet the future inhabitants of Earth and enjoy plenty of Easter eggs. Your choices will shape the game's ending, so choose wisely! Or try a second playthrough to catch all the fun moments!

name: Siberian Way
summary: Siberian Way is a historical detective thriller. Follow the dark non-linear story and decide how it can end! For all fans of snowy Siberia, Murder on the Orient Express and twisted plots, seasoned with mysticism.

name: Tiny Duck Hunt 3D
summary: Next generation arcade game in a cute cartoon 3D world. Sweet graphics, nice gameplay, unique control system focused on handheld and joypad gaming.

name: Foddia
summary:
Foddia is a 2D-Platformer inspired by Getting Over It. There are difficult challenges to overcome and mysteries to uncover at every turn. Swing on ropes, make long jumps across chasms, and climb your way to the top of the Foddian Mountain.

You came here for a reason.
Was it to climb this mountain that won't stop towering over you?
Was it to search for secrets in the depths unknown?
Was it to become the fastest hiker the world has ever seen?

The only certainty is that if you leave now...
You may never know why you came in the first place.

name: Lilac 0
summary: The machine world of Molybdion has fallen into disarray. As Nidhogg eats the root of the planet, unending wars rage on the surface! Slice your way through hordes of metallic foes in five frantic levels, defeat fearsome bosses, and dodge countless bullets in this vintage vertical shoot 'em up.

name: Dinosaurs in Place
summary: In this exciting two-dimensional puzzle game, you need to place your prehistoric friends on the grid so that they fit perfectly. Dinosaurs in Place offers 100 unique levels and 40 diverse dinosaurs that will not leave you indifferent.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.

name: Holy Shot
summary: Holy Shot is a fast-paced, physics-based top-down shooter. Face nasty hordes of monsters in a chaotic environmental destruction, combining powerful weapons and strategic abilities to survive intense battles against challenging bosses.

name: HenPri
summary: Thrown into prison for an act of self-expression, protagonist Shuichiro must confront both a violent system and his own actions—or else try to find happiness on the inside in this censored visual novel from the makers of NUKITASHI.
storyline:
Tulip Prison—a special penitentiary filled with criminals from all over Japan who have been deemed too far gone to rehabilitate. As the “phantom precinct” of the justice system, its facilities occupy an inescapable island that stands alone on the open sea.

Shuichiro Minato—a young man who lives in Tokyo. Amid the Christmas lighting one beautiful winter night, he was arrested as a public nuisance.

Shuichiro defended himself in court, describing his acts as self-expression—art—but no one could understand him. He was sentenced to ten years of penal servitude for being a pest and resisting arrest. What's more, he was deemed too far gone to rehabilitate... and thrown into Tulip Prison. In a modern-day dungeon with monsters in human skin around every corner, can one brave annoyance survive?

Whatever the future holds, one thing is for sure: This prison ain't no paradise.

name: Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Card & Board Game
summary: Recruit and command a party of samurai on expeditions into the Shadowlands of the Legend of the Five Rings universe. Gain experience and cards in battle to develop units and create powerful combat combinations in this strategic roguelite.

name: Petrified Pawns
summary: Petrified Pawns has chess-style movement and turn-based combat. Fight new types of chess pieces and bosses. Build your army and keep them alive while you advance through the dungeon. Use healing spells, loot and strategy to keep your king alive and to reach the end with as many units as possible.

name: Age of Mythology: Retold - Immortal Pillars
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Unleash the power of Chinese mythology in Age of Mythology: Retold’s first expansion, Immortal Pillars. Discover a new pantheon of gods, legendary myth units, and awe-inspiring god powers in an epic campaign inspired by ancient legends.

Summon the fierce goddess Nüwa, command Chiyou, the bull-headed god of war, and call upon Nüba, the relentless bringer of drought. Control the skies with Yinglong, the mighty flying rain dragon, and experience so much more.
developers: Xbox Game Studios, World's Edge, Tantalus Media, Forgotten Empires LLC, Virtuos Games

name: Two Point Museum
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac
summary: Curate and manage incredible museums! Explore to discover amazing artifacts. Design and refine the layout, keep staff happy, guests entertained, donations plentiful… and children off the exhibits.

name: Cascadence
summary: Survive and ultimately escape a foreign world using your creativity to assemble defenses with physics-based building.

name: Knights in Tight Spaces
genres: Fighting, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Control your environment, gather your party, and build your best deck to overcome outlaws and supernatural forces, across a rich fantasy world. Watch as your tactical choices and deckbuilding prowess play out through stylish fight sequences.

name: Everhood 2
summary: An unconventional arpg where you battle enemies through musical encounters while being accompanied by a Raven who promises you to retrieve your voice if you slay the mighty Mind Dragon!
developers: Chris Nordgren, Foreign Gnomes, Jordi Roca
storyline:
Enter the world of Everhood
Discover the color of your soul and what lies beyond the river of death in a strange land. Accompany a mysterious celestial Raven who deemed you worthy of slaying the mind dragon.

name: War Robots: Frontiers
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: War Robots: Frontiers is an online multiplayer mech shooter that launches the War Robots universe into the stars. Build and customize your mechs, squad up, and unleash the destructive power of your machines in epic online battles.

name: Chess Bomb
summary: Chess Bomb is a unique puzzle game where bombs take the shape of chess pieces. Strategically use these explosive chess bombs to fend off waves of invading monsters threatening the chess kingdom.

name: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows
summary: Konnichiwa Shop-owner-kun! Become a hero of the weeb/otaku community in a cute Japanese suburb with your very own waifu pillow shop! Stock your shelves with exciting dakimakura designs, expand your store, and make a fortune in Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows!

name: Save The Village: Tower Defense
summary: Save The Village is a medieval tower defense game where you strategically protect villages from waves of skeletons, goblins, and fearsome bosses. Build powerful towers and use magical abilities to fend off the invading forces!

name: Old World: Wrath of Gods
summary: Empires rise and fall through military might, political aptitude, and diplomatic savvy – but all know to fear, above all, the Wrath of Gods. Experience devastating natural disasters, a unique scenario that explores stories of legend, and the playable kingdom of Aksum.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Destino Indomable
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: In Destino Indomable, you're the new actress tasked with playing the main character in a telenovela! This is a wild visual novel inspired by the craziest Latin soup operas, filled with humor, drama, romance, horses, handsome men, Spanglish and slaps!

name: Delirium
summary: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house. After a mysterious explosion, reality begins to unravel.

name: Deadly Heart Gambit
genres: Strategy, Indie, Visual Novel, Card & Board Game
summary: You only have 3 months left to live. Gamble for extra time in Alice-sama’s life-or-death game. Be careful — she wants to steal your heart.

name: Songs of Life
summary: Card drama adventure game. With the epidemic, no one can be left alone. You will play as Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing and Dong Feng, with the help of surgery, potions, and even the power of the gods, to end this tragic chaos, uncover the truth of the world and destroy the culprits of it all.

name: The Rise of the Golden Idol: The Sins of New Wells
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One

name: Escape Observation
summary: ‘Escape Observation’ is a short walking simulator inspired by the game ‘The Exit 8’, where you can only move your character and control your vision. It is important to note that the game is not about finding out if a room has changed, but rather that each room is different and you must be aware of the signals that these changes give you.
storyline: You wake up in an endless loop within a mystery room, and you must pay attention to the signals given to you by the changes in each room in order to find the right way out. Some of these changes will be useful and some will be useless. At first, the game will be puzzle orientated, and once you know what to look for, it's up to you to notice it!

name: MIKU: May I Keep Up?
summary:
A second-person physics-based platformer about love, loss, and the struggle to move on.
Parkour your way up through scattered memories of love in form of platforming challenges while you control two characters bound to each other by a thread while listening to healing journey of a man recovering from a heart wrenching breakup.

name: Spirit Channel
summary: An indie horror game made by ThundyVT who began making this game in Dec 2024. In this game, you try to survive from a monster trying to murder you. The way to get out is by entering the digits for the code.

name: Quartermain and the Cult of Cthulhu
Parallel Rift
summary: Parallel Rift is a four-dimensional puzzle game where you navigate through interconnected spaces along the W-axis to reach the goal. Experience an unseen direction in this casual first-person puzzle adventure.

name: Lets Get Loot
summary: Dive into a fantasy idle/incremental game where hack-and-slash combat meets endless progression! Defeat enemies, collect epic loot, and level up to unlock new powers. Craft artifacts, conquer powerful bosses, and grow stronger! Forge your path to greatness in a world of endless adventure!
storyline: In this game you will embark on an epic fantasy adventure in this idle/incremental hack-and-slash game! By epic, we mean get epic items! Cut through endless enemies, collect powerful loot, and level up your hero to face ever-greater challenges. With endless progression, dynamic combat, and artifact crafting, this game offers the perfect blend of action, strategy, and reward. Whether you're grinding for rare drops or letting the game work while you're away, the path to ultimate power is yours to forge!

name: Outlawed
summary: Outlawed is a crime-themed PvPvE first-person extraction shooter, set in a modern city overrun by gangs. Enter solo or with a squad to challenge powerful enemies and search for riches, and use everything at your disposal to make it out alive.

name: Castle of Shikigami 3
summary: ・A culmination of character shooting games set in a unique worldview! ・A wide variety of newly added playable characters and attack methods, as well as a 2P scenario that is different from 1P play. ・Features a high-tension MAX system that will satisfy your insatiable passion for shooting games!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: One Last Job
summary: One Last Job is a moddable team management game, where you work to build your reputation as a fixer by successfully completing jobs with your crew.

name: Another Round
summary:
Another Round is a deckbuilder / slots-style game. Your goal is to stay in business and make your cyberpunk cafe into a social hub which everyone in the community enjoys.

There is no timer or countdown clock putting pressure on you to make decisions quickly; you will not need to do a lot of math or rely on perfect play to have a good time.

name: Darth Vader Tamagotchi
summary: The third Star Wars themed Tamagotchi.

name: Emissary Zero
summary: Co-op horror (1-4 players). You are sent to explore a mysterious building at night. Fix all the equipment and try to return alive.
storyline: You are sent to explore a mysterious building at night. Only your manager will support you, the rest you have to do yourself. Fix all the equipment and try to return alive. Play single or with friends.

name: Merchant 64
summary: Merchant 64 a tiny retro inspired traveling merchant game! Take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.

name: Raid Auctus
summary: Assemble your raid team, gather EXP, and conquer challenges for legendary rewards. Upgrade, strategize, and become the ultimate raid master!
storyline:
Embark on an epic journey in this addictive idle game where every click, every upgrade, and every strategy brings you closer to glory. Gather EXP to grow stronger, unlock powerful raid members, and assemble an unstoppable team. Conquer challenging raids, earn legendary rewards, and prove you have what it takes to triumph over every obstacle.

Will you lead your squad to victory and claim your place as a true raid master?

name: Discopup
summary: In DISCOPUP, you're a seal eager to party, making your way to the most famous nightclub in the city: DiscoPup. However, tonight, the bouncer is only letting dogs in. How will you make it past him?

name: Minutescape
summary: Dodge bullets and upgrade yourself in Minutescape, a retro-inspired incremental game that keeps unfolding. Unlock new abilities and keep upgrading yourself to survive for 5 consecutive minutes.

name: Gas Station Manager
summary: An ultimate 1-4 player Co-op Simulation game where you build and manage your gas station completely from scratch. Team up with your friends, provide exceptional service and grow your business! Collaboration (and some chaos!) is the key to success—fuel up, have your fun and rise to the top!

name: Chaos Ascension
summary: Survive relentless waves of monsters in this fast paced rogue lite action game. Choose your hero, defeat epic bosses, and unlock powerful upgrades in a dark, procedurally generated world.

name: Null State
summary:
Null State is a moddable CRPG built on classic gameplay styles and themes found in cyberpunk games from the late 80s and early 90s.

Inspired by classic cyberpunk stories (& other, older tales of downtrodden folk heroes), you will be tasked with helping the people in your community until you discover that your world is barely holding together — and about to be pushed over the brink.

name: The Travelers
summary: The travelers is a 2d mmo and text-based adventure. explore a massive world full of worn cities and dusty buildings. discover items, build bases, engage in combat, or work together to solve the wasteland's hidden mystery.
storyline:
A surreal apocalyptic world awaits you outside the building where you wake up. without memory or knowledge of what happened to the world, you emerge into a broken city full of mystery, ringing a massive purple monolith that rises beyond the dark clouds high above, dead in the center of an empty world. the air hangs heavy with radiation, the rolling clouds above constantly raining ash onto a world untouched for a long, long time.

The travelers is a text-based adventure and mmo. the world is one massive grid to be explored by all players at once, where items can be discovered, bases can be built, and combat can be engaged. hidden within the world is a unique story, with dozens of old transcripts from a forgotten world to read through. hidden even within this, across the whole world, is a grand puzzle, guiding the community through clues that will reveal what happened to humanity. together, you can uncover the secrets of the wasteland.

name: Videophobia
summary: You are in a room without windows or doors. The TV dimly illuminates the room. What is this, a box? How to open it? After solving the riddle, you find the TV remote control. Click... a door appeared. You step into the darkness and hear laughter... turn around and find out what's behind the screen.
storyline:
The remote control is in your hands. As soon as you switch the channel, a new, unexplored space appears.

The more you explore, the more you feel like you've been here before. These objects... these sounds... it's all so familiar.

Why does every corner of this strange world bring back dark memories?

Understood! It's just a dream! You calm down... but not for long. Light relief gives way to panic... what if this is not a dream after all?

Challenge yourself. Find the answers. Don't let fear consume you.

name: AAA Simulator
summary: Become the CEO of a AAA studio and make important decisions like who to hire and who to fire. Handle events like a pro by making acquisitions or layoffs. Steer the company in any direction as long as it satisfies shareholders - and that means maximizing profit!

name: I Come In Peace
summary: Don't panic! survive the bullet hell action. As a goofy pacifist alien that crashed on Earth, use your tech abilities to evade paranoid humans whose deadly attacks on you cause destruction and mayhem. Navigate the chaos, collect your spaceship parts, and run the hell out of this crazy planet!

name: Upstream
summary: Play as a salmon journeying home in this challenging physics based platformer using only two buttons! Remember that on a voyage through innumerable obstacles and constant danger, it is your reaction to adversity that determines your success.

name: Space Menace 2
summary: Start small, expand your fleet, rise to power, and eventually command entire factions in this seamless blend of sci-fi space RTS and battle game. With strategic gameplay and evolving challenges, every decision shapes your legacy in the stars.

name: Eyes That Hypnotise
summary: A cozy, hand-drawn puzzle where you arrange fluffy friends to fit the grid. With their funny big eyes and a calming mood, this game offers a relaxing escape.

name: Flocking Hell
summary: Flocking Hell is a turn-based strategy roguelite where you defend your pasture from demon legions. It blends calm exploration with auto-battler combat, offering a mix of easy-to-learn mechanics and deep strategy. It also has a lot of sheep.

name: Damashi Game
summary: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.
storyline:
In a world where the weight of student debt crushes the hopes of the next generation, a shadowy organization known as the Watashi Group preys on the desperation of university students and recent graduates. These young people, drowning under the weight of crushing loans, receive an unexpected invitation: compete in a high-stakes game with a single promise—wipe away all their debt, if they can survive.

But once the participants accept, they are whisked away to an opulent yet eerie abandoned cinema. The massive auditorium, once filled with joyous moviegoers, now serves as the twisted arena for the games. The participants find themselves at the mercy of the Watashi Group, whose masked, enigmatic spectators watch from the shadows, delighting in the unfolding chaos like a grotesque form of entertainment. Behind their elaborately designed masks, these wealthy onlookers bet on the players' fates, relishing in the thrill of deception, betrayal, and survival.

The rules are deceptively simple: complete a series of challenges where only the cunning, ruthless, and manipulative can thrive. Every game is a test of wits, strategy, and trust, where alliances are temporary and betrayal is the norm. As the clock ticks down, participants must navigate the ever-changing landscape of the cinema arena, where even a single mistake can mean elimination—and more than just financial ruin.

To the outside world, the participants have vanished, believed to have run away to escape their burdens. But inside the cinema, they face a far darker reality. Those who win are granted the ultimate prize: freedom from their financial chains. But for the losers, the cost is more than just debt—it’s their very lives.

“In the Damashi Game, the stakes are high, and trust is a luxury you can’t afford. Can you outsmart the others and escape the clutches of the Watashi Group, or will you become just another piece of their twisted spectacle?

name: Kokoro Clover Sun: Prehistoric Invaders!
summary: The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series! A visual novel paired with boss battles! Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

name: Toushin Gent
summary: Seeking the coveted Goon Crystal and Bloodline Emblem, the Brutal Cook Gent must face Bendy Town and its strange dungeon. Guide our reluctant "hero" as he faces unwanted attention from friends and foe alike in this "unique" experience of a game.

name: Lucha Libre: Legend of the Mask
summary: Join the action in our 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up game for up to four players! Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Mexican Lucha Libre, where unique mechanics combine the elegant yet brutal art of lucha libre with classic combat. Team up and unleash spectacular moves to defeat your foes!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Domovoy
summary: Domovoy is a psychological horror game from the first person, the game takes place in a Soviet apartment in the late 80s. Are you ready to meet the Domovoy?

name: Tret
summary: A hybrid puzzler set in a synthwave world. Complex platforming meets physics-based synthball manipulation, with a dash of high-speed races across a neon-soaked landscape, all set to the tune of a killer electronic soundtrack paying homage to the colorful eighties.
storyline:
Gear up for a trip into the vibrant world of synthwave, challenging platforming, and physics-based puzzles. Get your trusty synthball to the target zone, unlock the portal, and drive off into the impossibly colored sunset. But there's one catch.

You can't interact with the synthball directly. That's why you need cubes and bombs to move it. But first you need to reach them, after jumping, speeding, and wall running your way across neon-soaked landscapes, thinking outside the box to overcome challenges waiting in each level.

name: Fluffy Sailors
summary: Fluffy Sailors is a charming roguelite adventure where you engage in thrilling sea battles, shooting your fluffy crew onto the ships of other animal pirates.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 6
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

name: Merchants of Rosewall
summary: As a new Merchant in the bustling city of Rosewall you'll manage your own shop, craft artisan goods, hire Companions, and even unravel a mystery of the city! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where conflict is a thing of the past in this narrative driven, fantasy shop keeper simulator.

name: Frontier Paladin
summary: You are an Apprentice Paladin, following your Master on your first quest. Survive by engaging your enemies in deliberate and impactful combat with a variety of play styles. Rally your beleaguered Order, improve your Castle and it's defenses, and hold fast against the Warlords of the Crater.

name: Nine Nights
summary: In Northeast China, there is a beautiful legend about the little fox fairy: In ancient times, the Five Immortals and Holy Spirit lived in the deep mountains and forests of Northeast China, guarding this land and all things inside. Every Holy Spirit possesses a unique power and mission.

name: Sugardew Island: Your Cozy Farm Shop
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: In this cozy farming game, you have to run your own farm shop. Take care of your animals and your farm, sell your goods to the cute Forest Folk, upgrade the island and fulfill small orders from the Harmony Tree to fill the island with life again.

name: Solar War
summary: Solar War! A fast-paced, space-themed, shoot-em-up, bullet hell, arcade style game where players attempt to shoot and weave through a horde of enemy planets in a bid to survive just a little bit longer.

name: SandRipper
summary: Tear across the desert, obliterating wave after wave with speed and precision. A punchy arcade shooter with unlimited weapon combinations!

name: Endless RPG: Untold Tales
summary: Craft a party of diverse characters, each with customizable skills and looks. Explore a living world with dynamic day-night cycles, changing seasons, and diverse biomes. Embark on an epic journey where you shape your destiny as the director of your unique story.

name: Woodlawn: The End of the World
platforms: PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, PlayStation
summary:
When scientists try to create and control magic, their first spell goes wrong, and monsters are accidentally brought to life and destroy cities. Now the military has to hold off and contain the monsters while scientists try to figure out how to undo the spell.

The enemies AI can detect the skill of the player and automatically adjust difficulty based on player performance.

name: The Beekeeper's Picnic
summary: Beekeeper (and former world’s greatest detective) Sherlock Holmes is arranging a surprise picnic for his friend Watson. Unfortunately pesky mysteries keep getting in the way! Explore, find clues and interrogate your neighbours in this cosy point and click adventure!

name: Fable of Fairy Stones
summary: Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world! A significant level of suspense awaits you.

name: Wacambria Island
summary: Explore ancient ruins for treasure and upgrades while avoiding traps and solving puzzles in this retro-inspired Action-Adventure RPG. Slash your way through dangerous creatures with a variety of weapons. Explore a diverse island full of hidden secrets and learn to wield a mysterious power.

name: Pixelpusher
summary: Delightfully simple online multiplayer action
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Afterblast
summary: Afterblast is a challenging FPS rogue-lite action game. Play solo or in co-op. Features dynamic gameplay with randomly generated dungeons, so don't hesitate to obtain the power, unlock new loot, and find a way to save your planet. Stand up against the gods and fight against hordes of monsters.

name: Warspace 2
summary: Warspace 2 is an open world RPG space shooter where you can trade, craft, fight and explore procedurally generated universe!

name: Zone of Action
summary: Zone of Action is a cooperative adventure mode where players navigate through tiers of rooms, choosing from various classes that provide unique perks. Players will fight enemies, mini-bosses, and face off against a big boss, all while exploring a rich lore set in both indoor and outdoor environments.

name: Eternal Prowl
summary:
After many years, you return to your hometown, but nothing is as you remember it. The streets are empty, familiar places feel distant, and the past seems to have faded away. The old school bus is your only clue, leading you deeper into a mystery that begs to be solved.

Immerse yourself in an emotional journey filled with forgotten memories and unsettling discoveries. As you explore an abandoned house, you’ll uncover hidden secrets and solve a crucial puzzle that reveals the truth behind the town’s eerie transformation.

name: Haydee 3
summary: Haydee III is a hardcore metroidvania with third-person shooter mechanics, platforming, puzzles, a sexy heroine and cake!

name: 1917: The Alien Invasion DX Remastered
summary: You are in the role of Dr. Brunhild Stahlmüller, an acomplished weapon scientist who upgrades a WW1 triplane with superior alien technology to attack the invaders. You will avenge mankind and take the battle into the darkness of space until you reach an ancient alien world.

name: Art of Glide 3
summary: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.

name: Leap Year: March
summary:
Leap Year: March continues the adventure for players who have beaten Leap Year and want an even greater challenge.

Delve into another hand drawn world that’s both larger and more complex than the original. Master your understanding of Leap Year’s secrets to complete another month of your calendar.

name: Whispers of the Dead
summary: A psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

name: Double Dangerous
summary: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!

name: Farming Simulator VR
summary: In a relaxing hands-on experience, Farming Simulator VR brings you closer to the soil: Cultivate your fields with yielding crops like corn, wheat & soy. Operate authentic agricultural machinery by renowned manufacturers, directly in the cabin of powerful tractors. Grab repair tools to maintain your vehicles and their parts in the workshop. Tend to vegetables in the greenhouse, and don’t forget to keep your machines sparkling-clean with the pleasure of power-washing!

name: Yosuga no Sora
summary: The censored port for Yosuga no Sora.

name: PGA Tour 2K25
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The master of golf sims is back! Tee off with the world’s top golfers on the most storied courses on golf’s biggest stages.

name: Bewilder House: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Bewilder House is a classic first-person horror puzzle game that challenges your perception and willpower. Trapped in shifting mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll need to rely on your mind and first-person controls to navigate a deceptive funhouse that manipulates your surroundings and your sense of reality. Every corner hides a new obstacle; every escape is just another illusion.

This enhanced edition brings minor improvements that breathe new life into the classic Bewilder House experience, making it easier to immerse yourself in the twisted horrors lurking within. Key Features:

Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Feel the pressure as you confront the unsettling twists and turns of a world that isn’t as it seems.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve mind-bending puzzles that play with both your sense of direction and your reality.

Enhanced Performance: Smoother frame rates and optimized controls for a more responsive and enjoyable experience.Note: The enhanced edition has no extra in-game content compared to the original.

name: Justice Ninja Casey
summary: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time! A princess in a castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... He is the Ninja of Justice!

name: Mojika: Truth Rears Its Ugly Head
summary: Explore themes of bullying, revenge, blackmail, and abuse, interwoven with lies, truth, beauty, and ugliness. The story follows an ugly boy who reaches his breaking point due to constant torment and decides to use his power to read thoughts to seek revenge.
storyline:
Tanezaki Suteru is exceptionally unattractive; comparing him to an ugly duckling would insult ducks everywhere. Bullied and harassed, he has become an introvert. Yet, Tanezaki possesses a unique ability, “Wordsight”: by looking at someone's face within 120 centimeters, he can see their thoughts as words around their head. This gift reveals abusive thoughts, dark secrets, and white lies, leading him to often avoid eye contact to escape the harsh thoughts of others.

His life takes a turn when his crush cruelly pranks him by feigning a confession of love, reinforcing his perception as an object of ridicule. This event drives Tanezaki to use his power against the five girls who tormented him. Each route in the story reveals the twisted personalities of these bullies, masked by their outward charm and deceit.

What revenge can one boy wreck with the power to peer into your mind, to see through your lies and drag your ugly truths to light?

name: Exanimate
summary: Exanimate is a 1-4 player co-op survival game where you face off against never-ending legions of Zeds and their innumerable variations in a valiant attempt to escape with your lives, your riches and your highest possible scores! How long can you hold out against the Exanimate?

name: Oceanlust: Erotic Descent
summary: Who can say no when the opportunity of a lifetime drops into their lap? A submarine tour of the world’s most famous shipwreck alongside the sexiest girl you’ve ever met. Sure, there were a lot of waivers to sign but it’ll be fine. They know what they’re doing… Right...?

name: Asleep: Ato 2
summary: Upon mysteriously waking up on the outskirts of a small village, Ana Lúcia continues her journey in search of answers in a supposedly peaceful new environment but soon experiences suspicious events forcing her to face even more intense and disturbing dangers. The nightmare continues.

name: Street Cleaner 3
summary: In this 8 bit retro action platformer sequel, you play as the eponymous Street Cleaner taking back the streets of San Diego from punks, ninjas, and now some weird spooky creatures! You're not alone, though. You can switch at will between the Street Cleaner, whip wielding rival turned ally Cogex, and high-school girl brawler Honoko who each bring their own attacks and abilities.
storyline:
For years, the Street Cleaner has been presumed dead. Killed in the fire at criminal kingpin M.R. Boss's mansion where unbeknownst to many, he managed to destroy the secret weapon hidden therein.

In present day, delinquent high schooler Honoko comes home to find her room being invaded by a ninja in search of something. Chasing him down she meets up with the chain-whip wielding Cogex, and they decide together to seek the help of the missing Street Cleaner to find out what's going on.

name: Sonic Rumble
summary: On your mark, get set...PLAY! Get ready to race in the Sonic Rumble! Jump into a speedy, 32-person mobile royale set in a cheery toy world created by Dr. Eggman. Play as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog universe complete with customization to create your perfect avatar as you dive into action-packed gameplay.

name: Dollhouse: Behind the Broken Mirror
summary:
Enter the broken mind of Eliza de Moor, a once-celebrated singer, now trapped in the labyrinth of her own forgotten memories. The only hope for recovering her memories lies with Doctor Stern and his experimental medicine. As Eliza, you'll navigate the reality and the world behind the broken mirror, guided by the effects of the drug.

Will you be able to piece together the mystery of your past, or will you get lost in this dark and twisted reality?

name: Hidden Cosmo Cats: Bonus Level
summary: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Bonus Level includes one additional hand-drawn level with 100 more cats to find! ️‍

name: Cosmo Cats
summary: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big cosmic location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

name: Foto Boy: A New Job
summary: Capture the Moment! Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin dream job.

name: The Beautiful Island
summary: A short visual novel about war, peace and hope. Explore a city after a devastating war. Talk to people, try to understand, try to help. The heroes of war are dead, but you can be a hero of peace!

name: Fantastyc Murder Mystery
summary: Immerse yourself in a thrilling Murder Mystery where you play as the perpetrator or detective. Other players worldwide will scrutinize your every move as they attempt to solve your murders. Meanwhile, sift through evidence, and uncover the true culprit in unique player-generated crime scenes.

name: Monster Hunter Wilds
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: The unbridled force of nature runs wild and relentless, with environments transforming drastically from one moment to the next. This is a story of monsters and humans and their struggles to live in harmony in a world of duality.

name: Mycelium Heaven
genres: Puzzle, Simulator, Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
summary: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.

name: Mushroom Picnic Party
summary: Help find little mushrooms and prepare for an epic picnic party in this cute hidden object game!

name: Moon's Creed: Genesis
summary: Moon's Creed: Genesis is an RPG game with deep character types, active and passive skill systems to support infinite character structures. Players gather adventurers, enjoy automatic battles, advance talent trees, craft equipment, and make strategic decisions for their town.

name: Lethal Dose
summary: Top-Down action: Blood, Magic, Stealth, Drugs! Make your own Levels

name: 99 Fails
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Can you hold your focus while platforming through Zeebo's bizarre nightmare? Uncover his sad backstory in adventure mode and unlock 3 mechanics to race friends in PVP multiplayer to music by the awesome David Wise!
storyline: Zeebo is having a terrible nightmare. What's behind it?

name: Celestine
summary: Celestine, by the makers of Final Battle, features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players. It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.

name: NecroWorld
storyline:
This takes place within the "The Tower of Wowers", "Grand Strokers" and "CarsFuckingDragons" world with a brand new adventure.

Nekro, a kitty cat discovers the "NecroWorld" and recruits characters, equips armor and weapons and takes down bosses and enemies.

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Heroes of the Past
Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Marisa
QUByte Classics: Glover
summary: The classic 3D platforming adventure is back—better than ever! Roll, jump, and shape your journey in this hands-down ball-tastic adventure!

name: Blackbeard's Treasure
summary:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!

name: ViCrew
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure, Indie
summary: A tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids.
storyline:
Long ago, the divine Worldstone kept the seasons in perfect harmony.

But as gods and mortals were corrupted with greed and arrogance,
a sorrowful guardian of nature shattered the relic
and doomed the world to an eternal dance of summer and winter.

Can you pass the trials of the seasons, to mend the worldstone and bring balance once more?

name: Him, the Smile & Bloom: Additional scenario - Flower Halloween Night
Good Coffee, Great Coffee
summary: Wake up and smell the coffee because TapBlaze's newest simulation cooking game, Good Coffee, Great Coffee, is finally here! Prepare delicious drinks, experiment with new flavors, decorate your shop, and manage cafe costs to become the best barista in town!

name: Freddy Farmer
summary: Freddy Farmer is a retro arcade style game with 16-bit pixel art graphics in the style of the 80s/90s where you can test your skills as a player.

name: Okayu Nyumu!
summary: An upcoming pure love visual novel made by ENTERGRAM and hololive's Nekomata Okayu.

name: Shift'n Slay
summary: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: Cladun X3
summary:
The third numbered entry in the Cladun series.

Cladun X3 is a highly customizable and dynamic pixel art action RPG with a focus on hack-and-slash gameplay. Utilize a variety of weapons, magic, and actions to fend off the monsters monsters and traps that await you, and clear the dungeons!
storyline:
Arcanus Cella—a miniature world that connects that various worlds, dungeons, and eras.

This place, which has existed since ancient times, is said to be accessible only to chosen villains.

Today, a new villain has once again been summoned to Arcanus Cella…

name: Utawarerumono Trilogy Set
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Visual Novel
summary: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen, Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth together as the “Utawarerumono Trilogy Set”.

name: Darkest Mine
summary: Darkest Mine is a roguelite action-plateformer with built-in co-op. Fight your way through monster-filled shadowy caves, take your pick from a large panel of abilities and weapons, adapt your choices, and create unique expeditions!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 5
summary: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.
developers: Follow The Fun, I commissioned some series

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Card & Board Game
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Early Days Collection is packed with classic Yu-Gi-Oh! games from the very early days of Dueling — bursting with retro RPGs and strategic card games with beloved anime characters!

name: All On Board!
summary: All On Board! is a platform to play board games in VR with friends.

name: Corporate Beatdown
summary: You are the newest intern at SmashFest, a combat sports company with a violent corporate culture. Any office item can be a weapon. There is no HR department. The title of CEO awaits.

name: I am the Law
summary: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: Fuyuzono Sacrifice
summary: An otome game by Otomate.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of the Arnor
summary: Uncover ancient galaxy secrets in Galactic Civilizations IV's "Tales of the Arnor" expansion. Explore the lore of Mithilar and the Arnor, encountering relics and uncovering Precursor Wars history.

name: Kaiserpunk
summary: Build and conquer in Kaiserpunk, the ultimate city builder and grand strategy combo set in an alternative 20th century world. Engage in epic battles on land, sea, and air, or use your economic power to emerge as the ultimate victor.

name: Tale of Ren: Searching for Heart Droplets
summary: Me...Mizu Ren Nanami… As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms. Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here. to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.
storyline:
In the Realm of REN, all youngsters who have reached the age of 16
must be sent on a journey to find the steam of mind.
I'm Mizu Ren Nanami. . . .
As people of REN, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms.
Then, Rostania is the place I was chosen to come here.
The boys and girls in this school are the ultimate goal that I must strive to weave the threads of relationships until I can capture the essence of the heart's water droplets. However, while carrying out the mission entrusted to me, I discovered a secret that I never knew before, which is related to events in the past.

Me...Mizu Ren Nanami…
As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms.
Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here.
to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.

name: Faceminer
summary: Faceminer is the dystopian narrative-driven A.I. management sim where you build a biometric data processing empire from scratch. Classify dubiously sourced data, upgrade mining infrastructure, and scale up your A.I. surveillance empire to obscene ends in this hardcore thriller clicker set in 1999.

name: Strike Zero
summary: In strike zero, you will play a girl who has lost her memory by integrating with the "Pi" fragment, and experience a series of unique adventures as a trainee pilot of the latest combat aircraft. You will find your memory in the crisis again and again and try to save the world.

name: Sky Lanes
summary:
Sky Lanes is an homage to the 90s MS-DOS arcade racing game Skyroads.
You race on straight courses, evade obstacles and jump onto different lanes.

The game supports ray-traced reflections and ambient occlusion, but it's not a requirement and can be disabled.

name: They Live in the Fractures
summary: David finally finished his time machine and will be able to stop time and venture to the unknown realm of frozen time. But one should not go and play God.

name: Painted Legend: Knights of Ink & Paper
summary: An action-adventure platformer in the metroidvania subgenre. The graphics are made in the style of a checkered notebook and blue ink. Defeat crowds of monsters, overcome traps, explore the game world, unlock new characters and find secrets! And all this to the accompaniment of driving music!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Tales of Agrabah
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The 15th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings the new Aladdin Realm, the new characters Aladdin and Jasmine, four new Floating Islands, improvements for cooking and UI, custom size rooms and the Oasis Retreat Star Path.

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping 2025
summary: Bakken 25 is a winter sports simulation game. Become a ski jumper and master every aspect of the discipline from the inrun to the outrun: the jumping, the flying and the landing! Are you ready for a new season?

name: DDinosaur with Double D's
summary: DDinosaur has felt alone for millions of years now... Will she be able to find love without revealing her biggest secret? That she's a Dinosaur...with double D's.

name: R.E.P.O.
summary: An online co-op horror game with up to 6 players. Locate valuable, fully physics-based objects and handle them with care as you retrieve and extract to satisfy your creator's desires.

name: The Stamp
summary: Piece together your memories. Reveal the truth. A minimalistic Lovecraftian tale of symbols, sentences, and quiet discovery.

name: Rabbit Raid
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Save your family by going on an adventure as a cute bunny.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne
summary:
Version 3.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Tribbie and Mydei
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne"
• New areas: Grove of Epiphany and Janusopolis
• New Divergent Universe phase: Protean Hero
• …and more!
storyline: Please tell me a tale: Of those drifting heroes and of the days of their homecoming stolen from them by the gods.

name: Crime Opera Fandisk: The Caterpillar Candids
summary: Experience a special chapter in the ongoing mafia tale surrounding the infamous Gallos family!

name: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect
summary:
Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. He’s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

This is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, as well as the strength or frailty of familial bonds. As a visual novel, Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect allows players the option of witnessing events in linear “kinetic” fashion or to affect how the narrative progresses by making key decisions along the way, all depicted with meticulously hand-drawn character portraits, a wide variety of scenes and scenarios to explore, original backgrounds and a soundtrack to fit the brooding and dangerous atmosphere.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ASU
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.9 feat. V.W.P
Global Shipping Simulator
summary: Dive into the fast-paced world of logistics and become the master of delivery. Manage your business, customize your space, and ensure every order is delivered on time. Can you build a delivery empire?

name: Cosmula
summary: Engage in an intense space shooter that you can play singleplayer or multiplayer with up to six players. Play a variety of different spaceships, each with their own unique stats, components, and playstyles!

name: The Local
summary: A fast-paced parkour game set in the Australian outback. Rail grind around the long abandoned country to complete orders or compete in timed courses. Master the movement mechanics and conquer the leaderboards.

name: Century of Anticipation
summary: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!

name: BlueCloud Summit
summary: BlueCloud Summit is a RPG roguelite deck builder game. The goal is simply to become strong enough to participate in and win a tournament of strength against the strongest people in the world. First you will need to become strong by exploring a diverse world to collect cards, weapons and relics.

name: Minecraft: Nightmare Skin Pack
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch

name: Lily & Sury: Adventures On Cristya
summary:
Classic retro-style platform game. Help Lily or Sury save your friends from the evil Wuning through 8 worlds and 32 levels.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, save your companions from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from destroying the planet Cristya.

name: Company of Heroes 3: Fire & Steel
summary:
Company of Heroes 3: Fire and Steel is a Battlegroup DLC pack consisting of four Battlegroups for Multiplayer and Co-Op/ skirmish vs AI.

US Forces – Heavy Weapons Battlegroup
Superior team weapons and halftracks control the battlefield before heavy armor arrives to finish the fight.

Requisition .50 cal heavy machine guns or off-map batteries of the devastating Black Dragon howitzer as part of Weapons Team support, or call in the Cavalry, with Assault half-track variants, 3-inch towed Anti-tank guns, and the implacable M26 Pershing heavy tank.

Wehrmacht – Terror Battlegroup
Shatter the enemy’s willpower with airstrikes, suppression and superior infantry tactics. Devastating heavy weapons will destroy anything that remains standing.

Use unorthodox Terror Tactics such as field interrogations, the Stuka’s iconic Jericho Trumpet, or V1 Rocket Strikes to force the enemy from the field, or show the enemy no quarter with Weapon Superiority and the King Tiger heavy tank.

British Forces – Canadian Shock Battlegroup
Seize territory to gain unparalleled momentum on the battlefield, and deploy powerful incendiary weapons to displace any who dare deny your movement.

Call upon Canadian Shock Sections and aggressive battlefield tactics to secure ground in a Shock Assault, or deny the enemy what they stubbornly refuse to cede with Incendiary Weapons, including the indefatigable Churchill Crocodile.

Afrikakorps – Panzerjäger Kommand Battlegroup
Cripple the enemy’s advance with defensive obstacles, enabling powerful anti-armor weapons to make the killing blow.

Use Stalling tactics, including Roadblocks, Minefields and Defensive Positions to buy the time you need to deploy your forces; elite Tank Busters and Tank Hunting tactics including the Elefant Tank Destroyer will crush even the strongest enemy armor.

name: This is Kiko
summary: A long time ago, my younger sister and I lived together in a house by the sea.And then, one day—I remember meeting her.Was she a good person? I should have asked myself that question sooner."THIS IS KIKO" is an adventure game set in the modern era.

name: Only for Gamers
summary: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.

name: RLChess
summary: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!

name: Formula Rush
summary: Formula Rush is a thrilling F1-inspired racing game! Race on real-world circuits, compete for the best lap times on global leaderboards, or challenge your friends in fun multiplayer races. With stunning graphics and regular updates, it's the ultimate racing experience on Steam!

name: Infinity Nikki: Eerie Season
summary:
Miraland is under the spell of strange happenings—full moons lingering for days, Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins blooming with eerie purple flowers, and the once-mighty Bullquet now sluggish... Something dark lurks in the night. While most would steer clear of these eerie events near Queen Philomi's Palace Ruins, for brave adventurers, this is the perfect chance to seek thrills and uncover secrets.

From the forlorn ruins, a mysterious call echoes... Within the desolate relics, ghostly whispers resound. What hidden truth lies behind the legend? Only the full moon knows, her haunting melody carrying the weight of her sighs...

name: A Bibelot: Y-Break
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Xtris
summary: XTRIS is an arcade dexterity game for the Playdate console. The goal is to catch as many Xs as possible within 60 seconds by moving around tetronimo-inspired game boards. The game currently features 3 levels, complete with stat tracking, leaderboards, achievements, and unlockable skins.

name: Shelldom
summary: In Shelldom, snails worship alcohol—a drink they love but one that kills them. Their cults sacrifice their own for more, trapped in a doomed cycle. But legend speaks of the Holy Water, hidden atop a merciless tower. Can you climb, endure, and break the curse? Or will you fall like the rest?
storyline:
The Holy Water Awaits… If You Can Survive the Climb.

In the ancient land of Shelldom, snails have strayed from the righteous path. Once, they lived in peace—but then they discovered alcohol. The drink became their obsession, their faith, their curse. Now, entire cults thrive on the ritual sacrifice of their own kind, all for just one more intoxicating drop.

But legend speaks of the Holy Water, a sacred relic resting at the peak of a towering, treacherous ascent. It is said to cleanse the soul, break the cycle of sacrifice, and free snailkind from their doomed thirst.

You are the chosen one—the lone mollusk willing to challenge fate. But the climb is no miracle; it is merciless. The tower looms, unforgiving. The falls are brutal. The path is slick with failure.

Will you reach salvation, or will you slip into oblivion like those before you? Ascend, endure, and claim the Holy Water… if you can.

name: The Backrooms: Forsaken
summary: What would you do if you were trapped in a dimension of seemingly endless rooms that went on for eternity?

name: Ninja Five-O
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Ninja Five-O allows players to relive this classic game. Uphold justice with fierce Ninjutsu moves on Steam.

name: Smashed
summary: Play against your friends or players from around the world in rousing games ! One ball, two paddles, the goal is simple: Score as many goals as possible! For that, you will have to be reactive and strategic.

name: The Little Brave
summary:
Become a brave hero and embark to the dangerous journey though mysterious forbidden lands. Reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic and gain courage to slay the terrible monster!

The Little Brave is a 2D action-adventure metroidvania genre video game about a little boy by the name of Keely. Get ready for an exciting adventure. Uncover the secrets of an old tale, gain bravery and strength on the path!

Keely lives in a world in which a long time ago there was magic. But one day a terrible curse distorted the magical places. Keely dreams to embark an adventure to discover the mystery of forbidden lands. Once fate gives him such a chance...
storyline:
In the distant past, there was magic in the world and brave wardens who have taken the oath to protect the places where the magic power was concentrated.

But one of them, falling to envy and a thirst for power, wanted to get this magic for himself alone. With the help of a dark ritual, he obtained magic power but was cursed for the evil he had done.

The magic was gone, the desolation and curse forever remained in forbidden lands.

Keely dreams of embarking on a journey to discover the mystery of forbidden lands and the secrets of the First Warden's past. Once fate gives him such a chance...

name: Museum of All Things
summary: Visit the Museum of All Things, a nearly-infinite virtual museum generated from Wikipedia! You can find exhibits on millions of topics, from the Architecture of Liverpool to Zoroastrianism. Search for the topic you want to learn about, or just wander from topic to topic as your curiosity dictates!

name: Spring in Her Step
platforms: Web browser, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac

name: Stratogun
summary: Stratogun is an ultra-fast orbital arcade space shooter where a fraction of a second will decide whether you live or die. Do you have what it takes to survive on the orbit? Play the demo and find out.

name: Wild Willy West
summary: Wild Willy West is a western top-down shoot 'em up, featuring action packed levels and instant death combat. Use an arsenal of magical bullets to blast your way through the old west, and take revenge on those who wronged you.
storyline: Wild Willy West is a western top-down shoot 'em up, featuring action packed levels and instant death combat. Use an arsenal of magical bullets to blast your way through the old west, and take revenge on those who wronged you.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 4
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Customise your decks with stunning new cosmetic card skins featuring fan-favourite characters like Vault Boy, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III and more!

name: Sayonara Wild Hearts
summary:
Sayonara Wild Hearts is a dreamy arcade game about riding motorcycles, skateboarding, dance battling, shooting lasers, wielding swords, and breaking hearts at 200 mph. Now available on PlayStation 5 with a brand-new exclusive unlockable game mode, the Remix Arcade.

In the new PlayStation 5-exclusive Remix Arcade mode, speed through infinitely replayable levels and chase high scores in random sound bites, all with no loading. Sayonara Wild Hearts now features stunning 4K resolution, 120 FPS, and haptic feedback through the DualSense controller, delivering pulse-pounding, immersive action.
storyline:
As the heart of a young woman breaks, the balance of the universe is disturbed. A diamond butterfly appears in her dreams and leads her through a highway in the sky, where she finds her other self: the masked biker called The Fool.

Travelling through futuristic cities, dark forests, and electric deserts, The Fool sets out to find the harmony of the universe, hidden away in the hearts of Little Death and her star crossed allies; Dancing Devils, Howling Moons, Stereo Lovers and Hermit 64.

name: One Minute
summary: Dive into the frantic universe of One Minute, a roguelite game like no other where every second counts! Designed to be fast, accessible, and addictive, this game offers an intense experience entirely controlled with your mouse.

name: Lumi Trek
summary: Lumi Trek is a unique rhythm platformer where you have to combine the three primary colors of light to overcome obstacles. Change the color of the moving star at the right time, and stay calm when deadly traps appear. It may sound simple, but this challenge will make your hands sweat!

name: Unprotected
summary: A perverted scientist wants to immortalize the human race and reduce the total human population. While trying to uncover this secret in the game, force the scientist to correct his mistakes!

name: Endeavor
platforms: Linux, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac
summary:
Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure.
Explore, investigate, gather, build and battle your way through the unknown frontiers of infinite space-time.
developers: Shrey Games Inc, Shrey Games Inc
themes: Action, Science fiction, Survival, Open world
storyline: Explore an infinite universe with vast, procedurally generated galaxies teeming with undiscovered sectors of space. Embark on a rich, AI driven narration with infinite storylines and dynamic characters.

name: Naughty Tales of Rabbits: A Cuckold RPG
summary: A whimsical RPG adventure where a loving couple must vanquish the four Elemental Demon Lords! There's just one problem- the girlfriend is lusted after by the denizens of this realm, and the boyfriend has a huge cuckold fetish!

In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?

name: Cats Hidden in Japan
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in Japan in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: I Just Want to Be Single!!
summary: I Just Want To Be Single!! is a visual novel dating simulation game where the twist is that you do not want to date the cast of eligible bachelorettes. In the game, you play as Aya, a socially awkward girl in her second year of high school, who only wants to make friends. Unfortunately, being a new transfer student starts turning heads and gets the attention of everyone in her class.
storyline: You are Aya - a timid, anxiety ridden mess that wants nothing more than to start fresh in your final year of high school. New school, new people, making friends will DEFINITELY work this time! But in a strange twist of fate, it turns out everyone in class fell in love with you instead?! How will you make new friends with cute girls that are looking for more than just friendship?

name: DexSweeper
summary: A minesweeper-type game where the cursor never stops moving. Use the Playdate's crank to guide your movement, then time your tile reveals carefully. One wrong move could be your last.

name: Mangui
summary: Mangui is a turn-based roguelike game inspired by spooky traditional Korean folklore. Play as one of four protagonists, unraveling the mysteries of the dark Mangui mountains. Live to tell the tale in this dangerous world filled with ghouls and monsters!

name: Supernatural: The Game
summary:
Supernatural: The Game. The game will consist of 5 parts, 1 part will tell the story from the childhood of the Winchester brothers and their first encounter with the supernatural. The remaining parts will tell the story of Dean Winchester's development as an independent hunter of evil spirits.

The release of part 1 is planned for 2024, which will be exclusive to VK Play and will be distributed free of charge.

The game will be available in two voiceovers - with actors from Lostfilm and actors from Novafilm.
storyline: The plot of the game takes place in 1992. The game tells the story of the fate of the hunter of evil spirits – Dean Winchester, his first encounter with the supernatural (according to the plot, he was 13 years old). Father John Winchester is also a hunter and arrives in one of the villages to complete his next task, while moving with his sons into one of the abandoned houses, which turns out to already have something supernatural...

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Omoide VR - Yotsuba
platforms: Oculus VR, PC (Microsoft Windows), SteamVR, Oculus Quest

The Quintessential Quintuplets: Omoide VR - Yotsuba is the second official VR adventure game based on the popular manga series!

Play as Futaro Uesugi and enjoy spending time with the fourth Nakano Quint, Yotsuba, in this VR adventure game.

name: Guardians of Gaia

name: Adventuring With Matilda!
summary:
Step into the shoes of an aspiring adventurer and delve into a perilous dungeon alongside Matilda, a beautiful elf with a secret, exploring and deepening your bond through shared trials and bonding moments.

Embark on a 30-day expedition through a 30-floor dungeon, where each level presents randomized events and challenges, and strengthen Matilda by exploring and engaging in friendly interactions. Balance dungeon exploration with deepening her bonds to maximize your team's effectiveness.

name: Shadowforge Chronicles
summary: Magic meets firepower in a battle for survival.

name: Distant Woods
summary: Start your journey!

name: Dark Sword: The Light of Ainn
summary: Dark Sword is a frenetic action game that mixes bullet-hell and hack-n-slash in the midst of a devastating and dark open world with a tragic backstory, where the player must immerse himself in order to defeat the powerful guardians that guard it.

name: GeoBoxer
summary: Punch glowing geometry to the beat in this future arcade come to life in VR - Work up a sweat unlocking 100 of the best Phonk, EDM and Drum & Bass tracks as you cyberbox through Campaign mode!

name: Carnaval Simulator
summary: Carnaval Simulator is an indie game where you build, design and manage spectacular parade floats. Inspired by the magic of real-world celebrations like Mardi Gras, Carnival of Venice, and more. This parade tycoon lets you truly immerse yourself in Carnival.
storyline: Build youre own Carnaval Car!!!

name: Stellar Settlers
summary: Stellar Settlers is a sci-fi space-base building and colony simulation game. Take control of a space settlement, with unique vertical and horizontal base-building gameplay, build your own thriving colony on 5 hostile planets that want to destroy you. Pick and manage your talented Settlers.
developers: Tinymice Entertainment, Rogue Duck Interactive, Gamersky Games

name: A Scoundrel in the Underlair
summary: Head out into the woods and find the dreaded Underlair in this traditional turn-based roguelike.

name: Devil Hunters
summary: Together with your friends, defeat the swarming monsters! Collect gems, and unlock more runes through accumulated honor to enhance the fighting power of heroes! The level boss will appear in 15 minutes, hurry up to let the hero grow up and defeat it!

name: Sovereign Brain Empire
summary: “Who isn’t a baby anyway?”~You travelled to a parallel world governed by the Sovereign Brain AI. In SB Empire, you’re an adopted “one-year-old”, recognized as a "Monarch-level" prodigy! There will be beauties giving you a sheltered babyhood. Your brilliance and privileges will change their fates!

name: Silent Burial
summary: A downloadable atmospheric horror game for Windows. Experience a chilling environment where every shadow hides a secret, and every sound keeps you on edge.
storyline:
David on a rainy night, The house is quiet—too quiet. Something feels wrong, but he doesn’t know why. Outside, a grave sits open, the soil freshly dug. The rain beats against the ground, the wind carrying whispers he can’t quite make out. Inside, dust covers everything. The air is heavy, like the house hasn’t been lived in for a long time. Things feel off. A plate that wasn’t there before. A picture frame on the floor.

What begins as a simple night at home slowly unravels into something far more unsettling. The house feels unfamiliar, the silence heavy. Faint voices echo through the halls, objects seem to shift when you're not looking, and buried memories start to resurface—memories you’re not sure you want to remember.The house is leading him somewhere, pushing him toward something he doesn’t want to see.

name: In the Palace of the Birds
platforms: Web browser, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac
summary:
Three friends stuck in a room. A girl climbing a mountain. A game, a story, a siren to the tune of A.

Can you see it? Can you see the moon?

name: Hyper Panda
summary: An exciting adventure in the classic style of old platform games. Face this adventure with a Panda who needs to reclaim his forest, challenging enemies and many obstacles.

name: Vida
summary: In a future where memories are the last connection to a lost humanity, you are an advanced AI exploring fragments of past lives. Understand emotions, traumas, and choices in a journey to uncover what it means to be alive.
storyline:
In a not-so-distant future, the technology that promised to connect humanity ended up isolating it. Life became too practical, too complex, too gray.

That was when they said: "Relive your best memories."

Memories became the key to understanding life. Humans, desperate for emotion, sought to heal their traumas or feel alive once again. Most chose to live in lucid dreams.

You, the player, are the most advanced Artificial Intelligence ever created. Your mission? Explore and understand human life through a crucial memory. Discover possibilities and learn what it means to live.

name: Harukuru: Spring has Come True?
summary: A Certain Situation. Of course, even if I put it that way there’s no way I can explain the situation I’m in… Thus is the start of a story unlike any other about a guy and 4 girls and the daily life they find themselves in.
storyline:
A Certain Situation. Of course, even if I put it that way there’s no way I can explain the situation I’m in…

In any case, I find myself with 4 other girls on a long spring break far away from civilization. To emphasize how middle of nowhere this is, there isn’t even a convenience store here. I don’t have a cell phone and despite having some rather good laptop computers, I have no way to connect to the internet. All that’s here is a large dormitory the likes you’d see at a hot springs resort and a school that looks like it’s on the verge of closing down. There’s a farm that’s closed and fields with ripening winter vegetables. In the distance you can see snow capped mountains and the beautiful, clear waters of the sea.

…and out in the distance stood a tower of unimaginable height who’s purpose was anyone’s guess which stretched into the depths of the sky.

This wasn’t a fantasy, or something out of sci-fi or even a mystery. With all that going on, the only intent was to spend some peaceful days with these four girls but that was totally not what was about to happen.

“We’ll make this place a harem for him!”

Wait, when you say harem, uhm… well… Huh????
I wondered what she meant by that as she took off her clothes and the events of that summer unfolded…

name: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition - Doom of Icewind Dale
summary:
After more than 20 years, the story of the Hero of Neverwinter finally continues in this epic new adventure from Luke Scull, fantasy author and lead designer of Tyrants of the Moonsea!

In the Ten Towns of Icewind Dale, the Hero of Neverwinter awakens. Stripped of their recent memories and left to die by a mysterious power, they must survive a dire threat to the dale as they seek the truth behind their abduction. The answers they discover will shape the very fate of the Forgotten Realms.

name: Robmembor
storyline: Help Hannah, an Alzheimer's patient, by solving puzzles followed by a witty robot - become a mind repairer now!

name: Cooking Tycoons: 3 in 1 Bundle - Extended Edition
15 in 1 Family Games Mega Collection
summary: One bundle, endless fun!

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
■PIRATE YAKUZA ADVENTURE AHOY!
Goro Majima, a notorious ex-yakuza suddenly finds himself shipwrecked on a remote island in the Pacific. Unable to remember even his own name, he sets sail in search of clues to his lost memories, accompanied by a boy named Noah who saved his life. Before long, they’re caught up in a conflict between cutthroat criminals, modern-day pirates, and other scoundrels over a legendary treasure.

■GET YOUR SHIP TOGETHER
Assemble a one-of-a-kind crew while upgrading your ship as you explore the open sea and forge your legend in the cannon fire of foes, unexpected friendships, and immense riches made along the way.

When an enemy pirate ship catches you in their sights, an exhilarating real-time cannon battle breaks out. Quickly maneuver into position while avoiding fire, then deliver devastating damage to board the enemy ship and take down the captain in all-out crew vs. crew brawls. Conquer the seas, discover hidden islands and acquire loads of loot like a true yakuza pirate!

■KICK ARRRSS WITH CREATIVE COMBAT
Dynamically switch between the “Mad Dog” and “Pirate” fighting styles to mix-up attacks and deliver explosive combos, juggles, and aerial takedowns that reward your creativity with over-the-top action.

With “Mad Dog” style, utilize speed, agility, and flair to deliver precise yet powerful blows that stun your enemies into submission.

Or make enemies walk the plank with the “Pirate” style that has you dual-wielding short swords and deploying tricky pirate tools to kick some serious booty.

*This product contains the base game and add-on content. Please be aware that the additional content is also sold separately.
*The “Legendary Pirate Crew Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Legendary Outfit Pack” will be available after the ability to change outfits is unlocked in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Ship Customization Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The “Extra Karaoke & CD Pack” will be available after gaining access to a smartphone in Chapter 1 of the main game.
*The contents of the "Legendary Pirate Crew Pack", "Legendary Outfit Pack", "Ship Special Customization Pack" & "Additional Karaoke & BGM Pack" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

Learn the unique abilities of each Hero and unlock new spells and skills as you progress. Combine your heroes strategically to create powerful synergies and overcome the increasingly difficult enemies you face.

genres: Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie

Harvest their guts for scrap and earn a deliciously varied array of upgrades. Beat the last wave if you have the skill, then strap in and try again in this survival roguelite shooter.
