name: Longvinter
summary: Fish, farm, explore, make money, and build alone or with friends while competing against other players in an open-world survival sandbox.

name: Die in the Dungeon
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.
storyline: Each dice represents a different action, from basic ones like attacking or healing, to boosting other dice or copying their abilities. Place dice on your board to unlock their powers, but be careful... not any place will do! The way you arrange your dice on the board will affect how good your turn is. Try to find the best combination while you upgrade your deck and collect new, stronger dice with unique abilities.

name: Peripeteia
summary: Peripeteia is a first-person game mixing shooter, stealth and RPG mechanics, placing it within the elusive and ephemeral "immersive sim" genre, heavily inspired by the greats such as Deus Ex, it expands upon the formula with original ideas and an unexplored alternative history post-soviet setting.
storyline:
Marie is a free agent employed by a multinational mercenary company, looking for fortune in the Desputed Zone. She is a one-woman army, enhanced with cybernetic implants and granted autonomy by her employer - free to make alliances with any faction and complete her assignments at her own discretion.
She's capable of both great compassion, completing her missions without killing anybody, and great cruelty - leaving no soul behind. Different approaches yield favors from different employers, of course.
But there's more to her identity than just being a merc and half-machine. She spends her time off in solitude, drinking Earl Grey and taking care of her cactus collection.

name: El Hero

name: There's a Gun in the Office
Uncursed
summary: Uncursed is a first-person psychological horror game blending immersive storytelling, environmental exploration, and puzzle-solving. Navigate a house filled with unsettling secrets, uncover the dark past hidden beneath its walls, and escape before history repeats itself.
storyline:
Alex thought he had left his past behind. But when his grandmother stops answering his calls, he returns home—only to find a place warped by time, filled with eerie remnants of forgotten rituals and a creeping presence that watches from the dark.

As he unravels the mystery surrounding his family, the walls begin to shift, shadows twist into something unnatural, and the truth he seeks may not be one he can survive.

name: Aurora Flight
summary: Aurora Flight is an air combat simulation on the uncharted planet Zenoa. Realistic altitude and speed physics provide strategic depth, while flexible fighter customization shapes your approach. Experience diverse aerial battles.

Dwellling deep in the Silence, these ancient beings have haunted Irdheim and Sonnan for countless cycles. Stuck between life and death, their insatiable craving for the Hymn forbids them to fade away...
Wield the arcane powers of the Lighteaters against your opponents in Skirmish single- or multiplayer, with Songs of Silence's first faction DLC!

Choose from a roster of characters then plan your escape from this bloody homage to old school horror. But remember... death is just a typo away.

name: Patriotika RPG: Shadow World

name: Card Toons
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Battle against toons in this cartoony roguelike deckbuilder where each run is different. Improve your deck with various creatures and spells, collect powerful relics, and defeat your enemies to win the Card Toons game show!

name: LlamaRPG: Farm to Fable
summary: A turn-based combat RPG following a llama traveling around the world trying to be a hero. Full of great itemization, crafting, story, hat collecting, and more.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)
storyline: You wake up a llama to find all of the crias have gone missing. Looking to prove yourself, you set out on a journey around the world to figure out the mystery of the missing baby llamas.

name: The Well of Essenwood
summary: Embark on an enchanting journey in a medieval fairytale land. Play as two main characters, Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep. Each begins their own adventure, and eventually unite to unravel a sinister plot to seize the magical well in the Essenwoods, which contains the very essence of magic in the land.

name: Fledglings
summary: Crash landed on an alien archipelago, you must raise native Fledglings to fight off waves of sea creatures at night. Collect Fledglings, scavenge for resources, and survive the nights with the help of your companions.

name: Era One
summary: Era One is an innovative space game that combines elements of real-time strategy, base building, space survival, and tactical battles. Players can create and customize their bases from scratch, construct various types of structures and warships, manage fleets, and engage in tactical space battles.

name: Cabernet
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in 19th century Eastern Europe. Guide Liza, a young vampire struggling with her morality and the supernatural world she has been pulled into. Beware, the taste of Cabernet is not for the faint of heart - prepare to explore themes of social conflict, alcoholism, and corruption.
storyline: Change is brewing, threatening the established ways of alluring supernatural aristocrats. Sustain your facade as one of the living and struggle with your morality as a young vampire. Will you retain your humanity or descend further into the horror you have become?

name: Japanese Drift Master
summary: Welcome to Japan, the drift capital of the world! Compete, drift, and race on miles of varied roads and winding mountain trails. Drive through towns nestled at the scenic Haikama Lake. Spend your savings on new cars and get a taste of Japanese tuning style.

name: Unbroken
summary:
Brave the hostile lands in search of your goal. Forge your own path and discover the many secrets of the realm and the looming Township of Westfall. Unlock new abilities, perks and weapons. Soak in the atmosphere and head forth against all odds.

A mood heavy action-adventure, Unbroken takes players on a grindhouse journey to Crests Edge in search of the traitor Nielsen. With multiple routes to achieve your goal (or even abandon it), the ascent to one of the multiple endings will be a memorable one.

With a unique lore structure and one of a kind audio visual composition, Unbroken will take players on a trip.
storyline:
The trail has led you to the kingdom spanning out to the North, far away from your homeland.

Your word is your bond. You will track down the traitor Nielsen who is seeking refuge somewhere in the realm of Crests Edge and bring him to justice. Dead or alive.

But be wary, Stranger: the realm is now engulfed in chaos. Along with the Feast of the 3rd Moon and the ongoing Earls Rebellion your journey will not be for the faint of heart. You will have 5 full moons to complete your quest. The clock is ticking!

You will prevail. Take up your arms and go forth and uphold the honour of our crest.

I Will Pray Day and Night For Your Safe Return...

name: Ultra Mega Planet Battles
summary: Ultra Mega Planet Battles (UMPB) is an intense arcade-style, space-based, top-down, twin-stick shooter. Players can play by themselves, or with up to 3 friends local co-op or Steam Remote Play (total of 4 players). Select your character, select and modify your ship, then get shooting!

name: The Backrooms 1998
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Backrooms 1998 is a first-person found footage psychological horror survival game where it tells the story of a young teen after accidentally falling into the depths of The Backrooms in 1998. Roam freely, mark, explore and try unravel the story - however you are not alone. Don't scream.

name: TactiCats
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Knock down your enemies and collect all the cats and achievements in this pixel art party game for true cat lovers. Use different power-ups and survive the dangerous traps to show your friends who's the fluffiest of them all!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Battle Royale

name: Tribe Nine
summary: Tribe Nine is an Extreme Action RPG where groups of teens will endure multiple losses and devise strategies to overcome formidable foes. Dive into a crazy adventure with unique characters in a meticulously crafted world with a variety of art styles by the same creators of the 'Danganronpa' series.

name: Slendytubbies Ø
summary: Slendytubbies 0 is a reimagining of the original 2012 game. It features story mode and new gameplay mechanics.

name: DCS World: East Afghanistan
summary: The East Afghanistan area includes 650,097 sq km of with 10 highly detailed airfields. The region is characterized by its mountainous terrain interspersed with agricultural areas around Bagram and along waterways. Kabul, the capital and largest city in Afghanistan, includes several points of interest like hospitals, historical sites, monuments, and neighborhoods. The Eastern region also includes urban areas of Bagram, Gardez, Jalalabad, and Khost and 10 highly detailed and accurate airfields.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: RTA Quest
Arcade Archives: Othello
summary:
“Othello” is a game of Reversi released by SUCCESS in 1984.
The rules are extremely simple while still requiring widely varied strategies, for fun and depth independent of luck.
This title includes features to help players practice and learn strategies, such as to evaluate your moves or to undo moves once made.

name: Harmony Chronicles: Demon Of The Void - Collector's Edition
summary:
Saga continues, Mona is about to travel through dimensions!

After her incredible adventures, Mona, the warrior of Goddess Harmony,
prepares to meet her divine protector before a magic portal transports her to a world on the brink of collapse.
Mona discovers she has arrived at the once-thriving Interdimensional University of Magic, which has become a shadow of its former self.

As the fate of the universe hangs in the balance, Mona embarks on a perilous journey through shattered dimensions,
chasing clues that lead to a terrifying entity devouring everything in its path.

To stop it, she must venture across awe-inspiring worlds, each filled with unique challenges, fantastical creatures, and powerful allies!

name: Fruit Adventure Returns
summary: This Bundle contains the game "Fruit Adventure Returns" in 03 versions (Xbox One + Xbox Series + Windows).

name: Solir
summary: Discover the unique atmosphere of Solir, a 2D platformer designed to offer relaxation, accompanied by a fantastic soundtrack.

name: Secrets by Episode
summary: Explore a world of sweet and spicy romance. You're the main character in these interactive stories, and your choices shape how each chapter unfolds.

name: Wonderful Monsters: The Flower Crossing
summary: In a meadow full of colourful flowers, lives a community of small and colourful monsters that maintain a harmonious relationship with nature.

name: Minions Survivors
summary: Survive the hordes of minions and defeat the bosses!

name: Escape Room Ultimate Trilogy
summary:
Three escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Pyramids and Aliens, Mystic Academy, Between Time.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Donald J. Trump
summary: Donald Trump signs the executive order to change the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America. Boyfriend is not happy about this, so he breaks into the oval office and demands that Trump change back the name. However, to change the name back, Boyfriend has to beat Trump in a rap battle.

name: Utter a Name
summary: Utter a Name is a challenging detective adventure with strong emphasis on atmosphere and investigation. Several disembodied souls linger in the premises of an old manor. The goal is to explore the vicinity for information, then deduce the identities of the souls and their murderers.

name: Auto Adventures
summary: Battle monsters, learn skills, collect items and trade with merchants to make the strongest hero and come out on top in asynchronous PVP auto-battles.

name: Bachelairs
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie, Arcade
summary: Race through a set of short dungeons, trying to collect the most treasures. The player that has the most coins at the end wins the game! Will you horde your coins? Invest in stronger gear? Or perhaps try to win extra gold with one of the awards? Face off against friends or play against the computer!

name: Bee Flowers
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Relax and Puzzle with Buzzing Bees!

name: Collect Baby Oil
platforms: Xbox, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One
summary: Collect Baby Oil is a fast-paced runner where you have to run away from the police. Collect bottles of baby oil scattered along your path to unlock a variety of funny and unique characters such as Quandale Dingle. Avoid obstacles, time your jumps perfectly, and see how far you can go before the cops catch up.

name: From The Other Side
summary: "From the Other Side" immerses you in a chilling first-person psychological horror game. You are Steve, a security guard on his first night at work, tasked with monitoring security cameras and fixing unsettling anomalies that will make you question reality.

name: Utter a Name
summary: Utter a Name is a challenging detective adventure with strong emphasis on atmosphere and investigation. The goal is to investigate a small manor and deduce the identities of several disembodied souls and their murderers.

name: Reverse Problem
summary: Navigate through small diorama islands and tackle 200 handcrafted parking challenges with 100 unique trucks and buses. For an extra challenge, create your own custom problems in the Sandbox mode!

name: Little Slippey
summary: Dodge tons of missiles flying at you. Practice your reactions, memorize the structure of the maps and adapt to the ever-changing rules on them. What is the ultimate goal? Pure fun, of course :)

name: Cascadia
summary: Compete to create the most perfect ecosystem in the award-winning board game journey!

name: Geminism
summary: Two pairs of twins war for love, life, and limb beneath the curtain of a dark Tokyo night. From the artisans at CRAFTWORK comes a visual novel lush with art, action, and mystery; a story of GEMINISM—deformity and divinity.
storyline:
Children pay karma for the sins of their parents,
born to bear a contorted cross.

Tokyo—2 AM, the witching hour.
Under the new moon, two identical girls face off.
Their improvised weapons look out of place in their hands.
Behind them stand two strange men, garbed all in black.

What do these men want? What are these girls’ dreams?
And what is it they're fighting for?

Gather round, now, don't be shy!
It's a dark festival beneath a black sky...
So, candles out—let's start the bout!

name: Cabin Crew Life Simulator
summary: Welcome to Cabin Crew Simulator, the pioneering flight attendant simulator by SOGA Std. Dive into the glamorous world of aviation and kickstart your career by ensuring passenger satisfaction and safety. Navigate through exciting tasks on each flight, from serving gourmet meals to managing in-flight emergencies, providing an unparalleled passenger experience.
storyline:
Experience the exhilarating journey of an airline crew member in Cabin Crew Simulator, the ultimate Steam game for flight enthusiasts. Step into the shoes of the main character and navigate through a dynamic life filled with challenges and opportunities, starting from humble beginnings at a small airline.

In Cabin Crew Simulator, players will encounter a variety of situations both on and off the aircraft. From managing daily tasks to handling emergencies and making crucial financial decisions, every moment is packed with excitement and suspense.

Immerse yourself in the realistic and vibrant aviation environment of Cabin Crew Simulator. Explore bustling airports and luxurious aircraft cabins, each meticulously designed with attention to detail and modernity. Feel the thrill of embarking on a real journey as you experience the true essence of aviation.

Don't miss out on the adventure of a lifetime. Start your journey in Cabin Crew Simulator today and soar to new heights in the world of aviation gaming!

name: Spellhack!!
summary: Become a totally rad Spellhacker in "SPELLHACK!!" Collect Technospells, explore Doom City, and defend your portal against waves of Summoned Beasts in this video entertainment computer program!

name: Cinnabunny
summary: Cinnabunny is a cozy life simulator game where you play as a bunny who runs a bakery. Unlock new recipes, go birdwatching, collect mushrooms, and charm your community. Save up enough carrots to help your family move.

name: Fight School Simulator
summary: Step into the world of Martial Arts, an immersive FPS Simulation where you take on the role of a martial arts instructor determined to build the ultimate dojo. From humble beginnings, guide to greatness by mastering martial arts, teaching the next generation of fighters, and standing up to rivals.

name: HPL: Nyarlathotep Rising
summary: Deep dive into the HP Lovecraft perverted universe with this oversized narrative RPG. Slip into the intertwined souls of Mark, Anna, and Victor, surrounded by cult worshippers, as Nyarlathotep, the cosmic horror, strives to enslave humanity in 1929.

name: Unbridled: That Horse Game
summary: 'Unbridled: That Horse Game' will be an online multiplayer game where you can build on your own piece of land, explore a beautiful open world, breed horses and take part in challenging competitions such as eventing or western riding!

name: Stories from Sol: The Gun-Dog
genres: Point-and-click, Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: An indie graphic adventure / visual novel game in the style of PC-98 titles. Players take on the role of a ship's security officer in deep space near Jupiter as a deadly mystery threatens the entire crew.
developers: Space Colony Studios, Astrolabe Games, Space Colony Studios, Astrolabe Games, Meridiem Games
storyline: Stories from Sol part 1: The Gun-Dog takes place in a vintage anime and sci-fi inspired retro future. Players take control of a security officer transferred to the Jovian warship 'The Gun-Dog' as it heads into deep space to investigate reports of mysterious signals. As things begin to unravel on the Gun-Dog the player has to navigate the slow breakdown of the crew and do their best to uncover the mystery of the threat from deep space before it is too late.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 & 2 (Holiday Special)
summary: Return to the heartfelt world of To the Moon.

name: Thin Threads
summary: Thin Threads is a first-person psychological horror game about a family's desperate struggle to survive poverty. Step into the shoes of each family member, witnessing their story unfold from different perspectives, immersing you in a truly haunting and disturbing experience.

name: Dropship: United Peace Force
developers: Sony Computer Entertainment Europe, Sony Interactive Entertainment

name: The Fire Nobody Started
summary: This is a train to 21C, via 19C. Passengers will require a valid click to use this service. Passengers are advised that this train consists of 9 cars, divided by each era. Please mind the fire. This train is ready to depart, please stand clear of the fire.

name: Lightning Katana
summary: Kick doors, shoot lightning, and parry bullets in this blazing fast first-person shoot'n slash inspired by Hotline Miami
storyline: Slash, Parry, Shoot and Dodge Roll your way through the Neo-Nippon Yakuza to avenge your pet Dogsuke and take on the top brass and baddest hit squad in all of Neo Nippon, the Ryujin Ichizoku!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 15 - Honor & Glory
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Season 15 introduces Perks, Overwatch 2’s groundbreaking new gameplay feature that lets players unlock mid-match hero upgrades, transforming strategy and playstyle. With the launch of the 2025 Competitive Year, fresh rewards like Galactic Weapon Skins and exclusive charms await those who climb the ranks fighting for honor and glory. Plus, weekly challenges in the Perked Up event offer exciting treasures, including Rainy Day Mercy and Legendary Loot Boxes. Don’t miss out on Mythic Pixiu Zenyatta and more as Overwatch 2 takes bold steps into its most exciting season yet!

name: Patapon 3
summary: Patapon 3 is a rhythm game for the PlayStation Portable now back on modern consoles.
developers: SIE Japan Studio, Sony Interactive Entertainment

name: Learn & Play Collection
summary: The educational Learn & Play Collection combines good fun and creativity no matter the age! The Treflik Family, The Smurfs, and Uzzuzzu are ready for a new adventure.

name: Turbotz Testing 20XX
summary:
Turbotz Testing 20XX is a tower defense game infused with clicker gameplay and rogue-lite elements. Join the Turbotz Institute in researching the explosive potential of turret robots by testing them under diverse conditions and parameters.

Collect research, unlock new elements to experiment with, and push the limits of existing turbotz through dynamic transformations. Discover the countless varieties of antroids and the creative ways to obliterate them!

Change the world—one explosion at a time.

Twitch Integration: Connect with Twitch to enable full audience participation in a 'Twitch Plays'-style experience with advanced customization options. Decide how viewers can interact—whether through structured voting or pure chaos.

Viewers can join the side of the Turbotz or the Antroids, with their chosen allegiance displayed alongside their username. Their contributions are tracked on a leaderboard, highlighting kills and damage dealt.
storyline:
Professor Gregory Photon and Doctor William Guylful welcome you intern_name to the Turbotz Research Institute. Changing the world, one explosion at a time.

As a member of the Turbotz Research Intern Program (It's a TRIP) you'll be monitoring virtual tests of Turbotz being used to destroy Antroids. The test requires substantial power to operate and can be run longer if the Antroids don't cause it to overheat.

However we have substantial data on the effects of basic Turbotz on basic Antroids. The more you alter the subjects the more substantial the research that can be done. Perform well enough in a testing area and we may even reach a breakthrough!

There is a lot of work to be done and research can be used to open up new testing environments. It's staggered so that you dear intern can learn to respect their power before the most devastating Turbotz are unleashed on the most ferocious Antroids

name: Moe Waifu H Fantasy
summary:
Meet 5 lovely maidens and impress them with your rhythm and sharp reflexes! Moe Waifu H Fantasy is a simple and addictive action puzzler where your goal is to match your target icon at the right side of the screen to the incoming icons that fly in from the left side of the screen. Match them before they touch the target, and your score will climb, earning up to 3 stars for your performance. Fail to match them and you’ll lose hearts!

Each girl’s expressions will change in reaction to your gameplay, so don’t let them down! Can you unlock all their cute outfits, fill your gallery and complete the jukebox to win them over?

name: Headquarters: World War II - Ardennes
summary: Headquarters: World War II - Ardennes is the second DLC for Headquarters: World War II, a fast-paced turn-based strategy game where your battlefield tactics are as important as your army management skills.

name: Necrocat
summary: In a card field, choose wisely your next move on the grid, for every item collected and every monster defeated brings you one step closer to death. Answer the call and uncover Necrocat's schemes that disrupt the cycle of life!

name: Liminal Border Part III
summary: Following the events of Part II, Itsuki and the gang's "Rave" business is close to getting off the ground. Itsuki looks to Meryl Hathaway, a young girl often seen accompanying Kotoko, as a counter to the violence of the Umon-kai as he searches for a way to destroy them once and for all.
storyline:
Despite running into plenty of trouble along the way, Itsuki was able to escape his predicament with Kotoko Teshigawara's help.

The gang’s business is close to getting off the ground, and a plan to destroy the Umon-kai is steadily taking shape inside Itsuki's mind.

However, that plan is still far from guaranteed to work, and should the Umon-kai get serious, everything he has worked so hard to build will surely crumble in the face of overwhelming violence.

There's one more way to make certain—

Itsuki searches desperately for a counter to the threat he faces.
Eventually, despite knowing the risk, he approaches “Meryl Hathaway,” a young girl often seen accompanying Kotoko, and tries to make contact with the overseas syndicate she belongs to.

From amidst the trickery and scheming of both organizations, a glimmer of hope emerges.
Will Itsuki be able to seize that light?

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage - Tape 1
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5

name: Ale Abbey
summary: Build and expand your monastery, craft recipes and brew holy ales in this unique brewery tycoon. No pre-made recipes in Ale Abbey, oh no. It's a canvas for true beer alchemists. It's as simple as: brew, sip, repeat. Welcome to Ale Abbey!
storyline: Give your brew a unique name, experiment to discover special traits, and ensure your ales reach unprecedented popularity! Dive into a vast array of over 20 European styles, meticulously choosing the equipment that best suits your needs. Adjust the quantity, quality, and mash temperature to blend the perfect brew. Decide whether to store it for aging, or sell it at the market. Put your trust in your monks’ brewing skills, and let them create the holy ale.

name: Battimals
summary: Battimals: Combine animal DNA and battle foes in fast-paced matches. Hilarious, strategic fun in quick play sessions. Create your ultimate team!

name: Glusiverse
summary: Help GlusiGlusi in this adventure to find the remedy to his master illness.
storyline:
A long time ago, far away, there existed in space a GLUSIVERSE, where a brave hero called GLUSI-GLUSI fought against his enemies (or not). In space year 6126 the interplanetary Economic System suffered a collapse that caused panic on all planets. At the proposal of the SPACE GUILD someone is guiding the forces of PLANET AMALFAR to build a great fortress in the GLUSIVERSE, where…

… Our protagonist, GLUSI GLUSI, must find the antidote for the disease that threatens the life of his teacher, GLUSEI. To do this, he enters the confines of the GLUSIVERSE in search of the 7 ingredients and the recipe.

name: Blue Hunter
summary: Welcome to hell! Forge your own path as a Blue Hunter and turn into a god! Create your own army of undead monsters and beat all the monarchs that stand in your way. How far can you go?

name: Microtopia
summary: Become the hive mind of a robot ant colony in Microtopia! Use pheromone trails to create, automate and optimize supply chains for your ants to follow. Collect resources, produce goods, feed your queen, grow your colony and fly out to expand the species!
developers: Goblinz Publishing, Cordyceps Collective, Gamera Games
storyline:
In Microtopia you'll manage a colony of robot ants, design a network of transport trails, explore unique environments and expand your settlement.
Your goal? To reproduce! Create young queens that will fly out during the nuptial flight to spread out to distant lands. Starting the cycle anew.

name: Wheelborn
summary: Take control of Arback in 'Wheelborn,' a gripping 3D indie beat 'em up adventure set in a world where the Wheelborn, car-like creatures with a unique lifecycle, face corruption. Engage in intense combat, explore, make narrative choices, and shape Arback's destiny.

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage is a brand-new story-driven journey through time from the creative minds behind Life is Strange. The magical summer of 1995 is one of self-discovery and forging unbreakable bonds for high school friends Swann, Nora, Autumn, and Kat. 27 years of no contact later, fate reunites them to confront the long-buried secret that made them promise to never speak again.

name: No Border
summary: No Border is an action-puzzle platformer where you manipulate each level borders to navigate your way through!

name: Dunia: The North Wood
summary: In this action-adventure RPG, explore a strange and futuristic island-city as Secret Police Captain Aeydrien Mason-Northwood. Become a Villain, Hero, or something in between as you deal with the island's various problems in any way you see fit.

name: Raia Nova
summary: The greatest tournament of all time has gone terribly wrong. Warriors from different lands do battle and form alliances in the wake of a strange mind wiping spell. Battle hordes of creatures and duel crazy characters in this funny fanservicey ARPG.

name: The Silent Kingdom
summary: The dark tale of a princess who must corrupt her own soul in order to save her kingdom, reaping death and sorrow along the path.
storyline:
Place yourself in the role of Princess Erinys, whose kingdom has fallen under the yoke of a sorrowful curse. In order to save everything you have ever known and loved, you’ll have to stand against the entire world - and even defy the Goddess herself.

How much weight will a withered kingdom burden your soul? As a princess, will you be loved or hated, betrayer or betrayed? Will you seek comfort in the companionship of others, or will the demise of your kingdom seal your heart away forever?

A path of thorns is waiting. The manner in which you walk it is up to you.

name: Blow it up
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Physics sandbox game where you setup bombs, vehicles and aircrafts to destroy structures made out of voxels. Create your own worlds and blow them apart.

name: Avowed
summary:
Welcome to the Living Lands, a mysterious island filled with adventure and danger.

Set in the fictional world of Eora that was first introduced to players in the Pillars of Eternity franchise, Avowed is a first-person fantasy action RPG from the award-winning team at Obsidian Entertainment.

The Living Lands is a place that feels foreign yet somewhat intrinsic to you as it feels the island itself is calling out to you for help. Explore an island home to many different environments and landscapes, each with their own unique ecosystem.

Mix and match swords, spells, guns, and shields to fight your way. Dig into your grimoire for spells to trap, freeze or burn enemies, bash them with your shield, or use range bows to attack from a distance.

Companions from a spread of species will fight alongside you, with their own unique set of abilities. From a former mercenary to an eccentric wizard, they will be part of your journey with your choices shaping them as you help them with their quests.
storyline: You are the envoy of Aedyr, a distant land, sent to investigate rumors of a spreading plague throughout the Living Lands - an island full of mysteries and secrets, danger and adventure, and choices and consequences, and untamed wilderness. You discover a personal connection to the Living Lands and an ancient secret that threatens to destroy everything. Can you save this unknown frontier and your soul from the forces threatening to tear them asunder?

name: Land of the Void
summary: Land Of The Void is Roguelike STG game, combined with dungeon exploration. You need to think about the battle strategy of STG & rune integration, in the meanwhile recruiting teammates, exploring the dungeon to obtain equipment and items, completing tasks and accumulating resources.

name: Pourdle
summary: A daily challenge game where you try your best to fill a coffee cup as much as possible without spilling.

name: 5th Dimension
summary: 5th Dimension is a sci-fi world builder and RPG MMO that empowers players to create, and then control a limitless virtual world.

name: The Brave Little Pigs
summary: This visual novel follows a group of young pigs who participate in their town's annual race for the first time.

name: Dying Sun
summary: Dying Sun is a cozy surfing game in which you play as Hurabi, a young nomad on a solar-powered sailboard, searching for the mysterious causes of the extinction of an ancient, highly advanced civilization. On her journey, she travels through grandiose landscapes where nature and technology meet.

name: Sacrilege
summary: Sacrilege evokes the feels of Quake: Mission Packs 1 and 2 and is a new fork of the Re:Mobilize and Progs Dump 3 mods. It comes with additional monsters, weapons and powerups. This is a set of 3 episodes of 5 maps each - plus one secret map per episode - as well as a start map and an end map. This makes use of Re:Mobilize mechanics such as wiremeshes and lighthooks/lightpanels.

name: NBA Jam: 2020's On Fire Edition
summary: NBA JAM: 2020's On Fire Edition is a historical conversion mod of NBA JAM: On Fire Edition for PlayStation 3. It features every franchise's best teams of the 2020's. Every team has accurate uniforms, courts and arenas, coaches, and logos.

name: One Girl's Trash
summary: Maggie is a simple girl. She doesn't want any trouble, nor does she start any trouble. But sometimes trouble finds you despite your best attempts to avoid it. When Maggie's trash goes missing, she does whatever she can to ensure she gets it back.

name: Blue Wyrm
summary: Blue Wyrm is a first-person skill-based action game, where you take upon a role of the Red Knight Gabriel, armed only with her trusty sword to fight off a tight, but varied roster of enemies in a nonsensical surreal dungeon. Learn the ways to use your movement and position, directional attack variety and timing to perfect your battle technique and succeed in your quest to save her.

name: Arithmetic
summary: A revolutionary puzzle game combining box-pushing and math operations! Slide number crates, merge targets with +-×÷, and challenge your logic & arithmetic skills

name: Pale Abyss
summary: Descend into the Pale Abyss, a cursed chasm where the forgotten truths of a dying world fester in its depths. Inspired by games such as King’s Field and Shadow Tower, Pale Abyss is a first-person action RPG about exploration and adventure.

name: Occultus Vitae: Hidden Life
summary: A psychological horror adventure where you explore abandoned locations and unravel dark legends. Set in a remote castle hiding a Nazi black magic experiment gone wrong, you'll face haunting environments, challenging puzzles, and a fight to survive the horrors lurking within.
storyline:
As a seasoned adventurer of the unseen, you’re drawn to places others fear to tread. Legends, conspiracy theories, and forbidden tales are your lifeblood. When you hear a chilling rumor of a Nazi experiment gone horribly wrong beneath a forgotten castle, your curiosity gets the better of you.

Explore the underground laboratory rumored to have been the site of a failed experiment in black magic—a place where something monstrous was unleashed, leaving only death and madness in its wake.

name: Tiny Pasture
summary: Meet your new little desk buddies! They’ll snooze, scratch, and scamper around while you work or study (don’t worry, they’ve been trained not to invade your workspace). If you’re good at animal management, they will occupy the bottom of your screen with different kinds and colors!

name: Mini City: Mayhem
summary: Mini City: Mayhem is a chaos-filled city-builder where you build against time. Become the mayor of a tiny town, plop down tiny building blocks to build a working city to progress. Manage your roads and building connections. But be quick, because time is ticking!
developers: The 4 Winds Entertainment, Rogue Duck Interactive

name: Snø: Ultimate Freeriding
summary: Snø is a raw, fast paced and challenging, yet minimalistic game about freeriding. Experience beautiful mountains inspired by Scandinavian nature and score points by doing risky moves like grinding on rocks, jumping off tree trunks and fly close to the treetops using your speedglider.

name: Cinema Simulator 2025
summary: Cinema Simulator 2025 is a simulation game where you will manage your own movie theater and test your strategy and management skills. Starting from a small movie theater, try to become a giant in the movie industry.

name: Dragons: The Helmet of the Forkai
summary: Dragons: The Helmet of the Forkai is an adventure game where you play as the little dragon Koni and explore the world of the floating islands!
storyline: Embark on an adventure as Koni the dragon and explore the mythical world of floating islands!

name: One Box One Goal
summary:
You're in a box and you have to climb as high as possible... if you can make it.
One Box One Goal is a game inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy but made in third person.

name: Fully Dogomatic
summary: An auto shooter where you create a ring of guns around you to mow down thousands of enemies! You may be an adorable corgi, but that won't stop you from designing the ultimate arsenal of fully customizable, realistic weaponry.

name: Planet Pioneers
summary: Planet Pioneers is a relaxing building strategy and puzzle game where you place hexagonal tiles around pristine planets. Grow your colony, fulfill quests for your settlers and enable new buildings along the way. Shape the planet as you wish until it’s time to move on to your next challenge.

name: Chromocide: Prism of Sin
summary: Shoot, shift color and race against the darkness in this short-run psychedelic action roguelite. Will you atone for your sin?

name: Phantom Bound
summary: Immerse yourself with this spine-chilling Ghost Hunting game. Navigate the haunted halls with your electric gadget and show the uninvited ghosts true hospitality! Are you ready to embrace the ghostly challenge?

name: Block Shop
summary: Block shop is an automation puzzle game in which basic blocks are transformed and combined to create increasingly complex blocks.

name: Until the Last Plane 1942
summary: Soar across the skies of World War II in this vertical shootem'up. Duel enemy fighters, strike critical targets and choose your wingmen wisely. The year is 1942, and the odds are against you.

name: Nobody Nowhere
summary: A side-scrolling, story-driven text adventure game in pixel art. The story is set in 2079, when a Replicant awakens in a lab facility amidst a life-or-death situation. The replicant aid agency tries to rescue him but fails. In the process they stumble on the real secret of the Replicant project...

name: CrimeSceneCleaners
summary: The protagonist, who has taken a job as a special cleaner, goes to his first cleaning site with his seniors. Witnessing the scene of a gruesome death, he begins to feel something that he has never felt before. He begins to feel the presence of something he has never felt before.

name: The Dark Tower
summary: Complete the Trials of Kornath and learn the location of the dark evil behind the events that unfurled in The Curse of Feldar Vale and Mystery at Morgoth. An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 6-12, loosely based on D&D Open Game License (1e/2e).

name: The Shape Killer
summary: Take on the role of a sniper and get paid to eliminate high-profile targets, find and defuse bombs, massacre civilians, eliminate dangers, explore 70+ missions. Sometimes be a hero, sometimes be an assassin! Start as a novice shooter, turn pro, unlock new game modes and become a legend.

name: Outrunner: Neon Nights
summary: Outrunner: Neon Nights merges arcade racing with snake-style mechanics. Race, jump, and defy gravity as you outsmart your opponents. Whether you prefer intense one-on-one duels or chaotic multiplayer mayhem, you can join the neon-lit arenas online with up to 8 players.

name: Immortal Hunters
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Co-op RPG beat 'em up. People killed the underground god, stole his power and built a civilization ruled by the Church which is served by powerful immortal Hunters. Choose your hero, survive the apocalypse, fight, find a reborn god, expose the lies of the Cardinals.
storyline:
For many hundreds of years, humanity has been fighting the Khemrids, the nightmarish creatures of the divine thousand-eyed snake that lives in the very heart of the planet. Only the church saves people from extermination. In return, the ruling Cardinals demand only unquestioning obedience. Ancient texts that question the structure of the world are destroyed, the recalcitrant rot in church cellars by the hundreds, those who are too submissive, on the contrary, become Saints and suffer martyrdom. From their bodies, the churchmen kindle a special flame — the Holy Fire, which the khemrids hate and fear. But the main weapon of the Church is the immortal Hunters, people able to fight the khemrids on equal terms.

A girl fleeing from the khemrids pursuing her loses the most precious thing in the fight; a self-propelled carriage powered by the power of the Holy Fire, a ridiculous old man who knows more than he says... The city destroyed by the invasion becomes a home and a battlefield where completely different battles will unfold: the ambitions and lust for power of the church will collide with the will of a brave heretic, the lies of the Cardinals will crumble, because ancient books will tell the truth... Find love, lose your father, detect an immortal god where you never thought you would find him — Immortal Hunters is building its history out of the chaos of the coming end of the world, it's time to find your place in it!

name: Gunforged
summary: Gunforged is a fantasy roguelite shooter where you construct powerful and unique builds every run. Forge your dual guns from a huge number of randomized parts and acquire game-changing abilities to create the ultimate monster-slaying hero.

name: Sodaman
summary: Sodaman, he's a space agent. He must stop the hostile aliens trying to destroy the universe and save the carbonated drinks they destroyed. Maybe you should help him out?

name: Machinicide
summary: Machinicide is a boomer shooter with imm sim and bullet hell elements. Reduce all evil robots to scraps with a huge arsenal of futuristic weapons and abilities, such as telekinesis, changing of gravity and many more.

name: Monster Bonds
summary:
Hello, researcher! Help me identify monsters!

Use your mouse to match pairs of monsters.

name: ZigZag Ball
summary: ZigZag Ball is an endless casual game, switch sides to move forward in the world and do your best to stay on the right track and not fall, and collect diamonds.

name: Gunzle: Clover And Claus
summary:
a game made in 3 days for a gamejam, where you control the characters Clover and Claus to go through levels
it's a puzzle game, with the main mechanics being a weapon, used to destroy certain blocks, the cloner of the character Clover

name: Cage of Roses
summary: A haunting gothic romance set in the 19th century. Follow Meike, a young woman from an impoverished noble family, as she’s swept off her feet by the mysterious Magdalena: a vampire who possesses a dark secret.
developers: Ebi-Hime, Two and a Half Studios

name: No-Skin
summary: No-Skin is a roguelike game characterized by a horror atmosphere and a smooth yet complex gameplay. Face the horrors that the house hides behind every corner and discover who the No-Skin Man truly is!

name: Narava RPG
summary: Explore a magical open world crafted by a passionate developer. Battle using weapon skills or magic and evolve your character throughout your adventure.

name: The OG Cake Factory
summary: You've woken up in this magnificent cake factory, but soon realize that a crazy chef is after you… Have fun baking cakes in this stressful Point-and-click Horror game!

name: Bad Guys Good Boys
summary: Follow the life of a ringleader of an evil organization who wants to change his evil ways and become good. In an attempt to change his organization, he has to teach and convince his henchmen to get rid of their evil habits and encourage them to do good deed.

name: Cribbish
summary: The roguelike deck builder for Cribbage.

name: Flames of Damnation
summary: The Flames of Damnation burn on your path – are you ready to face them?

name: Re:Mobilize Jam 2: Re:Visions
summary: A set of 6 maps, plus a start map, created for a map jam event held from January 1, 2025 to February 8, 2025, using the Re:Mobilize mod. The objective of this jam was to re:imagine multiplayer maps from different games as single player experiences, all while making use of the three Re:Mobilize mechanics (trampolines, wiremeshes, and lighthooks/lightpanels).

name: Outbreak: Sinister Investigations Collection
summary: A terrible night to be trapped in Cypress Ridge…

name: Perfect Tense: Maggot Therapy
summary: Perfect Tense: Maggot therapy is a horror-BL visual novel with themes of Zoroastrianism, decay, rebirth and insects. It follows two young men, Perfect Tense and Deadboy, who seek to resurrect Deadboy's brother through a twisted ritual.

name: Reinbo
summary: Reinbo is a hack and slash where you'll cut your way through waves of enemies and bosses on a journey to rescue your loved one.

name: Mind 720
summary: Survive for 100 seconds in each of the 10 unique levels. Enjoy the wrath of ten enemies , as they bring a plague of bullets.

name: Leafy Season
summary: Leafy Season is here!

name: Rental Store Simulator
summary: Run your own movie store. Choose your movies, customize your store, hire employees and build your movie empire!

name: Flash Doll
summary: Surprise blind boxes and custom outfits combined with physics-driven action figures, automatic battles, custom moves, and intense showdowns ready to start!

name: Gems Of Evolution
summary: Gems of Evolution is a top-down action roguelite featuring 4 elements, 4 races and 4 classes. Choose your unique hero from diverse combinations like Human-Warrior-Fire. Fight, make various builds with skills, items and evolutions, survive 30 wave and uncover your hero's tale in this challenging.

name: Final Forge
summary: Defend your tower and protect the dwarf's treasure from marauding creatures in this roguelike survival game. Explore the region, collect resources, and choose the right upgrades. But be careful, don't leave your fortress empty for too long.

name: West Escape
summary: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the wildest ride through the Wild West!

name: Stunt Flyer
summary:
Stunt Flyer is an open-world flying adventure,
led by the brother and sister team of Jimmy and
Sophie.

name: Night Drive
summary: My version of the Atari's arcade game Night Driver and Dr. Reiner Foerst's Nürburgring 1.

name: Forgotten Psychedelics
summary: Doomer Boards Project #70 is a set of 12 brand new Doom 2 levels for limit removing source ports. The host of the project was @JadingTsunami. The theme was 'the groovy vibes of 70s: brutalism, trippy art, wood paneling, shag carpets, and soft glowing computer lights'.

name: Architekt
summary: Architekt is a compilation of 8 limit-removing maps for Doom II made by the French Doom Community during a special speedmapping event led by Astelan and Gromat! This event, which took place on the Discord of a Doomer called “Panzy”, brought together 8 mappers of vastly different skills with the main goals being castle themed and a cyberdemon must be your best friend.

name: Dating Stories
summary: Dating Stories combines the fun of solving jigsaw puzzles with the spicy excitement of romantic interactions with the sexiest women you can imagine. Piece together well-drawn images of your accidental dates to unlock seductive conversations and deepen your connections. Every choice you make in dialogues shapes your relationships, leading to a tempting ending. With gorgeous artwork and steamy, suggestive content, Dating Stories gives an experience for those seeking both charm and challenge.

name: Galagi Shooter Ultimate Blast
summary: A fast-paced arcade space shooter with epic battles, stunning visuals, and intense boss fights!

name: Funko Fusion: Universal Monsters Pack Bundle
summary:
Experience a festival of fandom like never before in Funko Fusion!

Play through iconic worlds and mashup characters inspired by some of your favorite franchises in an action-adventure game with uniquely authentic, irreverent humor from the creative minds of 10:10 Games.

name: HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror
Tomb Raider I-VI Remastered
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Lara Croft is back! Discover Lara Croft’s Original Adventures, Lovingly Restored

See the Classic & Remastered Visuals: Play with the original polygonal models or swap to the remastered graphics at any time

Globe-trotting Adventure: Follow Lara Croft around the world and face off against deadly foes and dangerous myths.

Experience Lara’s Darkest Adventures: Uncover the secrets of Lara Croft’s past and shed light on the mystery of her disappearance

Included Game Titles
-Tomb Raider I + The Unfinished Business Expansion
-Tomb Raider II + The Gold Mask Expansion
-Tomb Raider III + The Lost Artifact Expansion
-Tomb Raider IV: The Last Revelation
-Tomb Raider V: Chronicles
-Tomb Raider VI: The Angel of Darkness

name: Enigma of Sépia
summary: Idle-RPG with good art in which you can get characters of all kinds. Combat to get rewards and level up. With different game modes and different zones.

name: The Candle
summary: As night falls and a storm rises over the annual county carnival, you are visited by a mysterious spirit. Tasked with laying his soul to rest, you must brave his long dilapidated manor and avoid the horrifying remnants of his estate staff.

name: LoveBug Quest
summary: Find love as you explore BUG WORLD!

name: Millennium Whisper
summary:
It’s 1999 and there is a rumour going around. If two people confess their feelings for one another at the turn of the millennium, they will be destined to be together in a thousand year fairytale romance! Who will choose you on New Year's eve?

Welcome to Escafeld College, the school in which you spend the next year meeting a cast of 13 unique characters. Taking them to a variety of locations and making new friendships along the way!

Building your skills is going to be vital to maintaining your standing at the college and with the cast. A delicate balance that will allow you to grow closer to the people you like. While also keeping you in the good graces of everyone else you meet at Escafeld.

Rather than the standard dry AI experiences trained on large sets of data from the internet, the cast in Millennium Whisper is played by AI that are exclusively trained on in-house creative work and runs entirely on your own hardware!

The possibilities are endless, and the way you play the game will be entirely unique to you. Each of our (13) characters has their own unique personality and behaviours powered by their own separately trained model. In Millennium Whisper you can have complex relationships and deep conversations, or enjoy a more light hearted experience, having fun with the characters.

Play the game your way, and write your own story.

name: Sunshowers Burn the Century Scionic
summary: A cracked fantasy brothers simulator.

name: Zavod
summary: The visual novel "Zavod" is an adventure that will take you to the industrial and factory everyday life of ordinary workers.
storyline: Dmitry Morozov is the protagonist and a simple worker who laid down his life on the altar of the factory. It seemed to him that time was lost, but one day it reset its course. The reality in which he found himself is completely different from the previous one, and his reflection in the mirror is young again. What secrets await him on his journey back home? And is there any point in going back there? He doesn't know, but he will definitely try to find out.

name: Remember Valentine
summary: Celebrate the holiday with Remember Valentine, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Valentine-themed icons like hearts, candies, and Cupid himself, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: Somnifuge
summary:
Compelled by a mysterious note, you step into the grand mansion. As you explore its dark corridors, you must solve cryptic puzzles, confront the residents, and uncover your purpose.

SOMNIFUGE is a first-person indie horror game that blends exploration, puzzle-solving and psychological horror. Drawing inspiration from the eerie atmospheres of Silent Hill and Alone in the Dark—as well as the many indie horror games they influenced—SOMNIFUGE calls back to PSX-era horror with its retro visuals.

name: Misty Village
summary: An adventure suspense, love simulation visual novel game. The player plays the role of a boy who runs away from home and enters a strange village in the fog. Then he meets the girl in the village and gradually uncovers the mystery of the village. Your final choice determines the ending of the two.

name: Truck Mechanic Sim 2025
summary: Repair, Profit – Become the Ultimate Truck Mechanic!

name: Lost Egg: The Hard Boiled
summary: A hard-action adventure game depicting the love and resilience of a boiled egg. Roll through various stages accompanied by poignant music, all aiming for the ultimate destination: the pot. "I may be a soft-boiled newbie, but I'm going on an adventure to become a tough, hard-boiled egg...!"

name: House Mansion Flipper
summary: Rebuild, redesign and make your dream homes!

name: Night of the Witch's Invasion
summary: Defeat the evil witches, rescue the trapped bunnies, and defend the peace of the town!

name: Going for Nuts
summary: Do you like playing platform games and especially the old ones? A brand new and yet old game (in appearance) in 16-bit cartoon graphics. Experience a crazy adventure with an unusual hero.

name: Tap Derby
summary: Tap Derby allows you to step into the shoes of a rookie horse trainer. Under the guidance of legendary trainer, Rusty Hayes, buy, train, and race as you grow your stable. Conquering prestigious racing events and rising to Horse Racing Stardom.

name: Last Spirit PBT
summary: Play solo or with up to 4 players in Last Spirit PBT, a fast-paced roguelike adventure. Crash-land on your former home, now an alien-infested world, and battle relentless machine foes. Combine loot to power up and master each character. Use sharp combat and smart strategy to conquer the chaos.

name: Weirdo
summary: Weirdo is a Japanese manga-style visual novel set in DYL High School. It follows Wang Zhe, an ordinary and frail boy, who tries to win the hearts of girls and complete his experiments. He gets entangled in bizarre events, plunging into darkness. Each choice you make determines his fate.

name: Valet Simulator
summary: Run your own valet company. Start as a beginner and rise to become the best in town. Park cars with precision, deliver exceptional customer service, and expand your business. Compete with rival valet services and dominate valet market with your top-tier valet skills.

name: Copper Odyssey 2
summary: The world of Copper Odyssey returns! You play as an Angel named Celeste who must touch 30 paintings to bring color back to them. This is a press-turn JRPG that takes place in a museum. Respect the craft and yourself by fighting against the living artworks who want to make you one of their own.

name: Forecursed
summary:
Survive:
You and a bunch of other inmates must go purge your death sentence on Earth, a cursed and abandoned planet. Teleport to a chosen location and be the last one standing to clear your sentence. Keep an eye on your oxygen meter and use the tools at your disposal, but most of all, stay away from the curse.

Curse:
If you receive the curse, your goal is to get rid of it before it consumes your soul. You are now the hunter and must catch one of your fellow prisoners. Lie and confuse others to approach them, or go for the chase and outrun your victim. The curse has given you otherworldly abilities that let you leap far in the air, see others through walls and hear their heartbeats. Use those to your advantage and don't stay cursed for too long.

Ghouls:
Death isn't the end. The curse has now consumed your soul and you can now take on the forms of different ghouls to torment the remaining prisoners. Crawl, fly or run, different ghouls will give you different ways to traverse the environment and attack the prisoners. Figure out each ghoul's best strategies and work with the cursed prisoner to spread as much chaos as possible.
storyline: You and a bunch of other inmates must go purge your death sentence on Earth, a cursed and abandoned planet. Teleport to a chosen location and be the last one standing to clear your sentence. Keep an eye on your oxygen meter and use the tools at your disposal, but most of all, stay away from the curse.

name: Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
A remaster of the original Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness and the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

Accused of murder, Lara becomes a fugitive on the run, while uncovering a sinister conspiracy involving alchemical experiments and the search for ancient artifacts.

name: Tomb Raider: Chronicles
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
A remaster of the original Tomb Raider: Chronicles and the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

Following the events of The Last Revelation, Lara Croft is buried in an Egyptian tomb and is presumed dead. At her memorial, those closest to her reminisce about secrets from her past.

name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
A remaster of the original Tomb Raider IV: The Last Revelation, including The Times Exclusive Playable Level as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb of the Egyptian God Set, unwittingly unleashing him and fulfilling an ancient prophecy—one that plunges mankind into darkness.

name: Tomb Raider IV•V•VI Remastered
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Remastered collection of the Darkness Trilogy includes:

Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation – Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb of the Egyptian God Set, unwittingly unleashing him and fulfilling an ancient prophecy—one that plunges mankind into darkness.

Tomb Raider: Chronicles – Following the events of The Last Revelation, Lara Croft is buried in an Egyptian tomb and is presumed dead. At her memorial, those closest to her reminisce about secrets from her past.

Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness – Accused of murder, Lara becomes a fugitive on the run, while uncovering a sinister conspiracy involving alchemical experiments and the search for ancient artifacts.

name: The Curse of the Demon Tree
summary: A top down 2D JRPG exploring the stages of grief and loss in a post-apocalyptic landscape.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Digital Soundtrack and Mini Art Book.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II - Limited Edition
summary: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II - Deluxe Edition, Collector's Box, Art Book, Art Card Set, Digipak Original Soundtrack, Steelbook and Atlas of Calvard.

name: The Suspected Murder
summary: Deep night, famous suspense novelist fell from the balcony, leaving his young wife an enormous heritage. Accident, or calculated murder?Novelist's nephew secretly began investigation.He found a hidden manuscript, which contains a creep story, as well as the key clues concerning its author's death.

name: Voxel Project
summary: Voxel Project offers an immersive sandbox experience set in a fully destructible voxel environment. Explore a dynamic world teeming with vehicles, dynamic fire mechanics, enemy NPCs, voxel gore, weapon customization, and a bunch of additional features to discover.

name: Satan is an Astronaut
summary: A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.
storyline:
A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.

------

The Biology, Etymology, Ecology, and Limnology Zone - E-3U3 - or as it’s more popularly known, "The Bub,” is a marvel of innovation, and it stands as a testament to what one can achieve when the sky is no longer the limit.

Part forest, part proto-generation ship, the BUB is humanity’s latest and most significant attempt to bring Earthliness to the stars.

Hundreds of volunteers have joined the Faust Corporation in reaching skyward with new technology that pushes the boundary of what is possible with every mile it travels away from Earth’s loving embrace.

Of course, what would any ship be wi [I don’t think you understand. It’s not about money. It’s about what we hope to achieve here. These people don’t deserve this, and I’m not sure how long it can go on.] fully furnished, and with all the accommodations of home, the BUB is humanity’s best chance at a long-form journey into our galaxy.

name: Love Rocket
summary: A mouse-controlled arcade game where you command missile launchers to defend your bases against cute animal girls and their rockets. Blowing their rockets also blows away nearby clothing items.

name: Deadly Footprints
summary: You find yourself being chased through snow-covered terrain by a relentless killer who is tracking your every move by following your footprints. Run, sneak, hide and use the items you find to evade the killer, in a pixelart horror game where every step you take could be your last.

name: Dynamic Destruction
summary: "Dynamic Destruction" is an innovative destruction simulation game. In this game, players are tasked with demolishing various structures, ranging from simple walls to complex buildings, using a plethora of tools and construction elements.

name: Shadowgate 2
summary: The sequel to the critically acclaimed, re-imagined, point-and-click adventure game is now available for preorder! Shadowgate 2 leaves 2D adventuring behind, expanding its horizons, and letting you lift the veil on the mysterious castle once again!

name: Price of Power
summary: Price of Power is a wholesome adult visual novel focused on romance and adventure. Explore forgotten lands using your skills as a master hunter, romance your childhood best friend (and maybe others as well), and rediscover long-lost secrets about your world.

name: Ancient Cultivatrix
summary: "Ancient Cultivatrix" is a Roguelite cultivation game with tower defense elements. The world was corrupted by chaos and became utterly depraved. Please gather the surviving cultivatrices and unite them. Enhance Taoist energy and spiritual prowess together, gradually uncovering the elusive truth.

name: Hentai Stories
summary: Thirsty for spicy adventures? Hentai Stories is already here! Try our new 5 juicy stories with branching paths, animated sex-scenes, and engaging match-3 challenges! Unveil the secret desires of the hot college coed, the dominant lady boss, or even your best friend's mom!

name: Maraka
summary: Maraka is an action dungeon-crawler that features physics based combat. Delve into a procedurally generated cave system on an alien planet. Harness the power of magnets and the environment to wield as your weapon: defeat opponents by physically manipulating objects and the enemy itself.

name: Space Hero: Intergalactic Titan
summary: A top-down "bullet-heaven" roguelite where you play as a futuristic space marine. Use a variety of damage and utility abilities in your attempt to survive. Earn tokens to spend on permanent character upgrades, ability upgrades, and ability mods that allow you to customize your playstyle.

name: Life Effect
summary: Alien invaders invaded the planet, having exterminated most of the population, humanity, being on the verge of annihilation, united the armies and gave a serious rebuff to the enemy. After several years of war, the climate on the planet has changed. The military founded fortifications.

name: Brxken Inside
summary: Shion's calm and measured life comes to an end when she meets Akiko. This encounter has the chance to change her life or plunge it further into the abyss of depression and hopelessness.

name: Pico Islands
summary: Lead your settlers to build cities in a medieval island world.

name: Afterlove EP
genres: Point-and-click, Music, Simulator, Adventure, Visual Novel
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Afterlove EP is a slice-of-life adventure about love, loss and music. Explore modern Jakarta as Rama in his journey to learn about himself, create music, find love and come to terms with the loss of his girlfriend Cinta, whose voice still lives on in his head.
storyline:
Taking place in the vibrant city of Jakarta, capital of Indonesia, Afterlove EP is a unique mix of dating sim, rhythm game and narrative adventure, where players will inhabit Rama, a young musician whose girlfriend Cinta has recently passed away.

Whilst his close friends and bandmates are all determined to help him move on, Rama is languishing in his existence, dwelling on the promises he made to Cinta before they could be fulfilled.

But there's one more thing keeping Rama from moving on, and that's Cinta herself, whose voice now lives inside his head. As he explores the city with Cinta in tow, Rama’s choices and interactions will lead to a variety of possible story branches, and ultimately a number of different endings.

name: Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth
summary: You've been invited to a Halloween party! Yay! Music! Food! Drinks! Vampires! Wait. VAMPIRES!? Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth is a Romantic Visual Novel featuring 6 romanceable vampires.
storyline: You've been invited to a Halloween party! Yay! Music! Food! Drinks! Vampires! Wait. VAMPIRES!? Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth is a Romantic Visual Novel featuring 6 romanceable vampires.

name: Delinquent Community
summary: Welcome to Sterling Heights... Play as Jacob Stains and explore the town to learn about Jacob and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobs life, and optionally use violence against other residents.

name: Make it! Donut
summary:
Get ready for a delicious donut-making challenge!
Make as many as you can and watch your food cart prosper!

name: Jump You+
summary:
As a lost one, you tirelessly jump towards the top!
To return to your owner!

name: Summer Love
summary: Experience a summer love story where your choices shape the outcome. Will it be a forever love or just a memory? Your unforgettable journey begins!

name: Speedway Legends: Overdrive Racing
summary: Burn rubber, break limits, become a Legend!

name: Rebus Rush
summary: Rebus Rush is an exciting educational puzzle game where players solve word based puzzles by interpreting images. Levels presents a series of visual clues that represent an English word.

name: Eggconsole Arctic PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Guide the colorful, roaming planets to the goal. A new type of puzzle game where you skillfully switch points on the rails for fun.

name: Crosswords: World Tour
summary: Are you a fan of crosswords? Do you like travelling? Heck! Who doesn't?! Crosswords: World Tour is the game for you!

name: Anime Girls: Awesome Adventurer
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Spot The Difference: Sports
summary: Introducing Spot The Difference Sports, brought to you by the original creators of the globally renowned Spot The Difference amusement machine game.

name: Escape Room Six Games Pack
summary:
Six escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Pyramids and Aliens, Mystic Academy, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: The Day Valentine Died, and So Did I!
Panelka
summary: Panelka is a nostalgic, relaxing game where you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the post-Soviet era. Create your cozy apartment or garage with that familiar, warm interior from your childhood. You have a wide selection of furniture and many other interior details at your disposal.

name: PropFight
summary: PropFight is a 2D physics-based fighting game where you play randoms props in random arenas, with random events occurring.

name: Astro Bot: Vicious Void
summary:
This free update features harder levels to test your jumping skills. Each level comes with a brand-new Special Bot to rescue and, once that’s done, can be replayed in Time Attack mode with online rankings. It has weekly release schedule:

- Feb 13: Tick-Tock Shock
- Feb 20: Thrust or Bust
- Feb 27: Cock-A-Doodle-Doom
- Mar 6: Hard to Bear
- Mar 13: Armored Hardcore

name: Unblinking
summary: Trapped on death row, unravel the dark mystery of an ancient horror to escape alive. Outsmart the abyss, cheat death - if you dare.
storyline: You are a condemned soul, a death row inmate forced to participate in a twisted game of survival. Your goal is not only to escape your fate but to unravel the very fabric of an ancient, otherworldly being. Watch others fail and fall into the abyss while you survive until you are left alone with the angel.

name: Wuthering Waves: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls
summary:
Version 2.1 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Phoebe and Brant
• New areas: Riccioli Islands and Vault Underground
• New story quests
• New endgame content: Whimpering Wastes
• New echoes, events and more!
themes: Action, Fantasy, Science fiction, Open world
storyline: What happened out there is still a mystery… Looks like to claim Drake's treasure, one must pay a price equal to its worth.

name: Puzzle & Summoner
summary: A competitive puzzle game in which players summon monsters to fight!

name: Bumblebee: Search for Happiness
summary: This game is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bee on its journey to find a new home.

name: Forsaken Facilities
summary: Find your fate in the Forsaken Facilities. Explore vast dungeons to gather a valuable resource for your mysterious kidnappers. Each day you enter a facility the only way to return is if you find the required resource. Test your luck to see how long you can survive through a variety of facilities.
storyline: You play as an astronaut that has been kidnapped by aliens. For the aliens entertainment you must enter a variety of facilities and retrieve a simple power cell. Your goal is simple, survive as many days as possible.

name: Vampire Waifu Puzzles
summary: Create stunning anime vampire waifu art through puzzles!

name: Witch of the Meta Loop
summary: This is a Roguelike adventure game with Meta elements. You are a witch, yet not a witch. Step through the magic mirror, break the fourth wall, and uncover the real you!

name: Love, Money, Rock'n'Roll: Summer '94
summary:
7 years have passed. Nikolai's life has changed: he has left much behind and now simply goes with the flow, avoiding stress and upheaval. However, fate has its own plans for our hero! New and old acquaintances will rush into his life like a gust of summer wind, bringing with them long-forgotten emotions and love!

An all-new story taking place across over more than two in-game weeks.

The opportunity to learn what fate befell the characters after the end of the game.

New characters, environments, music tracks, and illustrations.

A chance to see Nikolai from a different perspective and help him find new love.

name: Terry's Other Games
summary: Hi, I'm Terry Cavanagh! You might remember me from such videogames as Dicey Dungeons, Super Hexagon, and VVVVVV. Here are a few other things I've made over the years!
player_perspectives: First person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view

name: Moorhuhn VR Blast
summary: Get ready to blast Moorhuhn like never before with “Moorhuhn VR Blast!” Feel the unique blend of new and nostalgic vibes as you enter Virtual Reality. Test your shooting skills in a variety of reinvented versions of the classic levels you know and love. Every level offers new challenges and new weapons to unlock. With various game modes, challenges, and leaderboards, “Moorhuhn VR Blast” offers endless hours of fun. Compete with friends to become the ultimate blaster!

name: 10 Blaze Escape
summary: Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing!

name: The Righteous Scar
summary: When blades fall silent, and blood tells its tale, a scar remains—a mark not of rage, but of absolution. In The Righteous Scar, violence becomes virtue, and what’s buried beneath the skin reveals a truth only the damned can see.

name: Avowed: Premium Edition
summary:
Premium Edition includes:
- Avowed base game
- Up to 5 days early access
- Two Premium Skin Packs
- Access to Avowed Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
storyline: You are the envoy of Aedyr, a distant land, sent to investigate rumors of a spreading plague throughout the Living Lands - an island full of mysteries and secrets, danger and adventure, and choices and consequences, and untamed wilderness. You discover a personal connection to the Living Lands and an ancient secret that threatens to destroy everything. Can you save this unknown frontier and your soul from the forces threatening to tear them asunder?

name: Back Alley Darts
summary: Back Alley Darts is a crowd-play game designed Back Alley Darts Game experience. The aim of the game is try and get a bulls eye or the hiest points going and be the top of the leaderboard. The more points you get the better it is as you will unlock stuff in the game to be able to use in the game

name: Chained in the Backrooms
summary: Chained in the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op, mission-based horror game. Trapped in a blurry subconscious and chained together, toy bears must solve puzzles, complete challenging missions, and survive against creatures trying to destroy them.

name: Void Climber
summary: Climb to the top of a collapsing universe in this parkour platformer with roguelike elements. Gather resources, spawn platforms, and obtain powerful upgrades to survive before the world crumbles beneath you. Just don’t fall into the void.

name: Guns of Fury
summary: Guns of Fury is a retro-inspired action platformer that combines the run & gun and Metroidvania genres. Explore a vast interconnected world, gain new abilities and weapons, battle epic bosses and stop the plans of an evil corporation before it’s too late!

name: Carpe Dino: Seize the Date
summary: “Carpe Dino: Seize the Date” is a journey back in time with a romantic twist. Face the dangers of ancient Pangea, get involved in a few intrigues, and choose a mate to get through the Great Dying. Be ready to decide the future of the entire Dinosaur world… World, which is wider than you imagined.

name: Project Tachyon
summary: An exciting run-and-gun action shooting game in a rogue-lite format! Fight for the future by crossing timelines with the protagonist Sigma to prevent an artificial intelligence rebellion!

name: Fearbonding
summary: Fearbonding is a Yandere x Demon BL Horror Visual Novel. Play as Hinata, a demon, and try to tame the deranged Kosuke. Will you get to satisfy your hunger for fear through your new hunting dog or will you be the one to get devoured?
storyline:
Sweet and viscous like honey, that's how fear tastes to Hinata, a demon. True terror is hard to come by, so the day he meets Kosuke, his new goal is clear:

He needs to tame this terrifying man.

name: 100 Romantic Cats
summary: 100 Romantic Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Lovely themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of romantic places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: RoPan
summary: RoPan is an action game, in an open mini map in which you can explore every corner, you will find traps and enemies everywhere and so complete missions from the salesman Saber and you will have several weapons and items to help you.

name: Damsels in Distress
summary: Damsels in Distress is an interactive adventure. You will play as a lustful paladin who’d have to choose between sex and duty all the time. All this is accompanied by awesome sex animations and Japanese voice-over.

name: Restless Voronezh
summary: Restless Voronezh - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a hero and, using various available means, deals with his enemies in cramped rooms of a huge building, clearing floor after floor.

name: Dimenders
summary: Dimenders is an online horror game playable in cooperative mode for up to 4 players. You and your team are recruited to investigate the emergence of portals linked to other dimensions. Your mission is to solve various puzzles to find the solution and close all portals.
storyline: Dimenders is an online horror game playable in cooperative mode up to 4 players. You play as a team, recruited to investigate on the emergence of portals linked to other dimensions. Your job is to solve different puzzles in order to find a way to close all the portails. In fact their emergence allowed wicked entities to flood our world. Be aware, they will try to stop you, at all cost ! Pace all the levels at the risk of your own life ! Will you manage to close all portals, avoid the entities and resolve all riddles ?

name: Dawnfolk
platforms: Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Nintendo Switch
