summary: Minimalist and relaxing survival builder perfect for short gaming sessions. Rebuild and manage your realm, collect resources and decide the fate of your people. Explore the darkness and unveil the secrets of the black monoliths to bring back light to the world.

name: Rugby 25
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Welcome to the ultimate rugby gaming experience, Rugby 25! Whether you're a passionate fan or a newcomer to the world of rugby, Rugby 25 immerses you in the heart of the action and hard-hitting tackles like no rugby video game has before. From humble local club matches to the bright lights of the world's greatest international tournaments, every detail has been meticulously crafted to bring the excitement and intensity of the sport to your fingertips. Rugby 25: where legends are born, and history is made.

name: CodeReactors
summary: Build your own Magic Deck and set off on a quest in this magical battle-packed 2D-action RPG.

name: Metal Suits: Counter-Attack
genres: Shooter, Platform, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie, Arcade
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: They should never have ticked him off. Begin a hot-blooded revenge as the protagonist Kevin, who has lost everything and was reborn as a cyborg!

name: Dangerous Community
summary: Welcome to Sterling Hollows... Play as Jacoby Paccs and explore the town to learn about Jacoby and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobys life, and optionally use violence against other residents.

name: Lust Trip
summary: The day of your planned road trip has finally arrived, and you are almost ready to drive off. Suddenly, an unexpected person joins your trip, so now you have to travel with her.

name: Devil on Your Shoulder
summary: See your name in lights on Broadway! Find fame, fortune, and true love! All it costs is your immortal soul.

name: Recall: Empty wishes
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Recall: Empty wishes is a story-driven game based in Taiwan. The story centers around the desires and memories shared by a brother-sister pair.
storyline: Ever since Tommy disappeared, Yonny, her sister, has being trying to locate him. By way of a toy handset once shared with Tommy, Yonny and her friend gained access to a world constructed from past memories, along with its inhabitants’ most private thoughts and the truth of Tommy’s disappearance...

name: Shujinkou
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary:
A retired samurai (主) is entrusted with saving his home from intelligent, language-devouring "Akuma" alongside an eccentric fox (人) freed from a cursed abode and an astute princess (公) with her own ambitions.

Shujinkou is a dungeon-crawling JRPG that offers a unique opportunity to learn Japanese as you play. It features thousands of Japanese words, phrases, kana, kanji, and grammar elements that players can master through focus, diligence, and consistency. The language content spans from JLPT N5 to N1 standards, accommodating learners at any stage.

However, learning Japanese is entirely optional. For those more interested in the adventure, Shujinkou delivers a rich JRPG experience. Players can immerse themselves in hundreds of skills, items, deep forging, cooking, fishing, quests, achievements, records to break, and minigames.

name: My Gambian Boyfriend
summary: A mature visual novel exploring the relationships between elderly English women and young Gambian men, blending humor and drama while examining desire and humanity.

name: Legend of the Kitties: Return of Echoes
summary: In a forest full of life, a shining river connects all the creatures that inhabit it. Three young adventurers discover that this river is not just running water.

name: Arcade Archives: Kitten Kaboodle
summary: The fun accelerates and the enthusiasm is at full throttle!

name: Porkshire Hero
summary:
This bundle contains: Porkshire Hero for Xbox One, Xbox Series and Porkshire Hero (Windows) for the PC platform.

Join Porkshire Hero on a delightful yet daring quest to collect all the apples needed to save the princess! In this charming and colorful adventure, you'll meet Pink Pig, a charismatic and brave hero, as he embarks on a journey through vibrant forests and treacherous mountains. Along the way, he'll face formidable enemies and navigate deadly traps, but with courage and skill, he might just succeed in his mission.

name: Alpacapaca Dash 1 + 2 Bundle
summary: Alpacapaca Dash 1 + Alpacapaca Dash 2

name: Alpacapaca Dash 2
summary: After saving the Alpaca Goddess and vanquishing the eternal darkness, you now have to save the Alpaca World again! Fragments of darkness started appearing and it's your job to destroy them and ensure peace will remain into the colorful Alpaca World.

name: Night at Grandma's
summary: A single-player experience where your grandma got possessed by a demon. Search her house to find torn pages from an ancient book and items needed to free your grandmother’s soul from a sinister force. P.S. Remember, demons don’t like salt.

name: Holo8
summary: Escape from the looping office. Observe the office carefully and look for any anomaly to reach the main entrance.

name: Escape the Tower
summary: Escape the Tower is a horror game where you must escape from a 600-meter-high radio tower within 10 minutes.

name: Warriors: Abyss
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Through victory and defeat, traverse the merciless trials of hell.

name: The Seabed's Shining Star
summary: Under the hazy moon, a shrine maiden meets a star. A short visual novel of a two person conversation. Cup ramen recommended.

name: Il Fiore di Moretti
summary: You are a renowned chef who accepts a job at "Il Fiore di Moretti," an Italian restaurant preparing for its grand reopening. Your task is to cook and ensure that customers return for your delicious food. However, you start to notice that strange things are happening in the restaurant. They are subtle, almost imperceptible, but enough to make you realize that something is very wrong...

name: Meet the Myths: An Ormhildur the Brave Game
summary: Join granny at the State Research Department of Magic to finish the board of creatures!
storyline:
The year is 2043. The glaciers have all melted. The planet has been flooded and temperatures are rising. Out from beneath the glaciers appeared creatures. Creatures that had been believed to only exist in the folk tales!

Now is your chance, the State Research Department of Magic needs your help! Come visit, explore, learn, and connect the dots!

name: Vertical Blast Vol. 1
summary: Dive into the thrilling universe of arcade shoot 'em ups with Vertical Blast Vol.1, an exclusive bundle by TOMAGameStudio!

name: Escape Room Ultimate Duo
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Two escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Pyramids and Aliens: Escape Room and Mystic Academy: Escape Room.

name: Code Reactors
summary: Build your own Magic Deck and set off on a quest in this magical battle-packed 2D-action RPG.

name: Fractious
summary: This game plunges players into a challenging dungeon world where they play as a brave skeleton,

name: Evaluate
summary: This game provides players with a simple yet highly attractive stress relieving experience.

name: Genshin Impact: Moonlight Amidst Dreams
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5
summary:
Version 5.4 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Yumemizuki Mizuki
• New story quest for Yumemizuki Mizuki
• New main event: Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival
• New quality of life features
• …and more!
storyline:
Life is like weaving between sweet dreams and nightmares.

When you feel tense, terrified, and unable to breathe,

Please take a moment to rest and savor the sweetness of delectable dreams.

Rip, tear, and devour your nightmares.

name: Penguin Flight
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Soar Beyond Your Dreams

name: Super Jagger Bomb 2: Go East
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Disarm bombs as fast as you can to save the world in platforming superhero style!

name: Hand Simulator: Shooter
summary: Hand Simulator Shooter — a true contender for the shooter throne, inspired by iconic games of the genre. Take control of your hands to survive and dominate in physically realistic shootouts. Experience unique gameplay where every move matters, and become the master of the new king of shooters.

name: 108 Silly Ways to Die
summary: Caichen made an appointment with a female netizen from the same school to meet at an abandoned medical college, but was caught up in a conspiracy. Caichen planned to explore here and find a way to escape, but the sudden roar and the appearance of zombies implied that there were secrets hidden here.

name: Legacy: Steel & Sorcery
summary: Explore the dangerous beauty of Legacy: Steel & Sorcery as you race to find lost treasures while battling players and monsters in merciless action combat. But make sure to find your way back to safety before it's too late—or risk losing it all.

name: Sancticide
summary: Become Ezechiel, the sin collector in service of Them at The Top, as he makes his way through the remains of our world during the End Times. It is the Apocalypse taken to the very letter, and his job is to eradicate sin and filth for the glory of God. Find out if a human being can endure such fate.
developers: Red Square Games S.A., Sylen Studio S.A.

name: Bearly Delivered
summary: A 3D physics-based package delivery game

name: Jump King Quest
summary: Brave The Heights together or alone in this unhinged Multiplayer-Combat-RPG successor to the Original Tactical Leaping Adventure from Nexile.

name: Urban Myth Dissolution Center
summary: Join forces with the psychic Director of the Urban Myth Dissolution Center and solve a variety of cases involving cursed relics, rental properties with shady histories, and dimensional anomalies. Monstrous oddities and otherworldly planes abound in this occult mystery adventure game!

name: Mind Over Magic
summary: Design, build and manage your magic school to explore what lies below. Study lost arcana, grow exotic plants, brew potions, and raise undead servants -- only you can prepare your fragile students to harness their Mind Over Magic.

name: Jurassic Island: Little Dinosaur Park
summary: This graphic novel follows the adventures of a group of dinosaurs who find an island full of challenges and ancient secrets.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Damage Under Cover
summary:
Want to learn how to play hull down? This legendary British tank will get you there! Position the FV201 (A45) behind rocks, ridges, or other forms of cover, and unleash its firepower to support your team.

Damage Under Cover also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and the Major "Butch" Alan Commander, a master of subterfuge that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- British Tier VII FV201 (A45) Heavy Tank
- Major "Butch" Alan 3D Hero Commander
- 30 Days of Premium Account

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Patricia Laserian
summary:
Only fire and retribution await the Enemies of the Emperor. Deliver His vengeance to your opponents with Patricia Laserian of the Adepta Sororitas in charge of your tank.

Bundle includes:
• Patricia Laserian 3D Hero Commander
• Patricia Laserian 2D Standard Commander
• Emblems: Ecclesiarchy's Hand of Vengeance (3)
• Emblems: Sister Lucia (3)
• Inscriptions: Adepta Sororitas (3)

3D Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

2D Standard Commanders start with one open Skill slot and earn Commander XP at the standard rate.

Emblems and Inscriptions can be applied to any vehicle that can use Cosmetics.

2025 Games Workshop Ltd

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Scout ‘n' Swarm
summary:
Take command of the M22 Locust and master the role of the active scout! The high rate of fire on this fast-moving tank will make it nearly impossible for your enemies to escape.

Scout ‘n' Swarm also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings and Silver to stock up on ammo, Consumables, and more.

Included in this World of Tanks Modern Armor DLC bundle:

- American Tier III M22 Locust Light Tank
- 3 Days of Premium Account
- 200,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Volusad Thassius
summary:
None can rival the discipline and courage of the Ultramarines. Harness their legendary prowess with Volusad Thassius in command of your tank!

Bundle includes:
• Volusad Thassius 3D Hero Commander
• Volusad Thassius 2D Standard Commander
• Emblems: Insignia of the Ultramarines (3)
• Emblems: Icon of the Ultramarines Emblem (3)
• Inscriptions: Courage and Honour Inscription (3)

3D Hero Commanders start with three open Skill slots and earn Commander XP at a +30% bonus rate.

2D Standard Commanders start with one open Skill slot and earn Commander XP at the standard rate.

Emblems and Inscriptions can be applied to any vehicle that can use Cosmetics.

2025 Games Workshop Ltd

name: A Tale of Body Limbs
summary:
This is an historical experience based on the real life and death of Mary and Percy Shelley.

Through fragments and scattered remains, the player pieces together a story of love, death, and creation.

name: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness
summary: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness is primarily a spooky, atmospheric, first-person walking simulator that doesn't take itself too seriously.

name: Mournight
summary: Mournight is a horror game where 1-4 players collaborate to survive and solve the mystery. Explore locked rooms, collect cursed objects, and stay alert against a terrifying creature that hunts you in the dark.

name: Spyfall
summary:
Welcome to Spyfall, a pulse-pounding multiplayer game where trust is scarce, and the stakes are high. Set in a dynamic urban environment teeming with life, Spyfall puts you and your friends in the middle of a thrilling game of deception, strategy, and survival.
In a city alive with NPCs, five players take on unique roles. One becomes the relentless police officer, tasked with uncovering spies hidden among the bustling crowd. The other four assume the roles of citizens—spies with a mission. Their goal? Complete covert tasks across the city without raising suspicion and, above all, avoid getting caught.

name: Pexit 8
summary:
A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.A piece of Exit 8-like where all the anomalies are related to the penguins.

Horror game Penguin Hotel extravaganza

name: Goblin Corrosion
summary: This is a 2D turn-based game. The story is set in a fantasy world. The protagonist, a succubus, must fight against the Goblin invasion with the nuns and save the world.

name: Pop DS
summary: Pop DS is a match 3 game with a twist, you POP (don't swap) gems to remove them. As you progress you will learn new moves and encounter lots of on grid interactive objects. Enjoy playing the game casually, or aim for a challenge worthy of a gamer and go for 100% completion!

name: Primal Hearts 2
summary: As new rivalries and old divisions threaten to split Ainoshima apart once again, only a new “Triple Seven” can restore peace once more! Torn between the machinations of the Liberal Arts and Sports factions, can our hero heal everyone's hearts—and steal just one?
storyline:
Going on my big sister’s recommendation, I’ve transferred to Ainoshima Academy! With summer break over, a new semester of fall events awaits. There’s the annual academy festival, the sports meet—the list goes on! As I walk to class on my first day, my heart races in anticipation at what my new campus life will be like. That is, until students start approaching me a short distance from the campus gate… You see, Ainoshima Academy has two student councils that are always vying against each other. Here, let me break it down for you real quick:

Gekka Council: Steeped in history and tradition, Gekka is as old as the academy itself. Its supporters wear uniforms featuring flowing, dark-green skirts for added noblesse.

Gekka President Alicetia: “Join Gekka… Let’s be friends…”

Tendo Council: Tendo is a new student council that was formed after Gekka. Its supporters prefer a dress style that incorporates the latest in uniform chic, including burgundy bolero jackets, pleated miniskirts, and neckties.

Tendo President Usagi: “Join Tendo—let’s get this academy inspired!”

Meanwhile, various student associations have been involved in a proxy war, with the sports teams supporting Gekka and the liberal arts clubs backing Tendo. Before I transferred, the student vote was split evenly between them, which means my vote will be the one that decides who gets the majority! Word has it that a similar deadlock happened six years ago, and it was a transfer student who broke it. Coincidence, huh? Anyway, as you can imagine, since day one of me moving here, neither faction will give me a moment’s peace! This isn’t how my sister said it would be at all…?!

Gekka Vice President Mashiro: “I wish the sports jocks and liberal arts gang could just get along.”

Tendo Secretary Tateha: “With your vote, something might actually change around here.”

I was planning to live my new campus life in peace, but as the academy’s 777th student, the entire student population is watching my every move. Being 777 might sound like the jackpot, but the way things are going, I just might be the unluckiest guy here…

With two student councils to deal with, plus the ongoing proxy war, my new life at Ainoshima Academy is already off to a challenging start!

name: AmaZoo
summary: AmaZoo is a progressive and varied puzzle game, inspired by the classic video game Sokoban, but presented in side-view, like the old classic 2D games. In this game, you can solve a multitude of puzzles and put your logical mind to the test, moving and organizing different types of boxes to reach the exit and progress to the next stage. But be careful— some boxes are fickle, and watch your step!
storyline: Hi, I'm KoKo. I'm the new order picker at AmaZoo. My job is to get these boxes to the right place—or at least, I think it is. I don’t have all the instructions yet, and there are some dangerous things around here that I’m not too sure about. Can you help me move all these boxes and find the way out? I really can’t wait for this long day to be over!

name: Rosttle
summary: "Battle Roosters" is a solo-developed 2D top-down shooter where players must survive each round by collecting yellow energy dots on the field, navigating map obstacles, and employing various tactics to vanquish monsters, earn coins, and secure rewards.

name: Office Overloaded
summary: Type quickly to process incoming documents without burning out. Sharpen your skills, climb up the ranks and challenge your coworkers around the globe. Can you stay cool under pressure and become the next CEO?

name: Primal Hearts
summary: After moving into a new town hoping for a new life, Kazuma finds himself the swing vote between two deadlocked factions representing tradition and innovation. Nicknamed “Triple Seven,” can he still live easy and find romance under his new status as a much-contested lucky guy?
storyline:
“So, which one are you gonna join?”

Spring—a season of new encounters. As I walk beneath the cherry blossoms, my heart races in anticipation at what my new life will be like. That is, until students start approaching me a short distance from the campus gate…

“It’s gotta be Gekka, right? Tradition is so important!”

“But Tendo’s all about innovation. Trust me, we have more fun!”

Ainoshima Academy’s two student councils don’t quite get along, but before I transferred here they were splitting the vote dead-even. Now I’m the tiebreaker. That’s why everyone is vying to sway my swing ballot.

“Together, let’s inspire every student to rise to bigger and better things!”

“You’ll be working with our side, though, right?!”

This place was supposed to be my verdant island of love! All I see in the cards is desertion and disappointment—I’ll be letting down half the students no matter which side I choose!

With the expectations of two very vocal factions on my shoulders, how am I going to pick one without ruining my chances at romance?

name: Arctic Motel Simulator
summary: Have you ever been to the Arctic? Do you want to open a motel in the Arctic? With the company of aurora, blizzards, polar days and nights, primeval forests, and wild animals, can you turn a run-down motel into a landmark in the Arctic?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Rule as one of many legendary leaders from throughout history. Establish your civilization, construct cities and architectural wonders to expand your territory, conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations in pursuit of prosperity, and explore the far reaches of the unknown world. Will you build an empire that stands the test of time?

name: Aria Skies
summary: Soar to new heights in Aria Skies, a 2.5D indie fighting game featuring free-flying movement that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

name: The Executive
summary: Shape the history of the Hollywood movie industry in this sandbox business simulation game. Create the movies you've always wanted to see, hire the best team, research cutting-edge technologies, and dominate the Box Office. Can you rise from a small studio to a Hollywood giant?
developers: Goblinz Publishing, Aniki Games, Maple Whispering Limited
storyline: The Executive is a sandbox business simulation game that lets you relive the history of the Hollywood movie industry from the 70s to the present. As the founder of the newest production company in town, you can create the movies you've always dreamed of. Hire a top-notch team, research new technologies, and grow your annual Box Office to become a Major Studio.

name: Cold VR
summary: COLD VR It's the non-stop VR experience. With its twisting mechanics, this game will turn you into an unstoppable machine as you adapt and overcome challenges in each level, you are in control of time. Every time you stop, time flows; you move, it slows down. So, keep on moving!

name: Taco Terror
summary: TACO TERROR is a boomer shooter set in a cyberpunk future where capitalism rules everyone - except for you. Run, gun, choke, dive, jump(?), and slide your way through the forces of T.A.C.O. Take back New TACO City from these forces of fried evil before you become too... delicious.
developers: SimpleShutIn Productions, The Best Worst Gamers Publishing

name: The Brilliant Coup
summary: A fun and exciting 2D pixel art point and click adventure game with classic commands. Steal a world-famous brilliant from the best guarded bank in the country.

name: Unforgotten: Ordinance
summary: Face your fears, uncover the secrets of the past and fulfill your own destiny. In the wild impenetrable forests of Siberia you will face those who look beyond our reality and only the right choice will allow you to reach the end. Test yourself in a new psychological ethno-horror.

name: SteamDolls: Order of Chaos
platforms: PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary:
In the mist of time, society is eaten by industry, and its citizens oppressed by an authoritarian and omniscient cult.

The Whisper (David Hayter), a violent anarchist, dreams about a revolution that will destroy the order of things. He devotes himself to expose the dark side of those in power and bring awareness to the people.

His obsessive quest for the ultimate truth will throw him into a world of betrayal and sorcery where the only certainty is the imminent end of the world.

SteamDolls is a steampunk inspired metroidvania with a grimy touch of brutality, featuring AAA talent like David Hayter. Lose yourself in a labyrinthine city, full of secrets and madness, and reveal the truth lurking in the shadows. You know but four words: Action, Exploration, Stealth, and Blood.
developers: The Shady Gentlemen, Top Hat Studios

name: Oirbo
summary: Explore a labyrinthian spacecraft and discover its mysteries and purpose. Help Oirbo navigate a metroidvania inspired, hand-drawn, 2D action-platformer full of secrets to uncover, areas to explore and enemies to dismantle. The choices are yours to make, how will you unravel the twisted story?

name: Assetflip Attorney
summary: Assetflip attorney is a murder mystery satire visual novel, Solve crimes in a world where everyone has gone insane and everything feels like a fever dream, interrogate witnesses, hunt for clues and take down the criminal organization that threatens to destroy reality.

name: Jigsaw City Princess
summary: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of city princesses drinking coffee, at school or other activities you love!

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 4: Drift Out
summary:
VISCO Corporation’s DRIFT OUT series is a celebrated collection of 2D rally racing games that brought the excitement of World Rally Championship Racing to arcades and home consoles. Spanning from the original Drift Out in 1991 to Neo Drift Out: New Technology in 1996, the series was renowned for its innovative use of the isometric perspectives, tight controls, and engaging track designs.

Included in this collection is all four games in the Drift Out series as well as several bonus sports titles from the VISCO Catalogue to enjoy in between races!

name: Polymega Collection Vol. 3: Tiger-Heli
summary:
Toaplan produced several landmark 2D Shooting titles in the arcade during the 1980's that today are regarded as some of the earliest and finest examples of the genre. Among those, one title stands out in particular as having established many important ideas that helped define the shooting game genre -- 1985's Tiger-Heli.

You could say that the features which characterize a shooting game today, like the scrolling playfield, screen clearing bombs, weapon upgrade systems, and so on, were probably in some way influenced by one of the titles in this collection.

name: FMV Adventure
summary: FMV Adventure

name: The FMV Collection 5
summary: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the Bloodshore, Ten Dates and Mia and the Dragon Princess all in one bundle!

name: Project Hailstorm
summary: A short story where you enter the shoes of a researcher sent to uncover the mysteries of a project abandoned deep within the Antarctic circle.

name: Jerkmate: Ranked
summary:
Rejoice: Jerkmate Ranked is real! All the hilarious user-generated content has inspired Jerky to make one more fantasy come true. Play the Jerkmate Ranked game to reach the highest ranks of fapping mastery. Will you be the next Grandmaster Baiter, or should you bear the Bronze Beater title forever? Your destiny (and hopefully something else) is now in your hands!

Jerkmate Ranked is more than an Internet trend. It’s a statement for all jerkers, fappers, wankers, gooners, edgers and meat beaters worldwide. United, we stand firm! Let’s honor Jerky, our universal symbol of sexual freedom, inclusiveness and diversity. Flaunt your Jerkmate rank like an honor badge because it is. Good luck, and may the nuts be with you.

name: Whale Flesh
summary: A short horror game where you dig through the flesh of a giant whale to find out what happened to your team.

name: The House
summary: The House is a single player horror and thriller game. As a journalist, you are trapped in a house where the paranormal is on the rise. It's up to you to find photos, notes and tapes and escape the house to survive!

name: Prolonged Winter
summary: Prolonged Winter is an MBF21 mapset of 6 maps (5 beatable maps + 1 stopper map) which are wintery and surreal, using @OverflowingMocha's lovely DreamPal palette. The maps have a heavy focus on creating a sort of dream-like atmosphere, often containing experimental gameplay and visuals, while some maps have no enemies at all. Most of them are relatively short, with the exception of MAP05.

name: FriendShapes
summary: A jumpscare-free abstract horror existential crisis of a lite-RPG. Explore Digressions - areas that continue longer than they should with sets of randomized text events and map variations for a differing experience each time. Features a unique non-violent interaction system with various Entities.

name: The Lost Island
summary: A lonely warrior to find a plant, that has caused the extinction of the tribes.

name: Autogiro
summary: In Autogiro, a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter, you take control of a sophisticated helicopter and set off on a mission where your survival depends on your accuracy, quick thinking, and strategy!

name: The Succession of Changing Kings
summary: A turn-based kingdom management simulator, with an emphasis on decision making. Will you survive and lead the kingdom to prosperity or die in obscurity? The throne awaits you.

name: Burgie's Cozy Kitchen
summary: A relaxing kitchen game. Manage your burger joint restaurant: minimize the game in the corner of your desk while you do your business and wait for new orders. It can also connect to your Twitch chat to welcome your viewers.

name: Ascension to Bheaven
summary: If you want a very smooth challenge try to beat this game. I know that you can't even reach the top of the first level.

name: SuperPosition
summary: Sokoban style quantum puzzle game. Make your way through many variations of one level at once using one sequence of moves!

name: World Horror Story
summary: World Horror Story is a cooperative survival horror game where you need to banish evil before it destroys you. In the game, you can communicate with ghosts and demons using your voice, but be careful; if ghosts respond, it doesn't mean they are friendly.

name: 10 Second Rule: Infinity Labo
summary: "Escape the infinite loop in just 10 seconds? Experience the thrill of the 10 Second Rule demo" releasing on July 23！Register now so you don't miss the demo release date!

name: The Gourmet Factor
summary: The Gourmet Factor - it gives creatures the instinct to eat and be powerful. Strong people who have mastered the factor are active in this continent in the name of food hunters. It is also the prelude to your adventure

name: Orc Incursion
summary: Real-time strategy game that features both PvE and PvP modes. With a variety of different units and structures, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, players must use their strategic skills to build and manage their base, train and upgrade their units.

name: Towers & Goblins: The Last Stand
summary: Build massive towers, manage your resources, create a team of powerful warriors, and try to stand as long as you can. Every choice you make will decide the destiny of your kingdom!

name: Line of Fire: Pirate Waltz
summary: Line of Fire - Pirate Waltz is a local multiplayer duel of pirates. Commandeer a ship of your choosing, master maneuvering around the dangers of the Seven Seas, manage your resources and time your shots perfectly to sink your enemy and emerge as a victorious captain against your friends.

name: LoneStar
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Tactical, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary:
LoneStar is a strategic Roguelike spaceship combat game. As a bounty hunter, you will capture criminals scattered across the universe. Win the shockwave battle to gain bounty rewards and vacations. Find the treasures, customize your spaceship, unlock talents, defeat the felons and be a legend!

The Bounty Hunter Association is recruiting now! Abundant rewards await you!

name: Mayhemers
summary: Mayhemers is game where you can create chaos and mayhem in different type of places. Play solo or up to 4 people against AI or challenge with other players in 3v3 pvp game mode.

name: Novus Orbis
summary: A combo-based deckbuilding roguelike through a space-time loop: collect cards, receive blessings, add pets to your party, and grow stronger. Chain together cards in the right order for max power, and act before the enemy does. Build synergistic decks, find many secrets, and make BIG numbers!

name: Museum No.9
summary: Massive artifact collection! Build your museum with extreme freedom! Visitor revenue depends on your route design, and whether you can achieve perfect profits is entirely up to you! Enjoy light rogue-style adventure exploration, and use different skill combinations to battle monsters every time!

name: IT Hell
summary: You are dead. Welcome to the IT Hell where you have to fight developers, critical bugs and your old equipment to make you way through it. Armed with your keyboard...and some guns, advance through different levels, upgrade your stats and reach the final boss!

name: Astronomics
summary: Command a customizable star ship, assemble a faithful crew of bots and automate your asteroid mining operation as you save up for that ticket to Earth so you can finally come home... for the very first time.
storyline:
Top-down action and space exploration meet asteroid mining automation!

In the not so distant future the cost of living on Earth has become astronomical - a paradise for the lucky few wo can afford it and only an aspiration for those who can’t. Sorry, but you aren't one of the lucky ones.

Fortunately you’ve got a sure fire path to profit in the asteroid belt thanks to your pseudo employment contract with the Cube Corporation and their motivational representative CUBO.

Command a customizable star ship and assemble a faithful crew of bots as you save up for that ticket to Earth and get to finally come home... for the very first time.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: 'Tis the season for puzzles!

name: Reality Break
summary: Rewrite the Universe! Pilot an agile starfighter, upgrade it with randomized loot, and unleash mystical fate energy to alter the fabric of spacetime itself!
storyline: In Reality Break, almost everything is modifiable with the Rewrite mechanic. Upgrade and change the attributes of your equipment, unlock mythical abilities, and change the course of the future. The possibilities are endless!

name: Door Kickers 2
summary: Command military Special Ops Teams in gripping tactical combat against a Middle East-based terrorist network. Sequel to RockPaperShotgun's "Best Tactics Game of 2014".

name: My Little Blacksmith Shop
summary: It is a crafting game, created in the Unreal Engine 4, where players are tasked to mine resources, smelt them into ingots, forge weapons and tools and sell them to their customers.

name: 256 cosas en común entre una cama, un libro y una cerveza
summary:
Half personal story, half essay.
A 10-minute interactive piece on creativity, with some exercises and tips on how to unlock it.

name: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels
summary: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels is Co-op 1-6 survival horror game where you explore eerie, hidden levels filled with terrifying entities, cryptic puzzles, and relentless dangers. survive deadly encounters, and find your way out—before you become another lost soul trapped forever.

name: Coffin Delivery
summary: Trapped in a haunted mansion on your first day delivering coffins, you must uncover its dark secrets to survive. Explore eerie halls and evade a stalking demonic presence as you race to gather the ghost's remains and find a way out alive.

name: Gravity's Apple
summary: An action adventure game in which you guide a rolling apple. As you roll through various stages accompanied by soothing music, your goal is to reach the top of Newton's head.

name: Beta Hospital
summary:
Beta Hospital is a horror game with a lot of Internet memes, with some funny content, but the main tone is horror.
You will play Zeng Zhaofeng, to Beluta hospital to find his missing wife Zhai Yina, on the way will meet a strange woman Hu Yilian, she is an enemy or a friend?

name: Dead Daylight
summary: "DEADDAYLIGHT" is a side-scrolling platform action-adventure game.Developed independently by a single person. It tells the dark story of a protagonist who wakes up from a nightmare about the plague during a plague after the gods abandoned the earth, and then return to the Cathedral of Holy Light.

name: Kirby Street
summary: This mod of Fortune Street introduces 26 new characters and 18 unique boards to play with, directly from the Kirby franchise! There are balance changes, custom Mii accessories, and you can even play the original Fortune Street boards!

name: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary:
FMV (Interactive Movie)

"It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"
Meet Tesu Kang, a simp who's never had a girlfriend in his 30 years. Now facing the harsh reality of aging without any prospects for romance. he realizes that if there's no path, he must forge his own. Determined to find new love through a dating app, Tesu embarks on what could be the biggest challenge of his life.

Join in and see how your choices will change his destiny!
storyline:
He carries a petty pride, believing he could date anyone if he put his mind to it. However, when he confidently logs onto the dating app, he’s confronted with the brutal hierarchy of the dating world. Placed in the lowest tier—Bronze—his self-esteem takes a major hit.

Unable to accept his Bronze tier, Tesu resolves to prove his dating prowess by ultimately reaching the coveted Gold tier and, in the process, finding true love.

name: Boulder Crash
summary: Collect diamonds and avoid monsters! You need to collect all the diamonds to exit the level. Rocks and diamonds can fall and kill you.

name: White Flame Inna: Daughter of the Void
summary: 2d hand drawn female protagonist metroidvania/soulslike game

name: Puzzle Girls: Celia
summary: Play Blackjack against a series of sexy bankers and maybe even break the bank to unlock some special additional content from the girls.

name: Puzzle Girls: Cheryl
summary: Enjoy some cute puzzle action in this relax-alot one handed puzzle game.

name: Digging a Hole Simulator
summary: Ready to dig into an exciting adventure? Digging a Hole Simulator lets you unearth the mysteries beneath your garden! Grab your shovel and start digging to uncover hidden treasures, ancient relics, and secrets that have been buried for centuries! What lies beneath? Only you can find out!

name: Railbreak: Neon Carnage Collection
summary: Arcade neon destruction awaits in these survival horror nightmares!

name: Sally's House
summary: A single player Horror Game made with Unity, consisting of 4 short levels with different environments and entities.

name: Nightmare Journey
summary: You're on a bus, trying to reach the next station.

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
summary:
This game is an arcade-collectathon-exploration game where an unknow being is doing its best to avoid the end of his/her world because of the sun disappearing. Through different places the player have to run and collect sun rings to progress ever further. The game include a story, additional content and a rpg oriented dlc. The base game minimum game time is at least about 16hours.

This video game is born after omega no sunshine 1 (2019) made by the galoxyum studio.
storyline:
this is the story of you,as a random citizen from your world, but well too much pollution and the sun is disappearing meaning the world is near to come at its end.an old legend make you hopeful, by collecting sun rings you might make the sun appear again but...you are the only one to see them, and saving the world might have a price.
will you let your world disappear or will you bring a brighter future on our families ?
it is time to act.

name: Bluesky Map Jam
summary: This project started as a way for Doom mappers and modders to find each other on the new social media site and to show off their skills. The result was 44 maps from mappers of all disciplines with all kinds of aesthetics and gameplay styles.

name: Hidden Tomatoes 3
summary: Explore serene forests, sparkling river, and rustic rural houses in *Hidden Tomatoes 3*! Find 100 cleverly hidden tomatoes in a peaceful yet challenging hidden object adventure. With stunning visuals and relaxing gameplay, it's fun for all ages. Can you uncover them all?

name: Welcome to Maison Chichigami
summary: Deep in the mountains, there is said to be a legendary hot spring: called the Spirit Spring. Becoming lost on the way to the spring, you are rescued by a mysterious, reclusive family. But what secrets does this family hide away in their manor?

name: Operation Get Bike Back 2: Pedal Recall
summary: A sequel to the 22 year old map Operation Get Bike Back except this time it takes place on Mars. Find all the disassembled bike parts scattered across the map across the Martian city (which houses apartments, stores and the usual hi-tech facilities) is open-ended just like the city in the original OGBB was.

name: Drop That Cat
summary: Connect small cute kittens to big cats.

name: Witch’s Gaze: The Vanishing Village
summary: Embark on a mystical quest that blends Slavic folklore with arcane witchcraft, uncover hidden secrets, and rescue a village lost to the shadows in this magical detective visual novel. Oh, and never forget your cat - he might save you!

name: Monochrome Nemesis
summary:
Dive into the Darkness!

Enter the captivating universe of Monochrome Nemesis, a die and retry game in black and white pixel art, offering a retro black and white experience. Relentlessly face a formidable knight who gains strength and strategy with each duel. Each victory makes your Nemesis more powerful, ensuring a constant and renewed challenge.

For Challenge Seekers, Monochrome Nemesis is designed for those who seek a true challenge. Each combat demands skill and perseverance, putting your abilities to the test.

A Game Without Limits, Except Yours. Monochrome Nemesis is a record game, with no mechanical limits other than your own endurance. How far will you go to defeat your Nemesis?

Prepare to take on the ultimate challenge and prove your worth against your Nemesis.

Created with Godot by an Independent Developer.

name: Beat Around the Bush
summary: Beat Around the Bush is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Beat Around the Bush is a game where your primary goal is to Beat around the Bush. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Just Find It 4
summary: Lots of Difference-Finding Fun in Just Find it 4!

name: Simply Survive
summary: Simply Survive is a 2D bullet hell survival experience where you the player battle through waves of enemies to just survive as long as possible.

name: The Backrooms: Mass Extinction
summary: If you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms. The old moist carpet, the mono-yellow rooms and the hum-buzz of the fluorescent lights will be your only comfort in the endless purgatory you have found yourself in. Don't bother crying out for help. Nobody is left.

name: Kingdoms and Slaves
summary: In a kingdom fallen by a disease, nearby kingdoms keep this isolated, meanwhile, people starve, go crazy and die, but there is still a hope of starting again in another place, but for that it will be necessary to leave before the disease takes over your body and soul...

name: Newtonian Horror
summary: Step into the boots of Isaac Newton, in a world before gravity was invented. Newtonian Horror is an occult platformer where you can't move or shoot and the only weapon at your disposal is gravity. Use your exceptional knowledge as Newton to manipulate gravity and defeat your enemies!

name: A Very Ordinary Elevator Simulator
summary: A Very Ordinary Elevator Simulator is an easter egg hunt walking simulator where you climb the floors, going higher and higher, in a seemingly ordinary elevator. Features over an hour of gameplay, multiple endings, minigames, collectibles, achievements, easter eggs, and many unique sights to see. Do you dare uncover the secrets of The Elevator?

name: Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare & Trench Shooter: Warfare Tactics Bundle Collection
summary: From Trenches to Triumph—Your Battle, Your Legacy!

name: Spot Challenge Vol. 2
summary: Spot Challenge is a game series inspired by 'Find the Differences,' where you compare two images and spot over 330 differences across 35 levels. Play solo or with friends and family—test your attention to detail in this fun challenge!

name: Poopy's Wonderland
summary: The rules of this game are incredibly simple: All you need to do is guide the characters to the goal by giving them instructions. However, each stage is filled with various traps and obstacles. Use the available actions to overcome these challenges and lead the characters to their destination!

name: Low Polly
summary:
Polly's soda-lighted you're here.
Just earlier today, a strange gravity anomaly snatched Polly’s favourite can of pop clean out of his webbed fingers, and he needs your help to reclaim his beloved beverage! Use Polly’s signature bubble-jump and tongue-grapple to traverse a low-poly world reminiscent of games from your childhood.
Embark on an un-frog-ettable adventure through 3 challenging levels set to an energetic soundtrack punctuated by humorous narration. This is a Foddian game sure to keep you busy for up to 60 minutes, or until you rage quit, whichever comes first.
So, what are you waiting for?
Hop to it!

name: Coloring Game: Girls 2
summary: Coloring Game: Girls 2 is a sequel to the double anti-stress game (coloring by numbers plus beautiful girls).

name: Buck 'n Grunts Bundle
summary: Guts 'n Grunts and Buck Blastem -- two excellent, retro-styled, 16-bit platform games together in one epic bundle!

name: Bomb Bowling X
summary: Bomb Bowling X is a casual retro game where you need to help a cute cat in a superhero cape win at Bomb Bowling. It has only a few bomb charges, as well as bowling balls, basketballs and your skill and ingenuity.

name: Hyakki Yako Survivor
summary: Follow the wind and destroy all the cursed torii gates. Deploy your fellows and form a formation to fight off the onslaught of enemies. Control many fierce warriors and challenge the "Hyakki Yako".

name: Berry Berry Festival
summary: A wholesome and heart-warming story game about a young girl who wants to become the Berry Berry Champion. Explore a small town and help the residents with odd jobs to prepare for the Berry Berry Festival!

name: Vox Populi: Germany 2025
summary: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative German elections! In "Vox Populi: Germany 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: The Silent Suite
summary: You live in a hotel room. Everything seems normal—until a strange rumbling wakes you. Panic sets in as you realize you’re not alone. A killer is somewhere in the hotel… Trapped inside, you must navigate the eerie hallways, and find a way to escape… before it's too late.
storyline: You live in a hotel room. Everything seems normal—until a strange rumbling wakes you. Panic sets in as you realize you’re not alone. A killer is somewhere in the hotel… Trapped inside, you must navigate the eerie hallways, and find a way to escape… before it's too late.

name: Only False
summary: Only False is a party game that blends bluffing and strategy, spiced up with a dash of dark humor. In Only False, a game for those who can’t get enough lies, you’ll sometimes lie like a politician, and sometimes think as strategically as Sun Tzu.

name: Skyline Bowling
summary: Strike out the competition and become the ultimate bowling champ! Ready to roll?

name: Clash of Busts
summary: Clash of Busts is a multiplayer shooter where players battle it out with quirky weapons like Rocket, Milk and Rail Guns across diverse arenas.

name: Aralez
summary: This game is based on aralez from Armenian mythology, winged canines that lick the wounds of the dead in order to revive them. Explore each level and do minigames to revive the fallen.

name: Shieven
summary: Enter the enigmatic Luminora Hospital, where, as a researcher on the brink of ruin, you take on a case that will test your courage. Amidst dark rumors, you will uncover terrifying secrets that have caused those who dared to go too far to disappear.
storyline:
Shieven is a suspense and exploration game that puts you in the shoes of an investigator whose financial situation is on the verge of collapse. In a desperate attempt to solve his problems, he accepts a case in the mysterious Luminora Hospital, a place shrouded in dark and terrifying rumors.

According to the stories, those who have ventured beyond the superficial levels of the hospital have never been seen again.

Explore the depths of Luminora Hospital and discover what happened there in the past...
Discover chilling secrets that were never meant to see the light...
Escape from terrible creatures or monsters that lie below...

name: Sugoro Quest: Dice Heroes
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Roll the dice and fight! SUGORO Quest: The Quest of Dice Heroes comes to the West for the first time! This is a board game-style turn-based RPG where dice will decide your fate! In English for the first time, it features new functions such as save state, screen filters, gallery and cheats.

name: Pole Vault
summary: You are a stretchy little newt who loves to pole vault.

name: Car Detailing & Wash Simulator: Luxury Car Cleaner
summary: Luxury Cars, Flawless Shine – Master the Art of Detailing!

name: Friendly Sheeps: A Cozy Simulator
summary: FRIENDLY SHEEPS is a relaxing sheep farming game in which you create your dream farm in a peaceful, colorful world. With its simple gameplay, meet the needs of your sheeps, craft and sell your products, and grow your business!

name: A Game About Digging A Hole
summary: A minimalist game about digging a hole in the garden of a newly purchased house. Collect resources, sell them, upgrade your equipment and discover a mysterious secret. Costs you only one coffee!

name: Wizards in Shorts
summary: Wizards in Shorts is a fast-paced online arena shooter. Blast your friends with fireballs, electricity, puffer fish, and mysterious blue orbs.

name: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre
summary: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre is a 2D action platformer with a real focus on speed, Tarantino-style violence, and a wicked grapple feature that lets ya zip around like an acrobat, eh! This is a prequel chapter for Croak Crusader: the Champion of Canada, and the full game’s gonna have, like, five times the content of this demo, buddy! So buckle up, ‘cause you’re in for a wild one, don’tcha know!

name: Night Fright
summary: Discover a haunting tale of a father, who driven by madness, tragically killed his daughter. Set in a bleak, atmospheric house, you experience the father's deteriorating mind. As the father goes deeper into his own nightmare, he must confront the devastating consequences of his actions.

name: Curse Rounds
summary: Survive random rounds and kill enemies with your pistolflash while choosing a curse card for yourself! No two attempts are the same!

name: Last Half of Darkness
summary: Your aunt sure was a strange one. She was some sort of witch or something. A good witch though, practicing only good spells and magic. In fact, she was working on a potion just before she was killed. Now the secret will go to the grave with her... unless you can find the missing ingredients.

name: Rebound Rivals
summary: Blast into action with your trusty air cannon with gameplay inspired by Air Hockey and additions like traps and power-ups. Play with your friends in the classic game or go all out in the destructive chaos mode where you have more than your opponent to worry about.

name: Get Tilted! :)
summary: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted :)

name: Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol
summary: Take control of a little red robot on a daring mission to escape a factory filled with deadly traps, relentless enemies, and multiple paths in this roguelike platformer that blends fast-paced action with intense gameplay

name: Los Pingheros
summary: Duck, dodge and toss. Los Pingheros is a multiplayer brawler for up to 8 players online or local. Join hectic battles in various modes and strive to become the ultimate Pinghero in Mexico by snowing your opponents out of the arena.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Battle Royale

name: 1000 Seconds
summary: “1000 seconds” is a roguelike shooter where you control a farmer trying to protect his crops from an alien invasion of fruit and vegetables.

name: Ethereal Fracture
summary: An exciting fantasy Roguelike-RPG that immerses you in a constantly changing universe! Randomly generated dungeons, challenging enemies, powerful bosses, equipment, and abilities. Switch between old-school pixel art and modern pixel art as you unravel the mysteries of Ethereal Fracture!

name: An Eternity Gone By
summary: Use your telekinetic powers to hurl watermelons, lamp posts, toilets and more at the monsters roaming this strange yet familiar world. You’ll take the role of Mirai: a young sorceress trying to save her friend from the monsters who’ve abducted her.
storyline:
It is said that every thirty years monsters descend upon Starblast Village. Everyone knows not to leave home during this event - everyone except for Mirai Starblazer.

That night, Mirai convinces her best friend Kako to sneak out and watch the stars. However, during their outing the two are ambushed by monsters and Kako is abducted and taken away to a mysterious world. Mirai ventures after her, not yet realizing just how long this journey will take…
It will take more than one attempt for Mirai to save Kako. Mirai might not have enough time on the first attempt. And with every failed attempt, time will pass and Mirai and the worlds she visits will change.

Follow Mirai through the different phases of her life. With age comes new perspectives as well as new abilities on the battlefield!

name: Shadows in Silence
summary: Shadows in Silence is a 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the killer - the witch Elliana and her cat named Sharm. And the other four players play as survivors trying to neutralize the killer.
storyline: Shadows in Silence – a multiplayer horror game where one player assumes the role of the blind witch Elliana, sensitive to sound, accompanied by her faithful pet named Sharm. The other four players take on the roles of survivors, seeking to avoid a deadly threat and neutralize the killer.

name: 100 lil jumps
summary: Nara the frog has been cursed and can only make 100 jumps. Complete the challenge and break the curse

name: From Nava
summary: In From Nava, you are equipped with only a seemingly ordinary pen, but it possesses the extraordinary ability to unleash magic attacks by drawing specific patterns. You must escape from this abandoned research laboratory by gathering all the keys and polaroids left behind in the aftermath of an unknown incident. Various monsters and puzzles are all that stand in your way from fulfilling a stranger's final wish and unravel the mysteries of the world and yourself.
storyline: In From Nava, you are equipped with only a seemingly ordinary pen, but it possesses the extraordinary ability to unleash magic attacks by drawing specific patterns. You must escape from this abandoned research laboratory by gathering all the keys and polaroids left behind in the aftermath of an unknown incident. Various monsters and puzzles are all that stand in your way from fulfilling a stranger's final wish and unravel the mysteries of the world and yourself.

name: Champion of Andia
summary: CoA is an Action RPG Wave Progression game. Create a character and fight progressively harder waves of enemies in a directional based combat system. As you complete missions - you earn experience and gold to buy better armor and weapons. Play solo, cooperatively or PVP!

name: Astral Throne
summary: Uncover the mystery of a Kingdom beset by a Falling Star's curse in this retro-inspired Roguelike SRPG. Build your party, recruit new allies, and synergize your team's skills for decisive victory.

name: Drill to the Stars
summary: In "Drill to the Stars," you build your OWN base! Guide enemies with walls into traps and eliminate them before they destroy your drill. Strategically adapt to the environment and place the towers cleverly for maximum attack speed in this roguelite tower defense game.

name: Stacky Dash
summary: Dash your hero across the mazes, stack the tiles higher and higher, and reach for the skies!

name: Star Knightess Aura
summary: Follow Aura's adventure as she is thrust into the fantasy world of Roya. What she initially believed to follow the conventional plotline of a "summoned to another world"-story quickly turns into her worst nightmare.

name: Slender Threads
summary: Slender Threads is a point-and-click thriller adventure where unseen forces bind the fate of an unremarkable traveling salesman to the peculiar town he one day arrives in.
storyline: "Discover scenic Villa Ventana, the hillside community of empty stores and emptier people." Not the ideal backdrop for a bestselling novel, but as every writer knows, inspiration can strike in the unlikeliest of places. Within hours of Harvey Green's arrival, that inspiration takes the form of foreboding dreams, impossible coincidences, and hidden motives that set Harvey on the path to uncovering a chilling, fateful truth.

name: Tireless: Prepare For the Adrenaline
summary: Tireless is a Challenging Sci-fi 3D Platformer that takes speed to cosmic levels. As a 'Pacer' robot in space, master movement and evade obstacles at extreme speeds. Easy to pick up but challenging to dominate, this skill-based game offers a thrilling experience, relying solely on your expertise to conquer each meticulously designed level. Enjoy seamless gameplay with responsive controls and complete freedom of movement, offering a truly off-the-rails experience.
storyline:
TIRELESS is a Challenging Sci-fi 3D Platformer taking place in an intergalactic championship in space known as the TIRELESS Tournament. Every year somewhere far in the galaxy the championship begins. Thousands of contestants sign up and try their best to win the title of a legendary speedster.

In TIRELESS the participants pilot specially crafted machines capable of enduring incredible speeds. These machines are called Pacers.
In the game, you will get to pilot a Pacer named Blur and make your way through a long deadly set of levels to prove your worth of entering the tournament.

name: Ice Sisters: Princesses of the Frozen Age
summary: In the magical kingdom of Lunalia, where the seasons are controlled by an ancestral legacy, two sisters inherit the duty of maintaining natural balance.

name: The Exit: Liminal Anomaly Horror
summary: Escape the unknown, survive the unseen.

name: Santa's Christmas Gift Quest
summary: Embark on a magical quest to collect Christmas gifts!

name: Robot Boxing: Real Fighting Steel Battle
summary:
Clash of Titans, Built for Battle!
Unleash Steel Fury, Rule the Arena.
Robot Boxing: Where Legends are Forged!

name: Around the World 2: Travel to Canada - Collector's Edition
summary: An unforgettable vacation in Canada.

name: Hidden Object Adventure Bundle
summary: Get a captivating collection of three exciting hidden object games with gripping plots and unexpected twists!

name: Ambulance Life: Deluxe Edition
summary: Dedicate your life to saving others. As soon as you receive the emergency call, speed off to the site of the accident in your ambulance, sirens wailing. Apply first aid and transport the seriously injured to hospital. Every second counts!

name: Pets
summary: PETS is a platformer puzzle game. You will cross different dimensions and go through the maze, find your dogge.

name: Door Game Deluxe
summary: Door Game Deluxe is a (very) short, satirical RPG. An expansion of the original and the pinnacle of human artistic expression, this version offers original art and music on top of new endings.

name: First Steps in the NICU: Discovery Edition
summary:
Welcome to “First NICU Experience”! Experience neonatal care in this serious game. As a nursing student, work with medical staff and families to care for infants and tackle post-discharge challenges. With interactive choices and story-driven gameplay, learn key skills in 1 hour.

Players take on the role of a nursing student participating in clinical training at a NICU. By collaborating with medical staff and families, you will learn the basics of neonatal intensive care, communication with patient families, and the challenges of transitioning from hospital to home care.

name: Of the Devil: Episode 1
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Unlock the first of five episodic murder mysteries with the Episode 1 DLC for "of the Devil" and dive headfirst into the dark and thrilling corporate conspiracy that unfolds when the father of modern android programming is found dead of apparent suicide.

name: Shopping Fever
summary: Let the shopping fever get the best of you!

name: Arcade Archives: Märchen Maze
summary: “MARCHEN MAZE” is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988. Control the main character, Alice, and take back the Mirror Country, which has been conquered by the evil queen. Use soap bubble attacks and jumps to advance through the area and defeat the boss waiting at the end.

name: Big Helmet Heroes: Exalted Edition
genres: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
summary:
The Exalted Edition includes:
- Big Helmet Heroes
- Artbook & OST

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
summary: An ultra-difficult action game with beautiful pixel art is waiting for you to take on the challenge!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Lunlun Super Hero Babies Plus NewGames
Shogun Soul: Legendary Puzzle
summary:
Beautiful men and women in the guise of Sengoku warlords appear in abundance!
An easy puzzle game anyone can enjoy!

name: Hentai Girls: Juicy Judo
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: The Demon's Room
summary: The Demon's Room is a horror suspense interactive video game. Players need to establish a good feeling with the characters, and the plot triggers and selects to influence the story. The game contains many ways of playing. With the deepening of the plot, players can unlock 11 story endings.

name: Tantalus
summary: You are a patrol staff aboard the spaceship 'Tantalus'. Explore a spaceship filled with mystery, uncover anomalies, and report them to the control AI.

name: Calico: Neat Things
summary:
There's even more to explore in the world of Calico with the Neat Things DLC, including:
New Quest
New Area and NPC
New Animal Companions
Two New Mini-Games
New Café Decorations

name: 100 Hidden Cats: Playground
summary: Hidden Cats Playground is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find all kitties hiden on the map.
developers: Sons of Welder, FM Simple Games Studio

name: Relaxing Jigsaw
summary: Unwind and escape into a peaceful world of jigsaw puzzles! Enjoy 30 beautiful levels featuring serene nature scenes and charming little towns.

name: Silent Forest: Deadly Night Horror
summary: Silent Forest: In this forest, silence is deadly. Hunt or be hunted.

name: Eggconsole Carmine 88 PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Pilot the Armored Fighting Walker, Galleouse and destroy the bio-dolls occupying the secret research facility. A hardcore sci-fi adventure!

name: Bad Parenthood
summary: Survive the nightmare born from your own stories.

name: Cats the Commander for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Too cute Cats "Bump! Bump!" adventure RPG!
"Cats the Commander", popular tower defense game,
is now available on Nintendo Switch!

name: Math Muncher
summary: Math Muncher is a puzzle game where you push blocks to manipulate their values. In each level, the Math Muncher is hungry and demands blocks of a certain value. Keeping the Muncher fed and satisfied to advance to the next level and safely make your way back to civilization.

name: Treflix: Mini Games
summary: Cute and sweet games for everyone!

name: Zumba: The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure
genres: Shooter, Puzzle, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure.

name: Dream Cage
summary: Robert battles early Alzheimer's and nightly sleep paralysis. Each night reveals fragments of his past. Uncover the truth and help him solve the mysteries haunting his mind.

name: Signal
summary: Signal is an immersive action-adventure game made as a student project where you attempt to uncover the mystery behind your old mentor's distress message. To succeed in your mission, you will have to use your martial arts skills and fight off hostile creatures that are trying to stop you.

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Danyang-gun
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage! You can enjoy the actual beautiful natural scenery in high definition

name: Frip and Froop's Logical Labyrinth DX
summary:
Hang on to your test tubes, because Frip and Froop are back! In this full remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

In this remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

name: Throneheir
summary: As the Champion of Avalon Kingdom, the knight Jethro is entrusted with the task of raising and training Prince Magnus, he who carries in his blood the prophecy that shall set the Kingdom free. On his journey to prepare the young Prince, he will learn about fatherhood, love and betrayal.

name: Drunk Builder Simulator
summary: A construction simulator where one of the players plays the role of a foreman who has to catch drunk players. And the rest of the drunk players have to run, hide and search for alcohol on the construction site to survive.

name: Escape Together: Secrets of the Professor
summary: Gather your best problem solving friends or go in alone in this VR Escape Room game, that features both singleplayer and multiplayer with cross platform support. Can you uncover the secrets of the professor and escape?

name: The Liar's Tavern
summary: Outwit, deceive, survive—where every lie could be your last.

name: Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum
summary: Train gladiators, conquer the arena, build your legacy!

name: Trading Card Shop Simulator
summary: Turn your card collecting dream into a real business!

name: Murder Is Game Over: The Blackinton Curse
summary: A new stand-alone murder mystery in the Murder Is Game Over series. Can you break the 150-year-old family curse before it claims another victim?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: Deluxe Edition

name: Bauhaus Bonk
summary: In this single-player game of skill, the movement is not straightforward. Switch between pivot points to maneuver your way through Bauhaus art-inspired arcade levels. Avoid obstacles, reach the goal and beat the high score!

name: Keep Driving
summary: An atmospheric management RPG about life on the open road. Pick up hitchhikers, work odd jobs, customize and repair your car, and map your route across the country. Use upgrades, skills and items to overcome challenges. And remember to take it easy. You’re young. You have time.

name: Grandpa High on Retro
summary: Grandpa goes on a retro, third-person, action-adventure game, with his grandson after he got a phone call.

name: Big Helmet Heroes
genres: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat'em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

name: Last Outpost
summary: Last Outpost is a minimalist Base Building & Strategy game where you build and defend your outpost in zombie apocalypse.

name: Sworn
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Sworn is a 1-4 player co-op action rogue-like. Explore and reclaim a fallen Camelot from the reign of a corrupted Arthur and his Knights of the round table.

name: Border Pioneer
summary: You! the most outstanding pioneer who graduated from this kingdom, are finally about to embark on your legendary journey. Construct towns across various levels to fend off waves of attacks from diverse enemies until you establish a firm footing and complete your exploration!

name: Valkyrie Squad: Siege Breakers
summary: "Valkyrie Squad: Siege Breakers" is an exhilarating top-down shooter survival game. The mission is to break through the enemy's fortified defenses and face extreme survival conditions. you will lead this brave squad, utilizing each member's unique skills and defeat powerful enemies!

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Dedicate your life to saving others. As soon as you receive the emergency call, speed off to the site of the accident in your ambulance, sirens wailing. Apply first aid and transport the seriously injured to hospital. Every second counts!

name: Maza
summary: The protagonist does not want to lose his home because of the ambitions of his sister and her cynical husband! Oleg Mazapov wants to get the required amount of money to solve his housing problem, but it turns into unexpected consequences...

name: Everwarder
summary: Everwarder is a 2D tower defense with elements of roguelite. Defend the crystal against endless streams of enemies while exploring the world. Design your defense and keep up with constantly rising difficulty by acquiring powerful artifacts, evolve units, progress in upgrade tree and more!
storyline: You are a mote of light shining in the dark. You are also the only thing standing in the way of the approaching darkness. There are no phases or waves in Everwarder - there's you, your units, and a procedurally-generated world with unique challenges for each run. How long will you last until you're snuffed out and forced to return to limbo?

name: Stray Path
genres: Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Stray Path is an adventure and strategy game combining FreeCell and roguelike card. There are different characters and venturing in a randomly generated world. Dragging cards like FreeCell, optimizing choices, selecting equipment & items, discovering the truth of a stray world!

name: Strangers on Paper
summary: What better place to find a muse than among strangers in a bar? In a quest for inspiration, your choices will dictate how you navigate reconnecting with people from your past and helping each other towards a better present and future.

name: Polygeddon: Survive
summary: You are on an island where everyone wants to kill you, ranging from weather conditions to dangerous enemies, your goal is to survive. Survive alone or together. Build, craft, grow, explore, fight!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Spacepunk Survival
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Spacepunk Survival is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game where you must survive hordes of deadly aliens in a derelict space station, all of that with beautiful and dark retro aesthetics.

name: Seed of Pandora: Legend of the Gaia Tree
summary: Embark on an epic adventure across the continent of Pandora as you meet helpful companions along the way that will become lifelong friends. Discover the many secrets of this fully realized 16 bit style world. Beautiful anime cutscenes bring the story to life with gorgeous hand drawn art.

name: Of the Devil
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Immerse yourself in neon, smoke, and high-stakes legal gambles as a Defense Attorney with uniquely Killer insights in this diabolically stylish visual novel adventure game.
storyline:
THE YEAR IS 2086.

There's a camera in every device and a half dozen devices on every citizen. There are tracking implants in every cybernetic and location tags on every bullet. No stone goes unturned- and every stone is accounted for.

Violent crimes are cleared in 97% of cases.

The few cases that make it to trial result in a guilty verdict 98% of the time.

People are safer now than at any other time in history, and getting away with murder is nearly impossible.

So if you find yourself wrongly accused...

Better have the right lawyer.

name: Survivor: Stay in the Light
summary: Stay in the light, hunt the dark. Create your own hero through the four dimensions of role, skill, talent, and blessing outside the battle. In the battle, choose the most suitable equipment and weapons strategically to improve your strength and continue to fight.

name: Last Monarch
summary: You are the Demon Lord Kuro on a mission to protect demonkind. Use your abilities to capture and ensnare others. Tumble with different personalities in this 2D rogue-lite shooter!

name: Let's Cook Together 2
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Let's Cook Together 2 is a plot-driven co-op game. Use teamwork to fight against Nutri Inc. - a dystopian food government. Cook and serve dishes like the future depended on it. Travel across the world to make cooking meaningful again. Take back the taste.

name: Ailuri
summary: A hand-drawn, 2D platformer following the breathtaking story of an endangered red panda, named Ailuri. Climb, explore and survive the intricate levels while trying to defeat enemies to restore balance of life in the world.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Triple Jump
summary: Triple Jump is an auto-running puzzle platformer where you have a library of different "jumps" that you can assign in any combination to three slots. You are then faced with levels that require some combination of those jumps to solve.

name: Bubble Battle Blast 3D
summary: Bubble Battle Blast 3D is a retro arcade third-person shooter in which a spaceship battles its way through 8 arenas in which a guard drone protects bubbles. Earn ship-enhancing items and temporary power-ups by blasting bubbles with lasers, Earn bonus points after each arena to upgrade faster.
storyline:
A struggle for freedom has dragged on across the galaxy for ages. One brave soul after another has battled their way through the bubble arenas, searching for L4‐CZ4R to destroy it and free the occupied planets from its control. If you are destined to be the one who defeats L4‐CZ4R you must defend yourself from the arena guards and utilize the ship upgrades held within some bubbles found in the arenas.

Completed in 2045, L4‐CZ4R is the first and last artificiamaton. It began with an A.I. brain trained for two decades on the brains of its creators, a group calling themselves TEXNOX7 comprised of seven of the wealthiest men in what was then the United States.

Soon, L4‐CZ4R created a secondary A.I. living within its memory.

For centuries the physical manifestation of technological singularity has done what it was trained to do: consume and destroy.

name: Fun Puzzles Premium Bundle
summary:
This bundle contains: Punch Monk (Xbox Series, Xbox One and Windows), Slime Ranger (Xbox One and Windows) and SokoNature (Play anywhere).

Punch Monk: is a challenging puzzle game with 50 phases of incremental progression. As players advance, new mechanics are introduced, increasing the game's complexity.

Slime Ranger: You are on a quest to find and defeat the Slime King. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

SokoNature: The game has 50 levels, with increasing difficulty and the introduction of new mechanics as the player progresses. The character can have three distinct sizes: small, medium, and large. The character will grow in size whenever they collect a seed (see collectible items) and shrink one size when they take damage (see board tiles/enemies).

name: Fun Puzzles Bundle
summary:
This bundle contains: Punch Monk (Xbox Series), Slime Ranger (Xbox One) and SokoNature (Play anywhere).

Punch Monk: is a challenging puzzle game with 50 phases of incremental progression. As players advance, new mechanics are introduced, increasing the game's complexity.

Slime Ranger: You are on a quest to find and defeat the Slime King. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

SokoNature: The game has 50 levels, with increasing difficulty and the introduction of new mechanics as the player progresses. The character can have three distinct sizes: small, medium, and large. The character will grow in size whenever they collect a seed (see collectible items) and shrink one size when they take damage (see board tiles/enemies).

name: Punch Monk
summary: Punch Monk is a grid-based puzzle game with RPG attributes (Health, Attack and Defense). Players must battle enemies, who share similar attributes, survive and reach the destination alive.

name: Edict
summary: Welcome to Edict! Take up the role of a fortunate judgement agent sent to destroy the word of Nowherehoods soul engine!

name: American Cooking Simulator
summary: What's more American than Fast Food? How about cooking it with guns! Switch between individual weapons to move ingredients, cook and deliver them to your customers before they lose their patience.

name: Neffy: Moonlight Labyrinth
summary: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is a single-player action-puzzle game created specifically for the VR platform. Summoned to the VR world, you control Neffy, a girl who can transform into a cat, while manipulating the labyrinth's gimmicks to reach the labyrinth's exit.

name: Gelluloid Domination
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Simulator, Strategy, Tactical, Indie
