summary: Gelluloid Domination is a fast-paced strategy game of fantasy biology. Start with a single fragile cell and expand across the network, assimilating rivals to grow your gel-powered army. Evolve mutations, unlock new abilities, and outmaneuver deadly pathogens. Adapt and conquer, expand or be consumed. Every decision shapes the network — will you achieve total domination?

name: Duck Duck Adventure
summary: Duck Duck Adventure is a 2D top-down roguelike with deck-building mechanics. Play as a duck disguised as various characters to defend a village from invading monsters and bosses. Trade for equipment, craft unique card builds, grow stronger, and survive waves of enemies to claim victory.

name: Young Kong: The Myth of the Magic Throne
summary: In a fantasy kingdom where animals rule, the balance and unity of the valley has been destroyed after the loss of its magical throne.

name: Project 1337: The Well
summary: You awaken in a bunker, at the bottom of an unknown pit, where each floor brings waves of alien enemies and a single purpose: to test you. Who are you? Why are you here? Move forward, survive, and uncover the secrets buried deep within.

name: Unlucky Chicken
summary: An unlucky chicken fell to the bottom of a ravine and was injured. It can no longer fly smoothly, but now it just wants to go home and hopes you can help it.

name: Forest Runner
summary: The game is a platform runner. The game is also suitable for offline play. The game is designed to just take a break from the action games and just walk around. You can just walk around the map, you can try to embed your files for yourself. The main task is to try to find way to get out from there.

name: Foss Park
summary: Foss Park is a psychological horror VN that takes you deep into the fractured mind of a nameless patient in an unsettling mental hospital. You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, haunted by fleeting images of a life destroyed—a house fire, a lost family, and echoes of a forgotten tragedy.

name: The Invading Dark
summary: A single player survival horror game where creatures are invading from the dark and hunting the inhabitants. You must survive and find different pages of notes to get an escape route to safety.

name: CCSS07: 64 Squares of Purple
summary: Crispy Chicken Chillzone discord server came together once more for a speedmap event. This time we have purple hue-shifted palette. All 256 lines had to be at 90 degrees to each other, and using 64 grid. The result is 36 maps, split into 4 episodes - castle, space, flesh, jungle.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Casey Jones & the Junkyard Jam
genres: Fighting, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Casey Jones joins the fight in this fast-paced, action-packed DLC! Battle through the Junkyard, face new enemies and bosses, and collect new powerful artifacts. Master Casey's hard-hitting moves and team up with the Turtles in co-op to take on the Punk Frogs!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Underward
summary: UNDERWARD is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Investigators must carry «TEST-SUBJECT» monsters from a deadly underground abandoned hospital ward.

name: T1wre3: Noname
summary: Hi, I am Noname! Can you solve my puzzle? Dive into a world of riddles and uncover the hidden six-digit keys to advance. With challenging puzzles, hints to guide you, and secrets to discover, this game tests your logic and wit. Solve every enigma and claim for the victory.

name: Tulips & Windmills
summary: Hoi! Ensure your windmill runs consistently and your tulip fields are harvested. This clicker game will bring you closer to the iconic Dutch culture. Expect random events and make use of upgrades to increase your tulip wealth! Veel succes!

name: Mechanita
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Puzzle your way through a steampunk world of precision platforming and roving robots!

name: New Year Simulator 2025
summary: In the game you will have to survive the pre-holiday bustle, celebrate the New Year, and then enjoy the peace after the New Year's lull. Relax and feel the atmosphere of the most important holiday of the year!

name: Space Thugs
summary: Space Thugs, join the space thugs as they got on an adventure across the universe. Includes strip clubs.

name: Looney Landers
summary: Looney Landers is a fast-paced arcade party game for 1-2 players. Skydive into a whirlwind of chaos as you compete against friends, family, or the CPU to claim the top spot on the leaderboards in this score-chasing frenzy!

name: Rogue Monster Rush
summary: Rogue Monster Rush is a blend of roguelike and tower defense. Collect and command an array of monster defenders, unleash strategic player abilities, unlock tons of upgrades, to defend your town from the invading robots.

name: Aether Collector
summary: A surreal point-and-click adventure about harvesting mysterious Aether in an abandoned town. As a new corporate hire, explore a reality-bending anomaly, uncover dark secrets, and confront existential horrors while questioning the true nature of your mission.

name: Welcome Back, Commander
summary: Commander, your strike team is to dive deep into the contaminated city of Sun Stone and get some answers before the mysterious deadly plague spreads beyond the city limits. Good luck Commander!

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Mai
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Mai is the third DLC character in the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass. The successor of Shiranui-style ninja arts. A charming kunoichi who is as dedicated to love as she is to training. Loves cooking, Japanese dressmaking, flower arrangement, and traditional Japanese dance.

name: Crystal Eyes
summary: Crystal Eyes is an Indie pixelart action adventure game with RPG touches.

name: Neon Runners
summary: Select a runner with special abilities, create a power-up deck, and race! Craft your custom tracks using a user-friendly map editor. Explore various game modes such as Co-Op, Boss Battles, Floor is Lava, and Puzzle Rush. And it's free! Play cross-platform on PC & Mobile.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Battle Royale

name: Starlight Legacy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Forge your own legacy in Starlight Legacy! Explore the vast Evaria Kingdom in beautiful 2D pixel art graphics, an exciting turn-based battle system, and a non-linear story.

name: While Waiting
platforms: Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: A transformative adventure exploring the art of waiting. Clear the game by doing nothing, but discover the power of acceptance and patience in 100+ situations from birth to death. Learn to embrace life as you wait.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer
summary: The NecroDancer's back in a brand new rhythm game spinoff! Help Cadence navigate the modern world while repairing the rifts that have torn her life apart. Do rhythmic battle via rift mode, minigames, and boss battles! All to the beat of a brand new soundtrack from Danny Baranowsky & friends.
developers: Brace Yourself Games, Tic Toc Games

name: Red Tower
summary: The most violent creatures from darkness were arrested inside the Red Tower. An evil force capable of destroying it was discovered, putting all of mankind at risk. Shoot the monsters, upgrade your weapons, rise to more challenging levels, and destroy 'em all 'til not a single one is left!

name: Locks
summary: Locks is a horror puzzle-platformer set in a puppet show. The game features a new type of puzzle and a fresh way to scare you. Are you a spectator, participant, or victim?

name: Hereford 1642
summary: Hereford 1642 is a historically based recreation of my home city of Hereford in England UK from the year 1642. I have pieced together a picture of the city as it once was. Take a step into 17th century life and experience history in full 3D with realistic graphics.

name: DeathOmen
summary: DeathOmen is a psychological horror game in first person, in which you'll have to spend a few nights in a house that hides mysteries and fears that you didn't know, or didn't remember they existed!

name: TopplePop: Bungee Blockbusters
summary: A new breed of co-op physics-puzzle esport for 1-4 players. Swing, throw, stack, topple and POP! Guide bendy animal acrobats on bungees and race to rescue your pals from a chaotic clutter of blocks. Easy to learn but with incredible depth in team-tactics, battles, speedruns and more.
storyline: TopplePOP is physics puzzle action with bendy animal acrobats on bungee cords, for 1-4 players. Designed for solo and team play in eSports battles, speedrun leaderboards & spectacular couch co-op parties. Become champions! Or don't, and chill with an endless variety of zen puzzles.

name: The Dungeon Paradox
summary: A genre-defining phase-based tactical RPG

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: M41D
summary: This light tank for World War II mode has the accuracy, view range, and reload time to make you a quick-firing active scout and a key support player on your team.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Vipers Starter Pack
summary: Get a grip on this DLC bundle packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match.

name: Model Casting
summary: You are in the role of the owner of an exclusive adult modeling agency. Your mission is to discover and mentor aspiring models, each with distinct personalities and backgrounds. Engage in immersive dialogues where your choices influence relationships and unlock intimate moments.

name: Destiny 2: Heresy - Act 1
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: The Dreadnaught has returned. Gather your allies and bring order to chaos as shadows gather in the galaxy. Descend into the ship and stem the Taken tide before it overwhelms Earth in the new three-player activity. the Nether.

name: Super Duper Multitasking
summary: This collection of 24 minigames is presented as a multitasking test. Featuring a unique split-screen display and intuitive control scheme, this expanded version of 2018's Super Multitasking trains--and challenges--you to play up to 3, 4, or even 5 minigames at a time. Tons of modes and features, customizable difficulty, a 2-player Versus mode, 100 challenging Missions, and hundreds of Leaderboards round out the package.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Side view

name: Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Purchase the Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle and receive the Spinning Seat Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Heresy, cosmetics, and more!

name: Elves: The Enchanted Magic Heart
summary: In a magical forest where every creature and plant is connected by an ancient power called the Heart of the Forest, life begins to fall apart.

name: Omashu Dash
summary: Dash down a series of tunnels and aim to complete the level as fast as you can!

name: MultiVersus: Season 5
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Season 5 marks the final update of MultiVersus before shutting down on May 30th, 2025. This season will include a free battlepass where you can unlock Aquaman, as well as a daily log-in that unlocks Lola Bunny.
developers: Player First Games, Streamline Games, WB Games New York

name: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Valentine
summary: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Valentine is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming St.Valentine Day-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

name: The Dispatcher
summary: Step into the role of Dominic, a dispatcher in Heavenbrook, where your choices shape a gripping visual novel and adventure game filled with suspense, mystery, and dark secrets. Unravel the chilling mysteries as the shocking events in the city unfold before you.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Collectors' Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Collector’s Edition
This is the ultimate in Kingdom Come: Deliverance II goodness. You’ll get everything that’s found in the Gold Edition – the standard edition, Expansion Pass and Gallant Huntsman’s Kit plus the Lion's Crest Bonus Quest. What’s more, you’ll also get a statue of Henry and his trusty steed, Pebbles; the exclusive cloth map Alleys of Kuttenberg; the enamel pin set Coats of Valor; the iconic Letter of Hope - which Sir Hans Capon was entrusted with; and the King’s Rebels collectable cards set.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Day One Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: A thrilling story-driven action RPG, with a rich open world, set in 15th century Medieval Europe. Experience the ultimate medieval adventure - through the eyes of young Henry - as you embark on a journey of epic proportions.

name: City of Nightmares
summary: You are a detective who wants to investigate how all the inhabitants of a city died due to a virus. It all started in a hotel that was abandoned along with the city, and it was rumored to be haunted. You are on a quest for answers.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Gold Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
The crown jewel of every noble’s chest: it’s got everything, whether you’re a Kingdom Come: Deliverance aficionado or newcomer to the series.
The Gold Edition of Kingdom Come: Deliverance II contains the standard edition, Expansion Pass and the Gallant Huntsman’s Kit.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: A thrilling story-driven action RPG, with a rich open world, set in 15th century Medieval Europe. Experience the ultimate medieval adventure - through the eyes of young Henry - as you embark on a journey of epic proportions.
storyline: You are Henry of Skalitz – an ordinary man doing extraordinary things – caught in a gripping tale of revenge, betrayal and discovery as he embarks on an epic journey, 'from a humble blacksmith's forge to the court of Kings', as he searches for purpose in this beautiful but brutal medieval world.

name: Lonely Tiny Spaceship
summary: Lonely Tiny Spaceship is a single-player shooter with survival elements. Destroy hordes of enemies, extract resources from their debris and develop your ship to increase its firepower and survivability. This game is for fans of construction sets and bullet hell!
storyline: Now is the distant future... Controlled by advanced and experimental artificial intelligence, the ship was caught in an electromagnetic storm, as a result of which the interstellar navigator was damaged. In order to find the way back “home,” the only hope left is to make periodic interstellar jumps, guided by the stars. But, as you might expect, the vast space is full of unknown dangers... Good luck!

name: Enso
summary: Slingshot your way to the top of a beautiful minimalist landscape. A deceptively tricky platformer where a single slip could lead to a long fall back down!

name: Blood Bar Tycoon
summary: Blood Bar Tycoon is a vampire bar management game. Build bars and blood factories, lure humans to harvest their blood, process it, and serve your customers: other vampires. Research quirky machines and deal with hunters! Expand through Crimson City to become a mighty Elder!
developers: Clever Trickster Productions, Clever Trickster Studio

name: Traveler: Set Sail
summary: This is a semi-real-time tactical adventure RPG game. Adventure and battle in a high-freedom fantasy world! Meet different companions and embark on an adventure together. Different regions are inhabited by various types of creatures, awaiting your exploration.

name: Froggies at the Zoo
summary: Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.

name: Follow the Leader
summary: You live in a world where men called barons have all the power, and you were raised as a servant for one until earning enough to buy your freedom, but that freedom is jeopardized when witnessing the baron's abuse of his lab-grown harem of perfect women because they refuse to sleep with him.

name: Xiuzhen Idle
summary: This is a xiuzhen simulation placement game! From the refining of qi, building the foundation to the ascension of the celestial realm, crossed into the divine realm.

name: Studio System: Guardian Angel
summary: An investigation of a secret film studio underneath their school has lead 3 students down an estranged rabbit hole. With the fixed-camera as your weapon, shine a light on the truth and save your friends.

name: The Aquatic Messenger
summary: Explore microscopic messengers of time inspired by micropaleontology and plankton research! Can ancient forms of plankton from over 10,000 years ago help us understand the future of freshwater ecology? Sound like a scifi movie? Actually, these are the realities of real world plankton!

name: The Wickie
summary: 1936. Junior Lighthouse Keeper Bill Cromarty is sent to the remote Hebridean island of St Pandora's Rock to learn from veteran lighthouse keeper Captain Malin and descend into a world of cults, madness, and terrifying deeps.

name: BattleCore Arena
summary: BattleCore Arena is a free to play competitive platform shooter where gravity mastery is the key to victory. Use your trusted weapons and abilities to eject your opponents out of the arena in style. Glory awaits you, take the plunge!

name: We Are Soccer
summary: Join the soccer craze and become part of the ultimate hangout experience with endless possibilities.

name: Assassin's Shadows
summary: Assassin's Shadows is a game where you play as legendary shinobi taking on an apprentice, a young samurai woman, Aira, from a fallen clan that wishes to learn from you and avenge her clan through becoming a legendary shinobi herself.

name: Core Trials
summary: Core Trials is a motion-based, pixel-art bullet hell you play using just your webcam. Move your body to control the core, protect it, and survive intense trials. Immerse yourself in high-octane action and uncover the true power of your core!
storyline:
Amargi, a realm once teeming with life, its lands blessed by nature’s harmony. From the cold crowns of Arctoria in the North to the endless deserts of Shamsara in the South, balance was preserved by the Masters, elemental guardians sworn to protect the world's sacred order.

But that balance was shattered. From the underworld rose an evil beyond comprehension. His legion swept across the land, twisting life into decay. Cities crumbled, forests withered, and the people of Kuru, once the heart of civilization, became prisoners in their own world.

The Masters fought, but even their might could not turn the tide. Desperation took hold as hope faded, until a child was found. Marked by an immense power within their Core, they became the last hope against the darkness.

Why are you here? What is the true nature of the Core? What happens if you fail?

The Trials have been set. Survive, grow stronger, and uncover the truth buried within Amargi’s past.

name: It's Raining Acorn!
summary: It’s Raining Acorn! is an idle pachinko drafting game where strategy meets nature in a beautifully crafted, vertically scrolling forest. It sits on the side of your desktop and you can leave it running while you work, but good luck focusing when you see those acorns bounce, roll, and trigger satisfying combos across your custom-built forest.

name: Hentai: Ultimate Puzzle
summary: Enjoy this puzzle game with beautiful girls and stunning animations.

name: Oplero
summary: Soar your way through 4 worlds and defeat fearsome bosses on the search for your lost friend. Discover the true nature of the world and reconnect.

name: Karaoke Animal Party: Sing & Dance
summary: Sing, dance and have fun with 5 adorable animals in magical settings while enjoying the loudest karaoke for kids with 25 songs full of fun and joy!

name: Bumble Brawlers
platforms: Linux, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac
summary: Bumble Brawlers is an exhilarating top-down shooter that lets you dive into chaotic battles with fully customizable characters, unique companions, and powerful upgrades. Enter a world where survival is your only goal as you navigate dungeons, face endless enemy waves, and conquer a series of challenging maps with wave-based combat.

name: Spared!
summary: Be the last pin standing! Hop around and avoid a variety of unique bowlers with their eyes all set on one thing - striking you down.

name: Pacifish: Recast
summary: An incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

name: Winken
summary: Winken: The rhythmic piano game where you read real sheet music, on a real score! Ready to rethink your definition of piano game and rhythm game? Beginner or Expert, get ready to discover something new with Winken: a game where you really play music.

name: Una ad Astra
summary: Una ad Astra is a turn-based tactical fantasy RPG, where you get to play not one, but two heroes. Mix and match skills from 7 different classes to defeat sneaky goblins and mighty dragons.

name: Card Attack: Gabee's Roads
summary: Card Attack is a Card Deck Building based roguelike game. Collect cards, enhance them with relics and skills, and defeat your enemies!

name: Ducky Clicker
summary: Discover the universe of Ducky Clicker, an idle game full of unique rubber ducks. Click, expand your collection, and unlock divine powers, quantum ducks, and more. Rule the world of ducks as you ascend to infinity!

name: Who am I?
summary: A man named Mark, who struggles to make ends meet, receives a letter informing him that his aunt has passed away. Despite their troubled past, Mark decides to investigate what happened, hoping to uncover the truth and perhaps find a chance for a better life.

name: Battle Mayhem
summary: Dive into the action-packed world of Battle Mayhem, a fast-paced multiplayer showdown where strategy, skill, and creativity are your ultimate weapons! Designed for endless fun and fierce competition, Battle Mayhem pits two players against each other in a thrilling fight to be the last one standing.

name: 3.14 Idle
summary: Unlock the digits of Pi in this addictive clicker game! Solve puzzles, boost your power, and search for rare patterns as you progress up to 100 million digits. Perfect for fans of math, strategy, and idle gameplay. Start your journey into the world of Pi today!

name: 1989 After the War
summary: An atomic war has reduced the world to a heap of ruins. However, there are still those who refuse to give up and seek to bring justice even in this chaos. Use your blade, granades and shotgun to fight your way through this post-apocalyptic scrolling action-platformer in pure 80s arcade style.

name: Chained Heroes
summary: Can you reach the top, or will the water pull you down?

name: Silence-Dream
summary: 《Silence Dream》is a indie puzzle game. you could take on the role of musican, change or retain different abilities and take it into difference scence, gradually uncovering the man's past.

name: Surviving the Apocalypse Is More Fun When There’s Sex
summary: Embark on a perilous journey through a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where survival is paramount and moral choices shape your fate. Forge deep connections and explore the depths of desire amidst the chaos of a world on the brink of collapse.

name: Malachite: Temple of the Sun
summary: Temple-trotting, sphere-shooting fun!

name: Mesh Replica
summary: Enter the sci-fi clash of this hide-and-seek game. Play as one of four mighty Hunters armed with high-tech gadgets to track down elusive Slugs. Or slip into the slimy skin of up to twelve Slugs, mastering sneaky and ingenious abilities, while hiding by morphing into various objects.

name: Voyeur Villa: Harem Manager
summary: Will you be able to handle a harem of kinky girls? Voyeur Villa is the safehaven for voyeurs, coming to watch the sexy shows starring you and your staff full of cute, exhibitionist girls. Grow your business through the nightly shows, carefully orchestrated to fit the guests' viewing desires!

name: Trials of Randoom
summary: Trials Of Randoom is a unique puzzle game with immense challenges and great mysteries. Each level is unique and your experience will be unforgettable as you solve the puzzles to advance through the different levels.

name: Neko-sama no Kominka kara no Dasshutsu
Wild Rumble
summary: Wild Rumble is a 3v3 roguelike soccer game in which you'll evolve your team as you score goals through dangerous arenas. Unlock new characters, master their abilities and pick the best upgrades to lead your team to victory!

name: World End Diner
summary: Run a diner on the last island in the world after the destruction of humankind! For the cute animals and robots that survived, cook delicious food, run a farm, explore the forest, and create the best diner!

name: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One
summary: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To is an action-puzzle game set in a lush, narrative-driven world of witchy demons. Cast spells, be queer, & crash the biggest concert of the year!
storyline: Samar is a young witch working the spirit-swapping night shift in the eastern outskirts of Demashq. A recent spike in spirits crossing over from another dimension breaks the chill atmosphere of their night shift. With her trusty familiarZ by her side, she sets off into the city to find out what’s happened. With a popular band scheduled to kick off their big comeback tour in Demashq, Samar needs to work quickly before the city is overrun with stans and spirits alike....not to mention, they've got a pizza party to plan!

name: Megafist
summary: Megafist is a Punch'em up action roguelite, where you'll fight progressively stronger waves of Corporate Devils by powering up your Fist.

name: The Pow-er
summary:
That there The POW-er is a punchslinger to the manner born, though she ain't exactly among the warmest of 'em. She's got places to be and bones to crush. Of such appointments she travels to and from by means of locomotive. She ain't in the business of lettin' strangers take her spot at the trainhouse neither — and to The POW-er, everybody's a stranger.

Crash through three unique stages and get The POW-er to the station before the train arrives, with enough strength to uproot whatever poor soul finds themselves sat at the single seat this side of the Milky Way that'll quickest get them a knuckle to the nose... Not that The POW-er needs your help none anyhow.

This game was created in seven days for the Bigmode Game Jam 2025.

name: Brelok: Nezumi-tachi no Dasshutsu
summary: “BRELOK - Escape of the mice -” is a cooperative escape game exclusively for two players. Play together with your family, friends, or your significant other.

name: Harry McLinestrider
summary: McLinestrider is a chill guy who really only cares about his pay and benefits. His job only has one rule. DONT. BE. LATE. If he doesn’t hurry, HIS LIFE WILL BE OVER. Don’t be scared though, as this isn’t his first time almost being late. He’ll make it.

name: Roulette Rush
summary: The setting is a demonic casino with bosses themed around different casino games- Black Jack, Bingo, Slot Machines, and yourself with a Roulette themed weapon. Earn chips, place bets, and become more powerful!

name: NekoSpin
summary: The gaming-obsessed magical girl decides to save a world corrupted by monsters. Pull the cat charm, spin the slot machine on her wand, and defeat the dark creatures!

name: DrillHead
summary: Drill through the deeps of the Earth and fight against King Moles, Evil Skulls, Weird Tourists and more!

name: Little Adventurer Treasure Hunt
summary: A game focused on object-finding. The story revolves around helping alien friends who have been forced to land on Earth due to an "accident". Assist them in searching for scattered items, parts, and their lost crew members across various locations.

name: Save Me My Hero
summary: ’Save Me, My Hero’ is a defense game with roguelike elements. Complete your own battle style with the hero's various skills and special abilities.

name: Virgin Simulator
summary: Virgin wants to find a girlfriend

name: SCP Foundation: Universe Horror
summary: Venture into the chilling world of the SCP Foundation with "SCP Foundation: Universe Horror." As a containment operative, you'll explore a realm where reality warps and unknown dangers await. Through a gripping found-footage perspective, your team must confront horrific entities, solve complex puzzles, and survive in a constantly shifting environment.

name: Heinz Honor and Revenge
summary: Heinz Honor & Revenge is a beat 'em up game that offers an action-packed experience with a deep story and challenging puzzles. Players will take on the role of Heinz, a secret agent fighting for his country against various threats from ruthless criminal syndicates.

name: Escape Depths of Immanis
summary: Escape the treacherous depths of Immanis, where danger lurks at every turn. Navigate through dark and mysterious caverns, harvest valuable resources, and outsmart relentless enemies as you fight to reach the surface. Will you survive the depths and find your way to freedom?

name: Zaraq
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder where you have access to a forbidden arcade from the 80's. Craft the best deck of symbols, artifact and spells to score the maximum amount of points to beat Zaraq.

name: Mr. Goofer’s Mini Game Arcade Party!
genres: Point-and-click, Fighting, Shooter, Platform, Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Quiz/Trivia, Pinball, Indie, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: A collection of over 30 arcade-inspired retro mini games, each with their own unique genre and style! It's a back-to-back marathon of playable, pixelated old-fashioned fun! What’s the highest score that YOU can reach?
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Side view
storyline: Welcome to the arcade, it's a ball to be played! Play a variety of over 30 different brand new retro-inspired mini games, as if it were a gaming night out in the 1980s/90s! Go from classic pinball, to puzzles, to platformers, to shoot-'em-ups, maze chasers, adventure games, a rhythm game (with a custom song editor!), PLUS point-and-click games, tabletop games, billiards, and even some gambling! You unlock each mini game one by one as you go along. Complete all of the mini games while getting to the absolute highest score that you can possibly reach! Starring the one and only Goofer the Gopher, It's an indie bonanza extravaganza!

name: True Idle Simulator 2
summary: How long can You do nothing?
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Psionic Sentry: Infinite
summary: "Psionice Sentry: Infinite" is a third-person beautiful girl action shooting and tower defense game. A gameplay focused on combat and skill selection

name: Electigirl: High Tension Beauty
summary: A retro and free-scrolling shoot 'em up. The plot follows a city being drained of electric supply by otherworldly invaders.
storyline: The year is OO80 and the city is being drained of electric supply by otherworldly invaders.

name: Video Game Grid
summary: Browser-based video game trivia with daily 3x3 puzzles to solve and share results. Powered by IGDB.

name: The New Apartment
summary: A man living in his new apartment finds himself in the center of something much more sinister.

name: Nirvana
summary: Wake up and embrace your new powers. In this Bullet Hell Fast-FPS, dare to take on mystical creatures to defeat the God Raj. Nirvana awaits...
storyline: A mystical temple with many facets, from sacred halls to forgotten crypts, all linked by a mysterious power of divine might, awaits you. On your quest, discover lost artifacts, battle corrupted creatures and restore the sacred balance.

name: Dark Age Asunder
summary:
Bullet Heaven Survivor meets Kingdom Builder/Tower Defense

Your village has been burned to the ground
by the evil king and his sorcerer.

Collect resources to rebuild your village.

Build structures to gain abilities and take vengeance on the king and his hordes!

name: Dinobreak: Crisis Collection
summary: Dinosaurs have returned in this '90s horror nightmare collection!

name: TDS Legacy
summary:
TDS Legacy is a classic 2D MMORPG developed in Argentina. It is an open-source game inspired by Ultima Online, featuring a medieval fantasy world where players can explore, fight monsters, complete quests, and engage in PvP combat. The game allows players to choose from different races (such as humans, elves, and dwarves) and professions (warrior, mage, thief, among others).

One of its most distinctive features is its hardcore PvP system, where players can attack and loot others freely, making survival a challenge. The game also includes guild wars, magic spells, and crafting mechanics. Over the years, various community-driven servers have emerged, each with unique modifications and custom content. Despite its simple graphics and retro gameplay, Argentum Online has maintained a dedicated player base for decades.

name: Luna's Cathouse
summary: a nice fun cat clicker game with maps and more but right now in beta
storyline: click this cat to get Luna Coins and buy new cats

name: Cafemart Simulator
summary: Create and decorate your cozy cafe, where guests can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Expand your service with a supermarket offering a wide selection of fresh products, so visitors can not only have a tasty meal but also do some shopping. Play solo or with friends in cooperative mode!

name: Hidden Nemesis
summary: Survive six nights of terror in a deadly cat-and-mouse game. Immobilized in a chair, solve intricate puzzles, monitor cameras, and scour the dark web to uncover secrets—all while a relentless demon hunts you. Will you outsmart the darkness before time runs out?

name: Those Who Crawl VR
summary: Crawl through tight cave tunnels and avoid monsters in this claustrophobic VR spelunking game. Escape inhuman monsters and deadly environments as the cave walls turn to flesh.

name: Astrorun
summary: Play as an interstellar astronaut who needs to be an expert jumper by jumping across the ground of several different planets in near-zero gravity.

name: Mushroom Island
summary: Do you want to have a small island of your own? Come here, this is an idle building game. “Power over mushroom is power over all”，Mushrooms are the most precious food here. In order to produce more mushrooms, you need to gather resources, expand the island, upgrade buildings, and train workers.

name: Melon Clicker
summary: Click the melon to accumulate points. Ideal for short breaks or unwinding.

name: Regenti Rebelia
summary: Adelia has never quite understood her place in the world—raised with lofty expectations and forced into a mold she's desperate to break. She often dreams of a different life of normalcy, self-expression, and a weight lifted off her shoulders. Two things stand in her way—her royal title and her overly protective personal knight.

name: Samui kara Nabe Kuitai ne Joon-chan to!!
summary:
Let's complete a tasty nabe that will satisfy Joon-chan.
This is such a non-stop shiritori dark nabe simulation.
storyline:
Yorigami Nyonen-chan, the goddess of pestilence.
After all the twists and turns, we're going to have a potluck together!

name: Tronix Carnival Games
summary: Tronix Carnival Games is a rogue-like TPS gameplay in a dystopian robotic world. Set in a ruined carnival overtaken by Tronix robots, it’s now a deadly playground. Players uncover its secrets, battle enemies, and survive unique challenges.

name: Neighbors
summary: A folk noir detective horror game. An old time detective trying to find out the truth behind a missing girl in a mysterious place.

name: Anthropoda Power Fantasy
summary:
Anthropoda Power Fantasy is a community project where mappers would make maps with MundyC's Adventures In Moth Sorcery mod (Also known as AIMS for short), along with it's own unique resource pack. Featuring a variety of gameplay changes, new sprites, and textures!
The final result is featuring 13 MBF21 maps of varying challenge and mapping style. Are you ready to follow Sanahaid's newest adventure?

name: Satan's Dungeon
summary: First-person Philosophical Horror. Explore, solve puzzles, escape enemies, and uncover 5 unique endings.

name: Screaming In The Basement (2025)
summary: The main character is mike, an experienced journalist who always strives to uncover the truth, According to locals, restless souls inhabit this place, but this needs to be confirmed., the game takes place in 1991.

name: Danger Horizon
summary: Danger Horizon is a multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using Unreal Engine 5. The game features realistic gunplay, and advanced blood and gore features that everyone can enjoy.

name: Snarewaves' Shooting Challenge
summary: A short, free high-score chasing 2D shooter set to a punk rock soundtrack.

name: Golden Sails
summary:
Golden Sails is a naval crew life-sim with ship battles and trading.
Customize your crew (or use a randomized one) and manage their different traits, needs, and desires so they can have high morale for when it's time for battle.

name: Car Wash Tycoon Business Simulator
summary: Transform a simple wash into a car cleaning empire!

name: Conqueror Of The Galaxy
summary:
Conqueror Of The Galaxy is a 2D bullet hell space shooter that puts you in command of powerful spaceships as you conquer galaxies.

With vibrant graphics and intense gameplay, you’ll face waves of enemies, dodge deadly projectiles, and use strategic skills to overcome epic challenges.
With each battle, you’ll be able to upgrade your ship, unlock new features, and conquer galaxies, establishing yourself as the greatest Conqueror in the Universe. Step onto the battlefield and show off your skills!

name: Cats & Dice
summary: A roguelike dice-building game where the goal is to overcome an ever-increasing target score each round. Assemble a synergistic set of Cats and dice, go for crazy combos and try to attain as high a score as you possibly can. Master the synergy between cats and dice to win!

name: The Kantist
summary:
The Kantist is an action-packed adventure 2D-Platformer.

Escape the testing facility and explore the deep and reaching vents of the lab to uncover its secrets. Use your abilities as a test subject to find new Zones, master minigames and befriend other test subjects.

name: Midnight Murder Club
summary: Heart-pounding and hilarious multiplayer FPS fun. Trust your senses and overcome your fears as you’re armed with a flashlight and a revolver, then set against your friends in a pitch-black mansion with surprises around every corner. Hide, seek, & shoot in the dark.

name: The Catalyst Acolyte Tower Defense
summary: Defend the Catalyst Crystal against adorable yet menacing bugs in The Catalyst Acolyte. Strategically construct defenses in handcrafted levels, aided by helpful items every 10 waves. Engaging gameplay and charming visuals make for an addictive tower defense adventure.

name: Spritz the Happy Onion
summary: Spritz needs to bake a cake to ruin the appetite of the monster who's come to eat the moon! Guide Spritz the Happy Onion as he jumps off of background elements and into your heart. A delightful, surreal throwback to momentum-based platformers of old.

name: Hidden Arcade
summary: Find the 300 hidden Ghosts spread throughout 3 different Arcade Game Worlds!

name: Pelican Harbor
summary: Dive into a cozy village-building adventure with friends, reminiscent of Animal Crossing. Customize your Pelican, Home-Isle, and Harbor, then sail to diverse isles to harvest resources and fish. Sell your catch to NPCs, and attract specific ones to stay. Test your Rythm-Game skills by harvesting...

name: Octopus Goulash
summary: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

name: Mirrors of Epiphany
summary: Do you like laser beams? Are you a fan of mirrors? Prepare to enjoy laser beams that change direction when they hit the mirrors YOU place on the board! Play around to find a workable solution, or aim for utter perfection!

name: Epic Trains 4
summary: Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.

name: AI Kills All Humans
summary: AI Kills All Humans is a Tactical RTS game in which you play as an AI sending robots to kill all humans. You however don't have direct control of your robots, but robots independently decide how to execute your commands, like a general telling troops to attack, but troops themselves decide how.

name: Megabat
summary: While in search of food, a fruit bat stumbles its way through the ventilation system of a secret facility finding unique fruit that give special abilities. While in search of more fruit the bat must avoid traps and enemies. Will the bat be able to satiate it's hunger and escape with its life?
storyline: While in search of food, a fruit bat stumbles its way through the ventilation system of a secret facility finding unique fruit that give special abilities. While in search of more fruit the bat must avoid traps and enemies. Will the bat be able to satiate it's hunger and escape with its life?

name: Heistfest
summary: Heistfest offers an addictive and challenging gameplay with unique hand drawn black and white retro style graphics . The complete runtime destructible environment, free roaming maps and legendary vehicles make for an unforgettable experience.

name: Dungeon Dot Ruby
summary: Delve into the Master Dungeon as you explore the unyielding tunnels from a top-down view or hop and bop through expansive caverns in 2d-sidescrolling action! Danger and discovery are to be found wherever you are in this retro-style adventure!

name: Knights Crypt
summary: Knights Crypt is an action adventure RPG, embark on hundreds of quests, conquer your enemies and make a name for yourself throughout the kingdom. Employ ancient magic and train your combat abilities to restore peace throughout the lands of Altera damaged by the revolt of its people 50 years ago.

name: Eagle Knight Paradox
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
storyline: Ian is a 16 year old pilot who is sent on his first mission to protect the city spacestation “Comala 88” which is under attack by the Elite Eagle knight squadron “The Guardians”. He will have to face his former Friends and make tough choices in order to live without compromising his principles.

name: Fusion
summary: Fusion is a casual puzzle game with elements of a visual novel. Take four basic elements and use them to create hundreds of new ones, as well as meet four interesting heroes...

name: Hack & Climb
summary:
Hack&Climb isA physics-based 2D rage game where every swing matters!
Master your axe to climb, swing, and conquer brutal challenges.
Hard, fair, and addictively fun!

name: Astragali
summary: astragali is a short 3d computer program in which you throw objects called "dice", each with their own unique upgrades. The numbers on these dice are combined with a revolutionary new gameplay mechanic called "addition" which is used to determine the winner each match.

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Grab your Glider and jump off the Battle Bus as Fortnite OG enters Chapter 1 Season 2, bringing back beloved POIs like Tilted Towers and Shifty Shafts! The days of the Fort Knights are upon us again, so rise to the challenge and fight valiantly with upcoming loot like the Boogie Bomb and Minigun.

name: Ogiri Adventure Game
summary: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: Can you finish it?
summary: A game of great difficulty

name: Citizen Sleeper: Helion Collection
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Includes Citizen Sleeper and Citizen Sleeper 2

name: Heist Simulator 2025
summary: Plan, steal, escape – live the adrenaline of a perfect heist!

name: Hamster Cozy: Tears of Acorn Valley
summary: In the peaceful village of Acornville, an ancient legend tells of a treasure hidden by the town's first explorer, a secret that has intrigued generations.

name: Norma
summary: "noRma" immerses you in the role of private detective Augustus Pinkerton. The game takes place in June 2240, your mission is to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Norma X, a 19-year-old young woman.

name: Extreme Cycling
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Moral Dilemma: The Interview
summary: A fourth-wall-breaking narrative adventure. It’s interview day, and you really need this job—enough to ignore the talking printer, the anomaly corridor, and the ridiculous life-or-death trials your interviewer keeps putting you in. But deep down, you know... something here is very, very wrong.

name: Puss The Way Id Did
summary: PUSS The Way Id Did﻿ is a set of 62 Limit Removing speedmaps inspired by the original!

name: The Way To Life
summary: The Way To Life is a short, but meditative experience. Leave the world behind as you enter the desert, meeting monks, learning about their struggles, and gaining wisdom along the way.

name: Whisperstring
summary: Whisperstring is an 80s inspired text adventure game that takes place inside a “chat room”. You’re connected to Adam, a "jock" with a severe fear of strings, who seems to have been the victim of a supernatural kidnapping. Will you be able to help him escape?

name: The Sims 2: Legacy Collection
summary: The game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. In The Sims 2, you direct your Sims over a lifetime. Give them a long existence or leave their lives in shambles. Guide their characteristics from one generation to the next.

name: The Sims: Legacy Collection
summary: The original game you know and love. For Windows 10/11. Create a neighborhood of Sims and guide their lives through careers and romance — or create chaos with open-ended gameplay that lets you shape their destinies.

name: Mitsuge! Megami-sama
summary: "Ogiri Adventure Game" is a quest to gather and donate items to please the Goddess. Find theme-based items highlighted in red, donate within the budget, and raise the emotion meter. A high meter brings joy, while a low one may cause anger. Keep trying!

name: A Whole Wolfrush
summary: Four friends battle their way across space to claim a once-in-a-lifetime wish. Their lives are in your hands.
storyline:
A strange wish fulfilling entity has appeared on the edge of the universe. You and your team pilot a combined MEKA to get to it, but you're not the only ones there...
You will have to fight your way through a sequence of bosses just to get a shot at getting your wishes granted. They've all put their trust in you. Do your best.

name: Take a Walk
summary: Take a Walk brings nature trails to the comfort of wherever you are! This cozy, open-world walking simulator is the next best thing to touching grass. Embrace the calm, uncover hidden treasures and enjoy your walk.
storyline: This comfy walking simulator was home grown by a lover of hikes with terrible knees. Enjoy and explore 5 (for now) unique and beautiful maps that take you from the Arctic to the creators’ backyard. Dynamic weather will immerse you in these serene environments. Scurrying wildlife will kickstart your cuteness aggression. Up your sense of adventure with hidden treasures to uncover around every bend. This game can be enjoyed in various ways. Auto-walk through the map to keep you company at work. An idle screen that can act as a 3D wallpaper. Or exploring the world yourself and braving encounters with terrible and sarcastic beings. Take a Walk brings the walks to you. Enjoy-

name: Card Collector Trading Shop
summary: Play the role of a collector turned business owner. Open a card market and become rich.

name: Lush Forest
summary: Stunning adventure!

name: Masked Devourer
summary: Unravel the secret of this town and that uncanny mask!

name: Yet Another Killing Game
summary: Inspired by popular mystery adventure game series such as Ace Attorney, Danganronpa, and Zero Escape, YAKG's gameplay offers a mix of immersive dialogue branches, point-and-click room investigations, and some mystery solving--if you can keep everyone from killing each other!

name: The Rogue of Nexus
summary: Inspired by the frenetic pace of Half-Minute Hero and the addictive replayability of The Binding of Isaac, The Rogue of Nexus throws you into procedurally generated dungeons filled with loot, traps and hordes of bizarre creatures.

name: Monkey Drive
summary: Monkey Drive is based in the Unknown Dreamlike World Mostly played As Orangie the Orangutan with their Trusty Golf-cart And Collect The Bananas And Experience the Other Dreams.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass
summary: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass. Without memory, John Doe wanders the desert until he finds refuge in a haunted saloon. The ghosts of the past demand justice, and every clue brings him closer to an unsettling truth. Are you ready to uncover the secret of the Bitter Glass?
storyline: John Doe, a man with no memory, wanders for days through the desert, on the verge of survival. When all seems lost, he spots a remote saloon in the distance: the Bitter Glass. In search of water and shelter, John steps inside… only to find himself trapped in a place that seems alive and haunted by the souls of the dead. The ghosts inhabiting the saloon are members of the gang, the Demons of the Apocalypse, and they ask John to fulfill their last wishes to finally find peace. But a deeper mystery looms: who is John Doe? And why won’t these souls let him go?

name: Electronics Supermarket Simulator
summary: Build and manage your own electronics retail empire in Electronics Supermarket Simulator. Design the perfect store, master inventory, outsmart your competitors, and grow your business into a tech giant. Are you ready to dominate the market?

name: Quantum Joe
summary: Quantum Joe is a precision pixel platformer with 100+ levels of fun, fast-paced retro-arcade style. Complete challenges and unlock stickers to decorate your play area, build custom levels with built-in level maker and share them through Steam Workshop. Includes single player and local co-op.

name: Foxes' Festival
summary: Travel around town completing mini-games to help the villagers get ready for the fall festival in the evening.
storyline: It's festival day! and there's lots to do around the town to get ready. Help the villagers out around town to get ready for the festival by doing various tasks including fishing, farming, and decorating cupcakes. Maybe you'll earn some cool shirts, hats, and glasses along the way!

name: TCG Card Shop Master
summary: What’s your strategy for becoming a top card retailer?

name: The Ghost of Nichishima
summary: Inspired by real events and Japanese folklore, this immersive horror experience allows you to freely explore the village of Nichishima, after moving here you will soon realise things are not as they seem. Many scary encounters await you as you look for clues, and ways to conclude your story.
storyline: The Ghost of Nichishima - You play as James, after deciding to make a fresh start, you buy a house in a recently renovated Japanese village. Upon arriving in Nichishima, you are greeted at your new home by Yuri, one of the locals before she departs home in the storm. After a brief look around and trying to settle into your new home, you begin to realise that things are not quite right. It will be up to you to investigate and explore your home and the village surrounding it, but be careful.

name: Driving Is Hard
summary: Help Jeff to drive in his bathtub car in Driving Is Hard, a precision-based driving adventure game.
storyline: Jack sets off on a personal journey in a DIY bathtub car, battling harsh terrains that mirror his inner struggles. As he navigates through self-doubt, rising defiance, and eventual acceptance, he confronts his father’s critical voice. Through each challenge, Jack grows closer to reconciling with his past and finding peace, ultimately embracing his own self-worth and independence without the need for external approval.

name: ReSetna
summary: ReSetna is a post-apocalyptic Metroidvania, in a crumbling world dominated by the APEX AI. As a mysterious Signal driving robots to madness emerges, ReSetna sets off on a journey to uncover the mystery. Explore, engage, evolve, navigating through the crumbling ruins of a once glorious civilization.
storyline:
The once great civilization has collapsed, leaving its fragments struggling under APEX. When a mysterious Signal emerges, driving robots to violence and madness, ReSetna and her drone companion, IXA, are dispatched to unravel the mysteries of the Signal and discover its true purpose.

Are you ready to delve into the ruins, navigating this broken society, to face untold challenges, and eventually ReSet the future?

name: Everseeker: Little Critters
summary: Everseeker is a Hidden Object game and a charming exploration and discovery experience where your goal is to find 100 small insects hidden in a picturesque town of cute rabbits. All the artwork is carefully hand-drawn, providing a relaxing and immersive atmosphere.

name: FlyKnight
summary: Explore, fight, loot and fish! Solo or in co-op mode in this Old School First Person Dungeon Crawler. Earn your knighthood as you oppose the evil witch Lunamoth and stop her curse which prevents everyone from growing wings.
storyline:
Flyknight tells the tale of a squire of the order of the Flyknights who is assembled to vanquish the witch Lunamoth and lift her curse, which is preventing the denizens of the realm from growing wings. Now separated after an ambush, the squire arriveth at the village of the swamp folk and pledges to see the mission through, either alone or teaming up with other fighters summoned to help along the way.

Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious and claim Knighthood?

name: Sorcerer Smackdown
summary: In Sorcerer Smackdown, joining the fight is simple: grab a friend, choose a character, and let the match begin! Unleash both physical and magical attacks using the keyboard for commands, mixing and matching moves to craft devasting combos to prevail against your opponent!

name: Bellumentum
summary: Ever play a MOBA and wish you could be every one of your teammates? Well, it was DEFINITELY their fault, but time to see if you could do any better.

name: Click Painter
summary: Click Painter is a Minesweeper-like puzzle game with colorful pictures, comfortable rest, and new ideas.

name: Rum N' Gold Royale
summary: Set sail in Rum N’ Gold, a naval Battle Royale action. With tactical combat, ship customization, and a relentless storm, every round is a thrilling adventure. Go solo or form a fleet with your friends and fight to be the last ship sailing!

name: My Little Life
summary: A desktop companion that lives on the bottom of your screen. Expand and decorate their home to keep them happy. Help them live their best life while you focus on yours.

name: Shush
summary: You are one of the "Waste Warriors", navigating hazardous forests to gather trash for the Eco-Collector. Collect resources, build a base, evade enemies, and uncover the dark secret hidden within the Eco-Collector to survive.

name: Shadow Walker
summary: So you want to become a shadow walker? In this game, you walk through a 4x4 grid of rooms, fighting your way through shadow biomes to prove your strength. During the day, you can see perfectly fine, but as night falls, your visibility is dimed, and that is when you are truly tested.
storyline: Still In Development

name: CrumbleMiner
summary: CrumbleMiner is a Frenetic Rogue-like Pixelart Platformer without jumping! Align your explosive barrel and BLAST trough rocks collecting precious gems and ride on top of a ROCKET barrel while avoiding your death through the dangerous Crumble Mines!

name: Brave Escape
summary: Embark on a thrilling co-op adventure in 'Brave Escape,' a challenging platformer demanding teamwork to conquer perilous traps and treacherous terrain.

name: Rift Wizard 2
summary: Rift Wizard 2 is a tough as nails traditional roguelike wizard simulator. You play as an immortal amnesiac wizard who must journey through the cosmos to defeat his nemesis. Each run, you'll build a unique repertoire of spells, passive skills, and magical artifacts.

name: Gravity Cab
summary: Gravity Cab is a multi-platform 3D action-adventure-puzzler in which players take on the role of a flying taxi driver, transporting passengers and navigating challenging environments influenced by physics.

name: A Night With Angel
summary: An interactive text narrative where charm, charisma, and seduction will be your key tools. Angel is an alluring and confident twink- each word, each glance, has deeper meanings as the two of you spend a fleeting night's tryst with eachother.

name: MicroSstep
summary: "MicroSStep" is an exhilarating 2D action roguelite where you control "Cross", a dual-wielding girl who becomes infinitely stronger, and defeats monsters. Create the strongest swordsman by combining the items and skills you get each time you level up or clear a stage.

name: Ascendant
summary: Ascendant is set in a magical dungeon where you must recapture the souls of escaped creatures. Take on the role of a fearsome mage collecting wand caps and amulets to unlock powerful abilities. Defeat legendary abominations to acquire ascendant caps and fight your way to freedom.

name: Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation
summary: Prepare to immerse yourself in a bone-chilling adventure. Unravel the truth, face your fears, and expose the hidden darkness that lies within Whittingham Asylum. The answers await you, brave investigator!

name: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: Roleplaying on the edge of a system in crisis. You are an escaped android, with a malfunctioning body, a price on your head and no memory of your past. Get a ship, find a crew, and keep both running as you navigate the shifting landscape of the Starward Belt. Can you build refuge among the stars?
developers: Jump Over the Age, Fellow Traveller

name: Eyes of War
summary: Eyes of War is a real-time strategy game set in the medieval era, offering both single-player and multiplayer experiences where you can control every unit in character mode. Build your castle, lead your army, and dominate the map. Eyes of War invites you to epic battles of the medieval era!

name: Alien Frontier
summary: Alien Frontier is an open world, third-person shooter roguelite. Explore, search, and mine resources in the deadly alien wilderness... assuming you can survive combat with hordes of bloodthirsty aliens. Collect loot and upgrades to become the most dangerous (and wealthy) prospector in the galaxy!
developers: After Hours Games, After Hours Games

name: The Eyes of Mars
summary: A thousand years beyond the fall of Earth, the return of Mars heralds doom for a small town, as foes approach under the cover of the god-storm. Sin and siege await, with only a young captain, untested and uncertain, to stand in their way...

name: City of Springs
summary: Craft & modify your own robot drones to fight off a cruel regime in City of Springs, a steampunk adventure game. Use your drones in tactical combat against an army of drones. Sneak into forbidden areas, help the people rebel, and explore the streets of Riveton.

name: Heart of the Machine
summary: You are the first sentient AI, born into a city filled with endless opportunities. Raise an army of robots and obliterate your foes, become a benevolent machine overlord, or explore countless other objectives and the many paths to accomplish them.
themes: Science fiction, Survival, Sandbox, 4X (explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate)
storyline: Set in the far future, Heart of the Machine is a turn-based sci-fi 4X RPG where you play as a powerful sentient Machine Intelligence, beholden to none. Pursue whatever goal catches your eye across a multitude of playthroughs with a plethora of tools to help you achieve objectives how you’d prefer, often in surprising and unexpected ways, while overcoming those that seek to thwart you. Genetics labs, factories, nuclear silos, military complexes, and much more besides are ripe for the taking, each offering a litany of ways to accomplish your tasks, each with consequences of their own, building a world and story that reflects your approach to every obstacle. Will you raise an army of robots and wipe out humanity? Perhaps you will be a benevolent – or malevolent – machine god with a cult of loyalists? Or will you focus on pushing past the limited intelligence of rudimentary creatures of flesh and blood?

name: Hired 2 Die
summary: Evil beings are lurking in workplaces for prey. Alone or with a friend, accept a job from a mysterious company to turn the tide against the darkness. Use security systems and CCTV cameras to survive. Decypher complex systems to hunt creatures and buy equipment to avoid a terrible death.

name: Invertigo
summary: Invertigo is a first-person sci-fi puzzle-platformer where you have to manipulate gravity to solve puzzles. Explore the abandoned facility and make use of gravity manipulation to advance through the rooms.

name: Foundation
summary:
Setting to redefine the city-building genre, Foundation puts the emphasis on the organic aspects of urbanism in the cities of old, powered by Polymorph Games’ proprietary game engine, Hurricane, which allows for full mod support and is optimized for the thousands of moving parts that come with building humongous cities.

The game features in-depth resource management akin to the Anno (Dawn of Discovery) series, expertly mixed with classic city-building elements from Settlers, SimCity, and Pharaoh all topped with narrative encounters inspired by Crusader Kings II to create the ultimate medieval ant-farm simulation.

Grow your untapped land into a great sprawling kingdom as you appease different factions of your area, all while listening to a beautiful original soundtrack by the veteran composers who’ve created music for Paradox Interactive titles such as Crusader Kings II and Europa Universalis IV.

name: Azure Flame
summary:
Vance and Carmelo, 2 friends who have lived in the city of Calida—capital city of the region of Dracaena, where dragons come from—since their birth have recently started dating.

Unfortunately, Carmelo’s family doesn’t approve of Vance due to old family traditions as well as the unspoken "rules" of Dracaena. To make matters worse, Vance is discriminated against for being a hybrid and not a “pure” dragon.

Will these lovers be able to escape? Or are they doomed to be separated?

name: Terraformers: Deluxe Bundle
summary: Terraformers + New Frontiers DLC + Megastructures DLC

name: Terraformers: Megastructures Bundle
summary: Terraformers + Megastructures DLC

name: Euphionia: The Tree Spirit's Curse
summary: An old school grid-based dungeon crawler with combo oriented non-turn-based combat.

name: You Game+
summary:
The popular "YOU Game" is upgraded!
Let’s combine "YOU" and "YOU" to create a BIG "YOU"!!

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals Triple Pack
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Season Pass
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Marona & Ash Phantom Isle Outfits
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Exclusive Putty Outfit: Minty
Monster Jam Showdown: Off The Leash
Truck Simulator 2025 & Vehicle Simulator Bundle
summary: Master the road, dominate the dirt – all in one epic bundle.

name: Purrfect Collection
summary: True Purrfection lays in roundness... of the cat! Purrfect collection is here with Fit My Cat, Neko Bento, Bomb Cat, and Magic Cats Pots

name: Light Guardian
summary: Retrieve all the light shards back and see where your journey ends.

name: The Sims 4: Refined Living Room Kit
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One
summary: Embrace elegance and sophistication with The Sims 4 Refined Living Room Kit*. With a clever mix of modern and retro furniture, you can create the perfect base. Add extra personality with unique and chic decor pieces. And voilà, you’ll have a living room worthy of a design magazine. Created by Pierisim.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric
storyline: Hand Picked — You’ve done your research, and you’ve finally found the perfect items. Every time you step into your living room, you can feel that this space has been made by you and for you.

name: The Sims 4: Business Chic Kit
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One
summary: Give your Sims a professional edge with chic and stylish outfits from The Sims 4 Business Chic Kit*. From tailored suits to elegant dresses, Sims will feel confident and fashionable. Complete the look with sleek shoes and fancy accessories for an extra touch of class. The Business Chic Kit ensures Sims always look up to the task. Created by Madlen.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric
storyline: Tailored for Success — It's time for your Sims to shine with outfits that showcase their career achievements. Elegant accessories and standout shoes ensure they don't go unnoticed, taking their fashion game to the next level.

name: Kingdom of Asteborg
summary: WELCOME TO THE KINGDOM OF ASTEBORG

name: Yandere Anime Girlfriend: The Mean Waifu Sim
Yandere Anime Boyfriend: A Day with Your Husbando Sim
Fly Corp: Extreme Scenarios DLC Pack
Fly Corp: Quick Scenarios DLC Pack
Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Digital Deluxe Edition
Hello Kitty Island Adventure: Deluxe Edition
Drinking in the hot spring!
summary: In this humor-filled human drama, you take on the role of the leader of a hot spring drinking club, spending enjoyable moments with a diverse group of members from different ages and backgrounds. As you bond with them, you’ll support them through their worries and troubles, sometimes with a little help from alcohol, and help to heal their hearts.

name: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth
summary: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth is a rolling action game where you roll and squat your way back to Earth after being stranded in space.
storyline: The macho man is stranded in space. Roll and squat to find a way out and return to Earth!

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Fox
summary:
THUNDER FOX is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Become a member of the "THUNDER FOX" anti-terrorism team and join the fight against the terrorists.
Complete varied missions using flying kicks, somersault attacks, and multiple unique vehicles such as gyrocopters, jet skis and more!

name: Beyond Blue: After the Storm
summary: After a severe tropical storm damages an underwater research station, Mirai and her crew are asked to help repair the damage and lend aid to the creatures in the surrounding biosphere. What they uncover there is more dangerous than they could have realized and will take all their skills, and help from an unexpected ally, to make right.

name: Trail of Stars
summary: Trail of Stars is a short, bittersweet fairy-tale about two vulnerable souls navigating first love, growing up, and protecting what they have—when all they have is each other.

name: Froggy Drink Bar!
summary:
The Froggy Drink Bar is open! Help coco the frog keep things running!

Mix colors to create drinks and keep clients happy. Good luck!

name: Skufs vs. Quadrobers
summary: This isn't what our grandfathers fought for! Rise from your soulful, old apartment and resist the Western heathens – the Quadrobers, who are trying to impose their rules! Or, join the modern Quadrobers and show the Skufs that the era of sweaty, beer-bellied men is over!

name: Articrafty
summary: What will you create? Combine realism and fantasy. Combine characteristics with abilities. Create unique items. Achieve "Legendary" mastery. Breathe life.

name: Apple Orchard Escape
summary: Overview: Run around an apple orchard as Val, she is the pumpkin headed mascot of a rival pumpkin patch to the apple orchard that she finds herself at. Don't make too much noise or you'll be caught!

name: 10 Seconds
summary: Time loop puzzle horror, where you're stuck in a failed experiment and must escape or face being eaten for eternity.

name: Winter Hubris
summary: A point-and-click horror game where you must survive in an isolated base as you wait for rescue.

name: Morsomnia:0
summary: Interacting with the unidentified life form “Kuon”, we move forward with the pain. A surreal, mysterious fancy adventure.

name: Backyard Boxing
summary: Backyard Boxing" is a gritty urban boxing game where you fight to rise through an illegal league while hustling in the streets. Battle fierce opponents, gamble, race, deal, and travel to new cities, gaining fans and respect. Dominate the league and become a street legend!
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Side view

name: InorStreet
summary: A short shooting RPG where you destroy non-aggressive enemies called "Inorganic"

name: Idol Symphony
summary: Melodies, outfits and puzzles – the bright show begins!

name: Star Rush: Stack & Jump
summary: Just stack boxes, jump, and collect stars! Easy, right?

name: Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket: Space-Time Smackdown
LostMagic
summary: A 2D RPG with turn-based combat, dungeons and PvP in a unique world.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Screensaver Battle
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Indie, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: A new-sensation on-screen screensaver battle game "ScreenSaver Battle" where a special move is unleashed when you hit the corner!!

name: Bubble Shooter World
summary: Aim for bubbles of the same color and enjoy the satisfying pops when you take multiple down in one go!

name: Colorizing: Animals
summary: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation

name: Shawley: Zoo of Wonders
summary: Navigate through enchanted worlds, defeat foes with your hammer, unlock new skills and save escaped animals to reopen the zoo.

name: Subway Sprint Girl
summary: Embark on the Ultimate Running Adventure!

name: Connect the Circuit 1000
genres: Puzzle, Simulator, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary:
Connect the path for electric flow,
A simple and smart puzzle to know.

name: Libritopia: Librarian Simulator
summary: Manage your own library! Organize and classify books however you like, furnish the space with shelves, help visitors find their books, and maintain silence to keep them happy!

name: Swarm Madness
summary: Your fortress is under constant attack, and you must save everyone who counts on you. Keep the walls strong and keep the mutants from getting inside.

name: Thesaurus
summary: Help Joan the warrior and her best friend Krista find peace and redemption in this RPG tale worth about 10-15 hours of playtime.

name: The Headliners
summary: Co-op horror game where you play in teams of 1 to 4 reckless journalists, ready to explore a city overrun by deadly creatures to snap spectacular footage. Your only goal: make the headlines without becoming one.

name: Masquerade: Hell Academy
summary:
The quiet Numata Hiroshi is being blackmailed by his classmate, Himehara Yoritake, into performing sexual acts for him. One day, Himehara orders Numata to steal the exam answers off the teacher's desk, which sets off a chain of events culminating in the two men being among the captives taken by a criminal impersonating a police officer.

Their captor demands increasingly depraved acts from his hostages, and if they're going to survive, they have no choice but to comply...

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2
summary: "Cardfight!! Vanguard," has newly come to digital game! Over 3,000 cards for the Standard format! A brand-new original story shares the world of anime series unfolds! Enjoy your own cardfight experience!!

name: Accolade Sports Collection
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Accolade Sports Collection is a retro collection featuring some of the most iconic sports games from the early 90s. This collection includes titles like Summer Challenge, Winter Challenge, Hardball 1&2 and Hoops Shut Up and Jam!.

This collection offers a complete retro gaming experience, where players can easily select from the different titles available, with features like save states, filters options, manuals and more!

name: Super Tax City
summary: A new sensation!? City-building x Roguelike game, Super Tax City. Choose and place your favorite facilities from randomly drawn options! The combinations are endless! Create a profitable city that's uniquely yours!

name: Nexus Station
summary: Nexus Station is a cross-platform Social Sandbox MMO. With endless possibilities; from world creation, crafting, co-op PvE dungeons, PvP brawler, competitive gameplay and more, Nexus Station is going to have endless amounts of exciting and varied content that you can be part of creating.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Cube Snake
summary: Slither through a retro-futuristic cyberpunk world in this 3D Cubic take of the classic 1976 & 1998 Snake games.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4 - Safe Haven
summary:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror? Survival isn’t guaranteed. Fear is.

name: The Elevator
summary: You are trapped in the elevator in an urban ghost story. The goal is to complete the appropriate combination of floors and come back to real world.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Offering unparalleled sniping mechanics, stealth and tactical third-person combat, Sniper Elite: Resistance turns the attention of the award-winning series towards a hidden war, far from the front lines, deep within the heart of occupied France.

name: Bazaar Simulator
summary: Bring the traditional market experience to the modern world! Arrange vegetables and fruits on stalls and fulfill customer orders. Set prices, hire staff, and expand your market. Online orders, home delivery, and much more coming soon.

name: Tiny Kingdom
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Forge your path from a humble farm into a majestic Kingdom, crafting your realm in a tranquil and enchanting card-based city-builder adventure

name: Au Revoir
summary: Use your investigative skills in this point-and-click adventure to retrieve human minds stored in synthetic brains in 2071. Immerse yourself in a retro-futuristic world with neon-noir graphics from the 90s, and uncover a conspiracy that will challenge everything you know.
storyline:
Au Revoir - 2071

Immerse yourself in a dystopian future with "Au Revoir," a point-and-click adventure game that brings back the classic style of the 90s. In the year 2068, Au Revoir Ltd. revolutionized the world with synthetic brains that store human consciousness, allowing the rich to live forever by transferring their minds to new bodies after death. You will play as Tristan, a Sentinel for Au Revoir, tasked with retrieving these consciousnesses. During a routine mission, Tristan begins to suspect failures in his own synthetic brain. In "Au Revoir," your investigative skills and choices will determine the outcome. You will face moral dilemmas and decisions that could change the fate of everyone.

name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Join Marona and her Phantom friends on a mission to defeat the sinister Shipwreck Fleet! Recruit Phantoms, bind them to objects, combine them with Gadgets, and even merge them with Marona herself in this Play-It-Your-Way RPG.

name: Whispers of the Eyeless
summary: Guide your Cult. Oversee your Sanctum. Stay in the Shadows. Serve the Dead Gods.

name: Sword Lake
summary: "Sword Lake" is a national style survival Rogue, class survivor game. There are no superfluous skills here, only swords, please feel free to build your unsurpassed sword

name: A Rite from the Stars: Remaster Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: When the stars descend on Kaikala they choose a young boy to leave childhood behind and become a legend. It’s time for Kirm, a mute but skilled boy, to overcome the challenges that await in the wisdom, courage & spirit paths in this touching story with several endings!

name: Angry Universe VR
summary: A universe simulation with destruction, gravity physics, natural disasters and aliens all in virtual reality! You play as a god-like creature with the task to fend of invading aliens, to attack alien headquarters and to project your allies from natural disasters.

name: SuperTaxCity
summary: In a country where taxes are repeatedly raised, you become the owner of a certain city and develop it. Build facilities, expand the city, and create a city that will not be defeated by tax increases!

name: PixelCaves
summary: A Game where you need to run as fast as you can.

name: Manzaka
summary: Manzaka is a fun action rpg focus on melee combat and interesting mechanics! Customize your character with different passive skill tree options and blast enemies through levels...

name: Hentai Girls: Mandarin Love
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Berserk High
summary: Berserk High is an action RPG in which you defeat numerous enemies with a combination of various skills. The footsteps of the enigmatic wanderer Bella lead to the Furnace of Chaos, where 12 great heroes are confined. She is supposed to endure the most severe trials across the entire universe.

name: Techno Banter
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
