summary: Surrounded by bright neons, filthy streets and even filthier techno beats, it is you who guard the entrance to the rave. Sharpen your wits and deliver lyrical smackdowns to those not worthy of partying. But beware - the stakes may or may not involve blowing up the city.
storyline:
Your rising star was shining bright and you were going straight to the top. And once misfortune struck, it struck hard. In an instant, the days of living large in the prestigious high-rises were gone. Looks like you need to go back to doing what you know best - bouncing the door at your old job in the Green Door club. Seems that, much like you, the club has nowhere to go but up, and so it’s time to bring it back to its former glory.
Get. To. Work!

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - The Absence of Misericordia
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary:
It has been two years now, and the endless winter has not once relented, leaving many stranded in the settlement of Winternadir. The fur merchants come to the adventurers with a request...
The villagers often speak of a place of worship in the heart of a nearby valley. It was once home to "The Relic of Our Lady of Mercy", which was said to have kept the cold weather at bay. The relic is long since lost, and the valley has been abandoned. You must retrieve this relic, and return the region to its natural state.

name: The Zebra-Man!
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Zebra-Man! is a hyper-charged pixel art top down action game with brutal fist fights and blood spilling in your wake. You'll have to get out of impossible situations while unraveling time paradoxes and blasting the enemies you encounter along the way.

name: Basureroes: Invasion
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: “Basureroes: Invasion” is a 2D platform game with retro aesthetics in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump and fight your way through twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

name: Wander Hero
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

name: Dead Letter Dept.
summary: Dead Letter Dept. is a short horror game mystery experience, where you use your computer keyboard to type in various prompts, and attempt to decipher damaged images as oddities begin to appear.
storyline:
After moving to the big city, you got yourself an apartment, and secured a temp data entry job- just to keep you afloat till something better comes along. Your official title is a Data Conversion Operator, but you're really more like a warm body who types up all the junk computers still can't read.

Day to day, you go to work & process the images displayed on your terminal, and type up whatever text is in front of you. Whatever can be made out, that is. Letters and lost mail, some mangled and twisted, that have travelled from place to place with nowhere else to go. Sometimes the mail you receive is a little strange. Sometimes, it feels like it's talking to you directly through the screen...

name: CyberCorp
genres: Shooter, Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Brutal fast-paced top-down Co-op Loot Shooter in Cyberpunk world. Equipment-based combos. Exotic Weapons and Armor. Easy to start, hard to master. Play solo or with friends.

name: Cynoclept: The Game
summary: Cynoclept: The Game is a nightmare brought to life. Kidnapped and kept within an abandoned government base, with no recollection of how you got there, you must escape with your life or be brought to your knees by those who control you.

name: Defender's Quest 2: Mists of Ruin
summary: Defender's Quest II is set in a completely new world, with a brand new cast of characters and an entirely different story from last time.

name: Rocket League: Season 17 Rocketeer Pack
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Unlock the Dingo car (Titanium White), Ultralex Wheels (Black), Interstellar Decal (Crimson), and Ambustion Boost (Titanium White) in the Season 17 Rocketeer Pack! You'll also get the Shark Attack Goal Explosion (Burnt Sienna) and 1000 Credits!

name: War Thunder: "Serpent Rising" Bundle
War Thunder: "Snake Charmer" Bundle
Eros Raiders
summary: Welcome to Eros Raiders, the ultimate fusion of waifus, sci-fi, mechas and hentai!

name: Rocket League: Season 17 Veteran Pack
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Unlock the Sentinel car (Sky Blue), Nucleon Clutch Wheels, Toon Sketch Boost, and Toon Sketch Trail in the Season 17 Veteran Pack! You'll also get 500 Credits! Be sure to get this limited-time pack before it's gone!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2: Character Sleeve Set 02
Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2: Character Sleeve Set 01
Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2: Additional Card Unlock Pass
Toy Tale: The Forgotten Factory
summary: This visual novel follows a group of toys who, after being forgotten by children, begin a journey in search of a legendary place: The Forgotten Factory.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition
The Tower Of The Gods
genres: Shooter, Puzzle, Simulator, Tactical, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary:
In The Tower Of The Gods, embark on a legendary mission to ascend a towering, mystical fortress. Each level of the tower is guarded by a formidable boss, an ancient deity, or a mythical creature, each with unique abilities and lethal strategies. With no minor enemies to slow you down, every battle is a titanic showdown that will test your skill and courage.

With every victory, you climb closer to the summit, where your destiny as a legendary hero awaits. The tower challenges not only your combat prowess but also your ability to unravel the mysteries and secrets of the gods. Will you overcome all the challenges and claim your place among the legends?

name: The End of Infinity Return
summary: The End of Infinite Return is a story that unravels the fate and secrets of the secret agent Lexy as she goes on missions in a simulated world.Use a variety of firearms to defeat enemies and solve puzzles while deciding your own fate.

name: Somnus
summary: SOMNUS is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. The protagonist, a young boy, faces a difficult ordeal: his mother is seriously ill, and in order to pay for her treatment, he takes a job as a night guard.

name: The Closing Shift
summary: An interactive first-person horror game. Walk, look around, and talk to people to finish the short story about closing your restaurant. Complete the story with immersive sounds, and spooky tension and jumpscares to keep you focused.

name: Dino Crisis 2
summary: The legendary Dino Crisis 2 is back, fully playable on modern PCs.
storyline:
A year has passed since the operation to retrieve Dr. Kirk.

Third Energy, both a source of "ultimate clean energy" and a potential "ultimate weapon," has proven to be dangerously unpredictable. The government, having taken control of the project from Dr. Kirk, continued its development. Then, the “accident” happened once again.

The research city of Edward City was completely destroyed in an explosion from the Third Energy reactor—an event far more catastrophic than the previous accident. In response, the government launched a rescue mission to retrieve the research data and any remaining personnel.

To reach Edward City, believed to have been displaced in time by the reactor’s explosion, the government deployed an experimental, untested “time gate” device to send a rescue team back in time. No one could foresee the consequences of this mission—except one person: Regina…

name: Dino Crisis
summary: Dino Crisis remastered to be fully playable on modern PCs by Capcom and GOG.
storyline:
Three years ago. A scientist died in an accident during an experiment. His research was on “Third Energy,” a completely clean energy source. The accident occurred just as government funding had been cut off because the project was deemed unfeasible. To the public, it was nothing more than an insignificant piece of information. Until now.

An agent dispatched to a small country in the South Seas to investigate a top-secret military project brought back surprising information. At a military research facility in the Republic of Borginia, a scientist who was supposed to have died three years ago in our country has resumed his research activities in the field of Third Energy. Regina, a member of the government's spy team, was tasked with retrieving the doctor.

She heads to the isolated island of Ibis, where the military facility is located. The dark elite are trained for every conceivable challenge. For them, it is just another “job” as usual…

name: Hidden Cats: Spring Festival
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Spring Festival" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Jiji...Love
summary: A bullet hell game made in 48 hours for MalagaJam Weekend 19

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part II
summary:
Update 5.50, WORLDS PART II, transforms the universe with new stars, new story, and new planets. Explore ancient ruins, gas giants and water worlds, and discover strange creatures, varied biomes and dramatic terrain. Featuring new gameplay, huge improvements in lighting and water rendering, and much more.

Our journey continues.

name: Plot Twist
summary: Welcome to Plot Twist, where you take on the role of an ambitious writer in a world of stories and inspiration. You will manage your own writing career, create bestsellers, gain fans, and shape the history of literature! Your success depends on making the right decisions and your creativity!

name: Ropuka's Idle Island
summary: A cozy idle game that sits anywhere on your desktop. Watch the frog cut grass, upgrade his tools, and decorate the island while you work or relax.

name: Squaser 3
summary: Squaser 3 is a minimalist puzzle game where you control a white square and erase the darkness on each level. Clear your path using logic and memory!

name: Cho Aniki Collection
summary:
Have you been hitting the gym?
The intensely muscular shooter is back!

name: Robot Anarchy
summary:
The Retro 90’s FPS You’ve Been Waiting For!
The world is under siege by the ruthless robots of the MacroCyber corporation.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Istanbul
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Istanbul landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Stellar Docks
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Stellar puzzles, logic without limits!

name: Mutation
summary: Mutation is a procedural Dungeon Crawler Roguelite with survival and RPG elements, set in a sci-fi Lovecraftian theme: gain experience, unlock skills and new items, face increasingly dangerous threats, and escape through different paths while exploring multiple levels and uncovering the organization's secrets.
storyline: Set in a dark and twisted future, Mutation explores a universe ravaged by the influence of alien entities and cosmic anomalies. Players take on the role of a survivor trying to escape from an underground facility overrun by a mutant horror and many other creatures. As they seek answers, players uncover fragments of the world's lore, including references to mysterious technologies and cults tied to the "Artifact."

name: Agent Fall
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Infiltrate and destroy in side-scrolling shooter style!

name: Batography
summary: Play as a curious bat on his mission to take a full fledged photo of the moon. Run, Climb, Glide and Snap your way through an array of obstacles while interacting with the cheeky characters in the neighbourhood. Can you collect all five moon cakes?

name: Achilles: Survivor
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Achilles: Survivor is a dynamic single-player bullet heaven game where you face thousands of enemies, build destructive structures, develop your character to return as an even more powerful machine of destruction and survive waves of enemies.

name: Slasher: Origins
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Slashers is a chaotic, 2.5D, auto-attack survival game with rogue-lite elements and noir-anime storytelling. Unlock powerful heroes, create builds of unique abilities, and survive the escalating inferno of Mephistopheles’ underworld.

name: Smol Survivors
summary: Smol Survivors is a 2D reverse bullet-hell where you open portals to new worlds and then fight off hordes of hostile inhabitants. Collect weapons, upgrade them, then combine them into super weapons to wreak havoc!

name: Polaris
summary: Team up and take flight in this sci-fi co-op shooter with fully destructible environments. Soar through dynamic open levels using powerful abilities, unearth the coveted secrets of Polaris, and lay waste to the hostile cityscapes of a colonizing threat— reclaim your homeworld!

name: Bellfortis
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS)
summary: Control the people and armies, gain territory by force or cunning. Be a clever ruler or a ruthless conqueror in this Middle Ages game that combines turn-based strategy with intense real-time battles.

name: Cozy Campzone
summary: “Seek trough the forest around and find all ingredients to make cozy camping coffee recipes!!"

name: HexaScape: Cyber Defense
summary: Build your perfect defenses with hexagons! Use hex tiles to explore cyberspace, upgrade your defense towers, and complete quests in this unique turn-based strategy game. With a story campaign, a procedurally generated endless mode, and a powerful editor, HexaScape offers endless challenges.

name: DeTechtive 2112
summary: DeTechtive 2112 is a co-op, stealth/action game from an isometric perspective with a linear storyline set in a cyber universe.
storyline: A lone detective sits in his office, one of millions of common men and women living in crumbling cities of neon, steel, and concrete. High above, the rich live in splendor, free of torrential rains or the danger of cyber thugs ripping you apart as you cross the street. The detective is not yet aware that he's about to take on a case that will change his life - and make him wonder whether some things are better left buried.

name: Ronny's Climb
summary: Relive the 90s in this 16-bit inspired retro platformer! Explore colorful worlds alongside Ronny and their adorable furry friends and help them jump, dash and fight their way to the top of the mountain. Can you overcome the challenges and reach the summit?

name: Quantum Odyssey
summary: Are you the One to solve the Puzzle of All Puzzles? Enter an award-winning adventure in the realm of Quantum Computing. Program hardware-ready algorithms, hack players, solve decision games, and unlock knowledge to convince Quantum-Enlightened Sages that you Master the Nature of Reality.

name: Cryptical Path
summary: Cryptical Path is a thrilling rogue-lite dungeon crawler that pushes the boundaries of the genre. Play the Architect, build your own path, and navigate an ever-changing labyrinth you've been summoned in.

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Help the brave adventurer Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the Ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D action-adventure game. Explore a fantasy world inspired by South-American locations, nature and cultures.

name: The Kaiyo Mission
summary: The Kaiyo Mission is a casual, 2.5D, single player, sci-fi based, underwater exploration game set on alien ocean worlds.

name: Level Zero: Extraction
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Level Zero: Extraction is a multiplayer extraction horror - a unique take on survival experience that blends the heart-pounding tension of asymmetric horrors with the high-stakes showdowns of extraction shooters.

Embark on a dangerous scavenging expedition where 3 teams of up to 3 mercenaries compete for loot and dare to come back. Or take on the role of two deadly alien monsters and hunt for human prey.
themes: Action, Science fiction, Horror, Survival, Stealth

name: Top Dog
summary: Dogfight your way through short, intense and randomized runs. Hard but easy to pickup, with daily leaderboards and minimum hardware requirements

name: Kamibako: Mythology of Cube
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: "Crafting" x "Puzzles" x "Battle" x "RPG" !? A game system that evokes a unique new game genre that will give you a brand new experience. Become the "Restorer" who aims to save the world by finding solutions to the "great division" and "fragmentation", the world's...

name: Grief Like a Stray Dog
summary: An isolated Russian village, 1942. Men leave one by one, along the winding forest path painted crimson by distant fires, and do not return. Yong Nadia becomes a part-time postwoman filling in for her sick mother. She is now a messenger of hope and of trouble.

name: Coridden
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Become the beasts you defeat in this action-packed RPG! Equip and upgrade both your human and beast form and shapeshift between them anytime. Venture out solo or ride together in co-op on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed away inside a legendary city.

name: Level Z
summary: Level Z is a tactical online first-person horror game, where the first team, the surviving scientists, must evacuate from the space station where a biological accident has occurred. The second team, the dangerous creatures, must prevent the escape and neutralize all survivors on the spacestation.

name: The End of the Sun
summary: The End of the Sun is a first-person exploration and adventure story-based game, embedded in the Slavic world. This is a series of mysterious events that ordinary people dealt with, as they were living in a small village where the line between myth and reality became to fade perilously.

name: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter - Deluxe Upgrade
summary:
Prepare for the chilling clash against the Dark Wings with the Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter Deluxe Upgrade, featuring both the ‘Augur of the Draugr' armour and weapon pack and ‘Hair to the Throne' cosmetic DLC. Base game required.

Step into the fray clad in the legendary Draugr armour of old, forged in the fires of the elder wars between Rat and Bat, before choosing between six different, warrior-worthy hair and beard styles. For those who seek to claim victory over winter's shadow, only the fiercest attire will do.

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram - Deluxe Edition
summary: Become a tram driver, so hop into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience! In addition to the three real-world trams included in the Standard edition (ULF B1, R2.2b, or ULF A1), the Deluxe edition also includes the StadtRegioTram and the Type D Vienna! Get ready to hit the streets of Tramau.

name: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter - Deluxe Edition
summary: Prepare for the chilling clash against the Dark Wings with the Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter Deluxe Edition, combining the brutal action-RPG base game with both the ‘Augur of the Draugr' armour and weapon pack and ‘Hair to the Throne' cosmetic DLC.

name: The Stone of Madness: Special Edition
City Transport Simulator: Tram - Collector's Edition
summary: Become a tram driver, so hop into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience! In addition to the five real-world trams included in the Standard and Deluxe editions (ULF B1, R2.2b, ULF A1, StadtRegioTram, and Type D Vienna), the Collector's edition also includes the E1 Vienna and the GT8N Mannheim

name: Bubble Dreams 3D
summary:
Gogi the rabbit has misplaced his collection of precious rainbow gems... and they've all fallen into several different 3D dream worlds!

Using his magic bubble ball, help Gogi get his gems back by rolling, drifting, bouncing, and boosting your way through a handful of shiny platforming stages without falling off!

name: The Reformatory
summary: Your name is Dewey. You enjoy playing video games, much to the dismay of your parents. One day, they send you to a reformatory. There, a man electroshocks you. In convulsions, you fall into a world filled with enemies. This is a top-down 2D pixel-style shooter game with roguelite elements.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Crewmate
summary: Emergency meeting! Is it a monkey... or an Impostor? Find out with the Crewmate.

name: Tails of Iron & Tails of Iron 2: Standard Bundle
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Rats exact revenge against the Frogs & Dark Wings with this ‘Tails’ bundle.

name: Tails of Iron & Tails of Iron 2: Deluxe Bundle
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter and Tails of Iron are bundled together with their DLCs in this ultimate 'tail' and action-RPG experience.

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos: Deluxe Edition
summary: Make sure you gear up with the Goddesses with the Deluxe Edition! The Deluxe Edition also includes the Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set!

name: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 2
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Season 02 is here, upending the new order of Avalon. Engage with a massive amount of new content, including five Multiplayer maps, more than six new weapons, a new Zombies map, limited time Valentine’s Day-themed modes, and more. Gear up and deploy to Season 02.
game_modes: Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen, Battle Royale

name: Vampires in your area
summary: Single vampires nearby are waiting to chat with you!
storyline:
Sketchy ad? No! This is the universe giving you a sign!

After a quiz in your favorite magazine said that your ideal type would be a vampire, you come across an ad for single vampires in your area.

This might be your shot at love after a whole lot of heartbreak.

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2 HD
summary: A young girl confronts eerie manifestations and deciphers cryptic puzzles as she sets out to defeat three cursed toys and rescue her friends.

name: Little Lighthouse of Horror
summary: A pixel art psychological horror game inspired by the Flannan Isles mystery. Manage a remote lighthouse, handle limited resources, and confront eerie occurrences as isolation erodes your sanity. Multiple endings await based on your choices and actions. How long can you last?

name: Crashed
summary: Crashed is a third-person stealth game where you play as B.O.B., stranded on the quirky planet SnamSam. The mission? Rebuild the craft and escape! You'll sneak through restricted areas and take daring routes. A splash of humour as B.O.B.'s detachable head knocks off the Snailmen's heads!

name: Zombie Tide Incoming Final Defense
summary: This is a refined third-person shooter game combined with tower defense elements.

name: Galactic Simulator
summary: Galactic Simulator is a clicker game based on the Fermi Paradox and the Great Filter theory. Players can simulate the evolution of celestial bodies and civilizations in the galaxy from an observer's perspective. The game supports multiplayer mode. Create a unique galaxy with friends!

name: Trashcan Simulator
summary: The moment you throw something into the trash can is an exciting moment in your daily life. Through this game, you can enjoy the exciting moments of your life over and over again! You might discover something new by staring at the trash can in the room.

name: Slide to Solve
summary: Slide to Solve is a minimalistic & relaxing puzzle game

name: Can No One Hear Me?
summary: All you have to do is press a key and speak into your microphone... But which key?

name: Final Redoubt: Zombie Apocalypse
summary: Survive the onslaught, manage your ammo, and endure in Final Redoubt, a relentless survival shooter where every bullet, every swing, and every decision counts!

name: Chat is Real
summary: A short horror game of a few minutes, with elements of combat and fear. You play as a streamer known as "Gargamelovo let's play šílenství" He always felt like an outsider, whether at school or at work. So he started talking to chat.

name: Southside Racing
summary: Race and battle using weapons and karts themed after Vtubers and content creators! All characters in game can be found livestreaming on Twitch. Race through different Vtuber themed levels like TomaKey's Liminal Spaces or Meat's Silly Safari and slow each other down with weapons!

name: Leaving Whisper at Night
summary: Leaving Whisper at Night is a free, exploration-based indie game that tells the story of the protagonist, Yuniga, and their experiences throughout the game.

name: Atomic Heart: Enchantment Under the Sea
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Enchantment Under the Sea goes back to the spectacular combat gameplay that made Atomic Heart one of the highlights of 2023, as players continue the main storyline with the Twins’ consciousness at their side and new weapons in their arsenal. Meet new and returning characters while diving into the mysteries of the underwater Neptune Research Center to find a way to save humanity from a dismal future. Players will also revisit familiar locations from Facility 3826 that have changed beyond recognition, like the flying city of Chelomey, now under the robots’ total control.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
2-Day Early Unlock
1 Weapon Skin
Karabiner 98 Rifle
M1911 Pistol
Target Führer Campaign Mission (2-Day Early Unlock)
Season Pass

name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.
summary:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. takes the gameplay of Virtua Fighter 5 and raises it to new levels! Rollback Netcode support, gorgeous 4K visuals and additional content make it the best version of this legendary game ever.

The legendary fighting series makes its Steam debut with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.! Challenge the greatest fighters in the world in the ultimate remaster of the classic 3D fighter,now featuring Rollback netcode support, gorgeous 4K graphics, and all the bone-crunching, martial arts combat of the renowned original. Battle through classic VF modes like Arcade or Rank Match, create your own custom online tournaments and leagues with up to 16 players, or learn from the best in Spectator Mode. Master your fighting style to defeat all challengers in the Fifth World Fighting Tournament and become a Virtua Fighter legend!

name: Cosmic Raze
summary: Cosmic Raze is a sci-fi tower defense strategy game. Control advanced weapons, build powerful synergies, and then blast away as aliens attempt to conquer Earth. Between rounds you'll earn unique augmentations, purchase and upgrade a huge variety of weapons, and unlock powerful synergy bonuses.

name: Shining Hero
summary: A single-player roguelike game with pixel art that blends deck-building with grid-based turn-based strategy.

name: School Fighter
summary: School Fighter is a top-down arena roguelite shooter where you play as a student who fights off school enemies using paper airplanes. You have access to a school shop, unique perks, and an upgrade station to help you create a powerful character and overcome the school nightmare!

name: Mysteries of Perception
genres: Point-and-click, Puzzle, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary:
Mysteries of Perception is a detective game where you will see the same scene through the eyes of different characters. Uncover their secrets by analyzing all the clues. Switch perspectives and learn everything about the artifacts of the Distant and the deaths in their wake. Glory to the Stars!

Mysteries of Perception is a 2D investigative game structured like a choral narrative where you can jump from one character's perspective to another during the investigation. To gather more clues and progress in your investigation, it will be necessary to collect information from all viewpoints and confront them to reach plausible conclusions. Confirm your theories by consulting the stars. Jump from a past to a future perspective and discover every facet of the mysterious deaths that will be presented to you.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...
storyline:
The continent has been under the yoke of an authoritarian party for too long.
The Astralist Party promotes individuals with high animic potential, considering them superior to others.
Dirty tricks and manipulations are multiplying within the party as a revolutionary cell, active for over twenty years, begins to challenge the authorities hold on the artifacts.
These relics, are ornate bones from past civilizations that, according to myths, hold powerful powers.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...

See the world through the eyes of more than five different characters and perceive the scene from their point of view. Some will see details that the ordinary person will overlook. Others will see the world in an even more unique, biased, strange manner. The information you obtain from them will be all the more subtle to decipher...

During each investigation you will amass evidence and incriminating elements by interacting with the world around you. You can use them in the Constellarium. You have always thought better when gazing at the stars. By placing your evidence in the right spot, the path to the truth will become clearer and clearer.

The continent has been under the yoke of an authoritarian party for too long. The Astralist Party promotes individuals with high animic potential, considering them superior to others. Dirty tricks and manipulations are multiplying within the party as a revolutionary cell, active for over twenty years, begins to challenge the authorities hold on the artifacts. These relics, are ornate bones from past civilizations that, according to myths, hold powerful powers.

name: Carmen Sandiego
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’.

name: Dodge 2
summary: Bullet hell with the mouse.

name: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap
summary: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is an action-packed third-person shooter and trap defense game. Evolve as an orc-slaying War Mage through rogue-lite choices and obliterate, eviscerate, and incinerate massive hordes with up to four players.

name: Eternal Strands
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Fight epic, towering creatures while blending magical abilities with an arsenal of powerful weapons to keep the world from crumbling in this third-person, action-adventure game.
storyline:
Decades ago, the Enclave unexpectedly sealed itself away from the rest of the world. A once powerful center of magical wonders now lies dormant. After finding a way through the believed-to-be impenetrable barrier, a band of Weavers – powerful magic users who blend sword and sorcery to devastating effect – must peel back the mysteries of this lost land.

Play as Brynn, a young but fearless Weaver, determined to recover her people’s cultural home, in this third-person action-adventure game. Armed with powerful magical abilities and an arsenal of magical weapons, face enemies that range from humanoid constructs to towering beasts. Use the environment and temperature to your advantage in battles against a diverse roster of fantastical creatures, like turning a dragon’s fiery breath against ice-covered minions. Climb every surface and use arcane skills to create new paths. Explore the world in pursuit of the Enclave’s lost mysteries and challenge giant titans on your journey.

A realm of mystery, opportunity, danger, and wonder: the Enclave awaits.

name: Tails of Iron II: Whiskers of Winter
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Linux, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Embark upon a vast, snow-ravaged kingdom in Tails of Iron 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed action-RPG. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.
developers: United Label Games, Odd Bug Studios

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Become a tram driver! Hop back into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience. Drive modern real-world trams from various cities with physics indistinguishable from the real thing.

Take to the rails and transport passengers while sticking to the timetable and strategically set up your own tram routes by choosing from the many stations to build up a fully functioning and effective tram network.

name: Beat the Humans
summary: Beat the Humans is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a squad of aliens against human invaders. Gather your squad, fight, collect artifacts and explore the star system map to survive and win.

name: The Mute House
summary: Inspired by old and classic survival horror games, The Mute House combines exploration, management, puzzles and a touch of action. As Emily investigates about her sister's vanishing, she finds herself trapped in a mysterious mansion.

name: Army of Tentacles: Assault on Rainbow Unicorn Island
summary: Classic story of monster boy falls in love with human girl, and then there's a war. Train and fight with the power of love and weapons in this party-based RPG!

name: Six Legends
summary:
Six Legends is a narrative point & click game with a few minigames.
It tells the story of six young dragons, exploring forbidden parts of the world around them, and slowly changing how their own world works.
Play as all six characters as they go through friendships and life-changing encounters, in a journey of self-discovery and growth.

name: Absentis
summary: Adventure game with RPG elements in which you have to take on the role of a young and ambitious traveler named Jack, for whom a trip to a frightening, but alluring island with its secrets turned out to have completely unexpected consequences.

name: Exogate Initiative
summary: Build and manage mankind's first worlds exploration program. Build your infrastructures underground, recruit international specialists and send them on missions across the universe through the Exogate.

name: The Stone of Madness
genres: Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Tactical, Adventure, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: From the studio that brought you the Blasphemous series comes The Stone of Madness: a real-time tactical stealth game set in an 18th-century Spanish Monastery. Located in the Pyrenees, this time-worn Jesuit monastery is home to a madhouse and an inquisitorial prison. Five prisoners - plagued by cruel punishment, madness, and despair - pool their skills and resources to face their phobias, stave off insanity, uncover the mysteries of the Monastery, and find a way to escape.
developers: The Game Kitchen, Teku Studios, Tripwire Interactive
storyline: The Stone of Madness is a hardcore real-time tactics and stealth game set in a Spanish madhouse in the late 18th century. Located in the Pyrenees, a timeworn Jesuit monastery is home both to a madhouse and an inquisitorial prison. Five mysterious characters have been imprisoned between its walls under different pretenses. Plagued by cruel punishment, madness and despair, they will soon devise a plan to escape this place.

name: Under the Sea: A Hidden World of Wonders
summary: On a vibrant underwater reef, three very different friends embark on an extraordinary adventure. Learn their story in this beautiful visual novel.

name: DevTycoon
summary: DevTycoon is a software development business simulation with a charming pixel art style, which challenges you to build and manage your own company in a world where competition is fierce and the challenges reflect real life.

name: Sprout Crafter
summary: A farm simulation game where you cultivate nature, run a farm, and enjoy colorful interactions. Develop your farm by planting crops, harvesting, caring for animals, crafting, and exploring.

name: Into The Depths
summary: Escape the lab and survive through dangerous monsters and military personnel

name: Wendigo Blue
summary: Action-packed 2D beat-em-up with intense boss battles and a large variety of customizable equipment and skills. Up to 4 players with local co-op.

name: Dying Light: 10th Anniversary Bundle
summary: Released to celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Dying Light, this bundle includes the certified Hotshot Outfit, the invaluable Dawnbreaker shotgun, the radiant Sunburst revolver, and the glimmering Golden Idol machete. The gilded appearance of each item is a testament to everything you accomplished in Harran. This bundle also features the Golden Hour buggy paint job, symbolizing your role as a beacon of hope for survivors and a formidable force against enemies.

name: Neptunian Nightmare
summary: Neptunian Nightmare is a vanilla mapset and partial conversion for The Ultimate Doom (-complevel 3). It's an atmospheric romp heavily inspired by the Doom Bible and its associated prototypes, as well as Team TNT's TNT: Evilution and Icarus: Alien Vanguard.

name: In the Facade we Trust
summary: You’re torn between a girl who obsessed with you and a creature. Whose words can lead you out of this endless and dangerous loop? Which "you" are you? Who is the real monster? Trust the right person in the right cycle to get closer to the exit, or be misled by facades, complicating your next loop.

name: Tragedy at Ashville Lane
summary: Dive into a psychological horror experience and try to uncover the mystery at Ashville Lane. Step into the shadows of your fears and face them to figure out what happened that day. Survival is your only option and remaining hidden is a must.

name: Back in Service: A Metro Driver
summary: Join the adventure and become the master of the Prague metro in our game, which takes you into the underground world of the capital city. Explore stations and overcome challenges on the tracks from the cabin of a historic train. Can you complete the route, transport all passengers, and avoid delays?

name: The SS Destiny Disaster
summary: Humanity's ambition for the stars turns into a brutal fight for survival. The crew of The SS Destiny discovers a bacteria that turns their mission into a nightmare. Find resources, battle infected, and escape the doomed ship as it spirals into chaos.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Inhuman Bondage
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure, Indie
summary: Plunge your stagecoach into the long-forgotten Catacombs beneath the Kingdom and face a corrosive, oozing threat! Uncover powerful items in this new mini-region, and gain access to The Abomination, a fearsome new playable hero with unique battle mechanics.

name: 60 BPM
summary: 60 Beats per Minute is the rhythm of a healthy heart at rest, but be ready to speed it up! Play 42 levels by tapping on-beat with the music following sound and visual cues. Enjoy spectacular surprises, with soothing music and visuals from the calm of a starry night to the rush of heated battles!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in New Delhi
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the New Delhi landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Space Engineers 2
summary: Space Engineers 2 is an open world sandbox game where engineering meets exploration, construction, and survival in the vastness of space. Become a pioneer in the distant Almagest system, a new uncharted world with infinite possibilities for creativity and discovery. Build everything from starships to space stations as you craft your own path in this highly anticipated next chapter of the Space Engineers series!

name: Camelbirds
summary: Saddle up a giant bird and race to victory. Overtake your rivals, use various tools, and overcome obstacles on thrilling tracks. Prove you're the best rider in these wild races!

name: BlockWorld Ai
summary: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players

name: Circuit Runner
summary: Circuit Runner is a fast-paced cyberpunk game where you collect resources to escape a dystopian tower. Use active and passive skills to outwit enemies and overcome obstacles. Compete on Leaderboards for ultimate bragging rights in this thrilling race for freedom.

name: Bloxolotl
summary: Bloxolotl is a cozy puzzle game all about cute block-shaped Axolotls and connecting them together.

name: Knights of the Round Peg
summary: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!

name: Phantom Beast Solitaire
summary: Each start will have a different beginning. The game is set in a cartoon style, with simple and fresh graphics. Players need to deal high damage to defeat their boss through playing cards to clear the level. Suitable for players who enjoy challenges, randomness, and creativity.

name: Besotted
summary: Dive into the world of Besotted. A classic JRPG 2D-3D art style set in a fantasy world with 3 main protagonist. Each with their own deep back stories that's full of death, revenge, love, and destiny. Join the 3 as they team up together all with the same goal in mind.

name: Arrogue
summary: Collect, upgrade and unlock powerful arrows and relics to protect and restore your village. For that you’ll have to fight against procedurally generated hordes of enemies in this turn-per-turn, physics-based, roguelike! Explore the map, find the right path and make decisive choices in random events.

name: Enkate
summary: An action-rpg multiplayer with rogue-like influences, in a post-apocalyptic world.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Kingdoms
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure, Indie
summary: Kingdoms is a free standalone campaign game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II. This new game mode challenges players in a desperate race against the clock to find and defeat a monstrous threat before it overwhelms and destroys the Kingdom. Journey across the land to gather resources and battle evil incursions, all while defending a network of safe haven Inns.

name: Unreachable
summary: A first-person investigative thriller where your family is kidnapped and you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives. However, if you are sharp, you might also uncover clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

name: Undomestic
summary: Uncover forgotten secrets on a secluded medieval island. Journey through a dynamic world influenced by time and weather. Build, battle, and unravel the enigma. Shape the destiny of this captivating adventure.

name: Those Who Rule
summary: Join three fresh recruits caught in a web of betrayal as war looms over the land. Lead your band of heroes through tactical turn-based battles, master unique abilities, and forge powerful gear to turn the tide of battle. Will you unravel the conspiracy driving the conflict—or be consumed by it?

name: Rat Memory
summary: RAT MEMORY is a 3D platformer game with exploration, in which you will have to complete tasks, such as collecting items and coins, and overcome challenges as a rat trying to discover his present and change his future.

name: Camping Simulator: The Squad
summary: Camping Simulator lets you experience what camp means by preparing your backpack wisely for challenging conditions of nature. You can play all the experiences with up to four friends in multiplayer mode or single player mode.

name: Learning Factory
platforms: PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: A base building game with a relaxing atmosphere and complex structure. Build a giant factory on a multi-layered map, gather resources, craft and sell items to cats, collect cat data and process it with machine learning to establish Catopia on Mars!

name: Battle Realms: Zen Edition
summary:
Ed Del Castillo (producer of Command & Conquer) proudly presents the return of his masterpiece: Battle Realms.

Critically acclaimed and enjoyed by fans worldwide, Battle Realms is packed with innovation, deep strategy, and an immersive world filled with meaningful detail. It's a game defined by its setting - an RTS that combines resource management, unit development, and tactical gameplay with storytelling inspired by the Kung Fu movies and oriental culture.

If you missed it the first time, now is your chance to experience one of the most innovative RTS's in the genre. Even though the original Battle Realms came out almost two decades ago, many of its features have yet to be copied in other games. With unique units and many original ideas Battle Realms is a game that no RTS fan can afford to miss.
storyline:
Sit by the fire, young nobleman, and help yourself to a cup of jasmine tea. You are wise to come here. So many warriors before you attempted to unite this realm under their reign. They were brave and strong. They had the noble knowledge of tactics. They knew how to choose the best steel for swords. They had fists that could punch holes through stone walls. They had eyes that could spot a sneaking ninja in the middle of a cloudy night. They had hearts that knew no fear nor remorse. But none of them came to seek advice of an old man living on the mountain. And--one by one--they failed. Their power crumbled, their dreams vanished, and their lives faded. You are wise to come here, young nobleman. But this is only your first step towards the true wisdom and the true power that only comes with balance...

Once upon a time there was a proud empire with many great clans. The Serpent Clan ruled this empire while the other clans like the Lotus and Crane maneuvered for greater control of it. It is said, that in those times a great darkness grew from the shadows and formed sinister creatures of pure night. Like droplets of rain they dotted the land and overwhelmed the one clan after another. Tarrant, the leader of the Serpent clan, was the first to accept the fate of the empire. He fled to the south with the remnants of the Serpent Clan and its prized possession, the Dragon Orb.

Further and further they travelled until he could see the Southern Seas and the end of the land. It was here that he turned and faced the Horde. Summoning all the power of the Dragon Orb, he separated the southern tip of the continent from the rest of the mainland with the awesome power of the orb. Neither it nor he would ever be seen again. The Horde could not cross running water, so Tarrant had saved his people at the cost of his own life and the Orb.

To this protected place came two other Clans, the Lotus and the Wolf. The Lotus Clan, twisted and corrupt managed to cross to safety by means unknown. The Wolf Clan, whose matriarchal Druidesses foresaw the drowning of their lands by tidal wave (a result of Tarrant breaking the world) built massive arks for their people which rode the surge and shipwrecked on the new formed island.

How they came to know one another and fight for their piece of the island is the story of Battle Realms!

name: SCP: Fragmented Minds
summary: Fragmented Minds explores the reality in which The Foundation fails to contain a breach after a cataclysmic XK-Scenario. You will awaken in the derelict depths of Mars Site-113 to discover what happened, and piece together the solution to the most devastating event humanity has ever seen.
developers: HST Game Studios, indie.io, HST Game Studios
storyline: Set long after a massive event decimated humanity, you awaken from cryosleep in Mars's Site -113. This was the most state-of-the-art off-world research site in existence and holds many answers to the secrets of what happened during the events that threatened humanity's existence many months before. You'll traverse the crumbling and overgrown facility to try and find anything you can to help you against the many dangerous creatures that have made the outer sections of the facility their new homes.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Anniversary Edition
summary: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Vendrán las aves
summary: You bought a guitar with your severance pay. And you have enough savings to do without a job for a year. So you've decided to devote some time to yourself.

name: Laundry Room Dilemma
summary: You find yourself amnesiac and trapped in a laundry room. You can earn food by working. Who built this place? How do you escape?

name: Living With It
summary:
Welcome
Instructions for this training will be delivered via memo.

name: Pogo Epoch: Impossible 99%
summary: It’s a game where you bounce on a Pogo Stick and try to climb a massive tower full of tricky obstacles. Take on the impossible challenge—one unlucky slip, and you’re back at the bottom. Pure focus solo or chaotic fun with friends

name: Rise of Kenshin
summary: Demons invasion, the young heroes face the heavy siege of the enemy, they fought in blood and finally recovered the lost land. This is a national style Roguelike casual game, players can play a variety of roles, gradually grow, and experience the hearty grass-cutting battles.

name: You Draw, I Guess
summary: An online pictionary game of drawing and guessing. The game has 4 modes and supports up to 10 players in a group. You can select a prompt and draw a picture for other players to guess. You can also guess on others' drawings. Time to test your drawing and guessing skills!

name: Egg Ascent
summary: Launch yourself through tough but fair platforming challenges with the power of eggs in this suck and spit momentum based platformer!

name: Princess & Blade
summary: A Clothing collection ARPG.Creatively to sets properties according to the appearance of the clothes. Hundreds of clothes for the protagonist to enjoy, experience different battle strategies because of different clothes.Fight accompany sexy,beauty or to become a heavily armored angel.

name: Type Help
summary: A puzzle-mystery game inspired by Return of the Obra Dinn, Her Story, Unheard and The Roottrees are Dead.
storyline:
Investigate the files on an old computer that once belonged to a mysterious outside agent.

The files detail the gruesome story of Galley House, a case that was said to be unsolvable.

What really happened at Galley House? And what did the agent find out that lead to their death?

Delve through deeper and deeper layers of mystery as you piece together the grand puzzle.

And remember... There are no ghosts in Galley House!

name: Half-Life: Savior Complex
summary: You play as a scientist that got himself lost in Xen during the resonance cascade and you have to find your way back to Earth and escape. The mod is a short, old-school inspired project that has been in development for the past year and will feature 5 maps that spans across Xen and Black Mesa

name: Sayonara Sigil Sentry
summary:
ALERT - ALERT - ALERT

Massive, unknown, hostile, fae-type entities are coming.

Pilot the Sigil Sentry.

Draw city-scale, looping fae name runes my marking their points with floating, spinning sigils.

name: Outbreak: The Fall of Cypress Ridge Collection
summary: Return to the world of '90s survival horror in these action packed nightmares!

name: Mayéutica
summary:
Only one can get the job. Review their resumes, ask them questions and find out what they hide under their skin. Every second counts.
Mayéutica is a narrative experience about four job candidates. Through their answers, they will discover truths hidden from themselves until they explode. Designed and programmed in 48 hours to participate in the Global Game Jam 2025, with the theme “Bubble”. Recognition for best narrative by the Francisco de Vitoria University.

name: Starling
summary: Starling is a student made third person base-building exploration game. As an employee of Starling Corp., your mission is to gather resources from across the galaxy. After an unexpected turn of events, you will need to rebuild your base while being assisted by adorable creatures known as starlings.

name: Grand Theft Bubble
summary: Join an ordinary person as he goes about his work: wrapping objects in bubble wrap. Maybe then you can relax after a hard day preparing orders...

name: Stickman Odyssey
platforms: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Will you conquer the odyssey and emerge victorious?

name: Hoarding Simulator 2.0
summary: Sleep, train, ride a bike—almost anything is possible in this game. All you need to do is collect!

name: Toasty Tires
summary:
You're playing with your toys in your bedroom when your parent comes in and asks you to clean up. Can you pick up your room and escape before it's too late? Or take your car for a spin in endless mode, where the carpet is never-ending. Just enjoy the ride.

Zip around the carpet and hardwood floor across Five unique levels as things get weirder and weirder. Explore and maybe by the end you'll uncover what's wrong with your parent before it's too late. Add avocado (and a little extra challenge) to your Toasty Tires experience with Avocado Edition!

name: Subway Exorcist Girl
summary: A subway train plagued by strange occurrences. A part-time exorcist girl arrives to confront the supernatural chaos, with the unknown ahead.
storyline:
The game has certain random elements, and you cannot predict the terrifying phenomena you will encounter next. Each death and rebirth presents you with completely different crises, and your previous exploration experience cannot help you or provide a sense of security. The randomly occurring horror phenomena and monsters add to the fear.

Players must identify all abnormalities and find a way to eliminate them, ensuring that they do not overlook anything in order to safely reach the end. Otherwise, they will be continuously killed and reborn by an indescribable unknown evil force.

Based on the gameplay of horror suspense and light roguelike elements, the game features a certain level of narrative and character development. The dark, eerie atmosphere of the subway is filled with the unknown and mysteries. Players explore and interact with various characters, monsters, and anomalies to gain an immersive role-playing experience and narrative insights.

The game will showcase refreshing monster designs and bizarre horror imagery, aiming to create a strong psychological horror atmosphere and incomprehensible terrifying scenes.

With the continuous arrival of the unknown and surprises, do you dare to challenge?

name: MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix
summary: In MeiaUm: Escaping the Pix, you dive into a digital world where precious bits are scattered across every level. Your mission? Collect them—but there's a big risk: the Pix. One touch from this ruthless system can be fatal, and the threat is always lurking. As you progress, the challenges grow tougher, and you'll need agility and sharp thinking to dodge the danger and grab all the bits before the Pix catches you. Every move could be your last chance.

name: The Demon Lord’s Daughter and the Tower of Seals
summary: In the wake of the Demon Lord’s defeat, his daughter, Lilina, finds herself leading a miserable existence without any of the comforts of the castle she once called home. Now she has to make an honest living while seeking out six fabled talismans in an attempt to regain her lost powers!

name: Walk Zero1
summary: The distant future... There are almost no people left on planet Earth, everyone has moved to Mars. The age of prosperity, the age of robots, androids, technology. And then one day, robot Zero1 decided to take a walk around planet Earth. What awaits him? Desert? Vast forests? Who will he meet on his way? All this is to be found out in the walking simulator.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - Nextgen Edition
summary: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - Nextgen Edition is a total conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto IV. It includes every mission and side content from the 2002 original game. Bringing the city, pedestrians, cars and even radio stations to the Rockstar Advanced Game Engine (RAGE).
storyline:
Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s.

Having just made it back onto the streets of Liberty City after a long stretch in maximum security, Tommy Vercetti is sent to Vice City by his old boss, Sonny Forelli. They were understandably nervous about his re-appearance in Liberty City, so a trip down south seemed like a good idea. But all does not go smoothly upon his arrival in the glamorous, hedonistic metropolis of Vice City. He's set up and is left with no money and no merchandise. Sonny wants his money back, but the biker gangs, Cuban gangsters, and corrupt politicians stand in his way. Most of Vice City seems to want Tommy dead. His only answer is to fight back and take over the city himself.

name: Car Heist Simulator: Thief Mechanic
summary: The city’s most prized cars, waiting for the perfect thief.

name: Dot
summary: Do something to the pixel and trigger something to happen in the game.

name: Catcha
summary: Catcha is a catching game where you shoot bombs and bosses, not your average catching game...
storyline: You are a normal person getting food and getting ready for the winter, but then there spawned a tree that had almost everything you could ask for, but then, it went too well and then there was a shadow and then a the ground started to shake and then there was an evil villain called monstiros, he then spawned in bombs and bosses and locked him out of his house, he needs to get food fast and shoot the bombs and bosses before it is too late and it is winter

name: Sexdivers
summary: SEXDIVERS is an intense survival shooter where you play as a fighter escorting a scientific expedition on a mysterious uninhabited planet.

name: Car-Toon Chaos
summary: Car-toon Chaos is an action-packed game where high-speed chases and combat converge. Play as a vigilante driver with fully loaded automatic weapons, pursuing criminals by day and evading colossal dinosaurs by night. Playable on both PC and VR.

name: Time To Live
summary: A story of living with a woman whose identity remains unknown for 30 days.

name: UFO Blast
summary: Blast the UFOs that appear in space to earn XP and gold. Spin the spinner earn more gold. Open cards and buy new equipments or abilities for your SpaceShip . Advance through waves and try to reach the final boss.

name: Sae
summary: SAE takes you to a dreamlike yet perilous tropical island chain in the South Pacific. Survive the natural perils, gather resources, and find your way back to civilization.

name: Datura Time
summary:
Datura Time is a third-person action-adventure game that catapults you into a realm swirling with mystery, suspense, and dynamic action. This captivating world is a tribute to the 90's console games era, handcrafted with love and passion by a single-developer, Vladeta Stojanovic, with an infusion of post-Soviet and Eastern European aesthetics.

You, the player, are plunged into an enigmatic alternative reality known as the "Zone" after an accidental encounter with a peculiar drug - "Datura". Here, you'll cross paths with a host of characters, some allies, some foes, all delivering a singular message - you are an outsider and the unfolding reality is more than meets the eye.

As you navigate this perilous world, you'll unravel the Zone's hidden truths - it's a metaphysical limbo, home to the souls of Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union, currently under the control of malevolent entities. This sinister realm is in desperate need of a true hero - a role YOU never expected but must now embrace. Your mission? Survive, defeat the wicked forces, restore balance, and return home.
storyline:
In Datura Time, the player is transported to an alternate reality, known as the "Zone", after they accidentally ingest a special drug called "Datura". During their time in the Zone, they meet different characters (some friendly, some not), who soon make it clear to the player that they are not where they belong, and that there is a whole lot more going on than meets the eye.

By interacting with characters, exploring the Zone and avoiding the dangers that come along the way, the player discovers that the Zone is kind of a limbo for souls of people from Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union, and is being controlled by evil and sinister entities.

Until now, other mystical entities tried to fight this evil, but kept failing as they did not have a true hero who could help them. The players then assume the role of this unexpected hero, who must get back home again without getting killed, while attempting to get rid of the evil forces and restore spiritual equilibrium and order in the strange dimension where the Zone is located.

name: Jaded
summary: Platform and fight your way through mountains and forests to accomplish your purpose as a Jade being. Slow down time using your 360-degree directional dash, and lock on to targets to strike! Fight soldiers and creatures on your quest in this gem of a game.

name: Summer Islands
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Simulator, Strategy, Indie
summary:
Be the right businessman and build a unique holiday paradise. Become rich and enlarge your paradise. But be on the lookout for your competitors and the unpredictable weather.

Summer Islands – In this diversified economic simulation you have the possibility to build an indescribable holiday paradise.

Build cottages, villas or expensive hotels, right on the beach or in the mountains. When a building has been completed, the tourists can come by boat or plane.

Then the difficulty begins: build bars, discos, golf courses, supermarkets and many other buildings, which are popular by the tourists and let you as the owner become rich. But do not forget their surroundings. The many catastrophes that can occur and your enemies who also want to depend on the cake. You should always keep an eye on your vacation paradise.
storyline:
The holiday is in danger.

Millions of vacationers find no suitable vacation. Be the right businessman and build a unique holiday paradise. Become rich and enlarge your paradise. But be on the lookout for your competitors and the unpredictable weather.

name: ReSpaced
summary: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you master gun recoil to leap across platforms, battle various enemies, and upgrade your weapon to escape an overrun space station.

name: Cube 2x1 RailFarm
summary: This package includes two puzzle games: Cube Farmer, where you place cubes to irrigate crops, and Cube Railway, where you build tracks to guide trains to their destination. Enjoy 40 challenging levels in each game!

name: M.A.D. Cows and D.U.M.B. Ducks Bundle
summary:
Better together!

M.A.D. Cows is an exciting, retro, action platform game. Mow down aliens. Buy better guns. Rescue cows, dogs, raccoons, and more.

D.U.M.B. Ducks is an action-filled, retro platform game. Slaughter giant snails. Battle gigantic beasts. Buy better guns. Blow up walls. Collect fat stacks of cash.

Play as Deacon, a young pirate in search for his brother after rumors of his disappearance. Faced with a new reality the fight for survival begins.

summary: DON’T GET GOT is a multiplayer co-op horror game of deception. You’re locked inside and something is out to get you. Find the key. Use the environment and collaborate with other players until they no longer serve your needs. Make it to the safe room. Survival not guaranteed.

name: Parkour Assassin: Sprint Run

Terrifying bombs and robotic enemies will stand in your way, but you can use the quick blade in your hand to slash through them!

name: The 8ight

name: A Few Days With: Bianca

name: Menticide
summary: Menticide is an endless runner where you protect a man running from himself. You draw lines to bounce the man around, block off enemies and cut through obstacles. Through strong symbolism and procedural rhetoric we are using the game as an analogue for mental health.

summary: Merge, strategize, and conquer—reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle phenomenon!

name: Unaccessible
summary: Unaccessible is a third-person wheelchair platformer about struggling to get a health insurance claim approved on a mysterious island without accessibility ramps. Tackle stairs, climb obstacles and hop your way through the pain of the claims approval process.
storyline: Unaccessible is a third-person wheelchair platformer about struggling to get a health insurance claim approved on a mysterious island. You've broken both of your legs and are wheelchair-bound. No accessibility ramps in sight.

name: Wukong Fight in Kaoria
summary: This is a single player action adventure game that includes mythological themed character actions and role-playing, You can use regular attacks and skills, spells, such as magic, celestial phenomena, and body fixing spells, to Fight and defeat the enemies you encounter.

name: MyPopgoes: New and Improved!
genres: Point-and-click, Real Time Strategy (RTS), Simulator, Indie, Arcade
summary: myPopgoes has been reprogrammed from scratch, with countless fixes, optimisations, and brand new features! New and Improved! is out NOW as a free update to the game on Steam.

name: Stand: Survive, Team-up, And Never Die
summary: STAND is a tower defence in a post-apocalyptic environment. Other survivors can join you, but also lots of upgrades. Combine weapons with items. Make a spinning flamethrower or install barbed wire to face the hordes ! Survive, Team-up, And Never Die !

name: One Room Dungeon
summary: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.

summary: Lunavania is an Anime pixel horizontal action shooting game with unique pixel art style and roguelite elements.The game has rich build structures, over a hundred different styles of weapons, equipment, skills, which can be infinitely stacked and freely combined to experience the fun of meat pigeons.

name: Wait: The Patient
summary: Wait: The Patient is a non-combat mystery horror game, that takes place in the 90s and follows the story of Dr. Alice Fincher. After a new patient arrives in the mental hospital she works in, strange events start to unfold.
storyline: Based in in the mid '90s, the game follows Dr. Fincher, a psychologist who has recently begun working at a mental hospital until her typical work day gets disrupted by the arrival of a new, strange patient - a young man surrounded by an eery air. An ominous chemistry builds between the two, and at the same time, an onset of strange phenomena begins within the hospital. Dr. Fincher decides to investigate.

name: Crimson Snow Deluxe
summary: CRIMSON SNOW DELUXE: A psychological horror RPG where you destroy the world you've created...

game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
You and an AI mech named Magus explore a dystopian landscape in the year 2222. A catastrophic poisonous rain event known as Tears of the New Moon nearly eradicated the human race — survivors fled to the underground city of Amasia. To survive, the player character known as a “Drifter” must sell AO Crystals, which can only be harvested from the polluted outside world. To travel, you’ll drive around in a vehicle called the Cradle Coffin, which you can customize.

The game will also have a unique PvP option, wherein playing online will support encounters with others plays on their own missions - you might collide head to head while trying to gather precious supplies
storyline: The year is 2222. It has been years since “Tears of the New Moon”, a mysterious rain, poured and wiped out almost the entire human race. The poisonous rain gave birth to deformed creatures devouring for humans, and humanity fled from the danger. As means for survival, the humans then build an underground haven; Amasia. In this new built dystopian city, on a pursuit of maintaining their existence, they run into an Artificial Intelligence named Magus. Not knowing how things will work between them, the story of how Humans and AI coinciding and trying to find their truths begin.

Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

Players must muddle their way through a murder mystery that's messier than a fresh hairball, with a captivating voice-over and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!).
storyline: A freakish corpse... a pissed-off bookie... a wormhole to another reality... it's just another day in the office for Albert Wilde, feline private eye.

You don't need Mishelin Star to create the best restaurant in the world. Who says street food can't be delicious?

Start a real street food restaurant in your city and make it a legend. It's all for your beloved customers and let everyone visit you and find something tasty. Make this place trendy and watch your business grow!

Expand and upgrade your restaurant. Every guest will feel the fusion of the simple street food and amazing taste. Be a perfectionist and create something unique even in such a trivial place.

Manage the restaurant - add tables and new thematic spaces. Open new zones and add new dishes. Experiment with the menus and the ingredients. It's all up to you!

Let everyone taste and fall in love with your delicious street food!

summary: Knight's Night! is a retro-style 1-bit platformer. Collect items, unlock new abilities, and make your way into the evil wizard's castle to save the kingdom!

name: TheLostWoods
summary: You find yourself lost deep in a strange forest. Will you be able to find the right path and escape this mysterious forest safely?

name: Greed Stays Home
summary: A horror walking sim that emphasizes atmosphere, tension, fear, and immersive storytelling, all heightened by well-timed jump scares. The game takes place in a village frozen in time, stuck somewhere in the mid-20th century.

name: 1000 Princes
summary: 1000 Princes is a female-oriented 3D visual novel romance game. A fracture in your timeline has caused all your prince husbands—spanning past, present and future from different settings—to time-travel to your current era. Now1,000 princes coexist on your shared timeline, protecting and adoring you.

name: Turbo Dismount 2
summary: Turbo Dismount 2 is a comedy physics racing sandbox with Mr. Dismount and his friends. It is the officially ambitious sequel to the wildly popular, immensely successful, world-renowned entertainment juggernaut - Turbo Dismount.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - Jedi Power Battles
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Take back the Theed Royal Palace in this fast and furious lightsaber action game. You will have the power of the Force and your trusty lightsaber to help you ward off legions of battle droids, destroyer droids, assassins, and other creatures from Star Wars: The Phantom Menace.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: The critically acclaimed Guilty Gear Strive arrives on Nintendo Switch for the first time, complete with the first three season passes of DLC to make for a total of 28 playable characters!

name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
summary: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city. A new title, "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" now in development please look forward to the release of more information.

name: Horizons: The End Of Words
summary: Humanity has written all there is to write about anything and everything. Words will soon lose all meaning. Find fragments of lost words drifting in space and explore the universe through your prose.

name: The Jiang Shi 2: Curse of Soul
summary: This is an independent development game based on the Chinese folklore "JiangShi", with a 2.5D horizontal operation perspective as the main focus, and features exploration, decryption, fighting, capture and other game features and gameplay.

name: Hunter Moonstrike
summary: Hunter Moonstrike is the first survival game integrated with artificial intelligence. In this game, all npc have their own unique story and you can see the story of the game from their point of view. Talk to any person, ask any question you like, they will answer and think they are alive
storyline:
The Enigma of MOON

In the chaotic aftermath of the zombie apocalypse, when hope seemed all but lost, a new threat emerged from the shadows—Moon , a ruthless and enigmatic figure who would come to dominate the forest landscape. His origins shrouded in mystery, Moon’s true identity remained a closely guarded secret, hidden behind a mask that concealed his every feature.

Amassing a formidable band of loyal followers, Moon quickly established himself as a force to be reckoned with. His modus operandi was simple yet effective: he would target the weaker camps, extorting their precious resources through a combination of intimidation and brute force. Moon’s insatiable thirst for power and control knew no bounds, and he would stop at nothing to maintain his dominance over the forest.

Hanks, the resolute leader of Camp One, was among the first to recognize the imminent danger posed by Moon . A seasoned military veteran, Hanks had honed his survival skills in the wilderness, and he understood the importance of unity and resilience in the face of such a formidable adversary. Yet, even as he harbored a deep-seated enmity towards Moon , Hanks remained uncertain about the true extent of his rival’s resources and capabilities

Moon’s true strength lay not only in his physical prowess and the loyalty of his followers but also in the veil of secrecy that shrouded his every move. He was a master of deception, always keeping his face hidden behind the mask, and his subordinates were fiercely devoted to maintaining his anonymity. This aura of mystery only served to amplify Moon’s reputation, striking fear into the hearts of those who dared to challenge his authority.

As Hanks and his camp struggled to maintain their fragile existence, the threat of Moon loomed ever larger. The conflict between the two leaders had become a battle of wits, with Hanks constantly seeking ways to outmaneuver his elusive foe. Yet, with Moon’s resources and influence growing by the day, the stakes had never been higher, and the fate of the forest – and perhaps even the remnants of humanity – hung in the balance.

name: Chaos Express
summary: Run, Deliver and do it with care. Become an owner of Delivery point in near-future city and make all the parcels reach their destination. Do it yourself or with friends.

name: Kick the Boss's Ass
summary: Collect items and defeat the annoying boss!

name: Airships: Lost Flotilla
genres: Fighting, Shooter, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie, Arcade
summary: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a steampunk autoshooter where you fight your way through waves of enemies on your way to a safe harbour. Destroy your foes, harvest wreckage, and upgrade your ship.
storyline: Your fleet was betrayed and your airship barely escaped destruction. Now fight your way past waves of pirates, cultists, and sky monsters. Destroy your foes, harvest wreckage, upgrade your ship, and find your way to safety.

name: Casino Simulator 2024
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Sport, Strategy, Card & Board Game
summary: Casino Simulator: Build, manage, and expand your own casino from scratch. Hire staff, design your casino, and delight customers by offering the most popular games. Enjoy the thrill of the casino experience!

name: AI2U: With You ‘Till The End
genres: Puzzle, Strategy, Adventure, Indie, Visual Novel
summary: A first-person escape room game with AI-powered NPCS who are desperate to keep you by their side... so much so that they will resort to drastic measures to keep you from leaving! Explore the environment, solve puzzles, and uncover mysteries in different levels with various themes.

name: Mysterious Mystery, EP 1: The Duo Dilemma
summary: Mysterious Mystery is a fully voiced mystery visual novel centered around the detective duo, Justin and Dakota. Solve multiple cases using Dakota's evidence gathering abilities and Justin's expert interrogation. Discover outlandish cases, meet unique characters, and become world class detectives.

name: Streamer Life Simulator 2
summary: In the second game of the series, competition has increased and now everyone wants to be a streamer. Are you ready to stream until your cpu burns out?

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!

name: Wren's Resurgence
summary: Wren’s Resurgence is a 2D action platformer where Wren must fight her way through the Yokai-infested lands in order to rescue her sister Swan. With the evil force’s tyrannical grasp on the island, it’s up to Wren to brandish her katana and bring peace back to the land.

name: Virtual Love Secrets
