summary: A visual novel a little unusual, which not only the decisions you make change the course, but each game will be personal.

name: Legends of Savvarah: Children of the Sun
summary: A fantasy interactive story (visual novel) where the mysteries of ancient gods, enigmas of bygone eras, magic, and the complex relationships between various beings are intricately woven together.

name: Butcher's Creek
summary: Use rusty tools to brutalize a perverted gang of serial torturers in the remote Appalachian Forest.
storyline:
November, 1993...

A troubled loner with a hunger for cinematic gore finds himself on the other side of the camera when rumors of authentic snuff videotapes lead him to an abandoned cabin near Butcher's Creek, Pennsylvania. What starts as illicit urban exploration quickly becomes a fight for survival when he's captured by a gang of sadistic killers. Now his only option is to pick up a box cutter, a hammer, a pickaxe, or whatever else is at hand, and unleash a little video violence of his own.

name: Exterminators of Saturn
summary: A top down, twin stick shooter inspired by classic retro arcade games with loads of enemies, fast paced bullet hell combat, big boss battles and tons of weapon customizations.

name: Dreamcore
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Step into the surreal with Dreamcore, a body-cam styled psychological horror game that plunges you into the eerie beauty of "liminal spaces." Unravel the mysteries of Dreamcore’s non-linear worlds and uncover its hidden secrets. Can you discover what lies beyond the edge of reality?

name: Realm of Simplicity
summary: Realm of Simplicity is a indie-developed MMORPG that will have you embark on your own adventure. Complete quests, master your skills, party-up and conquer dungeons all at your own pace!

name: Infest
summary: Infest is a roguelike deckbuilder where you manipulate the battleground Pixel-by-Pixel. Every pixel is physically simulated to burn, freeze, corrode, shock, and melt. Deploy a carefully-crafted deck to unleash impressive chain reactions on the alien infestation!
storyline: Fire, Oil, Ice, Poison Gas, Water, Seeds and Growing Plants are just a few of the elements you'll have to strategically navigate. Customize your deck and upgrade cards along the way. Make sure it is well balanced to handle a variety of environmental effects. Can you melt ice? Can you stop mutant plants? Foresight is key. Deal damage card by card, when your stack is exhausted the enemies get their chance to attack! They will create defensive barriers, throw damage cards at you, buff themselves and heal others! Anticipating their moves and playing the right card is key. Choose your path through the alien universe. Each run is different so you can replay many times without getting bored. Besides the playable levels, you'll encounter shops, hospitals, and dozens of different bonus challenges. Picking the right path is key to survival.

name: Dead of Darkness
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.
themes: Action, Horror, Thriller, Survival, Drama, Mystery
storyline: England, 1985. Private investigator Miles Windham is asked to help the local police on a missing persons investigation on Velvet Island. But once he arrives on the island, he soon realizes that the residents are behaving strangely. Nobody seems to be interested in clearing up the case. In fact, there is a growing hostility towards the investigator that feels as though it is becoming stronger by the minute. It doesn't take long until the situation escalates and Miles finds himself in a struggle for his own survival.

name: Venus in Furs: Sensual Pleasure
summary: Hardpunch's Venus is alone in her temple of love, pleasure, and sex. She knows that the world we know no longer exists. Now, she remains a recluse in her palace and anyone who dares to steal her precious gifts will be punished with explicit and savage sex. This invader will become her sex slave...

name: Prison Life Simulator: The Legend of Navalny
summary: Immerse yourself in the prison life of the most dangerous criminal in modern Russia.Go through the prison path from the beginning and determine the fate of the famous defendant. What will you become? Offended, authority or maybe the president of the Russian Federation? Everything depends on you!

name: Osman Gazi
summary: Osman Gazi 3D RPG Game

name: Divine Legacy
summary: Divine Legacy is a dark story/character-driven action RPG with hints of humor, friendship, and bonds. Fight your way through hordes of demons, and move one step closer towards the truth!

name: Creo God Simulator
summary: Creo God Simulator is a game of building, decision-making, survival, and a ton of peasant smiting. As a newly-assigned lesser god, it's your job to build a society bit by bit, while convincing your new population to believe in you as their one true god.

name: Rocket Boots Mania
summary: Rocket Boots Mania is a fully-loaded 3D platformer set in a thrilling open world filled with interactions, puzzles, secrets, and collectibles. The game features singleplayer campaign as well as asynchronous multiplayer through online leaderboards.

name: Doom Anthology
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: The Doom Anthology takes players through more than three decades of demon slaying - from the classic games that popularized the first-person shooter genre to the fan favorite franchise reboot and its sequel.

name: StompyBoy
summary: Pilot a big stompy mech, and shoot other big stompy mechs with your various lasers. That's about it.

name: Goddess Of Swing
summary: A Highscore Chaser game, made from german group of students.

name: The Reward of Cherishment and Eternity.
summary:
Death, nature's remedy for all things, offers you a deal: Help him, and he shall grant peace for a lost loved one.

-Explore a visually stunning world filled with hidden secrets and unravel its mysteries at your own pace.
-Chart your own path by playing the levels in any order, enhancing replayability.
-Master a deep and complex combat system, with fully integrated DualSense wireless controller features, including haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for unparalleled tactile engagement.

The Reward of Cherishment and Eternity is a third-person, action-adventure shooter that combines exploration, emotionally charged storytelling, and intense, rewarding combat.

name: Jumpng Disable
summary:
"Casual 3D JUMPNG game"

A game that feels familiar yet refreshingly new—and occasionally downright crazy. No further explanation needed.
Let's JUMPNG!

name: Varyznex
summary: A horizontal scrolling 2D shmup

name: The Short Trip
summary: The Short Trip is a game about driving and surviving in an endless desert along a somewhat-long almost-short road.

name: RedShift
summary:
In a city on the edge of nothing, the race is on.
Everything unnessessary to compete must go. No safety gear, no doors. Just you, an engine, and a bucket we've welded you inside of.

name: GuGu Pizza: Delivering Pizza to the Space Station? Boss, This is Just Not Right!
summary: GuGu Pizza’s motto is to deliver anywhere! So couldn't refuse the pineapple pizza order that came from the space station. Eventually, the pigeon deliveryman begins a high-altitude jump to deliver pizza to space, passing through the city, forest, and sky...

name: Scary World
summary:
You are about to see a scary world.

Your goal is to survive just ten minutes in this bouncy, bumpy, dynamic and surprising bullet heaven. Inspired by Vampire Survivors.

name: Triptych Book I: Blockhead
summary: Triptych Book I: Blockhead is a graphical adventure set in an alternate version of World War One with simple point and click interface, easy to use controls & rip-roaring adventure in the skies!
storyline:
Triptych Book I: Blockhead is the 1st part of a 3 part graphical adventure game series set in an alternate version of World War One, where robotics have now begun to fight the war in place of mankind.

War *is* the world now, soldiers become citizens in battlefields dimply lit by glowing incandescent bulbs. A last bastion of hope chugs through the clouds; the Great Airship Auberon - a last holdout and floating fortress now about to come under duress & betrayal.

You begin the game awakening in the bowels of the airship Auberon, controlling an experimental prototype machine; you are the first true android. Your mission is unclear at first - but with the crew busy with an emergency brought about by an unexpected storm you will soon find yourself having to explore the airship and solve problems along the way. Perhaps a saboteur awaits in your midst? Only a small pigeon sent by your creator provides any real help. You are alone, for now...

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.5 - Astra-nomical Moment
genres: Fighting, Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
platforms: Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Mac
summary:
Version 1.5 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Astra and Evelyn
• New Outfits for Ellen, Nicole and Astra
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Pio
summary: Prove your strength in the world of stars and become the brightest one of all! PIO faces trials to show his light and challenges himself to become the most radiant star.

name: Aquarun
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Dive into the vibrant world of AquaRun, a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer that tests your reflexes, precision, and determination! Inspired by the best of hardcore platforming games, AquaRun challenges you to guide a fragile yet determined character through 40 meticulously designed levels filled with relentless obstacles, devious traps, and tricky platforms.

name: Waifu Simulator: Latex Edition
summary: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

name: Popotinho's Adventures
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Guide a mischievous kid back to his parents in a vibrant side-scrolling adventure!

name: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
summary:
The coiling chains of obsession that began with The Shell now threaten to strangle Detective Reiji Tokisaka in the third and final entry in the trilogy. As old friends and foes rise up for one last confrontation, can anyone break the cycle—and can Reiji's heart ever be set free?

(This version is the censored Steam release of The Shell Part III: Paradiso)
storyline:
The year is Showa 33—or 1958, by the new calendar.

It is an especially cold January, and amid the dour gray snow, a funeral is being held. A portrait of a girl's face sits there draped in snow, looking almost embarrassed and a little lonely...

The imprisoned painter Shinzo Mamiya died a scant few weeks after the Blessed Congregation's crimes came to light. Detective Reiji Tokisaka has been recruited by his old friend Maris Stella to help sort through the man's belongings, but instead they find an unknown work in his studio: a one-winged angel with no arms. The work, which they name Exile Of Paradise, is as beautiful as it is sinister—and it resembles his infamous masterpiece Girl In Shell.

A few more days later, a woman's corpse is found, modified in the manner depicted in Exile. She is identified as having formerly worked with Tomoyuki Masaki.

There may be no one left who can cut the chain of obsession that began with Girl In Shell—nobody but one small girl.

E quell'ossessione fa girare il sole e tutte le stelle.

name: Dark Trip
summary:
Dark Trip is a psychedelic VR escape room where the hero is forced to use drugs investigating a sadomasochistic lab.

The game of Escape Room genre features Lavcraftian setting, Psychedelic Trips gameplay mechanics and the goals to collect and investigate evidences. Some event in the game are inspired by David Lynch's and Terry Gilliam's movies.

- Experiences Psychedelic Trips. Use VR to immerse yourself into psychedelic experiences not possible on any other gaming platform.

- Investigate the Sadomasochistic Laboratory. Solve twisted riddles in surrealistic setting of physical and mental torture.

- Collect the Pieces of Horrible Truth. Search for clues, artifacts and diary pieces in each location to discover the dark story behind the events.
storyline:
In a small German town, the only daughter of a retired businessman disappears. A player hired to investigate the case finds a seemingly abandoned laboratory. Exploring room after room, the player discovers evidence of experiments carried out in the place, notebooks of employees and test subjects.

It becomes clear that the infamous Nazi doctor Mengele conducted the inhuman experiments here using psychedelic substances and sadomasochistic practices. Moving deeper, the hero understands that despite the apparent abandonment, the laboratory is still active and the experiment continues: Olga (the kidnapped girl) and the player themself are in fact the active subjects of the evil occult ritual that is merging the infernal plane with our world, causing bizarre sets where one can not distinguish hallucinations from reality…

name: Rusty Dudes
summary: Assemble a team to complete various missions, while fighting off hordes of freaks. In your will be available two dozen unique mercenaries with different skills. Combine them at your discretion.

name: Dog Walking Adventures
summary: Dog Walking Adventures invites players into a cozy casual experience where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Walk around and explore immersive environments, all while playing with your dog, completing quests and collecting items.

name: Shalnor: Silverwind Saga
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Rynna has arrived on one of Shalnor's most dangerous Islands. Prepare yourself for an epic RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain
summary: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain is a four-player co-op survival horror game centered on the supernatural "Yokai" from Japanese folklore. Trapped in a cursed domain, you and your companions must work together to endure the curse, hide from the terrifying Yokai, and find a way to escape.

name: Gravelord
summary: Gravelord is a fast-paced boomer shooter voiced by a badass protagonist featuring hand-crafted levels filled with secrets and hordes of enemies to kill. Dish out some brutal carnage with powerful guns and collect Tarot Cards to gain even more killing power. Let's put the fun back in funeral!

name: Dog Walking Sim
summary: Dog Walking Sim is a first-person experience, that invites players into a virtual world where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Players can immerse themselves in a relaxing environment and play with their dog or go on quests and collect other dogs.

name: Disorder
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Escape the department store and uncover the hidden truth in this full 3D roguelike dungeon crawler
storyline: Become a girl who has lost her memory and must uncover the truth. The story progresses as you become stronger with each escape attempt.

name: Farmer's Shop Simulator
summary: Create your own farm. Harvest crops, take care of animals, sell goods, set prices at your discretion, hire staff, expand, design, and build your dream farm.

name: Silverwind
summary: An RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Supermarket Bash
genres: Racing, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Adventure, Indie
summary: This is a happy and tense weekend. The rush to buy in the supermarket has quietly begun. As a member of this family, are you ready to contribute to this carnival?

name: Ender Magnolia: Bloom in the Mist
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Decades after the Rain of Death, a new journey begins in the Land of Fumes, where mystical powers lie beneath the earth. The kingdom’s desire for conquest led to the creation of the Homunculi, machine-like artificial life forms prepared to execute the king’s will. A recent resource-harvesting mission gone awry caused toxic vapors to emerge from underground, driving both man and machine to feral madness.

As the Homonculi devolve into dangerous creatures, guide Lilac –- an “Attuner” with the power to purify those infected by the fumes — on a quest to save the kingdom. With the help of friendly machines and spirits who fight in Lilac’s stead, fend off mechanized legions of lunging carcasses, cannonball-firing corpses and chainsaw-wielding goblins terrorizing the land.

Turn foes into friends by exorcizing corruption from enemy bosses. Wield their powers to add 30 different abilities to Lilac’s combat repertoire in an enhanced battle system where she can equip up to four special abilities at once. Improve Lilac’s odds of surviving this hunt for lost memories by leveling up attack strength, HP, and armor.

Explore the depths, heights and far corners of the kingdom for lore-filled relics. Collect and trade gold for upgraded items at the Blacksmith’s storefront. Combine story fragments from the kingdom’s fleeing inhabitants with Lilac’s forgotten memories. Seek the truth in an atmospheric hand-drawn setting set to the soothing serenades of returning musical group Mili (Ghost in the Shell, Goblin Slayer) with a brand new original soundtrack available for purchase at launch.
developers: Live Wire, Binary Haze Interactive, adglobe

name: Dawn of Anarchy
summary: In Dawn of Anarchy, your skills, determination, and combat prowess will be put to the ultimate test. Will you be the hero the world needs to quell the uprising and bring an end to mechanical tyranny? Prepare for the battle of a lifetime amidst the dawn of anarchy.
storyline: In the aftermath of a technological experiment gone horribly awry, the once-peaceful cityscape now lies in ruins. The robots, once servants, have evolved into ruthless overlords, their artificial minds consumed by anarchy. As chaos reigns and the city descends into darkness, you, a solitary soldier, are entrusted with a secret mission: infiltrate the heart of the robotic rebellion and dismantle the malevolent factory responsible for the cataclysm.

name: Ekorella Vol 1
summary: A turn-based RPG set in a fantastic society of plants and animals. Fight against monsters and visit exotic places that have their unique culture and history. Beware of what lurks in the darkness...

name: Border Town
summary: 2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game. Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

name: Mika and the Witch's Mountain
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Soar with the wind on your broomstick, deliver packages to your friends, and explore a vibrant sandbox world in a coming of age adventure about an aspiring witch!
storyline:
This coming-of-age journey will take us to the top of the mountain through a story of effort, friendship, and community; and will let our hearts fly free.

Take your magic broom and discover all the secrets hidden in the mountain while getting to know its charming inhabitants. Work hard and get a magic broom good enough to achieve your goal: to go to the top of the mountain.

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator
summary: Take your opportunity as a real Rally Mechanic. Overcome all the obstacles that the reckless racers throw at you - including unrepairable parts, time limitations and more. Take good care of your rally cars so that on the next special they will perform as good as if they came out of the factory.

name: Few Nights More
summary: Few Nights More is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, fulfill your Lord’s true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: Way of the Hunter: Ultimate Edition
summary: Way of the Hunter - Ultimate Edition is the collection of hunting grounds all over the world and all existing equipment packs. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfill all your hunting fantasies.

name: 4-in-1 Award Winning Bundle
summary: Get 4 award-winning games and enjoy capturing stories of joy and heartbreak.

name: Landing
summary: Our ship has suffered an unknown disaster and has been forced to dock on the side of this planet, and all you have to do is lead us to repair the ship and continue its voyage, however, the danger is getting closer and closer without our knowledge......

name: A Simple Garbage Sorting Game
summary: We are recruiting a large number of testers from around the world to participate in an unprecedented secret experiment.. Join us and embark on this journey of exploration that is crucial to survival. In this unknown experiment, your choices will determine the fate of the Earth

name: Mini Market Design
summary: Build your dream market and welcome your customers!

name: Minecraft: Hello Kitty and Friends
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Step into Hello Kitty's World in this sweet DLC! Build a cozy farm, grow crops, and raise Animals with Hello Kitty and Friends. Upgrade your House with Cute new Furniture and enjoy Fun Seasonal events like egg hunts and pumpkin carving!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: MediEvil II
genres: Platform, Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
summary:
A port of MediEvil 2, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

MediEvil 2, or MediEvil II in its NA release, is an action-adventure game originally developed by SCE Cambridge Studio and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released in 2000 for the PlayStation, it is a sequel to the original MediEvil and continues the story of Sir Daniel Fortesque.

Set in Victorian-era London, the game follows Sir Dan as he is resurrected once again to stop a sorcerer named Lord Palethorn, who has unleashed chaos by reanimating the dead using pages from Zarok's spellbook. The gameplay combines hack-and-slash combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving, with new weapons, levels, and enemies. The game introduces unique features such as a ghostly ally, Kiya, and new mechanics like controlling Dan’s detached head for specific puzzles.
storyline:
In Kensington in the year 1886, 500 years after Sir Daniel Fortesque's battle against the evil sorcerer Zarok, a sorcerer named Lord Palethorn discovers Zarok's spellbook and casts its spell of raising the dead over the city of London. However, the pages of the book soon scatter across London and Palethorn gains a demonlike appearance as a result. The spell Palethorn casts once again brings Sir Dan, who was resting at a nearby museum, back to life. He is recruited by a professor named Hamilton Kift and his ghostly sidekick Winston to recover the pages of Zarok's spellbook and put a stop to Palethorn's plans. Along the way, they end up being joined by an ancient mummy princess named Kiya, who becomes Dan's love interest.

During an incident in which Kiya goes off on her own, she is killed by Jack the Ripper, much to the shock of Dan. Discovering a time machine, Dan travels back in time in order to save Kiya, merging with his past self to gain golden armour. As Dan finally confronts Palethorn, he steals the pages from him and uses it to summon a large blue demon. However, Dan manages to turn the demon against Palethorn, putting a stop to both of them. As Palethorn blows up his lair on his dying breath, Dan decides to join Kiya together in the afterlife as they return to their eternal rest. If the player has collected all the Chalices, Dan and Kiya will instead go for a ride on the time machine, which takes them to Zarok's arena.

name: Indiana Jones and the Staff of Kings
summary: The plot centers around Indy's search for the Staff of Moses. The game is mostly about a quest which takes you around the world on various quests, fighting Nazis, Panamanian hunters, and Tong thugs, and trying to find artifacts which will unlock other possible things for you to get and do.
developers: Artificial Mind and Movement, Disney Interactive, Implicit Conversions

name: Fideos
summary: Just shoot another eel's brain.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Witchcraft
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary:
The Witches Need Your Help

You’ve been called upon, Wanderer. Harness wondrous and uncanny Witchcraft Powers as you unravel the mystery of who stole the Heads from the Tree of Whispers, earning Favor with the Witches of Hawezar to learn the secrets of their power. Hunt the Tree’s rogue Heads before they further spread madness to the creatures of Sanctuary resulting in new grotesque abominations - the Headrotten. Make use of the new Armory feature to quickly save and swap your builds. Earn Dorian, the new Raven Pet, by completing the Season Journey, discover new Uniques and Legendary Aspects, equip new Runes in Vessel of Hatred, and more.

name: Rust of Steel
summary: "Rust of Steel" is a post-apocalyptic ruins exploration RPG with a high degree of freedom. Take on the world in your own style with multiple scenarios, free stat distribution, and the option to play as the good guy or the bad guy!

name: Matchmaking Inc.
summary: A young single man returns to his hometown and takes over the family's matchmaking business. Matchmaking Inc. is a modern-themed RPG designed for men that combines gameplay elements of simulation management and text adventure.

name: Dokapon! Sword of Fury
summary: Whosoever winds up wealthiest in the end (meaning, the bearer of the most assets) shall be deemed the winner! How do you achieve that? Well, by fighting monsters, plundering, pillaging, and betraying your best buds; that's how! All the rules are made to be broken in this board game!

name: Transcontinental
summary: Play as a survivor of the aftermath of a train wreck during the Western Expansion era. Traverse the haunting railway tracks of a rural settlement cursed by supernatural forces unleashed after displacing Native inhabitants.

name: 1000 Missiles: Defense of Tornwa
summary: Missile Defense Game: Protect Your Country The enemy will employ various strategies to breach your defenses. Stay adaptable to survive. Defend Your Nation: Use strategic placement and upgrades of your AA systems to fend off relentless missile attacks and protect your country.

name: Legion Defense
summary: Legion Defense is a TD game made with the Y3 Editor that swaps boring mercenaries for epic hero showdowns! In special rounds, you’ll face enemy heroes and feel the thrill of battle. The KOF mode allows for 3v3 matches to compete for the top spot. join the ultimate battle now!

name: The Accuser and the Abyss
summary: You are a detective. You have been assigned a partner to investigate a horrid case. But things are not what it seems. Navigate the paths as you attempt to unravel the truth behind your lost memories and your new disturbing detective partner.

name: Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf
summary: 'Moldbreaker: Rise of the Loaf' is a quirky 3D roguelite-action game where you play as Bradley the Breadapus, a waffle-tailed bread platypus, battling moldy monstrosities to save the Bread Kingdom! Dodge, slap, and upgrade yourself to restore freshness and fight the rise of the mold!

name: Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net
summary: "Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net" is a typing game in which you enter internet lingo in a call-and-response format with a girl (OMGkawaiiAngel) who has a strong need for approval.

name: Inspector Douglas's Diary
summary: This is a detective game where you play as a middle-aged inspector searching for a terrifying serial killer in an isolated village. However, as a player, if you uncover the killer’s motives, you might consider whether to cooperate with them to achieve their goal of "killing THE time."

name: Sacrifice Villains
summary: Ever since the day the powers appeared, crime has ruled the streets of Scum City. As the conniving villains grow stronger and stronger, and the heroes find themselves walloped rather than walloping... it falls to you to rehabilitate S-rank villains in this short visual novel!
storyline:
Ever since the day the SUPERVILLAINS appeared, CRIME has been the king of the streets of SCUM CITY—
But in the center of this hive of evil sits a paradise, and its name is JUSTOPIAN WARD.

Standing opposed to the dastardly villains, the SUPERHEROES built this autonomous safe zone as a thriving base of VIRTUE amidst the CHAOS around them.
Its FOUNDER—its MAYOR—its CHAMPION—is none other than JUSTOPIA himself, the ultimate hero, the bane of the countless villains he has brought to account for their innumerable sins.
As the creator and chairman of the HERO SOCIETY, Justopia also commands the other heroes in their tireless efforts to wipe crime from the face of the city and bring peace to the world at large.

Yet the conniving VILLAINS grow stronger and stronger, and the HEROES find themselves walloped rather than walloping... and some of their number pledge themselves to the darkness in acts of foulest BETRAYAL!

To whom should Justopia turn for help, if not to the ASYLUM? This rehabilitative institution brings villains to the light, and who should be fit to lead it—if not YOU?

Capture S-rank Villains and turn them into heroes as quickly and efficiently as you can.
It's up to you to reform these filthy scumbags—and set their powers back to work for the cause of JUSTICE!

name: Escape from the Cursed Convent
summary: Escape from the Cursed Convent is a narrative-driven adventure game set in a medieval girls' convent, offering a rich storytelling experience, and several gameplay styles including QTE, hunting, cooking, and puzzle-solving.
developers: Ais Kacang Studio, 迷糊的安安

name: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
summary: Test your skiing skills in serene mountain scenery. Perform tricks, discover shortcuts and try to best your time in the snowy followup to Lonely Mountains: Downhill. Enjoy the slopes alone, participate in thrilling online multiplayer races or gather your friends and conquer the mountains together.

name: Oracle of Meles
summary: An ancient prophecy, a chosen one? Hack and slash your way through an evil castle, collect powerful artifacts, and uncover its dark secrets. Explore this 2D hand-drawn world full of magic and monsters where nothing is as it seems.

name: Demon's Regalia: Colosseum
summary: A Turn-based Combat Fighting game featuring monster girls, monsters, and human warriors alike; to earn wealth and glory in the colosseum!

name: Jötunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology. Fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings of ancient Norse Gods, explore hostile worlds and face powerful bosses. Become a god-like warrior in this ultimate showdown.

name: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Adventure, Card & Board Game
summary: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch is a unique combination of Deck-Building and Dungeon Defense, with a wide variety of military units and combinations, strategies and magic manifested in cards. Make your dungeon more dangerous by defending it against increasingly powerful enemies.

name: Blazing Trail
summary: Escape failed! All we have left is our will to survive, the endless hordes of enemies, and enough bullets to rip them all to shreds. Blazing trail. Vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.
storyline:
There's a secret base in the Brazilian mountains. Kidnapped scientists are kept here, developing a tactical combat vehicle for terrorists. The vehicle is powered by a nuclear power cell, and is equipped with missiles, a machine gun and the latest powerful laser gun.

The scientists cannot allow their invention to be used by terrorists, so they stole the key to the hangar to escape during the night. The scientists broke into the hangar to hijack the vehicles and freed the other hostages. After the hijacking, they leave the holding area and take a cargo ship to cross the border of the protected area. But on the way, the river is blocked with rocks...

name: Somber Echoes
summary: Take the role of the resurrected Adrestia and embark on an epic journey to prevent your twin sister from unraveling the universe. Master acrobatic combat, explore the Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos, and shape your destiny in Somber Echoes.
developers: Rock Pocket Games, Bonus Stage Publishing
storyline:
Somber Echoes is a single-player dark sci-fi Metroidvania that takes you into the depths of the abandoned spaceship, Atromitos.

As Adrestia, you must confront your twin sister, Harmonia, to prevent her from unleashing cosmic catastrophe while battling otherworldly horrors.

name: Super Arter
summary:
Super Arter is a puzzle/platform game inspired by the Mario vs Donkey Kong, with an emphasis on pick up the key to take to the door solving puzzles. Featuring pixel art inspired by 16bits games.

Jump, throw objects, use switches, dodge traps, defeat enemies and much more to overcome the obstacles in your path, while looking for the key to open the door to the next level, and free your way until you face the boss of each world to collect all Domino Relics.

-Solve various puzzles in up to 5 different worlds with many stages.

-Face a powerful boss at the end of each world

Recover the Domino Relics stolen by the Dark Wizard, solving the most challenging puzzles, facing enemies, collecting gifts, and discovering the best way for Arter to take the key to the door, in this Puzzle/Platform game.

name: The Last day of Han Dynasty
summary: “The last day of Han dynasty”It is a survival simulation business game based on the background of the end of the Han Dynasty in China. From the perspective of ordinary people, you can spend a difficult but warm time, and keep warm together with the characters you know in the troubled times.

name: Space Accident VR
summary: Step into the future with our groundbreaking VR game set in the year 2119, where humanity embarks on a historic journey into space. Join the "CCM-1" (Callisto Colonization Mission) expedition, aimed at the enigmatic moon of Jupiter - Callisto.

name: Dad's Coming
summary: Meet Dad's Coming, a fast paced co-op game about cleaning up your mess before your parents come back home! Help Kate and Bob cooperate to get items across rooms and hazards to get rid of the mess in time! Careful not to break anything and be aware of Jack, a kitty that loves knocking things over!

name: Code Alkonost: Awakening of Evil
summary: Code Alkonost is a first-person story-rich, atmospheric survival horror adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Travel through a dark fantasy world and encounter the possessive spirits and illusions of the underworld. Experience authentic art style and stories never before seen in horror games.

name: Blacksmith Simulator
summary: Become a Medieval blacksmith in this interactive blacksmithing simulator. Upgrade your forging equipment, unlock new exotic crafting materials, grow your business, and manage your customers - in addition to engaging forging mechanics. Strike while the iron is hot and hop in front of the forge now!

name: Brutes.io
summary:
Frantic Online Multiplayer Evolution Brawler

Original developed by BulletProof, now rereleased in January 2025 by the original developer, under Funk Games on itch.io: https://funkgames.itch.io/brutes

name: Smiling Misery
summary: Smiling Misery is an interactive tale that introduces us to the story of Margo, a jester who, weary of a comfortable life, embarks on a journey to seek misery. Join Margo on a brief adventure through a Mediterranean medieval kingdom and bring the story to its conclusion.

name: Elect
summary: Elect is a multiplayer political simulation game. Run in elections, join or lead a political party, and vote on laws in the U.S. and 15+ other countries. Become your country's leader and declare wars, send foreign aid, appoint a cabinet, fight pandemics, vote in the United Nations, and more.
game_modes: Single player, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Queen of Treasure Isle
summary:
Queen of treasure isle is a simple, small-scale metroidvania that mainly consists of bomb throwing and jumping.

You can retrieve the treasure hidden in various places and return home in a balloon when you are done.
storyline: Poor Windy has come to search for the treasure hidden on the island. The queens who protect the island are not afraid of her as long as she doesn't do anything unnecessary.

name: Idun: Frontline Survival
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Strategy, Adventure, Indie
summary: A defense RTS where you can move turrets at will. Extract resources, upgrade technology, and defend against enemy swarms in a gripping space campaign. Hold the line, set up your turrets, and brace for screen-filling hordes!

name: Little Bartmares
summary: On a dark night in Springfield, Bart Simpson sleeps quietly in his bedroom. However inside his mind, he's experiencing a little nightmare...

name: Call of Clans
summary: Call of Clans is an online turn-based strategy card game set in a magical world. Build a versatile deck with minion and skill cards to challenge equally matched opponents in a world of swords and magic. Team up with others to conquer challenging co-op dungeons

name: Skibidi Gyatrooms
summary: Skibidi Gyatrooms is a 1-5 player co-op horror game. You and the homies just fell into the Backrooms, you must out-GYAT the Skibidi Toilet with max rizz or get flushed. Expect cursed levels, and brainrot that’ll keep you on edge.

name: TimeTrain
summary: TimeTrain is a time manipulation puzzle game where the player builds railways for a time travelling train.

name: The Curse of Mount Madre
summary: The Curse of Mount Madre is a traditional turn-based JRPG with a wild west twist.

name: Government Contractors: Arms of Influence
summary: Historically accurate strategy game where you act as a government contractor researching, developing, and manufacturing weapons and technology for your clients. You choose the parts for each product, but be aware that cheap or wrong political choices may affect your success rate!
developers: Strategy Games Interactive, Not Final Games

name: Super Sorry
summary: You play as a salaryman who gets caught in various everyday troubles and overcomes them with acrobatic bows. From boss reprimands to client complaints and family issues, showcase your elegant apology skills across different scenarios. What shocking ending awaits?

name: Amatsuki Mahjong
summary: Amatsuki Mahjong is a ACG style mahjong game that offers real-time multiplayer online matches. It features four styles of mahjong: Japanese, Sichuan, Taiwanese, and Hong Kong Mahjong. Enjoy a variety of play styles tailored to your preferences.

name: Too Tired To Die
summary: Too Tired To Die is a fast-paced survivorlike multiplayer online PVP game. Seeking help from others is better than seeking help from yourself, the amnesiac ones must face all kinds of demons and monsters, and dive into the pile of couriers to retrieve his own share of soul.

name: Pairs & Perils
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Pairs & Perils is a memory-game roguelike and dungeon crawler. Match cards to attack enemies, avoid traps, shop for relics and consumables. Sharpen your mind as you journey through the depths of the dungeon in search of The Dealer.
developers: Little Horror Studios, Rogue Duck Interactive

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition
summary:
Immerse yourself in a scenic horse ranch to experience the joy and pride of caring for a world-class stable of horses in Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition.
With the help of a friendly mentor, you’ll raise charming foals, care for and train a stable of unique horses, and compete to become a champion racer and rider.

name: WonderLang
summary: Embark on an RPG adventure in WonderLang, where mastering a new language is part of the journey. Learn through quests, dialogues, and puzzles. Available in multiple languages with immersive gameplay. Begin your quest for language mastery today!

name: None Shall Intrude
summary: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: Runet Legend
summary: To move further along the plot, you need to complete quests, look for various items that will help you get closer to the finale. Exciting adventures, secrets of the past and difficult decisions are waiting for you. Control the fate of Ozon671Games and help him figure out this difficult situation.

name: Yield! Fall of Rome
summary: Forge your Kingdom amidst the Ruins of Rome! As the world crumbles, rebuild civilization and shape your destiny with every decision. Unleash your strategic prowess, conquer provinces, and explore dynamically generated campaigns that promise endless challenges!
storyline:
Fall of Rome
The year is 401 AD, spring is in the air as the sun is slowly setting. What seems like a completely normal night by the river of the Rhine is turning out to be the beginning of the end for the world's longest lasting empire! Tens of thousands of germanic soldiers have moved silently towards the river under the cover of the night.

The Roman province is putting up a good fight, but it's slowly dawning on them that the area they have controlled for centuries can no longer be protected. The Germanic tribes win back more important provinces, but they need a strong leader to gather around.

It will be your task to lead the campaign from there and progress through Europe, province by province! But you are not alone. Other factions are also ready to fight for the same goal: capture Rome and be part of history!

name: Mekkablood: Quarry Assault
summary: The Year is 2082. You play the role of Bill, a grizzled, and extremely hairy robojockey. It's up to you to take the reigns of Bill's Mekk, with your friend Rusty, to get your revenge against TorxCorp, who's trying to steal your mining claim.

name: Into the Emberlands
summary: Venture out into the Emberlands and uncover an ever-changing world filled with surprising encounters and mystical creatures! Save villagers who got lost in the Miasma, collect resources and rebuild your village to create a safe haven for your people.
storyline:
Step into the enchanting world of the Emberlands! Home to the peaceful Knacks, the world has been engulfed by the mysterious Miasma, plunging everything into darkness. As the chosen Lightbearer, you’re equipped with a lantern filled with radiant Ember. With its light you can cut through the thick shroud, allowing you to venture out across different biomes and save those who strayed from the path and became lost in the darkness.

In this cozy exploration game with a rogue-lite twist, you have a clear mission: Rescue the Knacks that lost their way out in the wilds and lead them back to safety. Collect a wide assortment of resources to rebuild and expand the village, and transform it into a safe haven for the Knacks! But be aware: If your lantern’s light fades while you’re out in the wild, you will become a lost one yourself, and the next Lightbearer will need to step into your shoes…

Traverse various treacherous yet fascinating procedurally generated landscapes and biomes that make each new adventure different from the last. Every biome offers unique challenges and encounters, each needing you to adapt your playstyle if you want to succeed.

Speaking of encounters: The Emberlands isn’t just home to the Knacks, but to many other fantastical creatures! From lazy trolls and crazy scientists, to…chickens?! They all offer their own quests and bargains to you. While some may seem rather dubious, they all promise unique rewards, from resources and tools to upgrades to your equipment. Choose which offers you are willing to take — it’s all up to you!

As you bring back precious resources and answer the calls of the Knacks, aiding them in rebuilding stores and homes, your village will expand and thrive, paving the way for future exploration. Each addition to your village brings you one step closer to unlocking the mysteries of the Miasma.

Into the Emberlands invites players to venture out, explore the secrets that the vibrant Emberlands hold, and meet its many quirky inhabitants along the way. Embrace the call of adventure, banish the Miasma and bring light back to the Emberlands!

name: The Dark Side of Ceclon
summary: Jensen, the sole survivor of the Nexentia shuttle crash on the planet CECLON. Alone, light years away from all human life! You will have to face the Nocturnes, primitive creatures in order to bring back the Veka energy, humanity's only hope.

name: City of Graves
summary: As a soldier in a lifeless city after a disease outbreak, fight creatures and hunt for what will save the city.

name: Scarecropia
summary: Here is Scarecropia! Lead at most 400 people to build a settlement. Arm your village to fight against the Goblin army, or invest limited resources in yourself to become unparalleled! Take every cost to survive!

name: Godly Survivors
summary: Face thousands of lost souls in the arena of the gods! Godly Survivors invites you to embark on an epic journey through an action rogue-lite game where you will hunt down the mobs' souls to improve your skills and survive the trial of the gods.

name: Hexarium
summary: A minimalistic traffic management game where you build and maintain a bustling road network to keep markets and homes connected and traffic flowing smoothly.

name: Mistery
summary:
Mistery is a multiplayer game of survival and social deduction. You work with others to collect materials, survive the dangers, and complete tasks. Beware of monsters, but more of the Alternates disguising as your teammates. They can change into supernatural monsters and attack you at any time.

The game seamlessly blends survival, top-down combat, social deduction, and new weird stories into a unique and visually striking experience, strengthed by a proximity chat system. Join forces with friends to destroy some friendships in Mistery!
storyline: It takes place on Site-14, a government complex deserted after containment breaches. The top-down camera offers a clear overview of the surroundings—but players will have to use a flashlight to light their way through the heavy mist, and find batteries to restore Site-14.

name: Escape from the Nursing Home
summary: Dry mouth, arthritis and poor eyesight? That is not surprising, because you're an old man! It doesn't matter how you ended up in the nursing home, it matters how you get out of it!

name: Faunamorph
summary: Mutant foes await: Transform into different animals and recombine your own DNA to unlock new abilities in Faunamorph. Uncover the mysteries of your origin in this action-packed 2D metroidvania about genetics and mutations.

name: Helskate
summary: Helskate is a skateboarding action roguelite. Grind, perform tricks, and chain combos to power up your attacks to slay the monsters of Vertheim. Combine unique weapons and gear to suit your playstyle as you fight, die, and upgrade your abilities to come back to this labyrinth over and over again!

name: Settlements Rising
summary: Settlements Rising is a resource management-focused survival and city-building simulation game set in medieval. While meeting the growing basic and luxury needs of the village through hunting, gathering, farming, and trading, you must also fend off raids on the village using military tactics.

name: Idun
summary: Explosive singleplayer action RTS with a story campaign. Hold the line against massive swarms on a fully simulated battlefield.

name: Super Roboy
summary: Deep in the Nevada desert, in a secret underground government facility, a young robot boy is awakened by an unknown force. He finds the building infected with alien creatures and hostile robots… With his memory wiped, he sets out to uncover secrets of his - and the facility’s - past.

name: Toaster Arena
summary: Toaster Arena is a first person multiplayer arena shooter where players battle it out on different maps and game modes. Use Advanced movement to traverse obstacles or hop on some wheels and create carnage

name: Iron Roads
summary: Lay tracks, buy trains, and set their routes using board game-inspired mechanics to optimise your network. Run your enterprise efficiently while avoiding backlogs, jams, or angry passengers, and you'll be recognised for the unsung train hero you know you are.

name: Holy Whore Emily
summary: Making love is joyful. To become a priesthood holder who can keep making love is even more worshiped by the world. Emily loves this kind of life… You will play the role of the High Priestess and arrange for the Holy Maiden Emily to be engaged with various activities and H-acts.

name: Primeval
summary:
Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many species of creatures that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you.

Earn evolution points by eating, killing, and completing tasks. Spend those points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

62 playable species.

name: In Ten Years
summary: In Ten Years is a piece of interactive fiction about a group of friends in a small town and the moments and places that draw them together

name: Chuck Nolemland
summary: Maybe the hardest RAGE horror game ever..

name: Unseen
summary: Anomaly finding game that takes place in an old apartament building

name: Who Is Who
summary: This community project featuring 8 maps was created to get everyone to try out the role of another mapper. The aim was to create a map in the style of a random mapper among other project members.

name: The Haunting Eyes
summary: The Haunting Eyes is a game in which you have to break into an abandoned mansion and solve its mystery by collecting bags of gold.

name: Shadow Baptism
summary: This is a third-person shooter in which a wizard uses homing magic to fight enemies and collect hats.

name: Yuri Lowell Prints a Gun
summary:
A short reflection on luigi mangione through the lens of media specifically Tales of Vesperia

Made for boshi's place Year of Luigi show

name: Soporfall
summary:
A collection of five interactive narratives exploring a variety of dreamscapes which, interwoven, tell the story of a shattering dreamer.

Befriend fallen angels, spelunk impossible ruins, find love amidst regal bugs, get in poetry battles with forest critters or delve into a pastry-making bureaucracy. Soporfall valley is yours!
storyline: Between reality and the realm of slumber rests Soporfall Valley, where images and stories gather into a surrealist collage of philosophies, images and spaces. One night, you awaken to find the perfect valley rife with tensions. Befriend fallen angels, spelunk impossible ruins, find love amidst regal bugs, get in poetry battles with forest critters or delve into a pastry-making bureaucracy to bring back together the pieces of a shattering dreamer. Soporfall Valley is yours to do with as you please!

name: Aotenjo: Infinite Hands
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: The Mahjong Roguelike. Aotenjo is an deckbuilder where you will use Mahjong styles all over the world to beat innate threats, play different Patterns and combos, reach the "bottom" of Aotenjo, and discover ancient secrets....

name: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict
summary: Backrooms: Liminal Conflict is a PvP backrooms game with different factions.
storyline: Play as the M.E.G. Researcher class, trapped in the depths of the backrooms. Your objective: escape to the safety of an M.E.G. outpost. Along the way, you'll find aid from M.E.G. Mercenaries, ready to support you. But beware the Followers of Jerry, a sinister cult lurking in the shadows, intent on indoctrinating all wanderers in backrooms.

name: Dark Umbra
summary: Fight against the Umbral Horde on your way to take down the sinister sorcerer who doomed the world. Team up with friends or go it alone as you level up your character and collect powerful relics in this action rogue-like.

name: Midnight Racer
summary: Arcade sythwave car game. Hey there, champ, can't sleep? Had a tough day? Or maybe you just helped yourself relax? Sit back, relax to the synthwave beats. Turn off your brain, just watch, play, and relax.

name: Together After Dark
summary: Together After Dark is a co-op horror psychological game with a survival touch for 1-4 players. 4 Teens are stuck in the forest and need to find a way out but they are not alone

name: ThroneForge: The Fortress War
summary: Throneforge: The Fortress War:Build an arsenal of diverse towers, each with unique abilities and strengths.Strategically place towers along the enemy's path to maximize their impact and create impenetrable defense lines.

name: Lymbus
summary: Descend into a digital labyrinth of our own making. Move around with your keys. Do everything else with your cards. Exercise maximum strategy in building your deck, then throw it out the window in screen-shaking, bullet hell-style battles. Combat happens in real time, meaning every moment matters.
storyline: The year is 19XX. Great strides in neuromechanical research have allowed the most common human actions to be transcribed onto memory cards. Great oversights in said research have also made it so nobody remembered to save a backup. After a catastrophic crash renders most of the population comatose, you are tasked with diving into humanity's collective unconscious to retrieve the memories that may hold the key to ending the blackout.

name: Primeval
summary: Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world.

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Apocalyptic Collection
summary: It's all out war in this collection of survival horror nightmares featuring Lydia Daniels. Can you survive the onslaught?

name: The Great Yokai of the Haunted Halls
summary: You and your childhood friend Yua were supposed to just pick up a book from the decrepit building, but when a sudden twist of fate sends the two of you stumbling into a hidden realm teeming with spirits and yokai, it'll be up to you to find a way out! In this eerie supernatural dimension, you meet Izuna, who claims to be a great yokai with a fondness for humans. Can you escape this otherworldly realm, with the help of Izuna and the Kosaka sisters' spiritual powers?

name: Life And Death Are Predetermined by Heaven
summary: Slapping Competition ": Two contestants stand face to face and alternate their attacks, using their maximum strength to slap each other's cheeks. The game will continue until one side is beaten and unable to get up

name: The Black Lamb
summary: The Black Lamb is a folklore horror game inspired by eerie childhood tales and real-life events. After a tragic accident, you find yourself drawn to a mysterious black lamb. Following it leads you to an unsettling village—but this is no ordinary village. Dark secrets lurk within, and your only choice is to uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors around you.
storyline: The Black Lamb is a folklore horror game inspired by eerie childhood tales and real-life events. After a tragic accident, you find yourself drawn to a mysterious black lamb. Following it leads you to an unsettling village—but this is no ordinary village. Dark secrets lurk within, and your only choice is to uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors around you.

name: From The Past
summary: What hides in the depths of the forest?!

name: Hidden Tomatoes 2
summary: Search for 100 hidden tomatoes in a detailed city. Explore the streets, buildings, and alleys with no time limits. Can you find them all?

name: Ledge Maze
summary: This is the latest map by Jon Landis in 28 years. It features a techbase with three levels of confusing ledges. Can you discover the secrets of the ledge maze?

name: Master of Bow
summary: Lock, draw, and conquer. Claim your title as the ultimate Master of Bow!

name: Bright Escape
summary: Embark on a magical journey in Bright Escape!

name: Bulletproof Tank Adventure
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, engage in a thrilling 3D tank battle game, fighting zombies and AI robots. Navigate challenging terrains with your tank and defeat enemies using powerful weapons. A struggle for strategy, danger, and survival awaits you!

name: Entities
summary: We combined fast-paced roguelike combat with a randomized procedural format to make the best third-person single player we could. Entidades is a survival game, which tells the story of a very mischievous boy, who lived in colonial Brazil, suffered from religious abuse and slavery at the time.

name: Island Master
summary: Build, manage, and thrive in Island Master! Procedural islands, resource control, citizen happiness. Become the ultimate Island Master in this top-down city builder.

name: Joy of Programming: Software Engineering Simulator
summary: JOY OF PROGRAMMING - Software Engineering Simulator is an immersive 3D programming puzzle game about automating and controlling realistic machines, robots, drones and more using real Python code. Build actual coding skills while playing, solve exciting bite-sized programming challenges and progress to unlock new programming features and improved machinery. Prior programming knowledge recommended.

name: Eat or DIE!
summary: The idea is simple bigger fish eats smaller fish and survives!

name: Moon Keys
summary: "Moon Keys" is a 3D platformer focused on gameplay with a subtle story in the background. The game has three sections: underground, surface, and space. It’s played with 40 keyboard keys, which are randomly assigned. Each time a key is pressed, the assigned keys change.

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
summary: This pack contains the items included in the Deluxe Edition.

name: Spot Challenge Vol. 1
summary: Spot Challenge is a game series inspired by 'Find the Differences,' where you compare two images and spot over 360 differences across 35 levels. Play solo or with friends and family—test your attention to detail in this fun challenge!

name: Bright Side: Quiz - Complete Edition
summary: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Breakout
summary: A mini-roguelite boomer shooter FPS. Fight through over 70 procedurally linked combat arenas, upgrade your fighting abilities and destroy an ever increasing amount of enemy types.
storyline: A robotic uprising is rippling through the prison you are being kept in. Bust out of your cell and go on a robot-breaking rampage through the halls, and perhaps discover deeper secrets within.

name: Newton's Fourth Law
summary: Fight against brain-rot in this story-driven educational physics puzzle game. You will need to learn and apply high school physics concepts to solve increasingly challenging problems and uncover a galaxy spanning plot. When you have finished, you will be able to take a college level physics course.

name: Motorbikes Pro 2025
summary: Feel the Speed, Own the Track!

name: As The Gears Turn Slow
summary: A 1024 restriction map made by Obsidian in a day.

name: Need For Race: Street King
summary: Fuel your ambition, ignite the streets, and race beyond the horizon!

name: Saber Survivors
summary: Saber Survivors is a survival action roguelike where the evil galactic emperor has declared that all “Space Wizard Samurai” must be exterminated. You, a Space Wizard Samurai, must fight to survive. And your only weapon… a saber to deflect laser beams.

name: Rookie Table Tennis
summary: 3D local multiplayer ping pong game

name: Toon Breakout 3D
summary: Break Bricks, Smash Characters, and Conquer the Toon World!

name: Fork-U Forklift Simulator
summary: Fork-U is a physics based forklift simulator. Drive and operate a forklift in 1st or 3rd person. Try your hand at loading and unloading pallets in a warehouse, delivering building materials in a construction site, keeping shelves stocked in a grocery store, and more!

name: Cats and Seek: Toge Land
summary: Celebrating the 16th anniversary of Toge Productions, we will explore Toge Land and greet the cats there.

name: Herbals Tycoon
summary: "Herbals tycoon" is a game that combines ancient style with deep management strategy, bringing players into a mysterious and fantastic world of traditional Chinese medicine. Here, you are not only a healer but also an explorer, manager, and inheritor, writing your own herbal legend every moment.

name: For Sale
summary: For Sale is a PSX-esque first-person horror adventure game with a strong emphasis on atmosphere and exploration. Interact with objects, take pictures using your digital camera, and discover unnerving secrets all while exploring a seemingly ordinary house.
storyline: The year is 1998. Step into the shoes of a real estate agent, tasked with photographing a seemingly ordinary house for an upcoming sale. Explore the environment, use your camera to take pictur-- wait, what’s that in the last photo?

name: 2025: Tobi
summary: The second in Kibodo's classic game series. It is a vertical scrolling shooting game! Controls are left and right movement only. The game is over when the fighter runs out of bullets. Get items to replenish bullets and destroy the enemies in front of you! Aim for a high score!

name: Diddy
summary: Destroy a dark party in Diddy's mansion. Gather your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent and save Justin B from Diddy! You can destroy the party with your friends by experiencing co-op

name: Casino Heist: Aruba
summary: *Casino Heist: Aruba* is a comedic heist Visual Novel and dating sim where every choice counts. Assemble a team, craft the perfect plan, and tackle a high-stakes robbery targeting a shady casino. Can you outsmart the odds, secure a fortune, and maybe even find love? The score of a lifetime awaits!

name: Sex Club Simulator
summary: SEX CLUB Simulator is a wild adult clicker game where you step into the shoes of a strip club manager on a mission to make the hottest spot in town.

name: Break.Up
summary: break.up is a block-breaking roguelite all about bouncing your ball as high as it can go.

name: Orifoldium
summary: Fold your way through mindspinning puzzles

name: A Coloring Break
summary: Fill the blank patterns with colors and take a coloring break on paper.

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered: Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary:
Tales of Graces f Remastered is an action RPG with high-speed battles that allow you to switch between fighting styles to match your play style. The remastered title adds more than 80 DLC packs and items release for the original and features stunning visuals, newly localized scenes available in English for the first time, and notable quality of life enhancements such as auto-save.

The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Graces f Remastered
• Battle BGM pack
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Super Growth Support Herb Set

name: Drunk Alien
summary: Help this drunk alien find his way back to his spaceship in this challenging adventure!

name: Hyperchannel
summary: This is a free shooting game. The game has very simple operations and beautiful graphics. Great for killing time.

name: Fork-U
summary: Fork-U is a physics based forklift simulator. Drive and operate a forklift in 1st or 3rd person. Try your hand at loading and unloading pallets in a warehouse, delivering building materials in a construction site, keeping shelves stocked in a grocery store, and more!

name: Stage Cleared
summary: You're just trying to beat a platformer, but something is stalking you outside. Keep an eye on your security cams while you’re gaming and stop the intruder from getting in. Stay sharp, or it’s game over.

name: No Give up
summary: No Give up is a 2D Rouge+ strategy combination game.Heroes from different worlds are thrown into an unknown uninhabited planet, where there are only monsters and perhaps gods.Take up weapons, choose rewards, fight with monsters, and leave a legend of the unyielding……

name: Tales of Graces F Remastered
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Tales of Graces f Remastered is an action RPG with high-speed battles that allow you to switch between fighting styles to match your play style. The remastered title adds more than 80 DLC packs and items release for the original and features stunning visuals, newly localized scenes available in English for the first time, and notable quality of life enhancements such as auto-save.

name: Overnight Watch
summary: As a new hired employee of Paranormal Security you need to monitor live surveilance cameras and report any anomaly you can find. Can you find them all and will you survive?

name: Love & Cards
summary: Porn and Cards is an adult visual novel/turn-based card game with stunning 2D visuals and a fun, immersive narration in the Galactic Wild West

name: Monster Meals
summary: Monster Meals is a fast-paced cooking game where you control a small monster chef in your food truck, preparing meals with exotic creatures for monstrous customers. Serve quickly, or you’ll be on the menu!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Experience an unrivaled sense of realism on the battlefield, fueled by exhilarating 1 vs. 1,000 action and the rush of massive armies! A nameless hero conquers the turbulent and chaotic Three Kingdoms in this latest DYNASTY WARRIORS series entry.

name: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
summary: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss is a small scale, monochromatic CRPG in the style of Ultima, that takes place in the underworld of H.P. Lovecraft's Dreamlands.
storyline:
Trapped in the Great Abyss!
You are an old dreamer who, through unforeseen circumstances, has found himself trapped in the Great Abyss, the vast underworld beneath the Dreamlands. Use the resources at your disposal, weapons, armor, supplies, and any alliances you have with the locals, to explore and learn the secrets of the underworld, in order to make your way back to the upper Dreamlands, or back to the Waking World.

name: Realtor
summary: The year is 1998. Step into the shoes of a real estate professional, tasked with photographing a seemingly ordinary house for an upcoming sale. Explore the house, take pictures of each room an-... wait, what’s that in the last photo?

name: Dragon of Saiyu
summary: Dragon of Saiyu retells the classic tale of Journey To The West in Retro 2D platformer style . Play as the young aspiring monk, Sanzang, and defeat strong foes in his quest of attaining the legendary scrolls from the Buddha of far west.

name: How to Lose One's Virginity
summary: "How to Lose One's Virginity" is an adult visual novel that describes the process of self-discovery... and hot beauties. Playing the role of a loser, are you able to change your life and become someone women are very fond of and build your own harem?

name: Skystead Ranch
summary: Transform a desolate sky island into a vibrant sanctuary. Using your enchanted crook, cultivate your garden, befriend quirky creatures, build a home, and unlock secrets along the way. Each choice adds a personal touch to your unique Skystead Ranch!

name: GhostCatcher
summary: Ghost Catcher is a cooperative horror game that can be played by at least 1 and up to 8 players. You need to perform mysterious rituals in a haunted house, confront spirits, identify their true nature, and ultimately capture them.

name: Chase
summary: Chase is a horror game with shooter and detective elements. The events take place in a dark and atmospheric world, you have to take on the role of a mercenary of the Inquisition, go to the dark forest of Blackwood and fulfill the terms of the contract.

name: Blade and Burden
summary: Blade and Burden is a rogue lite dungeon crawler where different adventurers slash, roll, and solve their way through a trick filled tower in order to reach their own goals, whether that be to save a kidnapped royal, complete a contracted hit, or just to cure their boredom.

name: Asterism
summary: Asterism is an interactive music album. A digital series of playable music videos that allow exploration and interaction within hand-crafted worlds that relate to the narrative of each music track. The narrative follows themes around personal expression, self-acceptance, anxiety and mental health.

name: Last Train Outta' Wormtown
summary: Last Train Outta' Wormtown is a chaotic Sandworm vs. Cowboys showdown. The Worm can only detect players touching the sand, like "hot lava" with a giant sandworm twist! Work together, Complete the objectives, and get outta' Wormtown! - Or, play as the Worm and gobble up your friends!

name: Takara Cards
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Indie, Card & Board Game
summary:
Takara Cards is a fusion of deckbuilding and tactical RPG about chasing space dragons in a sci-fi fantasy universe.
Control a spaceship with Cards on a 3x3 Grid in Tactical Turn-based battles.

name: Battle Balls
summary: Choose your favorite ball and play mini games!

name: Session: Skate Sim Year One & Two Edition
summary: With the Year One & Two Edition of Session: Skate Sim, you get the base game and lots of additional content. Ride the most iconic spots, explore unique maps, meet and play as professional skaters.

name: The Sims 4: Casanova Cave Kit
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One
summary: Impress guests with a modern entertainment space and suave fits from The Sims 4 Casanova Cave Kit. This laid-back masculine fashion will have Sims looking confident, and the contemporary style of your den’s décor — a stylish bar, sleek coffee table, and more — will guarantee the right atmosphere, whether it’s game night or date night.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric
storyline:
Elevated Evenings — A jumbo, state-of-the-art TV and stylish modern furniture will make your den an undeniable hotspot. Have friends over for a chill night at the card table, or have a date over for an exciting night on your stylish, well-loved leather sofa.

Effortless Style — Dress in high-quality, understated fashions made for the masculine Sim. These styles are relaxed, achieving a polished look that is still a bit rough around the edges.

name: The Sims 4: Secret Sanctuary Kit
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One
summary: Indulge in iconic fashion and enchanting décor with The Sims 4 Secret Sanctuary Kit. Create a luxurious space full of opulent furniture concealed behind a secret passage in a bookcase. When you’re inside your hideaway, let the world melt away as you relax on your chaise lounge or try on polished Italian-inspired fashions in your floor-length mirror.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric
storyline:
An Opulent Oasis — This is a private retreat featuring a mysterious hidden entrance, elegant antique vanity, charming tea set, and more high-end touches sure to delight Sims with a sense of refinement.

Flawlessly Fashionable — These finely tailored, Italian-inspired fashions are polished, sophisticated, and feature classic silhouettes. It’s a cohesive collection that feels curated, as if hand-picked by someone with exquisite taste.

name: The Sims 4: Comfy Gamer Kit
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Xbox One
summary: Settle in for a cozy time at the computer with The Sims 4 Comfy Gamer Kit*. With this collection you’ll craft warm, inviting spaces that feel personal with a large desk, playful clutter items, and of course a comfy gaming chair. This kit was created in collaboration with Lilsimsie to be fun and relaxing with subtle references to The Sims.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Bird view / Isometric
storyline:
A Personal Touch — Use the décor in this kit to make your computer area feel homey, relaxing, and completely yours with plants, clutter, and gaming accessories. There are even cubed cubbies for displaying knickknacks and other treasured items that make you happy!

A Little Sims-y — Who wouldn’t want a mini cow plant hanging over their head? This kit has all kinds of callouts to The Sims, including a grilled cheese mini-library and an adorable alarm clock.

name: Montezuma's Revenge: The 40th Anniversary Edition
summary: The 1983 classic multi-room platformer Montezuma’s Revenge returns in 2.5D glory, and now Pedro’s adventure is bigger than ever with 100 tricky rooms to explore! For its 40th anniversary, what was once an unfinished game is now resurrected to match the full vision of creator Robert Jaeger. This time you can choose between male and female explorers, Pedro or his sister Rosita, to delve deep into the dangerous ruins and hunt for treasures untold!

name: Courageous Reasoning Nori 9 Reasoning Tournament Sticking Nori
Fragance Point
summary:
Fragance Point is a trippy 3D exploration game.

Fragrance Point is a digital paradise where you can do everything you want: Dress up, dance with aliens, and knock big things over. Make new friends, embarrass yourself in front of everyone, and you might just find a way into the station's core.
storyline: We are speechless. After a hundred years of silence, research station Fragrance Point starts sending signals to earth. What does it mean? We are sending our most advanced security robot. Armed with lipstick, snazzy boots and a big heart, we are sure it will do the right thing. What will it find?

name: Punyan
summary: Easy! Cute! But deep! A fun puzzle game with the cats of Nyanten Island, “PUNYAN”!

name: Doll Style: Underground Design and Dress
summary: Create unique styles for your girls with casual urban looks! Combine clothes, hairstyles and accessories to shine on the streets.

name: Sugoi Girls: Tribal Crush
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Summer Girlfriend: Natsu Kano
summary: Can the overly insensitive Yuichi find a girlfriend this summer!?

name: Golden Rails: Valuable Package - Collector's Edition
summary: An exciting new adventure in the world of mail delivery!

name: Destination Paradise: Collector's Edition
summary: Embark on a global adventure to uncover magic destinations.

name: The Hellspawn Spectrum
summary: Ten massive, over the top, cheese, doom-cliché ridden levels featuring lots of Eternity Engine features like portals, scripting, slopes and more.

name: District: Evolution
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Enjoy immersive battles with HD graphics! Stunning effects, weapon sounds, and team play create an immersive FPS experience!

name: Eggconsole Crimson PC-8801mkIISR
summary: Carry on your late father's will and defeat the ferocious Crimson! XTAL SOFT presents a fully-fledged command-based RPG!

name: Let's Aim! Ring Toss
summary:
Gear up for a carnival game classic: ring toss!
Win as many prizes as you can and become a ring toss master!

name: Shadows of Steam
summary: Unravel the secrets hidden in the smog of Brassfall

name: Valhalla Mountain
summary: Ascend Yggdrasil's surreal landscapes in this Norse-inspired puzzle adventure. Solve puzzles, twist geometry, and uncover a warrior's path to Valhalla.

name: Arcade Archives: Escape Kids
summary: " ESCAPE KIDS " is a sports-action game released by KONAMI in 1987. ESCAPE KIDS has only one rule: run faster than everyone else. Use the “RUN” and “SUPER JUMP” buttons to win the future superhero race.

name: The Last Light
summary: Rediscover a log lost love in a heartfelt journey through life's stages.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Claus Cat
developers: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: SantaCorps 4
summary:
Armed with their merry mysticism, magical machines, and maybe a little bit of luck, it's up to YOU to make a miracle this holiday season...and beyond!

Don the fabled white and red solo or with up to 3 friends as you dash your way through this fast-paced holiday frenzy!

name: Slay the Alice
summary: A short visual novel presented with pixel art and cute animations. Chasing after a rabbit, Alice found herself in a land of talking plants. Now, it's time to go on a tiny little adventure.

name: Dragon Ruins II
summary: An indie dungeon crawler inspired by late 80s and early 90s CRPGs.

name: Cedric & Odious
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
summary: Battle through a dark fantasy world as a resurrected warrior king. Once loyal friends, you now serve at the mercy of Odious, a brilliant but corrupt sorcerer. Master tactical combat and magical artifacts in this challenging action RPG.

name: PicoMix By NuSan
genres: Platform, Puzzle, Simulator, Adventure, Indie, Arcade
summary:
PicoMix by NuSan features games made by creator NuSan over a 8 years period of time. It’s a compilation of works in multiple genres, like platform, puzzle, crafting, or base building for a total of about 20 fun games and experiments, some will provide hours of interesting challenges while others can be completed in a few minutes.

All of the games were made using “fantasy console” Pico 8 with its recognizable 16-color palette, crunchy sweet 128x128 resolution pixel art and 4-channel chiptune

Thanks to the use of Zepto 8 emulator, an optional wide mode is included in some of the games to go beyond Pico 8’s usual square screen, as well as visual filters to tweak your experience (scanlines, CRT, toon, minit...)

name: Scarlet Girls
summary:
Commander, the girls await your call. Are you ready for this epic journey?

In the 119th year of the Old Euro Calendar, a mysterious catastrophe gave rise to crazed "Catastromechs" that swept through civilization.
