Survivors created new shelters and fused Catastromech cores with humans, creating powerful "Stellar Spirit" battle maidens. As Commander, lead these battle maidens to combat the Catastromechs, rebuild a new home called "Pax," and restore peace.

name: Magnitude: Epsilon
summary: Chaos has not begun to subside below the microscopic level. Rogue electrons are still a threat to the safety of the nuclei. The core must remain protected.

name: BattleHeights
summary:
BattleHeights is a multiplayer party game combining elements of aerial combat, fantasy, and physics-based mechanics.

Players engage in matches across floating maps, using abilities like double jumps, grappling hooks, and wind spells to outmaneuver and outwit their opponents. The gameplay revolves around creative movement, strategic use of terrain, and team-based objectives in modes like King of the Hill, Team Deathmatch and other fun activities, like a Grappling Race.

The game features cartoony physics, emphasizing fun and laughter over competitive intensity.

name: Alchemy Laboratory: Simulator
summary: Dive into a world of creation and discovery, where each element combines to form new ones. Experiment freely in this interactive sandbox. But be careful: every combination has its consequences..

name: Revenge of the Mage
summary: RotM is an Action Roguelite FPS game where players get in the robes of a Mage. Let the hands of fate open ways for the power of your magic. Save the Multiverse to power up yourself! Unlock, collect, discover, live, die, repeat!

name: Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker
summary:
Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker is an every-direction action shooter that emphasizes the exhilaration of defeating waves of enemy hordes.

The game uses a quest-based structure in which you clear quests, earn rewards, and use them to strengthen your characters for the next mission.

Skilfully dispose of the enemies coming at you from every direction and enjoy building up your characters.
storyline:
One night, as the city slept, evil spirits known as the “Miasma” emerged from the shadows into the empty streets, bringing disaster to the people.

The protagonist, Shinobu Kisaragi, is publicly an employee at a detective agency, but secretly, she is an agent of an organization that exterminates the Miasma.

Each, she fights the Miasma that emerge from the shadows.

What dangers await her…?

name: Blob
summary: Embark on a chemistry-packed adventure! Collect elemental blobs, combine them into powerful compounds, and build the ultimate periodic table collection. One element drop per hour, with more drops influenced by your blobventory!
storyline: With each element you unlock, you get closer to uncovering the noble gases and completing your ultimate collection

name: Starlair
summary: Fly through an endless universe visiting the planets of other users and taking on their challenges in a Metroidvania style game!

name: Randomax
summary: Ride or drive the turbulent waves of luck toward victory! A novel rogue-lite vertical scrolling Shmup that puts your resourcefulness to the test.
developers: ASTRO PORT, Henteko Doujin, Sanuk Games

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Ultimate Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Synduality Echo of Ada
• Ultimate Edition Content
Be ready for anything with two new outfits, access to Ultimate Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and two special tickets - including one to obtain Mystere from SYNDUALITY Noir!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Magus Costume School Uniform Purple
- Ultimate Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket
- Mystere Magus Type Exchange Ticket

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Deluxe Edition
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada
• Deluxe Edition Content
Be ready for anything with a new outfit, access to Deluxe Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and a Magus Remake Ticket!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Deluxe Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket

name: Egyptian Punishment
summary: All slaves has to be punished for misdemeanor. Watch as the queen summons an exotic futa slave and orders her demonic beast to punish the girl's filthy fuck hole. Things get heated quickly, soon it’s the queen’s hole enjoys the slave’s shaft. It all ends with a well-deserved bath of monster cum!

name: Satan
summary: Experience the thrill of retro boomer shooters in this action-packed game where you'll battle hordes of demons and face the ultimate challenge: Satan himself. Relive the glory days of classic shooters with intense gameplay, a variety of weapons, and relentless enemies.

name: Donkey Kong Country Returns HD
summary:
Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong are back for some ground-pounding action in this HD version of Donkey Kong Country Returns, originally released on the Wii system.

Play solo, or with a buddy in local two-player co-op, in an adventure brimming with hijinks where you can stomp obstacles, send mine carts careening, fly high on rocket barrels and even hitch a ride on Rambi the Rhino.

Experience 80 a-peel-ing levels, including the additional ones from the Nintendo 3DS version.
storyline: The villainous Tiki Tak Tribe has stolen Donkey Kong’s precious banana hoard and the Kongs are barreling after them in pursuit!

name: Avian Colony
summary: Avian Colony is a survival simulation game that places you in the role of the ruler of a floating colony in a harsh sky world. Your main goal is to ensure the survival and prosperity of your colony by managing resources, planning strategically, and defending against threats.

name: Nunholy
summary: In a world overrun by vampires, nuns with their own stories have arrived at the Hunter's Guild. They are prepared to borrow even the power of demons if it means defeating their enemies. What fate awaits them?

name: Check Inn
summary: Build hotels, accommodate guests and expand your hotel business throughout the world!

name: Save The Castle!
summary: Save the Castle is an action packed VR tower defense that places you on the field of battle. Build your army, take over any tower and turn the tide of the war!

name: Hyper Flux
summary: Hyper Flux is a single-player speedrunning 3D platformer that demands you to speed through shattered planets using your zero-gravity suit and force-manipulating orbs. Fly through the skies of insane levels to reach the end portal as fast as possible.

name: Robot Girl's Dream: Robot Battle Championship
summary: This game is an RPG game that follows the growth of a robot girl who has lost her memories. Players can aim for victory in the robot battle tournament, the main objective, and also enjoy interactions with both humans and robots.

name: Things Too Ugly
platforms: PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Clock in at TEREBRO INC. for the night shift in 1986. Protect the company's legacy as Risk Assessment Data Processor. Equipped with era-specific technology, navigate through obscured narratives to shape the company's future.

name: Tribe Nation
summary: Tribe Nation is a roguelike strategy with real-time battles set in the Gallic Wars era. Lead your Celtic tribe across Europe to a new homeland. Strategize on a randomly generated hex battlefield, adapt to unexpected events, craft, improve, and equip. Make your tribe a nation.

name: Waiting in the Lime Forest
summary: Face your friend's twisted mind and do your best. You should stay sane until the end.
developers: WSS playground, Unica, BARON DU JUVÉNILE

name: Arken Age
summary: Arken Age is a VR action-adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

name: Blade Chimera
summary: In this exploration-heavy 2D action game, use your demon sword to interfere with the past, create platforms, and shield yourself from danger to explore a dystopian cyberpunk world depicted in gorgeously animated pixel art.
storyline:
In the year 20XX, cities were suddenly flooded with demons in the form of monsters and spirits that suddenly appeared in the city, sparking an all-out Demon War.

Even now, more than 30 years later, demons still roam the streets and harm humans wherever they go.

name: Wizard Warfare 2: Cephalopod Wars
summary: Wizard Warfare 2: Cephalopod Wars is the sequel to Wizard Warfare, a fantasy-themed, 4X-style, turn-based strategy game with a strategic empire management layer supported by a detailed tactical battle simulation layer. Now includes fully simulated naval battles.

name: Assetto Corsa EVO
summary: Assetto Corsa EVO is the sequel to 2014’s racing simulator Assetto Corsa, which featured a range of road, track, racing, historic and drift cars as well as laser-scanned tracks

name: Kill a Million Rats
summary: A roguelite bullet-heaven RTS, set in a forest invaded by an endless horde of Rats. As the Spirit of Vengeance, you must save the adorable, innocent animals. Explore a randomly generated world, harvest resources, rebuild the Hidden Village, recruit allies, and Kill a Million Rats!

name: Grim
summary: Grim is an Exclusive VR Multiplayer Survival game where you must immerse yourself in its harsh landscapes, where survival is not just a choice but a grueling battle against nature and other desperate players. You must gather resources, craft, and build your base, all to stay alive.
storyline: Left stranded on the Red Planet by AdvantEDGE. Filled with treacherous terrain, riddled with precious resources necessary for your survival. Find food, water, and materials to construct a secure base and hone your craft. Discover radiated monuments that hold desirable loot. But be wary of the unknown and rival survivors as they pose constant threats and challenge your resilience on the Red Planet that is GRIM. Explore Mars, but watch your back…

name: Age of Water
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Age of Water is a new MMO game set in a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water.

The rooftops of high-rise buildings and tops of other man-made and natural objects turned into islands, on which the surviving people built new settlements. Your adventure begins near one of them.

name: Fragrance Point
summary: What went wrong on Fragrance Point? Explore, hang out, and poke around where you're not supposed to.

name: Hunter: The Reckoning - The Beast of Glenkildove
summary: Full moon. Cold night. Dark shadow. Warm gun. The Beast of Glenkildove has stalked Ireland for centuries. Now, you must hunt it. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: 9 Lives to Defend
summary: Face a pest infestation and survive until Loki's parents return from their trip! Defend the house with your 9 lives. Choose upgrades, and play with different versions of Loki, with unique weapons and abilities to fight this war ^.^

name: Football Coach: College Dynasty
summary: A true college football management game. Play as a coach or a school, recruit players, develop your team, and compete for national championships. Build a college football dynasty in a realistic and customizable league with up to 90 teams.

name: Splittown
summary: Cold War has split the world in two. The Great Divide spans across the globe with an impenetrable wall between the two blocs. You are Leonard Nimby; stone-faced agent of IM5, hot on the trail of a shrink gun stolen from you by a villanous mayoral candidate on the eve of a fateful election.

name: Tyrant's Realm
summary: Tyrant's Realm is a challenging action roguelike. Fill your arsenal with weapons and armor each with their unique gameplay mechanics. Tread carefully in this dark fantasy world because every enemy you face could be your end.

name: DreadOut: Remastered Collection
summary: Where the world of Dread begins!!

name: Hitman World of Assassination: Episode - Sapienza
summary: Suit up as Agent 47 in this spy-thriller adventure where creativity is your deadliest weapon. Experience Sapienza, Italy, one of the many locations in the World of Assassination trilogy where your mission is to neutralize a lethal bioweapon and eliminate its creators.

name: Suikaiju
summary: Play as a mad scientist with the goal of creating the biggest and mightiest Kaiju of all time! Merge Kaiju Cores, a fundamental material to trigger the evolution, into biggers ones. Repeat this process until your Kaiju can finally evolve. Can you make your little monster big enough to conquer the world?

name: Perfect Ninja Bundle
summary: Save 20% with the bundle of four games: "Super Ninja Miner" and three part of "Perfect Ninja Painter"

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 3
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: New part of the puzzle platformer about ninja painters with new character, new features and new puzzles.

name: Turning the Page
summary:
For Felix and Sophie Page, two professors at Riverside College, things are going very well. They have jobs they love, they are well respected and most importantly: they have each other. In fact, their recent marriage has made it official. Nothing could get between them... except maybe one of their students...

Turning the Page is a Visual Novel focused on Netorare and Corruption.

In particular, it is part of the “mystery NTR” subgenre, meaning that the player can choose to experience the story through either the hero’s point of view, with an obscured and limited view of what is happening, or from the heroine’s perspective which shows her being stolen away from the hero in complete detail.

name: YieldTrillions
summary: Hello, I'm a corn alien, I need to start the ship and go home, please V I have 10000000000 pounds of corn for spaceship fuel and I'll give you half a pound of popcorn as a reward when I get home.

name: Prison Notes
summary: Prison Notes is a RPG with text-based ADV and cultivation elements. You act as a young migrant worker, wrongly imprisoned in the prison known as "The Coral Reef".What challenges and adventures are awaiting? Will you finally find a way out? Your choices and actions will decide the end of your story.

name: Jailbreak Assault
summary: In Jailbreak Assault, you're a prisoner on a daring mission to break free. Start with a key and a baton, outwit guards, destroy documents, and disable security systems. Arm yourself for the ultimate challenge: escaping the heavily fortified perimeter.

name: Up Island
summary: The tides are rising and starts to flood your island. The only way to escape, is to find your boat at the top of the island and sail away. You must hurry before the flood takes you away.

name: Well Dumb
summary: It's a simple swiping game. You catch fish from a well. Trade fish with other players. Regular updates and fish drop events! Happy Fishing!

name: Silent Signals
summary: Hack the System. Uncover the Truth

name: Samurai Brothers
summary: Samurai Brothers is a fast paced shared-screen multiplayer game. In addition to the solo mode, two modes are available for multiplayer games. Do you want to fight against your friends ? Or work as a team against the multitude of enemies ?

name: Tenshi
summary: Don't Blink. They're Always Watching. Enter the haunting corridors of the Fukushima asylum, a short but intense bodycam-style horror game that will leave you breathless.

name: Culinary Tour
summary:
The Forgotten Culinary World, Rediscovered and Continued by You!

The food of various countries is personified as a anime, helping you in the whole process! Your favorite food will transform into a unique culinary elf, accompanying you through various difficulties and obstacles in a different world, so that you are no longer lonely.

With just one click, the Food Elf can easily sweep away evil monsters for you; One click harvest allows you to quickly obtain the resources you need! Let's talk together online and save another world, while offline, we'll lay flat and reap abundant rewards.

In addition to maintaining peace in other worlds, it can also cultivate the favorability of food elves and add combat power to you! Which type of food spirit do you like?

One handed operation, easy and casual~Hidden battles, automatic level clearing, multi line advancement saves more time! Diverse gameplay, experience different worlds.

name: So Many Zombies
summary: So Many Zombies! is a fast-paced top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Face heart-pounding action and test your skills in a chaotic, bullet-filled battlefield where every second counts. How long can you last against the swarm?

name: Phantom's Estate
summary: Phantom's Estate is a Survival Horror game where you have the choice of going in solo, or gathering your friends to hunt for the dead. Be aware though as these ghosts have been reported to track and learn your mistakes while you explore...

name: Warranty Not Included
summary: Warranty Not Included is a fun and accessible VR shooter perfect for newcomers. Practice your aim in various ranges and blast away at hordes of robotic enemies. Join the Resistance Now!

name: Malleus Cocconum: The Heiress
summary: You were Arenda Finch, a fifteen-year-old girl who had inherited a vast fortune. Expelled from your old school, you were transferred to a new school located within Dunkenwood House. The dark side of elitism awaited. Humanity or demonic nature? Love or desire? Your choices would determine her fate.

name: The Road To Harvest: Food From Across The Ocean
summary: Become the God of Harvest, explore the world of food and adventure, plant, trade, and spread deliciousness to create your own path to prosperity!

name: Trapped: Family Vacation
summary: Spot the differences, but each room has a survival rule.
storyline: You are adopted by a new stepfamily. They locked you up in a hotel, and they’re making you follow weird rules. The only way to escape is by completing a game.

name: Sokorobot
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: In this puzzle game, a robot need to clear paths to unlock new levels!

In 2015, aliens visited the United States.

In 2115, they came back.

name: Sanguis Luna
summary:
Wake up in the darkness of a cold, unfamiliar cellar, with the distant echo of footsteps that shouldn't be there.

Sanguis Luna throws you into a living nightmare, where every shadow hides a secret and every sound fills you with growing terror. You are alone, with no memory of how you ended up in that cursed house, but one thing is certain: someone, or something, is watching you...

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Paean of Era Nova
summary:
Version 3.0 of Honkai: Star Rail is the game's second major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: The Herta, Aglaea, and the Remembrance path for the Trailblazer
• New character path: Remembrance
• New Trailblaze mission
• New planet: Amphoreus
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!
storyline:
"Hero. Divine. Puppet. Prisoner. Which of these things are you? Who are you?"

"I am but one among a thousand faces defiant against my fate. That which you see... is me."

name: Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz
summary: Dive into the adrenaline-pumping action of Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz, where the fate of the city rests in your hands! This action-packed shooter throws you into a city overrun by the undead, transforming every corner into a battle for survival.

name: Chicken Hill
summary: Find 250 Genjouin of various species and hundreds of items for brother KUN. Rescue your frustrated and devastated brother KUN in the KUN space. We are the most devout believers.

name: Aleator
summary: Can Debt-laden gamblers grab at straws and escape, or plunge into a bottomless pit

name: Deckarium
summary: A deck-building pet simulator. Play pet cards to populate your terrarium or aquarium, be on the lookout for card-packs to expand your deck, keep your creatures fed to collect coins, and use them to buy more pets! But look out for ghosts! They hunger for the souls of your pets.

name: Piworld
summary: First pixel 2D game, which include MMO and PVP system for anyone, who wants to try something new.

name: Strigoi
summary:
"We, my sister and I, have long lived abroad, together with the longing for our homeland. Not long ago, we received an invitation to a party in Romania, in the Carpathians. My sister, without hesitation, got into the car and left. I refused to go, but after some time I received a terrifying message from my sister. Frightened, I dropped everything and quickly set out to find her. I wonder what happened?"

Strigoi is a first-person horror shooter set in the Carpathian Mountains. You will face various enemies (Vampires, Strigoi...), encounter interesting puzzles, and find different items that will help you overcome obstacles and enemies.

name: Pollen
summary: Immerse yourself in a thrilling maze escape game where your sense is limited, and danger lurks around every corner. Can you outsmart everyone and find your way out?

name: Winged
summary: A platform game with map that unlocks books! And the books are part of the gameplay, because it is through them that the characters gain new "wings", a metaphor for the concept of "wings of the imagination" that books teach us. This game innovates by blending literature and games in a harmonious way.

name: Battleships Collide: Space Shooter
summary: Battleships Collide: Explore 3D space, defend the galaxy, and conquer 20 intense levels. Customize your spaceship, collect artifacts for hyper space travels in this thrilling shooter game and become the hero galaxies await!

name: The Roottrees Are Dead
summary: A genealogical mystery straight out of 1998. Scour the early Internet for clues, uncover hidden connections, and piece together the family tree behind the secretive Roottree Corporation.

name: Umbra: The Last Summoner
summary: As the sole summoner, step into the mystical realm of Umbra to rescue it from the encroaching demon army emerging from dimensional rifts. To end this invasion, call upon 60 diverse heroes, each with unique abilities, and engage in strategic, round-based RPG battles.

name: Ancient Kingdoms
summary: Explore a vast open world filled with unique creatures and dungeons. Choose from six powerful classes and embark on an epic fantasy journey in this RPG. Play alone or with your friends (up to 4 players)

name: Endless Alice
summary: "Endless Alice" combines Rogue-lite random elements with RPG strategic character development. In the game, you can explore maps to collect enhancement elements and interact with various creatures to gain special effects or alter gameplay.

name: Harvest Hills
summary: Harvest Hills is a charming and relaxing farm simulator that allows you to run your own rancho. Cultivate various crops, take care of animals, and produce homemade products. Sell the goods in the local market to earn money and use it to upgrade or automate the farm.

name: Dealer's Life Legend
summary: Undertake the perilous Quest of the Wandering Merchant and become a Legend in yet another outstanding installment to your favorite haggling tycoon phenomenon Dealer's Life!

name: The Lies We Tell Ourselves
summary: The Lies We Tell Ourselves is an episodic first person psychological action-adventure game with introspective/horror elements and a focus on subtle storytelling and atmosphere.

name: Farm Wars
summary: Set a price for your farm and protect it. Your shapeshifter farmer will help you harvest your farm and destroy your rival’s farm. Farm Wars is a top-down PvP farm game against time. Create a strategy for your opponent and purchase their farm. Pay attention to the mines while making your attack!

name: Aloft
summary: Survive on floating islands caught in an eternal hurricane in this atmospheric sandbox survival indie game. Build your base and sail the winds to discover new islands and fight back fungi corruption while upgrading your gear. Reach the highest altitudes and brave their challenges.
storyline: Survive on floating islands caught in an eternal hurricane in this atmospheric sandbox survival indie game. Build your base and sail the winds to discover new islands and fight back fungi corruption while upgrading your gear. Reach the highest altitudes and brave their challenges.

name: Broken Alliance
summary: From the makers of Death and Taxes comes a turn-based adventure-strategy game. Play as one of 4 distinct factions, harnessing the vast power of magic to save your dying world. The way you play determines the sacrifices and consequences you have to endure, shaping your personal storyline.

name: Wormventures: Barrier 51
summary: A classic 3D cartoon point & click adventure game. Help Looky the worm to save planet Vermis!

name: Age of Darkness: Final Stand
summary: Age of Darkness: Final Stand is a dark fantasy survival RTS where you must illuminate, build and defend humanity’s last bastion against hordes of Nightmares. Set in the remnants of a kingdom consumed by a deadly fog, you decide. Will you hide in the light? Or take back your world.
storyline:
The darkness is an entity of evil. Some say it is the manifestation of human fear and nightmares, others say it is a wandering mass of damned souls haunting us. The origin of the darkness itself is unknown, but one thing for certain is that we can keep it at bay through the power of light and fire.

Brace yourself against huge tidal waves of Nightmares. Leveraging an internally developed technology called ‘SwarmTech’ allows the game to render over 70,000 enemy units on the screen at one time. These enemy legions claw their way up through seething fissures in the earth to reinforce ‘The Veil’.

name: Wet Nightmares
summary: As another woman joins the list of the missing, deep within a forest, a man living in solitude is visited by a pretty stranger. Wet Nightmares is an Erotic Horror Visual Novel exploring the psyche of a haunted man and his depraved past.

name: Momibosu
summary: A boy and a girl, who have a mysterious weapon, a drone, set out on an adventurous journey from their small underground village to the vast world, aiming for a new world. Enjoy "Momibosu," a high-tempo road movie-like 2D action game that will make you want to play over again and again.

name: RaidLand
summary: RaidLand is a rerelease of the original game by SideQuest Software. In this fantasy rpg you play as the Hunter, Warrior or Berserker in Team Greed mode. Hunt & kill your opponents, steal & hoard gold for victory. Level up, unlock skill perks & masteries in each class!
developers: Blue Wizard Digital, SideQuestNZ, Funk Games

name: Gunship Battle: Total Warfare
summary:
Battle enemy units to defend your base and save the world. Gunship Battle is now back as a new MMO Strategy game, Gunship Battle Total Warfare!

Become an Admiral and lead your troops to end the battle and dominate the ocean.

Game Features:

BUILD YOUR ARMY BASE

- Build powerful Ships, Jets, and Armor Units and form your own strategy against Armada.

- Defend your Headquarters from incoming enemies trying to take over your land.

- Battle Real-time PvP with other Admirals from around the world.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ARMY

- Camouflage your Ships with your own design and patterns.

- Research various subjects and advance battle strategies.

JOIN ALLIANCE

- Dominate the ocean by creating or joining an alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.

- Help your Alliance by supporting their actions.

Rule over not only the ocean but also the sky with your army!

Download now to start your new journey as Admiral.

name: Orbital Cascade
summary: A puzzle game inspired by classics like Zuma, where you pop colorful bullets, unleash dazzling combos, and rise to conquer the skies. Strategize your moves, master the challenge, and claim victory!

name: Jump Truck
summary: Hop over gaps, flip between rooftops and launch yourself through an entire planet to become the fastest truck in the universe. Jump Truck is a 3D racing game about finding shortcuts and executing crazy aerials.

name: Bear Jump
summary: Step into the bouncy world of Bear Jump! Help a determined bear jump endlessly upward, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and reaching new heights. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Bear Jump is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Whack Mole
summary: The player gets ready to face moles popping up from various holes. As the game advances, the speed and frequency of the moles' appearances increase, challenging the player's reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

name: Whispers in the Wood
summary: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.

name: Aisera's Ladder
summary: Come and experience the fast and exciting cold weapon battles! Understand the vast world of Azeroth in battle; By using exquisite combat skills to defeat the weak, managing a farm to produce food, and running a tavern to accumulate gold coins and upgrade equipment.

name: Enerdusk
summary: "Enerdusk" is a roguelike deck-building game where you develop strategies centered on units while utilizing cards. Decks and items empower your units, and in turn, your units enhance your deck and shift the battle in your favor. Master this synergy to dominate all your enemies.

name: Ninth Hotel
summary: You are trapped in a Hotel by accident Find out all the signs of abnormality in the hallway Escape by going down to the first floor while carefully observing your surroundings

name: Dragonsweeper
summary: A minesweeper game that requires observation by mixing roguelike elements with the classic gameplay.

name: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic
summary: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic is a Roguelike game. You will role-play an agent of a streamer who died because of a murder. You are trying to "bring her back" through AI technology on the Internet, making her the unique creation of the Internet.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 7
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
developers: Epic Games, Harmonix Music Systems, Crypton Future Media

name: Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator
summary: Unleash your inner fashion mogul in Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator! This immersive game combines the bustling world of supermarket management with the exciting world of fashion retail. Build your dream clothing empire, from a cozy boutique to a sprawling fashion megastore.

name: Threefold Recital
summary: Threefold Recital is set in an oriental fantasy world where the metropolis of Bluescales faces turmoil after a long golden age. The mix of magic, modern, and ancient technologies challenges governance, while tensions between humans, beastlings, and dragons grow. In the shadows, a crisis looms. A 2D platformer with puzzles.
storyline:
Step into an oriental fantasy realm inhabited by humans, beastlings, and majestic dragons. After a golden age spanning thousands of years, the bustling metropolis of Bluescales now faces tumultuous times. Here, magic and technology coexist, complicating social governance. To further stir the pot, the secret art behind ancient miracles—presumed long lost—is resurfacing. Beneath the city's clamor, a storm unlike any other is quietly brewing...

A long, long time ago, there lived a wolf, a fox, and a snake. But these weren’t just your ordinary wild animals. They were very patient and wise, and after a lot of hard work, they gained human form and became "beastlings", as they liked to call themselves. Now, let's meet our heroes:

name: Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise
summary: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.

name: Eternal Night Glory
summary: From the beginning, you've got all the cards. Now, command the garrisons of the Gate of Radiance to stop them from approaching.

name: My House
summary: 3D Action Shooter, Tower Defence Game. Kill monsters. Buy items for defence. Save Your House.

name: Templar
summary: Templar is a 2D indie platformer and hack and slash game.

name: Block Blaster DX!
summary: New block puzzle game, offering a relaxing yet challenging experience for all ages.

name: Relentless Expanse
summary: Capture and upgrade planets, outsmart your enemies, and conquer the galaxy! Simple yet addicting, you can play alone or outsmart your friends in this 2D top-down space RTS. Completely free, no monetization, just fun!

name: Sports Girl: Village
summary: Lucy is a sporty girl, this time she comes to a deserted village, in order to obtain the ancient magic, restore the girls who have been petrified by the spell, she needs to find 18 objects to make magic. There are 24 beautiful girls waiting to be rescued.

name: Heroes of Hammerwatch II
summary: A rogue-lite that offers extensive persistent progression. Build your town, upgrade and equip your heroes, before taking on the the ever-changing Dark Citadel - either solo or with a team of friends.

name: Another Way of Gettin' Paid
summary: As Shunji's various acquaintances begin to interact in ways they were never supposed to, he finds his social circle expanding farther than he could have ever imagined...
storyline:
Ever since his college days, Shunji Naruse has been working with the female president of a real estate company, Mizuru Kozuki. He works as her private secretary.

One day, Shunji's pleasant life gets even better when he befriends a girl, Chisato Hinata.

Things grow even livelier when a divorced wife and one of Mizuru's old classmates, Kasumi Tachibana; as well as Chisato's friend, Hasumi Tachibana—get added to the mix.

As his various acquaintances begin to interact in ways they were never supposed to, Shunji finds his social circle expanding farther than he could have ever imagined...

name: The Moon Ate the Sun
summary: Defeat hordes of enemies, upgrade your weapons and abilities as the evil Moon that was dormant for millennia.

name: Forest of Perdition 2: The School Trip
summary: James Everhart and his classmates embark on a school trip to the abandoned Tranquil Hills, a forest park shrouded in mysteries and horrors. As they explore the area, they uncover dark secrets and confront malevolent forces that threaten their lives and the truth of the past.

name: Sailing Alone: Aftermath
summary: Sailing alone: Aftermath is a post-apocalyptic nautical survival game where players navigate their ships through an infinitely vast open world, exploring endless oceans and lands, playing any role you desire, and penning their own legendary tale of survival in the apocalypse.

name: SickWay VR
summary: Sickway is a realistic VR game where you drive a two wheeled electric vehicle in the heights of the city with the goal of getting down. Good advice: Avoid falling down! You can use your creative abilities in track editor, or you can become the fastest among your friends in multiplayer maps.

name: Try to Survive Today
summary: A three-dimensional shooter with an isometric camera or a first- or third-person view. You in a fur suit shoot all sorts of devils and robots spawning from everywhere. By gaining experience for destroying enemies, collecting their souls, you upgrade your tree of characteristics

name: Bored Wife
summary: Mrs. Moore, an bored housewife, finds herself trapped in the monotony of her life. She feels the invisible chains of family duties, lost in the routine. Then, unexpectedly, a unique opportunity secretly presents itself to her, offering a chance to change her life.

name: Nagi no Koi
summary: A Japanese-style visual novel where two stories intersect.
storyline:
【Chapter of the Red Spider Lily】
Masahide's dream was to become the Lord that would rule this land.
But his dream, along with his ego, was crushed, leaving him without any pride.
It was then where a girl named Sahana scolded him for living his life as a mere cog of the government.
He enters into a loveless political marriage with Sahana, but that relationship slowly changes them both.
As it gradually transforms into a passionate relationship, Masahide decides to pursue a dream he once gave up on.

【Chapter of the Water Lily】
A man without memories.
Completely lost, unable to remember even his name, is saved by a girl named Suirin.
For Suirin's sake, he turns his existence around.
Across the sea, where the nagidori calls.
Kai's memories lie dormant in the sea.

name: Asfalia: Fear
summary: Adventure awaits you in this colorful, family-friendly point-and-click delight! Navigate through a world painted with emotions, where even 'fear' becomes a playful friend. Solve puzzles, collect stickers, and share giggles in a heartwarming journey in the world of emotions.

name: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
summary: A lengthy fantasy adventure role playing game based around a day/night cycle, customizing your heroes, and a storyline where every choice has an impact on the story. Upgraded from it's original MS-DOS release to run natively on all platforms with QOL updates!

name: Hyper Light Breaker
genres: Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Enter the Overgrowth, a new land in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore massive biomes, defeat brutal monsters, create new builds, survive the mysterious Crowns and overthrow the almighty Abyss King in this adventure from the creators of Hyper Light Drifter.

name: Annihilate the Spance
summary: Annihilate The Spance is a real-time strategic base builder with vast, semi-autonomous fleets. Construct your base and provide your automated armada with the means to annihilate the enemy through calculated unit compositions and rapid on-the-fly adjustments.

name: The Machines Arena
summary: The Machines Arena is an adrenaline-fueled 4v4 top-down hero shooter where players compete in chaotic close quarters combat to plant bombs, deliver payloads and rack up kills in a growing number of game modes. Choose between 9 unique characters spread across 3 distinct roles and dive right into the action. Find your hero, hone your skills, and dominate the arena.

name: Pirates VR: Jolly Roger
summary: Pirates VR Jolly Roger is a game alluding to old stories of the all-time most famous Pirates. The journey into the pirate world begins on a deserted island. Despite its extraordinary charm, the land hides a number of secrets and mysteries to be solved as well as obstacles and traps.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Jump-Start 7
summary: Enhance your fleet with Kolberg A—a Premium version of German Tier II cruiser Kolberg, and stock up on credits, camouflages, Boosters, and Premium Account time.

name: Puzzle Adventures: Sea Animals
summary: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Shinya Ichi-ji no Koukanshu
summary: Have you heard the rumor? If you call a certain number at 1am, you will be connected to a person called the 1am operator. This person is said to be able to connect you to the past.

name: Sebastian's Quest
summary: In Sebastian's Quest, you have to shove gems and find the cheese.

name: Return to Campus
summary: An open world school game, you can bully your classmates, collect protection fees, go to the supermarket to make zero-dollar purchases, or even blow up the school. Of course, you can also study hard and exchange ideas with your classmates.

name: What Is This Sorcery
summary: WITS (What Is This Sorcery) is an immersive digital trading card game (TCG) that brings together the classic appeal of card collecting with the dynamic interactivity of online gaming. Set against a backdrop of enchantment and strategy, WITS challenges players to master the art of magical combat, using a diverse array of cards that represent mythical creatures, arcane spells, and cunning tactics.
storyline:
In the mystical world of Catena, 10 powerful factions vie for dominance after the arrival of the comet Satonako, which unleashed untold magical energy across the land. This cosmic event reshaped the world, granting extraordinary abilities to those who dared to wield its power. But magic is a double-edged sword—while it has elevated civilizations, it has also ignited a battle for control over Catena’s destiny.

At the heart of this struggle is Drath, a warlord consumed by the comet’s dark energy, seeking to impose his vision of order through domination. Opposing him are champions like Centurio, the noble strategist of the Light Faction, and ViBu, a visionary alchemist who believes magic must serve all, not the few.

As factions clash for control of magical relics, territories, and influence, the fate of Catena hangs in the balance. Will you align with the disciplined protectors of light, the chaotic forces of darkness, or another faction with their own ambitions? In this world of evolving narratives, your choices and victories shape the future of Catena.

Step into the conflict, claim your power, and decide Catena’s ultimate destiny.

name: Constantine Scores
summary: Constantine Scores is a single-player heisting Sci-fi First Person Shooter. Upgrade your arsenal to gain more abilities, weapons, and perks to keep the playing field equal. Fight against three separate factions, spanning multiple contracts, and randomized multi-day campaigns.https://

name: Magic Book Auto Battler
summary: Magicbook AutoBattler is a non-traditional strategy game that combines Roguelite moves. This game has unique binding combinations, rich weapons and equipment, cool magical effects, and thrilling combat scenes. In the world of magic books, you will face endless challenges and rewards……

name: Jigsaw USA
summary: Jigsaw USA is an exciting puzzle game that challenges players to complete puzzles as quickly as possible to earn top scores. Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and secure your place at the top of the global leaderboards. As players race against the clock, they also get to explore iconic moments, notable figures, and landmarks from American history, making the game both thrilling and educational.

name: Paranormal Night Shift
summary: Paranormal Night Shift is an observation and spot the anomaly game set in a haunted house in the 1980s.
storyline:
You and your partner, Gary, are ghost hunters. A desperate call from a family in distress leads you to a house in a residential area of North London, where strange phenomena are disrupting their daily lives.

Your job is to keep a close eye on the cameras and report any anomalies to your partner.

But be careful, this house is truly haunted and if you miss too many anomalies, you might not survive the night...

You will have three nights to play, 3 to 5 hours of gameplay, depending on your powers of observation, and a mystery to unfold gradually.

Keep your eyes peeled, ghost hunter, and good luck!

name: TeeDee
summary: A minimalist 2D tower defense game with 3 towers, 6 maps, and 4 monster types. Simple, fun, and perfect for quick strategy sessions!

name: Dead Rush
summary: DEAD RUSH - This is a dynamic first-person shooter in which you must confront hordes of hungry zombies! There's no convoluted plot, side quests and a large open world. Here you will find only concentrated action. The only thing you will be doing in this game is shooting at the crowd of reanimated dead. Explore the location, find the most powerful gun and destroy ten waves of zombies before they reach you!

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Digital Deluxe Edition pre-order bonus:
- Early access
Provides access to the game 72 hours before the official release.
developers: Koei Tecmo Games Co., Koei Tecmo America Corporation

name: Toy Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own toy store! Arrange shelves, set prices, process payments, and manage staff. Expand and design your shop, handle online orders, deliver with a scooter, trade rare toys, and ensure security. Create a magical shopping experience in Toy Shop Simulator!

name: Janken Horn
summary: Janken Horn is a "Rock Paper Scissors" card game. When a simple luck testing game suddenly becomes a strategy game, you will understand. Why does it make you think so much when all you need to do is to pick one from Rock/Paper/Scissors?

name: Alpaca Party
summary: Alpaca Party is a free VR Party game. In this game, you can enjoy thrilling Werewolf gameplay, strategize with friends. You can also explore mysterious realms through portals,Whether you love strategic puzzles or relaxed social play, Alpaca Party has something for everyone.

name: Nine-Ball Roulette
summary: This will be the most exciting pool game you have ever played. Join up to 3 of your friends in this exciting pool roulette game! Eliminate each other with pool until only one person is left.

name: TrickShot Simulator
summary:
This Game is a simulator game.
A player experiences realistic trickshot challenges.

name: Willie's Nightfall
summary: Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willie—a distorted, murderous mouse—is hunting you down.

name: Lern Island Letters
summary: Lern Island Letters is a short narrative game where you play as a postman, sorting the mail of the five intriguing residents of a remote island. Pick up on their peculiar habits through hints on the envelopes, discover their secrets, and try to save this peaceful haven from its fate.

name: Deadbeat
summary: Make your voice heard in this isometric Action-RPG where quick thinking and patience guide the way to victory. In a hazy Hereafter that's not heaven or hell, fight bizarre demons, call your friends, and explore the deepest reaches of death.

name: Wasteland Chronicles
summary: Wasteland Chronicles is a card based turn based combat game adapted from ancient mythology, featuring forty different styles and skills of Wasteland gods who will help players complete their journey from Chaos to the Jedi Sky Pass.

name: Nurikabe World
summary: Nurikabe World is a relaxing logic puzzle game where you solve puzzles by creating islands and connecting rivers to create beautiful sceneries. Experience different landscapes and seasons, solve puzzle campaigns and create your own levels.

name: Endeavor
summary: A sci-fi real-time strategy game with free form base building and all of the typical features found in classic RTS offerings. Construct a base, collect resources, build defenses, train an army, research technology and destroy the enemy. Manage your army with unit formations, patrol routes and attack groups, reveal the enemy through fog of war, monitor the battlefield with radar, one-click support abilities, unique unit attacks, hero units, etc. Combat balanced with a rock-paper-scissor approach to unit balance.
storyline:
Resources are being held captive by profiteering corporations who have joined forces to overthrow elected governments and seize the world's riches for the world's richest.

Praesidium, a cabal of the most powerful private corporations, has seized control of over 90% of the world's natural resources.

Why?

Because they could.

Greed won the war before it began.
Praesidium forged false alliances with select nations and signed contracts giving them full access to each of the nation's resources. They also ran successful propaganda campaigns, encouraging these same nations to compete with one another politically and ultimately militarily. This strategy slowly but surely weakened all nations who struggled to maintain control over their people and their land as their wealth, which was tied to the very resource rights they had signed away, was stripped.

When the nations of the world were sufficiently weakened, Praesidium moved on the world's most resource rich lands with a vast private army, which was funded by the unlimited wealth of the world's corporate powers.

This private army became known as Praesidium's Shield. They did not conquer nations, they simply moved into resource rich regions, constructed defensive strongholds and seized control of the world's various natural resources.

Nations crumbled as they fought against Praesidium and each other, in order to secure remnants to sustain their economies and their way of life.

Eventually, there were no nations powerful enough to challenge Praesidium's dominance...

...until now.

Endeavor is a newly formed resistance force. Made up of the most powerful military minds, technology and equipment from each of the world's once mighty nation states who have combined into a single fighting force powerful enough to make a difference.

Take command, retake our lands and reclaim what is rightfully ours.

name: Super Puzzled Cat
summary: Help Puzzled Cat use jetpacks, portals, bombs, gum, and more to conquer treacherous platforming stages. Play your own way using save states to explore a world full of challenges and secrets - but can you find the way through? Travel through time and space and reach enlightenment.

name: Lamu
summary: Lamu is an adventurous, single-player 2D RPG game.Improve your farm during the day.Protect your friends at night and battle enemies.

name: Personal Finance Simulator
summary: Choose how much money you start with, a profession, and a city, then make personal financial decisions! Will you end up rich or end up getting evicted?

name: The Witch's Assistant
summary: A sexually explicit visual novel in which the player assists a Witch to run her potion selling business.

name: The Haunting of Joni Evers
summary: The Haunting of Joni Evers is a psychologically thrilling first-person strollplayer set in the small town of Harvest, Oklahoma. Confront, examine, and reexamine Joni’s memories in this emotional story of estranged family underscored by a malevolent, interdimensional haunting.
storyline: Trouble follows you home as strange happenings once again disquiet the small town of Harvest, Oklahoma. Play as Joni Evers, a self-reliant loner estranged from her family. Much of the massive Cunningham House, where she lives alone, stands forgotten and forsaken. After an unexpected fight with a close friend, Joni comes home one night unprepared for the mystical snare that awaits her. She must face her past to secure her future. But can she do it in time?

name: The Dream Within
summary: A pixel-graphics open world survival craft RPG, where players are locked in a deep dream world, survive and rescue yourself in this unstable world, forage, hunt, mine, and build up shelters. Find a way to escape.

name: Edd-E
summary: Edd-E is a pixel-art game maker with custom visual scripting and publishing platform. Create games and Publish them with just one click. Play games from other creators or edit them. Learn programming and game development!

name: Airborne Empire
genres: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Strategy, Tactical, Adventure, Indie
summary: Build, manage, and grow your unique city in the skies. Traverse a vast and rich open world full of exotic technologies, relentless dangers, and many hidden treasures. Defend your inhabitants – and the kingdoms below! – from destructive attacks. Only daring leaders can reforge the Airborne Empire!
developers: The Wandering Band, Stray Fawn Publishing

name: Transfusion
summary: A VR game where you slice alien enemies into tiny pieces!

name: Rogue Hex
genres: Simulator, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: Craft your deck of cards to conquer the world in the Roguelite 4x. Explore mysterious lands. Survive against the barbarian horde. Expand and build dynamic cities. Discover over 200 game-changing techs. Grow your stone age empire into the stars!

name: Dreaming Isles
summary: A colorful sandbox action RPG and life sim that combines sword and sorcery, high seas adventure, farming, and relationship building. Unite the clans of the Dreaming Isles, farm the land, start a family, and find your purpose.

name: Final Knight
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Indie
summary: Retro console-style beat 'em up action RPG, Giant weapons, massive monsters, Lightning Ring, 9 fantasy classes, and Sword of Legend.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Bleeding Code
summary: Bleeding Code is a psychological horror game set in a decaying fantasy world long abandoned by its creator. As an unnamed traveler, you must collect the pieces of the shattered kingdom and uncover the truth behind its downfall while trying to keep your sanity and evading a sinister group who want to complete a mysterious ritual tied to the creator’s disappearance

name: ColdWire
summary: ColdWire is a limit-removing mapset that aims to combine modern visuals with classically inspired gameplay. Boasting a bespoke custom palette and a tailor-made texture set, the maps in ColdWire aim to create a strong and inviting atmosphere while keeping the player on their toes with IWAD-esque but nonetheless thrilling combat. The player is going to traverse through roughly an episode's worth of techbases and urban environments in search for answers to a traffic accident of historical magnitude.

name: Mystic Rest Stop
summary: Welcome to your new summer job. Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a night job at Moon Gas Station. As he settles in, he experiences strange events that unsettle him. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life. Dealing with customers at night is deeply unsettling.

name: Dungeon Vending Machines
summary: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!

name: Moon Tower
summary: Play as a mechanical being, defeat all enemies, and retrieve the crucial item. Moon Tower is a fast-paced game where you must constantly dodge enemies and eliminate them within each room. Gain different abilities to strengthen yourself and enhance your power.

name: Gem's Hentai: Ultimate Puzzle
summary: With very high quality illustrations made by a real artist, this is the ultimate puzzle. You should arrange pieces and enjoy artistry, have fun.

name: Vysions
summary: Welcome to Vysions, a world made of dreams, where puzzles are truth and you must bring meaning to their madness.

name: Outbreak: Tenth Anniversary Celebration Collection
summary: Celebrate ten years of undead horror!

name: Forgotten Spirit
summary: Forgotten spirit is a first-person hardcore action game set in a fantasy world. Become a disturbed ghost and get ready to fight your enemies, parkour and explore.

name: World Pole Stone Dusk: Diadem of the Pole
summary:
The World Pole shattered, and with its destruction emerged a rusted fog that settled fast throughout the world.

Traverse through the desolate Stone Dusk to retrieve the sacred artifact destined for your grasp.

name: One Room: Yui Hanasaka Memorial
summary: A new immersive animated novel game where you can experience the story of Yui Hanasaka, the main heroine of the popular short anime series OneRoom, from the protagonist’s point of view.

name: Gummy Jump 2
summary: You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you
storyline:
You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you

However, time is not on your side. You quickly realize that an enemy lurks in the shadows, relentlessly tracking your every move. With his menacing presence looming closer, you must act swiftly and decisively. Scattered throughout the environment are hidden collectibles that can aid you in your quest for survival. Each item you find could provide crucial advantages in your battles ahead.

name: Salvo Subs
summary: Destroy your friends online in Salvo Subs, a retro inspired top-down shooter. Unlock 32 submarine vessels in 10+ arena game modes.

name: Terra Exodus
summary: Defend the evacuation of Terra on the losing side of an alien invasion. This experimental action strategy game breaks out of genre norms to provide fresh mechanics to strategic gaming.

name: My Sexy Neighbor
summary: My Sexy Neighbor is an immersive real-time visual novel for adults that transports players into the tense and emotionally rich world of neighborhood dynamics and mysterious relationships

name: Starship Coaster
summary: Surf the black holes to high scores! Steer your rocket away from crazy arcade cosmic dangers and try to be the fastest, survive the longest, or get as much points as you can. Space is hard, be prepared!

name: Rake Remastered
summary: Survive the pursuit of a monstrous predator in "Rake Remastered," a tribute to the 2015 original. Uncover mysteries armed with traps and cameras. Outsmart the Rake, survive the nightmare.

name: Rock 'N Racing Off Road & Grand Prix
summary:
This pack includes the games: Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing and Rally Rock 'N Racing.

Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

name: Hole io: Gold Edition
summary: Show who is the biggest black hole in the entire universe!

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Boti: Byteland Overclocked experience + 4 add-on DLCs, soundtrack & artbook

name: Golfslinger
summary:
An explosive mix of golf and shooting! Use a varied arsenal to launch your ball into a frantic multiplayer chaos!

Be the world best in the racing solo races or face off against up to 12 players in stylized Westernpunk environments and prove you're the best of the Golfslingers!

A game made for tryharder and having fun with your friends !

name: Krashimals
summary: Krashimals is a chaotic, physics-driven party game where you play as adorable animals and crash into friends for ultimate mayhem! Smash through stylized arenas, challenge modes, use power-ups, and enjoy the fun. Customize your Krashimals hats, karts and wheels and battle to be the last one standing!

name: Mariostro Strikers: Soccer League
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary:
Dive into the thrilling world of arcade-style soccer with [Your Game Name Here]! Experience the excitement of 4v4 matches, where every player counts. With 10 unique and fun teams to choose from, you’ll dribble, pass, and shoot your way to victory while defending your goal with a skilled goalkeeper.

Designed for fast-paced fun, this game focuses on easy-to-learn controls and engaging gameplay. Whether you’re sprinting down the field, setting up the perfect assist, or unleashing a powerful shot on goal, every moment is packed with action and excitement.

name: Dim
summary: Dim, a wandering soul whose light is constantly fading, must use the various abilities it possesses to traverse the dark and dangerous world surrounding it. Jumping through platforms and other dangers, the player must guide this lost soul through the darkness before its light runs out.

name: Witch Stories
summary: First-person retro horror RPG. Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover. Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your story unfolds over two days, whether you choose to act or not.
storyline:
Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your husband goes to work in town every day, and you deliver the goods of your farm to neighbors. Your story unfolds over one day, whether you choose to act or not.

Most choices, and lack thereof, will result in uniquely branching narratives, letting you tell your own Witch Story.

Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover.

A witch doth dwell in yon tangled wood…

name: Your Android
summary: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.
storyline:
"Am I beautiful? What does it mean to be beautiful?"

A mysterious package arrives at your door, the contents inside shock you beyond belief. The Android woman inside reveals herself to be known as Float, and she desires to know more about what it means to be human. You cautiously accept her request and begin your new life with her.

name: FlipCat
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: FlipCat is a 2D platformer with a unique perspective rotation mechanic. Explore 30 challenging levels as a curious cat, overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, and uncovering hidden paths in a vibrant pixel art world. Fun for all ages!

name: Nezumidash
summary: A minimal action platformer
storyline: A computer has been infected with a cat-shaped virus! It’s demanding "Necoin," a cryptocurrency so obscure that no one has ever heard of it!! For now, you’ll have to collect “Necoin” while waiting for the virus to slip up. What a hassle...

name: Battle Royal: Battlegrounds Call
summary: Where Survival is Earned, Victory is Inherited.

name: Bonk!
summary: Action packed, lighthearted, fun. The party game for up to four players.

name: Die by Anything
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Welcome to Die by Anything! Make the right choices to survive a “normal day” in the ordinary life of a student or die trying in ways you would never imagine. Trust nothing, no one and try to survive as you figure out what's going on.

name: Once Upon a Dungeon: Infinity
summary: Travel through dark dungeons, defeat dangerous creatures, and collect unique loot as you play endlessly in this hardcore, traditional roguelike.

name: Base Blitz
summary: Two teams battle it out in a high-stakes capture-the-flag competition. Set on resource-filled battlegrounds, each team must protect their base while devising strategies to infiltrate the enemy's. Your flag is perched on the roof of your base just out of enemy reach, but so is theirs. The only way in? Tear down their walls by gathering resources, crafting items such as pickaxes, bombs and cannons, and launch a full-scale blitz!

name: Red Blue Cell
summary: This is a retro barrage flying shooting game. Drive a space fighter plane, shuttle between planets and space stations, and use powerful firepower to destroy enemy space battleships!

name: Undead Realm: Ego
summary: Time stands still, space warps, whispers in the dark and indescribable things are approaching you step by step. You will embark on a survival journey with several strangers in a desolate and mysterious place, and immerse yourself in a horrible battle royale full of despair from the first perspective

name: Freedom Maker
summary: Seek freedom and build an infinite deck. In a cyberpunk future, use strategy and skill to overthrow AI's domination. Freedom Maker is a unique RPG blending puzzles and action.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Bit Racing
summary:
Buckle up everyone, we got some hovercraft races to do! The Bit Racing DLC adds a hovercraft garage and a collection of intricate race tracks to test your skills on.

Take on the clock to get the best time and reap the rewards for finishing in bronze, silver or gold. Collect and equip a slew of unique skins for your hovercraft to add some extra flair.

name: Marvel Rivals: Season 1 - Eternal Night Falls
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Darkness engulfs New York as the Timestream Entanglement leaves Doctor Strange trapped in the Entangled Astral Plane, scattering the Darkhold pages. Dracula and Doctor Doom disrupt the moon’s orbit, plunging the city into eternal night and unleashing an army of vampiric creatures. With the world on the brink, the Fantastic Four join forces with iconic Marvel heroes, standing together in the epic battle to break the mystical darkness with science. Ignite the battle against Dracula with the Fantastic Four in Marvel Rivals!

name: Sheep Seeker
summary: Sheep Seeker is a fast-paced, co-op 3D platformer where you and a friend race through dynamic levels to catch every sheep as fast as possible.

name: MyPawnShop
summary:
Have you always dreamed of running your own pawn shop? Now it's possible with MyPawnShop!

You can buy and sell hundreds of items of many different types. Musical instruments, weapons, art objects and much more!

Become rich by negotiating with your customers when buying and selling.

Clean and repair your items to earn even more money, with different tools at your disposal (found at different vendors in the game).

Manage your store as you wish with different storage units available as well as your storage reserve to temporarily store your items to be repaired or cleaned.

name: Ball Race Party
summary: Ball Race Party is a game where you race against time or other players with your physical ball. You can play single player or multiplayer.

name: Jump! The Floor Is...
summary: Do you remember the excitement of hopping from spot to spot, avoiding the ”Lava”? We’re bringing back those childhood memories with a game inspired by the fun we all had growing up. You can test your reflexes, strategy, and competitive spirit. The goal is simple: be the first to reach the trophy.

name: PiMon
summary: PiMon are virtual pets that live right on your PC! Take care of your PiMon while you do your daily tasks. Train them, update them into new forms, raise PiMon together or battle with your friends. Or do none of that and raise your PiMon your way! Welcome Admin, what kind of PiMon will you raise?

name: Coffee Express
summary: Open your own coffee shop and become a barista in the cozy and colorful world of Coffee Express! A unique experience awaits you with stock tracking, realistic coffee making experience and shop customizations. Make your customers happy by making excellent coffee in your own coffee paradise!

name: The Redundant
summary: Step into the metallic boots of an abandoned robot and fight back against an army of virus-infected machines. Sneak or battle your way around the facility, uncover its secrets, and isolate each section from the network - before it's too late...

name: Terror Diversion
summary: A text-based horror game in which you investigate mysterious urban legends. Along the way, the player takes on the role of a character who gets “lost” and encounters a series of random events.

name: Freedom Wars Remastered
platforms: PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch
summary: Born into a one-million-year prison sentence, you must survive deadly missions to earn any hope of freedom. Die in prison or live on the battlefield. The choice is yours.

name: Adventure Paws
summary: Adventure Paws is a pixel-style 2D side-scrolling adventure game where you and your friend will play as two cats, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unknown continent. Join the black and white cats and set off on this journey full of challenges and surprises!

name: Unless
summary: Take a trip back to the nostalgic era of platforming games built without gimmicks or a story. Race through bite-sized levels solo, or with a co-op helper to get the best time among your friends, or maybe even the world!
storyline: Enter the Forest of Worlds, a fantastical realm where each tree is a gateway into realms of pure imagination. Yet the forest is withering, and along with it; the creative spark of every living thing. Join Mari on a platforming adventure as she is guided by her mentor, Owl Sensei, to reseed the Forest and avert the fate of a world devoid of imagination.

name: Status One
summary: Status One is a top-down 3D tactical shooter where you create your own task force from scratch and lead your squad while being personally on the field

name: Hop 'n' Marty
summary: Hop 'n' Marty is a retro 3D platformer for the modern age. Journey through sprawling worlds to find all of the collectables and meet the eccentric inhabitants within. Rescue the captured pygmies who have been trapped in cages and bring them back to safety.

name: Carnival of Souls
summary: Embark on Carnival of Souls, a first-person roguelite shooter where strategic weapon choices and upgrades are key to uncovering chilling secrets across otherworldly dimensions.

name: The Shadow Over Cyberspace
summary: Dread whispers echo across the Information Superhighway. Y2K is coming, heralding the rise of the Old Ones. With your meatspace mind unraveling, time is running out -- barter with gods, embrace the deathless aeons, or go offline permanently in this modempunk horror story.

name: Checkout: Cashier Simulator
summary: Checkout is a cute point-and-click pixel art cashier simulation game. Work shifts throughout the year and seasons, earn as many points as you can within each shift's time limit, and get to know your coworkers.

name: Unpossess
summary: Unpossess is a 1-4 co-op exorcism simulator game set in the early 1900s. Players take on the role of exorcists responsible for addressing cases of human possession.

name: All Fridges are Psychotic
summary: Roll Camera: Julius Brown's Adventure Begins!A retro-style point-and-click adventure, helping Julius Brown get to the Californian film-maker competition.Julius will negotiate puzzles, time travel and weak coding to try and win his ultimate prize.

name: BattleTanks
summary: Welcome to BattleTanks! Join friends to defend animals from moles in co-op game. Explore 5 worlds with 80+ missions. Face bosses, gather tank parts, and craft your machine. Play with up to 4 friends. Ready to save the world?

name: Quarrel Hill
summary: Single button - Push or slash. Anything to get them off the hill. Side effects might include sneezing, freezing, farting, poisoning, healing, or setting on fire.

name: Corrupted Paradise
summary: Paradise Club is known to the wealthy as the island of all fantasies. The leaders cater to every need: young women, submissives, strippers, twins, etc... Our two heroes arrive on the island to solve the mystery surrounding the disappearance of their half-sister.

name: Dumb Castle
summary: The Dumb Castle is just made to bully players! Jump into the castle with your friends and get bullied by the various maps and levels waiting for you with some horror elements!

name: Coins & Wishpalm
summary: You'll enter a peculiar world locked by tides, transitioning between day and night every half a month. As a knights, your fate will determine everything. Conquer beasts, evade dangers, and reap rewards! In this open world, there are no obligations—your choices define your path!

name: The Inn-Sanity
summary: Early 90s. You stayed in a quiet hotel for just one night and the next morning you’ve found out that the old world was destroyed. Alien dreams, secrets of your past and other guests that are turning into monsters. This hotel will not let you to check out.

name: Survivor Challenge TD
summary: Survivor Challenge TD plunges you into an epic struggle for survival against an oncoming horde of monsters. Arm yourself with the most formidable and thrilling weapon combinations and abilities as you brace for an ultimate showdown against a powerful boss!

name: Cards of Clotho
summary: Cards of Clotho is a roguelite autobattler where you summon legendary heroes and conquer mythical realms! Weave your strategy and hold the Fates of Gods in your hands!

name: The Unlife of Gorlak
summary: The Unlife of Gorlak is an RPG Where you play as a dragon who died but got better (or is at least trying to). You have been resurrected as a skeletal dragon by a necromancer. As you returned to the living world you felt the presence of the hero who had slain you has given chase. You have one month to prepare for his arrival so you can tell him how you really feel about him!

name: Sleembo
summary: Help Bo wake up! Control ragdoll physics in freefall, collect fragments, avoid obstacles from her subconscious, and open the awakening portals. Unique biomes, mini-games, beautiful music, and the magical dream atmosphere await you!

name: The Other Me
summary: The Other Me is a first-person psychological horror game delving into the realms of horror that prowl the recesses of one's psyche. Pursue the dread ruminations amidst the maelstrom of the Asylum. This game offers both mind-bending horror elements and realistic environments.
themes: Action, Horror, Thriller, Survival, Drama, Mystery
storyline:
The Other Me is a single-player horror survival game. Play as Amelia, and try to save her twin from a lunatic asylum. Be her light and guide her through the darkness..

Amelia is dragged toward an abandoned mental hospital to trace her deceased sister's footsteps and unravel the mystery. The hospital appears no different from a dark and deserted building where horrifying experiments were conducted in the past. As Amelia walks into the mental hospital, an eerie silence and darkness envelop her.

While wandering through the hospital corridors, she encounters faint screams and ghostly silhouettes. She often comes across figures resembling her sister, but they all vanish like fleeting memories. Amelia enters hidden rooms and laboratories, and searches for clues about its past.

As she follows the traces of terrifying experiments connected to her mysterious past, her own mind becomes increasingly complex. Trapped between the ghost of her twin sister and the secrets of the mental hospital, the boundaries between reality and delusion blur. Amelia finds herself amidst a series of events from the past.

name: Siren's Call: Escape Velocity
summary: A surreal, coming-of-age visual novel set in early 2010s Central Florida, "Siren's Call" is the small town you swore you'd always leave. Something inside of you knows that this is your last chance. Will you reach escape velocity?
storyline: After a summer of deadly fights with supernatural creatures known only as "Sirens," you and your friends finally have time to relax and enjoy yourselves. But in the wreckage of a job well done...it's become obvious just how fleeting their time with you actually is. Even so, it's your job to say goodbye to each of them and go to college. It's your job to be an adult.

name: Neotag League
summary: Team up and beat your opponents in Neotag League, the sport from the future, where sci-fi parkour robots chase each other to score points! Jump, roll, wall run, grapple, dodge and attack in this team-based multiplayer game of Chase Tag.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Going Rogue
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Combining tower defense, action RPG, and roguelite gameplay into a crazy free-for-all, where it’s you and up to three friends versus hordes of enemies. Select your hero, survive the waves of foes, unlock new weapons and runes, and take on the bosses that await you!

name: A Marble's Muse
summary: Will you be able to find love and create art in Liliana, a colorful land full of marbles?
storyline: In the small island country of Liliana, lays Clarke, an artist who just so happens to be a marble. They're having some trouble, you see. They're facing the worst thing that can happen to a creative: artist's block. Following the footsteps of their favorite artists, they're out on the town to find a muse! That's where you come in! It's your job to guide Clarke to their next muse and maybe even help them find love along the way. Will you make Clarke's next piece the best portrait Liliana has ever seen, or will they continue be stuck with their artist's block?

name: Walk
summary: You can walk freely in the world of Walk, enjoy the beauty of the virtual world, and let the wonderful scenery bring comfort to your soul.

name: Calcification
summary: Calcification is a short exploration of waiting, losing faith, and watching all around you turn to dust. After the failure of the villain’s plan, you play as a boss in a dungeon. Abandoned by the interest of heroes you languish awaiting a fate that will never come. Made in RPG Maker MZ.

name: House of Ghosts and Cats
summary: Protect your cat, defeat the monsters, and build a happy home for your cat. Battles, crafting, exploration and conversations lead to the truth of the mansion and the whereabouts of your cat. A dark and heartwarming mansion-robbing horror adventure begins.

name: Windborn: Journey to the South
summary: Guide your bird south, staying with your flock. Soar through speed boosts, embrace the skies, and don’t fall behind. Can you keep up?

name: Boo! Are you scared? The Chests Game
summary: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.

name: The Paddy Field
summary: I was walking along the rice paddy path with my dog ​​Bonta. That was all I wanted to do. My ordinary daily life was suddenly shattered.

name: Stupid Cars
summary:
These drivers are, you guessed it… STUPID!
They need your help. Using Hand Tracking or Controllers, select their vehicles to change speed and guide them as they merge into the flow of traffic. But be careful, these cars can’t stop… if there’s a collision, it’s all over.
Perfect for casual players, but also offering optional challenges for the purists. Adjustable playing position to get you right down into the action and, for a more immersive experience, try Mixed Reality Mode.
Designed to be one of the most challenging "One More Go" games around, it features.

name: 2 in 1: Trash Punk & Moto Rush GT
summary:
Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
Rock the apocalypse in punk style!

name: Eggconsole Ys II MSX2
summary: A grand story unfolds in the ancient kingdom of Ys. The raging development that unravels the many settings inherited from the previous title is a must-see!

name: Hentai Girls: Adorable Angel
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Princesses Lylop: Royal Puzzle Challenge
summary: Assemble 60 stunning princess puzzles, from elegant portraits to fantasy scenes. Test your skills, immerse in magic, and discover them all!

name: Rodgerbints: Romance and Scandal in High Society
summary: Experience a story of glamour, romance and secrets. Make key decisions that will change the fate of the characters. Every choice matters!

name: Cash Guardian: Collector Operation "Capital Defense"
summary: Defend your cash, outsmart the heist!

name: Epyka
summary: Epyka is an adventure, puzzle, narrative VR caper into the mysteries and blunder of a forgotten society. Reveal secrets by deciphering clues, decoding hidden messages, and revealing veiled pathways on your quest to finish what your father started and finding out what happened to the world's first civilization.
