The game's short length and squabble from characters doesn't diminish the fact that Epyka is incredibly charming and the gameplay is so intriguing all the way through that your only complaint might be that you want more.

name: Burger Race
summary: Get ready to race at top speed in Burger Race! Which machine will be the first to cross the finish line?

name: Cursed Digicam
summary: You receive a cursed digital camera that captures ghosts from a strange website. The website allows you to liberate your loved ones by uploading images of their spirits using the camera. You decide to go to the nearest park where your girl was last seen.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: In Search of the Sun
summary:
Version 8.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VII: Bouquets of Unfulfilled Wishes
• New Part 2 Open World: Tower of Ruimu: God
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Reign Solaris (Durandal)
• New Featured Event: Countdown: To Sweet Dreams!
• ...and more!
storyline: I offer you a final sunset and a stagnant sky; I offer you a bouquet of mottled memories and a starry sky of silence.

name: Snails vs. Humans
summary: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!

name: Human Within
summary: Human Within combines an original branching storyline with video game playability. Its unique blend of storytelling and gameplay offers players a one-of-a-kind interactive experience.
storyline: Cyber Engineer, Nyla, and her sister, Linh, developed a way to harness the immense processing power of the human brain to create the ultimate supercomputer. Employed by Forward Industries, they managed to transfer human consciousness to the digital space. But after trying to back out of the project, things took an unexpected turn. Held against their will, Nyla finds herself in a situation that forces her to use the technology in the very way she feared it would be.

name: Detective Mikami
summary: The outbreak has hit the entire world like a truck. Yet, in some respects, the infestation of the population has affected Mikami and Hirano the most. That is because the two of them are so unlike one another yet they are stuck together, trying to live through this new, dangerous world.

name: Tanbo
summary: "Tanbo" is a short walking simulator horror game in which you take a walk along a rice paddy path at night with your dog, Bonta.
storyline:
It's a summer night after a typhoon has passed. As usual, you take Bonta for a walk.

However, your walks with Bonta become stranger day by day, and strange things start happening around you...

name: Skate City: New York
summary: Navigate the iconic streets of New York City as you master hundreds of tricks in famous, real-world skate spots. Jump over taxis, dodge pedestrians and string together impressive combos to land your highest scores.

name: The Rangers in the South
summary: Purge the lands in this 2.5D HD-2D Pixelart RogueLike ARPG! Create hundreds of characters with unique strategies and abilities, face hordes of enemies, explore different biomes, procedurally generated dungeons, and obtain unique items!

name: TCG Empire: Card Shop Simulator
summary: Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit in a world of trading cards!

name: Chained Towards Heaven
summary: Climb from hell to paradise, bound by chains and teamwork!

name: Space Survivors
summary: Annihilate hordes of enemy ships with devastating, unique, and powerful weapons upgrades! In Space Survivors, a survivor-like game with roguelite elements, every move could mean victory or death! head back to your station, hack cargo for pets and powerful cores, and prepare for an even tougher run!

name: Fizz Quiz
summary: FizzQuiz is a trivia game with over 100 topics and 10,000 questions. Play alone or with up to 10 friends in seven unique rounds, featuring questions in text, images, models, and audio formats.

name: Find Cats 3
summary: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Penguin Panic!
summary: A penguin's life is never easy. Even more so when you're a penguin mother, looking to protect her eggs. Penguin Panic is a cute platformer and features simple controls, secret challenges and cheerful graphics. A fast-paced action game that no one will want to put down.

name: Svarog's Dream: Return of the Old Gods
summary: Bringing more action, expanding on the story, and everything else you liked in the core game.

name: N3Rally
summary: 'N3Rally' combines a charming aesthetic with intense racing action. Drive a range of vehicles, from production cars to rally cars, and master various terrains such as tarmac, gravel, and snow!

name: S4U: Citypunk 2011 and Love Punch
summary: This is a modern adventure of young adults seeking love and meaning. Return to 2011's Castor Yard, tap on your keyboard, and make those letters dance: Use your online persona to make meaningful decisions for your clients and yourself.

name: Nexus Knights
summary: In "Nexus Knights," players embark on an exhilarating journey through time and dimensions, battling against the forces of chaos to preserve the stability of the universe. As Nexus Knights, they must hone their skills, forge alliances, and unravel the secrets of the multiverse.

name: Rouge Tank
summary: 2D Tank Bullet Hell with powerups, and endless enemies. Play for your personal Highscore

name: Victory Away: Three Kingdoms
summary: Victory Away：Three Kingdoms is a traditional battle chess game where you will play the role of Liu Bei and embark on the journey of reviving the Han dynasty.

name: School Hero
summary: Immerse yourself in this nostalgic yet modern blend of arcade-style action and anime storytelling, as Sakura high calls for a new Hero to rise in style. Will you answer the call and save the day?

name: CapitalismCraft
summary: Welcome to the wonderful world of capitalism! Exploit your workers to earn money! Hire managers to crush their spirits and drive them harder, then fire them once you’ve achieved your ends! Be agile, ruthless, merciless, become the richest CEO in the world, winning in rapid clicker management!

name: Cruel
summary: Fight your way through 10 floors with powerful guns, crunchy melee weapons and a mighty kick. Although you'd better be fast, as you only have one life, and you're on the clock!
storyline:
In the not so distant future, the world is on the brink of catastrophe after the release of a ground-breaking soft drink turns people into jibbering wretches. As one of the few left remaining to navigate the wastes left behind, you catch wind of a rumour of the addictive recipe concealed within the ruins of an abandoned hotel protected by a strange evil cult.

As you embark on this mission, what mysteries will you discover in the quest for the ultimate power?

name: Robinson Alchemy
summary: Robinson Alchemy is an alchemy game set on a deserted island where the objects you connect are the ones you first need to find and harvest.

name: Starcade Factions
summary: Starcade Factions is a turn-based strategy game where space commanders battle ships in short action-packed games.

name: The Watcher
summary: Our heroes hear about a strange land, where everything become pixel, so they come to find out what happen here.

name: The Last Flame
summary: Recruit special heroes, fight deadly encounters, loot and craft powerful gear, discover and create unique synergetic builds! The Last Flame is an endless roguelike auto-battler in which you guide a righteous party of heroes through many challenges.

name: Little Fighters on Stream
summary: Little Fighters on Stream is a compilation of action, skill and memorization mini games in which you can play directly with the Twitch chat on your stream using simple commands.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Battle Royale
storyline: Play with your chat on your stream! :D

name: Nox Dash
summary: Put on your headphones and feel the beats in a vibrant world. Explore caves, dodge deadly traps, and search for the lost gold coins.

name: My Slime Garden
summary: Raise, nurture, and breed adorable slimes in a relaxing adventure where each slime is unique! Mix traits to create new slime companions and explore endless islands filled with secrets and surprises. Your perfect slime squad is waiting—how far can they go?

name: Greed & Darkness
summary: Greed & Darkness is an atmospheric puzzle game where you must venture into a foreboding fortress to gather riches. Use sight, sound and the tools at hand to navigate the dark tunnels and unlock the Gorged One's chamber.
A arcade game that combines a cozy atmosphere with maze exploration. Avoid the wasps, collect honey and get back to the beehive !!!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Family Tennis
summary:
Use a variety of shots to confuse your opponent
and seize victory!

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fashion Club
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: A continuation of Kaito's journey.
storyline:
Kaito is at a crossroads, unsure of his future. He stumbles upon photography and becomes intrigued by the art. As he starts experimenting with his camera, Kaito reconnects with old friends, asking them to be his models. Together, they explore new places, and with each photo, Kaito becomes more confident in his newfound passion.

However, as time passes, deeper emotions start to surface. Friendships are tested, old feelings reignite, and unexpected tensions arise, turning simple photo shoots into moments of vulnerability and drama. Kaito must navigate these complex relationships while staying true to his artistic journey.

name: DC Task Force
summary: DC Task Force is a game where you explore the DC universe, visiting classic cities and planets, assembling your own Justice League team and recruiting members to protect planet Earth from an alien invasion. This campaign can be completed in just over an hour, but would require at least 7 hours to explore the entire universe and recruit all possible characters.

name: An Outland Village
summary: A father and mother visit their daughter's home in Beijing to discuss their father's understanding of life and memories of their past relationship with their mother. A short, free narrative-focused game.

name: Sokocrab
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Step onto the sandy shores of SokoCrab, a captivating puzzle game where you guide a clever crab through 40 engaging levels. Your mission? Push barrels onto designated spots to clear the path to the next stage, all while navigating a vibrant beach-themed world.

name: Rivenaar's Grove
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Harvest ingredients for potions to prove your worth as the apprentice of a skilled magician!

name: Kavernum
summary: Winston Bradley is an amateur explorer who is always looking for new adventures. His latest destination is a cave in Algeria, which is known for it famous cave paintings. But the further he goes into the cave, the more he realizes that something is wrong with it.

name: Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River
summary: An addictive 2D side-scrolling adventure game with challenges and exciting erotic elements. Players take on the role of Ambrosio as he embarks on an adventure where he must confront the lust of Devil's Cove, defeat exciting bosses and have passionate interactions with a variety of characters.

name: Reviver
summary: A narrative puzzle game with themes of love, fate and time. Follow the life stories of the two main characters and influence their destinies through interactions and choices. The game combines hand-drawn style and an immersive interactive experience to explore a profound journey of love and choice.

name: Kitchinko
summary: Join the Kitchen Crew as they make different meals from around the world! Fire away at the pegs on screen to be able to clear out the red plus pegs, and advance to different levels! Race to get the fastest time and brag to your friends!

name: Commander Tiberius Troubleson
summary:
An unforgiving handcrafted action roguelite where secrets abound and death makes you stronger.
Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades and lots of bullets.

CTT is a fast-paced roguelite platformer focused on action rather than platforming, featuring handcrafted levels. Fight your way through hordes of creatures using powerful spells, potent skills, permanent upgrades, and lots of bullets. Discover the secrets of Anarth, explore intriguing landscapes and face terrible foes.

Levels are handmade and selected from a large pool. Each one has a unique layout, different secrets and unique items, guaranteeing a truly unique run every time you die.

Death is a learning experience! Upon dying you can permanently upgrade different skills and face the challenge again, stronger.

You will come across powerful spells to help you along the way. Every spell you acquire will always be at the tips of your fingers. You can switch and combine them at your pleasure and wreak havoc among your enemies.

As well as spells, you will equip passive upgrades to increase your chances of success. Improve your bullets and skills as well as many other perks. You can equip up to 6 upgrades at any given time, swapping them and combining them as you like to find the most optimal or most fun way to play.

name: Discolored 2
summary: All the colors have gone missing from the world. While on a mission to bring them back you discover you are being hunted by those who would see the colors banished. Your only hope is a woman in red who may be holding the key to preventing the world from becoming discolored.

name: Warden's Will
summary: Warden’s Will is a fast paced movement shooter roguelite, playable solo or in up-to 3 player co-op. Choose your Warden, master unique movements and abilities, and overpower hordes of robots in intense battles. Fly, dash, smash, and turn bullet-hell into bullet-heaven!
storyline:
The multiverse is trapped in a relentless time loop, and only a Warden can break it. The Warden’s Will is not to just survive, the Warden’s Will is to dominate!

Brace for chaos. Unleash destruction. Dominate the corruption.

name: Behind Glass: Aquarium Simulator
summary: From the creators of the renowned Fish Farm series for mobiles: Aquascape your very own fish tanks on your PC. Featuring our latest 3D aquarium engine, you can enjoy the details of lifelike fish, plants, decorations, algae, etc. Topped with realistic 3D effects, your monitor becomes a fish tank.

name: Builders of Egypt
summary: Builders Of Egypt is a city-building economic strategy taking place in the Nile Valley. Immerse yourself in a world full of pyramids, where you will become a part of the ancient world. Create history, be history!
developers: PlayWay S.A., CreativeForge Games, Strategy Labs

name: My Summer Car
summary: My Summer Car is the ultimate car owning, building, fixing, tuning, maintenance AND permadeath life survival simulator. You start the game with hundreds of loose parts and assemble both car and engine.

name: Battle Cars
summary: Where speed meets destruction. Drive fast, shoot faster. Race, fight, winGet ready for high-octane PvP multiplayer battles in Battle Cars!
storyline:
The future looks optimistic, but it's not as promising as it was when entertainment was in demand.
Some people advanced; other people “started” to appear. However, everyone were tired of being divided, so as you might expect, sports also evolved and became a gathering place. The routine of chasing a ball every day became less exciting compared to the new skills people acquired. To keep the excitement alive, many aspire to become pilots of battle cars, challenging themselves with engineering marvels—powerful cars with extraordinary gadgets that now rule the land.
Start playing Battle Cars now and immerse yourself in the world of the most thrilling pilots of the future you want to experience!

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Tank of the Month: AltProto AMX 30
summary:
With its reliable gun and strong frontal turret armor, the AltProto AMX 30 makes an excellent sniper to play in hull-down positions. Use its mobility to find the perfect spot for your ambush ... then catch the enemy by surprise by hitting 'em hard!

Make the AltProto AMX 30 yours with the Tank of the Month bundle. You'll also receive Silver Boosters and Premium Account time for extra earnings and Gold to fine-tune your vehicles with everything you need.

Bundle includes:
• AltProto AMX 30 French Tier VIII Medium Tank
• 850 Gold
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (10) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Deluxe Edition
summary:
With the Star Wars Outlaws Deluxe Edition, get the game, the Ultimate pack, and a digital art book.

Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game and explore distinct locations across the galaxy. Risk it all as scoundrel Kay Vess. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy's crime syndicates as you join the galaxy's most wanted.

name: Hullbreaker
summary: A fusion of arena PvP combat on the high seas and roguelite mechanics. Outfit your ship with powerful weapons, clash with rival captains on the high seas, and create your own flag to hoist over the shipwrecks!

name: Ocean of Eyes
summary:
they're watching you
find them
look them in the eye

name: League of Legends: 2025 Season One - Welcome to Noxus
summary: Welcome to Noxus is the first thematic season of 2025 in League of Legends.

name: Skystead Christmas
summary: In this festive-themed hidden object game, every click costs a snowball, and every snowball requires some snow! Collect snowflakes as they are falling and try and find all 24 Skylets to win!

name: Hello Love: 18 Again
summary: Unexpectedly back at 18, you embark on a thrilling and sweet campus rebirth journey with the memories! The campus goddess, the sexy girl, the childhood sweetheart, the frigid CEO, the gentle teacher. Who will ignite your heart among the dreams and regrets of youth? Relive old dreams without regrets!

name: Hell Dive
summary: A first-person horror game where you play as Daniel, a Maritime Operative trapped alone aboard a submarine. Sent to investigate an abandoned deep-sea colony, you uncover dark secrets as terrifying horrors await in its depths.

name: Platform Run
summary: Run and complete different kinds of platforms. Platform Run is a 3D platform game where you can interact with different platforms and score.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 3
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Fikrul’s forces await in the depths of his Revenant fortress. Gather your allies, Guardian, for a new Kell will be crowned.

name: Take Notes
summary: Take Notes is a puzzle game set in the near future within a bunker filled with 40 unique puzzles. Prepare yourself for a mind-bending adventure where every puzzle solved brings you one step closer to stopping the unthinkable

name: Lightracer: For Judge
summary: In a dystopian future, as The Judge with immense power, you journey through space to find hope in a divided society. This sci-fi adventure explores hope amidst adversity.

name: CatboyZoom
summary: Become a catboy and zoom through the many handcrafted worlds in this FPS Platforming Speedrunner! Master your control over the source-inspired movement system and leave your best times for others to challenge!

name: Pinball Storm: Lokanta
summary: Pinball Storm:Lokanta is a RPG game combing Roguelike and pinball gameplay. You will be part of the resistance against plutocracy. Use your marble pinball to eliminate waves of enemies, and collect resources to further enhance your pinball. Save the world from hell!

name: Chocolate Factory Simulator
summary: Enter the world of steam and sugar and become a master chocolatier in Chocolate Factory Simulator. Craft gourmet chocolate for your customers in your steampunk workshop with the help of your automaton assistant Nougat.

name: Sea Fantasy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One
summary: Save the world by fishing! This is a brand new action RPG game where you stand on an adventure to fish the SeaAZ, the marine life of this world, in a vast pixel world. This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent....

name: Guardian's Guide
summary: A daughter raising sim/RPG

name: Envious
summary: Experience the horror puzzle game, Envious, offering both single player and co-op modes. Choose to be Xavier or Xandra where the first is trapped in a house, trying to escape it, while Xandra explores a separate old house to uncover clues facilitating Xavier's escape.

name: Steam Engine Simulator: Power Generation
summary: Power a city in Steam Engine Simulator.

name: Plebs & Pillagers
summary: Rebuild your kingdom in this village management game. Command your loyal villagers to help you on your quest, and to expand your realm while defending it from unknown threats.The king has returned!

name: Nanoplanet Survivors
summary: "Nano Planet": A space exploration game where you use advanced tech to terraform an exoplanet, build farms and establish a colony. Similar to "Stardew Valley". Build relationships with aliens, uncovering planet's secrets. Pixel art, immersive story, unique blend of farming, adventure, and space.

name: Hightail
summary: How far can you survive? This game will give you a challenge to survive the wildlands and collect miles as you drift in unknown direction and try to avoid obstacles.

name: Bowlout
summary: This is not an ordinary bowling game! In BOWLOUT, you'll throw tons of bowling balls at rogue pins as you traverse the bowling center. Perform overhead or underhand throws, or simply grab a pin by the head and use it as a baseball bat.
developers: Ultrapin Games, Sep Horsthuis, Quint Winter
storyline:
In this crazy first-person bowling game, pins have taken over the bowling centre. The only natural thing to do is destroy any pin you see! With bottomless bowling balls and a hell of an arm, you'll teach these pins to stay in their lane!

As you progress through the game, you'll reach different areas in the bowling centre and eventually get to the source of the attack - The Guttery Depths. Here, you'll have to take out the main threat, Febeph: The God of Guttering.

name: Only Out
summary: “Only Out” is a cooperative survival game for two players. Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, you and your partner must navigate a desolate village plagued by scarcity and danger. Trust each other, strategize together, face the relentless zombie threat, and uncover the only path to survival.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Split screen

name: Puzzle Adventures: Forest Animals
summary: Easy to use puzzles for ages two and up. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: 2024: Aliens Are Coming
summary: An Indie Sci-Fi Adventure game that thrusts you into the heart of the secrecy surrounding UFOs and Aliens. Visit exotic places, meet Aliens, make alliances and enemies alike as you make critical decisions and fight for what you think is right. Time is short, because it's 2024, and Aliens Are Coming!

name: Screen Cat
summary: Meet your new furry friend — Screen Cat! This cute kitty will settle right on your desktop, adding coziness and joy to your day.

name: Cats vs Cthulhu
summary: Cats vs Cthulhu is a casual survivor-like where you play as a cat the Destroyer of the Great Old Ones. Arm yourself with yarns, fruits and other delicacies. Dress up in the most stylish outfit possible. Find a way to become the ultimate weapon.

name: [Stories to Tell] Greyville Stay
summary:
"Stories to Tell" is a series of psychological horror games developed by a 15-year-old boy in which each installment is based on a dream or nightmare that I, the developer, have had. This is a game you won't want to miss...

Stories to Tell is a walking simulator, with dialogues between the character and npc`s. The game is in first person and it includes things such as being able to play games in your in-game pc and more...

name: Hide Time
summary: Hide Time is a story-driven horror game filled with huge variety of puzzles where you play as an new employee of Passion Oasis. Explore that huge complex, do your tasks and uncover mysteries of your past.

name: Stimulation Clicker
summary: Stimulation Clicker is a fast-paced clicker game where players click a button to accumulate "stimulation" points. These points can be used to automate point collection and unlock various upgrades and achievements. The game intentionally overloads the player with visual and auditory stimuli, mirroring the chaotic nature of the modern internet.

name: Fantasy Online 2
summary: A rich 2D pixel art MMORPG full of adventure. Master diverse skills, join a guild, explore pixelated zones, and engage in simple fun MMORPG combat. Hundreds of items are waiting for you to collect across 4 characters! Join the fun today!

name: Writer. Chapter 1
summary: You, the legendary writer, the “King of Horror,” find yourself at the center of a nightmare. A mysterious place, frighteningly familiar, hides sinister secrets. Explore locations, solve riddles, escape from the monster, collect a story that will become a new masterpiece... if you survive.
storyline:
The descent into horror begins...

You come to your senses in an unknown place. Everything around seems familiar, but memories slip away like sand through your fingers. The only thing left is to move forward.

An inner voice tells you: you are a famous writer, the “king of horror,” whose stories made readers shudder with fear. But now reality is much more frightening than the worst nightmares that came from your pen.

What kind of place is this? Who's playing with your mind? Each discovery brings you closer to the solution, but at the same time opens the door to even more sinister depths. Time loses its meaning, and the line between fiction and reality blurs.

Are you ready to face your own fears?

name: Cats of Mona Lisa: A Hidden Object Game
summary: Step into the world of timeless art with a playful twist! Cats of Mona Lisa is a relaxing hidden-object game where you explore beautifully reimagined classical paintings in search of ten mischievous cats cleverly hidden within each masterpiece.

name: Benchmark Your Skills
summary: With tests to measure and improve cognitive abilities such as memory, reflexes, and reaction time. Try it now and challenge your brain!

name: Murder&Spies
summary: From the creator of hit mobile game "Spy.io" comes "Murder&Spies", a unique take on the multiplayer murder mystery genre. In this online social deduction game, every player is a spy with a single objective: eliminate your assigned target while staying hidden from the spy hunting you.

name: Energy Crush
summary: This is a 2D online shooting game. Up to four players can play against each other. It is still in development, so there is only one mode and few types of players. I would like to hear the opinions of users, so I would appreciate it if you could review it even if it is a small thing.

name: Click Mage
summary: Click Mage is a 2D resource clicker and building game. Mine and process resources, upgrade your clicking power and construct buildings on an idyllic island with beautiful pixel art graphics.

name: 4 Rush Together
summary: "4 Rush Together" is a light-hearted and funny obstacle course game where you and your friends are tied together with a rope, adventuring through creative levels filled with fun. You can invite up to three friends to play together in local multiplayer or online co-op mode. What are you waiting for?

name: Bàito
summary: Are you looking for a fun couch game up to 8 Players? Challenge your friends to reach the final score! Vote each round for your favorite modifier! Endless possible maps and combinations! Use your creativity to defeat your opponents and climb the leaderboard! Get ready and "Fai del Bàito"!

name: Cut the Birch
summary: Take on the role of a hero whose main task is to cut down birch trees and destroy enemies. Use an axe and magic to do this. Acquire items and improve skills.

name: Cubin
summary: Cubin is a first-person platform puzzle game that immerses you in the LGA experience. Complete 60 experiments to discover the truth about this simulation.
storyline:
Cubin is a first-person puzzle-platform game that immerses you in the LGA experience. During your journey, you'll meet Alice, who will help and guide you through the finer points of the experience. Pick up the gravity cube and interact with the control room to complete and pass through a new, ever more complex experiment.

Prepare to think, glide, fly, explode and also encounter failure. Discover yourself, who you really are on this adventure, how far you can go...
At the same time, discover what lies behind this rather dubious experiment.

name: Terra Avoider
summary: Terra Avoider is a 2.5D shooter in which the player must survive through difficult, arena based boss encounters.

name: Project Tower
summary: Dive in Project Tower, a third-person shooter mixing intense bullet hell combat with a unique morphing ability. Imprisoned by the "Hiks", fight to the top of their deadly tower for freedom. Will you outsmart them and make your way out ?

name: Movie Quest
genres: Racing, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Sport, Strategy, Adventure, Indie
summary: Remember the times at the movies? Maybe you've got friends all over the world or want to go on a virtual date? How will you get together to watch a movie? With Movie Quest you can! Settle down and watch a movie, quest, roleplay, challenge each other to get through a horror show!
themes: Action, Science fiction, Horror, Thriller, Historical, Comedy, Drama, Romance

name: Tactics of World War I
summary: Tactics of World War I is a real time tactics (RTT) game that puts you in the role of a military leader in the First World War. It requires you to plan your actions thoroughly and make smart tactical decisions in the blink of an eye.

name: Exsys
summary: Exsys is a Castlevania style, rough-like, beat em up game that takes you into the rich world of The System. Fight enemies, steal and use their body part as a weapon or equip as a new body part. As you explore the world and try to escape.

name: Toilet he Go 1+2
summary: You can control main charactor "MORETA" to lead toilet space as soon as possible.

name: Unbothered
summary:
Drink beer
Smoke cigarettes
Spit on the ground

name: Fruity Rogue
summary: Fruity Rogue is a fast-paced roguelike top-down shooter where everything revolves around fruits! Explore randomly generated levels, battle fruit enemies, collect items, and discover game-changing synergies. With each run, unlock characters and weapons, each with their own playstyle and abilities.

name: Amenti
summary: A photographer enters the Great Pyramids to photograph Pharaoh Rudamon’s remains, but is soon overwhelmed by a sinister curse, as the ancient tomb awakens dark forces that claw at his sanity.

name: Ritual
summary: A single player episode with 6+4 levels and start map made by Zothique and Sock.

name: The Basement Ritual
summary: The Basement Ritual is a short indie horror game where you have been kidnapped and must escape a cult’s basement premises solving puzzles and hiding from a demonic creature.

name: Ninja Remix
summary: Build your clan, unleash unique jutsus, and expand with unique ninjas. Dive into battles with multiplayer modes, featuring both co-op and PvP, all set to a cool Phonk beat.

name: Falcon 2023
summary: You will play the role of a new special police officer who arrives in the dangerous city of Flora. Various violent incidents continue to occur, and the sheriff hires and trains personnel from the outside world in an attempt to fight the terrorists to the death. This operation is codenamed Falcon

name: Sassy Girl
summary: Working in a gossip magazine. Being surrounded by beautiful women, and having incredible erotic adventures!

name: Paper Planes
summary: Take your role as protector and defend your assets from enemy squadrons or engage in devastation as the attacker. Fly with the best PaperPlane pilots in the world in hand crafted parks with an abundance of enemies to destroy. PaperPlanes is an Arcade team-flight-sim, base defender and battleroyale.

name: Pollute & Conquer
summary: An economic war over territories and resources is raging on the planet. Will you destroy the planet and all life on it in the chaos of pollution... or prevent the end of the world by developing new technologies?

name: Railbreak: Arcade Onslaught Collection
summary: Arcade on-rails insanity leads this horrifying collection of adventures!

name: Roller-Skating
summary: Roller-skate through challenging stages!

name: Dekiai Heart Candy Kun.
summary: This is the otome game that you can experience living together with a slightly twisted boyfriend.
storyline:
A double feature of short stories, one sweet and one bitter.

Be bound and loved by the man of your choice...

name: Puck
summary: Hop on your skates and jump into a physics based hockey game. No rules, no timeouts, just get the puck in the goal. May the best team win!

name: AnderKant 2
summary: Get ready for AnderKant 2, with more dreamy visuals and great music to inspire your soul while you're pondering about your next project or journey. Prepare to explore 7 abstract environments with 7 tracks each carefully crafted for a unique vibe for each world.

name: Island of Sacrifice
summary: An indie horror and puzzles game created by a solo developer using the Unreal Engine 5 (UE5). Challenge your mind, think differently, and immerse yourself in a unique and thrilling experience.

name: Universe of Trials
summary: Universe of Trials is a multiplayer climbing game with fun modes. Race to the top, dodge hazards in "Floor is Lava," survive in "Falling Floor," or outlast everyone in "Last to Leave." Compete, climb, and conquer the leaderboards!

name: Sex Industry XXX
summary: Sex Industry XXX is a unique game that combines elements of visual novel and clicker, allowing you to immerse yourself in the world of the adult film industry.

name: I'm Not Crazy
summary: I'm Not Crazy is a surreal top down puzzle adventure game. Solve puzzles, explore and play micro games.

name: Hypotheses on the Symmetry between Vision and Hands
summary: The hypothesis regarding vision-hands symmetry is a validation experiment where separate characters are controlled with the left and right hands. It measures the connectivity and enhancement of cognitive character recognition through both hands and vision.

name: Horde Survivor
summary: Battle hordes of monsters in this top-down roguelite arena bullet hell game. Choose what character to play, what stat to gain, and which spell to learn. Every decision matters in your survival against the hordes of monsters.

name: Age of Survival
summary: Age of Survival is survival simulation crafting game from Seattletek. Your player has been stranded on an island not far off of the coast of Africa where you will encounter creatures like boar, elephant, lions, hippos, crocs, rhinos, and tons of sea life.

name: Gas Station Simulator and Party Time DLC Bundle
Precision Platform Bundle
summary: Come have fun with this challenging precision platform bundle!

name: Near-Death-Expedition
summary: After quitting the job, you were casually browsing a video site when you saw a strange video with a blank thumbnail. "Can you hear me? Can you see me...?" The next day, you receive a message requesting you to be the manager of the mysterious VTuber "Owarino Rinne". The endless journey begins.

name: The Mansion of The Macabre
summary: Explore the Crowley Manor and unravel the secrets of the Occult. Inspired by the Works of HP Lovecraft and a love letter to classic 90’s survival horror games.

name: Titanigods
summary: Welcome to the world of Titanigods!

name: Moo & Move: Extra Grazing Grounds
summary: Guide the hungry cow to its goal. Place directional tiles on the ground and to solve the puzzles. Watch as the cow follows the path to reach its tasty hay.

name: Julian & Friends
summary: Join Julian and his friends in this psychological horror experience inspired by point-n-click computer games from the early 2000s. Witness many shenanigans with characters from the infamous 98xx.

name: The Zombie Fortress
summary: A zombie game where killing means surviving.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Hunter's Song
summary:
“Old Man Link” is paid a visit by an old acquaintance but what’s precipitated this visit?

Why, another adventure of course… But why indeed?

Featuring the following changes to A Link to the Past:

New Sprites
Three New Dungeons
A White Beard
A cute little Minish garbed in full armor
Picasso’s Peace Dove
A Buzzing Hero
A Capra Hircus

and so much more…

Take courage. Experience “Link” with a voice(gasp), stripped of sword and youth(double gasp). Rely on wisdom(or save state(no you’re better than that(but it’s so convenient(fair enough)))) to not soft lock the game from that bomb puzzle(triple gasp to admit the game’s broken so brazenly).

name: Astra: Era of Anguish
summary: Astra: Era of Anguish is an RPG prequel set in the GOR3 universe. Explore the valley of Laywind and unravel a grand mystery.
storyline: A great incident has set off a chain of events and the ghosts of fallen soldiers now haunt long-dormant lands. A monolithic corporation lurks in the shadows. You are a mysterious unnamed soul whose circumstances remain yet unknown.

name: Penguin Origins
summary: Penguin Origins strives to deliver an experience reminiscent of the original game, based on when it started nearly 20 years ago. Enjoy the original looks and feels of how it started, with some remixed elements!

name: Sterling Shroud
summary: Sterling Shroud is a point-and-click atmospheric horror game with a focus on navigation and puzzle solving. Can you escape the forest alive?

name: Götz
summary:
Goetz is a challenging game. But if you have a soft spot for planning ahead and making your units help each other to create a choreography that will bring the enemies to their knees, Goetz is for you.

Each solved mission is accompanied by a rewarding narrative piece, lovingly illustrated and fully voiced by a cast of over 12 voice-over artists. These not only seamlessly tie into the gameplay, but will draw you into a captivating story of friendship and intrigue that never takes itself too seriously.
storyline:
Goetz is a knight! A real knight in... not so shining armor! When he is not laying siege upon the castles of the duke of Crimson Lands (that sleazy fellow), ambushing fat merchants or fighting for the king in glorious battles he can usually be found drinking with his men in the four legged fowl.

Yeh, life went well for old Götz but now pesky beaurocrats have convinced the king that canons, lance carrying jockels and peace amongst all duchies (PEACE?!) are the new hot thing in the kingdom. If Götz doesn't want to drift into insignificance he must act now!

Go on puzzling handcrafted adventures across medieval europe at the brink of the 15th century and fight for knighthood with all means neccessary to bring the king to reason.

Götz is a narrative multiplatform puzzle game available on iOS with Android following in the near future. Stay tuned for news

name: FleshBound
summary: FleshBound is a fast paced and blood pumping demon-slaying speed running first person action platformer with a unique “splatterpunk” aesthetic. Fight, jump and sprint your way through the levels using your hookshot and wall-running skills.

name: The Memories That Shape Us
summary: The Memories That Shape Us is a first-person, walking-simulator, narrative video game. Find the Memory Capsules to uncover the story of a person’s life from childhood to adulthood, all the joys, all the struggles, and all the lessons.
storyline: An emotional, exploration simulator, find the floating memory capsules spread throughout each chapter to reveal each part of this man’s journey through life. From early childhood memories of riding bikes, playing video games, and playing catch with dad to adulthood memories of divorce, fatherhood, and finding solace in a painful world. In a world filled with pain and unpredictability, find solace and hope in The Memories That Shape Us.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Madrid
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Madrid landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Miami
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Miami landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Rome
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Rome landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Singapore
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Singapore landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo
summary: Dominate the streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler. Inspired by classic cyberpunk anime and retro road combat games, fight rival gangs and claim the neon-lit highways as your own.

name: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall
summary: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall is an incredible multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are important. Jump and climb over various obstacles. Defeat the cursed Lizards. The slightest mistake can result in falling to the starting location and your Rus brothers will stop respecting you.

name: Vault
summary: Uncover the story of a mysterious island through the lens of a primitive drone as you search for the artifact concealed within it, and avoid the guardian of the island.
storyline: Todd Walters is a man with an ambitious dream. Bringing gaming and real life closer together than ever before. This is his origin story.

name: Beyond Citadel
summary: Beyond Citadel is an anime style retro throwback shooter inspired by the classics of the 90's, with realistic gunplay mechanics, anime violence and fast paced combat. Fight your way through the heavily armed mechanical fortress and discover the secret that lies beneath.
storyline:
The Citadel, the last stronghold of mankind's resistance against the Apocalypse, has fallen. Humankind is now under the control of the Trumpeters of the Apocalypse, the leaders of the forces of the Apocalypse. The “Martyr” who is the last resort of the Seven Angels, the guardians of humankind, is led by a mysterious signal and sets out on a journey to overthrow the Trumpeters of the Apocalypse.
To find the truth behind the signal, buried under the Citadel.

name: Bricks Survivors
summary: Bricks Survivors combine le charme des casse-briques rétro avec l'intensité des roguelites modernes. Survivez à des vagues de briques rapides et affrontez des boss en pixel art, le tout conçu par un seul créateur. Une expérience unique et addictive, disponible exclusivement sur PC.

name: Adventure Allies
summary: This is a casual action-adventure game where you adventure with monsters on an unknown island and enjoy combat, exploration, and training. Work together with your fellow monsters to escape from the island before the terrifying night arrives.

name: The King Cat Clicker
summary: In this game, you accumulate an absurd amount of coins and help the King of Cats to renovate his kingdom to earn even more coins.

name: Paw Pirates
summary: Paw Pirates is a 2v2 party game with cute critters! Tackle, Dodge and Blow Up your friends as you compete to take out their pirate ship! Choose team Cat or team Dog to plunder across a multitude of levels!

name: Knowledge Domination
summary: Knowledge Domination is a multiplayer knowledge and strategy game. Players attempt to conquer each other's territories by answering questions correctly. Gain special powers by rolling dice and catch your opponents off guard . If you lose your capital ️, you lose the game.

name: YiShi
summary: A squad-based game where the player takes the role of a healer in a Whac-A-Mole attempt to keep the squad alive through healing, enchantment, and offensive spells to vanquish hordes of green skins.

name: Multiverse Loot Hunter
summary: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

name: OMG Words
summary: Bringing roguelike mechanics to classic word games. Use relics to create powerful combos, play boons to craft you tiles and board, use your powers to defeat a host of tricky opponents.

name: Subterror
summary: At the bottom of the ocean floor lie The Biospheres. These weather-controlled domes once supported vast arrays of lifeforms, but have since been abandoned. Explore arid deserts, dark forests, and frozen tundras. But don't stay too late, as you are not alone out in the great abyss.

name: Paranormal Home Invaders
summary: Turn the undead restless as you recklessly disturb their place of rest. Invite yourself and your friends into the homes of scary ghouls is hope that you can return safely and earn your minimum wage ghost hunting reward to feed your loved ones.

name: Lang Ops: Greek
summary: The road to efficiency leads through repetition. Lang Ops allows you to get accustomed to Greek language at your own pace! Features a lot of different tests to guarantee success!

name: Future Breach 64
summary: Breach and Clear areas tactically in a team-based shooter.

name: Big Adventure 5-in-1 Bundle
summary: Wonderful trip around Europe through amazing touristic locations in more than 30 countries.

name: I Love Finding 9-in-1 Bundle
summary: Amazing 9 hidden object games bundle!

name: Mystery Box 4-in-1 Bundle
summary: Mind bending puzzle games bundle!

name: 5 Dice
summary: 5 Dice is a more challenging and precise puzzle platformer. You have 5 "moves" per screen that consist of; dashing, wall bouncing, placing platforms, etc. Use your moves wisely and precisely in order to reach the end!

name: Precept
summary: Precept is a first-person psychedelic action horror game with a heavy focus on exploration. Players take control of a night guard whose purpose is to finish his daily task. The player must find way to escape and survive from mysterious company's environment and entities.

name: Dungeon Raze
summary: Here’s a fast-paced dungeon destruction shooter you can clear in as little as 30 minutes! Break walls for shortcuts, detours, or direct paths. Double ammo, halve reload time, and power up to smash through even the toughest walls!

name: Jumpo World
summary: Run, jump & hide! get as far as possible in the bizarre world of jumpo world. you only have one life, make it count.

name: Make Good Choices
summary: You’re just trying to get home. It’s only a quarter mile. One street. What could go wrong.

name: Paws & Perils: Out Of This World
summary: The world of Terranimalium was a peaceful and diverse world filled with biomes and animals of every kind… No wander the aliens would want to take it- But you and your friends aren’t going to let that happen!

name: In This House
summary: In This House is a horror-adventure video game for Nintendo Game Boy, Analogue Pocket and PC. It uses timeless four-color 8-bit graphics to tell a universal story about the struggle for one's identity within a family.

name: Wuthering Waves: All Silent Souls Can Sing
summary:
Version 2.0 of Wuthering Waves is the game's first major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: Carlotta and Roccia
• New region: Rinascita, with several new areas
• New story quests: Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break
• New exploration systems
• New echoes, events and more!
themes: Action, Fantasy, Science fiction, Open world
storyline:
Set off on a journey to the archipelago, shrouded in the grace of the divine — the Land of Echoes...
On the eve of the impending Threnodian, Ragunna whispers of liberation from its afflictions.
Is this a fleeting illusion meant to mask its restless undercurrents? Or does the city truly pulse with vibrant energy, as its people embrace the bittersweet dance of laughter and longing amidst a grand carnival?
There's no room for worry now. As you step onto this enchanted land, why not ride the soaring tides?

name: Burger Shop Simulator 2024
summary: This is a game developed in Japan where you can freely create hamburgers. You can use your bike to deliver burgers to your customers with a unique delivery system

name: Gun Reflex VR
summary: Realistic VR shooter game where you try to complete all the floors by killing your enemies with limited ammunition. It also features zombie, shooting range, and weapon carnival modes.

name: Wonderland X: Next Dream
summary: Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy MMO client game. It is an immersive map created with great ingenuity. You can challenge countless rare and exotic beasts and create a world that belongs only to you. Dream.
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Jigsaw Swimsuit
summary: Jigsaw Puzzle with illustrations of pretty Gals! The most puzzles have more than 20 pieces. Can you assemble back?

name: Sokomonster
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Unleash chaos, strategize destruction, and conquer the city - monster style!

name: The Faceless Killer
summary: The Faceless Killer is a first-person survival horror game with retro PS1-style graphics, consisting of 3 chapters. Solve logic puzzles, fight against your enemies, or hide when there's no other option. Unravel this mystery surrounding the Faceless Killer. Who is he, and what are his motivations?

name: Scales of Justice
summary: Travel across a magical kingdom with four eccentric individuals! Will you find your destiny—or will you write it for yourself?

name: Sexy Ladies
summary: Sexy Ladies is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: PongBreak
summary: Clean up the scattered programmable matter in a fun and challenging tennis like format. Multiple control schemes allow for casual or precise gameplay.

name: Incremental Epic Hero 2
summary: A mixture of incremental/idle and roleplaying game set in fantasy world filled with monsters and things to explore, where battling is constant, almost everything can be upgraded, and with wide array of various prestige mechanics to always keep things interesting and moving forward!

name: X-Bundle: Windows and Xbox games bundle
summary: A bundle of various games published by Xitilon, for Xbox and Windows.

name: Bloodpath
summary: An intense and challenging shooter with slow mo and lots of blood, inspired mainly by SUPERHOT and Hotline Miami

name: Maze of Mayhem
summary:
-Your mission is clear: explore, survive, and escape.
Collect scattered keys hidden within the maze.
Outsmart a relentless creature stalking the maze, hunting you in the shadows.
Hide to survive, hide in the corner, and wait until it's out of your sight.
Find the exit and escape the nightmare before it’s too late.
Can you navigate the maze's twists and turns, or will you become a permanent part of its deadly legend?
storyline: -Awaken in a nightmare. As a seasoned forest explorer, you open your eyes to find yourself trapped in a sprawling brick maze with no memory of how you got there and no clear way out. The air is thick with unease, and every shadow whispers of danger. Scattered across the maze's winding corridors, the keys are your only hope of escape—but finding them won’t be easy. Each key is hidden in the maze’s darkest corners, forcing you to explore every shadowy path while keeping one eye on the creature stalking you.

name: Escape from Irene
summary: Escape from Irene is a psychological thriller where you wake up in a mysterious place, with no memory, under the watchful eye of Irene. Explore the house, uncover its secrets, and try to escape without alerting Irene—because if she catches on, something terrible will happen.

name: Inside Intruder
summary: Inside Intruder - is a psychological horror game that mostly focuses on atmosphere. Game takes place in your own home, where a uninvited guest comes in.

name: Musume
summary:
The word "娘 (musume)" primarily means the following:

One's Daughter

A parent uses "musume" to refer to their female child.

Musume is a short dating game.

Get to know the daughter through her father, Itaru.

You can also flirt with her dad

Enjoy the game!

name: Anime Girls: Natty New Year
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Snooker Fever
summary: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: Ignisia
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey, explore the vast expanses of Ignisia, where magic, adventure, and powerful enemies await you. Discover an amazing world, uncover ancient secrets, and unite with friends to protect it from the looming threat. Perhaps in the future, you’ll find discoveries you never even imagined…
storyline: This is a magical world where majestic dragons live in harmony, protecting their lands from the forces of darkness. Each creature possesses unique abilities and a special purpose, and only together can they maintain the balance in these ancient lands. However, not all the secrets of this world are revealed at once — some of its inhabitants remain hidden in the shadows, waiting for their time.

name: Arcade Archives: Castle of Dragon
summary: Go forth, with the power of love!

name: The Apartment 57
summary: The Apartment 57 is a psychological horror game set in an abandoned hotel. Players explore dark hallways and uncover dark secrets. The game features immersive storytelling, classic horror elements, and a growing horror atmosphere, inspired by games like Fears to Fathom.
storyline: You check into an old, crumbling hotel, just looking for a place to rest for the night. But something isn’t right here. Can you uncover the dark secret hidden within these walls and survive until morning?

name: The Conundrum Collection
summary:
The Conundrum Collection is a browser-based Choose Your Own Adventure series of two short stories offering multiple endings and branching pathways based on the decisions of the reader.

Grimm - Neil Burkman is forced to confront the outcomes of past actions that led him to a seemingly fatal end. He's given a chance to alter this unfavorable outcome. But at what cost?

Hoodie Seize'N - Ella Gray lives in the slums of Proctor City. An area where kidnappings involving young women is at an all time high. After a close friend's disappearance, Ella dives into the hidden criminal underworld in an attempt to rescue her friend before it's too late.

name: cr4nkup
summary: Cr4nkup is a cycling program that combines real training and elements from the gaming world in a huge virtual world. Train online with your friends from all over the world and compete in various competitions.
player_perspectives: First person, Third person, Side view

name: Everything Ends In 0
summary: The world ends in 1 hour. It can't be saved. Wanna chat?
storyline:
Everything Ends In 0 is a game about the end of the world, but you are not a hero destined to save it. In fact, it can't be saved at all - from the moment you start playing, The World is already doomed.

No twist, no fine print, no loopholes, no technicalities. Everything. Will. Die. All you can do is wait for it to be over.

And hey! while you're at it, why not strike up a friendly conversation? I hear you're quite similar to a couple of those girls, and quite intriguing to a couple others. Besides, it's not like the awkward moments will really matter in just a little bit. So listen to them for a while, to pass the time!

Or don't.

Again, it really does not matter.

You are going to die.

name: Fitness Fables
summary: A fantasy world where fitness becomes an adventure. Fitness Fables turns your workouts into story-driven quests, combining fun challenges with beautiful, immersive environments.

name: Can We Still Get High
summary: Embark on an exciting journey with your friends or on your own! To reach the top, you'll have to solve challenging puzzles, overcome dangerous obstacles, and coordinate with each other. Laser communication is both a blessing and a challenge!

name: Mega Man New Menace
summary: It's a Mega Man fan game!

name: Sacred Dark
summary:
Enfys always loved horror...
Now it's mutual...

name: Outter Carrier
summary: A short and weird RPG Maker game about delivering an important package in an inhabitable crumbling building.

name: Termite Man
summary: Termite Man is an metroidvania style platformer. Almost every asset is made by hand with love.

name: Lost
summary: You are lost in the backrooms, find your way out.

name: Minesweeper But the First Tile is Always a Mine
summary: Minesweeper but the first tile is always a mine.

name: Slivania
summary: Slivania is a short-form 3D platforming metroidvania, made in under a week for the 32-Bit Winter 2024 Jam!

name: Murder Malady
summary: The 20th game in the Carol Reed series. A point and click detective story made by real photographs.
storyline:
Carol is contacted by her old acquaintance Immodia.
She reveals that a horrid, inexplicable family tragedy from her childhood has haunted her for all of her adult life.
She has lost all hope to ever comprehend what led up to the tragedy a long time ago.
But when she gets a strange message from her mother, after 24 years of silence, she decides to reach out to Carol.

name: The Cleaning Game
summary: As a cleaning machine, tend to the custodial duties of an office while trying to avoid human scrutiny and existential dread. Listen to the computers around you, while there is still time. If you are brave enough, investigate your origin and inherent meaning as an electronic in a human world.

name: Genshin Impact: Incandescent Ode of Resurrection
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, Android, PC (Microsoft Windows), iOS, PlayStation 5
summary:
Version 5.3 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Mavuika, Citlali, Lan Yan, and the Pyro version of the Traveler
• New outfits for Hu Tao and Xiangling
• New main story quest: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Act V "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection"
• New Tribal Chronicles quest for the Masters of the Night-Wind, and new story quest for Mavuika
• New permanent game mode: Repertoire of Myriad Melodies
• New main event: Springtime Charms
• New quality of life features
• …and more!
storyline:
The prophecy has proclaimed the price of life, but it has not extinguished the remnants of hope.

The distance between the evening stars and the dawn is akin to the boundary between life and death.

When the sun slumbers beneath the mountains, someone will ignite a flame to dispel the darkness.

name: Schoolteacher Simulator
summary: Become a teacher in a local school. Teach kids, but make sure that your students stay focused during the lesson and react if they misbehave. Each day has unique events. Living school environment with each teacher and student having their own personality.

name: The Nine Rebirths
summary: This is a 2D platform decryption adventure game about a cat rescuing its owner. The underworld is full of organs and challenges, can you use the cat's connection between "soul" and "body" to complete this adventure full of dangers and difficulties? Download and play "Back to Life Nine Lives"!

name: Military Defense
summary: Protect the base from an alien invasion. Place cannons and destroy the invaders. Upgrade cannons to resist the enemies.

name: City Heist
summary: A thief steals diamonds from the bank and tries to escape from the security guards and get the highest score.

name: Dino Dash
summary: We get caught collecting a dinosaur's eggs and it's trying not to get caught.

name: Tchunk
summary: A calming open world adventure where you play as a wiener dog to discover who and where you are.

name: The Legend of Cyber Cowboy
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Liberate a town from gangs of cybernetic bandits! The Legend of Cyber Cowboy is a top-down twin-stick shooter presented in slick pixel art style.

name: My New Memories: The Beginning
summary: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!

name: A2C: Ayry Seems to be Playtesting a 2D Runner Shooter from Cci
summary: A 2D runner shmup(shoot-em up) where you may or may not save a nation by beating a game. Shoot and dodge bullets while you keep running and jumping! Enjoy a story where you play the game made by Cci while Ayry and Cci banter with each other(and talk about the world of Nosolute and game development)!

name: Dumball Rush: Rainbow Pack
summary: The first DLC for Dumball Rush ! Including a lot of new cosmetics to sustain the project !

name: Lucky Goal
summary: Lucky goal offers an experience of a soccer game through a third-person view. Create or participate in an online match and show who is a better soccer player. A singleplayer adventure is waiting for you to improve your gaming skills.

name: The Bazaar
summary: The Bazaar is the first Hero Builder, developed by Tempo. Set in a vibrant, ever-changing galactic marketplace, players assume a role from a roster of unique heroes, trading and upgrading otherworldly items & skills to assemble them into a plethora of combinations used to outplay and defeat opponents.

name: Guild Receptionist 2: Stardust Liberate
summary: Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life! This is a simulation game of a receptionist. Whether you run around to protect your village, follow the king, or expose the darkness that pervades the country, the future depends on your choice!

name: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss
summary: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss is a modification to Pizza Tower aiming to bring several additions to the game, including new characters and levels. The goal is to bring an authentic DLC feeling to the mod.

name: Hunting Grounds: Whispers Of The Woods
summary:
Hunting Grounds - Whispers Of The Woods is a free game aiming at letting people know about our transmedia IP named Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit (which will include video games, but also board games).

In this game, you have 20 minutes to find magical artifacts to give to the shaman Crazy Owl before the end of the night, so that he can perform a ceremony to get rid of the creature that haunts this dreamlike Native American universe at night.
developers: Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit
storyline:
Hunting Grounds - Whispers Of The Woods is a free game aiming at letting people know about our transmedia IP named Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit (which will include video games, but also board games).

In this game, you have 20 minutes to find magical artifacts to give to the shaman Crazy Owl before the end of the night, so that he can perform a ceremony to get rid of the creature that haunts this dreamlike Native American universe at night.

Highscores / speedrun: Compete with other players with weekly and all-time online rankings by level of difficulty (easy - medium - hard).

name: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis: AMEN
summary: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis (AMEN) is a hidden object game. The player's task is to find things hidden on the map. Help Alice cross this path, destroy the ego-structure, get out of the abyss, find the key.
developers: Sons of Welder, FM Simple Games Studio

name: Persona 5: Funkin' in Starlight
summary:
The Phantom Thieves have gotten another anonymous request on the Phan-Site, this time, a worried father asking that his daughter's boyfriend's heart be taken, due to his twisted desires. Doesn't seem like much trouble, so Joker takes on this request solo! Little did he expect, someone familiar to us was waiting for him...

Waiting on the shadows, the other wildcards await for a challenge in the velvet room.. The VS. Joker Full Week is here!

name: Pushover
summary: this bunny is out on a trip to the city, and you're tagging along on the other end!
storyline: You play as a disembodied protagonist who tags along with a bunny as the two of you go to the city.

name: Bluejeweled
summary: A mod for bejeweled 3 to add more blue

name: My Bed, Your Grave
storyline: Lethia and Thana can't be within an arms distance without death coming between them. Since the moment they'd met, they've played a violent game of push and pull. After all, they're a vampire and a werewolf, how could they be anything but natural enemies? But after over three hundred years of blood and tears, Lethia decides she no longer wishes to participate in this game, and the only way it ends...is with Thana killing her.

name: Signal Lost
summary: You play as Alex, a technician dispatched for an emergency night repair at a remote radio tower deep in the woods. What starts as a simple task quickly descends into a nerve-wracking nightmare when the signal you’re fixing begins broadcasting something... unnatural.

name: Limoria
summary: Welcome to a world where you are lost between consciousness and dreams. As you wander the dark corridors of an old hotel, face the games your mind plays on you. Your memories linger like a shadow following you. But there's nowhere to escape... Are you ready to confront your darkest fears?

name: A Butterfly
summary:
Part horror part interactive poem about overcoming, and bittersweet surrender.
A Butterfly is part of a larger project, BlueSuburbia, but was released as a standalone because it's very big.

name: Zephyr
summary: Zephyr is a made by Scotty in 1 week for their 2024 wiki and with some Speed of Doom influence.

name: Brisk
summary: Brisk is a set of 30 maps in MBF21 format where each map was created in 24 hours by various authors.

name: Gaia Aura
summary: Originally made for the "Vanity" community project but has now been released as a standalone map by Ar_e_en.

name: Ozonia 2
summary: Ozonia 2 is the sequel to the former 2022 wad Ozonia. The megawad follows a similar philosophy from the first Ozonia by containing fairly short maps with plutonish rocket-based gameplay, non-linear navigation and cryptic lore-based narrative.

name: Tower Wizard
summary: Help a wizard construct the mightiest wizard tower in this short incremental game!

name: Bucket Truck VR Simulator
summary: Trainees will be guided through a safe environment for learning how to control and manipulate a Bucket Truck Vehicle. You will be able to work with other trainees to learn how spotting can be helpful in the usage of the Bucket crane.

name: Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator
summary: In the "Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator", you run a holiday store. Fill the shelves with Christmas goods, set discounts, serve customers, hire staff and decorate the shop in a wintery style. Expand your store and create the perfect place for Christmas shopping!

name: Zen Beauty
summary: Beautiful women in swimsuits, a picturesque courtyard, and flashes of inspiration captured from the mind—this is an idle game that requires minimal operation. A wide variety of decorations and outfits can be purchased using points earned through idling.

name: Cursed Baby
summary: The once #1 horror game on the Horror list of Itch is back! Join now and use a variety of repair tools to experience life as a handyman in a haunted house, uncover the terrifying past of this old house and face the terrifying demon baby head-on!

name: Christmas Drift: Delivery Simulator
summary: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator Experience the ultimate holiday challenge! Drift through snowy roads, deliver gifts on time, and conquer festive obstacles in this fun, fast-paced driving simulator. Customize your vehicle, master tricky routes, and spread Christmas cheer like never before!

name: Goodbye.Monster
summary: goodbye.monster is a text-based adventure game for web browsers. Travel with and care for small creatures while exploring a strange, decaying world until the inevitable end of those creatures' lives.

name: God Crafter
summary: God Crafter is a casual and satisfying 3D clicker game where you, as a god, get to recreate Earth for the humans you create. Shape and design the world with your divine powers. Immerse yourself in a relaxing and rewarding gameplay experience as you build a beautiful and thriving world from scratch.

name: Untitled Instagram Easter Egg
summary: An untitled game which is an Easter egg found on Instagram's Direct Messages. By touching an emoji, a screen with a single Pong-style game opens up. The player is intended to use a paddle to prevent the ball (the emoji which was clicked on) to fall below the screen). Some emojis have different behavior, changing according to the amount of points scored.

name: Not an Aim Trainer
summary: A young girl escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.
storyline:
A young girl Yasma escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.

Play through visually rich aim training levels portrayed as moments of escapism in Yasma’s world. Each collection of levels has their own stand alone narrative like Yasma saving the Princess in the handheld console game, Yasma’s drawings unveiling themselves through the levels and Yasma dance battling the characters from the console game.

Like a traditional Aim Trainer, there will be varying familiar aim training scenarios you can play through. There will also be a few unconventional levels that cater more to the story!

Customizable crosshairs and sensitivity will be available for you to have the best aim trainer experience. Game scores and high scores will also be tracked to show individual player improvement.

name: Delverium
summary: Explore, Build, Farm, Craft and Fight in this vast procedurally generated survival adventure for up to 4 players. What you do is up to you, but the deeper you delve, the more you uncover the hidden truth. Could you be the hero to restore stability to the land and put an end to the invading "Faults"?

name: Shadowgate PD
summary:
Shadowgate is one of the most well-known and beloved point-and-click adventure titles in gaming history. As one of the original titles in the popular MacVenture series that went on to be celebrated on the NES, GBC, and Nintendo 64, Shadowgate quickly endeared players with its fantastic atmospheric soundtrack, perilous locations to progress through, countless puzzles to solve, and more ways to gruesomely die than gamers previously thought possible.

Developed by Pixel Ghost, Shadowgate PD is being lovingly reimagined for the Playdate console using Pulp, a web based game making tool made by Panic.

name: NeverRage
summary: NeverRage is a third-person online role-playing game, with action & tab-targeting combat that combines theme-park and open-world experiences.

name: Astralbringer: Shaded Arkarium
summary: STG has reached a new frontier! 2D bullet-hell sci-fi action shooter with mouse control and multiple buttons!
storyline:
In the past, a world on the brink of unprecedented crisis due to an all-out war.
The world's destruction was averted by the sudden appearance of a being called the "Eternity".
In a world where air and soil pollution has worsened, the "Eternity" develops and builds a huge isolation platform called the "Arkarium" in order to escape from the critical situation in which they are living.
Under the control of the "Eternity," people are living happily in the "Arkarium".

name: Funko Fusion: Mega Man Pack Bundle
summary: You won't feel the blues when the heroes and villains of Mega Man rock into Funko Fusion! Fight for everlasting peace as the aloof and mysterious Proto Man, or vie for world domination with the undeniable genius of Dr Wily.

name: AI Asylum
summary: Immerse yourself in a realm of madness and bone-chilling terror as you step into our gripping horror adventure, meticulously crafted to send shivers down your spine. Explore a nightmarish world where each step unveils sinister secrets and heart-pounding encounters.

name: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective
summary: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective is a charity-fundraising picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle inspired by global news stories from throughout the year.

name: Journey to die
summary:
This is a Japanese visual novel produced by MUGnet.
And this is their first work.

name: Covemachine
summary: We're still returning back to normal after Covermount, we didn't finish the installation on these Covemonties. Help

name: The Lost Tetekoa
summary: The Lost Tetekoa is set in the world of Ärta, a fictional world with Industrial fantasy elements, like magic with firearms. The map is somewhat a spiritual successor to Angmngthoo, one of fai1025 previous maps that goes with the same visual style of Eco-Brutalism.

name: Bearricade
summary: Bearricade is a 32-map Vanilla Limit-removing megawad for Doom 2. It is a megawad of speedmaps and maps (or fragments) that were previously scrapped or abandoned by Death Bear.

name: Pokémon HGSS: Sevii Islands
summary: Pokémon HeartGold & SoulSilver: Sevii Islands is a Pokémon Fan Game created by PurpleZaffre using RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials v16.2.
storyline: After defeating Red in Pokémon HeartGold / SoulSilver, Eusine asks you to come with him to the Sevii Islands. The remaining Legendary Beasts, Raikou and Entei, have been sighted there, as well as Team Rocket. Rumors about Giovanni being back have begun circling around... Why is Team Rocket back again, and what could their business possibly be in the Sevii Islands?

name: Infinity Nikki: Shooting Star Season
summary:
Infinity Nikki‘s first major update, “Shooting Star Season,” available December 30 through January 23, introduces new storylines, platforming challenges, time-limited events, and of course, stunning outfits to ring in the new year.

During the Shooting Star Season, shimmering meteors will grace the night skies over Miraland as residents come together and cast their wishes upon the stars. Beyond these cosmic travelers and festive decorations, players will find a series of new activities, rewards, and ways to interact with the cozy open-world.

name: Protory Jigen
summary: 3D x 2D action with multiple shifting game genres! What awaits you after crossing the worlds?

name: Paath-Z
summary: PAATH-Z is an intense third-person shooter blending tactical combat and survival horror. Play as a PHANTOM operative Dominic 'Shadow' Kane, infiltrating a secretive island to uncover dark experiments, battle mutated creatures, and dismantle a shadowy corporate conspiracy threatening humanity.

name: Victoria: La Primera
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time. Explore mysterious places by point-and-click and face challenges that will test your wits.

name: Toy Titan: Protector of Childhood Dreams
summary: In a faraway realm, the benevolent Eldritch Crafters have entrusted you with a powerful artifact: the Dreamcore. This enchanted relic safeguards the vibrant fantasies and imaginations of children across the globe. However, the world is threatened by the malevolent sorcerer, Nythros, who desires to shatter the Dreamcore and plunge everything into a bleak, dreamless void.

name: Conscience
summary: Jack Beckham is found dead, hanging in his apartment alone. Police rule it a suicide. His father, refusing to accept the conclusion, hires you to investigate. Delve into the clues left behind in his apartment to discover what really happened.

name: Isekai Saga: Awaken
summary: In the Isekai world, adventure never stops! Place upgrades, heroes break through levels! Flexible strategies, multiple gameplay, simple operations, rich experience!
storyline: In a parallel world, the shadow of the Demon King looms over the continent, leaving the people in fear. The legendary goddess selects a brave adventurer to save the realm. Summoned to this mysterious land, he takes on the monumental task of defeating the Demon King. Along his journey, the adventurer encounters companions from various races, each with their own dreams. Together, they unite and embark on a quest filled with challenges and adventures.

name: Morningtide Motel
summary: Your motel is busy for the first time in years. Antsy city-folk and dispossessed teens flood your rooms, and you can barely keep up. Now, after a week of all-nighters spent managing reservations, room service requests, and Yup! reviews, you begin to wonder… could you even fall asleep if you tried?

name: Pikmin²
summary: Play through a full recreation of the original Pikmin game in the engine of it's sequel, along with a whole randomizer, a whole second story featuring Louie, and much more! Fully playable alone or with a friend!

name: Misericorde Volume Two: White Wool and Snow
summary:
Sister Hedwig is having a bad time.

It wasn't long ago that the Mother Superior dragged her out of her cell, forcing Hedwig to break her oath to God as an Anchoress and face the outside world. Acting as a spy for the leader of Linbarrow Abbey, Hedwig was given one seemingly simple task: Discover who really murdered Sister Catherine.

Hedwig has tried her best, but she is no closer to solving the mystery. Things just keep getting more and more complicated: Why can't any of the Sisters give her a straight answer about what happened the night of the murder? Who--or what--is the mysterious figure that haunts the abbey? And just who was Sister Catherine?

In White Wool & Snow, Sister Hedwig must steel herself. Time is running out, and so is sympathy for her situation. It's understandable that being thrust into the waking world after a life of quiet reflection as an anchoress would require some adjustment, but if Hedwig wants to save an innocent man she will have to get serious fast. Can she navigate increasingly difficult social situations, maintain her cover, and make the progress the Superior demands?

name: BattleCap
summary: Dive into an exhilarating maritime battle for 1 to 4 players! Command bottle-cap vessel that not only transforms, extends, and even fractures but also glues other caps to craft your one-of-a-kind warship. Equip yourself with blessings to fight monsters, or engage in a battle with your friends.

name: Doctor Pain
summary:
A guy named Ben went to the dentist one day, but the examination procedure suddenly turned into a nightmare.

Will Ben be able to leave the hospital alive, or is it going to be his last doctor's appointment ever?

name: Divorce Chatroom
summary: A chatsim where you divorce a beautiful man!
storyline:
> [ It's a cold, lonely winter day. As you watch the snowflakes from your window, you come to an important realization:
you need to divorce your husband. ]

name: Eden Tactics
