summary: Eden Tactics is a competitive digital card game. Simple rules and deep reading, casual digital cards for a new era. Read your opponent's hand and make the best move!

name: Chimney Man
summary: A MSX homebrew created by GameCast Entertainment.

name: Fusionist
summary: Fusionist is a mech-themed game with diverse gameplays and detailed graphics, and it is free! Combining simulation management, turn-based combat, and 4X (explore, expand, exploit, exterminate) gameplays. Manage, build, and forge mechs to engage in intense battles!

name: Dinobreak: Chronicles of Horror Collection
summary: Dinosaurs, zombies, and more await!

name: Felinea Tales
summary: In this thrilling adventure, help Bill, a humanoid cat, restore peace to his village after a devastating attack.

name: Brew in Blizzard
storyline: You were lucky to land a seasonal job at Cafe Calmagi, a mystical coffee shop with an air of wonder and magic within. Your stay is temporary, but maybe you could do something to create something everlasting, like maybe...form a bond beyond being a barista?

name: Glider Simulator
summary: Human beings have always carried the dream of free flight, and the birth of gliders has brought hope, but not everyone has the courage to try. However, in VR, there is a magical software that allows you to experience the wonderful feeling of free flight!

name: Anomalies Detective
summary: A psychological horror game with a chapter-based plot, thriller and unusual elements! You are a novice paranormal detective, exploring secrets and finding ways to escape in an infinite loop of scenes. Many unusual things happen during this process, as if some strange force wants to devour you...

name: Half Away
summary:
Half Away is a One-Shot Narrative adventure where you play as Juna, exploring a mystical Spirit Realm.

Use her unique ability to hear hidden voices to solve puzzles and interact with enchanted objects and spirits.

Discover secrets, face challenges, and uncover multiple endings in this magical journey filled with exploration, puzzle-solving, and storytelling.
storyline:
Half Away is a puzzle-adventure game with a strong narrative focus, set in a fantastical world inspired by Slavic and Japanese folklore.

Juna awakens in a mysterious forest with no memory of how she got there. All she recalls is being bedridden with a high fever. Soon, she discovers she has entered the Limbo—a realm inhabited by spirits and inaccessible to humans, except in extraordinary circumstances.

Her presence is no accident. Juna's soul is caught between life and death, trapped in a coma. She must find a way to return home—or choose to remain in Limbo, helping both spirits and humans by influencing events in the Land of the Living.

Her journey hinges on the ancient runes left by shamans or the powers gifted by Limbo's inhabitants. These abilities will be crucial to solving puzzles and uncovering the mysteries that lie ahead.

Limbo is not one vast territory but a mosaic of fragmented lands, each its own micro-dimension. Juna can lose herself exploring its depths, meeting the spirits who call it home, and discovering a realm she once thought unreachable—or simply glimpse it before returning to her life in the Land of the Living.

Ultimately, everything depends on the choice she makes at the Portal of Return.

name: Nao's Love Triangle: Hentai Puzzle 18+
summary: «Nao’s Love Triangle: Hentai Puzzle 18+» is a puzzle game in which the player has to collect images of girls by rotating the puzzle pieces, in parallel following the relationships of the three heroines.

name: Digital Monster: Net Driver

name: Erdluitl: Legends of Below
summary: Erdluitl - Legends of Below is a 2D RTS inspired by Dungeon Keeper and old school titles from childhood. Dig and build dungeons, attract new creatures, manage population, train warriors and wizards, discover spells and assault your enemy !

name: Save the World
summary: The story is a young man summoned to another world is suffered from the scourge of aggression by monsters, and save the world with the native heroes. Game mode is rogue, you only release your kill desire to kill the monsters all! Special Zhen Fa System, allow you active powerful Zhen Fa to bombing!

name: Sokobundle
summary: Come have fun with this challenging puzzle bundle!

name: House Builder
summary: Become a one-man construction crew and build everything from simple mud huts in Africa to ultra-modern, energy-efficient homes around the globe. Travel through diverse climates and eras, mastering different building techniques and materials to create architectural masterpieces!

name: Cute Puppy Academy

summary: Survive the Frontline: Every Step is a Battle, Every Mission a Fight for Victory!

summary: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Paper Battlefield
summary: A strategy game where warfare takes place in a drawn world bound by the limits of a notebook. Experience a real-time strategy experience where all your units and structures are drawn with ink.

name: Senpai Sentinel
summary: Step into the world of LunaAkari, a beloved anime streamer who vanished under chilling circumstances during a live broadcast. As a devoted fan and member of the “Moonlit Guardians” fan club, you’ve been tasked with remotely monitoring her otaku-themed house to uncover the truth behind her mysterious disappearance.
storyline:
LunaAkari, a beloved anime streamer, vanished during a live broadcast after strange events unfolded—posters shifting, figurines moving, and a shadowy figure lurking just out of sight.

As a devoted member of her fan club, you take on the night shift, monitoring her home through surveillance cameras to uncover the truth. At first, it seems like harmless quirks, but the deeper you investigate, the more sinister the anomalies become. Someone is there—someone who knows the house too well.

Can you protect LunaAkari’s legacy, outwit the darkness, and reveal the truth before it’s too late? In Senpai Sentinel, you are the only line of defense.

name: Mogradiz
summary: The day has finally arrived, today you will become a monster tamer! Make friends with all of them and share a wonderful adventure, together you will explore different areas, take care of the crops and defeat great enemies.

name: Apocalypse Shop Simulator
summary: Apocalypse Shop Simulator is a sandbox game set in a post-nuclear war world. Buy goods and sell them to customers.

summary: A customizable Sudoku game that allows you to enjoy the joy of solving puzzles alone, as well as the fun of collaborating with others.

name: Shadow Siege
summary: Shadow Siege is an exhilarating third-person shooter (TPS) that plunges players into heart-pounding, action-packed battles. With fast-paced gameplay and strategic combat

name: Diner Simulator: Horror Story
summary: Take on the role of a night shift worker at a small fast food kiosk, where mystery awaits. Your predecessor has vanished under eerie circumstances, and it's now your job to uncover the truth. As you juggle late-night orders, unsettling occurrences start to unravel.

summary: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the sequel to the popular puzzle game "Color Swiper". In this expansion you can expect new, hand-crafted, tricky levels in which the aim is to fill all the squares with skillful swiping movements!

name: The Burton Equation
summary: Time is an equation, and you're here to solve it. 1920s Chicago detective Zachary Burton must defeat the Combine's attempts to influence humanity's past in the 20s, 40s, and 80s, and then achieve victory in the present - all the while pursued by a dark mirror of himself.

name: Pirates of Gensokyo
summary: Marisa rounds up a most unlikely crew, in search of adventure, and of course, treasure! Interpersonal conflict ensues among the crew, but in the end, their stark differences bring clarity to their personal lives. The real treasure is the one you find within yourself!

name: Klondike's Hike
genres: Puzzle, Strategy, Arcade, Card & Board Game
summary: A solitaire-based game with roguelike and deck-building elements.
storyline: Klondike has dreamed of shores covered in gold in the mountains. Being a gold panner, she aims to find those shores.

name: Basketball Legends 24

name: Animal Farmland
summary: A casual simulation management idle game. Players can click to place crops and buildings, earn coins, unlock a wealth of animals and buildings, and expand the farm

name: The Rake
summary: The Rake is an open world survival horror game. The gameplay loop is gearing up in your RV, Exploring the map for locations that house long scripted & unscripted horror sequences, or you can choose to look for evidence, hunt, or capture The Rake instead too.

name: Sicko Sanctum 2
summary: Enemies are weapons. Style is power. Your only goal, total violence. SICKO SANCTUM 2 is an innovative score-attack movement-shooter crafted from the design lessons of modern classics such as ULTRAKILL and HYPER DEMON. Featuring a simple player move-set in combination with synergistic enemy design, SICKO SANCTUM 2 represents the cutting-edge of digitized violence.

name: Doodle Taxi
summary: Doodle Taxi is a Zen-like taxi driving experience within a paper world! Why doodle-like? Well, a witch cursed you. Cruise around, pick up passengers, and get them fast & safely to their destination. The better you do, the more your world fills with color!

name: SpikerMan X
summary: The evil alien lizard Kromatone has returned to try and take over the galaxy! And he’s brought several of his former partners in crime to help him succeed! It’s up to SpikerMan to defeat all the crime bosses and defeat Kromatone himself before he takes over everything!

name: Where Winds Meet
summary: Where Winds Meet is an open world RPG set in the Ten Kingdoms period of medieval China. You take on the role of a swordsman who has grown up during war and conflict. Gameplay includes a mix of sword fighting, martial arts, and magic combat.

name: Realife Simulator
summary: Feature Contents Character Creator Once you have created your character, you can go to the clothes shops and barber shops if you want to get a unique look. Social Events In case we meet new people, take your cell phone number, record it in your own guide and send a message or call each other.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Resurgence
summary: The Division Resurgence is a free-to-play third-person shooter RPG that features a whole new and independent campaign from Tom Clancy’s The Division and Tom Clancy’s The Division 2, offering a new perspective on key story events. It takes place in a contemporary post-crisis America where a virus outbreak has created chaos and the collapse of the government. As an agent of the "Strategic Homeland Division” your mission is to restore peace, to protect civilians against hostile factions, and to help them build a better future.​
game_modes: Single player, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: P.I.
summary: "P.I." is a psychological horror science fiction themed around live streaming. While being cautious about revealing her identity, the streamer continues her live broadcast from home, gradually uncovering the truth behind the strange events that begin to unfold in her everyday life.

Unleash the Legend of the Monkey King!
Battle through chaos, conquer mythical foes, and reclaim your destiny.

summary: Relive iconic movie moments with 60 puzzles inspired by legendary films. Challenge your wits and immerse yourself in the magic of the seventh art!

summary: Upon the release of Squid Game season 2, Google added a small game to it's site when searching "Squid Game" to celebrate it's release. The game is a browser adaptation of the "Red Light, Green Light" part of the show.

summary: Explore a world of magic and adventure in the world of Aritas and defeat the Demon Lord! Play alone in single player or with friends on LAN in this classic-inspired RPG!

summary: Run from The Devil’s Bride, where you must outwit and escape from the clutch of the Devil’s Bride to save your niece, Nina. Solve challenging puzzles while hiding from the relentless Devil’s Bride in the world of Indonesian cult horror experience.

name: Corner World
summary: Game where you can build, break or craft things.

name: Decoration Rush
summary: Run and decorate! What could be stranger and more fun?

Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 4: Escape from the TV station!

platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

name: The Supernatural Power Troll
summary:
The Supernatural Power Troll is a puzzle platformer in which you control a troll that can grant humans superpowers. By doing so, the troll overcomes obstacles and solves puzzles.
The game features diverse NPCs with AI generated dialogs, a level editor,
storyline:
Merlot plans to acquire the orb of power. He is summoning a Supernatural Power Troll, who can grant superpowers to humans against their will.
As the troll goes on the quest to complete Merlot's task, he uncovers Merlot's evil plan, and must do everything to stop him.

name: Mosquito Simulator
summary: Mosquito simulator is a prank game in the type of simulation and survival.

name: Hell's Descent
summary: Start your roguelite adventure and dive into the depths of Hell's Descent. Play as one of three elemental sorceresses, you must survive the relentless enemies of hell. Unlock upgrades, discover powerful artifacts, and refine your skills.

name: Idle Tower Defense
summary: Control a single tower to fight off hordes of enemies. No randomization. Choose from a variety of modules to create unique builds and upgrade modules and survive endless waves.

name: Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight.
summary:
The scenario for Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight. is written by Momono Zappa, who won the 67th Edogawa Ranpo Award for the novel Roukou Zanmu. Character designs, CGs, and original images are handled by U35, who drafted the character designs for the TV anime The Aquatope on White.

An authentic world of mystery depicted by Momono Zappa with transparent characters illustrated by U35 come together in this new visual novel!

Additionally, the theme song is sung by Kanako Itou, who is known for her work on the theme songs for Higurashi When They Cry: Kizuna and STEINS;GATE. With its mysterious vibe and fast pace, paired with Kanako Itou’s vocals, the song is a key constructor of the game’s atmosphere.
storyline: The story is set in winter, at Seibunka Private Academy in Asahikawa, Hokkaido. The protagonist, Subaru Sakaki, and his childhood friend, Honoka Takamura, are excited as the final Christmas party of their school life approaches. However, their joyful days are shattered by the sudden news that their classmate Miyabi Yashiro and homeroom teacher Asuka Yuri have been murdered. And their close friend Kazuha Shinozaki has been arrested as the murder suspect. Believing in their friend’s innocence, Subaru and Honoka begin their investigation to uncover the truth behind the incident, but behind the scenes, someone deeply connected to a “certain secret” of theirs is pulling the strings.

name: Prison Escape Simulator: Breakout Master
summary: Outsmart, escape, survive: break free or be caught.

name: I Am The Registered Environmental Engineer
summary: This world is plagued by pollution, and as an engineer, you need to plan waste routes, gather, sort, and transport it to safe areas. Use powerful equipment to finally clean it up and restore cleanliness to the world.

name: Annihilation Plan
summary: In the land of dusk, the night ends. You'll explore the apocalyptic world with your friends, scavenging for treasure and slaying countless Cthulhu-like monsters. At the end of the day, you'll be able to sell the items you find to strengthen your equipment!

name: Architect Simulator
summary: Manage your own architecture firm! Would you prefer to design one skyscraper or many residences, or maybe all at once? Create buildings, beautify the city, sell land plots, manage a warehouse, hire employees, buy real estate, and watch your health.

name: Drewdler
summary: Drewdler is a puzzle platformer where you launch Drew in their orb of armor. Use the unique ability to draw lines and navigate through levels, collect gravity crystals and get back to the portal. Piece levels back together, and save the world!

name: My Fair Cat: Snow
summary: Dive into a feel-good adventure of love, laughter, and cat companionship. For anyone who has ever smiled at the thought of making a cat's day!

name: Emoji Face Jump!
summary: Jump action game. Emoji wanders in a broken world. Guided by a mysterious voice that tells them to aim for outer space to escape from here, they aim for the sky only by jumping. The mysterious voice curses you every time you fail. Will you be able to reach the universe while enduring the abuse?

name: Stray Children
summary: Stray Children is a bittersweet fairytale RPG, created by many of the same people behind beloved cult-classics like Chulip, Little King’s Story, Rule of Rose, Super Mario RPG, and, of course, Moon: Remix RPG Adventure.
storyline:
One day, a young boy is sucked into a TV set and awakens to find himself in a land made up entirely of children.

So begins the boy’s adventures in this strange and dangerous wonderland.

name: Undertale: Repent to Jesus
summary: Christian mod with bible verses. Tells the true meaning of Christmas. Converts the game into a God-honoring adventure with the gospel. Revamps some of the story. Changes some sprites. Has two main endings - requires a second playthrough for the second ending (has sort of secret...? requirements to unlock). Most graphical changes are in the second playthrough. Interaction with objects and NPCS instead of rushing through the game is recommended.

name: Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun
summary:
In Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun, you will face thrilling adventures in a blocky world where pixel art meets dynamic action and survival in a zombie apocalypse. Immerse yourself in a world filled with zombies and dangers, and prove that you can survive!

Zombie Blocks: Pixel Shooter Gun offers a unique blend of blocky graphics and intense gameplay in a world full of zombies and challenges. Prepare for endless adventures and prove that you can survive in this dangerous world!

name: Super Star Wars Holiday Special
summary:
Super Star Wars Holiday Special is a SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis homebrew game that works like an unofficial game from the cult-classic Super Star Wars series that was released originally for the Super Nintendo, but now, loosely based on the outrageous The Star Wars Holiday Special from 1978.

Super Star Wars Holiday Special was developed for the SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis with the Scorpion Engine by earok.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Dimension Fortress Macross
REVEREX: DX
summary: REVEREX: DX is a 2-player asymmetric experience that blends platforming action and microgames on a visually stunning trip through the mind. Don the roles of Lab Technicians operating an experimental Coma Treatment device, explore the deepest reaches of the subconscious and rescue your patient!

summary: Ready to slide into the fun?

name: Cole's Christmas 2024: GoonQuest
summary: A Christmas gift for Cole.

name: World of Slavic Glasses
summary: World of Slavic Glasses – a bullet-hell action game set in the world of Slavic folklore. You will fly on a stupa, fight hordes of undead creatures, and shop at Baba Yaga's store, which can surprise you as you upgrade it! Build your perfect character and try to survive all 20 waves!

name: Grave Deceiver

name: Banebush
summary: Banebush - is a non-linear and very red visual novel in the horror genre. Would you dare to step towards a fairy tale if it turns out to be true?

name: The Corn Maze
summary: Navigate a haunting corn maze in this atmospheric exploration game. Manage your flashlight battery, search for compasses, and uncover eerie secrets while avoiding what lurks in the shadows. Simple mechanics, immersive tension—can you find your way out?

name: 300 Line Christmas: Naughty or Nice
summary:
300 Line Christmas: Naughty or Nice is a community project targeting MBF21 (complevel 21). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's Line Massacre Series and is the sequel to 200 Line Christmas.
As the 300 in the title ﻿suggests, each map was limited to 300 lines at most. In addition, each map was a collab effort between two map authors.
The miniwad comes with 4 maps (technically 7 if you could both "naughty" and "nice" versions of maps). All but the first map have a "naughty" and "nice" version with different aesthetics and gameplay. Each map includes two exits ("naughty" or "nice") and depending on which exits you choose, you can get up to 3 different endings!

name: Gura Christmas 2024
summary: Celebrate the Christmas season with a merry jigsaw puzzle with various Guras drawn by many talented Hololive artists!

name: Criteria
summary: This game plunges players into a cold and snowy world, where they take on the role of a black ghost, moving forward through the icy landscape.

name: Decline
summary: This game transports players into a mysterious dark world, where they play as a red strawberry bear.

summary: Care Plan: Defying Gravity and Age

name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire

summary: Enjoy Golf Up with friends and family!

name: GrindFest
summary: GrindFest is a free-to-play idle programming action fantasy RPG where players utilize C# programming to create bots that engage in combat, loot, and cooperate with one another.

name: Tombs of Myra
summary: Descend into the cursed tombs of Myra and free the souls of ancient warriors.

name: Detail Hunter
summary: Can you spot every detail? Step into the challenge with Detail Hunter!

name: Elite Exorcist Miko
summary: A bullet hell shoot 'em up featuring hololive’s Sakura Miko! hololive has been possessed by evil spirits! Combine melee and ranged combat with a variety of items to fight your friends and set them free!

name: Riverside Gals
summary: This game is a school battle action game that incorporates simulation elements of ally selection into belt-scrolling action. You can bring up to 12 allies with you. Players are 1 MOB, and aim to conquer the game while being protected by strong gals and sometimes assisting allies.
storyline:
In 202X, a unified world government was established by simultaneous global default. The following year, the government dismantled public institutions including police forces in each country. At the same time, a surveillance system with AI drones and AI surveillance cameras was set up. Prohibition of owning property, prohibition of armament, and protecting yourself by fighting. These 3K law was enacted, and countries were plunged into chaos.

People relied on people with power, and a Gang Leader System was born at the school. And it was the same with Mob All Megane Academy, at Riverside City where all MOBs wear glasses. The gang leader demanded a huge payment. Students led by Aira, a black gal with a strong fighting spirit, formed the Black Gal Group. The students of MOB joined to either the Gang Leader or the Black Gal group, and a war broke out.

However, the Black Gal group was outnumbered by the Gang Leader group, whose strength was overwhelming.
Aira was captured. The story begins with the remaining four members of the Black Gal group. They begin to carry out a rescue mission for Aira!

name: Sport Clubs Collection
summary: Introducing the Sport Clubs Collection: Immerse yourself in the thrill of precision and skill with our exclusive 3-in-1 Games Bundle, featuring Archery Club, Darts Club, and Baseball Club – the perfect fusion of classic sports in one exhilarating pa

platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Point-&-click detective adventure game, you are a retired private detective investigating the case of a missing child while facing his own past demons. Midnight Cove, the wicked Victorian city you live in, features semi-open world mechanics, side-quests, pets, character relationships and much more.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Randomizer
summary: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.

name: New Day

name: Captain Gazman: Day of the Rage

But he finds himself embroiled in a war between the Nilgors and Gareses. Take control of Montana or Kurbon and take part in the biggest crime showdown of those years!

summary: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

summary: "Jewel Fever 3" is the much improved successor to the highly succesful "Jewel Fever 2" which is played by millions of people. It adds new gamemodes, better graphics and finally local and online multiplayer!

name: Colony
summary: A teenage guy is playing cricket with his friends outside a haunted house, and as he strikes a six,the ball travels inside the home.He goes to pick up the ball. During his search, he experienced a horrifying incident with the ghost.

name: Let's Compare the Speed of Our Punches!
Cutie Panda
summary: Cutie Panda is a panda-raising app. You can set timers for your panda to remind you to drink water, attend meetings, complete office tasks, or follow any healthy habits you choose. Your panda grows and levels up as you feed it bamboo and play games within the app.

name: Twas The Night
summary: Build and manage Santa's North Pole mega-workshop in this festive city builder where workshops produce toys for the world's children. Spend Christmas Spirit to create new holiday traditions and upgrade your workshops, but lose your spirit and you'll cease to exist.

name: Pizza Maker
summary: Become a pizzeria owner

name: Learn to Play Vol. 9: Santa's Sleigh Ride
summary:
You are Santa Clause and it's your task to deliver all the Christmas presents, just in time for the holidays.
Hop on your sleigh, fly over a bustling town, decide who's been good or bad and deliver lots of wonderful presents to all the happy townsfolk.
Watch out for obstacles in the sky! Can you make it in time for Christmas?

name: RAF Survival: Ocean Shark Survivor
summary: Set sail into the unknown in RAF Survival - Ocean Shark Survivor, where every wave could spell adventure or doom! Stranded on a precarious makeshift raft, your journey begins in the vast, shimmering expanse of the ocean. With nothing but your wits and determination, transform your humble vessel into a floating sanctuary of survival!

name: Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite
summary: The latest in the “Red Spider” series of Hong Kong noir visual novel with full japanese voice acting, “Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite” is now available with all-new graphics. The hard-boiled story of two female protagonists is set in Thailand in 2009. Play time: 2-4 hours

name: Mario in the Multiverse
summary: A collaborative major Super Mario 64 romhack where Mario goes through levels based on other video game franchises.

name: Mental State. Game One
summary: A fantastic first-person adventure with elements of the action and horror genres. A feature of the game is the "System of Thoughts" - a kind of generator of quests and various thoughts in the head of the main character, which directs and motivates the player to explore the outside world.

name: Click Me: Hentai Adventure
summary: Welcome to our exciting clicker game where you interact with charming characters! Choose from a variety of attractive girls, uncover their outfits, and experience different levels of nudity. Satisfy characters to add intrigue and diversity to gameplay.

name: Diverse Defenders
summary: Diverse Defenders is a strategy game that combines Roguelike and Go elements. Here, you will be able to recruit characters with unique skills and form a powerful hero army. Go deep into various levels and defeat powerful bosses to achieve ultimate victory!

name: Amazing Curves Racing
summary: Amazing Curves Racing: the simple, fast, and efficient racing simulator, where you start or join a race in seconds. The online multiplayer physics engine hides lag well and the tire model works directly on cubic 3D surfaces, for a high-speed racing experience not available anywhere else.

name: Delivery Mayhem
summary: Race against time, embrace chaos, and become the ultimate delivery daredevil in "Delivery Mayhem." Top-down mayhem meets high-speed action!

name: Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator
summary: A.A.B.S. Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator The Most Advanced Ballistic Damage Detection/Application System In Virtual Reality.

name: Grove Fisher
summary: A relaxing idle game about fishing. Discover dozens of fishes and treasures! Spend your resources on growing your operation and unlocking new varieties of underground life! Achieve goals, buy skills, and mutate rare fish to improve your profits!

name: High School Love: A Visual Novel Romance
summary: Meet Lana in this visual novel, a shy and dreamy girl who meets Leo in the school library, a boy passionate about music, who is looking for a quiet place to play his guitar.

name: The Ghost Treasure
summary: Use your soul as a stake to gamble for a treasure of the undead captain. As long as you take the randomly distributed flintlock gun and fight a duel with the ghost pirates, you can leave with the treasure, or your soul will remain on the undead ship forever. Good luck.

name: Gar-Type
summary:
GORESTAR, the living planet, is on a direct course for Earth.
It's time to debut our secret weapon duo:
Ace pilot Jon Starbuckle, and his prototype starfighter, Gar-Type D.
Your mission: save humanity! Defend the Earth from the alien invaders!
storyline:
GORESTAR, the living planet, is on a direct course for Earth.
It's time to debut our secret weapon duo:
Ace pilot Jon Starbuckle, and his prototype starfighter, Gar-Type D.
Your mission: save humanity! Defend the Earth from the alien invaders!

name: Tonya The Killer
summary: Tonya the Killer offers a fast-paced action and strategy-filled survival adventure. With dynamic enemy battles, an immersive story, and addictive gameplay, every moment is packed with excitement. Step into Tonya's world and conquer the chaos!

name: Final Sanctuary
summary: A year after the disaster, the bunker's life support systems fail critically. Communication with the outside world is completely lost. You are a mechanical engineer, awakened in your quarters by a piercing siren, alone and cut off from the world.

name: The Dark Gift
summary:
You woke up in the basement of your home and don’t remember anything...

When you go up to the house, you see the Christmas decorations and garlands and remember that it is family holiday time and time to get ready for it, while your wife and son went out to the store to do some shopping...

Suddenly the doorbell sounded. Opening the door, you see that someone left you a gift box...

What's inside this mysterious box?!
storyline:
The Dark Gift is a horror game about Christmas and New Year.

Description:

You woke up in the basement of your home and don’t remember anything...

When you go up to the house, you see the Christmas decorations and garlands and remember that it is family holiday time and time to get ready for it, while your wife and son went out to the store to do some shopping...

Suddenly the doorbell sounded. Opening the door, you see that someone left you a gift box...

What's inside this mysterious box?!

What awaits you in the game:

Unusual graphic style in the style of old-school games. (VHS aesthetics).

A dark story that will keep you in suspense until the very end.

The New Year's holiday will turn into a real nightmare for the main character.

Realistic sound design that will give you goosebumps.

name: Deck the Underhalls
summary: 34 festive Underhalls tributes in MBF21 format. Explore endless underground tunnels, collect more super shotguns than you'll ever know what to do with﻿, an﻿d marve﻿l at the shotgunners stuck in ﻿the walls!﻿

name: Island of Despair
summary: An episode 3 replacement for Heretic to celebrate its 30th anniversary.

name: Guardian Grids
summary: A pixel tower defense game packed with strategy and fun! Build Archer Towers, Magic Towers, Poison Traps, and Cannons to defend your castle from waves of monsters. With diverse levels, random cards, and upgrades, every battle feels fresh. Ready to defend? Begin your journey now!

name: Schape Dodger
summary: Enjoy a casual color and shape matching game. Easy to pick up but hard to master and complete all the challenges.

name: Poop on Red
summary: Take the wind! Avoid the buildings! Chasing the red car! Poop! Poop!

name: Date Banger
summary: Date Banger is an exhilarating 3D adult dating game where you meet stunning girls by swiping through videos. Engage in rhythm games and fun activities to charm and win over a variety of beautiful girls. Dive into a world of pleasure, unforgettable moments.

name: Trouble in Warsaw
summary: Trouble in Warsaw is a short, detective game, combining the genres of Visual Novel and Point&Click, featuring many puzzles, dialogues and related choices solidifying the plot and its finale.

name: Pragmatics
summary: This is a classic match-3 puzzle game where the primary elements are colorful and uniquely shaped blocks.

name: Dicey Tales
summary: Roll the dice in your hand! Dicey Tales, a TRPG-inspired game, combines deckbuilding with strategy in a unique SRPG experience. Assemble the ultimate expedition team with a variety of heroes. Defeat powerful bosses through strategic decisions and a bit of luck!

name: 100% Wedding Mission: Love Love Christmas
summary: 100% Wedding Mission! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with 45~ viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit! Collaborate with chat and streamers to capture the Love

name: Chirashiiru
summary: A puzzle game where you have to follow the arranged themes.

name: My Life: Zoo Vet
summary: Take care of sick zoo animals!

name: Untravelled Planet
summary: Outer space 3D-platformer action.

name: Use Your Words 2
summary:
“The party game for funny people and their unfunny friends” is back!

The cult hit Use Your Words has all-new prompts and twice as many mini-games where you compete to write the funniest punchline – we set ‘em up, and you knock ‘em down! Players can use their phones or tablets as controllers, so it’s easy to jump in and seamless to play. And if you can’t think of a punchline, you can use one of our sneaky "Decoy” answers to lay a trap for your opponents… all with beautiful new visuals by artist Andrew Kolb!
developers: Smiling Buddha Games, LLC, vellocet games

name: FallNation Lost Stories
summary: A Roguelike FPS full of action and exploration, where as an ARF agent, you must face the situations that arise during critical events in Kamau. Discover what happened in the bunker SH-301, overcome the risks, and activate the Fallnation protocol before it is too late.

name: Ascend Factory
summary: Welcome to Ascend Factory, a factory simulation game that challenges your ingenuity and resource management skills. Immerse yourself in a world of automation and strategic planning as you progress through levels of increasing complexity!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: In Real Time
summary: You work the nightshift at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza looking out for the animatronics, now moving towards you in real time. Relive FNAF 1 with a moving animatronics camera system; but as we all know, the animatronics tend to wander a bit.

name: Welcome To Eden
summary: Welcome To Eden is a narrative driven adventure RPG set in a utopian city, Eden. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, while learning about the more secretive side of Eden in this psychological adventure. And maybe, just maybe, everything isn't as it seems...

name: Mikoshi
summary: Twelve levels of dynamic platforming with interesting story, charismatic main character and his friends, ability improvements, epic boss battles, secrets hidden throughout and high quality graphics.

name: Sani Yang's Laboratory
summary: Awaken in a world of furries, where your life takes an unexpected turn. After being saved by a mysterious laboratory, you’re pulled into their research on humans. But what lies beneath their seemingly noble intentions?
player_perspectives: First person, Bird view / Isometric, Text
storyline:
In the game, you run Professor Saniyang's lab.
A university lab is made up of the blood and sweat of graduate students.
Therefore, you need to bring in graduate students to work.

name: Desmond's Castle
summary:
The vampire Desmond woke up from his long sleep and attacked the villagers of Burnsley.

A knight sent by the realm, will go to the vampire's dwelling to settle this matter.

From room to room, he will have to face the enemies and take the different secret passages of the castle to be able to face the terrible Desmond!

name: Covermount
summary: One of our programmers said that they wanted to express their opinion on the quality of our offices via this game. We don't understand.

name: Starship
summary: An unofficial port of Star Fox 64 for PCs including enhancements.

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: The Farm's Secret
summary:
"Tales Beyond The Tomb" is a chilling episodic horror series that plunges players into the shadows of real-life cases.

This is the second episode of the series:

Episode 2: The Farm's Secret
Dragged into a web of secrets and lies, Samantha seems to be part of a puzzle impossible to solve. What once seemed obvious soon turns into something far more sinister, and the line between villain and victim begins to blur.

Nothing is as it seems. How far will you go to uncover the truth?

name: Kandinhale
summary: Kandinhale is a story-driven short RPG game in which you'll have to escape from the clutches of Kandinhale, the company that owns almost the entire consumable market in this idyllic candy world.

name: Atropos
summary: "Atropos" is a visual novel in which you will learn about the story of Atropos, the prince of Capernaum.

name: ­Into the Deep Dark Green Sleep
summary: A story woven with the sound of rain, poetic text, and gentle narration... A short visual novel where you can spend a relaxing moment in your own place, with time to yourself, where no one will disturb you, no one will come barging in. It could be a small, secretive café.

name: Keep it Up
summary: A thrilling rock climbing puzzle action game with simple click challenges

name: J-Room
summary: J-Room is a turn-based strategy probability game. Playable only with the mouse. Manipulate your opponent's action probabilities with cards. Swords are strong against guns, guns are strong against helmets, helmets are strong against swords. An eerie world set in old Japan. Escape from J-Room.

name: Cheese Party
summary: Cheese Party is a casual match 3 game where you match charcuterie board delights to complete party orders with cute artwork. Create cheese knife specials and rainbow cheese if you match more. High point scores are rewarded with power ups to cheese the levels.
storyline: Sophie has taken over her grandmother Celeste's cheese shop. Unfortunately along with the cheese shop there is a huge debt to pay off. Sophie; her family, cheese maker, friends and cheese lovers come together to save it from the bank and a cheese rivals constant attempts of sabotage.

name: Shelf Life
summary: Shelf Life is an action FPS set in a near future conglomerate, that will seem eerily familiar if you spend your time around online dumpster fires. Use your arsenal of weapons to shoot, burn and fungible-ize your way through the Edison facility fighting a lizardy hostile takeover.

name: Ping Pong Deluxe
summary: Ping Pong Deluxe immerses you in a world of table tennis that revolutionizes the classic game with new modes and different maps! Here you get fast-paced rallies and dynamic gameplay that will keep you enthralled. Become the undisputed table tennis champion!

name: Anima Fighters
summary: Fight to escape from the dimensional prison: choose one of the six warriors and prepare for battle.

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook! - Christmas Special
summary: Christmas is here! Roll up your sleeves and cook up a holiday feast worthy of a number one chef!

name: Outbreak: Take a Bite Collection
summary: Experience the best retro survival horror nightmares the Outbreak series has to offer at a deep bundled discount.

name: House Painting: Simulator
summary: Enjoy the most realistic and fun house painting simulator you’ve ever seen!

name: Zombies and Orcs
summary: You have discovered ways to quickly move using teleportation and when visiting new lands you will have to protect your portals so that aggressors do not penetrate them.

name: Bilge Junction
summary:
Welcome to Bilge Junction, population 8: a dying town on the arctic highway. With the promise of a cheap roof over your head, you ran from your problems and wound up here.

But winter's setting in, and the fire keeps burning. A storm is on its way. There's something lurking in the pipeline that built the town. In three days' time, it's bound to escape.

name: Sub Terra Draconis: The Golemworks
summary: A dusty tunnel to the side leads to an old dwarven construction facility. Disused parts of golems and other machinery litter the ground. There is surely treasure here, but these tunnels won't lead him to the outside of the mountain!

name: Cognitive Dissonance: A SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story
summary: Cognitive Dissonance: A SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story is a visual novel and spinoff of the SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis which was released as a part of the SiIvaGunner 2024 Christmas ARG. The game follows The Joke-Explainer 7000 as she helps Dr. Andonuts with his mental struggles.

name: Clinical Trial
summary: A suspense tale about signing up to test psychiatric drugs for money and provider-patient relations.

name: Rusty Drill
summary: Rusty Drill is a 32 map community megawad which began development back in 2023 to celebrate Scythe turning 20. ﻿This project was a continuation of the Scythe themed community project "Scythe: Re-sharpened" by EPICALL.

name: Famulus
summary: Famulus is a short retro-style shoot-em-up-and-down adventure game about kebabs made by me (programming, sounds, graphics) in about 2 weeks for Sewer Jam 5.

name: Dreams of Saturn 2.0
summary:
This brand-new edition of Dreams of Saturn features an entirely new chapter that takes Ryo to Yokosuka Harbor for another fun-filled Christmas story! Packed with SEGA references and Easter eggs, including the legendary Segata Sanshiro, and follow the tale of Santa Maeno as he embarks on a mission to save Christmas for the residents of Yokosuka!

This release includes both Dreams of Saturn 1 and 2.0 as one full game, allowing you to select a starting point depending on if you are playing the entire game fresh or for the first time, or already experienced Dreams of Saturn 1 and wanted to jump straight ahead to the 2nd chapter.

name: Promized Land: Outer Town
summary: PL:OT 2025 is a third-person shooter horror survival simulator where you will experience terror while exploring an infected city, alone or with your closest person.

name: ODouzy!!!
summary: In ODouzy!!!, guide a cute rectangle through colorful levels, dodging bomb traps and collecting beans and douzy. With a blend of simple movement mechanics and challenging puzzles, navigate vibrant worlds and gather enough the douzy to emerge victorious in this lighthearted, strategic adventure!

name: Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor
summary: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.

name: Block Jam
summary: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!

name: Art Detective: Hidden in Gusu
summary: Step into the vibrant world of Qing Dynasty Suzhou with Art Detective’s latest chapter. Discover over 400 hidden objects as you unravel secrets and immerse yourself in a stress-free, artful adventure.

name: Mint's Hints 2
summary: Step back onto the set of Mint's Hints, a cancelled children's TV show you were once the showrunner for. What begins as a curious exploration soon turns into a nightmare as you're hunted by the vengeful spirits that roam the abandoned set. Seeking refuge in an underground corridor, you stumble upon an android version of Mint, the show's once-beloved star, now deactivated and discarded.
storyline:
Step back onto the set of Mint's Hints, a cancelled children's TV show you were once the showrunner for. What begins as a curious exploration soon turns into a nightmare as you're hunted by the vengeful spirits that roam the abandoned set. Seeking refuge in an underground corridor, you stumble upon an android version of Mint, the show's once-beloved star, now deactivated and discarded.

Desperate for survival and answers, you strike a deal with the android: reactivate Mint, and you may just uncover the truth. Armed with special Flashbrights, you must navigate the haunted remnants of the set, discovering cryptic hints and locating missing pieces vital to Mint's reawakening. But beware—the ghosts are never far behind.

As the android comes back to life, so do the forgotten secrets of Mint's Hints. But the more you uncover, the more dangerous the ghosts become. Can you collect all the hints and reactivate Mint before time runs out?

name: Ommatophilia
summary:
Ommatophilia is a surreal horror game in development about angels. You play as the Angel Cakes, a girl trying her very best to be happy with her friends despite her circumstances.

Explore the world of Ithal with your companions as you prepare to say farewell to Blue, an angel who will soon undertake Departure. Talk to several angels, solve puzzles, and meet those who do not have faces.

Come to Ithal, dear player! Embrace the eyes. Learn to say goodbye!

name: Autos
summary: Autos is driving game contains five modes Racing, Car Park Drift, Truck Challenge, Rally and Transportation Open World Driving.

name: Phoenix Reborn Games Big Christmas bundle
Hand-Drawn Epic Adventures
summary: Two big adventures with memorable characters!

name: Ancient Ants Adventure
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One
summary: Your task is to become the leader of this great colony, rebuild your army and learn to use magic to protect your comrades in order to turn the tide of battle with terrible enemies.

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Egypt
summary: Graphic novel about the adventures of a young traveling architect. Discover Bimfli and his friends in this beautiful story full of values and lessons.

name: Fighter Aces: Sky Dominance
summary: Your Sky, Your Rules: Experience the Ultimate Aerial Combat!

name: Grass Life Sim
summary: Grass Life Sim is a game in which you can become grass.

name: That New Diner
summary: That New Diner is a short murdersim visual novel for Android, Linux, Mac and Windows.
storyline:
You're struggling for friends in a new town and decide to check out a cute diner!

'That New Diner', huh? Odd name for a restaurant, but I see advertisements for it everywhere. Might as well check it out.

Who knows, maybe I'll meet somebody?

name: Frosted Love
summary: A short visual novel featuring Dizzy Dokuro, Kaneko Lumi, Hoshiumi Jelly and Ember Amane from the VTuber agency Phase-Connect.

name: SilvaGunner: Rebooted
summary: SilvaGunner: Rebooted is an Undertale fangame released by SiIvaGunner as a part of the Christmas 2024 ARG, in which it plays in the genocide ending of the SilvaGunner: Rebooted storyline. The player plays as Chad Warden as he faces off against Haruka Amami.

name: Czech Soccer Manager 2025
summary: Czech Soccer Manager is a football manager simulator, where you take over the coaching of one of the available teams and try to bring it not only by using reinforcements to bring over time to success.
storyline: Czech Soccer Manager is a freeware game since 1999. It become one of the most popular game in Czech.

name: AAA Dynamic Scenes
summary: AAA Dynamic Scenes allows you to transform your screen into a device that grants you power of surveying space and time. Immerse yourself in beautifully animated vistas from the farthest reaches of the universe - feast your eyes on the many futures and pasts from the great beyond. The application can also function as a screen saver displaying date and time over the scapes and at a touch of a button can turn each scene into a jigsaw puzzle providing you with entertainment. This product contains five scapes - your experience can be expanded by purchasing additional 35 vistas - please see available packs in items related to this product.

name: Finally A NSMB2 Christmas Mod
summary:
The first ever Christmas themed mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2!

This mod includes:
~ Brand New Levels with a Christmas theme!
~ Brand new and familiar festive graphics!
~ Tons of remodeled enemies and objects to fit the Christmas theme!
~ Custom Snow themed Worldmap!
~ A Soundtrack made up of many game franchises!
~ And much much more!!!

name: Dead Christmas
summary: Step into the boots of Santa Claus himself, facing a nightmare like no other. A peaceful North Pole is thrown into disarray when an alien spacecraft crashes near Santa's village, unleashing a deadly virus that infects his loyal elves.

name: Wordlike
summary: A word roguelike. Make words, tune your bag of letters, and collect power-ups to beat increasingly difficult levels.

name: Ginger's Letter to Santa
summary: "This is it! This year I will cook the best roast Christmas dinner the Zodiacs has ever seen! They will all scream for more and then nobody will try to eat me, no more no more!" Join Ginger, Sullyvan, and the Gonk on this RPG Christmas Adventure as they deliver their letters to Santa's Factory!

name: A War On Christmas 3: World War C
summary: The third installment in the "A War on Christmas Series" featuring 12 maps of Christmas Mania.

name: Madness Below
summary: Madness Below is a RPG dark fantasy horror game developed by Sif Kamira that began development in November 2024.
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Text
storyline:
You star off choosing one of two protagonists.
Alexandrius Kalimor, a paladin and a prince of the kingdom Kalim where the story takes place. He choose to take this mission as a part of proving himself worthy to the throne.
Evelynn, a mercenary hired to investigate missing villagers. Evelynn was shunned by her family in the past due to her transgender status and had a hard life. But she is a skilled warrior and thus manage to survive through taking difficult missions.
It starts off as a fairly straight forward mission. Find the missing soldiers and villagers. Find out what happened. But it turns out things aren't that simple. Just being near that cursed dungeon messes with your head. Weakens your grip on reality and more prone to listen to the darker parts of your soul. Thus the rabbit hole goes deep indeed.

name: Baptisterio
summary: With an analog camera, a gift from my father, a photo of the missing tourists and the illusion of my first big news I prepare to enter with the brothers to the enigmatic baptistery.

name: Oryum
summary:
Step into the immersive world of Oryum, a reimagined game where tradition meets innovation. Designed for hardcore grinders and dungeon enthusiasts, Oryum offers balanced mechanics, continuous quest series, and bug-free gameplay that redefine the MMORPG experience.

Engage in thrilling events, tackle challenging dungeons, and explore a meticulously crafted world brought to life by a professional development team. With flashy cosmetics, unique boosters, and a focus on community-driven updates, Oryum delivers a seamless blend of classic MMORPG nostalgia and modern enhancements.

Whether you're conquering epic bosses or building your legacy in the vibrant in-game economy, Oryum promises an unforgettable adventure tailored for veterans and newcomers alike. Join now and forge your story in a world that never stops evolving.
storyline:
Oryum Storyline: The Shards of Eternity

In a time long forgotten, the world of Oryum was whole, vibrant, and flourishing under the divine balance of the Eternity Shard, an ancient crystal that harmonized the realms of Light and Shadow. This mystical shard, entrusted to the High Council of Anor, ensured peace and prosperity for centuries. Yet, as greed and ambition corrupted mortal hearts, a catastrophic war erupted, shattering the shard into countless fragments scattered across the world.

Without the shard's balance, chaos consumed Oryum. The land split into three warring factions, each seeking dominance and the lost fragments of the Eternity Shard to claim ultimate power. Unchecked darkness seeped into the world, giving rise to monstrous creatures and twisted dungeons where the shards remained hidden, guarded by malevolent forces.

Amidst the chaos, the Ancient Guardians, remnants of the old order, whispered of a prophecy: “A hero will rise from the ashes of conflict, one who can reunite the shards, restore balance, and reclaim Oryum’s destiny.”

You are one of the chosen, drawn by fate to embark on this perilous journey. The path will lead you through sprawling cities, treacherous mountains, and haunted ruins, where forgotten secrets and unimaginable dangers lie in wait. Along the way, you'll forge alliances, uncover the truth behind the Eternity Shard's destruction, and confront the darkness threatening to consume all.

Will you restore balance to Oryum and become the legend foretold? Or will the realm succumb to eternal shadow? The choice is yours.

Prepare to fight for your destiny, uncover the fragments, and shape the future of Oryum. The journey begins now.

name: Real Pharmacy Simulator
summary: Become the owner of a pharmacy in Real Pharmacy Simulator! Manage the business, serve customers, and balance profit with ethics. Order medicines, organize the space, and decide how to run your business - honestly or riskily. Your decisions will determine the fate of the pharmacy!

name: Propa.
summary: In this RTS game, control your virus to replicate and evolve against a powerful immune system. Equip gene segments to create unique viral armies. Use tactics to eliminate immune cells or achieve escape. Develop strategies for domination and enjoy endless strategic fun!

name: Guns, Blocks, and Steel
summary: A voxel-based multiplayer FPS with fully destructible terrain and an emphasis on strategy, tactics, and resource management. Play singleplayer with bots or multiplayer PVP/co-op.

name: All About Maze
summary: A casual, retro, Atari-inspired maze traversing game. Controllers recommended! Play by yourself or couch-coop with your friends and family.

name: Penguin Escape
summary: Penguin Escape is a fun and challenging game to play, simply collect all the items in order to move to the next phase, just do not get caught, use portals and platforms for your advantage

name: Hentai World Halloween
summary: This is a captivating game featuring stunning and charming girls. Immerse yourself in the jigsaw puzzle mechanics, arranging pieces to reveal the full picture of these eye-catching characters.

name: Ad Astra: Sci-Fi Tower Defense
summary: Lose yourself in an indie solo-dev. treasure that harkens back to arcade classics! All while thumping along to killer retro-inspired beats by Ovani sound. Embark on an epic tower defense adventure against awe-inspiring machine monstrosities, made by a devoted gamer for devoted gamers.

name: Grand Mall Simulator
summary: Manage and expand your own shopping mall in Grand Mall Simulator! Open diverse boutiques, stock shelves, decorate, and attract customers to grow your profits. Hire workers for automation and create a unique mall experience. Can you turn your center into a bustling mall?

name: 5 Nights at Timokha's 4 School
summary: Continuation of the legendary saga about the naughty Timokha and his delicious pie!

name: Coffee Break
summary: It's time for a well-deserved break from your space-engineering stuff. Unravel the functioning of your freshly repaired coffee machine, while trying not to destroy the Earth. The fate of all humanity lies on your mug!

name: Combat Rally
summary: Gear up for mayhem! Combat Rally combines real car physics with explosive battles. Outrace and outgun your friends on thrilling tracks using a deadly arsenal. With local and online multiplayer, it's the ultimate party game. Think fast, drive hard, and dominate the rally—your gears, your rules!

name: Monoquous 2
summary: A challenging puzzle platformer in which you can phase through walls to invert the world around you, taking the direction of gravity with it - up becomes down, black becomes white, and deadly obstacles lose and gain their threat along the way.

name: The Battle for Christmas
summary: The Battle for Christmas is a festive platformer where you play as Santa, battling goblins who stole Christmas presents. Explore 30 levels, face 3 epic bosses, and enjoy charming graphics in this fun adventure to save the holiday season!

name: Hideko
summary:
Hideko is a short mystery game about nature.

Explore the rules of a small sandbox world to create new objects, plants and other forms of life! Discover special situations and interactions to earn stars to increase your inventory-size and unlock new areas.

name: Stella Gladio
summary: A precision platformer where you take on the role of Gladio, venturing into a mysterious magical tower with your companion—a sentient, talking sword "Stella".

name: ParallHex
summary: ParallHex is a puzzle game where you'll navigate increasingly challenging levels. Solve puzzles simultaneously in two distinct worlds, interconnected by your every move.

name: Paper Bride 6: Nightmare
summary: "Paper Bride 6 Nightmare” is the sixth work to the Paper Bride series. Dive into a bewitching dream and immerse yourself in yet another immersive Chinese horror puzzle game!

name: Superhero Market
summary: Become the manager of a dynamic supermarket! Manage inventory, optimize store design, plan shelves and improve the customer experience. In this immersive management game, every decision counts to develop your business and satisfy your customers. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

name: Seedbo And That Time The Sun Exploded
summary: Re-assemble the sun in this bite-sized adventure platformer!

name: Christmas Gift Catcher
summary: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the perfect game for the holidays: "Christmas Gift Catcher"! After decorating the Christmas tree in our previous game, "Christmas Tree Decorating Simulator", now it's time to collect the presents.

name: OFC: Ultimate Fighting Club
summary: OFC - ULTIMATE FIGHTING CLUB invites you to dive into the brutal world of no-holds-barred fighting, where the only rule is to win. Join a fighting club inspired by the intense atmosphere of real OFC tournaments, and level up your fighter to become a true champion.

name: Die for the Economy!
summary: Blast evil robots in a retro psychedelic maze of an office, as you bring down the security servers and make your way home. Die for the Economy! is a retro arcade survival game featuring beautiful, chunky pixel art graphics with a psychedelic slant harking back to the old 8-bit game systems.

name: Jump Race
summary: Jump high. Run fast. Win the race!

name: Morkull: Ragast's Rage - Collector's Edition
summary:
A 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration in which we control Morkull, God of death and darkness and lord of the Ragast, whose main mechanics lies in the breaking of the fourth wall, which will allow Morkull to communicate with the player in various ways.
The Collector's Edition contains:
• The Base Game (Standard Edition)
• Special Box with exclusive illustration
• An Artbook
• 4 stickers
• Postcards Set
• Original soundtrack on CD-ROM

name: Lost Room: Escape
summary: As twilight descends and the world plunges into darkness, you, a seasoned police officer, find yourself answering a harrowing call that shatters the peace of a quiet, unassuming neighborhood. The distressed voice on the other end speaks of Lost Apartment, a place steeped in sinister legends.

name: Ghoulie's Garden
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Welcome to Ghoulie’s Garden, where Halloween magic awaits!

name: Ways
summary: A lone urbex in an abandoned hotel - what could go wrong? Explore the surroundings and find the mysteries of this place. Don't forget to be quiet - urbex is an illegal adventure, and you don't want to be found...

name: High Score
summary: High Score is a thrilling top-down arena shooter where you face off against relentless waves of numerical enemies. Rack up points and earn medals to unlock a variety of unique classes and powerful items. Dive into the action, enhance your arsenal, and aim for the highest score!

name: Mary
summary: Mary is a mystery and investigation game, in which you are a private detective who has been called to solve a case of a massacre in a bar. Collect all the clues and find an answer to all the mysteries of this case!

name: Holy Undead
summary: An undead-loving necromancer is reincarnated as a saint!? By chance, the necromancer Frankel is reborn as Yurishia, a girl with the incredible qualities of a saint. Today, too, she ignores the expectations of those around her and forges ahead on her path to collecting undead.
storyline:
Frankel was hated as a wicked necromancer and an abhorred man.

But he was not evil, he was just an unpopular, socially awkward loser who liked the undead.

However, society thought poorly of him as a necromancer, and he was shunned, hated, and finally defeated by the heroes Cain and Flora. Just before death, Frankel invoked a forbidden curse that would make him the King of the Dead.

However, the magic failed, and he thought he would simply die...but for some reason, he is reborn as Yuricia, daughter of Cain and Flora, with the memories of his previous life!

A love for the undead! All women—be they malicious bullies or not—are goddesses! Inside this dainty, pretty girl lies abnormal principles.

And Yuricia—ironically—receives the blessings of the Holy Mother and acquired an unprecedented five Gifts, including incredible healing power!

However, Yuricia uses her power for her own personal gain. Her goal is to be reborn as a necromancer! But the healing interferes with her dream. Various trials and errors are on repeat. From an outsider's perspective, could it just be eccentric behavior?

However, those around her always react favorably to the various uproars Yuricia kicks up, and despite her own intentions, she ends up helping many people.

She accomplishes many great feats and eventually becomes known as the Healing Saint...

Though many handsome men adore Yuricia, she is indifferent. This includes the handsome Anthro swordmaster Wolferos, her brave brother with a sister complex Alexei, the cursed and highly sought after prince, and the seriously injured future hero. She heals them from top to bottom, and doesn't care if they call her a street healer. All she wants is super rare undead materials! And...?

She looks prim and proper, but inside she is actually a he—a necromancer loser.

This is the story of healing and salvation woven by a beautiful girl with an unhinged moral center!

name: Wallsurf
summary: Wallsurf is a game that combines elements from CS:GO's Surf minigame, Jumps, and the beta release of Karlson. This game is a fast paced 3D racer based on the movement mechanic of sliding down walls.

name: Ragdoll Training Center
summary:
Ragdoll Training Center is a physics based arcade game where you push a ragdoll character through the challenging maps to reach the finish.
Compete for thousandths of a second differences with other players in global ranking.
Create your own maps in Map Editor and try maps made by other players.

name: Dashpunch
summary: After the Tyrant Hand is stolen by a mysterious figure, an ancient being awakens to return it to its rightful place before it's too late. Dash and Punch your way through corrupted dungeons that fall apart at the seams, meet colorful characters, battle powerful bosses and carve your legacy!

name: Forgotten Fears
summary: Forgotten Fears is a collection of five small horror games, ranging from rainy forest to deep underwater.

name: Empire: Sound of the North
summary: Empire: Sound of the North, a swipe em up cards game. Swipe the cards, go on adventures, solve puzzles and mysteries, make everyone happy and create your own kingdom.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite & Beyond
summary: A mod conversion of MVC:I that overhauls the functionality, art, and playstyle of general characters in the game, including the addition of a new 4-player, 2v2 mode where all 4 characters actively fight on-screen at the same time.

name: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream
summary: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream is a Sci-Fi visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Io, a pilot/spy who was sent to United Europe to investigate Cornelli, meanwhile, the arrival of a skilled assassin threatens her mission.
storyline:
Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream is a Sci-Fi visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Io, a pilot/spy who was sent to United Europe to investigate Cornelli, meanwhile, the arrival of a skilled assassin threatens her mission.

Seventeen years have passed, yet the shadow of the Great War still hangs upon the world. On February 28, 2019, the 3th World War began. The war was between China and the United States of America. A series of sanctions imposed by the United States ignited this war. A feature of the Great War was the use of robots, manned bipedal machines, the Metal Knights. China, now called Great China, became a union of republics, consolidating itself as the largest economy.

After that, Great China established a system to remain militarily stately. The Great Generals system. Each of the Great Generals acts as a strong independent force. They are stationed throughout the nation. Zhaoky base with Houke and Rinshu, Weisho base with Ren and Goke, Yannro base with Gakuk and Gekishin, Quinou base with Koshou and Lu, and Chukou base with Kyou.

You are Io of Yannro, Vice General, commander in the Gekishin Army and a military spy. Originally you was a rebel leader infamous for organizing resistance acts in United Europe.

name: The Mare of Jonah
summary: A first-person psychological horror/mystery adventure where you play as a small boy trapped in an unknown and dark mansion. Try to survive the vengeful evil spirits lurking in the dark while exploring the rooms and corridors in hopes of finding clues that may lead to a way out of this horror.

name: Marble Maid 2: The Negative Levels
summary: Deep in the damp dungeons of a forgotten mansion, evil lurks. A sexy maid is ready to cause chaos!

name: Street Race Kings
summary: You are brought into a racing league, the SRK. Once you can qualify and prove yourself to the league, you then make your way to the top, racing against various competitors, and taking down stage bosses to move up in rank! Multiple vehicles, customization, open world maps, and more!

name: Bone Meal
summary: Plant strange mutated crop in a chilling rogue-like with strategic resource management. Use a wide variety of seeds through three seasons to survive the blinding glow of the sun. Brew tonics, produce biofuel, upgrade facilities, and don't go hungry.

name: Echoes of the Abyss
summary: Dive into a rogue-lite survivor action game, where world changes based on your Sanity. Eat or be eaten. Grow from Prey into Hunter. Build ability-combos to survive waves of creatures from the Abyss. Uncover secrets of your lost humanity.

name: Ultimate General: American Revolution
summary: American Revolution is a sandbox strategy game featuring the epic historical period during the rebellion of the American colonies against the British Empire. Take on the role of the British or American Colonists, and fight for territorial control over North America. A gripping real-time campaign awaits you on a detailed 3d map where you can build your army and navy, construct military infrastructure, and fully command your armies on a regimental level. If you want even more action you can fully zoom-in and fight massive battles on a battalion level.
storyline: Fight in real-time on the global map with regiments and naval squadrons. Move your General to gain the tactical control of the situation in a minimal way. The presence of the General makes it possible to control the troops or ships directly on map, actively use maneuvers, cut supply routes, utilize different types of terrain and flank with cavalry. The battles can be fought with more detail and full tactical control by zooming-in further on the map.

name: Very Bad Dreams: Do Not Fall Into Madness
summary: Very Bad Dreams is an intense and demanding experience that will test your nerves. Forget everything you thought you knew about horror games, because Very Bad Dreams transcends the boundaries of the gaming experience. Developed by an independent French studio, it's much more than just a game.

name: MannaRites Gold
summary: Gold edition of the warmly received fantasy 2.5D hack-n-slash / RPG - MannaRites! Cut your way through enemy troops, explore open map, find and equip legendary weapons, armor and artifacts, level up your hero! Defend your lands from invaders!

name: War to the Core
summary: War to the Core is a tactical multiplayer war game where fleets of motherships battle for global domination.

name: Poveglia: The Island of Non Return
summary: Visit one of the darkest places in Italy where hundreds of souls were forgotten in time. After an acclaimed career as a private investigator, detective William Miller takes on one last case; the disappearance of the Family Pierangelli, which has remained in mystery for over thirty years.

name: It is a Good Knight to Die
summary: Fight your way through hordes of evil in this light-hearted 2D, action-platformer. Traverse and battle your way through deep caves, werewolf filled forests, frigid peaks, and big stompy bosses! Always remember, It Is A Good Knight To Die!

name: Locked In Mind
summary: In Locked in Mind, you are trapped in a virtual escape room full of puzzles. Use your wits to solve them at your own pace without the pressure of a time limit. Perfect for players of all skill levels. Start your adventure today!

name: Fountains
summary: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world.

name: Vincemus: Air Combat
summary: Fly through the theaters of World War II with fighters planes from across the world. Intercept, Raid, Defend, Survive in theatres of World War II. Vincemus is an arcade semi-realistic air combat shooter, The game is avalable on WindowsOS and MacOS.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year Two Pack
summary: Get all the game's additional content released between 1 January 2024 and 31 December 2024 in a single pack, and find your new spots in three additional maps, including a school and two iconic locations in Europe: Paris and Prague.

name: Alaskan Road Truckers: Highway Edition - Cosmetic Bundle
3-in-1 Christmas Collection
summary: 3 games with guaranteed entertaining fun await you in this Christmas Collection!

name: Anime Girls Dating: The Night Before Christmas and the Tree
Anime Boys Dating: The night before Christmas and the tree
Love Furry Girls: Zodiac Dating App
Love Furry Boys: Zodiac Dating App
Sky Diving: Parachute Flight Simulator
summary: Soar, freefall, Conquer the Skies!

name: Garten of Banban 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 6 + 7
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Experience the Garten of Banban series with this complete bundle, including Garten of Banban 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 & 7! Explore the facility and make new friends... If you dare.

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them! 1+2
summary: This bundle, containing "Those Games" and "Those Games 2" is for you! Play Pin Pull, Number Tower, and more to your heart's content!

name: Aireo Flight Simulator 2025 Edition
summary: Are you ready for a new adventure? Fasten your seatbelt and experience what it's like to be a pilot as you dive into the most breathtaking landscapes of this planet.

name: Christmas Puzzle Story
summary: Celebrate the magic of the holiday season with Christmas Puzzle Story, a cozy and addictive puzzle game where festive fruits and Christmas treats collide in delightful combos!

name: Christmas Stories: The Adventures of Santa Claus
summary: Visual novels full of magic, snow and exploration where players immerse themselves in the wonderful world of the North Pole.

name: Football Stars: Head Ball Soccer Co-op Battle
summary:
Team up with friends for epic co-op battles.
Jump, kick, and unleash special moves.
Score big and become the ultimate champion!

name: Item Frenzy
summary: Experience the Joy of Discovery in Item Frenzy!

name: Little Animals: The Wild Race
summary: Interactive graphic novel that tells the exciting adventures of three adorable animal friends who participate in a daring race through the jungle.

name: Pixel House: Color by Number
summary: The dream home starts here: paint, listen, relax.

name: Sugoi Girls: Enchanting Elf
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Taxi Driver Simulation 2025
summary: Speed, stunts, and passengers—master the urban chaos!

name: Desierto
summary: This is a game about getting lost.

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged - Threads of Destiny
summary:
• French Campaign
Switch sides and swear allegiance to the French king, continuing your military career under a new banner - that of kingdom of France. Go on a new ambitious campaign against Paris' numerous rivals in order to, one by one, bring them all to submission, earning wealth and glory in the process. But don't let the glitter of gold blind you as, in the royal service, the cloaks and daggers of maligners and ill-wishers might prove to be way more dangerous than even the sharpest swords and spears of the best enemy knights.

• Bounty Hunting
Accept the offer of Grace & Glory and abandon the military career in favour of bounty hunting. Accompany your new colleagues on their travels around medieval Europe and complete various contracts, some of which might take you to rather unexpected places. They say that bounty hunters die young — find out if you got what it takes to become an exception from this rule.

• From a peasant to a king
Betrayal is the worst possible sin. However is it really that bad if the crown of the whole kingdom is at stake? Stop being a pawn in somebody else's game and make your own dash for the throne. Seizing the crown will be a challenging task, holding onto it will be even harder. But, if you've got a true monarch's ambition, the battle is worth the blood. True greatness is now within your reach — it's time to become the king or die trying!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 7 – Secured Gear No Fear
summary:
Arena Breakout is available for download worldwide with the new Season 7 update, ""SECURED GEAR, NO FEAR"". Download and enjoy the latest shooter with tens of millions of players around the world! Eliminate adversaries head-on, with stealth, or bypass the bullets altogether. Players have the freedom to fight however they desire. Escape the combat area alive for a chance to strike it rich, but be prepared to fight for survival.
Please note that your feedback will be processed by the Arena Breakout team for improving the game, responding to you, and/or providing support and troubleshooting, such as addressing and remediating technical issues and bugs.

name: Wanted?
summary: It's not often that you look closely at the faces of people you pass on the street, is it? It's no wonder that there are people near you who look exactly like the ones on the wanted list .This game will test your observational skills.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2 (Holiday Special)
summary: Step into the next chapter of To the Moon with Sigmund Minisode 2, a poignant holiday-themed spin-off that offers a deeper look at the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. This part continues to explore the personal struggles, mysterious secrets, and ethical dilemmas faced by the doctors of Sigmund Corporation.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 (Holiday Special)
summary: Return to the world of To the Moon in this heartfelt spin-off that dives deeper into the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. During a holiday season filled with both festive cheer and public protests against the Sigmund Corporation, this minisode explores the ethical dilemmas and emotional challenges behind their wish-fulfillment work.

name: Level
summary:
Somehow you are locked in a strange room.
Find the hidden items and solve the riddle to escape.

name: Puniru ha Kawaii Slime no Game wo "Ano Game" de Tsukuttemita Keredo, Hatashite Anata ha Clear Dekirunoka?
summary: This game is a collection of three mini-games with 150 stages, created by D3 Publisher in collaboration with Dokokade Mita “Ano Ga ”me Tachi wo Bouningen de Tsukuttemita Keredo.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Liberty II Pack
Store Wars: Multiplayer Shop Simulator
summary: Play solo or with up to 16 friends in a chaotic grocery store showdown! Manage, grow, and compete against rival stores in a fun, lighthearted battle of wits and strategy. Who will be the ultimate grocery tycoon? Sabotage, upgrade, and outwit your friends in this unpredictable simulator!

name: Virtual Girl: Sex Simulator VR
summary: Customize every moment with over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions. With realistic HDRP graphics and full VR support, dive into a world of passion and connection like never before. Whether on PC or in Virtual Reality, this is your chance to create your perfect experience.

name: Water Game Simulator
summary: A classic casual puzzle game that simulates a water ring machine.

name: Christmas Mutilator
summary: Inspired by 80s slasher films, Christmas Mutilator is an immersive horror and home invasion game. Your husband and children are trapped in the storm, you are stuck in a cabin for the holidays. Use every tactic you can to stay alive and get out of your house as a vicious psychopath breaks in.
storyline:
Adam and the kids are stuck outside while you are alone in the cabin, and a snowstorm ensnares your family, miles from assistance. You can feel the loneliness, and your main responsibility is to keep the place safe and secure. However, you understand that you are not alone as night falls. Someone is observing, waiting for the ideal opportunity to enter. Outwitting this vicious murderer and getting away before they destroy everything is the only way to live...

But it's not just the psychopath that you should be afraid of. Adam and Amelia's relationship has never been easy, and as the game progresses, a terrifying revelation could ruin everything you believe to be true about him.

name: Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz
