summary: "Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz" is an SRPG set in the medieval world of Yusia. A modern high school student is mysteriously transported to this ancient land and caught in its conflicts. Alongside a princess, they embark on a dangerous journey filled with intrigue and hidden secrets.

name: Tank Arena: Total Operation
summary: Tank Arena:Total Operation is a free MMO war game where you play as a commander, drive thousands of types of tanks, armored vehicles or helicopters on a massive battlefield engaging in 12v12 team-based battles against players globally. Enjoy the fun!
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Furry Aim Trainer: Gooning Mode
summary: Edge closer to victory with gooning mode! 20 unique furry targets as well as videos to practice with!

name: Forgotten Memories
summary: Forgotten Memories is an adult visual novel where your choices lead to intimate relationships and multiple outcomes. Uncover your lost memories, forge connections with three unique women, and experience both emotional and erotic storylines.

name: Gacha Addict Simulator
summary: A simulator game where you play as a gacha-addicted human of society. Go to work, earn money, survive, and do what you were meant to do as a human being - play all the gacha games in the world. Gacha pulls earn you collectibles that you can place in and decorate the space of your small apartment!

name: Motorcycle Combat
summary: The game is designed to drive a motorcycle and kill or destroy targets along city roads, occupying the Goal, allowing the game player to win. You need more than 100 points and 10 shields to win.

name: Castaway Hand
summary: A relaxing vacation, a leisurely journey - that's how it was supposed to be, but due to a cruise ship crash, you are stranded on a tropical desert island. With its vast sandy beaches, dense woods, and possibly less dangerous animals - do you, by any chance, have what it takes to survive?

name: Gravity Block 2
summary: Gravity Block 2 is a minimalist puzzle game where the player must control the environment to make the Block reach the end.

name: Sweet X'mas
summary: Sweet X'mas - is a simple and beautiful puzzle game with a Christmas theme. It is accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photos in the gallery.

name: Fallen: Into the Darkness
summary: Dive deep into the darkness in this free-to-play, single-player platformer. Time moves fast, so keep your light alive and watch your step, each attempt reshapes the entire level.

name: HuntNPrey
summary: HuntNPrey is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game for up to 8 players. By day, act natural and blend in with the herd to escape the hunter's sights. By night, transform into a wolf and flip the script—now it's your turn to hunt! Stay sneaky, stay sated, or get caught!

name: Summons Sword: Pot Guardian
summary: "Summons Sword: Pot Guardian" is a top-down, highly challenging action game. Teleport to dodge enemy attacks, fight with swords and summoning magic, and recover the treasure "Clay Pot of Darkness" stolen by the evil summoner!

name: TattooVR
summary: TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR. TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

name: A Few Days With: Emma
summary: Embark on a sensual Christmas Baubles hunting adventure with Emma, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Emma's enticing layers.

name: Archaeology: Sand Fantasy
genres: Racing, Role-playing (RPG), Simulator, Sport, Strategy, Adventure, Indie
summary: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Anemone
summary: This is a board game set in the fictional Japanese city of "Neverland." Enjoy local multiplayer with simple mouse-based controls. Original music and an unusual world await you

name: Planet Factory
summary: A small quick game about building a factory to launch planets into a solar system! Grow your base and increase production to make the ultimate factory for launching planets!

name: Taiwan Love Story⁵
summary: "Taiwan Love Story ⁵" is a romantic interactive novel. To write a thesis on love, you meet girls from different parts of Taiwan. As you conduct your academic research, you gradually become captivated by them, leading to a series of sweet, bittersweet, and complex romantic encounters.
storyline:
You're a college senior studying humanities at a university, and during a camping event held by your department, you meet five women from different parts of Taiwan. While you're hanging around the bonfire, a mysterious kiss leaves you lovestruck and yearning for more. Inspiration strikes, and you finally settle on a thesis topic: "The Binary Equation of Love and Happiness."

In order to both finish your thesis and find true love, you set out on an adventure around the island. Along the way, you meet up with the women and experience a series of bittersweet romantic encounters bursting with youthful naivety. Your very own Taiwanese love story is about to begin...

name: Heavenly Way Legend
summary: “Heavenly Way Legend” is a casual game set against the backdrop of Chinese xianxia. You will play as a cultivator, cultivating, fighting, exploring, and having fun in various spaces.

name: Prop Hunt Rumble
summary: Welcome to Prop Hunt Rumble, the multiplayer hide-and-seek game where hunters use their fingers as magical projectiles and props have ingenious abilities to turn the tables! Get ready for a hilarious experience filled with strategy, bluffing, and guaranteed laughter!

name: Galaxy Hassle
summary: Step into the shoes of Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, as they steer their way through Asteroid Fields and Monsters a-plenty, to arrest Dr. Jillkoy - A menace known for his deadly atrocities towards intergalactic citizens. Do you have what it takes to see him behind bars?

name: Dig Night
summary: Dark comical RPG set in a city at night and a spiritual world.

name: Purrgonia
summary: There are many things hidden within the unexplored wilderness. Venture into a mysterious forest to gather resources so you can rebuild the village of Purrgonia. Bring back life to the forgotten lands but be wary: the illusive serenity can make you forget about the true dangers of this place.

name: Secrets In Green
summary: When a pretty plant in Alma's garden begins to speak to her, she knows that a dark mystery is afoot! But in Victorian England, women are often dismissed as nothing more than hysterical fantasists. Can you help Alma find her power, and solve this dangerous situation before it's too late?

name: Ascendrix
summary: The ascent nightmare

name: Starving Cat
summary: Starving Cat is a third person sci-fi shooter where you explore planets and fight monsters to find food for scientist cat Simon.

name: Cryst
summary: In this action-packed game, unknown creatures invade a factory and steal diamond pieces. Your mission is to play through exciting stages, recover the missing pieces of diamond scattered across various locations, and restore them to the factory.

name: Eggconsole Aqua Polis SOS MSX
summary: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!

name: Truck Simulator 25: American Driver
summary: Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver invites you to an exciting adventure on the roads of America, progressing through levels set in diverse locations — from industrial zones to quiet suburbs and the bustling city center. From hauling cargo across diverse landscapes to managing your trucking business, this game brings the thrill of the road to life. Your task is to deliver goods on time, improving your driving skills and upgrading your trucks as you go.

name: Vaulting Champions
summary: Try this incredible mix of track and field and running. Pole vaulting through the course is something very unusual and unrealistically fun!

name: Cats Visiting Christmas Town
summary: Embark on a Christmas quest to uncover hidden cats in charming holiday scenes filled with snowmen, festive shops, and a grand tree adorned with gifts.

name: Tekken 8: Clive Rosfield
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary:
Clive Rosfield, the first prince of the Grand Duchy of Rosaria, from FINAL FANTASY XVI joins the tournament!

Experience thrilling swordplay and precision coordinated attacks with Clive's loyal hound, Torgal. Wield powerful and dynamic Eikonic abilities and temporarily transform into the mighty Ifrit. Use your power as the Dominant of Fire to emerge victorious.

Content:
- Clive Rosfield as a playable character

name: Mia and Me: Magic Friends
summary: Take your unicorn for a ride through enchanting tracks. Discover the Rainbow Island, Crystal Cave, Heart Valley, Blackwood Forest, and many more magical locations. Help Mia, Yuko and Mo protect Centopia - take on exciting quests, search for magical items, and then, with the help of Phuddle, banish Gargona and the other villains! And then there's the cute little ponycorns you're sure to fall in love with too!

name: Fool's Pub
summary:
Welcome to Fool’s Pub - The Online Multiplayer Card Game.

This isn’t just a card game – it’s an online multiplayer battle where up to four players compete in a high-stakes game of skill, luck, and survival. Outplay your friends or strangers from around the world and prove you’ve got what it takes to be the last one standing.

- First-Person Fun: Experience the game through the eyes of your character, bringing you closer to the action with every draw, bluff, and shot fired.
- Play Your Way: Jump online to challenge others or enjoy offline mode with clever AI opponents when you’re flying solo.
- Cute and Dangerous: Meet adorable characters packing serious heat – their charm hides a fierce determination to win at any cost.
- Rough Rules, Wild Rounds: With Russian roulette-style mechanics, every turn could spell glory or disaster. Will you take the risk or play it safe?
- Only One Wins: In this pub, there’s no second place. Outwit, outplay, and outlast everyone else to claim the ultimate victory.

Get ready for the perfect mix of strategy, adrenaline, and chaos.
Fool’s Pub is calling – are you brave enough to answer?

name: Lost Footage: Sound In The Silence
summary: Sound in the Silence is a horror game where you must find and destroy 10 Totems in a quiet, ominous environment. With each Totem destroyed, more monsters appear and eerie sounds increase, raising the tension. Survive the growing fear and complete your mission before it's too late.

name: Legends BMX
summary: Pure Flow and Adrenaline! LEGENDS BMX is an energetic and exhilarating game made for extreme sports enthusiasts! Ride your BMX through a variety of parks and scenarios designed to let you pull off incredible tricks.

name: Anime Dance-Off: Around the World
summary: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.

name: Mini Golf Simulator
summary: A new style of mini golf game where you swing with the Joy-Con hanging down!

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Refine
summary: An upcoming remake of Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

name: Wolf Souls: Arena
summary: Fight monsters in the colloseum. After each round upgrade your ablilities or wepon and prepare for other vawe of enemies. This DLC is new game mode into Wolf Souls game.

name: Hidden Cats: Winter
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Winter" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Christmas
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Christmas" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Snow
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Snow" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Kaimyou Maker
summary: This is a tool that automatically generates, manages, and edits Kaimyou. It can also issue Kaimyou certificates and save them in an album, and it can be used as an Ihai.

name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep3: The Southern Resort
summary:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 3: Escape from The Southern Resort!

name: World of Jade Dynasty
summary: "World of Jade Dynasty" (Zhu Xian World) is a fairy-themed online game developed by Perfect World Games. It was launched for public beta on December 19, 2024. The game is developed using the UE5 engine, using various technologies such as physical rasterization and ray tracing rendering, dynamic shadow options, screen space and true 3D reflection.

name: Shirokuro: Shikijoushou no Osananajimi wo Sewa suru koto ni natta, Kanojo ni naisho de
summary: You secretly help your friend with erotomania, even though you have a girlfriend.

name: Lost Verses
summary: Lost Verses is a first-person psychological horror game where you face supernatural forces and inner fears, using faith and your mother's teachings as defense. Survive the spiritual battles, PRAY! Resist the enemy, and it will flee from you.

name: The Adventures of Zomboy
summary: A bite sized post apocalyptic point and click adventure game, where you play as a passive zombie.
storyline:
A re-awakening of an old flash point and click adventure game that will bring you back to your childhood (well for most of you). You play as a peaceful zombie who is on an adventure, as you play the game the story enfolds. Try to find out who you are and what's going on and maybe what the future holds. It is based in an post apocalyptic land out in the desert where you parked up your RV and set up base for a while.

In this short but sweet little point and click adventure game, you will come across characters who need your help, or at least will help you in your quest. You will also get to read up on what and why things have happened to get you to this point.

Did you know, in the future they produce brains in cans?

This game has been updated for the steam release, including some new graphics, scenes, clickable items, and some quality of life updates.

We do hope you will support us and enjoy the adventure so we are able to continue on with the sequel(s)!

name: Cloud Piercer
summary: It's time to go on an adventure! Board an airship, load your cannons, set off to discover the secrets of the clouds and... Who knows? How far can you go?

name: One Piece: Ambition
summary: The mobile game "One Piece: Ambition" is developed by the Morefun studio based on "ONE PIECE". It was developed by the original team of the "Naruto Mobile" under the studio, and received the support of Bandai Namco. The art style is delicate and highly restored. At the same time, combined with the research and development of Unreal Engine 4, the visual effect of the game's fighting blow is enhanced, and the fineness of the picture is further improved, so that players can also experience the sailing journey in the original animation.
developers: BANDAI NAMCO Games Inc, Morefun Studio Group, Tencent Games
game_modes: Single player, Multiplayer, Co-operative, Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO)

name: Nettle
summary: A survival RTS game about exploring the vast cosmos, the many planets inhabiting it and their countless secrets. You'll need to explore, gather resources and research new technologies in order to survive, thrive, and eventually build a colony on a bizarre, foreign world.

name: DuaLight
summary: In this challenging cyberpunk platformer switch between day and night environments, go through dangerous obstacles by manipulating gravity and time. Upgrade your abilities to conquer these levels with an intense soundtrack. Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush?

name: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy - Expansion DLC
summary:
From the developer, Inusuku, comes a fun-filled expansion DLC for the hit game Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy!

This expansion DLC adds a ton of new content, and some quality of life features.
Features:
- Many Additions to the Main Story and Side Events
- New Quality of Life Features Including an Album
- New Art
- And More!

name: Royal Quest Online
summary: Fantasy comes alive in this vast yet cozy free-to-play MMORPG! Choose between 4 classes and 8 subclasses, explore hundreds of locations, thousands of quests, dive into varied PvE and PvP modes, enter the unique vibrant world, and trade with other players. Play, explore, fight and be victorious!

name: Alien: Rogue Incursion
summary: This brand-new single-player, action-horror VR game features an original story that fully surrounds players within the terrors of the Alien universe.

name: LingerieS
summary: The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is asked by his twin sister, Riko, to dress up as a woman and work as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, in her place. Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie and develops a bond with the women who visit the store...

name: Fallacy Quiz
summary: Sharpen your critical thinking skills in this quiz game that challenges you to spot rhetorical fallacies. Everyone likes this game so you must too, right?

name: Tombstone MMO
summary: Tombstone MMO is a western-futuristic, low-res 2D MMORPG set in a post apocalyptic world

name: Swashbuckler's Xmas
summary: An action-packed holiday adventure full of pirates, snowballs, and the occasional yeti. Explore the North Pole in this third-person action adventure game for all ages.

name: ArcaneOutpost
summary: A strategy game that combines MOBA and Tower Defence, You would control guardians with different skills，building your outpost to fend off enemy attacks.

name: My Supermarket
summary: Manage your own supermarket, attend multiple types of customers and make the most profit you can. Order products, refill shelves, play with your friends in co-op mode, go after thieves, order some staff and grow your empire as much as you can.
storyline:
My SuperMarket is a third-person simulation game in which you, as a member of a team of up to 4 people, own a supermarket in the middle of the city.
It is your responsibility to manage the supermarket, organize and serve the customers while expanding and making the most profit you can.

name: Inside a Dungeon
summary: What will you find inside a dungeon? A treasure chest filled with gold and traps, a battle against the dangerous forces and greedy desires of humanity, or a place full of misery waiting for your demise.

name: Endless Dark
summary: An existential horror game in which you are tasked with keeping a sleeper colony ship intact. No enemies or NPCs share the ship with you - only creaking metal echoes and endless dark. Overcome random events, system failures, and the downward spiral of your sanity to see your mission through.

name: Isekai Tragic Love
summary:
Love, friendship, betrayal & fighting demons!!
But, at what cost wlll he pay for this powerful strength?

name: My Insect Girl Can't Be This Cute
summary: Warm soft skin, contrasted with hard chitin. It isn't something you've thought of until one day where your curiosity forced an encounter with an actual insect girl! In this visual novel, you meet Ophelia, the result of a successful cross genetics experiment between a ghost mantis and a human

name: Tracery of Fate VR
summary: Tracery of Fate VR is a dark fantasy cooperative/solo VR game in magic post-apocalyptic world.
storyline:
The game takes place in the dying world of Alfira. After a long confrontation with the invasion of demons, the goddess of Alfira weakened so much that she could not cope with the curse left by demons - Bane, which gradually devours all life. Cities fall into the ground, people, elves and orcs die from Bane poisoning or mutate into terrible monsters. As if that was not enough, a former ally, a mad necromancer, decides to become the new god of a dying world and turn all the living into his army of the undead.

You are the Sentinel - the last hope of this world. A mysterious creature created by an ancient race to oppose demons. At the disposal of the Sentinels are melee weapons, shield, various superpowers and pistols. You are opposed by hordes of the undead and even other Sentinels enslaved by the necromancer. There are rumors around the world that the demons have returned and will soon begin their march through the world of Alfira again, devouring the remnants of the survivors.

name: Grimlord
summary: Grimlord is a dark fantasy action RPG built for VR. Use every type of weaponry and armaments with full customization and limitless move sets to annihilate anyone who dares to stand between you and your destiny

name: Flappy Octane
summary: Flappy Octane is an endless level, speed increasing game. It's game set in the future where cars can fly and all we do is pick a car and jump through rings. The rings are generated at random heights and the speed of the game increases. ​How far can you get? Can you get #1 on the leaderboards?

name: Coreupt
summary: An updated take on the classic 1v1 fighting game model, Coreupt enhances fighting mechanics by adding over-the-top special attacks. Take combat mastery to the next level by chaining normal, special, and cinematic attacks together with each character’s Coreupted mode to pull off a heavy-hitting combo. Follow the story of an unlikely party in their mission to stop an insatiable warlord in his pursuit of tyranny over the galaxies.
storyline: In the vast expanse of distant galaxies, the very fabric of reality trembles as an unstoppable warlord leads an armada to seek out the Hyperion Cores. Imbued with unimaginable power, they hold the key to either salvation or annihilation. Will you plunge the universe into eternal darkness, or bring it back from the brink?

name: Glorious Companions
summary: Lead a party of fellow companions through tough times and become a renowned lord in the land of Navaroth. Watch your men suffer and celebrate, learn and grow. Guide them by example, fighting alongside on the battlefield.

name: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero
summary: A story-driven cooperative action-adventure about friendship and teamwork. A boy never meant to be a hero, learns that pure strength is not always the answer! Guide two completely different characters through the adventure of their lifetime and witness how bonding is a powerful source to overcome any obstacle!
storyline:
An unlikely hero!
Every hero starts with a dream in his heart, but Leif started with a nightmare that haunted his dreams.

In his dreams, Leif relives his mother’s tragic death. His mother passed away giving birth to him. The guilt and longing for a mother he never knew overshadow his dreams. Each night he fights to save her, only to wake up and to realize that no matter what, he will never be able to change the past.

Leif’s father too is haunted by the past. The death of his wife turned him into an overprotective father. He is scared to lose Leif and will do everything to keep him out of harm’s way.

A father struck with grief and an older brother, Ragnar, the seasoned warrior that everyone looks up to. Leif feels small in the shadow of his family. Will he ever be as brave as his brother? He looks up to him and dreams of becoming a strong warrior like his brother, that protects the village and is trusted by everyone. Ragnar is held in such high esteem that he was chosen to undertake the monthly dragon ritual.

Leif’s village honors the belief that two dragons fight an eternal battle in the sky. The dragon serving the light and the dragon creating the darkness. This battle has been going on since the beginning of time.

The villagers believe that they must bring the dragon of light offerings each month so that he remains strong and defeats the dragon of darkness. The ritual is key in keeping the balance between light and darkness.

Leif’s brother was chosen to bring the offerings to the Dragon’s horn at the top of the mountain so that the dragon of light can feast and replenish, thus gaining strength for a new cycle of battles.

Leif dreams of becoming an admired warrior like his brother. But Leif's father thinks differently. Leif’s future is set in stone. He is destined to be the blacksmith's assistance.

Fire and steal instead of the cold blade in battle. Forging the blades for the warriors instead of becoming one himself.

At night Leif sneaks into the village tavern to listen to songs of heroes’ past and dreams about becoming one himself. He dreams that one day they will sing a song about his epic battles.

But someone is never seen of late at the tavern. Leif’s brother Ragnar is keeping watch at night. Something is keeping him up and he gazes upon the darkness weary of an evil force. Leif tries to understand what is going on with his brother. His brother is keeping a secret from him. But what could it be? He will find out soon enough.

On the morning of the ritual things are unraveling fast. Leif's village is attacked by Phantom Warriors. No mortal blade can harm these evil forces from another dimension. Only the dragon sword Ragnar carries can defeat them. Leif's father wants to protect Leif. He doesn't think Leif to be strong enough to fight in the battle. Instead, he is sent away to find his brother.

Leif runs as fast as his legs can carry him to the top of the mountain where he believes the ritual to be taking place. But things have taken a different turn of events. For there is no dragon, but a great evil awaiting Leif.

Leif arrives too late. In horror, he watches as his brother is fatally wounded by an evil foe and thrown into a magical portal. Little does Leif know that the evil force he witnessed has been the cause of the danger brought upon his village. Minjaar is the master of the Phantom Warriors and the darkness lurking in the shadow of his dreams.

Now it is upon Leif to save his brother and his village. Leif has no choice but to jump after his brother through the portal. And so his quest to the Netherworld begins. The quest to save his brother, village, and most importantly learn the true meaning of being a hero.

name: Space Engineers: Ultimate Edition 2024
summary: The Space Engineers Ultimate Edition 2023 includes all of the DLCs for Space Engineers, all the decorative blocks and cosmetic items released in 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 and 2024.

name: Nefiriya and the Sands of Eternity

The project "JALECOlle Famicom Ver." continues to release Jaleco's Famicom titles one after another!
The 4th release is "Saiyuuki World"!

name: Fisherman

summary: Take on the role of a legendary hero on a quest to find the Dungeon Lord: a powerful creature lurking deep within a treacherous dungeon. Every game is different and completely random.

name: Broken Psyche
summary: Play as a detective investigating his wife's disappearance. Suspecting the asylum she was researching, he infiltrates it, only to uncover a realm of horror. Solve puzzles, maintain sanity, and confront monsters as you unravel the asylum's secrets.

name: Cropolution

platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: In Infernitos, take on the role of a little imp chef serving up devilishly delightful dishes to hungry demon patrons. Move the dishes across the fiery kitchen, carefully pushing and delivering them on the table to serve your hellish clients. Every level demands sharp thinking and a strategic approach, as each dish must be assembled with precision to satisfy your picky infernal clientele!

name: Save Christmas With Santa
summary: SAVE CHRISTMAS WITH SANTA!

As Twen’s father, you will have to pay your debt to the God of Death and wrangle lost souls for his herald. Be prepared for another Weird West adventure with new eldritch horrors and new weapons to send them back to where they came from.
storyline: As Twen’s father, you will have to pay your debt to the God of Death and wrangle lost souls for his herald. Be prepared for another Weird West adventure with new eldritch horrors and new weapons to send them back to where they came from.

name: Wild Fire
summary: WildFire is a strategic and survival game. Play as the Tribe Leader and Fire Watcher in the wild that is full of strangeness. Make decisions to be sure your tribe runs well, guide your members to do the right job to survive longer and explore the mysterious land.

name: Doodle Cats
summary: Welcome to a playful world of childhood memories! In this fun hidden-object game, your task is to find all the cats, carefully sketched as if by hand in your favorite drawing notebook. Good luck finding them all!

name: ChatBattlers
summary: ChatBattlers is a Twitch Integration game releasing on Steam in September. Steamers have get an interactive 3D set of both Idle, and engaging game mods. Both Transparency support as well as a Stream-Safe LoFi sound track are included. Users can download the app in order to customize their slime with weapons, skins, costumes, and accessories to appear in other streams. Join streams to compete and wind Gems to purchase customization.

name: Crimes of Passion III
summary: Crimes of Passion, Book 3 is the third book of the Crimes of Passion series. It succeeds its first two books, Crimes of Passion, Book 1 and Crimes of Passion, Book 2.

name: Fish Flash
summary: A simple arcade game where you maneuver your net to the left, right, and middle positions to gather as many fish as you can while avoiding the nasty snakes. Playing earns currency that can be spent on cosmetics. Do you love fishing and fashion? Then Fish Flash is for you!

name: Argonauts Path
genres: Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Card & Board Game
summary: A card-based combat roguelike. A fantastic adventure of growth and struggle for the future of humanity. You will help in different villages, fight against incredible creatures and fearsome demons until you reach the 7 divine ones and you will fight against them, if you are up to it.

name: The Traveler
summary: Lost and alone in a cave, you start your adventure jumping and ducking your way through enemies and different environments. Collect coins to upgrade your player & unlock new abilities. Maybe then you'll find the ancient relics that start to reveal how you got here, and maybe...the way out.

name: Jumpy Bunny
summary: Obey the carrots and accept the challenging levels with a silly Bunny! Jump, jump, and jump. This game is about jumping with precision and determination.
storyline:
-Wait... do people really care about this in these kinds of games?
-Hmm, whatever, let's say enough to fill this section with content.

The fearless Bunny faces an intense journey searching for the true reason to exist in a world full of bad vibes. In a post-apocalyptic world where carrots eradicate humanity, and you are the only hope for... the world?
-Well, I guess that's enough, isn't it?

name: Wizlite: Everybody loved RPGs
summary: “Wizlite” is an RPG that merges the old-school command battle system with the popular roguelite genre. It offers gripping moments during battles and while unlocking treasure chests, as well as strategic decisions about whether to advance or rest based on remaining health and spell count.

name: Moth Cry
summary: Moth Cry is a non-linear visual novel about life and its consequences. Experience life alongside the main character. His fate is in your hands.

name: WordLeap
summary: This action-based word game will test your knowledge by giving you higher rewards for less common words. Jump from tile to tile, picking up letters as you go to spell out words that can be exchanged for points.

name: RetroFight
summary: RetroFight is a multiplayer turn-based strategy game for up to 6 players, in which each action change impacts your next turn retroactively. Play games full of twists and become the master of retroactivity!

name: Onyx
summary: A more or less fortunate event led to you receiving your own piece of land, which you can freely develop. You can also explore the already accessible regions of Hyalen to complete quests, obtain new recipes, mine resources and improve your crafting skills.

name: Canvas Menagerie
summary: A slice of life boys love romance about a group of TV actors going through their mid-20s together.

name: Nusantara
summary: The hackable indie turn-based strategy game. The game is feature-rich, with single (PvE) and multiplayer (PvP) content. Different maps, factions, heroes, upgrade trees and randomized map interaction allow for lots of exploration, while rulesets allow for endless replayability. Minigame included!

name: OHV

name: Office Life

name: Ran: Lost Islands
summary: In an era where warriors clashed face to face with cold steel, 100 outcasts converge on a cursed island in search of glory and gold. Only one will leave through violent close quarter combat with katanas, flintlocks, rapiers, and broadswords.

DOOM: The Gallery Experience was created as an art piece designed to parody the wonderfully pretentious world of gallery openings.

In this experience, you will be able to walk around and appreciate some fine art while sipping some wine and enjoying the complimentary hors d’oeuvres in the beautifully renovated and re-imagined E1M1 of id Software's DOOM (1993).

name: JR East Train Simulator: Tokaido Freight Line (Nebukawa to Tokyo, Shinjuku) E257-2000, 5500 Series
summary:
Tōkaidō Freight Line is the common name for tracks on the Tōkaidō Main Line dedicated to freight trains that are separated from passenger trains (freight lines) and branch lines attached to the main line that are mainly used by freight trains (freight branch lines).

Generally, it refers to a series of freight lines and freight branch lines from Hamamatsuchō Station to Odawara Station.

The Tōkaidō Freight Line runs a variety of freight trains to and from the Kansai, Kyūshū regions, some limited express “Shōnan” trains during morning and evening hours, and test runs of new trains and crew training during daytime hours. The trains run alongside passenger lines, pass through long tunnels and elevated shelters through residential areas, and pass through a number of freight stations, allowing to enjoy the unique view of the freight line.

In this DLC, you can drive from Odawara Station to Tōkyō Station via the Tōkaidō Freight Line and Hinkaku Line (Yokosuka Line), which are separate routes from passenger lines, and to Shinjyuku Station via the Yamanote Freight Line.

We hope you will enjoy the different scenery from the passenger line.

name: Killistar
summary: Killistar: A 2D/3D sci-fi shoot-em-up remake of the classic arcade game Sinistar.

name: Hidden Winter Things
summary: Enter a winter fairy tale with cat people, elves and cute atmosphere. Explore a cozy forest and Santa's workshop, uncovering over 300 hidden objects, from winter sweets to magical surprises. Relax with hand-painted scenes and soothing melodies in this enchanting seasonal adventure.

name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Fuddler's Courtship
genres: Music, Puzzle, Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Adventure, Indie
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Mac, Nintendo Switch
summary: In this heartfelt novella-like story of romance, newfound friend Fuddler needs a helping hand to express his feelings.
player_perspectives: Third person, Bird view / Isometric, Text

name: Pocket Mystery EP DX
summary: A surreal, short-form puzzle adventure / horror game built for the GameBoy, POCKET MYSTERY EP DX updates the original POCKET MYSTERY EP with full color graphics, re-designed puzzles, updated music and sound effects, and additional content.

name: Spell Spiral
summary: A fast-paced action shooter game where you fight while managing spells, decks, and mana just like in a card game.

name: Pit of Goblin
summary: In this online horror co-op, you play as a scrappy goblin, scavenging dungeons, dodging traps, and fleeing monsters to feed the Goblin King. Team up with goblin pals, or go rogue, as you dive deep and cause chaos! Fail to feed him, and you might be the next meal!

name: Night Shift Nurses
summary: A washed-up mad doctor is hired back by a devious former test subject and asked to twist her hospital into a corrupt donation mill. Will he seize this second chance to practice his own vision of "science," or will his many failings drag him down once again in this pseudo-medical visual novel?
storyline:
Ryuji Hirasaka. A depraved doctor with severe personality issues. Despite his genius, he has no interest in anything but humiliating and toying with other people, whom he views as nothing more than subjects to use for his experiments.

One day, Hirasaka receives a request to work on a temporary basis at St. Juliana Hospital. Waiting there for him is one of his former victims—Narumi Jinguji.

Narumi makes Hirasaka an unexpected proposal. Her goal is to create the world's most corrupt hospital ward, and she wants Hirasaka’s help to mold the perfect staff for it.

Hirasaka finds himself perplexed by such an extraordinary proposal. However, the chance to finally realize his twisted ambitions is a temptation he cannot resist. Will St. Juliana Hospital become a den of mad science, or will Hirasaka's incompetence and unlikability spell the end for the Night Shift before it even begins?

name: Rocket Rats
summary: Rocket Rats is a survivors-like game where you defeat cheese-based astral bodies in space – as a rat! Clear waves of enemies, collect cheese, upgrade your gear, and conquer the moon!

name: Songs of Conquest: Vanir
summary: Songs of Conquest's first new faction has arrived from the shores of the Bleak East. Conquer the lands of Aerbor as the mighty raiders of Vanir and witness their powerful transformation into the Vildra.

name: Squid Game: Unleashed
summary:
Prepare for fast, heart-pounding action and brutal competition in this multiplayer battle royale game. Play with friends (or enemies) online and see if you have what it takes to outlast and defeat the other Players in each twisted Contest.

With deadly challenges you'll recognize from "Squid Game," the series, and more new games inspired by classic childhood activities, each round is a dark trip down memory lane. Can you make it through playtime alive?

name: Warno: Northag
summary: Warno: Northag brings World War III to the North German Plains, where the attacking Warsaw Pact needs to overcome NATO’s NORTHAG. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations as you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Belgium, the Netherlands, and Poland.

name: Flint: Treasure of Oblivion
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical, Adventure
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5
summary: Experience the golden age of piracy through a strong and original narrative, real-time exploration and turn-based tactical combat in Flint - Treasure of Oblivion.
storyline: The story follows Captain Flint, his second-in-command Billy Bones and his crew of old salts in search of a legendary treasure promising freedom and fortune.

name: Pro Football
summary: Relive the thrill of football management with "PC Football Classic"! Inspired by the classic football managers from 90's, this title invites you to dive into the exciting world of football. A masterpiece of strategy and sports management that challenges your ability to lead your team to glory.

name: Unheim
summary: UNHEIM is a psychological horror surveillance game of exceptional difficulty in which you must not only report anomalies, but also learn to survive paranormal attacks. Every night is a fight for survival against lurking horrors.

name: Birds Organized Neatly
summary: In this 2D puzzle game, you have the responsibility to arrange your avian friends in a way that fits the grid. Birds Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of birds in all shapes and sizes.
storyline:
"The early bird catches the worm!"
Calling all bird enthusiasts and animal lovers! We've got a chirpy surprise for you – a flock of 30 adorable birds waiting to be organized (neatly!).
Our feathered friends come in all shapes and sizes, each with their unique personalities. But with so many of them, our aviary is becoming a bit chaotic.

Please, lend us a helping hand and bring some order to this feathered frenzy. Pick up our little avian friends and gently place them on the grid, making sure each has their own cozy corner.
Don't worry if you rotate them – they might squawk in protest, but these friendly birds won't bite.

name: Penny Blood: Hellbound
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure, Indie
summary: Unleash the hounds from hell and fight your way free of this otherworldly prison in a roguelike adventure that explores the world of Penny Blood’s darker side! Can you find the distinction between good and evil…?

name: A Twisted Path To Renown
summary:
A Twisted Path To Renown: is a Multiplayer, loot-focused, PvEvP extraction shooter, set in the rugged 1899 United States!
Strap on your holster, assemble a posse, and get ready for a rootin'-tooting good time!
Roam the savage lands of the United States during the 1890s and live out your Western dream!
Fight against vicious bandits, or become one yourself as you loot and pillage from the Hills of Tennessee to the Pine forests of Arizona. Fight various factions in an unforgiving land for fame, and fortune!
Stay alert for ferocious wild boars, and bandits who will tan your hide for a chance to steal your precious loot!
Evade the resourceful and cunning Indigenous Peoples of early America to fight another day or attack against all odds for your chance at Legend!
themes: Action, Thriller, Survival, Historical, Stealth, Non-fiction, Sandbox, Warfare

name: Shadows Labyrinth
summary: Embark on a journey through the enigmatic realm of shadows, battling countless creatures to unveil the path towards emancipation.

name: RowBot Rally
summary: Team up with a mechanical pal and row for the gold in the annual Fish Bowl!
storyline:
So, you wanna enter the big annual boat-racing competition! It's quite an important event, you know. Alas, evil “RowBots” have torn the whole tourney from the hands of human — (err, animal?) — racers, and the competition’s only getting worse. By tandem-rowing with a defective junkyard RowBot of your own, it’s your goal to defeat these baddies…but soon you may realize, that these waters go deeper than you thought.

Can you put a stop to the nefarious Robo-X corpo-conglomerate led by the mischievous Shark Boss, put the evil RowBots in their place once and for all, and win back the spirit of the Fish Bowl (and, perhaps more importantly, that big golden trophy)?

name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable
summary: Fight for your life against man-eating Titans in Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable. In a thrilling mix of hunting and action, join the Scout Regiment and put on your Omni Directional Mobility Gear to defend and protect humanity against the Titans.

name: CargoSpace
summary: Deliver packages in a world torn by goddesses. Working for Cargon they guarantee your package will arrive no matter what hazards!

name: Open Wheel Manager 2
summary: Open Wheel Manager 2 - is a management sim for open wheel racing fans who want to venture back to 90s and go wheel to wheel with competitive teams.

name: Dragonyhm
summary:
Experience an epic tale set in a vivid fantasy world.

For a number of years after the age-old conflict with dragons came to a head, the people of Archend have enjoyed an era of peace.

All was well until the esteemed Yhmszindr, Kurtis, went missing, and the sealed dragons began to awaken.

​Explore, solve, and battle your way through this heroic adventure, meeting memorable characters while uncovering the rich history of the land of Archend.

Step into this world as Kris, son of the Yhmszindr, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, put a stop to the plot that threatens the kingdom!​
storyline:
Play as Kris, son of the slayer, embarking on a quest to find him. Meet memorable characters while uncovering the rich history of Archend, and uncover a plot that threatens to destroy the kingdom!
Explore, solve, and battle your way through this heroic adventure!

name: Aurelia: Special Edition
summary: Aurelia is set in a fantastic medieval world full of beautiful women and exotic races. The player will take the role of a young man that inherits his grandfathers house and on a sudden twist of fate becomes entangled with a magician.

name: Reknum: Fantasy of Dreams
platforms: Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
summary: Reknum: Fantasy of Dreams is a 2.5D adventure and exploration game that combines action and the magic of dreams. Join Cheri on her epic quest to uncover the secrets of a dream world filled with strange creatures, puzzles, and surreal landscapes. With hand-drawn frame-by-frame graphics and an instrumental soundtrack that captures the essence of a dream, every step of this journey is a work of art.
storyline:
What would you do to mend the past? Is facing your fears the solution to become stronger?… or perhaps the key to making amends? change or protect the future, what would you do to make up for an injury done to a loved one?… Let’s look for answers in this classic platform adventure full of challenges, puzzles, combats and more!

Explore the thematic levels in their different routes, unlock new weapons and upgrade your skills, decipher the poetic words of the ancestors to find your meaning of existence while restoring order to the kingdom, fight fearsome bosses inspired by classic gameplay, travel through the dreamworld and reach the real final outcome.

As long as the Kingdom of Reknum has existed there have been legends of a powerful secret hidden within that land. The myths speak of Sacred Crystals, rich in power, but unable to be claimed by any who were not deemed worthy. For only someone who had a soul as pure as driven snow, with wisdom and courage to match, would be able to lay claim to that power.

name: Aurelia
genres: Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Visual Novel
summary: Aurelia is an game set in a magic-filled medieval world. Play as a young man that becomes fatefully entangled with a mysterious magician. Explore the land, bedding exotic beauties along the way!
storyline:
In this sensual adult adventure game, you'll take the role of a young adventurer who returns to his newly-inherited childhood cottage in the realm of Aurelia.

By a sudden twist of fate, you come across a mystical amulet right as you walk in the door. A simple touch sets in motion a magical chain of events that begins with a mysterious woman seeking refuge in your home.

Enjoy your time in Aurelia and forge paths that lead to new adventures and new experiences. Along your journey, you'll be able to meet a bounty of beautiful women. Find your way into their hearts—and beneath their skirts!

name: Fishing the Abyss
summary: This is a relaxing atmospheric game where you simply watch a robot catch creatures. Place it at the edge of your screen like a vertical desktop accessory and observe the ecosystem. It’s neither an idle game with mountains of stats nor an exciting fishing game.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Union of Land & Sea
summary: Prepare for epic battles on both the ground and seas with content from World of Tanks Modern Armor and World of Warships: Legends, including a Premium tank and Premium ship!

name: World of Warships: Legends - United Force
summary: Join forces on land and at sea with this bundle for both World of Warships: Legends and World of Tanks Modern Armor! It includes a Premium ship, a Premium tank, and more useful items.

name: Gold Mining Simulator + Mini Machines DLC
summary:
DOUBLE PACK set includes realistic gold mining simulator GOLD MINING SIMULATOR and MINI MINING MACHNIES DLC:
Fulfill your dream, become the best and richest gold miner!

name: Enlisted: "Firestorm" Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:

- M26 T99 Squad
- Type 5 Ho-Ri Prototype Squad

name: War Thunder: Two Fronts Bundle
The Jackbox Naughty and Nice Bundle
summary: The Jackbox Naughty and Nice Bundle includes 4 party games to appeal to your group’s sweet and scandalous sensibilities! Perfect for get-togethers with family or friends!

name: Tummy Bonbons: The Sweet Monster
summary: Eat candy. Get spookier. Scare children into giving you their candy. Eat it. Choose new bellies. Then eat more candy, as much as you can!

name: A Dual Ascent
summary:
"Once upon a time, there was a mountain; a mountain so tall, it touched the sky. It was the Great Mountain of Wonders.

An Old Pilgrim, who came from a land far away, was on his way to the summit.

But a fallen Little Star had the exact same idea, for she thought she might return home, if she reached the top of the Mountain..."

name: Debug Deadline
summary: The main character is hired as a debugger at the game company “Dokidoki Games”! With a time limit of one week, will he be able to find the bug safely? The debugging work with fate on the line begins now!

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Seven Symphonies
summary: From the creator of "Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Special Episode 0" comes another ROM hack which will continue the events of both Special Episode 0 and Explorers' late postgame! This time, the plot will unfold throughout the legendary Destiny Tower, which will have a drastically different nature to the one we already knew in several PMD titles.

name: Big Blind
summary: Where Sound Becomes Sight, Style Meets Violence. Step into the world of darkness as a blind protagonist who sees through sound in this stylish 2D top-down shooter where every kill matters and style is everything.

name: Gift Collector
summary: Gift Collector is a New Year's horror game from the first person, in the Japanese style and genre of walking simulator. Collect gifts and make the kids happy on New Year's Eve. But don't forget that Midnight is a time of miracles!
storyline: Gift Collector [ギフトコレクター] - this is a New Year's horror game from the first person, in the Japanese style and genre of walking simulator. Collect gifts and make the kids happy on New Year's Eve. But don't forget that Midnight is a time of miracles!

name: Lonely Christmas
summary:
Lonely Christmas is an indie horror walking simulator from the first person. Feel the festive atmosphere during the day and the scary atmosphere of loneliness at night.

Feel the Christmas atmosphere! The house is located in a beautiful place among a centuries-old forest. Kevin was left there alone as his parents had gone to the shop and left him a lot of tasks to prepare for the holiday.

In the evening, Kevin hears on the radio that a crazy robber has escaped from the convoy and that he may be near his house. You have to keep the robber out of the house, call the police and wait for your parents. Good luck.
storyline: It’s a story about an 8-year-old boy Kevin who was left alone at home at Christmas. Protect your house from a crazy robber and wait for your parents. Can you handle with it? We’ll find out.

name: Infernal Legions
summary: Infernal Legions is a single map in MBF21 format that reimagines Alien Vendetta map 25: Demonic Hordes.

name: Purgatory
summary: A 34 Level Megawad Inspired by PSX Doom & Doom 64 with heavy influence from Doom 3 & Quake

name: Nitrogen Narcosis
summary: Nitrogen Narcosis is a thalassophobes deep diving nightmare, set in sinking and sunk abandoned facilities. You and up to 7 other employees wearing the cheapest deep-dive suit money can buy are sent in to recover old materials from these facilities and return it to your captains submarine!

name: Caustic Industry
summary: DBP69: Caustic Industry is a new limit-removing (cl2) megawad designed for Doom 2, with maps made by the Doomer Boards over the course of two months, led by @BiZ. The project theme was 'Industrial facilities made of rusted metal and concrete, rivers of neon nukage, and hazardous crushers.'

name: Saloon King
summary: A short, cinematic western shooter with wild, fast-paced spray 'n' pray action! Help a sharp-shootin' renegade on a mission to take over the saloon. Shoot first, ask questions never. Clear out anyone daring enough to stand in your way!

name: Storage Anomaly
summary: Storage Anomaly is a memory and puzzle game in which you have to identify anomalies in a dark and spooky storage room using your phone, while overcoming unexpected challenges.
storyline:
The game starts with a normal version of the storage room, which you can explore to familiarize yourself with the area. This phase is crucial, as you must memorize the layout of objects, the lighting, the sounds of the environment, and the objects you can interact with.

When an anomaly is suspected, you must use your phone to take a photo of it and report it to your boss. For this, you will need Wi-Fi, which will force you to leave the storage room. As the game progresses, unexpected events will complicate your task. Each found anomaly earns you $10. You can choose to save this money to end the game when you reach $100 or spend it on upgrades that will help you search for anomalies.

name: InKing
summary: Inking is a fast-paced 2D top-down action game. Players take on the role of an ink bottle warrior on a journey to become the king of tools. Use your fast attacks, moves, and powerful skills to defeat the tools that stand in your way, prove that ink and pen are the best tools, and become the King of Tools.

name: Balantica
summary: Safely guide the twins to the altar. The path to the altar branches into multiple routes, each filled with trials and unexpected events awaiting the twins. As their companion, you will choose their path, build a deck of cards to give hope and overcome increasingly challenging trials.

name: Dr. Cog
summary: Dr. Cog is a deck-building roguelike game using gears. Operate the memory restoration machine, turn gears, discover and enhance them, and build synergies. Complete the memory restoration within the time limit, recover the client's lost memories, and reach the final chapter.

name: Bone to Gather
summary: "Bone To Gather" is a synergy-building action roguelike. Embark on an epic journey with a team of puny skeletons determined to revenge the Demon King. Recruit skeletons with unique synergies to create a powerful team and battle through monsters on your way to the final showdown.

name: Enscroll
summary: Fresh out of Magic Academy with a hefty student loan, you must craft and sell magic scrolls to pay off your debt. Create spells for demanding customers and manage your growing loan payments. Will your magical skills be enough to free you from student debt?

name: Crab Game 2
summary: Crab Game 2 is a multiplayer PvP game with up to 30 players where you have to survive different mini games to be the last one standing.

name: Dino-Ducks Dash
summary:
Dino-Ducks Dash is a 2D Hi-Score Multiplayer Runner with PvP and Co-Op or you can even play it as a single player to beat the leaderboard.

It has a couch co-op mode and an online co-op mode, but you can also beat the stuffing out of the other cute Dino Ducks with a machete!

name: Pic-Me!
summary: Test how well you know your fellow players and how creative you can be! In this turn-based card game, the goal is to find the perfect word to describe one of the images on your cards—not too easy, but not too difficult either. If your description isn't good enough, your opponents will have a chance to steal points with a better-fitting card. But if your description is too obvious, everyone scores points—except you! Only those who strike the perfect balance have a chance to win!

name: Awaria
summary: Welcome to the tunnel maintenance crew. If the generators fail, it's your job to fix them. Check what's wrong, craft all the needed parts and deliver them. It's simple. Just stay clear of anything that randomly cracks bolts of electricity, spews fire, throws sharp pieces of scrap at high-velocity or radiates with ominous green light.

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange in the Whimsical Library
summary: The Capybaras with Orange are back! Find them all in the fantastic library. Search for them between books and on the stained glass windows. Light them up at night with amazing colors.

name: Submarine Survivor
summary: Dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures, and collect their experience crystals. Upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips.

name: Death Moon
summary: DEATH MOON is a murder mystery death game visual novel inspired by games like Danganropa. However, ironically, in this "death game", death itself is not permanent. Every time you die, you open your eyes at the start of the loop forever trapped in an endless game of death and misery.

name: Lullaby Data
summary: Follow the story of Lullaby and Echo in a futuristic world. Mixing action and adventure, meet many unusual characters, play numerous mini games, and explore space to discover the secrets of Lullaby and the mad gods.

name: Miglorn
summary: Gather resources and strategically build up your Viking settlement by day, fortifying it to withstand the relentless onslaught of skeletons by night

name: Shenaniganza
summary: Outsmart friends in goofy hide-and-seek with crazy power-ups, vibrant cartoon aesthetics, and endless laughter. Form alliances, betray buddies, and experience multiplayer mayhem in this unpredictable, entertaining game. Get ready for a bonanza of fun – where laughs never stop!

name: Micron Defense Force
summary: A Roguelike Tower Defense in space with missions to conquer. Can you hold against the spreading alien bosses? Build and upgrade towers against the corruption. Choose your technologies and warpspeed your way to victory.

name: Idle Colony
summary: A condensed incremental experience, where you build a colony to collect and merge bigger and bigger fruits. Combine game-changing technologies and special upgrades to find the best synergies and take your cash flow to another dimension.

name: Teachers Secrets
summary: In "Teacher's Secret" you become a young student who accidentally discovers that teachers hide deeply hidden secrets and romances.

name: Berkeley's Maid: Remake Edition
summary: The ghosts of the past, recounting the tragic past

name: Bunches For Bart!
summary: After a particularly hefty loss in the local Casino, Bart, the Bleeding Heart Monkey, must make his way towards his new fortune -- a fountain full of banana bunches! Located at... the top of the tallest mountain in Africa?

name: The Ape Tales: An Epic Adventure Game
summary: Experience an epic 2D adventure game by becoming the legendary ape who is the last hope for innocent animals. Traverse through diverse realms and eras, encountering evil that threatens your species. Prepare for the unexpected as each location unveils unique enemies and challenges that you will face.

name: Dungeons and Ducklings
summary: Dungeons and Ducklings is a Retro - PacMan - Roguelite Adventure. Help Mama Duck rescue her ducklings from the evil Lich by navigating his dark dungeon. Use powerful attacks to create your own path through the Lich's maze.

name: Green Hell VR: Co-op Mode
platforms: Meta Quest 2, PlayStation VR2, Meta Quest 3
summary: Gather your team, ready your tools, and work together in order to survive a hostile and unforgiving jungle when the mode launches in 2024.
storyline:
Follow the story of Jake Higgins, a famous anthropologist, who is thrown deep into the emerald and impenetrable Amazonian rain forest - the green hell. What you discover there will be worse than what you have ever fought against to survive. Find yourself stranded in this dangerous jungle, surrounded by predators with only a trusty smartwatch, backpack, and a survival guide to help you stay alive.

Green Hell VR now also includes the Spirits of Amazonia Update - a prequel which presents the adventures of Jake set before the events of the original Green Hell.
Your main goal will be to gain the trust of the Mu'agi tribe, along with the chief of the native Amazonian village. To accomplish this, you will need to complete missions relating to the local legends, to help out tribe members, and to provide supplies for the village, all rebuilt and tailored for the VR platform.

name: Asteroid King
summary: Fast pace shooter that mainly focuses on Fun Factor, game mechanics and AWESOME FACTOR! The game is a blast from the past with updated features. If you are looking for a game with great mechanics and cool factor, you have found it!

name: On Your Tail
summary: Embark on an intriguing seaside getaway you’ll never forget in On Your Tail, a sleuthy story-driven 3D life sim of relaxation, investigation, and knowing how to play your cards right.

name: Brood Ma: Dadda
summary: Manipulate the limbs of a fragile automaton to shape an immense dynamic noise score.

name: Neko Odyssey
summary: Here’s a slightly unusual Casual Adventure game where the main gameplay centers around taking pictures of cats. The pixel art graphics in a 3D setting create a charming atmosphere reminiscent of Japanese animation.

name: The Static
summary: Tune into The Static, a 3D-platformer with a twist. Float, fly, bounce and surf the channels in the mysterious static-soaked universe behind the television screen. Challenge creepy creatures, solve puzzles and overcome elaborate platforming challenges with your ghostly companion.

name: Builder Simulator VR
summary: In Builder Simulator VR, you will take on the role of a real builder and feel as if you are standing on a construction site. Design, create, and complete your project. Plan every detail and see your construction from different perspectives. Use a variety of materials and tools.

name: Coffee Shop Simulator
summary: Have you ever wanted to run a coffee shop? Now you can start your coffee shop in the beautiful city of New York. As an entrepreneur buy your coffee shop, renovate it, and sell coffee.

name: Long Live Caesar
summary: 44 BC. Caesar, dictaror of Rome, finds out that the threat of conspiracy comes from the people closest to him. Can you resist the impending danger and rewrite history?

name: Cafe Paris
summary: Welcome to a game about coffee and conversation. This is a 3D narrative coffee shop sim located in the heart of Paris. You run a 24/7 open coffee shop between the foot of the Eiffel Tower & the banks of the Seine river. Serve coffee & food to your customers and learn about their stories.

name: Dino Running from a Furry: Gamesforfarm
summary: Run, Dino, run! You can't fall into the clutches of Mr. Furry

name: City Noodle Shop Simulator
summary: This is a simulation game about the operation of a Chinese noodle restaurant. You will play the role of the owner of the noodle restaurant and develop a reasonable cost control strategy for the store, ultimately achieving profitability and development for the store

name: The Noexistencen of You and Me
summary: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: We Three Gifts
summary: We Three Gifts is a single MBF21 map for Doom 2 (MAP01) made by Dreadopp and Lord_ Z utilizing the 32in24-15 texture pack and some of Doom Christmas: Enhanced's resources.

name: Mima's Magical Wardrobe
summary: Help Mima get ready for a hot date. Or maybe it's for a job interview? Maybe it's for protesting on the streets. Who knows?

name: 100 Korea Cats: Extra Content
summary: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Korea Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: Eco Ronin
summary: Grapple, jetpack, shoot, and slash through procedural worlds. Collect philosophy pages, craft items, and go to space. A precision-platformer and action-roguelike made in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Undercover
summary: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?

name: Just Squat
summary: Just Squat is a shmup and visual Nobel game that focuses on boss fight by growing up a boy. Grow the boy by encountering various events at the gym and school, and push Babel out with all your might! The difficulty of boss fight and the boy's growth will be determined by the exercise you choose!

name: Intergalactic Storage Clearance
summary: In this light-hearted adventure, you must outwit competitors in bidding wars to secure storage containers scattered across alien worlds. The objective is to uncover valuable objects hidden within them and turn a profit by selling them on the intergalactic market.

name: 100 Korea Cats
summary: 100 Korea Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Korean themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Korean places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?
storyline: Can you find them all?

name: Novice Dungeon Master
summary: [Novice Dungeon Master] is a dungeon management simulation set in a fantasy world of dungeons and adventures. Turn your beginner dungeon into the ultimate dungeon of your dreams. Greet adventurers who come to visit your dungeon, grow herbs, summon monsters, and more!

name: Wonderland: The Visualized Girl
summary: Use "game" as a medium to showcase the world of "you/girl". Explore the truth of "you/girl/world" through the form of a "visual novel".

name: Simply Rotate
summary: Simply rotate is a minimalist physics puzzle game where you rotate a level to get a ball to reach the goal while saving up on rotation for future stages. Learn the new mechanics introduced in every level and master conserving rotation between levels to reach the goal.

name: Cufflinks & Cages
summary: You've been locked in Chastity by your cruel boss, will you submit to her sadistic whims, or let the company find our your secret in this Futa-on-futa chastity focused Visual Novel!

name: Mighty Marbles
summary: Get ready for a thrilling challenge that will test your skills and wits. Guide lively marbles through mesmerizing mazes, manipulating virtual buttons, levers, and even gravity itself. Conquer sixty levels across four stunning worlds.

name: Anime City
summary: Anime City reinvents classic visual novel mechanics by transferring them into full 3D environment. Study at anime high school, engage in after school clubs, and attempt to win love of one of your classmates.

name: Outbreak: Urban Jungle Collection
summary: Hundreds of hours of undead adventures await in this collection spanning ten years of the Outbreak series!

name: The Fallow City
summary: Shoot Zombies with different Strength and Weakness, do Simple Crafts and Upgrades, Fight Monsters, Solve Puzzles, get Haunted by Creepy Creatures and Experience the Story in this Indie Horror, Action-Adventure, Story game.

name: Farm
summary: Chaos has taken over the pasture! Take on this addictive challenge where you need to help the farm animals find their pairs and escape the pen. Move cows, piglets, sheep, and more, organising them to free up space and ensure everyone gets out happy.

name: Fading Star Melody
summary: Animation System Visual Novel "Fading Star Melody"

name: Meet Santa
summary:
Did you ever want to meet Santa? Well, now you can! At least if you can win a match of Nutcracker Run!
Sir Creakwood is ready to take on any opponent—do you have the skill (or luck) to beat him? Roll your way to victory and burn this old wooden creature... for real... please, do it, this thing creeps me out! Who the hell designed these things?!

name: Cavalry Charge
summary: Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms is a game that combines the historical theme of the Three Kingdoms with strategic elements. The game features a connected large-scale map design, supporting national wars with up to ten thousand players on the same map.

name: Portal Balls
summary: ROLL INTO ACTION!

name: 2000s Rock Legends: Music Pack
summary: Get ready to rock with the '2000s Rock Legends' DLC for Smash Drums! Featuring iconic banger tunes from a decade of musical revolution, this pack brings you 5 of the most celebrated hits that defined the rock scene of the early millennium. Immerse yourself in the beats that fueled legendary festivals and iconic rock moments. Don't miss out on this blast from the past—turn up the volume and let the nostalgia kick in!

name: The Underworld of Brain Damage
summary: Players can't attack. Players need to avoid attacks in the game and lead monsters' attacks to other monsters. Let the monster kill himself! ! ! The game map is random, the elements in the map are random, and there are many strange props, so that players have different game experiences every time.

name: Crazy Shipping
summary: Crazy Shipping is a free-to-play space trading and logistics management game. Players run a transportation company using ships piloted by cats, delivering cargo and passengers between stations across the solar system. The game features a risk-reward system where players balance legitimate deliveries against more profitable but risky "hot" cargo, while managing station alert levels and random events. Progress is made by expanding your fleet, purchasing stations, and upgrading facilities using currency earned through gameplay and optional in-game purchases.

name: ConsTance
summary: ConsTance is a puzzle game where you have to solve different puzzles in order to discover the secret of the game.

name: Compactory
summary: Team up with your friends in a small space to produce as many resources as you can!

name: The Guardian Shift
summary: The Guardian Shift is a whimsical adventure about a young guardian, awakened from slumber, who faces a series of perilous trials to fulfill their destiny of safeguarding the planet. Despite the daunting challenges, the guardian must rise to the occasion and protect the world. Go forth, Guardian.
storyline: The Guardian Shift is a whimsical adventure about a young guardian, awakened from slumber, who faces a series of perilous trials to fulfill their destiny of safeguarding the planet. Despite the daunting challenges, the guardian must rise to the occasion and protect the world. Go forth, Guardian.

name: Traumatarium: Penitent
summary:
A dungeon crawler inspired by the Fighting Fantasy books and Warhammer Quest 1995.

The followup to Traumatarium, Penitent aims to improve on the success of the original, while improving and expanding on almost all aspects. You have three distinct dungeons to overcome, all while managing scarce resources and making hard decisions on when to push on, or use a map to return to the safety of one of the few outposts found in those dark halls.

Traumatarium Penitent takes place well after the events of the original game. The kingdom's knights have broken into two factions: the Penitents, who swore to pay off their sins in defense of the kingdom, and the Ebon Legion, who aim to bring forth again the evil spirits that once haunted the land.

name: Night Project
summary: Night Project is the first game to introduce you to the history of corporate Degrees Intertainment. As you progress through the game, you will be able to find notes that will fully describe to you the entire deep history of the largest corporation in this game universe. The main antagonist is not a successful experiment of the Degrees Laboratories companies, called the "Kili project". Your task is not only to search for keys and notes, but also to simultaneously deceive the AI, whose task is to scare you as much as possible.
